user_reviews: [{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We really liked this location. What good customer service! Fresh and delicious! The store is clean and organized even in the kitchen is clean.  The washroom is also clean. A lot of parking. My husband always likes to come by for lunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5zhMz6XoiGMDh5Cahcb2bvGjjkdq39sEfPP6V\u0026fid=0x0:0xe2f5357fd679af22"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Samantha Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUlM-2rB8OtiW9hDniE1MhXAbwnDPYOBzgfv7kFAHS2eIHrpCV2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff and team here make great pizza and have amazing service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObAtl865SbBOcFj_yvnQAz3FgzEEp8GElyj1n5\u0026fid=0x0:0xe2f5357fd679af22"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"irshad Alam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBiceHD41WruRGOl0t2MOUIBPoRdfY8zh9XbILuuK-Rk-skw4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They won’t let you choose toppings by yourself, even though you ask, they behave like we are fool, I told I will choose the toppings, then they asked me to wait and did not let me choose my toppings. And I asked for no crust but they did not, moreover  they behave so bad, worst customer service, and my pizza was like I am eating some vegetables with a sauce and was nothing like a pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSmRIlRXM_hdxpgvdDU30CMEuq2PYYo2pF3ffD\u0026fid=0x0:0xe2f5357fd679af22"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Grovr X","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKf45t0arSAA66w-92VJS7ZYkJQmi3mCjAt2vleR1dNrC8o6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"“Chiranjeev at Fresh Slice makes amazing pizzas! Delicious, perfectly cooked, and full of flavor. Highly recommend his pizzas!”","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfedztO2nRcF8LL_4gfJJ96bL5qYu7tX7_jNCz\u0026fid=0x0:0xe2f5357fd679af22"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Embellished Trinkets","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnj6xAHz8D20Pw4G9NwqmNUxyBgoEqbLcj6wfrb6D0uN7KYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered regular crust pizza and the pizza that arrived was so thin, you could see the sauce leaking through the bottom which made the pizza so incredibly soggy and flimsy that the kids couldnt even eat it without falling apart. Asked for hot sauce on the side so the adults could add it on after and we were literally given a teaspoon amount, the cup is always filled up so I'm not sure what this was about. We order from here frequently and this is the worst we've received. It's made me not want to order from here again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNY3puIuVktkZjg7SX6HIHzTjhhJmTMy-_KPILp\u0026fid=0x0:0xe2f5357fd679af22"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Draws Mp32","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVa76eeqHQryxDZiaPkkF8TMW7ygHRX2jlaIYwhLmenqMHS-Shc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They are super friendly here! Never had a sour experience. Was an easy call and picked it up nice and warm. I love the white sauce lots :).","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shifali","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI5pnUicRa2V3MCYPI-A-4-VpzvEyV2Y3E3pHL63-AthW7WCqmc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve picked the order from Dharmik and he is so friendly. Amazing service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_a_ktYojdh5FVYamZkJBwuekiRFWhlk2v6hVw\u0026fid=0x0:0xe2f5357fd679af22"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"S “Happyindodge” A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUo7ykHjsdauQqMJEhInJ8RlXuVBgqg_-mpTf2POs7m4WxjA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Best 2 pizzas in my opinion are the butter chicken and chicken bacon ranch. Also love that they use white sauce on the cheese pizza","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bonnie Acko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7W9_LRpWW1Wg7jrsjcJXqIqtyhH9cmYYWABcZeHaU-SqOAo7N=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a great breakfast here, food was delicious and good portions. Great service and coffee. It feels like an old fashioned Canadian diner,  a real friendly atmosphere. The family that runs the restaurant are very welcoming and friendly! We will definitely be repeat customers! Thanks so much! ❤️🇨🇦","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_wfNrYM-BvKUqRcwsC_XejuvPt6YhFjeknISx&fid=0x0:0x12e8d9c8ec59cc15"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Sandra Braga Davidson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVb0zhic3XQWJsDL0A4TJ6SQOyjsvK6E15aalppaOgkYRYZH2K2xQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best is not just the name of this place.
They mean it!

I love the coffee ( especially when it comes with this adorable kitty spoon) and the food is always great.

They have vegetarian options  and curly fries.

We come here at least once a month and  the service and food are consistently great.

PS: Even if the parking lot is busy on weekends check inside.
There are a lot of hockey families on the outside, but you may get lucky and grab a nice booth followed by amazing food!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNVPmNlDXXaA2zktedx3pZezR4lfvVYaynFGKE&fid=0x0:0x12e8d9c8ec59cc15"],"When":"2024-3-24"},{"Name":"Ton V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb4h6oZDMjakZ7o0kpJmjp_i41AvhfJ62KCrl6wCnDvytBpv4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice diner for breakfast and brunch. Love the option of half bennies if you don’t have a big appetite. Good portions for the regular Their bacon is like thin sliced pork-belly, different from smoky salty bacon, but actually nice. The ambiance is simple, the chairs are rock hard (the benches are better), and they had Tom Jones’  ‘Green green grass of home’ on repeat, but not annoyingly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRlwTGF_LLr0_Sb87vMIrmYMuXiCo-kh_e5o8&fid=0x0:0x12e8d9c8ec59cc15"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Lauren St John","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWi3pWsd_jh8y8V1Pl7XbMiNRgCVHq-YYCdAOx_KkkOFRnXREk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The "best" greasy spoon place! Loved my salmon egg bennies. Generous portions served in a diner-style venue that's in an industrial area of Langley. Friendly staff. Decent menu. Competitive prices. Good value. Would definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQyIadNDb8cy2B0P-dzF8lKmTkuaKj6VhzVeGu&fid=0x0:0x12e8d9c8ec59cc15"],"When":"2024-1-12"},{"Name":"Kerri Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyd1968zbaqfOY0E9-I8F3-w-rXBcTc5CtbLTOkgw4AYR22IUTqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here and it was excellent! We will definitely be back! Our order came out much faster than we expected and everything was hot and cooked perfectly.
I had an eggs Benny that I couldn't wait to dive into so  the photo of it is half eaten, and my partner got the dish with the burger patty on rice and said it was very good as well.
Servers were very kind and attentive.

Would recommend to everyone looking for good food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvRXkwxOoXj7LKdwmJ8ae9tsgl6371TD-W50Pa&fid=0x0:0x12e8d9c8ec59cc15"],"When":"2023-12-5"},{"Name":"Shannon Mundy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKepxe-nWptGEqB20pe6-OmOcvR3_xcn62pIGDl0tlgvg5fYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered via skip. Eggs benedict French toast and a salad. The food phenomenal two differences that I would do stop taping the utensils up impossible to open. Fry the hash browns on both sides not just one side. Other than that perfect.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"V Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-Qz_zR8NAjeqpRnuANXJcQGSLJzNuS-ETk_THk3z82H5rG6U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great brunch place. Food is fresh and you can tell they put effort into the quality of their food. Ordered sandwich and egg benedict and both were very tasty. If you want a simple breakfast that taste good for decent prices, this place is worth a visit. I have to add, the hash browns were very well made. Crunchy and brown on the surface but soft inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPsGwqgbf3VH--M2ZORLQUwvb5gw8uGl9LB55V&fid=0x0:0x12e8d9c8ec59cc15"],"When":"2023-7-31"},{"Name":"John R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJL0lMBkSYNzCoU3e3EtZTweMG9yrj7XdtrRXZG14WJ3tNoMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I were on the hunt for a new place for eggs Benedict as Browns Socialhouse changed their version into something that was horrible. After searching Google for the best eggs Benedict near me, they suggested the usual chain restaurants but up popped Best Grill and after looking at this location it seemed to be in a fairly obscure place. My wife remembered seeing it on her drive to work every day and after looking at all the great reviews we figured we'll give it a try and we were not disappointed. The atmosphere is more like a 50s diner and has a very full menu with fresh ingredients. The service is quick the food was excellent and now we know we have a new place to go to. The Eggs Benedict were awesome. Looking forward to trying some other menu items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSrTH2Tj8o2PBRtCrZOaRyJTy2DIqEC7V7R2aN&fid=0x0:0x12e8d9c8ec59cc15"],"When":"2023-8-14"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Robert Penny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3N1jxsPRsqRXyVSNL1iF9JmTu6z80CrY8YV-0J7hm0PGKNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in to try this Pizzeria for the 1st time tonight on the way back from work, I'm from Alberta, by the way. I have to give the place a solid 5 stars for the pizza I received. I asked for pepperoni, mushrooms, bacon and beef. I thought for a second I should also ask for extra cheese but I am happy I didn't. They were very generous with the cheese and it was more than enough to be honest. This pizza is absolutely delicious and I will eat again here myself and highly recommend this place if you have never tried it for yourself. A large with the mentioned toppings was $23 tax included. Thank you for the great service and fantastic pizza, much appreciated!!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jesse Elliott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtMV2K-SMNxNkehUpyacG5MTg1IZ65wAg_iIAEV01uxfBXVxA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Favourite pizza joint for over 10 years! Then a couple owner changes and complete disaster! Never will support the new regime! Half as much for twice the cost! Never again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ken Rideout","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8HSe_A_L_yXL-4CBdWed0rfl8DUY4bWtwkF97usLDw5Ciug3Cuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Looks like their back at it with yummy pizza and pasta again . Got a large Pep and Spaghetti both delish !!  No shortage of garlic butter on the G toast thanks 🙏 better too much than too little. OH and the pizza crust is finally nice and “crusty” doesn’t seem undercooked anymore . Thanks for the fast delivery too !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnCYXvg8CiOIKlmEt8zq9Ib0A85e35T5CEu3ad\u0026fid=0x0:0xc5d464d82de3ad7c"],"When":"2024-2-26"},{"Name":"Tyler Logan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKGZmsORCQdB1IHRQB7z7qrpbaz5-_i-oXp-9BvLViqBOzpA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered Ravioli off the website. No clue it was door dash who handles the orders. I gave the drive specific delivery instructions “I’m in basement around back, sliding glass door closest to VW Jetta”, pretty simple. I get a notification that my order has been delivered but it hasn’t. I call the delivery driver to find out where my food is and I didn’t understand him but he refused to come back to deliver my food. I contact the store and they put it off on door dash. I have no order number and no way to complain to door dash so now I’m without my dinner and nobody wants to rectify the situation. I will not support this business and I hold a good grudge so I will be vocal to my friends, family and anyone I can influence to not support them.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Payton Walmsley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXns5FJXwB8gq8gnoKJHpK_lFPspm_ylnUz1e9pZkdH1muiNdyh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here two times and they have been perfect so far! I really recommend as it's food is perfect and has thought put into it","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kunal Basra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0H5djIa7le9w8MCpXKW2_IAJAHAgYkTPD0zLAAxFMG94K-YwZnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're a fan of amazing pizza, this place is a must-try! Their Meat Lover and Greek pizzas are absolutely delicious. The Meat Lover pizza is packed with tasty meats, while the Greek pizza is bursting with fresh veggies and tangy cheese. It's a flavor explosion in every bite! You won't be disappointed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Taylor Lambe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2yvMMNP9hZvcqZe_3WgFu7pfdHyWwb05PlUImT77vEmCeuUAk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this pizza place everyone is so friendly and they have the best pizza and a new pizza treat coming out that sounds amazing 10/10 would highly recommend 🤌","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"hardeep singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqKsZZGdrATmbo3C_0YxTzxNENv3Uc_FX4gY6mySOIgoMrj_nk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing egg and cheese pizza must try","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXcQ1sfQToyNIzxt9tbnKjZxDpIJCscRbkjJH8\u0026fid=0x0:0xc5d464d82de3ad7c"],"When":"2024-9-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Carleen Bonneau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7FVBS9PYOSOoXlUDlrWBh7vfrls9D08iy_dtd9RJHI2jmFg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The diner is a cool atmosphere however our experience was that of a 1.5 star. Over promised by the atmosphere  and under delivered in service.
Took our wait staff over 10-15 minutes to talk to us once seated. Another individual that came in after us left due to what seemed like having the menu too long.
Once at our table she asked what we wanted, skipped over drinks & that was the last we saw of her until right at the end. So we were sure to order our drink with the food.
Once we got our food, still had no drink. The person bringing the food said she’d make the hot chocolate and be back with ketchup. She came back with the drink but no ketchup. By the time we stalled our food start and picked at the food for awhile, finally got ketchup , which was soapy from the wait staff having a soapy towel in the same hand. We love soap finger food or fries and ketchup, mmm.
This dining experience reminded us of why we do take out & have minimal aspirations to eat in at this establishment again. Seems like , if we were regulars or seniors, we would have got better service as they engaged with the staff more regularly than we saw our staff. We gave a $2 tip that wasn’t  earned & wished these people the best.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmbuELQUJB2lTcQo1GWDW4TGuQz8RxyfJ5JlfG&fid=0x0:0x6c189cab5ab3cd1a"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"J P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXO2DWHDNkytggbB-qrPWC6NlixBlQFqhqQjG5E3jl1ujR26N8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's very retro and eclectic. The server was very friendly and nice. The burger was plump, full, and juicy. The special house sauce made it extra delicious, and the house fries were crispy.  The milk shakes are super cute with candy on top, but don't expect a thick milkshake. It was more milky. I loved the decorations and classic music.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSUZcPiSkTdj_XOOaZv2R4hz0SAT5932iVZzJ5&fid=0x0:0x6c189cab5ab3cd1a"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"ZING CRUZ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUw_NX8aHJ5JUkCYvAU5jYvk_4mT8o4SuYGok3GnOs97LPbBEtE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They didn't deserve at least 1 star!!!

We placed an order via Uber Eats, which included additional gravy, steak with mushrooms, spaghetti, and baby ribs. However, when we received the food, there were several missing items: no spaghetti, additional gravy, and salad dressings.

I called the restaurant, and the lady who answered said they didn’t have spaghetti and replaced it with fries. However, this was not communicated to us, and fries are already part of our order. Additionally, items were still missing. She also said we needed to pick up the gravy and salad dressing ourselves, which defeats the purpose of ordering online. Moreover, the lady mentioned they are a busy restaurant, put me on hold for more than 5 minutes, and then hung up without even apologizing for the inconvenience.

This is very poor customer service.
August 4, 2024","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYyEty-bSG9VkKyjwL9DhJJ63yxfmPAFaFZebG&fid=0x0:0x6c189cab5ab3cd1a"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Cnd Traveller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-26C44JZC5R8i6BsbPLhkEVgK3nrhrrmm1a9e2hv7ib_7zNbYhg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst service I've ever received! The blonde lady sat us then took 15 mins to take our drink order. When our food arrived, she dropped the plates at our table and left without saying a word. We actually never saw her again! 45 mins later someone else came with our bill.. note the restaurant was empty! Food was very bland, fries cold and overdone.. Definitely sitting for a long time. Save your money. Avoid","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO-PxmXB3sWpMTVXceooYQcGUcJKQWHnkYq6hf&fid=0x0:0x6c189cab5ab3cd1a"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Daniel Stierhof","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTnxC26kuYF9GGcmGnd5PsIIr3J2upRJpAmop0SUGQrXDb68M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Brogans diner is a great place if you want that true diner feel and experience. The dining room is full of old school diner aesthetic. Card board cut out of Elvis, guitars and records. The staff were friendly and the service was quick. It was nice to see a coffee and pie combo as well as the classic breakfast and several other lunch items. Today I decided to try the BLT. The sandwich was delicious, I was offered my choice of bread with crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, and juicy tomatoes. The fries on the side were perfectly seasoned and cooked to perfection. I washed it all down with a hot cup of coffee and finished off with a slice of homemade apple pie. Overall, a fantastic meal at Brogans diner. I will definitely be coming back for more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiJd92zihvjlJXfxpcun8VM_XUSwvEmy2ceLzk&fid=0x0:0x6c189cab5ab3cd1a"],"When":"2024-3-19"},{"Name":"J Bunyan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZShBXdlvweLPhbn4FoF-iFtvG6Klym7mz-dJePwaeRAte4u6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sometimes, things get pretty busy here. The gals at the till and in the diner do their very best to manage the busy days for breakfast or lunch.

For sure, the kitchen does everything they possibly can to keep it fresh and delicious 😋. Once in a while there will be a new waitress, and we all need to learn our jobs. It's all good for the atmosphere. The vibes are such that we don't come here because we're in a hurry. It's an easygoing Saturday, Sunday morning "Sunday funnies" kind of feeling.

But Heeeeyy forget about it!!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVFf8iMabV-Z1QCddP-i7_rSegiUdjkdu0vtX-&fid=0x0:0x6c189cab5ab3cd1a"],"When":"2024-2-4"},{"Name":"Chiara Berton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVoHIPZny_HXjOEt5Mn_N4aw_HMYg4UkNAZOXujodpGJqA3DzM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place!!
We ate 3 different hamburgers, and they were amazing. For the size that they have, they are very cheap and eating while one of your friends is singing at the karaoke is very funny!

It was my friend's birthday and they were so kind giving us a free milkshake 😍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtUEwKyJgnwdx3t-xQn40vFkyW6-e8dLlDxrFO&fid=0x0:0x6c189cab5ab3cd1a"],"When":"2023-3-6"},{"Name":"jenny p","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMaWIyocHc_SoFmV9v4EiaCm1YlMpEqY1RtqHWYCaZR6crhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A great restaurant if you wanna take someone out for a fun experience. Reasonable prices. Greasy diner type of food so if you're looking for health food I'd probably go elsewhere but if you're looking to have some good old American style food then it's a great place to go. The music was great especially if you like oldies and there's tons to look at on the walls while you wait for your order. It sounds like they also donate to the community which also made me feel good eating there. The only thing I'll add is that service is a bit slow (a lot) so I wouldn't go if you're in a hurry but if you aren't in any rush and just want to sit down in a fun atmosphere for some good food then this is a great place. Ok ... The last thing I'll add is that it's also a great place to bring kids (old and young) for a shake, ice cream or a dessert. My 5 year old had the kids size ice cream which was a scoop of ice cream (I think they had 18 flavors to choose from that day) and it was topped with whipped cream, gummy candies and cotton candy (for $3!). Now what kid wouldn't love that! We'll definitely be going back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOe8_Mm3OOhUIWY4lL5SB-1QTttYP0-gLmibinT&fid=0x0:0x6c189cab5ab3cd1a"],"When":"2022-5-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWu2o94-TOfl6ea6WGk9y16UA_lYHgTBLK8OvnBHjJMDWaWjyJ_KA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious donuts and the Christmas donuts are so pretty! The drinks tasted so amazing.  The strawberry latte was my favorite 🤩🤩 The sandwich was filling and so good👍👍 Decent amount of veggies and meat! The interior is so authentic and welcoming. The employees were very nice and my drinks came out fairly quickly! Always a nice place to visit highly recommend 🤩🤩","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM79NmazTRD6JHg-mWeolQrKbkKrz--MqH-kcPM&fid=0x0:0x58318b0cc87b21ad"],"When":"2023-12-23"},{"Name":"James Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRy4tt5VGGL0iK_-djJIfjHplnD1UIaulpbY7EHrDW7VA0yw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I enjoy my coffee time visiting small local coffee shops rather than large coffee franchises, and I happened to visit Craving Cafe in Langley. First of all, the owners here are so nice and the smiles on their faces are always welcoming! The feeling of starting the day in a good mood! The muffins and fresh Americano made here are very delicious. I will definitely come back again for the delicious muffins and kindness.  The muffins I bought disappeared from my house within a day. Who is the culprit?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkMx22awCavRH2pc9J4_iJfe-0RXn542rG3ga7&fid=0x0:0x58318b0cc87b21ad"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"GAYOUNG YIM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOxjwg2ECu_HdnyP6F4Go8-QV5A7Mgkj299r36xfLo6f_cBcGNwg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is truly amazing.  The staff are honest and faithful.  The store is clean and the desserts are absolutely delicious.  Don't be disappointed if you arrive a little late and there are only a few donuts left on the shelves.  Even they are extremely yummy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDBE_ETgakNfoBuykFx86WggiZ6QzIK13PeU2H&fid=0x0:0x58318b0cc87b21ad"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Ifra Kanwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmiUZg-RsxkK3Mc9a0s0Mq3C6T2gv50hGlaDf75E7WozdTqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I can't believe this! I’ve been coming to this coffee shop every single day, spending my money on their drinks. But the one day I didn’t buy anything and just sat at a table waiting, I got kicked out! The place was practically empty, with only one other customer there. The owner had the audacity to treat me like this. It’s unbelievably rude and disrespectful!

In response to Cravings:
Here is evidence of one of the drinks I have bought from here just yesterday.
Also can you please explain what kind of calculations are being done here? Sitting in your cafe for less than 1 hour has suddenly become hours? If I hadn't ordered ONE day and was waiting in an EMPTY cafe with one other customer, that means it is okay to ask me to leave?

This is the kind of service provided here at this cafe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPwlOAljF-oV-RQwglKdPV5OkX-eiiakDhDjtc&fid=0x0:0x58318b0cc87b21ad"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Megan Goss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLM_CNHtIyteUQ7SdZF6o8XoyQQWhhJ4EgAxGNurEXxoPk1eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cravings in Brookswood is an absolute gem! Their coffee is out of this world—so smooth and flavorful, it’s the perfect start to my day every time. The service? Beyond amazing! The staff are always so friendly and make you feel right at home.

And don’t even get me started on the muffins… they are to die for! My personal favorite is the Sunrise Muffin—it’s like a little piece of heaven in every bite. Honestly, I can’t get enough of it!

If you haven’t been to Cravings yet, do yourself a favor and go ASAP. You’ll fall in love just like I did! ☕️🧁","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjt2jYHxMFs-uneKvVEMMXCwJpYt8iRfW8gopLQadPD9JGqDkgvg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a cute cafe! My new favorite cafe at Brookswood 😊 the deco is so cute, owners and staff are friendly, and their baking is soo good. Ordered the blueberry streudel, cream cheese raspberry muffin, and sugar cinnamon donut. All were really good, but blueberry streudel is probably my favorite. Would 100% go again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcNRylFK9wF1c8U2dRIn4xhlMGGIwkXe-_fNYD&fid=0x0:0x58318b0cc87b21ad"],"When":"2023-12-17"},{"Name":"jason K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLuZpGDNIETcsC2RoXQsY1-7xpBe0XzD-13qV_rzMSHVjFk4s0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the best muffin of my life! Cozy atmosphere, warm service, and delicious muffin. All I could do is wish it was near home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAw68fpVqpmTXJ-bWhew4drCxgJFQSipK4yg2k&fid=0x0:0x58318b0cc87b21ad"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Cathy Lyu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4TUJxvrdvSzWg4zZZUNyR1RgYlU64Iaey52yFzs4dAqUqpxw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cute little cafe in town! Tried their muffins, donuts, and sandwiches, and they were all great. Can’t wait to come early next time and try their espresso muffin 😀
The owner and staffs were very friendly and their drinks were good too.

Highly recommended 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEkHKJe-g71KPoGNjl9JSj0r3HkCo2FDuyHuma&fid=0x0:0x58318b0cc87b21ad"],"When":"2023-5-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Vikram Anand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJco9liaVdSQ1dViy6gHAk0HRR7HTDJCX6lPK4VOUMlBF1Ya_M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Okay, this is my first week with Panjab Tiffin and I am more than satisfied. I was cautious after reading several negative reviews. But do note that negative (and positive) reviews can be manipulated by competition and the service provider.

I started with a few trial meals which were satisfactory and better than a erstwhile leading tiffin brand in Surrey which has shut down.

I started my monthly plan with Panjab Tiffin a week ago. It's early days, but the quality of food and the timely service is commendable.

The food has a fair bit of variety, low on oil and moderate on spices. Quantity is pretty good for one super hungry adult and can easily be split into two meals.

I've started with a vegetarian plan and will migrate to the non-veg one soon.

I'll update this review after a month and then again (if all goes well) after three months.

Hope this helps anyone reviewing Panjab Tiffin. For me this was a good choice.

(This is an unsponsored review. All views are strictly mine based on my experience, which may or may not be similar to yours.)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nidhi Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUW106M4gx8BOE692W7ZqGeTkxW6jGd8ZOTpkuOqDt9gAdGBQ0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had kofta curry today in tiffin and had to say that was one of the best kofta curry I had tasted in a while . The texture ,the gravy and the taste were all ten out of ten . The new chef is doing absolutely amazing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jainsamridhi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZyWVst30eSgtMrfZYakdW7hQl3irsNQlzjcbsT9_Q1ZoJ1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered food from Punjab Tiffin service today.First they didn't send my correct order. They replaced dal with mix veg sabzi. I didn't create any fuss or bothered to call them. But halfway through my daughter’s meal she got two pieces of sharp steel wire pieces in her mouth. This is so dangerous it could have given a cut to my daughter on her tongue. I spoke with the owner and shared photos with the owner.  He wanted to give me a replacement but I would never eat from a place like this again. I also raised this with doordash. This is very concerning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO077WwkEYXkDFnsD5Bnjvb43PNeuyeTV43BmNO&fid=0x0:0x238b40ba03921111"],"When":"2023-4-2"},{"Name":"hitesh punj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5Mb3R1pn8P_bT9PkoI7bywhkQiEcf_BoBumERpEuF-ZqsbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I took  FOOD yesterday from them , I paid $168 . food was not delicious. It was not fresh . After eating food my bp  high and heartbeat was high. When I told about it . They were very rude . They said , refund me will done around 10 businesses days our accountant will do .  They charged me 25 $   for one day  Tiffin for 8 roti and  dal and Subji and yogurt . I recommend to everyone please DONT GO over there . You can save your money and time . ZERO STAR","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sonika Sethi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWures49C9dEdhUTQuWdaPVc-wQ3byw69ifBv0BESwzXXm-X4Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Stay clear of these people. They seriously rip you off. They are part of an app called "too good to go". It seriously discount leftover food. My order said it had a value of $21.99 and I paid 6.99 x2. I ordered two orders. My first order was naan bread and a little pot of rice) ,$21 value?????☹️. It's not even worth 6.99. the 2nd order had naan, a little pot of yogurt sauce and some eggplant sauce. There again certainly not worth the price. So basically I took of their hands their leftovers and I couldn't even make a meal out of it and I paid $8:00  they really should be ashamed. I called  Onwer but he said it’s  a surprise bag but there is no surprise never ever shop from them horrible food & 0 marks for Cx services","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sheri B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5Nxp_GpA887_fJhFcXVHU4pEU2Em2vI5T8t0HdMNQuM91MQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Stay clear of these people. They seriously rip you off. They are part of an app called "too good to go".  It seriously discount leftover food. My order said it had a value of $21.99 and I paid 6.99 x2. I ordered two orders. My first order was naan bread and a little pot of rice) ,$21.99 value?????☹️. It's not even worth 6.99. the 2nd order had naan, a little pot of yogurt sauce and some spinach sauce. There again certainly not worth the price. So basically I took of their hands their leftovers and I couldn't even make a meal out of it and I paid  $14.00. they really should be ashamed of themselves. Karma will come back to bite you for ripping off people. Too make matters worse, I haven't worked in 7 months and thought this might be a nice treat for my family. Not!!!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKnA-A76RHFaowdb1v27Csh7-2BnOgUoGaKRVO&fid=0x0:0x238b40ba03921111"],"When":"2024-1-30"},{"Name":"Prabhdeep singh Khalsa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDDS2KePfNYTQGjsCakdtwN1e6NikrKWgVHX8phS6KxtXYfA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I think they are the worst people ever , never pick up call when you need anything, they are so greedy people, wastage of money if you connect with them , the real thugs , try another one but never ever this one","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"FinanceNumber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKyOciTMnnl7iRe4Qhn1SIXoNq8KwzBEkGO4Qe5jw5YNXrAIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Liar and dishonest.
- Everyday the tiffin is delivered late
- when you call them, they give the same answer that it’s coming in 5 mins. 5 mins turns to 30 mins. What a joke. An honest person will at-least tell you the approx time.
- It’s so sad that Punjabis still follow the Indian  way of working.
- My recommendation is to avoid.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: McDonald's
address: Brookswood Plaza, 4061 200 St Unit #101, Langley, BC V3R 4G8
descriptions: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"matthew cain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ15nIwEWTfxWUCauq96alw2WKLXgagQxUEjk7DqIyz3aEHsw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Absolutely disgusting.The manager lady there was working the till and would make the food and not wash her hands absolutely disgusting.
It sets the tone for the entire hygiene of all their staff. Today is Saturday the 14th of Sept.... it shouldn't be hard to figure out w🤢","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJqFGI6zsFQkQEoaw4MIuBqWbusfIVpVycGmhQ&fid=0x0:0x8565ecdf5b033241"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Dawn Jervis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXniGn2o8RaMQ0Q4HrgfWlzVS4qLOlV6t3v91CtpC4BFPWIQBMumw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is the usual cheap quality bread, etc for the price you pay.  The conglomerate company has to make big bucks.  That's normal.  Fast food, fast ready made service.  Seating capacity is not crowded.  The cleanliness of the place is decent.  Overall, it's ok.  Food quality can be a little better though.  BUT, you know","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Griffin Occleshaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoLfNJyrYXb2jyALP5yndD1XlLeOEWX-E9tgp06B9mBmjToI_k=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Staff are quite rude and fed up, which is understandable for such a busy location, but the joint is in shambles. Everything is wet and run down. No drive thru, bad vibe from the people there, just all around a shady environment. If you somehow want McDonald’s, go to ANY other location. Avoid this small stingy location when there’s far better nearby. Not to mention the fries being colder than ice!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Haleh Magnus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZGl2rvHWlqbzuuFKZ9pHQfQXwlTmRHH4ep4A1K4mjlsDM4dQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They were fast, accurate , great customer service , clean , nicely updated location. They don’t have drive through which sucks. I really enjoy the knew chicken breakfast sandwich. Also the cups and glasses were really festive during Christmas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOab-j5hAbRLlWc27ckwhARem6p5p5BufhMlZw&fid=0x0:0x8565ecdf5b033241"],"When":"2022-12-19"},{"Name":"Mandi Robertson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlurSMUaSBuZ9wAuyQcBjbpmqB5cGy9fIc4Hg2r8geUs3PNnoi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This McDonald's literally sucks. Ordered on Skip, it came in like 20-25 minutes... but instead of a Spicy Habanero McChicken, we got a Spicy Habanero McLettuce. They literally FORGOT to put the chicken on?! Like hello. I'm pretty sure they teach you how to make a burger, or at least how to put the chicken on, when you start working for a McDonald's. Also ordered 2 cookies and cream donuts and 2 Boston cream donuts. We got 2 cookies and cream donuts and 2 butterscotch cream donut things (which weren't even on the menu on skip)... All of them looked like they were in the freezer for a couple months or had been frozen and thawed multiple times (they were also still half frozen). The Spicy Grilled Chicken burger that we ordered also looked like the ppl just threw all the ingredients into the little box, shook it up, and expected it to make itself.
Was especially mad about the Spicy Habanero McChicken so we called them... A lady picked up the phone and I started off by saying "hello, we just ordered on skip.." and she straight up just ended the call. Called a second time a couple minutes later and they put it through to a fax machine. Called a third time about ten minutes later, and by then they had actually blocked my number. They obviously knew that they messed up, but the fact that they just ignored us at all costs is even more messed up. If you want to learn how customer service doesn't work, you can use this place as an example. I would give a -5 stars if I could.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPP6pOvuHKQF09Y10kQAGphntyEsodmpzne30Mo&fid=0x0:0x8565ecdf5b033241"],"When":"2023-12-17"},{"Name":"Chasity Gillis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_oGmrJUIRrEZ9pnSF81dighLKZNrB3SG345DZN_MZtmiqyww7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went to get my toddler breakfast and a man while I was waiting to order went infront and ordered first and the employees allowed it.
on a side note I should have knew how bad the management was before I stood in line to order the washroom had pee everywhere all over the floor.
My oldest goes to school up the street we will be taking our business Els where","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pat Gunter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocITVPd2IGz6oC4R9rDUxokFmVc3b5GjhHoma9WrjzEiBitMEu96=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Service was terrible sept11 2024 evening!   Higher employee hiring standards needed.
Two incompetent stoned college student aged males running the entire place.  Took forever I had to speak up about my coffee when he went to take the next person's order and I hadn't gotten mine. He gave it to me and it was boiled burned crazy hot awful tasting.  Left it on table and walked away","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lada Nazarenko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWc_wbUSzlQ4gZJIzH_rr9zNCtOImSnBKKNdUv0fPSHAieWzCE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"2 people ahead of me in the line.
3 guys behind the counter.
20 minutes of wait.
=>
1 cold latte (ordered a hot one)
1 warm melted ice cream
1 cold saggy cheeseburger

The waiter was nice enough to make a new cone as the original one had the ice cream top slid off just from reaching with it through the counter. Thank you for being attentive.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mikey Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVd7FNXEw1_YzU-LYiPIU9iBnJ8TvJRP7ULRoqG2hDlpSbM-6Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stumbled across this little shop one rainy day. Upon walking in we were greeted warmly, sat and given menus and time to decide. The lady working was SO kind and funny. As we were sat a few regulars came in which you could tell she had forged really nice relationships with. She was joking with them and being so polite. It really helped to make the atmosphere of the place feel so welcoming and homey. Now onto the food, absolutely incredible! The burger was very tasty and was served with crinkle cut fries, I got the breakfast with sausage and bacon, it came with toast and shredded hashbrowns, i got gravy on the side and it did NOT disappoint! Such a yummy breakfast and we will absolutely be back! Highly recommend to anyone in and around the Langley area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzbRDlFBgkCM0fajKOw-MtlyN9Neu7Tf1rXkca&fid=0x0:0xe85fe34b13a07da0"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Keith J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlRWh0fivjEETJm8n4v6cXjBgAqf6CEN7OeXI2sgbaOtOdPw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"managing to have 4.5 google review for Katy's hospitality, but food is quite horrible. How can fries be YUK?  Worst fries I've tasted in years and the deluxe burger for $22 is a RIP OFF for this quality. You rather go to Cactus Club happy hour and eat. Burger wasn't impressive at any aspect at all, TASTE NOT GOOD HERE","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"PC Experts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMb8bSV9UMC1oG0k1qKZ_D1Qf15c14AG4IDwm0IqGuQtomutfH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is good and the prices are fair, but the best thing about Katy's Restaurant is Katy and the atmosphere she creates. It seems to be a gathering place for locals, and even thought it was my first time there, I was made to feel welcome and part of the group. I was included in the casual banter that was going on, and it was truly enjoyable. Katy told me she's closed on Mondays, so I guess I'll have to wait until next Tuesday before I return. I had a cheeseburger with a side salad, and it turns out that the lettuce was fresh from Katy's own garden. You won't get that at any of the franchise burger joints.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John Penacho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkSKQHA3v096wdqO-IsTThzQ8ZwYWvsVi4GDLQkKygN9xpjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I came for breakfast and had a very enjoyable time.  Could tell that the place was well liked as many customers knew each other on a firstname basis.  It is very nice having small family run places in the community such as this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5a3Oex3kyNui7Xel_Fs5P07aC-zawstBLPG1g&fid=0x0:0xe85fe34b13a07da0"],"When":"2023-11-29"},{"Name":"Sandra Ainsley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWztafMXtKRzwVehU70u2LV7YNBO2gNGouYmFeiFpwA87SBYjc_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Katy's Restaurant is a real find. The food  was so-o-o good! Perfectly cooked and they make their own bread which is delicious! If you want good food and a memorable experience, go to Katy's. Katy is so lovely,  full of life, friendly and welcoming. Did I mention the food is cooked perfectly and delicious through and through. I had the Ham and Cheese  omelet with pan fried potatoes and sour dough toast. Mmmm! Trust me, you gotta go!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVfaPfNs4VEmacUEoOItAWfAokSLKDezdeKXJOigymu3pVWbxj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"2nd Time here.
2019 May 19 10:30am
We brought a friend for Breakie this time and not very good.
I'm thinking maybe there not known for a good breakfast so
We'll try Lunch.

1st time here because of the reviews.. it's not a bad place. 2 people $21.00 . Sausage..Eggs Toast..and Medallion style potato & Coffee. Including Tax.

The only thing is the potato was very Dry.. should have had the shredded hashbrowns instead..

I would visit this place again
We came back. 2019 May 19th","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZLEeDFX-zYZZZx8Cozmtz2m04GbjNkzD22OuW&fid=0x0:0xe85fe34b13a07da0"],"When":"2018-4-21"},{"Name":"Michelle Wells","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvNRIjqpaD-7lGjKJQUstYMK_4eK7coNH_llfQJvZPo6DHh9s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best breakfast I’ve had in years! Everything was cooked really well, it tasted great and everything was actually HOT.  Our server was friendly and attentive to our needs. There’s free parking out front.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gord Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzqg26JTAvjLSvQR6iHAQ0vAHCgUM-McCo69jnkyAJxgQEMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always amazing food , never ever dissatisfied or disappointed!
Very friendly and welcoming, all the comforts of home with a home made meal !
We both had
Burgers & home made fries and gravy !The shrimp Wonton soup so delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLgIXc7evP-eXl9fMfkJOawxmuaEw4JOZRqed-&fid=0x0:0xe85fe34b13a07da0"],"When":"2021-9-1"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"K P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUsl05QdryAJBSPMIHEmJwb0-Wv8lUjniAxSGBi5qGnqkWbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It is so cold in this restaurant my kid was wearing a parka and we were both so cold we packed up halfway through dinner and left to finish at home and it was not the first time.  Unacceptable. Food is always cold but it takes forever to get and there is almost always an error in the order. The only reason service got 2 stars is because of one very kindly older woman that goess above and beyond. Do not recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Garry Sahota","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJpE854hYnFO-GxwJgtscbCCfWhHwm2nf3M7gg_sbmxdbr8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Whichever genius is back there on Sunday August 18th at 8:30-9:30 pm making burgers needs to be fired. If you can eat a whole burger with a literal mound of salt \u0026 pepper hidden between 2 patties, I will hand you $1000","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPM0yr3UMVnIDvEcBUgqECTLTI94Rj4i0V6YAl3\u0026fid=0x0:0x4feb92b33e7ce44"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"stunt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBs5eXU0_GJtCZPrq9MIaH_a7tARo14bRmxNi9DYszsm1huorH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a happy meal with a filet o fish burger and they forgot the sauce and added half a slice of cheese to my burger? Service was also very slow","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlYf5GdcPK-huC2LobCPIFQCjUSIN378IHVPyc\u0026fid=0x0:0x4feb92b33e7ce44"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Seth Vandeburgt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwCk4HfRerzNGuOVkdnYe4I_bMzfrT0gVy8toVvi8wJTB8YR1V=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered dinner for 5 people and I received 2 junior chickens with.no chicken it’s it absolutely ridiculous. Also we ordered happy meals we paid extra for, for our children and specifically requested the toys and were told we would received them and we didn’t get them. So disappointed with what is supposed to be a worldwide, professional establishment that is managed by people who are brain dead and just there for a pay cheque","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cheyenne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWL7MErDcTtavGDG9MjpkVJYEnXu1Ud3elNbxTBOS9ViSqpXb3G=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I kid you not I ordered a hot chocolate less than 10 minutes ago and it was a large filled LITERALLY filled half way with whip cream. How do you see it as a worker and decide “oh I’ll just dump a can of whip cream into this”. Absolutely ridiculous and lazy. Almost $5 for a small with a CAN of whip cream. Get better employees that aren’t too lazy to fill up the drinks as intended. I only knew because I use a flattened straw to scoop of whip cream from my drinks first.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Keiyana Sterling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVC1QwBzrGTCQsg7bFgVEJSR1MVIolqa6V4LkAIAihqIbrw4N2HYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Fries were cold and the iced tea was watered down. I’m glad I spent my own money on something that instantly went into the garbage. Oh I forgot to mention that the nuggets were stale and you would think that they would be fresh especially waiting in line for 10 minutes. :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Buddy Guy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtBw--DYosQikseVZzSoBFVRm5AwfCrRH0BAdmVSpzkgDbOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Was one of the better McDonald’s locations around… before they decided to replace the staff with people who can’t speak English and take an order properly.\n\nUpdate: after waiting for 5 minutes for them to fix my order… they still got it wrong. 2 stars, even though it was wrong they upgraded my fries.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jamie Foster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCBOVdJksvYtbx4e86R42gr0Z2r9F5h39j0jdhYjlDgTIpW5I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Location Charges for condiments: on a 20$ meal I asked for 1 Mcchicken sauce with my order. Was refused a condiment on my meal by window staff unless I paid for it, was made to pay 30 cents plus tax and was made to pay again on my card…. What are you going to charge for next? Napkins?","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Matthew Reid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_XYu-hONYlWVKFabmSHTAIJnFyzjrhHMnxnOR-St2VApePfRJVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The most amazing and delightful family owned business, that's stood the test of time!

Leo and his business give the most top notch, welcoming service that you could ever ask for; you'll always feel extremely welcomed and appreciated walking thru those doors of his restaurant ..and the food also does not disappoint!

Some of the best pizza in the area and the lamb is also quite divine! Mostly all homemade recipes, that have been within the family for decades, and you can taste it most definitely.

Go check it out, support a local business and you WILL NOT be disappointed! Highly reccomended.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charlotte Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTCsj1ht4_PY9T8kb8bvFF3Jd3jko8AIFFLmAEcq5qXaCNGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delicious, the staff were friendly, prices were reasonable, the service and food was really fast even though they were busy for father's Day. It had a nice family atmosphere","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOip_Ut6qLjkouZJEQjUkvl5g4RD58T-ZbuLdNl&fid=0x0:0x2b1db5331a485255"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Cam Doyle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDb7G6-jitv9d-vV7cEa74HI_kHVwwKg7xhuB0MJx_l8xlcyis=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This place has gone downhill. Quality just isn't there anymore and this amount of food was $80 with tip. So unfortunate as I used to love this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOStA6vpoZgyt7E6Ff9LU-DhyETJ0LUBBtux6LT&fid=0x0:0x2b1db5331a485255"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Embellished Trinkets","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnj6xAHz8D20Pw4G9NwqmNUxyBgoEqbLcj6wfrb6D0uN7KYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very disappointed with our meal last night. We ordered the Leo's family special and our salads were so brown and wilted they were not edible. Our ribs were so dry and over cooked as was our chicken and for some reason our pizza was so salty. The spaghetti and the lasagna were very basic. We only dine out once a month now due to the high cost of everything and we are beyond disappointed. Majority of our food was not edible and it cost us close to $100. We had been so excited to eat here as we had recently moved to the neighborhood and were left with utter disappointment","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8H3qmStKne-oIjeq0ZYnN7-B6aBWPxAWC6_tW&fid=0x0:0x2b1db5331a485255"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Milley Tilley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3NBFnOfd4AgMXsXHWrLgQNQ08d3t7XFqdw6oxD7G1LoaOiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Went with a group and the quality of food and service has definitely went downhill. Pricing does not match the level they are offering. Server did not come back for refills or to ask how the food was. The meals were VERY average. I would suggest going to OPP South Surrey.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jenn Charlebois","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKRrj9O2TC4Z43Klxsjk99MP2rrYMQXqnf50KZjyWmfrAj08VLNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This definitely felt like stepping back in time and being treated to a real family run business. It was so nice to feel like we were part of their family, and the customer service was incredible. The pizza was really great, and serving size was decent. The customer service and attentiveness was heartwarming.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tom McDougall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0J48kC1hZM1V1aRsvHOZVDophlDmEISwqhKMFe94oVeHk06c2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Another great meal at Ocean Park Pizza.
Comfortable family restaurant.  We celebrated my father’s 82 birthday and they accommodated our 15 person family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYHuft-48YoPg7luD1j747wScquumDheQC9rvm&fid=0x0:0x2b1db5331a485255"],"When":"2024-1-12"},{"Name":"shyloh Schmidt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHQbMKDV5jMOmCRSqLfslXEiWv0Tcqk2ZtoRjReiSvClvxFg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"After ordering 2 "simple small pizzas" and picking it up, got it home to see one of the pizzas was wrong.
Fine, mistakes happen.
Called them to have them replace the wrong one.
After explaining it to 3 different people, some
guy gets on the phone and says "the order was written wrong, we will replace your pizza for free, in 30 to 45 minutes, we are really busy ".
Seriously, how is paying for our 2 pizzas free?
Because you fixed your mistake it makes it "free", we didn't ask for the pizza you gave us or anything free.
Then tell us it's not our problem we have to wait..
I'm sorry however if we make a mistake in our restaurant, believe me, we don't argue, we bump their order to the front of the tickets in the kitchen.
First and last time ordering from here.
I will definitely recommend anywhere else to order from then here.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Vanessa Becker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjP-M2atXZC7s46eJ4wd5XC-RHr2pn3fRoPwoLQqghdxSrQBA9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Eggbomb is a super cute place to try out. They have so many fun drinks on their menu. My husband and I both enjoyed our sandwiches, they were huge! The eggs were cooked perfectly and the bread was delicious.
We went on a busy Saturday and knew we’d probably have to wait, there is an easy check in for waiting in line, no reservations. The restaurant is small.
The front door lacked an accessible button for wheelchair users or strollers, an easy fix to be more welcoming.
The chairs can be moved to make space for wheelchairs.
There are two individual bathroom stalls, one is larger for accessibility.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSsLMOkFSiQ3I7_IKbKomZdZzIIs4POyBCU_tK&fid=0x0:0x2c102e0857540a66"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"James Geisinger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUlhWyXY48zdpRt7zZErxEMiN2iJHNX8puFCQFrlhAwzXGQ6LM_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was delicious. A little pricey for what it is. The menu was terrible - 30 or so pages in page protectors that were bent up and dirty. Mostly pictures and arranged in a way that was very hard to understand and follow. Most of the pages contain pictures that could have been put online with a QR code - so much more professional and cleaner. We sat originally at a small bar inside facing a window that has a table directly in front of us. We moved to a table that opened up on the patio which is right beside traffic filthy garbage from the street everywhere not an appetizing location. Well the food was good I did notice there was no regular egg dishes that one would expect it in a restaurant. All chef creations which are all well and good but preclude a family coming to eat. Was nice to try it out but we will not be returning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9IBqy2u7u6dXhwe0emQ6T19jJcrstQxdP8S7h&fid=0x0:0x2c102e0857540a66"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Ümit Demir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_uHDzWsdbW3ua-zfBRWHS2tHFkBpaaiVRXieRUB0eFZwRwjn0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is a quality place for having breakfast. Food was delicious. My son doesn’t like eggs but he ate half of the egg -ham sandwich 🥪 on the pic you can see.

Recommended! 🤟🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1bBFuEkXFjBKttEY9VUKm9bGz2Z0eWotELVvC&fid=0x0:0x2c102e0857540a66"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Trevor Ball","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0frHcSKEK2V-1uRZ1eE2LEFeXrCisGR32zw3WNqrTc1SQtIjS_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"this place is absolutely incredible!!!!!!

definitely going to be back, the breakfast sandwich that I had was the spicy ham and cheese, and it was unbelievable because the bread is so thick and buttery. if you're gluten-free, this is not your choice.

we also had the egg calm, and it was unbelievable as well. scrambled eggs are done to perfection.

we both had lattes, I had the pistachio latte, and she had the banana latte.

if you haven't been here, don't be dumb, just get in your car, get on your bike or run to Egg Bomb!!!

JUST GO!

As Terminator would say.... I'LL BE BACK.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQG1Q0lgBxWC586oympRWa6DM1HC9gsmXlaeI8&fid=0x0:0x2c102e0857540a66"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Gazal G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNfRt6AYTRne5R5YyIlS82FlCPvw6yjMF8Wl3AyoUgCtB2w_8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"An extremely expensive cafe, with very delicious and beautifully presented food, but also very pricey! The staff were nice, everything was cute, but very confusing—I didn’t know what to order. Photos of the dishes would have been helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-q-olRWEPbNpl58D6EYhBaHxs2BGnzwLGH12j&fid=0x0:0x2c102e0857540a66"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Marcee Hampton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQltwaS-c2dRxrbI8k8noJWroF5fLdRUhJGAfiNAo-uCKNzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were in town for our son’s steel band tour and spotted this restaurant that was close to our hotel.
I browsed the menu online and one I wanted to try it. I am a huge fan of all things Korean and this establishment was amazing.
The breakfast was delicious and beautiful. The food was so fresh.
The service was friendly and fast.
The restaurant was very clean, including the bathrooms.
While we ate there was a couple that came in with a large German Shepard and sat outside on the patio. I loved seeing that it was dog friendly.
I ordered a breakfast sandwich and a chai latte. My husband got the croffles.
Would highly recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-hTpvfwsy9Kh19mFay_9oBdzWBEQY_5syA4fk&fid=0x0:0x2c102e0857540a66"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Soeun Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGxT7R49a_opx58SkfmQEiVqxllWdvoH88dj5QPV0qDRazHB9y0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Truly the best brunch place ever! Every menu was so delicious!! The coffee’s great. Kids loved the place too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMDMPBnkGeAQ-qP5GjP-Rh7jqrTxCGg1aVnBXz&fid=0x0:0x2c102e0857540a66"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Earl Flormata","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHEYR5crfzT5mFZF5yY6PmVwTawXCmDPm3U8WVZUqH5mb8rOP9MA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lots of seating. Huge menu with tons of options. We ordered 2 salads and a sandwich with a bunch of drinks and some desserts between the 4 of us.

The macarons are well designed. Sturdy. Lots of flavour and well balanced. The characters were cute. We got the Totoro and Hello Kitty ones.

Sandwich was well put together and great presentation. However the egg was rather plain vs other places with the same style “sando”.

Chicken was cooked well for the salad, but was just run of the mill salad-wise (nothing extraordinary). Salmon was good - but it’s hard to mess up Salmon :).

All in all a good experience. I’d visit again if we were in this area again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWjaWNFxBKkEZ4izlpMXWKGUa_jE9t4T7mqacE&fid=0x0:0x2c102e0857540a66"],"When":"2024-6-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"x","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhmJKDr7DJ4CGvY4IhEGbbWGqO-ap4CiO1rDd-9zbUBZo3Dg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Never disappoints! Always toasty and perfect amount of pate! They are not stingy on the toppings at all. They even give extra when you ask! All the drinks are delicious! Spring rolls are nice and crispy! Love this place. Quality is great every time whether I dine in or take out and even delivery has been good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYiLQll8QNhLoK9SUQ9YydWXVxHJ59Rm_vy7R1&fid=0x0:0x8604466a1d06f9d9"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Trang Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgJ9pqHZKACEpFTPpbY5g0WbGIRIjuGIv5wyzXvbiO-BL2kLhi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited this store during my Vancouver trip with my family. It came highly recommended by my local Viet friends, and it was totally worth it! Our beef sandwiches were phenomenal, authentic and packed with just the right amount of fillings. The side dishes were great too, especially the nem fries, such an amazing "invention" lol - a must-try in my opinion. I really wish they would open a store in Calgary so I wouldn’t have to drive so far for such delicious banh mi!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9ONOWGlkHYLcfV3kohEgoaanBelptMfis5PZO&fid=0x0:0x8604466a1d06f9d9"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Kerry Skea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3rkvFmzgaZUqrvXw6i_8zwZIHZDPQLv49eGSyUx9EQxyR2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We have not been to this location for a few months but decided to go for lunch today. This used to be a great little spot to visit. Today it was awful. First off instead of taking our order the guy answered the phone and took an online order first.  After that he took our order. Then we waited 15 minutes for 2 sandwiches. There was no one else in the store!   Not sure if they have new management or just being cheap. Sandwiches were good but very small bun and very very little filling. A few pieces of chicken, and very little veggies.  Unfortunately we will not be back. So very disappointing ! A big waste of money. There are better places on the one way to grab lunch, don’t waste your money here

As per your response I think it’s a shame you are trying to justify that putting a few pieces of meat in a bun is okay. People don’t like wasting their money and what you are  saying is that we should have ordered 2 sandwiches each instead ? So spend double? A few months ago under the old management a sandwich at your restaurant was just that… a sandwich. It was enjoyable and had adequate filling, not a few stray pieces of meat and a couple of veggies. If anything please don’t try justifying this situation. Do better. If you want customers to return, give them something to return for!!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMT_gTcup8i_pjjBUElnomYqymRO2PLfH-pfr7M&fid=0x0:0x8604466a1d06f9d9"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Gabrielle Kam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWA9F1m8fcxvueG5mi1tMn86OcddGWaEg4oLcbjAGkv5ZLY7tw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly staff, clean washrooms and the food was delicious. Sandwich was juicy and flavourful! Best spring rolls and the match drinks is amazing! Will come back here if I crave a sandwhich! Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcuTxvqaAOYWj6MzQ5rtACDEQWlMgzoCwOTC_h&fid=0x0:0x8604466a1d06f9d9"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Chin Chin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJt4yy2SkMpXfOMXIK8gVp0x-fSFni6zAZRloaNkFwAzccmaWu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go-to place for authentic crispy Vietnamese sandwiches FR!!! Visited the restaurant and it was a lovely banh mi shop with solid quality. The staff were friendly and polite, so you wouldn't have to worry about asking them if you’re new to banh mi and you could get your banh mi customized easily. Perfect place to grab lunch and a quick catch-up with your loved ones. I recommend the Taro Slush for those with a sweet tooth out there bc it’s just PERF. Well, these babies were from my takeaway to avoid my midnight craving. Will def be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNj-Xf1IrYBDUyxujzdDqsx-qEFmGqNXOGzqWo2&fid=0x0:0x8604466a1d06f9d9"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"hanna nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3WZRh6i47IMn1uiXuwuj7vxts-zp2mFtE78gFlBKGs0kidA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This bánh mì spot is amazing! The bread is perfectly crispy outside and soft inside, with fresh, flavorful fillings and just the right balance of tangy, savory, and spicy. Their Vietnamese coffee and sugarcane juice are top-notch too. Great portions, fair prices, and a cozy atmosphere—5 stars all the way!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPETbR9uyA7Fw-3VRj2_D2S3YHIzM37wpcn3ezl&fid=0x0:0x8604466a1d06f9d9"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Michele F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDMx6n46qma1M05HLf0Rh8d1WOUD3NEo22c4UT5GhAHxY6Kg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First time trying Obanhmi, and had high hopes based on reviews. Unfortunately, it did not meet our expectations.

Parking at the Langley location can be a bit of a challenge, but we know the area so that was expected. The restaurant itself is simply furnished, with nothing special to make it stand out.

We placed a takeout order online, saved 5% (no problems applying the code at checkout), and the order was ready at the indicated time. Service was friendly.

We ordered pork spring rolls, pork salad rolls, and the following sandwiches: lemongrass chicken, honey garlic chicken and sate beef.

The spring rolls were delicious! Crispy and not overly greasy.
The salad rolls were nothing special. Even the dipping sauce was not very flavourful.

We ordered all sandwiches with extra pickled veggies, no cilantro.
The bread was nice and crusty, but not as special as some of the reviews make it out to be. Unfortunately, the bread to filling ratio was way off.
Filling was sparse, including the pickled veggies, which we'd ordered extra of (would hate to see what it's like without the extra).
To top it off, one sandwich had full cilantro, and another had obviously had the cilantro picked back off, since there were still some leftovers. In this regard the sparse filling was helpful, as I could quickly pick it all off without anyone else seeing (and getting ideas in their head that they could still taste it...). Honey garlic chicken was quite tasty, sate beef was okay with just a tiny little bit of spice, and the lemongrass chicken was rather bland and full of gristle.

Pictures are of the honey garlic chicken and sate beef (1/2 sandwich shown; full sandwich size is about 10").","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQiywV8J_89aLLCVDPF9RAbuwR1Ba_5FcjYjTO&fid=0x0:0x8604466a1d06f9d9"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Your Dad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsCraod052SzzpZMGY6lo4iWb9TrGcmdDrZnPN4UP7KVLJzFAp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh is the best adjective to describe this restaurant. In fact, it was so fresh that the jalapeno that I removed with my grubby hands gave me a fresh punch in the face when I accidentally rubbed my left eye. Might I say, that was the most painful experience I went through that day. Who's fault was it? Definitely not the restaurant or the jalapenos, only mine. I washed my eye 5 times before I was able to see again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFErh9CpYhLVjVPxHFiZc1rv4T8dA0cbMf_axW&fid=0x0:0x8604466a1d06f9d9"],"When":"2024-7-23"}]

title: Fresco Pizza & Wings, Langley Pizza Delivery ,
descriptions: Chill pizzeria open late on weekends turning out creative pies, plus wings with a variety of sauces.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Phil V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpjl1Y21skGRQNlBmsFhHWXae2yxtJoUrEFk_TE2jl2W71vg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Placed my first order to try it out and there won't be another order.

1. Garlic bread is literally hot dog buns with garlic on it

2. Ordered a medium specialty meat pizza and a small Hawaiian. Meat pizza was salty and the toppings on both pizzas looked like the outlet was emptying crumps from the bottom of their topping bags. Lack of toppings looks to be an issue in reviews from others

3. Onion rings were OK","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lee Anza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuDvfmcryjwOjwanTQuEN7AbN4_OTGhgnUrvsAvmaC8DYcw52j=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"From the 4.4 stars I had high expectations. The pizza was flavourless and a bit too crispy tasting for me. There was barely a chicken on the pizza.

The service and price itself was good, though. Probably wouldn’t get again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Naomi Kragh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZLUAmyQRHAJJOvAgnTAMFOCBA9leIrpEFbTsp7S0XsUBWx9lRKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered pizza from here tonight and asked for "no onions please" and there was so many onions we were gagging! My kids wouldn't eat it and I had to make them sandwiches. I was able to get a refund from Skip the Dishes, but I still had to make dinner for my family. Super disappointing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvV0nSOK9ntjo-DS6qgTOcG_Uxr0grss4XX90S&fid=0x0:0x712413cf7e8424ff"],"When":"2020-10-21"},{"Name":"Austin Trowbridge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsUREz2RTY3ARDp3baX5cC-SngJjM6wJ39ia9LzwWg5hXzRw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going to this place since i was a kid and just picked up two pizzas today and its still the best pizza i’ve ever had","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUx85oVG5334zs78M_Mv_-3dXIb0JRWHUwH7xyXbx09W2qbqZk7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their signature pizzas are always tasty. Gotta try the wings they are KILLER, variety of sauces too. The owner is really cool and open late weekends too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kay Munchinsky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJH4RGAMCvDN8Nv7wekwvSRyO_f7Y5lbMkW6WwHKxZNEtGM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect pizza. Everything comes together so nicely. The sauce is delightful, the crust is the perfect crunchy/soft combo, the toppings are fresh. We order here a few times a month and we are never disappointed. The prices are reasonable for such high quality food. It’s not the cheapest around but it’s worth it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brian Fish","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXq_XxjjrFGF3mtuK8GMO7r3RNitbdTQNo4pGriHNJd0uA8z4c-kg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pizza everytime I've ordered. My go to place if I'm feeling a more classic pizza (opposed to emilio's thin crust). Great hand tossed crust and I highly recommend trying the fresco favorite with the sweet corn...so good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ray Varkki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8GXnT9U3qBOPC7eU9G5Sm4hRBnlhnXEiQ523gizDhz4xT3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried this place twice before making a review. Their pizza is fantastic. Very fresh and doesn’t taste like a generic pizza recipe. Had the wings the second time and garlic fingers. Absolutely delicious and the wings were fried perfectly. The person who was at the front(I’m assuming the owner) was very friendly.

Happy to see that there is a great pizza option here in Langley, at very affordable prices.","Images":null,"When":""}]
