user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Raymond Campbell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXldjV3i4-BTickKCXNM1ff98zOTT1RjfPjijGIUlY6ZcOfNWAP5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been eating at the Poseidon for years. It is my first time at their new location. Wow… what a cool place and atmosphere. Busy busy place so make sure you make a reservation. 4 of us stopped in for dinner. We had lamb souvlaki, lasagna, escargot and authentic Greek salad.
The meals were all 10 out of 10. The service was amazing. I highly recommend trying this place out. My girlfriend loved it and we look forward to going back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOO6zBp6xOfQO3XZByHKvcqTMAJUlody04la_Km&fid=0x0:0xa800c6c4433ae452"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"jen h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhCIsdNpI0zn0ln1R2W8y6FEnO7Rpwo3p2N6L3S94WtNoyzHf7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is a pretty good restaurant and I recommend making reservations. We went on a Sunday and picked up right at lunch/after church time. Our server (Shanna?) was very nice and accommodating to our group. The lunch specials are a good deal. I found the food and portion for price was affordable. Calamari was light and crispy, lamb souvlaki was tender and chicken souvlaki was ok. Overall - I found it a bit salty though to my liking. I would be interested in trying their other dishes (kleftiko and roast lamb) but I won’t necessarily rush back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBE7Jyd33Y94ye5GG_rT5NSdYUJaEowu5oTzg5&fid=0x0:0xa800c6c4433ae452"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Alicia Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRvUKAt1E5MAgBEss_TB2_5jwJghFINS96SeHx15rTExbEszLx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food looks good, but it was not tasty. Bland and overpriced for what you get. My friend did not enjoy his salad for $25, and he did inform the waitress. It was plain, and the chicken was nothing specia, just charcoaled on the outside. I ordered whatever the special was yesrerday, Sunday. We ate and left disappointing. We ended up going to eat somewhere else an hour later because we were not full and satisfied. The service was great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPapcITWfKnGoEklcAIbD0tX-2K7cTvr-677YYu&fid=0x0:0xa800c6c4433ae452"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Chantae Lester","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAjujbbvuYg6gl2OFHF2Vtqwvh1NwK7_qoTIxKWR0iZUtPoGTc5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here to celebrate Mothers Day and my brothers birthday! All of us shared some delicious appetizers and had the most delicious main courses meals! The pita bread was warm and fresh, our server Kate was an absolute gem! She checked up on us and made sure we had everything we needed! Not to mention she went above and beyond and gave us a box of donuts to share 🥰
Such great service and amazing food! Definitely cannot wait to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAo7hreyQi7MksxqRHzCtzzo8H03bxJUJVX-lS&fid=0x0:0xa800c6c4433ae452"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Manfred Rust","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEzdje012JUF1eIsRNA6YTAPihii_EajvYLzFoefVLI3ilBA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Once again we had a great dinner.  This is our go to greek restaurant. The calamari was excellent. The chicken souvlaki perfectly done...very juicy.  The Greek potatoes were not mushy..perfectly seasoned.  Over all great service even though we came in un announced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUQpp1JkU0_r80orAG6W6rH1bycxIYXsLNCQqi&fid=0x0:0xa800c6c4433ae452"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Victor Coulthard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVzaMZ-mJiSciATJo0_vmyqllN6m7TsaHh6k4ZWnfevzG5hG9P=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We just moved into the area and we were craving good Greek food. Instead we experienced GREAT Greek food. Our server Alana, was great. She listened to what we wanted and made it happen. We wanted a carafe of the house wine and Alana suggested a local red wine which turned out to be very drinkable.

The four of us ordered two platters to share: The Artemis and The Athena - all four of us have been to Greece and this food was better. My favourite was the roast lamb - (you just put it in your mouth and it melts) my wife loved the lamb chops- but everything was great - my son-in-law said they simply do everything really well. Our daughter also enjoyed the atmosphere. I highly recommend this restaurant . Well done everyone!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Terry F. Malchuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiyXvW5mh3s5enBHIQ639SYIaaTZmXBnI3-RJ1Dcb3ta5UMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered the Schnitzel, which was on special tonight. As soon as I saw it, I could tell that it was something they pulled out of a box. I think it was frozen. Absolutely no flavor to this poor tasting Schnitzel. I am sitting here at the restaurant as I write this. It came with Greek potatoes and rice and veggies, which tastes good. It also came with mushroom gravy, which actually tastes like it was from a package and had that thick consistency as in a packaged gravy.
I ate here before, and the food was great. This dinner tonight, so very disappointing and not worth $33 I paid for it.

UPDATE: Management took care of this meal for me. Thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODrUqjQva9YnOiF-2EZTOxUf9qdgtOo8PzJcba&fid=0x0:0xa800c6c4433ae452"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Shelley Bradford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4DjFmdvoWRNZpWJVqCUFsfMXIYk23BBDHDdvlL3QltIYS56Vk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sit outside on the patio when you can.. it's summer! Food and service are out of this world! Lamb,  dolmades, beet hummus and falafels, Dead Frog Brewery Hippity Hop beer, a rosè,  baklava, and what was that fried cheese YUM!! WE could not eat it all but we definitely tried! Jana is a lovely hostess and we are grateful for her recommendations.  This place makes Langley memorable. Thankyou Poseidon Restaurant.  Oh and if you are inclined with a little puppy, bring him along to sit outside, by your table.  Just a wonderful atmosphere to enjoy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQOIZAX7x5OeGa1jmWr4tznW_dTVzlfBccC23H&fid=0x0:0xa800c6c4433ae452"],"When":"2024-7-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Brandon Lieu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1l6wN98L8CMs2OejtfywOkLZPKh8R8jVEhQtWEIkzvjWy4Xk9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic and delicious Vietnamese cuisine in the heart of Langley. The owner and the staff were very friendly and accommodating for our large group. The menu options for expansive and the dollar value was great. The only negative is the area it's located in looks unsafe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6qBVdWDVaZVtgsH5341hChUHd84wzkXgoXi6J&fid=0x0:0xea74b02a243bf2e"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Ray Dubs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWv4pQtKu2wy66jann-Dj8Exe3FIdSioz5JunQZJxz8XSK1GHcjzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Review from guy eating his way through the Vietnamese restaurants in the Lower Mainland:
This place took me by surprise 😲
I’ve actually already eaten here 3 times before writing this review.
I wasn’t expecting a really good Vietnamese restaurant out here. They’ve got some fantastic menu items.
If you’re craving some pho, rice or whatever you’ll be covered. I tried their combo rice plate which came with grilled pork, lemon grass chicken, meatloaf (ground pork, wood ear mushrooms) and a fried egg on top of rice. This was a large portion and will fill you up if you’re hungry. Also came with a side of broth.
I also ordered Banh Cuon which is steamed rice rolls with a pork filling. This could be a light meal on its own but we shared amongst three people.

Service was friendly and quick. The server helping us kept our water and tea topped up and was always smiling.

I also ordered some take home items. Banh Gio (like a giant dumpling made with rice flour) and Flan for dessert.

Ray’s Tips:
Lots of parking in front and back of restaurant.
Cash or Debit accepted for payment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbAda1IEylQ_cTJlPjgkvrN_MDa4VJXXCHxuUn&fid=0x0:0xea74b02a243bf2e"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Jenn Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqiLL9ZvTs9bElLAJ5ArjOgyozUzBDv3c8c8vRSIbNaw4xv5o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best Vietnamese spot in the Langley area! I will drive from out of town just for their Bun Rieu. It’s so packed with flavour. Service is quick and friendly - you’re always greeted with a smile.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJ6umGOxVtvJmiTSxJ9-CRsncmNV9T8pgZ9ety&fid=0x0:0xea74b02a243bf2e"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Brandon Collins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJftMou5k5OJyPtZPxUAjCRk0hWFHK-OghGtQJYsSNzGar9YlLzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Wow !!!! Definitely the best Vietnamese restaurant in  Langley and all of the Fraser Valley.  The food acutely tasted authentic, and no added substations . I ate the bun bo hue and my wife had a dish with rice noodles and grilled meat and with so many options on the menu I wanted to try more of their dishes but I'll save that for next time . If you're not afraid to try new things I'd recommend coming here","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4b2j81u-7MTAXLhhRtxWaODQIgmnHowrsG8ky&fid=0x0:0xea74b02a243bf2e"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"Matt Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-1cTdGJYtRes_Awu4xeoewyyheOy2LaWq2bb12NtzUz5-2z37=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were referred to try this as we love the Vietnamese food. We were not disappointed one bit…….wow!  Open 7 days a week is a huge win for my wife and I. She could eat here every week. We will be back next week again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvI9uw4WMY4EvnQt0zVJItsHBENmcioylcDyFo&fid=0x0:0xea74b02a243bf2e"],"When":"2024-6-6"},{"Name":"Jack Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9-Eu6ScoS7SffxHNYrDtow8p7sKhUSwC3v0Kst478iG5GTw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered this dish bun mam, $18 and this is what’s in the box. 3/4 of it is noodle and very little meat or seafood. This should be $8. Why am I paying $18 for noodle? Please don’t be cheap and give customers what they pay for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyCUctUbp8LPr3Ys-mo59-Rac_kVUavOYS63wP&fid=0x0:0xea74b02a243bf2e"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"B. Glenn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVD5rLv28RwFRiGVz9W0Gzr1cuZpBy7hoFtK7l1VzG6_pABgXUU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"While dining by myself, I enjoyed the fresh & fried version of their spring rolls. Both filling and tasty. Generous portions & Affordable too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtElOiBOjxTDmHfcb8MVELVDjSJWeKZptWtsfQ&fid=0x0:0xea74b02a243bf2e"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Nikki Torculas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKplzqPQYX01OamjEWTQDH8N0vzbKCYHBlC3ClM-AbJEIeUOcUdA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I love this Vietnamese restaurant! Their  food tastes authentic and good portion. The staff is very friendly.  I highly recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVtYu7FzeQMFMXSc6ztd2Y8Nq8gZH-2gbeDEff&fid=0x0:0xea74b02a243bf2e"],"When":"2024-3-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Julio Hernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVe1K3IZyiZR-7k2j0sgZj91NSxbSIJoheL2gAuKU6XMgwqQkJAEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had lunch there yesterday with my wife, and it was quite the shock to find what an amazing place they have put together.
You would have never guessed from the outside, but as soon as you walk in the door and you see the hallway, right away, you can tell that this restaurant is special.

It's very easy to give them 5 stars on every category without having to think about it.

Food: A high-level culinary experience with a Thai fusion. Their chefs take their time to create each masterpiece. Both of our dishes (Soufflé pancakes and Midnight burger with taro and yam fries) were extravagant, with fresh and rich ingredients, the plating was on point and the food was filling.

Service: You are well looked after the minute you walk in. The staff is very attentive and is happy to take care of you.
They check on you without making you feel rushed.

Atmosphere: Just one word, Fancy.
We appreciate the attention to detail and honesty. We even felt a little underdressed.
Even their washroom has nice decor.
It has a great ambiance, making you feel like you're in another country.

In closing, you get what you pay for.
I am a happy customer, my belly was happy, my wife was happy and we will return.

Highly recommended for a date night and dress to impress 👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3XS5umWpuOtMcl36_IYp-JN2jfnuTfyBPxcbj&fid=0x0:0x34c51ac8732a9cdf"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Ümit Demir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_uHDzWsdbW3ua-zfBRWHS2tHFkBpaaiVRXieRUB0eFZwRwjn0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shortly, if you want to bring someone you love and to show off that you know fancy restaurants, bring them here.

Other than the elegant atmosphere inside, I have to congratulate the chef 👨‍🍳’s success of detail oriented plates. Moreover, the texture of all the foods were well balanced and you feel yourself in a cosy seaside, or holiday.

Stuffs are polite and friendly, prices may seem high, but if you come here, focus on what quality food you have after a big effort, but feeling full.

Finally, I am lucky to have a place like Fanta here, if I want to have quality conversation, looking around the beautiful decorations, quality of food and feel somewhere else makes me comfy, I will come here again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOixp1G7wmDUtNgo2Ia6Xk6OqqyO8D2IdBp7FIQ&fid=0x0:0x34c51ac8732a9cdf"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Sofia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3DifFwDMTB58GBwUcG7HSGccjUCVlplE2gzWFv3JhMyR4mjDT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is absolutely beautiful! I visited a Thai restaurant for the first time last week, and while I’m not a big fan of Thai food, the overall experience was better than I expected. The staff was incredibly professional and kind, taking the time to explain the menu in detail, which made me feel more comfortable trying new dishes.

For starters, I highly recommend the Siam Sliders(mini burgers) that were absolutely delicious! The Fettuccini Scallop Pad Cha was okay, but nothing too surprising. However, the risotto was a standout dish and is an absolute must try.
Finally… the coconut crème brulee! I was already full, but thank God I tried it! It was the perfect ending to the meal.

Even as someone who’s not into Thai cuisine, I’d consider coming back to explore more of the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpZ4iwuphy6rEFq7c8oV_3DsGeHwCxj8Tpvl88&fid=0x0:0x34c51ac8732a9cdf"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Jeff Ross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS7f1cJwUpU6pw0PsQWajaPJted73gQZ0lbkvXf8YADsG8KpPh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pretty much everything you think it should be and more! Great service great food. We were amazed at how quickly things were served to us, especially with such great presentation. All of the servers were helpful and kind. We had a great selection of food. Happy hour pricing is nice. Fresh ingredients served to perfection.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHVtQEnc1Io_fhFRbVjBF8TOQbR47Eh4FkjbU5&fid=0x0:0x34c51ac8732a9cdf"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Kristine Dalisay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcLt02amtZMIH0nGVOp_lAFwSAH2eimnaBxmoRHPGqXeXyGmHa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a lovely dinner here 2 months ago. The food was amazing and the ambiance made me feel like I was royalty, like a princess. 😅 I was wearing a dress, but if I were to back here I would wear a prettier dress to match the atmosphere ☺️. I have been craving for their nachos. I would come back just for those. 😁","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7qB3Tn7IurSJ2GDiH_P1SxeOQMLEOiwHxKy9o&fid=0x0:0x34c51ac8732a9cdf"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Jessica Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOeC5VCbc6g3HH3dxXpDS9bE993HEKMDVI3SjHX2aNdHbQOJHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried the vegan coconut creme brulee today and felt good and healthy and full afterwards. Beautiful and cozy place with memorable atmosphere and welcoming people. Loved other items on their feature menu too which had low prices like eggplant fries. Hope to try some of those next time","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNhnbFwQzre3raXn8PyXiI_d-OGLrQDGYzwDcq&fid=0x0:0x34c51ac8732a9cdf"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Joanna Fahmy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJTznlA_q5Xa6Whv5wHF-yEDXEyOSOXOXBiPU7xtZRDBuF4Yw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here for Valentine’s day dinner and this place definitely stands out. The decor is just beautiful and different from anything I have dined in before. The food was phenomenal, the dumplings were the best I have had and were so colourful. The Lamb was yummy and just fell off so nicely and the burger was quite unique and flavourful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-F64m5GnMwhOGfZk45qiYsqHzXz5fkWDBitlE&fid=0x0:0x34c51ac8732a9cdf"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Dean Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0pEsEURd4htP2KCqkfiSgm0pKFb3Qf7AweqGbEsp0o8JM9Ta4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was unique and tasted decent. The overall atmosphere was a bit chaotic, but it was decorated in a colorful style that would likely appeal to women.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPg583TwhmqmkLvzJ9osfHim9GdGtb-ndl6czCe&fid=0x0:0x34c51ac8732a9cdf"],"When":"2024-12-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"kenzie st.dennis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3IiK1JusZPNKOpAMznki3eR_elaK-RRfgSQNlRxvOGezdu57o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Perfect place for a basic, affordable breakfast on a rainy day. The place is packed full of artful creations and art work. The instant smell of fresh bread and aromatic coffee can not be topped, not to mention the sound of families and friends clearly enjoying themselves! I had the 13 dollar and change breakfast that was delicious. Unreal sourdough toast and delicious hashbrowns. Farmers sausage was cooked perfectly and my Sunnyside up eggs were just as I had hoped. My gf ordered the 12 dollar and change pancake breakfast and was equally as pleased with everything on her plate minus the pancakes. They were without a doubt edible but bland and tasted like mix. The peanut butter cookie bar/square we purchased to go was stale, crumbly and disappointing. Again, this will not stop us from enjoying this incredibly cute, quaint, homey, aromatic and "general store-esque" breakfast stop in the near future. Overall, the perfect spot to wait out the rain or kill a couple hours enjoying friends company over a delicious cup of coffee. Tons of art to ponder. Looking forward to re-visiting on a live music day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPndgnPUobgnaNNjPs69BZRWUmTw8q_T3hTaIIZ&fid=0x0:0x51c26082325204"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"ross macdonald (Ross Mac)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvcMjvlUrIgQB_oLS0TBidM3GLEXeoiOjyCahMLwtz3aukXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited twice in 2 days which says it all, both times were for breakfast.

Really lovely location, with a great setting and quaint decor. Would be nice for a meal of just for tea and cake.

The food was delicious, I had the PY breakfast (eggs your way, a choice of bacon, sausage or ham with hashbrowns and toast) which was delicious and the next day I had the omelette which was best omelette I've had.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGTR6vJUlqxmRnzfupNaymrBnmXMFTLAM3aDuy&fid=0x0:0x51c26082325204"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Kim Rhindress","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGV1bXDBhXJzPDI9KSedz8MMWu5WbOPshbJnxk8ecoAvwrcRUU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A local gem. Super cute coffee shop with a Carb-free breakfast on the menu!! Good coffee, friendly service and great vibe!
Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNX4Atg2mjbQKy6zjkLrgd1iwOiwzyoT9QG3eHt&fid=0x0:0x51c26082325204"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Val Phelps","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVt16bYFSmCYJrTtFnISGfVeuD0t6mGHLjEOBZjyodkTlcx-9xh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a unique, quaint spot in Murrayville.   It's like stepping back in time.   Lunches looked amazing. We had tea and home made pastries.  The coconut macaroons are definitely a reason to return.  Moist and delicious.  The blueberry scone did not skimp on fruit and the cinnamon knot was very flavorful.   Tea served in teapots.   Staff were friendly and helpful.  The eating area had small, intimate tables with tablecloths. Small store with reasonable prices.  We'll be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Oscar Laurence","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBdUpeJOcC_qCBmJysUpjZuf1KgWh_HXgcwVKcIl-fMPyhh5EcHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Porter's is a wonderful bistro. The servers have always been kind and hospitable, the coffee and drinks are better than I've had at any other café, and I've enjoyed using this space to study. The food choices are a bit limited, but I've enjoyed all my meals.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"kimcraigj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJ9dXRSheU8ynhpv9Q7H122MpMVn7N-YTIKcXLLSSreZuzX4vE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed two very delicious breakfasts and lattes.
Kim's came with farmers sausage and mine with breakfast sausage.
Both were great examples of their respective kinds.
The eggs were well executed and the sour dough toast was great for dipping.
Mine came with fluffy, delicious pancakes. The addition of the warmed syrup took it over the top.
It's a busy little place, so there's a bit of a wait for your food...but it just gave us time to enjoy our lattes and chat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Valerie Sikkema","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjq-n0sEJkeYgvz-lwfDGG087oh9JMDL4qckJm3pP5muoEWc1j2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had the cauliflower cheese soup, it was ok but not hot enough and too much thyme. The chai latte and cheese scone were very good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christina F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUK8gyHkbtCJrbhtvHYdwz_GaeuZU-qqOsVaJ8U0AKETZNxZWY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this little place! They make fabulous coffees and tasty foods (lunches, snacks, desserts) they have live shows on Saturday nights with reserved seating and a dinner served (not sure if they still do that during covid) I’ve also bought some fun kitchenware and gorgeous art during my coffee visits there. Below are some items I’ve bought.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsSf_0yJuWzfLa4UYROyiR9QQlJF9ranGhfNOo&fid=0x0:0x51c26082325204"],"When":"2021-1-30"}]

descriptions: A varied menu of Thai classics is served in an intimate dining room with red walls & dark wood.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Colin Hamilton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIk81cVmo3yWDzrWIoGkyXARTxEQPH_Om4zV8kxcEUg4fdCJnE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Starting with the food; We had the Green Curry (Beef), Drunken Noodles (Chicken) and Satay.

The satay skewers were great and had a lot of meat on them. Probably more than I’ve ever had at a Thai restaurant.

The green curry was good, a bit runny and the beef was not the best I’ve had. My wife switched plates with me and loved it though.

The drunken noodles were amazing and came out hot and spicy with great flavour!

The service was great. Came at dinner time on a Sunday and were sat at our choice of seat (we chose the patio). Order was take quickly and food came out likewise. A great service experience.

The atmosphere on the patio is charming and  rustic with live plants and soft music.

All in all a great experience and one of go to restaurants in the Fraser Valley.

Picture of the satay is missing 3 skewers because we couldn’t wait to try them! 😂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeEQ9juPEdh8AiEFtUgUW7J-ElpIiGqHADoUWo&fid=0x0:0xf25db44faf68ba17"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Mori","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzjNclSLYHoLurDMy1z6lBJJfgC1i3gQXUk28JpQQw8EIfuYkF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for dinner on a weekday, there were 3 adults and 2 kids. Had reservations for dinner as this place filled up quickly.
We ordered a few dishes to share, including an appy platter.
The food was good and each dish was a nice size portion. The green curry was probably the star dish of the evening as the flavors were on point along with the requested medium spice level.
The dishes we ordered were quite expensive for what it was though, for example, the green curry with tofu was $25.50. This definitely isn't a place you'd regularly go to for dinner unless you don't care about saving money.
The service was okay, the soup came to our table about 15 minutes after 3 of the 4 dishes arrived at our table and the server checked up on us once to see how everything was, which was before we even got the soup. Then the next time anyone checked up on us, it was when we were done and ready for the bill.
All in all, it's a decent Thai food spot and a spot that you should try at least once if you're in the area.

2024/09/23
Came here on a Sunday evening for dinner, 5 adults and 2 kids.
The food was good and the service was relatively the same as the last, all dishes arrived relatively at the same time, except for one dish, which arrived about 10-12 minutes after the majority of the dishes arrived.
The good thing is that the dishes have been consistent the two times I have been here and dinner times tend to get busy at this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNjcEUqe_4fiiowRtfAy-ggXeFpQ4AOJgFtKVO&fid=0x0:0xf25db44faf68ba17"],"When":"2024-3-26"},{"Name":"Ton V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb4h6oZDMjakZ7o0kpJmjp_i41AvhfJ62KCrl6wCnDvytBpv4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We came with a large group of 9 people so had a chance to order multiple dishes. Most of us are Asian and very familiar with Thai food, we had visitors from Asia visiting us, and we wanted to treat them to a great meal..
The sampler was ok. The Red Curry Chicken was very nice, the Papaya salad was tasty, and the Pineapple Fried Rice was good too - good portions too. The Fried Snapper was disappointing (more batter than fish). The Spicy Calamari were very small pieces and a bit soggy (probably due to the wet garnish on the plate). The Pad Thai was ok, but a bit surprised the noodles were thinner than we expected. Deserts were ok. So overall, we were a bit disappointed treating our guests to Thai food, hence we only give 3 stars. It's a nice place, and staff are very pleasant. Perhaps we were just unlucky this time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMJx1stvws1cj5Rdvw-K0oXL4Qqt55rP8U69I&fid=0x0:0xf25db44faf68ba17"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Kyle Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQa9hd5VqfhYkf7Se1SaeGQ890P9TQE7u9P6JtEfExGxdCnOT8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Absolutely terrible service today, we were there for a dining time of 50 minutes not too short not too long. We felt like we were a bother and got pestered over 8-9 times if we were finished eating, that isn’t service that’s supervising. The restaurant wasn’t even full yet and no other table was asked this frequently. Finally when the bill came we paid for it and then the server came back and said it was $20 short but they had just brought back the wrong receipt as the bank statement and invoice after showed the correct amount WITH standard % tip too. We won’t be coming back if this is the level we can expect, we had fond memories of this place prior to this as it was one of our first dates here.

Food was mostly good and drink was very delicious though. Props to the kitchen staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9FPTL59McEKBUlJKvPIGUXh9UKgpoAYz5aIEG&fid=0x0:0xf25db44faf68ba17"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Lex","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIOoTFR1sL0065mPU_AeAGgpwzqHssyGAT0I917Apw20TmHTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you haven’t been to Langley’s Ban Chok Dee restaurant, you’re missing out! Visually stunning and even more stomach pleasing. Ban Chok Dee is our go-to in Langley and the best Thai food we’ve ever tasted. My colleagues constantly rave about how delicious the food and drinks are here 🍹 My husband ordered Pad Thai and I got the Cashew Nut chicken with a couple of cheeky white sangrias.. we discovered this place in 2020 while looking at highly rated restaurants in the area, and it’s the best gem we’ve ever found.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGCqW5uAGowqjz2x8sDUHtgx-wCLseZeFEsaBy&fid=0x0:0xf25db44faf68ba17"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"S Salil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHLEz5i6JHhYd1TSfmOhILHvAbA35-zO0yP4VKH163dIaYQCYW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food is good (Patsara is better). Setup is good, nothing outstanding. Service is terrible!
They forgot my beer, then forgot about the nampra and then the bill. Maybe bill took time but definitely forgot the other two. Apologizing with a smile is fine the first time, second time it's like completely ignored.
Too much coconut flavor in everything. I was in Thailand for 1 year, never seen coconut cream/flavor in every dish. Only thing I liked was calamari which is not a Thai specialty anyway.
Better to avoid during rush hours maybe... Food didn't feel top off the line, service ensured I am not going there again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0AVH-D1TH1zyvANq5f-Bi2zzeoxINOb8Llb9l&fid=0x0:0xf25db44faf68ba17"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Bill Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrLDUKCB9KhwKlqIkCcXUiASMuWECjsxURVB66vsZhnoGGXEJCJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time here and we were impressed. Got a 5 pm reservation and needed it. Steady flow of people coming is a good sign. The service was fast and efficient and everyone liked their dishes. The meals were all hot so not sitting in the kitchen. You can have them mild, medium or hot and each dish was prepared to our heat preference perfectly. We will return! They have a medium sized restaurant and have taken over the adjacent space to expand, maybe twice as large. Parking is on the street but plenty of it. Got a high chair for the squirt and all was well. Recommend👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7L-Iecy7Z-4LoEF5c1nXEqbQOeW8VF74SIEWI&fid=0x0:0xf25db44faf68ba17"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Alym Amlani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGCS7cfdRd9yppSIvIAypDkWBSXz0qghmJF3r1Qs4AKnQ6BCK-zQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an incredible experience here. The portions are very generous and the food is the best Thai I’ve had outside of Thailand. Very highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoAgi3wJgM2cb9Z8GYbOgLEOxGkb8USDHfMZNH&fid=0x0:0xf25db44faf68ba17"],"When":"2024-11-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amor Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9kbKHYqRX_Gg2uVn_SGYTu2Tq6BfdN21XTd_KihWjWjlXpA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the new Chaii Thali. It’s amazing and very fulfilling for a single person.
2 of us shared the talli and enjoyed it. I received 2 Chaii / 1 Vada Pav / 2 small samosa / 3 piece sweet dish / Poha / Mix pakora (Paneer and veg)

Fresh, Tasty and valuable","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgFx7PL5Pd4aGQfVIs_FpQUWa7VkY7cHwkv5z-&fid=0x0:0xc9b4f9095d8c8d4"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Nandini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqGAGCY8WFdEDdmWtICcXIGUNH2gIHxAibr_QSMwVfqnxS_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Indulge in the authentic flavors of India at this delightful restaurant in Langley. Their commitment to using fresh, homemade ingredients ensures a healthy eating experience every time. The Kadhi Pakora is a true delight, bursting with flavor, while the Pav Bhaji paired with a complimentary cup of Masala Tea transports your taste buds to the streets of India. With the added convenience of their Tiffin service and affordable prices, this is a must-try culinary gem for anyone craving genuine Indian cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlJOFLuyBTPy5INcC2McOyY27ZMX9r5y_-15ce&fid=0x0:0xc9b4f9095d8c8d4"],"When":"2024-2-1"},{"Name":"Gavya Goyal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCeuOuLzr3z6nRiOYAJItGzFu6vPftIFwR5-ibg7OfWlTkJmU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered Navaratri thali from Namak Daani. It was so so good, worth it. The packaging was so good and taste was amazing. Keep up the good work guys. I am so happy I came across this restaurant. Thank you so much!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMD5wmh7cI8uxFNRFY-DUaAvarmSwMxZf6bcnSV&fid=0x0:0xc9b4f9095d8c8d4"],"When":"2024-4-11"},{"Name":"Puneet Sehgal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlum5y_kUvsZYQGDbIwe5TizSKb92nZk2KExxOp3CUtL_fbMfjuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the Navratri Thali from Namak Dani, and it was absolutely amazing!

The food was not only flavorful but also generous in portion—more than enough for one person.

Every item was prepared with such care, and the Sabudana Kheer was definitely the highlight of the meal.

Perfectly sweet and rich in texture! Highly recommend if you're looking for a satisfying and delicious Navratri feast.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7njhII5E1XAZqZJbtUnCZPvZbDsr8IjCGOK_gUrhVVRnM7x4vDA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst food. They microwave frozen food. Reviews are not legitimate. Uber drivers can't find this place as they operate out of some warehouse. Their food is a health hazard and causes food poisoning. This place needs to be shutdown - that's how bad it is!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sanyukta Kumandan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKL5gP6RsdeU-MbLKZUl38198ov5H9n9fYPHfxFs-BF5GIvZaW5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered food from here and it took forever to reach us. Almost 1.5 -2 hours.
We ordered rajma chawal and chicken pepper with garlic rice. Rajma was okay but too salty.
Chicken was the worst. It had a thick layer of oil on top and it tasked as if raw chicken is dipped in oil and sent to us. I had to throw it all. Sorry but this place is not reliable. Never ordering again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"deepak sharma dhami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWex5Q_sn_edqreuRwID0XO1gRmv85yacm57ZY3IwlxN_sUle8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Looks like a cloud kitchen and a good option for pickup. The food was tasty and good value for money","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNN_Fjejk_kDtkn1qIaUItCQPQhQ4M8q86kIal7&fid=0x0:0xc9b4f9095d8c8d4"],"When":"2024-2-24"},{"Name":"Himanshu Chadha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaVrnjBUh6SfeJydxSOE2Utp4QCNhiXEjDVsSkLNn19kjYDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have one of the best Tiffin service. I have tried several tiffins before, but you guys beat them all by both quality and quantity wise. I have ordered food in the past from Namak dani , it was really good, so I thought to try your tiffin service as well. 10/10. 👍🏻👍🏻","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ree Ling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWR0wT_fZJJfh-fYGTDLXtr0XxXk3ZBWYEvpbWYDvgkCB54QPRGNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We got food poisoning less than 24hrs after purchasing. Meat not cooked people rude add sauce even when my kids are allergic to sauce. Called back and got rude yelling at me very disrespectful no one wants o say names. I called the manager he wouldn’t tell his name very rude services from all employee. I seen in the comments that they don’t cook food well so alot of people are getting sick eating from hear. Will never go back here . I want HR to reach out to me because I’ve phone records of the employees talking and yell a me on phones or I’ll post it on here .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2Y6eNV2r1V7kURw_nJhiec9LLLRFd-qS6wva9&fid=0x0:0xb52a23362d971c9f"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Mila Viveros","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPObVbrmIsS2IWhzTbZjY9K41IUVEMchO3QMLs5hgKHdj6RDr9rA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a spicy  chicken burger for delivery, i have not eaten today, i took a bite and the chicken was raw, raw pink chicken patty… i actually can’t believe i wasted my hard earned money, im hoping to eat and you sent me raw chicken in my burger… that’s disgusting","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMV8GKcY2IlIHKzyBomgM6BDYhdPyWRlfdcLcwF&fid=0x0:0xb52a23362d971c9f"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Abhishek Kaushal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9og8g1yUG1LE_FPO3SkpFDSuwUVdVdqwuPrFf7lJA_h0roeA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The experience with Burger King and team was really good. The food and food service was awesome. All the crew members fully cooperated with customers. The dine-in area is clean and provides proper hygiene.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason Horn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAGQwo4-q9dyC8LPbitH4hPbOuamlQh-6B4VomzX3GP4EDP9AF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went through drive-thru around midnight. Food was hot and fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4MEYhMgXd8z4qw_WJJve_oWCddKfPiPW6VbWz&fid=0x0:0xb52a23362d971c9f"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Pawanjot Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4iE_qE0QiIl_7vxHFPTkSoao72Hy4hMxFXN1R2jtBaN4pYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went recently to this location, having their recently released funnel cake fries along with a impossible Whopper meal. In certain restaurants there aren't many vegetarian options but burger king is a place id definitely recommend for my fellow vegetarians. The food is always hot and fresh in this location and the staff is always polite. 10/10 experience overall.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Victoria Pauline","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLmVFDbHtLb15JCD4rWCirmWs6Qw8hTctbt_YvHqUeAykA4YAo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I haven't been here since I was a kid and didn't expect how good it was. I was greeted into the establishment by very friendly Jasmine. The new renovations are very nice, the order screen is easy to navigate (works way better than mcdonalds) I really enjoyed my chicken sandwich and fries (they actually salt the fries! The only thing i didn't really like was the churro fries, didn't expect them to be so tiny they didn't taste super great either. Otherwise I had a pleasant experience. The manager even asked if I had been helped too:)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaime Melul","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_3JK83Q4FM6_2M-nfSbVTfPjXF0JQ30NLLmITol2hMtZjiw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible customer service! We went in and ordered a whopper combo and I said I wanted to make my fries large. My mom ordered a jr whopper and drink (I upsized as we were going to share). After we paid we noticed the bill said large fries AND medium fries even after my mom told her twice she didn’t want a combo and even showed her the receipt. she gave us attitude about it! And then the manager apologized and said she was training. Train your workers better!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"tl;dr Below average. Look at the picture.

Ordered via Uber because sometimes you just want Burger King from Uber.

The regular Whoppers were put together well but lacked that distinct Whopper flame broiled flavor. Fries and onion ring were ok too, and the drinks and shake were fine.

But the junior hamburger or whatever it’s called… my goodness. I guess they ran out of the right sized buns? On first glance I thought they had sent me just two pieces of bread.

We ordered the “4 can dine for $29.99” which I thought was a pretty good deal. Two of the four are regular Whoppers and the other two are these smaller burgers. The picture speaks for itself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsEGoEXEs1HyO6pYVt2b2qOTWV1NBxboMhT2jQ&fid=0x0:0xb52a23362d971c9f"],"When":"2024-3-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Khatija Govani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIl6CPRCd66LqZ8ix4_ub44ULLqN6rYkvv7aTNL6WxPu-nhKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I just don't Understand how hard it can be to make a salad with no dressing or dressing on the side this is not the first time they've screwed up our order at the store absolutely ridiculous￼

This is now a second Review wow how special this place must feel that they are getting two reviews from me both at separate times!
My partner went to this particular store yesterday to get her salad on her way to work simple easy a salad the person serving her at Freshii were the same gloves to operate the register as the same gloves to open the refrigerator door and the same gloves to do all other task tasks and then make the salad but hang on. There’s the best part to this.
As soon as it was time to eat the salad, guess what it was not fresh fresh at all it was actually really gross and slimy. The cucumber was old and you know when you have old stale cucumber it’s slimy. That’s exactly what the salad was.

Please please please food safe if you’re reading this get over there quickly to the store before they poison. Somebody and Freshii please get it together. If nothing else at least serve fresh produce you charge a lot for your salads. I would expect it to be fresh as in your name Freshii.!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tamara C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUm95ZwFEQSRG4_Mzx9dtL0XmQO63mo0-suoR_Q-Dow0An7FRI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am the hot lunch coordinator for a neighbour school to this location. I can’t say enough good things about our hot lunch experience with Freshii. The owner was amazing to deal with, so friendly and responsive to questions. Our hot lunch arrived on time, the most organized we’ve ever had and not a single mistake. They even accommodated our gluten free children by adding a gluten free item to the menu. Staff and students all loved the food. We will definitely order again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIM_0ZEIq36NhqwJF4noA1a7jKLnGUjznHVfPDnEZ-CJbqOcw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is ridiculous, portion size was like a happy meal for children. Every other Freshii I’ve gone to have the bowls packed full and this was half. Not to mention the amount of chicken was a slap in the face for the extra cost. I think head office should take a look and educate them on proper portions cause clearly they are trying to be cheap.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"brian babb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIE-w3y-N446oOEEHCAzPU8n892ivE1ujG1qc1fV3LiRL8exw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Come here on lunch break frequently. Great wraps also use the app to get 20% off the daily burrito. They are filling and healthy im 220lbs so i need alot of food and these are perfect. Will be a longtime customer here
Freshii 4 life","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Corrina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB5hV85nOwIiiQ6_rlRdABZPey3qYktSXPDv-Op1W86SZan0Is=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This particular Freshii is a great place to grab a salad. I ordered the oaxii bowl. The bowl was actually full and it wasn't just filled with rice or kale, it actually had a good amount of filling. I paid for extra Pico di Gao and beets but it was worth it, the food was fresh. I paid four dollars extra for chicken though and I wish there was abit more. The woman that helped me was friendly and the place is clean.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephanie White","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXN0vmz3mDkNtjAudBNwwzTaFy9IBczM7kcuQBXrdWOtDvRP5E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The two times I walked in I had experiences that weren't worth complaining about but which kept me going to my regular location. I accidentally ordered from this freshii instead of the one down the road using skipthedishes. Big mistake. By the time I noticed it was too late to cancel. I live 2 blocks away but I've been waiting for an hour. It's taken them 50 minutes to prepare my order like what the actual....fast forward to 30 minutes later when I get my food, the soup has no avocado, but it did have a hair! The owners of this location would do themselves a favor by spending some time at the other location nearby. If you're going to try to compete at least be prepared 🤦‍♀️
And then to add insult to injury you claim it as a skip delivery issue? They had plenty of drivers on standby. And when the tracker is continuously saying "preparing your order", and twice I was notified that freshii needed more time to "prepare my order" The issue was most definitely not with skip. The issue is poor quality service. If you don't know how to train your staff, how can they perform well? It's quite clear the issue is the accountability of the owner. I would email you about it but it's easier to just drive down the road and not make the same mistake twice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J ZARO","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5IrTJN8M28rkmHMOPRpWNQGOzsRkPM067VkzqiFtAda5SYKBb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This was my review a year ago we loved this place.
But sorry can’t feed my kids a Burnt cheesy chicken packet I wish had a photo it’s funny she refused to change it She kept convincing me that it’s melted cheese what a rude girl!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHS7HRNdh2CkCp7ZXpRIUNnNN2WqXt6uJzcGYS&fid=0x0:0xbfb027eeab5a46fd"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Dee Booth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrpK_p5T_tFYRtZU98bYrJ6T4CZ7z08NJq3Sbhhrpg8Go3pg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We ordered 2 wraps. One was full of dressing and only 3 small pieces of chicken. The outer wrap was wet, probably from being frozen. We dont do wet!
The second was dry with all the dressing at the bottom with only 2 small pieces of chicken
And loaded with kale. No flavor.
Was gross. Won’t be back.
Thankfully A&W was next door.","Images":null,"When":""}]

Argumentative","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sonya Christopher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLeQE_r8grjephmhqy3bAkJFGe8S-d23vvqyBDjRtj3KibvCw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best subway out of everywhere I've been. They always remember you. Navneet always makes the perfect sandwich 🥪 😋","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gary Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKF1BKp3FufYKzppgN4TaoQTG5SgCArJTJHqtm2W18t9Cfn4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The worst customer service ever the staff is in such a rush to run away from work like they dont even care about what the customer wants they think they can make whatever they want . I ordered two sandwiches the first one without even asking what we  want just put veggies on the sub and and even when told what sauces to put on, they put there own choice , 2nd sandwich was a chicken sandwich made into turkey saying hurry up im in a rush maybe the owner needs to pay attention and tell there not to rush out the door at exact closing time people need to learn customer service if they want our money","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"T C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUX87tfmNtdv2NHYF-owyfHffJLv7IRFi8C-DHIvrplouBHj6xc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I don't think anybody needs to read a review of subway really, ya? I've always liked their subs and I find people either have always loved or always hated subway. I would give it a 5 star, but corporate places don't deserve the fourth. The suit at the top still makes way too much money while underpayment employees with a 4, 5, or a 1, amiright? Genoa salami, great sandwich.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Morey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjOs8TcWznVXGJWzAmTlXOdYy_Ysz-qprsjcoqi2OzJ2gj0y4p=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"\"Harry\" and Jashan were incredibly efficient, productive. Made sure all the food that went into the sandwiches were not wilted or old.\n\nI love subway as a quick snack and It is rare to have this good service with finesse they executed. 5 stars Harry and Jashan.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Mr. Siaopao De Langley is a standalone store with a bunch of purchasable products from the Philippines as well as dining tables for food service. The owners or workers are from Cebu and we had a lovely chat with them. We got a few products like their custom made vinegar, atchara, and 3 in one coffee. For food, we got the pork asado siaopao and the pancit canton. The siaopao was a little bit different than we were used to but was nice and fluffy. The food was ok and we got really good service for everything we requested.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfAlmSxg8ofS4lNd3gXqvygLYGrIoxr_ANt_B0&fid=0x0:0x597733d6dfed346f"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Timothy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI13h5FW-28uuiMWcvt87aPxokobmNsxxo41t8wpKkORLHJHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"you guys are horrible people!

you advertised 3 of lumpia for $19 but you only gave me one, cut in half!

you did not have what i ordered (lechon for $27), but you gave me sisig instead ($24).

is this a restaurant or a scam?

if there was a negative star, or if we could report you for theft!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVaIay0b4pjtGPnONv-a3xxifOhrZjJw0azMSJ&fid=0x0:0x597733d6dfed346f"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very home-y filipino place here in Langley! They have a small shop full of filipino snacks with plenty of classic drinks as well. Of course, their food is delicious, especially their sisig, and I highly recommend it :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuo1vVvyZHkDfpw7dvY4xSdLfiYsc9o7z3bXYM&fid=0x0:0x597733d6dfed346f"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"探险家Ramona","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVNVrqOQDND8IML5kfLwIR2bh_LDHY6JMIG9TSXsAZeBAYpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutly love their steam buns. Drove all the way from the valley to get them.  We got a frwsh badge of a dozen made and it was worth the wait. Easy to freeze and enjoy when needed .Taro and red bean steamed buns pefect with oat soup Perfect for the cold days.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiy3AM_5YqQsuF6vZ2SdqQIZu5MehEB5sILIDN&fid=0x0:0x597733d6dfed346f"],"When":"2023-12-6"},{"Name":"John Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvOMWAxTT73j63z3bZqraOTJDC4pwhvvmVNTsjoweNuYUIhHG1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's run by the nicest folks, and the food is fantastic. I hadn't had Filipino food before so I can't comment on authenticity but they tasted good :) I would love to come back and try their buns and other Filipino snacks they have.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"lai Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZhn1RF4oQ88AJoOZD2TNabiwCO_Sz-MclW8GplPkuuyxKcqiN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"(3.5/5)

Service is good. Store looks nice and clean with great chairs and tables but there was an odd semi-open door to a dusty construction site that gave a strange ambience.
The sweet siopaos weren’t bad (4/5) nice and fluffy, good flavour, not too sweet with lots of filling. but the chicken asado (2/5) were disappointing in terms of taste and amount of filling. The chicken was dry and bland and I think a recipe change should be considered.

Atmosphere (3/5)
Service (4/5)
Food (3/5)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-Ws-9HlCSYAw89SYLLdFu9bvk2JYHGccnHcFt&fid=0x0:0x597733d6dfed346f"],"When":"2024-4-17"},{"Name":"J C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRid-486EHf3vFFlqzxc7hc71kbL9n1FDLFiUelrs10b7uY4If=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"3 stars at best when you eat it fresh.  Bun is for sure fluffy but the filling falls short of the better ones out there.  For $4 a bun it’s decent and will fill you up. It’s not something I would drive all the way out for.but would be happy to support if I’m in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNo5Ys4HbLDhT6G0kbc9xPIHPwG1YEO97ur4fud&fid=0x0:0x597733d6dfed346f"],"When":"2023-7-27"},{"Name":"Mik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgbA3pjUHs6I-7cIfmRiU2gSggvkGxhVXym3GA2ZUTNLPeMHKv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like their asado siopao! The calamansi juice was refreshing too. You can also buy siomai (usually frozen). We wanted to eat it there and they were kind enough to steam it and serve it to us😀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJ0y9MbuYvF7iXjGs7X1AJdC4IEpv2K1ZBuauc&fid=0x0:0x597733d6dfed346f"],"When":"2023-6-12"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"maria grey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8FEcpnfN1-xWJm6jpUVFyeTvrZDkt6N8m0gKvoNv1bcyE2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I usually order here at downtown location for takeout and delivery and always get the half \u0026 half boneless chicken (Yangyeom and Cheese Snow, sometimes Soy Garlic). The portions are great. However, this time the chicken wasn't evenly coated with the Yangyeom and Cheese Snow sauces, and there was so little Cheese Snow powder that it tasted like regular fried chicken. Also, the store atmosphere was very hot. I don't know if they changed the owner, but the Yangyeom tasted a bit different, which I didn't like. I think they added some spice to it, maybe cumin or masala. I'm not sure if I'll go back. I might try the other location in Langley Township.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjMDB-wiq0AcRCd9TKBO8ll747-1AytRs_dqJ5\u0026fid=0x0:0x3e97afaa1fc9e24e"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Nick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkLgz8VOQBYFJkG7ndvY_ab42z8hujUknrTT6hp96Tk396SQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very good fried chicken, they use a light batter so it's not as greasy but you still get a good crunch. Took off a star because it does not come with picked radish, which is a staple. I can't believe you have to pay for that separately. They should really include a side-portion of radish like most places.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Guninder M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXG8PtH2OmGWVo6ojcV8teQbztUa0HaU-3qwzAIOG0oO7xsDti=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their chicken is amazing but hate the fact that closing time on google is 11PM but they won’t accept any orders after 10:30PM. You should change the opening times online, this is stupid.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sara Carlyle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUfagfxPSsqRzysTwGF0HJYhcU468FFL0xhcJkSC6KqdQt-JTe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Extremely clean, simple amazing Korean fried chicken. We always get lots of different sauces to try. I’ve never seen such a clean fast food/takeout establishment. The prices are reasonable we drive all the way from White Rock just to get it. My family and friends are all obsessed. So far the best chicken place I’ve ever been to! Ample parking and lots of tidy area space inside to eat or wait for it. The pickled radish is to die for. Again, house made not store bought. I love the boneless chicken option, but you can get bone in if you like. What a great place! The outside doesn’t do it justice. We got a bit confused finding it as the whole shopping area is a bit hidden, but not too hard to find.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrCjnpRkTqenYBFXEXrNi_yI5gRrmxqkqS_mtS\u0026fid=0x0:0x3e97afaa1fc9e24e"],"When":"2021-12-4"},{"Name":"Catie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnCSg1Tyc6KyG_BoUA7Jz5bc-AL8cRCmCKFFcZuiWQfljRcw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered from here for the first time yesterday.  We decided to get a half order of boneless fried chicken with soy garlic sauce ($12.50) and it was crispy and delicious! The chicken was fresh and cooked to order (took about 10-15 mins) which we appreciated as it was hot. The sauce had great flavour and was not spicy. We also tried the regular fries ($4) which had a good crisp to the outside and tasted great.  We also got a side of yangyeom sauce ($1) to try. There were plenty of fries for the two of us and the yangyeom sauce was sweet and a bit spicy but tasted awesome! We thought that this was a great way of trying each sauce which could in turn be put on a fried chicken order. The restaurant was really clean and staff was very kind.  The lady at the front explained each flavouring and their corresponding spice levels.  She even gave us some of the cheese snow powder on the side to try for free as this is what they put on their shake-shake fries and it was surprisingly good and sweet. We really enjoyed our meal and highly recommend this restaurant to others. Just had to watch the Korean Netflix drama “Crash Landing On You” while we ate!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnbUOKZCLNwlQECnZ_3iqOU3uNdac4Z30uoyEd\u0026fid=0x0:0x3e97afaa1fc9e24e"],"When":"2021-1-3"},{"Name":"Jamie Little","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXF1ipaOzq8nLinMTMqg5tfTdIlQQzEU_ka7XxFe7cceaH4Kk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"On word, Delicious!\nThe chicken is crispy, juicy \u0026 not overly greasy, its all the things you want in fried chicken. Plus they have a boneless option for all the chicken as well, witch is pretty great. The fries are also really good, crispy coated goodness. Looks like it's family owned, they are very polite and give great service.  The resturant/kitch was also very clean. Nothing but good things to say, I'll be returning here without a doubt! Picture really doesn't do it justice 🤤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX08uxozH-zrXs4T18byhA6jrmiOEq8kveI4TD\u0026fid=0x0:0x3e97afaa1fc9e24e"],"When":"2022-6-28"},{"Name":"Ying W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMgp1W6R7soMe4Pt0-9nIyFSxdU5hG7emawp3cioYUe42MraTX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A little hidden gem in Langley. The restaurant is fairly small but very clean. It's mainly for takeout anyway. The chicken comes in many flavours. We got half original and half with the sweet spicy sauce. The meat was tender, juicy and extremely crispy. The sweet spicy sauce had a special aroma which made my taste buds tingle. Best of all, they have bone-in option which is more authentic and harder to find in Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8IIj3fNO6zxh7ZLOFp6HA3HLlBsFw_17qUKfR\u0026fid=0x0:0x3e97afaa1fc9e24e"],"When":"2021-2-7"},{"Name":"Weihan Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJv2K1oAaP93dVsjAYqt3nP2QNT2zVWrSKXXudwYM19IhMHrg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice people, I am very impressed by their chicken. If you looking for tasty chicken with a fair price, here it is.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Dairy Queen Grill & Chill
address: Centre, 20300 Fraser Hwy, Langley, BC V3A 4E6
descriptions: Soft-serve ice cream & signature shakes top the menu at this classic burger & fries fast-food chain.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Drive-through","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":false}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true},{"name":"Late-night food","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":false}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Family-friendly","enabled":true},{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true},{"name":"Good for kids birthday","enabled":true},{"name":"High chairs","enabled":true},{"name":"Kids' menu","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alexis Jorsvik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKexwmylriwjX3RP3nwuiabp1mq5jZqyaRiR2MLtzU2i7Wv5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I love Dairy Queen, but I have been sitting in the drive thru now for 20 minutes waiting to purchase a gift card. There have been only 2 cars ahead of me. I am not sure how a single meal for a single person in the one car ahead of me could take 15 minutes, but somehow it is true. There are at least two people working inside. Please hire more help for them!!! Thank you","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leon Hong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6-KMw0P9pLdadDaXXdIupuy-a2gxL42t1TPJHI7r89HYZt3_3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is one of the worst DQ locations I have been to and I use to live in Vancouver.

1. The staff there are very unfriendly and just terrible. I ordered my food via the drive thru, I understand hot food takes time so they ask me to park which I get. I was outside for 30 mins and they forgot about my order. I had to go inside and remind them. This happen not just once but 4 times in 1 month. I just stop going.
2.  The food is horrible! I’m not sure what they do, the patties are dry, the chicken strips are cooked in really old oil that it gave my fries and chicken the rancid and bitter flavour.  Inedible!
3.  I hope you like cockroaches and rats, they sure got a lot there.
4.  The teens they employ there spend more time chatting and on their phones . I get it but do that when there are no customers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chloe White","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocITtA5hfER0P_IdOTi1xe3AU44i49dyP29xVuK74AGAuUlIZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"very much agreeing with the rest of the reviews!! i’ve never had such insanely rude customer service and coming from someone who is a manager in that field is crazy. went through the drive thru and ordered a blizzard which i was waiting for so long in the line about at least 6 minutes. when i got to the window the blizzard was melted and the younger man did not flip my blizzard so therefore i said if you don’t flip it don’t you get a free one? he shook his head and said im not sure and then said he did flip it which he did not and turned his head away from me so i left. i then called the store to speak to a “supervisor” who said yes i should of gotten a free one and i explained what happened and she said she had to check with the co worker to see what happened and she said “he said he flipped it” and so i told her that he said that but didn’t and to check their cameras which she doesn’t have access to so i asked when the manager will be in to speak to since there wasn’t one on shift and that she wasn’t sure so then i asked why she couldn’t check the schedule to see and she said she couldn’t do that either. this is ridiculous.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mandy K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqpPrmDEUt4AY-095oThusTQDEhbCauUEzF4lXu3tY_-Hnpw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"🚫NOPE🚫
We used to go here every week but not after today. This is the second time we have been given a rotten banana from this location. My daughter was eating her banana split with her little sister and went to have some of the banana and it was all black. I will never go back here after this. The night manager at first refused to give me my money back and said it had mostly been eaten! My daughter's had maybe 2-4 bites of the ice cream before noticing. The lady offered me a new one instead and said that their bananas normally look like that. I ended up getting my money back fortunately in the end after arguing. They should have fresh bananas for an $8.50 item in my opinion! Can you imagine what they put into an orange Julius?! Wasted gas and time to return it. Night manager was rude and made it an easy decision for us to never return. I hope that they have future quality standards. So gross!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUVc9ra9Z_aF6gyIvLiCFnbxEfIdjo-aE6nbYj&fid=0x0:0x150c954ad8e4862a"],"When":"2022-3-17"},{"Name":"Brad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIBJAhosqqQHYGVx7Oaj3h4q8ywP3t6a9K5BvuHvtUElCHnSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Went through the drive-thru at 10pm 1 hour before close so I don't expect super fresh, I understand it's late. But what I recieved was two brick solid pieces of dried out beef smothered in mustard.
I get this burger many times before and no problem.
But if this is the condition of the food at night, just throw it out. Tell me it's sold out or something. Don't make me pay $7 for garbage that you're about to throw out, just so I have to throw it out at home in my garbage.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP50qb3DTmKkwrggn9lURCBGuiAcSx3joOh8iC3&fid=0x0:0x150c954ad8e4862a"],"When":"2023-10-30"},{"Name":"Ally Robertson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDgeYny82o1Nq_p9mRjmGQwuEVznMcguf9Nl3LsN8mu_KlCRuf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Sorry was busy when the ap popped up for a review. My last two visits comprised of a frazzled and stressed woman, my wait in the drive through line was nearly a full 15 min. Inexcusable for a fast food place. Terribly understaffed. I feel so terrible for that poor woman doing her best to serve us. Human ability only goes so far. HIRE MORE STAFF. Especially at lunch time. DQ is a food of convenience but it's become inconvenient to wait so long for fast food, I had to work 15 min after my shift to make up for that lost time. Do better my dudes!
During my most recent visit I paid for water and never recieved it and waited another 10 min in drive through with only 1 car infront of me who only ordered a small sundae. This location is severely understaffed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nirupama Shyam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUqJ0DmTzq-xalgpZqHJeTOBBl2T0lFO2okFRivWfnptsmoQtm9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"(My review is solely based on ice creams and shakes. I haven't tried burgers here)

Despite a lot of run-of-the-mill reviews for DQ, I reckon it has the cheapest yet plausibly tasty ice creams in town.  We thought the size of the Oreo brownie and choco brownie cup ice creams was just perfect for a family of four. It's a go-to place to coddle your midnight cravings. I also give a thumbs-up to the assiduous staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-1cdH5ke-In0megh7uIX4xx6PVDObvYwNrsBK&fid=0x0:0x150c954ad8e4862a"],"When":"2024-2-23"},{"Name":"Ornella Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRsDej9-cJUVaAjxdV4MxtuWPuFItnQzHdr_-aW8-o3awSn8dCtA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I asked what their smallest thing cause I’m not very hungry and and the girl treated me with the snarkiest attitude and replied “cheeseburger”… I said I was looking for something small not a cheeseburger cause I was confused why a cheeseburger? Came across as if she’s making fun of my weight perhaps? I left because I have social anxiety and ordering is already difficult for me and she wasn’t being kind or helpful. When I went to sit down after my friend helping me order, she looked back at me with another co worker and they looked at each other and started laughing and saying things. It was clear they were making fun of me. They were working on May 12, 2024 at 6:50 pm if management wanted to look into this. I sat there trying to process all that happened, and felt too anxious which made me lose my appetite. I had to ask them to return my order because I felt too awful to consume it and her and the other employee started to argue with me about my reason. I said I don't want to argue, I just can't eat it and would like a refund. They asked "and you didn't know this earlier?" and that they won't refund me but they can make me a new one or give me a coupon. To that I said no because again I was too anxious to eat and I am no longer a customer of Dairy Queen due to this incident. She asked me to take the ice cream and throw it out myself instead of taking care of it.","Images":null,"When":""}]
