user_reviews:
[{"Name":"jeff h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2hwUZHs5gB5Kyej34MtjpP2Hqzjy1rdhu3RFkVOsX-xs-Lw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food, excellent service. Tenderloin was cooked perfectly and the blue cheese crust on top was the perfect way to finish it off. Scallop risotto was very creamy and scallops were cooked perfectly. Crab and cream cheese stuffed mushrooms were a large portion and had a great lemon flavor. Caesar salad was fresh with plenty of bacon and fresh croutons. Cool view overlooking the curling arena.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlzhjH80DvmieucDSXZWlYej370xB30enBgpVQ&fid=0x0:0xb245bfb988363a45"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Crystal Andrew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIbSIETTo5dByrrM35CVIN5OHi4tEXJzVs-ePtKpEy1FWae1w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gave the Horse and Ryder a try after our son's hockey game... service was on point and the food was fantastic... forgot to grab a pic of the calamari before we devoured the plate! Hubby had the Lodge bacon and cheese burger and I had the beef dip (swapped the horseradish aioli with garlic aioli)... we will be back to try other items.  Others at the table had nachos which also looked fabulous.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwjeLEMnYl4Ur-OzQu1g6xafz3vuCEES3vSgii&fid=0x0:0xb245bfb988363a45"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Nick H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsLwuGHXIoa1kZJzgg6GGJ4IwMUMcaj10KhKmoj8R6vY4s7g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went in and had the Game burger and onion rings.
Game burger had bison venison and elk so I thought it would be neat to try.
Burger was very good but it didnt taste much different that regular burgers and was a little overcooked.
Onion rings the same as they were a little cold and tasted a little overdone.
Food was a little slow to come but not worth complaining about.
Place wasnt too busy fortunately.
The meal was pretty good but at $33 I thought was quite overpriced.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"C Hunter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIa8UfSdxLMrKFZ8IWIJYio60-b-MkH5WV3jd2BlFjvGFlWOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First off staff here have always been accommodating and friendly. You can order food from the pub menu or the restaurant located directly next door. Some things to be aware of. It can get busy when they’re are tournaments in George Preston arena. Quite often you’ll have individual customers sitting at a table designed for six customers so not great if you’re showing up with a larger group for dinner. Some of the seating has to conform to the layout so some areas you feel like your sitting in the hallway or a revamped recreation centre. There are no exterior windows…not a big deal in the winter but in the summer it has the bunker affect. The food is well pub like the restaurant food on the other is acceptable but a bit pricey for the quality. Would I order the overtop expensive Tomahawk steak? Probably not, it feels risky for the cost/value. I have ordered $45-$50 steaks? Yes and honestly they were okay but just okay a little disappointing if your spouse can make a better steak at home for considerably less. Yes, I have eaten at the Lodge and this a review of the Horse and Ryder but when you can order from the same menus regardless of which location you dine in it’s hard not to merge reviews. By the way my favourite pub menu item is the fish and chips. If you live in Brookswood and you don’t want to drive to WG to The Keg for steak it’s worth checking this place out just ask questions and be fussy if you order a steak and it’s not acceptable for what you paid for. If your looking to have wings and beer and possibly watch the real “Men With Brooms” it’s not a bad local spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaXqMxkRARFPuIZokaC0SxPD1ZlFU4uuWuqtqI&fid=0x0:0xb245bfb988363a45"],"When":"2023-6-18"},{"Name":"Sandy Vorberg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRUnDlnJ9QoM0O9p2qDa5khVLT8gY3YyZXkZ6lUfwaAS-FLXY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Second time here at the “new” location at George Preston. Considering it was Monday at 2:30 the pub had a few tables taken up. Our server Natasha was a total professional and nailed a Burnt Martini for my hubby.  Shared steak bites that were tasty and the price was fair. Calamari was very nice and not greasy. FYI… Hockey and CFL is on the multiple screens during the seasons so they have no problem catering to local favourites. Only complaint is that we would have like to see what is offered for brunch but no menu available yet. Indoor and outdoor dining available. Looking forward to brunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsEkJb7S7D3_of2FFxifotxuHZ3jnk-ZGnREXD&fid=0x0:0xb245bfb988363a45"],"When":"2023-8-16"},{"Name":"Louise Borg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXW3YoQtRSnL6dSrftCznw3yk2Sm5YWWx8ViMh7-0b9LROb9DGqWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here and was a bit tricky to find, go upstairs on the left of hockey arena and the pub overlooks the curling rink.
Nice atmosphere, great and friendly staff and delicious food.
I had the lodge burger and hubby had the steak sandwich which is open faced.  tender meat, good french fries and yummy dipping sauce!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMF36yw2baPG9PgN1lHQuPu6Nows-cmBQUH88d1&fid=0x0:0xb245bfb988363a45"],"When":"2022-10-30"},{"Name":"Dayana Bc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVeWeEVY-SJlI0T_asmbsv2-OSXUweH6nkN_vv8-rsrNEymxBV9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went with my boyfriend and the atmosphere was okay, not the best but whatever. The service is horrible, they don't come to the table if you don't call them. After waiting a while for some fries  and calamari THE fries  WERE SUPER COLD, as if they had been put in the fridge after frying them. The only thing we ordered was fries  and calamari , the calamari was not concacent at all. Needless to say, we will never go back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rod Boss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZ8bWvBqQdVdlR8CAIVrDmGyVwu1ywLx5ZZqCiiK1M7zCYkh_z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I haven't been The Horse and Ryder for quite some time. I had a very pleasant surprise. The staff was very nice and the deep fried pickles were quite good. It was a great way to relax after a busy day","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5RUN8BjV2E9rLpEJHjUnI_SIwzSMqkZaL-QRj&fid=0x0:0xb245bfb988363a45"],"When":"2023-12-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Geetika Mehra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMxrafr_duF65DABUAFCyQj9yGUSnjc-5QWFMMMrt-d3V3LkA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to a Subway today and saw two boys working there. Their service was excellent and they were very polite. I purchased four footlongs, and all of my sandwiches were prepared well. I have never received this kind of service from the girls working there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Evin Sabberton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3cTkx3o77AE9ReoLZj0gGCEFzRoDe-bxfNVaJNtMNQxbjDn6o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a footlong turkey breast with MORE lettuce, spinach, green peppers, and MORE onion. There's barely any lettuce on my sandwich at all. It's extremely skinny.
Never order on the app! Only go in person! I tipped the worker on the app too and he still gave me a pitiful amount of vegetables. Such a disappointment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAVg91_J9RJH8KQxEYo0QwUK7-Q-YenhUNTdim&fid=0x0:0x2dfc9161244eb15f"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Simson Simson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTEGQP7uk5hBSMMfThs8wIBvkkqI2n0IfUI8GPvNPC78PQLneJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Went to grab myself subway for dinner on my way home. Waited 10 minutes for two employees to finish off with one customer. Online orders came in and they put them in front of my order. Online orders should never come before a customer in the store. Always customers in person have priority over online orders. Management must be incompetent. I was not willing to wait for someone's online order to be done before they get to me! Worst customer service I've ever had at subway.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Scott Cadwell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcUPkor7of022PE7mZhl7C4YBstCsnyBss-4DvqhxV-s-fyL4ezQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was a good Subway to go to. Service was fast for a busy day.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Donna Da Costa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX75AtvcvEgDWejt_1w8N54rIVWfDwA44A1Bs0El608uzV4Cf_B6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Went there at 9:45am to get sandwiches for our lunch for our hike later. Three hours later went to eat our sandwiches and the bread was hard, definitely not fresh baked that day, had to be day old for sure. Three different people with three different types of bread and all of us had the same old bread. Have gone to other Subways for the same thing and they have always been great. First and last time I will go to this one","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Theresa Lyn Klyne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtUAkaf-Suie2R30G82TITPO_kamPnjsLyF3q3pLHumMbG0Ljx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I wanted to try a foot long chocolate chip cookie and a foot long churro, I was disappointed. The cookie was under done and the churro was chewy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIW4OtQcfRznpkA6fmLZHSlpfaLSQUpx9i6S0sK3DkkYcdSq4GD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Poor support by restaurant, ordered food through uber. Sandwich full with spianch and they replaced 12pack of cookies with their own choice without confirming with customer. Disappointed at all

On contacting restaurant at same time, they told we will call in 2mins after having words with manager. Never called back and stopped picking up calls","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Romen Pierce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-oyniPE2EnGHgntG28Ic293Xb_wv42D3un08zr92lAz6THQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food always good. Staff always friendly. What else could you ask for. One piece of advise fir store, don't be so stingy on the veges. I will continue to ask for more, not sure if this is at direction of their boss, but when I spend 9-10 dollars on sandwich, it should be loaded up.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dylan Hendricks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQA2q_i_cbvFJmt5oGxZ7BA4GKrRPCLdlqYIQQi_N7sjF5Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Italian and greek-centric joint with an expansive menu. A lot of the entrees are excellent value, and the drinks are fairly priced as well. Several of the items are fantastic, such as the calamari, greek salad and the pizzas are LOADED with ingredients and cheese. Not upscale but its got a nice diner vibe. Entirely worth an outing with the family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsM7fjUwkmuZoTqFMlUYwaF9-qvxCSu-bn48kr&fid=0x0:0x9894ced7893045ed"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Michelle Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2FVGSlFFnT4DTUmJ1_d9RmQclA7X9RJV9xRw03otVVcjs9uJP8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had a staff Christmas party there and had a separate room. The service was great for just one server who took care of us.  The food was pretty good, and the serving was average.  Some ordered the drink of the day (Sangria on Thursday night) and they seemed to be pleased.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOd5oz3dyZ1eYRgTcZ-QoK6fd5AZwb6nZG7x6VX&fid=0x0:0x9894ced7893045ed"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Wall E Bush","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsKYOEr-emRnRDMvQb4Fe50cosacwOYlXOeUFcUM1BL-i4pEI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty big portions and relatively well priced. Drink sizes were bigger than expected (and appreciated) + free refills! They were able to accommodate for our relatively big size of a group (some arriving sooner than others), and it was quite quiet in there since it was decently late in the night. The server that worked our table was funny, kind and patient (wish I had gotten their name). If I ever find myself round here again, I would definitely go back! Definitely a good spot for both big and small groups, with booth seating available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtVxcwfQgKwOkcu9l7Wu_Wuq6cW5u6OZG6dKDZ&fid=0x0:0x9894ced7893045ed"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Lindsay Paul","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhZYH_3Q8tutSI1GbvfYvNv2Bw9YMxwHxvOYUmD63NypD8sxH8uw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in tonight for the 1st time for my anniversary dinner. Was a lovely place great food wonderful choices lovely waitresses that were on top of it! The drink menu was insane! Andreas was recommended to me from a client of mine and did not disappoint. 10/10 my husband and I will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFYqDqOXuqoCmzS2ViGll74YCfIaBeFSra7Wwr&fid=0x0:0x9894ced7893045ed"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Samantha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYQIBfn48v5lobWBHfs3E15st0WWe4wywXSw2ioY2SRNWNxXVl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time coming here last night as it was the only place open late. Oh my gosh, we absolutely LOVED it!!! It’s like stepping back in time when restaurants actually had character and just felt different. Our food was seriously incredible, highly recommend the Chicken Parmesan, and spaghetti with baked cheese and mushrooms. Our drinks were also great, and very reasonably priced. Rhonda, our server was lovely and had a great personality. This place is an absolute gem, and we can’t wait to come back !!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kaylene Fast","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDZDBZRQdhjFH3fhNZo3QjD0x0xghgydMBpJ6qUmutUjrBQwc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I've been eating here for 20+ years and all I can say is they're lucky the food is decent. For the last 5 years at least, there is something wrong with our order every time. If you call to complain you're left on hold until you hang up. If you talk yourself into giving them another chance and decide to use an automated app like Door Dash, thinking that if you type up the order yourself they couldn't possibly screw it up, you would be disappointed yet again. Why have the option to serve something on the side if you're not going to bother to read that someone chose the option?!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbrLgGpfwzt62Dr8R-dtLZStxl6n__mWE9e0Dn&fid=0x0:0x9894ced7893045ed"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Mariechelle Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWs1f3BzYUpCZ4NolZAF3qz_fJTrE4JyxOp1hJl7A9aWCYo9O6O7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was fantastic and the best ceasar salad I had so far. The service is great too! It was Jen who assist us and she's so friendly and patient. It was our first time to eat here but she gave a brief about the menu with a friendly manner. She also made sure that we'd like the food we're getting. ❤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1jzklMhP21-8SdnOEtcYBQWcaVQ5ucmvwobhQ&fid=0x0:0x9894ced7893045ed"],"When":"2021-8-1"},{"Name":"Ron Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4C9fuu3Pgu102q3bAxHKivkiOQqwqKjJditkVdy4zIZ628gCE7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good sized portions, very extensive menu, priced fairly, food was average, pasta can have more taste and lamb was a bit dry.  The feta cheese they used on their Greek salads were one of the best ones I've had.

Lots of seats at the restaurant, fairly clean, waitress was very friendly and attentive.

Parking available in their lot and street parking as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8MfH42ZOc4Wb4X4cSibPFz3y4T5dX8frqk0-0&fid=0x0:0x9894ced7893045ed"],"When":"2022-12-5"}]

title: Donair Affair
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Halal food","enabled":true},{"name":"Healthy options","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":false}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rye Guy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIumg5DEsmhDkuZZXSGINBJhUsqtEAUFq68BysneU4qN4LgUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s a great place for a donair the last good spot in Langley!
Small little shop with a ton of flavour
I especially enjoy there lamb beef mix with there garlic sauce and hot sauce.
These people know how to make a good donair and have great customer serve or and are always happy to greet you…….unlike that Hut place on the one way….
Make sure to check them out.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zigman Freud","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeWzqyC41pFsPRa8vtwoT6E4QT1PSQfhjt6zoQfEKRv8hZmIlz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Not a good value for the money. I used to come here a lot with my friend. It was nice to see that they did renovations. And the last time I ate here the food was very tasty the staff was very friendly and you got a lot for your money. This time I went and a new person was working that I didn't recognize. She was very friendly. And polite and got the order correct. However the food quality wasn't good at all. The hummus was as runny as tap water. She put in the smallest amount of rice I've ever seen and barely any chicken on top. The salad wasn't even to the top of the indent in the container.  And to be honest the container looked much smaller than it used to look. Before the hummus was thick and you hot lots of it. They could barely close the lid you would get so much food. Now only a few bites and the food was gone and had to make more food a couple of hours later at home. Not a good deal for $15. When restaurants lower the quality and quantity of their food. They will lose business. They have lost mine now. I would let the owner know if they are reading this, it's better to serve a good portion at a good price then to be stingy and lose a customer. Remember when running a business it's easier to make one dollar from  one million customers that to try and make one million dollars from one customer. Do better please.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"TBouzari N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_baPpMukUoOzON-1Bc0WVviV8MaaWCa_-KjbtB-g1KBRs9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered from here recently on Uber Eats and the whole order was inedible. Generally some crispy chicken pieces are a given but this one was entirely bottom of the pan old tasting chicken pieces. Can barely see any white meat of the chicken, literally both pitas and the bowl were all filled with this. Incredibly disappointing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2Dzjv7Jd0k2v817kGx_uXdGUhy8ivo9vfcgzT&fid=0x0:0x5edf3ddb1f20003a"],"When":"2024-1-26"},{"Name":"Shawn Afsharkia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB3GiVNqw_1BKcftMPSHTLBH0rnEroj2aRcCD5-VrmKEwZGn_hAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We ordered from here thinking it's similar to the Donair affair in Port Coquitlam (which has always been amazing).

The worst donairs we've ever had, ever. It was soup in a pita bread. The soggiest wrap I've ever had. Half way in hoping it'll get better we decided to throw it in the compost bin. Maybe it was just an off day but at least grill the Donair so it's not like chicken noodle soup.

When the paper turns into rice paper before you even open it, you know you regretted it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjrK_3GirYHUkqC4UuCtzNmORxPEXt1_1hhill&fid=0x0:0x5edf3ddb1f20003a"],"When":"2023-9-4"},{"Name":"Ramin Tahouri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3PGFwXhFR5wrjRgqZ8C6g76cQqHMugwCusafBYZgKtQdvNkVR0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This spot I like for the ground donair beef which is my usual to if I'm craving some. My only critique is this place does over sauce your dishes so you do have too ask for it to be lighter.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1HEu-DxmVV_MGV-FTOUJe8KJY7vbI5Z-ech1I&fid=0x0:0x5edf3ddb1f20003a"],"When":"2023-10-29"},{"Name":"Matt R Knez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXRPHFeBmHGU_c2-yEkVkgN-tPWgOJzI3XZqlR1LezhHOGUDS0Tg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ĺunderstand that "donair" is originally a Turkish idea adopted by Muslim countries like Lebanon. Creativity is a bliss. Too many options to list, but here I go. I don't understand why a regular lamb donair is $9 bucks and the "lebanese" variation (nothing different except for a few parsley leafs and two table spoons of humus) is close to $13.
In any event I celebrate diversity and like I mentioned lines above, creativity. These guys have managed to reconcile eastern, arabic culture with  Mexican "cuisine"  and they offer hybrids (that probably work for the culturarely naked Canadian eye) such as "Mayan platters", that combine Mexican rice and guacamole with donair meats. :-)
I highly recommend this place in any event.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"supercoachobrien","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtSOmIM341ZJvmU-Zhuw68RMom7ftSs6OdjraTe9rk0Pdn71zo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff are always so friendly and take the time to know their customers! I order the fries with chicken  more often then I should and love it. Their chicken donair is also another tasty option you don’t wanna miss out on.  The store is clean, and the food is delicious! 10/10 recommend stopping in and trying their amazing food!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Julie Jaggernath","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrLZyhcOWBgM5pLOZv-IoGPQX3EU86WQLxTmBhWdLt5kwGzpR7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in on a whim for a donair to go. When I mentioned it was my first time in and what I wanted, the friendly staff showed me the ingredients and made me a delicious chicken donair. It was fresh, tasty, and very reasonably priced. I will definitely be back!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"F M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiAuxCOUxOthoh8wyw2iAy6CmojcgUKL0veulsM0a6veQ3OQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Toni is incredible!! Such an amazing server, patient and friendly going above and beyond  to listen to my mom talking forever, not to mention service was perfect. Food was great we got calamari, French onion soup, pork belly with spaetzle , scallop risotto, chicken & gnocchi, truffle mac and cheese, table side dessert and the new warm brownie with caramel sauce my mom loved.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8KHgGaK2yzzp7bD8h7WKNImba81gKKyTc3vCr&fid=0x0:0x92d04b3740178651"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Jeremy Hannaford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJh4gJaa4fTCJIngBRIGMrmmqMdx4ZxIh5c_eHCdtOqz7VOAFhyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I'll be a bit honest, never knew this was here 🤣 been to several of my mom's curling matches but never knew it was upstairs.
Very happy though, I found out about it. It's a lovely place for celebrating a birthday or an anniversary. I say that mainly because the prices are a bit high so just something to consider.
My wife took me here for my birthday and we enjoyed a few appetizers, some delicious food and a couple of very cool drinks, including their smoked whiskey!
Service was exceptional and speed was quick.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiT-FrpomhN9ZViNzQjti0P-Jm_OK8Oe4AS9fq&fid=0x0:0x92d04b3740178651"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"MyLinh Ly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCkM1DP_X2gjlPJbZEqs4DhRdpkL-9zKdk9_CNYdTLj9LYqrK6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently dined at The Lodge Steakhouse, and unfortunately, the experience was far from what I had hoped for. Despite the high expectations that come with visiting a steakhouse, the food was disappointing. We ordered four steaks, all of which were supposed to be medium-rare, but three of them came out close to well-done. This was a major letdown, especially considering the premium price we paid.

Additionally, the sides we ordered were cold by the time they reached our table, which only added to our dissatisfaction. To make matters worse, it took nearly an hour for our food to arrive, making the experience even more frustrating.

On a positive note, our server was kind and attentive, doing their best to make us comfortable despite the kitchen's shortcomings. However, the hostess left much to be desired, as she was neither welcoming nor friendly when we arrived.

To compensate for the poor experience, the restaurant offered us two free desserts. While the gesture was appreciated, it didn't feel like a fair resolution considering the overall disappointment with our meal.

Overall, The Lodge Steakhouse did not live up to its reputation. While the service from our waiter was good, the issues with the food and the overall dining experience make it difficult for me to recommend this restaurant. I hope they can address these problems moving forward, as there is clearly room for improvement.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMd5W-h-4CX6qjpgiFXTbq0xV1T2arT-cJwAFra&fid=0x0:0x92d04b3740178651"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"chris leonardo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyBJaTKH0diyzovXlT4V_xnfZc9WtSy2qLDzwlaQYHKi-QM81g0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We celebrated my birthday at The Lodge Steakhouse in Langley, and it was our first visit. You wouldn't have guessed there was a steakhouse at this location, but as soon as we entered, I was blown away by how modern and beautiful the restaurant was.

Our server, Stephanie, was incredibly knowledgeable, and all her recommendations were spot on. We had the New York strip loin with mushroom risotto and the brown butter sablefish. It was the best meal I’ve had in a long time. We finished with a delicious dessert that Stephanie highly recommended: a molten chocolate lava cake.

Special thanks to Stephanie for making our first time here so memorable. We will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzDYh_4VVotHpenhdh_ii5y3duLq4ouJe6AtgA&fid=0x0:0x92d04b3740178651"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Kayla K.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYQQgW0puw0KLKA0_Vv2fWoL5twgpGyqE_ggZ8sMjkeva49Qio=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went right at 4 when they opened for an early dinner while road tripping and it was a great experience! The food tasted delicious and portion sizes rather large. A huge parking lot Wewith plenty of stalls and the seating area is also very spacious. If you're looking for an upscale steakhouse, this place is definitely worth a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMELnGdATF3RFO2Ows60N33DWft2LGw_1PI2i6V&fid=0x0:0x92d04b3740178651"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Patrick R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJWPbHwpFNDZ3pEWPQrLcMM0GxtLocS02anv0WkmHpRtCRLA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Four of us tried The Lodge for the first time this evening. It was my friend Dan’s birthday and we wanted steak!!!

The location and parking are really awesome and made getting there a breeze.

The atmosphere is as expected given the location. The patio was open however we dined inside. Our server was prompt, well mannered and, in my opinion , took pride in ensuring our needs were met.

We all order different steaks. Albeit pricey they all arrived as advertised. My steak ( a porterhouse) was quite undercooked however it was still epically delicious and therefore I simply ate it. The others in my group were very satisfied with the quality of their meals.

Again, expensive but I’ll be back !!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2Le7LTZRAdaRyuZu7wDZDri5Gh_Mp5ZaBiT0-&fid=0x0:0x92d04b3740178651"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Hogan S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2J3zZ66zZx7iQ4BTL4LzKwIf1IEEEibAnGfkvCeqVvgQxFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Came to this restaurant expecting a fine dining experience. Considering the prices we were extremely underwhelmed.
I ordered the ribeye. It was under half an inch thick and had the flavour of a top sirloin reheated in a microwave. Vegetables were undercooked and also resembled something out of a frozen veggie bag. My girlfriend ordered the short rib. Short rib was tough and not tender so she barely ate it. Presentation is important when dining at a nice restaurant and these meals had 3/10 presentation. We brought our concerns up with our waitress and we were satisfied with them waiving the short rib from our bill. Maybe it was an off night with the kitchen, but we won’t be hurrying back any time soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxRKDFexaEAcNk_nqoU45eGacWOq7ZHmmk7xi6&fid=0x0:0x92d04b3740178651"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Essy Martineau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKaQl8HcI4YS2q_rB1MhWxpVWuYk6NnobD_JjLdB3Rc1gFvBA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We decided to come here after some recommendations by friends for my birthday dinner, and we were not disappointed! Food was absolutely amazing! My partner ordered the strip loin and said it was one of the best steaks he’s ever had! I ordered the filet, it was cooked to perfection, but lacked a bit of seasoning for my taste. We ordered some sides as well. Truffle Mac and cheese ( which was my absolute favourite thing there), table side seared scallops, and mushroom risotto. All tasted amazing. The customer service was very attentive and accommodating. We will definitely add this to our list of regular spots to visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHnyzJJCrB9Ec3_bpSLyske8AgVneY5PWAQ702&fid=0x0:0x92d04b3740178651"],"When":"2024-4-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Faith Oh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRU1l7lR0St2FKA3sFQRqByUMO0kTpIy7V5hHpzuF2subJjzXD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Now this is a hidden gem sushi place in Langley!! Warm and welcoming restaurant ambiance, a ton of menu options, food came out fast. Offered for water or tea right away, servers were very attentive! The portions are great and everything we ordered was delicious! For the toro lovers, order the toro roll in the photo! (Not sure what the exact name of the roll was..)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaVwJVUmgkt7hOJRcHv6XhQNdh8p0E9NC-y08R&fid=0x0:0x89e9993604d7e5a7"],"When":"2024-4-3"},{"Name":"Adam Calvert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-FZZqnG8lrjQecNn4l2WZTV_kkgGNLe83y-C7JA9Yb68OUeQr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Some of the best Sushi in the Lower Mainland. We took our daughter and son in-law and they felt the same way. The Miso Soup was delicious. The rice was well formed and of good taste. The fish was of excellent quality. The quantity of filling in rolls was the right proportion and every roll had a really good taste. The Chicken Karaage was delicious. The Tempura was perfectly done. This find in the Brookswood area of the Township of Langley was a surprise. I would travel an hour to get this Sushi as it is worth the trip.
Lastly the service was excellent and matched the food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcTsmnaHmgXUMotLE6Azx4BKV5gD-skZnISuFe&fid=0x0:0x89e9993604d7e5a7"],"When":"2023-5-23"},{"Name":"Joy Lusk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgQjVYinemBQx_hNyX2rRp0OkHQVWRZhpTuhX2B1khczb0coJf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were visiting from Calgary today, and found this absolute gem of a sushi place. Hands down the best sushi we have ever eaten - and that includes our trip to Tokyo last spring. Absolutely delicious and flavorful, the quality and size of the sushi for the money is second to none. We ordered Joy's roll, the Last Train to London roll, the Spider roll, and the Deep Fried California roll and recommend them all! You've gotta go!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtcU1OCNVEPix3SaseJKLDbtLg4fFs_pjoaENx&fid=0x0:0x89e9993604d7e5a7"],"When":"2024-1-9"},{"Name":"Mariechelle Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWs1f3BzYUpCZ4NolZAF3qz_fJTrE4JyxOp1hJl7A9aWCYo9O6O7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Omg! This is the best sushi place I'd been to. The price is cheap but the quality is excellent! The serving is a lot and it's super tasty! Ugh. Will definitely go back again.

A must try:
Bento box B
Last train to london
Shadow of the night
California roll.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZjFayq3cNZo77ZPkjdX22PYLdA9SMzmD3MoUf&fid=0x0:0x89e9993604d7e5a7"],"When":"2022-8-24"},{"Name":"Jessica Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWg2ucuUtgiKfQ_kCPF5ArfTTG3WvJAhteULlGRwFYYZGrt_fUexw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good quality, fresh seafood, good portions, but more expensive than similar restaurants. I ordered the House Box, which comes with miso, sunomono, 2pc gyoza (deep fried), assorted tempura (1 prawn, 4 vegetable), 3 nigiri (ebi, salmon, tuna), 4 salmon sashimi, 4 tuna sashimi, and spider roll (basically California roll with deep fried soft shell crab in it). It's more expensive than most standard bentos but it also has better quality components (it's not often you find softshell crab in a bento), and there is definitely enough food for two, so if you're sharing with someone, the price is reasonable. The restaurant is clean and service is decent but nothing outstanding. Overall, if you're willing to pay more for the quality or if you're looking to share, this is a good place to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGSsag0lP62hqDT_RRBdDO0rD0n4aMjTvl93bT&fid=0x0:0x89e9993604d7e5a7"],"When":"2022-7-8"},{"Name":"michael chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3WoE9tU2yqYd_Vmjg2Vjvm6k2to0sq6Liz_mwps9YR3T5WZFx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Overall not bad, taste are okay, ingredients are fresh. preparation are interesting, however these oversize sushi are hard to eat, almost like eating charishi don instead of sushi roll. Prize is average.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7SX_9127QJYLUb1zC5F_y1rRE2oGjUFjv2p3-&fid=0x0:0x89e9993604d7e5a7"],"When":"2017-2-21"},{"Name":"Lizzie Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvHtF087-23PEbxdEgQVhuEgqpoDz_SnRNL9CWDluCGyZvkS6X7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious sushi, generous portions, fantastic prices, and stellar service.  Every. Single. Time.  We eat here a lot as a family and our only problem with the place is that as enticing as the enormous variety of special rolls on the menu are, we have favorites already!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkdOHFlU9V3oFtj95lO4GSXKQVXPMiWYvX9S0a&fid=0x0:0x89e9993604d7e5a7"],"When":"2018-8-14"},{"Name":"Edward Trejo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjdzW6yy9i0xKBBIg7EbVN-R5-rQdPALLfFwFdWRqfj2D-drF8MQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing fresh sushi...  The Ika was so good I ordered extra. Came in during dinner rush and it was chaotic. However the food speaks for itself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRY0fqdr9TWc9-vDwryjy07437BxUU6qmiHCRt&fid=0x0:0x89e9993604d7e5a7"],"When":"2023-3-18"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Blessed Love Jamantoc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiJkDfqK1tLHwmtym7NT7sodUjHvZSVRt9FJ_NqcdWkISaxfG4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had hawaiian,  pepperoni and cheese for my partner tonight and the taste is superb! Unlike other pizza places, this doesn’t taste like cardboard and were made with quite generous toppings. Wish it’s a little bit more thick for my partner’s liking of the pepperoni and cheese.\nAnyway, the driver delivered the pizza still hot from the thermal bag.. well done and thank you for your service. We appreciate it. Continue to be an amazing one!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsFwpHYy80v4M0cRziPk7CD3bvjiD25kvhJS5h\u0026fid=0x0:0x9a60bd327be43e3c"],"When":"2024-1-31"},{"Name":"LMN1984","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxMxiAU3AguWNG6DPpBttKblgfvWBf3VfnBnkCjEEJ1qP3fek=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Arrived to pick up pizza order, gentleman was placing a large stack of cooking trays back on the shelf. One fell to the ground, and the girl beside him picked it up off the ground and put it in the stack ready to use while there were 2 customers in the lobby. Although the germs will likely cook off in the oven, just knowing that this was put in the back out of service is enough for me to not return.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicole Fidler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2F3Q7TXKybPw3ig2GfIg6xsVnnT4qZOIpf20gZ-lzjZtr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered on a Friday night at 5:40 - knowing a Friday could be busy. EST time 30-40 mins. At 50 mins called and they could not tell me where my order was but it would be an hour. Refresh tracker and now 51-61 mins. At 1hr and 10 mins called again and manager could not tell me where my order was because they were too busy - I insisted on an answer - order had NOT even been started yet.  Brutal service - order cancelled.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brian Graham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKb8FntzzbFuKmzwRXS74K9luJmDBHdZNV0r3vCZy3eItaENQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"used a coupon got a large feast 3 topping pepperoni pizza delivered within a half hour at 6:00  p.m. Saturday.  $22.00 total including delivery and $4.50 tip.  Hot and Tasty!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kelsey H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2OTJoeLAqWPYYEQmNF642g-W6gg6cD5d04yBzRLOBpnQQMyT0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best Dominos Pizza I’ve ever had was just delivered hot and fresh tonight. Toppings were generous, pizza was fresh, delivery was fast and friendly. On top of that with their great coupons online, it was affordable. Thanks Dominos Brookswood!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kathleen edwards","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1CLhShWV7UJNMEtjbTRSE31vGGYLIfBGpq3QC6-6WkFqaV6w8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The PAN Pizza is delicious!! They followed instructions and did not skimp on toppings. I paid for extra cheese \u0026 they did NOT disappoint.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kathy Belisle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJq_7YX89WS6325JKHkbRMdoZGteNh5Ba3lWQZOIH45eOkPkw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"After our last experience we will never be ordering again,  both pizzas looked like they were dropped and the delivery guy just stood at our door and never knocked he finally called asked if knocked said no! Called and was told pizza looked like that cause was thin crust seriously give me a break\nDO NOT ORDER FROM HERE!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Abhinav Chawla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-oVg_tyqd4DVhrlpVHOYlid7woQtwMxV2nYvYa86oLaReXjB1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best place to have the pizza. Rahul's outstanding service consistently brings us back to Domino's – his commitment to excellence significantly enhances our overall dining experience. Thanks Domino’s for having employees like him ❤️❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOv5J63mNNqMPeb_Ac7TWA0ukrDlgKK77bq0USx\u0026fid=0x0:0x9a60bd327be43e3c"],"When":"2023-12-3"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"lee aaron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLjzGLcrHL7m1n1HX7Uli0zFu27FjzEpHa3eVtrmKyAX7goFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Servers are kind and polite, sushi and sashimi are fresh. Kitchen food is also mouthwatering. I love their yakitori. I can see that the owners and staff really put their dedication towards providing a wonderful meal for customers. The best sushi place for me!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhuOrQCjIMqvkuSKswSbeRbg4mGjpypylokgGc\u0026fid=0x0:0x73c437710ff6288b"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Ross Manson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEpVSqeqsTvRNtUJOrSLjIA9rzMulA6RrCY8I-EdxSNnHKVrVT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This sushi restaurant is the nearest one to me and also happens to be one of my favourite locations in Langley. I have had a couple other experiences at Langley sushi locations and they were okay, but I find Nikko to be quite consistent and the quality it very good. I ordered take out last night and in about the same amount of time it took for a couple of subs to be built, my order was ready to go. It was about an hour before they closed, so they weren’t slammed but I have order other times and have always received food promptly. I ordered the tempura prawns, with a Philadelphia roll, negitoro roll and a half order of sockeye salmon and it hit the spot! It wasn’t super cheap, $50 for everything with a %10 tip, but this is pretty standard for the items I ordered. I had a bit of the rolls leftover and ate them the next day and they were still tasty with just a bit more solid rice which is to be expected. All in all, Nikko is my favourite Langley sushi and I will definitely be going back, I think I would like to sit there too one time as they have nice tatami rooms for groups as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOPa9zY_2DRUwMj8x8VBndZ9lF5zZPXsHsYLDA\u0026fid=0x0:0x73c437710ff6288b"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Alan S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwlLj2pU2BXB7biHx7bVTYile6F_dgxVoDArKZXJO1KUdvVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Specialty rolls add great options for sushi lovers. Fresh seafood prepared by skilled chefs. Intimate booths and great team. A regular stop for us in Murrayville.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNloxAGW59pVvUaHg4tLxQUoSWQU5XB3P_v784Y\u0026fid=0x0:0x73c437710ff6288b"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"R LePage","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRvzUl4oWOBUlpbKENjEhRdvobpAklcnimxQRYSOu0GoQ0VA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Server was very attentive, even made some smart suggestions. Food was great. When we left they gave us a nice water bottle as a Christmas gift. Such a nice touch!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rob Sebastion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjakSj6i9_7dOk20y3wCpxp4vXE8xXOrxZQc5WQ3-s5BmvTvRT-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nikko Sushi has been a staple in Murrayville for many years now. I have been coming here for 23 years and plan on continuing for the next 20. The staff and owners treat you like friends and family. So welcoming and appreciative to all guests. This is my go-to sushi place. Keep up the great service and consistent food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karolina Futerski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZ1v705mhPac89FUINkkyn9yIqRv89-8tmFy9ResIfQpKj6Rw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is cute. Nice private seatings. The food was really good and affordable. We got some rolls, udon tempura and dessert. We were welcomed as soon as we stepped in by the chefs.The servers were very nice. They didn’t check up on us to see how the food was, but that’s ok because I used to work at a sushi place and I wasn’t trained that. They were still attentive when we called them over:) I recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZmeGCLd-UzLD49S3pMF_CJchotATa9IaHnW9p\u0026fid=0x0:0x73c437710ff6288b"],"When":"2024-3-20"},{"Name":"Madison MacKinnon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbCx1SaXrFi0r9BpDQzomuIaPNDInpmI6KbRy_ernqKkyZ4cIUHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time placing a pick up order from them was for 13 people and they did such an amazing job. The food was delicious and they did such a good job ensuring that nothing was forgotten and that everyone's meals was correct. The atmosphere inside is fantastic as well and I love that you can have a more private booth as an option. Couldn't recommend them enough","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"emily linde","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIiJZBYZ8YgYWeCQKbu-3eVe8jXdWsQqS4VEFeDMiZye8aIGA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food and even more amazing staff! This restaurant is one of a kind and loved by many! I Highly recommend Nikko Sushi!","Images":null,"When":""}]

The staff was very polite, and the clean environment made the experience a lot more enjoyable, highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joshua Masilya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtGNZVGF7oDzEt5s0_0fmx7vzL24RAJ_5X2fXPWxRhZb1QdwwY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was great and had a good time there as well, service top notch. All together amazing experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Swarnjit Grewal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPbWECEt6apeDA_o5EOyKN9U_9b5ymMBuJyUiR8vZIACW7cg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Quiznos Location. Very clean, friendly staff and excellent service!! Ordered Classic Italian, great tasty Sandwich!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ramandeep Hayer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDXxUpvzwTQdGDmzNq80HUWoLLuCEGxMihL4etJ2IbLco-heQx7A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff is great, very friendly.Very accommodating. Extremely nice I recommended highly","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"aman gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIN9uDmM19-62fM_biAS_qqOw6vhwuhpQfJKtR49ej7gnKiiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent Service!!! Very nice staff and well made food…..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Truffula Tree Bee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOxj1rHgVaBppKuLX-7hCb0WqDZPrWSSgH_DPwLVVqRV8cTPg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Store was clean staff was friendly and this is the most obscene amount of mayo I have ever seen on a sandwhich. I could have made 3 more sandwhiches with this mayo. Totally gross.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLtaBnhnmj93bEeALbcDOmg-gXHlB_Ds0jZ2c0\u0026fid=0x0:0x9c1d6f3f001668de"],"When":"2024-4-22"},{"Name":"Dave","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKmFP4EfECAwa62KvjAlz3vB6KXvYvzyfLw5OQ5MLftSrOpbg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is the worst and most dishonest Quiznos location around. I came here on Sunday June 16th at 6:20PM and ordered 2 sandwiches with the wife. While the two women were making our sandwiches I said we are going to eat them there, the woman said I am sorry we are closed soon. The door had a sign that says closed at 7PM, REALLY...CLOSED SOON!!!!!. I am pretty sure 15 mins to eat is all that it would of taken, but let's not stop here this is not the only problem for this location. The next part was when we got home and opened our sandwiches and realized they never even put them in the toaster. GOING TO QUIZNOS AND THEY DON'T EVEN TOAST YOUR SUB ARE YOU KIDDING ME!!! THIS IS WHY THEY DIDN'T WANT US TO EAT THERE WAS BECAUSE THEY TURNED THE TOASTER OFF EARLY TO LEAVE, GREAT EMPLOYEES YOU HAVE AT THIS LOCATION. IF YOU CHECK THE PICTURES YOU CAN SEE THE CHEESE NOT MELTED AND THE SANDWICH NOT TOASTED AS PROOF. DO NOT GO TO THIS LOCATION!!! GO TO SUBWAY AT LEAST YOU KNOW YOUR GETTING A NON TOASTED SUB THERE!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOgs_7f_pbzETDbllsSPcz74mGK5SaYvEs8WJ7\u0026fid=0x0:0x9c1d6f3f001668de"],"When":"2019-6-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtS-zKRr3tNdHER3Yfc_MVEdupAvLyOTlNqhvHp0LGpPQLrBs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So so so good. Everything they make is amazing. It literally takes you to streets of Delhi. This is the one and only place in lower mainland that literally serves authentic Indian taste👌🏼
Customer service is great too!
HIGHLY HIGHLY RECOMMEND","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGeQOmDDxmPM6lzlK4Upz2NxdodS9RDOGy8Nfa&fid=0x0:0x6d275031322916b3"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"angela Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVm15du404Pyq1LGGpi0PLlorhv3XaV5vDh7MqI8ssK2xr8bGXG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Although it may not look like your typical standard restaurant, trust me the food, service and chefs are above and beyond excellent. It was absolutely delicious eating here and honestly the food was the best I ever had. And so affordable. It’s as authentic as you can get. The only time I’ve seen this kind of cooking is when I eat at my Indian friends house for a celebration. We got the butter chicken bowls btw. And proportions are large.  We’ve decided to comeback every time we’re in Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjPqiiG5v6UDl44wzm74ufFfBhW5masnycG5aN&fid=0x0:0x6d275031322916b3"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Nikita Purohit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXB6Km0AeEXD7qcdDIGd6av-n5-Fm7Mes7Wgfrgb1WwefHHDrGI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a hidden gem… They serve food directly in your Car with a sweet smile… 😊
Their Paneer Makhni Pasta, Kathi rolls are to die for… We ended up ordering so much that we couldn’t even finish some of the dishes…
Totally worth trying. We’ll definitely be back soon…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBxYp53oeFZZQDeXm3XO-g69HCDIJfrIjiBYaU&fid=0x0:0x6d275031322916b3"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"SANDEEP KOUL","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwGE8qmu0mLcdxhIV2r6ravPkLMC83r017hWV3t1iuDixWmcAr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Here's the revised review:

---

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

After five years of searching for authentic street food in lower mainland Vancouver , I finally found a gem in Langley—Hunger Strike. This place is an absolute delight for anyone craving genuine flavors. The momos are perfectly crafted, bursting with flavor in every bite. The mutton keema pav is an absolute must-try—rich, hearty, and incredibly satisfying. And the rumali roti? Soft, delicate, and the perfect accompaniment to their flavorful dishes. Hunger Strike has nailed the essence of street food, and I can't recommend it enough. If you're in Langley and appreciate authentic street cuisine, this is the place to be!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMrrRMVWDDD1LC01hGREHD6fIM0JFYqaaZVFxg&fid=0x0:0x6d275031322916b3"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Anshika Arora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsZu9FW0QNtTqrTz7V8iGP1eC2GVtBcs4jnlsWdzcsEA6c8g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hunger Strike is a hidden gem for anyone craving authentic Delhi-style momos and Kathi rolls.What sets this place apart is its late-night hours, making it the go-to spot for a satisfying snack after a long day. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX13nXCrZydycOhvmEs-4P5yeDz3dadivCj7mg&fid=0x0:0x6d275031322916b3"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"soumya rastogi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoOSf5EEwUectWj3FTSaat7hv9FbQGSvRLEa5sv_VJj63pc71U_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Harmeet and his cloud kitchen, Hunger Strike, really nailed the authentic Delhi flavors for my Diwali get-together! It’s great to hear that his recommendations on quality and quantity were spot on. That kind of trust in a vendor is so valuable, especially when they can bring out flavors that impress both you and your guests. Having a go-to for all your future parties must be such a relief, especially with that perfect taste of Delhi cuisine….","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ravijot Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfWheaeQwlj_3V62qLZyLdDTeGbVbFmDU4rLVvxFr3EGkQb4Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always in search for street food from home, away from home, our search has ended here. We tried three dishes, and bang!
1. Aaloo Chaat: The famous aaloo Chaat from the streets of Delhi has been recreated here, and your craving can be fulfilled! Did not expect crunch to be found in all those chutneys, and it was there!!
2. Dahi Ke Sholey: I loved this one! Cooked to perfection, the crispy outside and the yummy gooey inside, packed with flavour with that awesome chutney will be had again and again!
3. Veg steamed momos: If you eat spicy, these are for you. Freshly steamed, unlike many places which sell momos which have that rubbery skin, these were delicate!

It was a delight to have visited here. Everything was freshly prepared, nothing frozen was used (as ensured by the owner). They do not have a done in place you'd fancy, but if you are a sucker for sitting in your cars and eating (like back home) or sitting on some benches and dining (like we did), then this is the place. Or order at home 🤩","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCZiSZt--rqjdBIPTHEzRdgOnVH6Ij-wx_GtNS&fid=0x0:0x6d275031322916b3"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Kanishka Rawat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIx_UtbuaDgE7oklMd_2hYfV2PDhl3OAv0m8nToXWpegdbH8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem in langley for evening and late night grub. Best place for mouth watering momo, Kathi rolls and mutton keema. Moreover, the owner Jasman such a gentleman and humble guy.
Thank you so much for the great food😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxr7V5nnyOLU0UmlMx0PpBIurqqSFzxvlKA1F_&fid=0x0:0x6d275031322916b3"],"When":"2024-8-15"}]

title: Annora Restaurant
descriptions: Quaint venue presenting reimagined seafood & meat dishes made with locally sourced ingredients.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Taz C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ235c-1POJF85QGI4N_CFSzUmrADwRBXdKObCvBIDceTrCYTc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Annora stands out as a hidden gem offering exquisite West Coast cuisine that rivals the best dining spots the lower mainland. Our family enjoyed the carefully curated and beautifully plated prix fix menu. We also enjoyed the intimate and relaxed dining experience. Can't wait to go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM27zuN_K2s_aW8ewulsbxlnfyy7wInXhB9zqvZ&fid=0x0:0x3ab541833210601f"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Chellé Tanner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQP4cCqyk_9yznRs5HPL9oWBdIaZ4RNI0pbWoz_lnKQw5kIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Best Meal and restaurant experience we’ve had in years! 5 Star quality food, service and Ambiance! It was our 32nd wedding anniversary and we were lovely  greeted by a hostess and seated to our reserved table with a mention of our anniversary and congratulations. Our server, Courtney, was beautiful, well spoken, kind and attentive. We went with the three course meal menu, which is an incredible value for what you get! Appetizers of scallops and truffle mushroom & goat cheese salad, with some bread, and to Die for caramelized butter! We both had the duck entree, which was amazing! The chef, Aaron, came out to greet us and congratulate us before our incredible dessert of lemon cheesecake and chocolate mousse that  came along with complementary port as an anniversary gift. We will be back many times, and cannot highly recommend this restaurant enough! Well done, Mr. Turkstra and staff!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmRpTBPwIv74VFWI2SnX4wHxwQv480VjkQWGME&fid=0x0:0x3ab541833210601f"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Ev Haus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhBn_RoFi4gHAZ_o2bWuZm9y05aVGbq1IyLL8dOPo4G5Bx98P4YQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really enjoyed our dinner here tonight. Tried a large variety of dishes and pretty much everything was very tasty and felt fresh & healthy. I think the perogies were my favorite. The portions are quite small but the prices weren't exorbitant, so don't hesitate to order a bunch of different things to try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4EYWuVDLFv1y_ks-TUdq-lHn2C3dwG01NtFec&fid=0x0:0x3ab541833210601f"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Jon Szekeres","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4TjzWM4-rYwKMzaJaRpelqECVckpWbT7on0MOTg3jdI05vv2ZYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite meal I've ever had in Canada. Small, cozy ambiance, great food, friendly, knowledgeable staff and fair prices. An absolute gem","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv-tcS9_c-xpMpRsigIfZLiuGJov8zjGOGBJrk&fid=0x0:0x3ab541833210601f"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Afsana Tabibi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzp6b-InW6PAK15vNh9v8ga8zbWmNjzR0Dlq305Lj5B3Ej-HpL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Upon walking into this restaurant there was a (not-so-nice) distinct smell, but I figured why not give it a chance. We ordered the caesar salad, short rib pierogies, curry chicken skewer, and truffle gnocchi to start. Every single one of our starters were delicious. For our mains we ordered the chicken, and beef short ribs. We both loved our main dishes. We felt like we had to order dessert because everything else tasted amazing lol. So then we ordered their special of the day dessert - Apple crisp cake with caramelized apples and crumble on top. I'll be honest, the cake itself was a bit stale but the caramelized apples and crumble made the dish. Overall, this restaurant is really great.

On a side note: I'd definitely recommend vacuuming their floors, dusting their furniture and signs at the front table, cleaning their tables (my table cloth had stains on it), and maybe updating their decor. For such great food, the restaurant itself looks like there is a lack of effort and care in its maintenance and overall appearance; which is extremely unfortunate.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYKR-c6y0EnyBySqJQ6X6oGPrC57Z3Fb6izBgd&fid=0x0:0x3ab541833210601f"],"When":"2023-9-10"},{"Name":"S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL02WHycytQrkTMwZQzbxJBywqloogUMKnqGbZYn4rSGcaaqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was there a few weeks back and there was a new waitress and she was rude, condescending and spoke to us like we were children. The food prices have gone up but the portion sizes have gone down. Our first two appies were burnt - no concession was offered. When I tried to call to give feedback I was hung up on. Seriously horrible customer service, really gone down hill from the last time we went. With the cost of food going up, we're now going to find a place with affordable food and better service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hannah Nieman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhvQPcw1kZonY_9i6oT4Jc_XJLOy1VnlBSDMm-5oUai4gM7KUd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great restaurant with delicious food. I've never had gnudi before and throughly enjoyed it as an appetizer.  The stuff chicken breast was cooked perfectly and the flavours of the dish were well balanced. The braised beef was also amazing and tender. Our dessert was lively and the perfect size as well. All in all good restaurant with friendly staff. Would recommend checking out especially if your looking for something a little more fancy in Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkbb1ObxZwSNvaKoyxx46UuLwkJH6yx7yjv6a-&fid=0x0:0x3ab541833210601f"],"When":"2021-9-17"},{"Name":"P. W.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmlT7gcdEhVjzJPL5HX6Ah7jfzOEVc2hRSJ-651XvvYpUPPG0h-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Coming from North Vancouver, I had heard to stop by Annora if ever in the neighbourhood. Turns out it was even better than expected - and Aaron the owner brought is in with a smile, even though they had closed after lunch.

The food is impeccable, fresh, and delicious. The service - outstanding!!

Definitely will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHDdAfBjQlmAdlOHSnWJLFEjG99WsCoT_QwG2c&fid=0x0:0x3ab541833210601f"],"When":"2023-9-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Justin Forbes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLPBkoM_t1crblCZM8Cyhes_KDBNfCItSDNgqusvRJnCpXNg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I heard about Donair hut from a friend. I went there for lunch and I ordered a lamb wrap. It was prepared very efficient and the service was very polite and kind. The the food was amazing. It was so good I went back the next day for another.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOG4qV-w364MRZc7c4I6Jkc_qBan5OcygB6Oo5B&fid=0x0:0x96b93646b5bf9e0"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Tony McGarry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZ-xUbjUWNq_4KAWrIEJ6sjhVDwqK8rNocFIoSkNYebs3FpYU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A chicken rice platter and a big lamb regular Donair. It was good food, but the hummus was on the salty side.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeLtP6ESwE9aBv9Wrz-JWcIIlbLaY2e7FE4Z8E&fid=0x0:0x96b93646b5bf9e0"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Justin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0XUoP2j69ve7eTSxok0YbV4-J15ptLc1ioxlVM2hLC85NRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great donair spot, first time here while walking through downtown langley. This will be my new donair spot.  Kid loved it too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMV0Q-jMwJvR5yx0bM3MsVFIuga769Swkn44cFY&fid=0x0:0x96b93646b5bf9e0"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Rye Guy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIumg5DEsmhDkuZZXSGINBJhUsqtEAUFq68BysneU4qN4LgUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Lazy people sitting in the back when a customer walks in they seem annoyed with the fact they are getting business!
Ask for a little hot sauce and it looked like it was dipped in red paint the put so much on.
The hot sauce taste like generic crap
Definitely not worth the $20 for a donair that rips ulcers in your stomach.
This place used to be the best spot sad to see it gone so far down hill.
Learn to care about your customer service and respect people’s request while making the food and you won’t be so bored your falling asleep at your business.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karan B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL36l_bvxw-BMTrnkWqGVutZvWpCuMU5GtqXAQXtkQ4l4Acqjk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went there after reading lot of reviews about how good the taste is. At entry water drips from AC right on your head. I ordered chicken rice platter. Quantity was very good. While everything else tasted good the taste of hot red sauce on top of the platter ruined the taste of entire food to a point that I had to trash half of it. Hot red sauce was not even hot, it was like a cheap store bought tomato sauce. Definitely wasn't freshly made that is what the expectation is when you buy food from outside. Everything else in the platter was good. Service was quick. Prices are pretty reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwMJauFbm1lEewdDIizewByRQNhZKwIu8R2O65&fid=0x0:0x96b93646b5bf9e0"],"When":"2022-9-1"},{"Name":"Jen N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIB3GVXqH4s1Ii8BceXwVYeZcJlutUxLdc58c45HuDWmJzj_50=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got two donairs and dessert here tonight - our first time trying them. Slightly more expensive than the place we frequent, but omg WORTH IT! Quality and portions are at least twice as good! This will be our new donair spot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Uzair Haroon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcZiCPIe_j4m8EYrPoIWrilLczaav4hGJbTmfNLILptUfyTkwc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped by after our workout for takeout. The gents at the counter were very friendly and courteous. I ordered the lamb salad platter and wife got the lamb donair. The quantity of food and the flavours were amazing and delicious. The platter was large and had lots of meat on it. The donair was big and tasted delicious. We will be going back again !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7J6oTSatuMPTN7u9UXlghGaWU7hMa_9FowE1q&fid=0x0:0x96b93646b5bf9e0"],"When":"2022-8-29"},{"Name":"Mike S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIdxloX2N4NAXB_1gevmWVD8jL7e2WL4frg7dVACANfAn9gg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"By far the best donair I have had anywhere in the lower mainland. The regular size is bigger than any "super" donair I have had anywhere else, but does not sacrifice quality for quantity. Lamb Halifax donair is my favorite! Halifax sauce is perfect!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Woorinara Korean Restaurant
descriptions: Family-run restaurant with a warm vibe dishing up hearty portions of bibimbap, hot pots & bulgogi.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amy Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvtm7hBqZHDYxXgP_oxkelx2FGhwfW-EuwTv9rdyjxo-_-_8Nq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good food and service.

The dishes were pretty standard, with some standouts and some that could be improved on. The seafood pancake was a let-down: a lot of batter but with not much taste, even with the dip. The bibim naeng myun was super refreshing, great balance of flavours and the noodles were perfectly chewy. We got a small gam ja tang jeon gol and it came with a lot of meat, super yummy. Bi bim bap, chicken and bulgogi were average. Seaweed soup and rice were great! There were many side dishes and it was pretty standard. I’m picky about the potato side dish and this one was below average.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOF-cUHuZt2eNzl6rcOW_aKGvBcLaxve5As_10Q&fid=0x0:0xf66493fc4ceb78b7"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Pilo News","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFId9ZdkkvXmcYiLmTK0bEP9YVRba_LZHmLxWEpHSLdGMlepoT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Woorinara is a delightful culinary gem, offering an authentic taste of Korean cuisine. The atmosphere is warm and inviting, perfect for both casual dinners and special occasions. Dishes like the bibimbap and bulgogi are flavorful and beautifully presented, showcasing fresh ingredients. The staff is friendly and attentive, enhancing the dining experience. Prices are reasonable for the quality offered. Overall, Woorinara is a must-visit for anyone craving delicious Korean food in a cozy setting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwQEuug2NkBzHsGJXCf10p3-WMzRUR7E5lacyM&fid=0x0:0xf66493fc4ceb78b7"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Jason “tsoiboieats”","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIWaEolTsQNS6_6nXtQ6x5fK1zvKAOLiIJ0oRsu25a3O_nSBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was good tasting! Service was quick and easy.  The shop is nice and clean.

Cha-dol Doenjang Jjigae - assorted bean soup stew  got some beef, clams, tofu, veggie
Buglgogi - staandard stuff maeinated beef
Bo Ssam- steam pork belly","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuKcbbOSw8nXZaxoo2QCp2U8kUbqWhE0fUN4U_&fid=0x0:0xf66493fc4ceb78b7"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Brett Karg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO0aMTCPD4ROW6Sna2Of0gRAu2fnOfk6eU8K7K3X6WO3XovCE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We did a walk in order here (takeout), the staff quickly greeted us and handed us the menu, about 7 minutes after placing our order it was ready! Upon opening the order, we found a very sweet note saying “thank you” with a little heart next to it. This simple little deed made us so happy and honestly boosted our moods so much, the staff are very sweet and the food was delicious. If you haven’t gone here yet, get your a$$ up and go get some sushi from Woorinara :) !!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9h31lShVs5hu9ND5afGIMh2F24DuzhIiLkN-6&fid=0x0:0xf66493fc4ceb78b7"],"When":"2024-3-23"},{"Name":"M E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJV42WOHiPv_nzFMOrmSgnA9fyB3Vddp6glkHUZ9acj8oPmw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Me and the wife just went there. We really enjoyed ourselves. The quality, portion and price was amazing. It is very nice to have all those side dishes and tea when you order something. We are both extremely full at the moment and probably are more than we intended to.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carlos Pan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWux4U6rOLToeeC3gIE8Jf9_HYneBTroavlw5rmZaFqxZye6HW-Mg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the opportunity to visit this little establishment around langley downtown area. So glad to see more Korean food alternative on this side of the town.
Bossam - originally I was worried that it might be tasteless and dry based on the look. But it’s actually flavourful and soft. Wrap with cabbage and spicy radish salad. So meaty yet refreshing. U can ask for bean sauce on the side to add extra layer of taste.
Woorinara soup - basically a spicy beef soup. It’s very rich of beef and kimchi flavours. It’s quite spicy though so be aware if u can’t handle the spiciness. Too spicy for me but I really enjoyed it.
Spicy cold noodle - it’s good and refreshing, add some mustard and vinegar to make the taste more vibrant.

Overall i really enjoyed my meal there. It’s a small restaurant so it could take a little longer for food to come out but I don’t think it’s an issue. Come give it a try when ur in town.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwwnERCRJz-aKvCD0vsLuAfPs0OvY8Ilt39Cfr&fid=0x0:0xf66493fc4ceb78b7"],"When":"2022-8-7"},{"Name":"Aggarwal Family","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUjYgjiaTTiySFcNlNlZUyERwjN1An3jqtf4pMul5ngPukOFs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Falling in love with Korean food every single time I have it.  Super happy that my friend took me here for lunch.  We ordered two diff items and both came with so many side dish.  I really enjoyed the soup a lot as it had a lot of flavour and perfect amount of spice. I appreciate the complimentary tea that came with our food.

Cozy atmosphere, clean, and friendly staff!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTOfW5lPOSZ7PP4T3B9OIw3-wY2I9h0O9IdQG-&fid=0x0:0xf66493fc4ceb78b7"],"When":"2022-12-6"},{"Name":"Cijaye DePradine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKJSMdwK2iv6Ld8Ky_xytOJ1Y_mb1td87xx6ntW2_ibZUL2I_G=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Likely one of only a few of the real reviews on here. As someone else alluded, the others seem paid for. So sad. That was pretty evident upon pick up when it was pretty dead at dinner time, and validated further when we tasted the food.

1 dish was okay, the other was absolutely not what we expected.

We ordered takeout and had a difficult time getting understanding with the order, then when we arrived the order was incorrect.

The Rice Cake and Raman (Robokki) was okay, but the boneless Fried Chicken barely contained chicken. It was breaded with an extremely crispy batter that had the texture of a dried duck (that I give to my dog). Admittedly this might be a different dish or specialty that we simply don't like, so to each their own. But we wanted Korean Fried Chicken and this was not at all the double breaded and fried KFC we are used to at all the other Korean Chicken restaurants.

So sad. Not only did it cost a small fortune for two dishes, we now need to find some other food to eat to feel complete.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkF8Xk8tr_HcqWA-nXAOJUFe41GTbLU9xzyoqf&fid=0x0:0xf66493fc4ceb78b7"],"When":"2024-5-31"}]
