user_reviews: [{"Name":"nav d","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNLMVi7TNC4wvmFNgT7-8BhlfG9SSsXwQtRiCMo7WSmvWztw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If I could give this location 0 stars I would. Staff is very unprofessional and always makes the food wrong. This is the type of food they serve; old, salty and stale food. The people giving these fake 5 star reviews are probably the staff’s friends so they can get their ratings up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO52TsUjBmtfGZwHv6RUC22XD9D_QUCNxF3Ympi\u0026fid=0x0:0xe3ce33f19cb6a82c"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"K M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKXwHJh7B8P0DZJcmF7dG-ROfM4k02K_Xc5rcOlL5lGq_4wdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always have a great experience whenever I go to this A\u0026W location, even if it’s going through the Drive thru. There is an older lady that generally works the drive thru and she is so sweet. She can brighten your day by talking to her. Food always comes out fresh and the service is quick and fast.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Inder Mand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKk-wsigQqXmJa3kVzupkht9caja6TQ-tE4hXw9ZGaTf3Y46g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff is friendly, and the service is fast. Whether I’m grabbing a quick bite or enjoying a casual meal, they never disappoint. Definitely a spot I’ll keep coming back to.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Danielle L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGtVJIuRCtJxqHeQ8IldwPF26YZRykK-KMbVF5HkjDOWgf0Te9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Staff was friendly and courteous at this Murrayville location. I received my order in a timely, manner. Thanks again for the delicious breakfast. 10/10 would recommend 😊","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pulkit Arora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8xs-2Rbmf-Uh2nWC5LLRclcDCh6b235PlPQ49ue-xq1AHeQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love coming to this store for the Beyond Combo. it's always fresh and tasty! The staff is super friendly, and the service is always top-notch. Definitely a place I keep coming back to!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"eric orr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqNJTgofrujOIh-4ALiVcyUDvY5HOL0nmrevn3YNWBen7IWlM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The patties were like cardboard... usually when I get a buddy burger with cheese, it's not the highest of quality,  but it still tastes like a burger.. these were dry , very chewy and dark brown where it looked like I was eating a piece of a car tire.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aaron Reid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNI_LJlJX2ZLkzCSFnImD7LwjS1XHsjVbocalCpWSH6WjIRw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Allways awesome, I come through the drive through for a great,speedy breakfast with 2 extra eggs, the cook is excellent as are the window staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"KingXanadu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVXGEzLFNCT3TUAjR3_hOTfEZbRRQUY586Wll_HwHddTtPo2o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This location gets 8 out of 10 orders wrong. Whether it's completely missing an item in the drive thru, or adding cheese when asked for no cheese .  I really like the food itself but I wish the employees paid attention to what they're doing.  It's very frustrating","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"lion8584","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7TY6tA9D5L4oIlUJD4IxZ2fz7QaaZi8ptijAViSQG81uRbg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were looking for a Thai place close to the hotel we were staying at in Langley, and we came across Naka Bistro and decided to try it out. There is ample parking, and the location of the restaurant was not in a busy area. The ambiance is classy and quiet, with authentic decoration to Thailand and Laos. The staff were friendly, attentive, and helpful. Now, the food. The food was very delicious! Great portion sizes and priced in the mid-range area. If we lived in the area, I'd definitely return. Would highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMY1Ufbeq6Piy4Fb3juH_bpv_jWaFf7k1lNWLie\u0026fid=0x0:0xa61af3407795f607"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Amar M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBQWZODVOR5EgW_ud4WGBoPZzS3E7_T_DuyVRfFsnuGSHVIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time - great experience.  Pad Thai, chicken Cashew and Spring Rolls all were great.  Service was quick, food was hot, no complaints.  Parking lot is a bit awkward, but lots of spots.  Delivery is next on the list!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOS7el4rUK1WxuPjovejHpnxbON0q8ESHtamXmQ\u0026fid=0x0:0xa61af3407795f607"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Shahrukh Islam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocITgqgO0djSb_HSRBnLIwds0Zd-4BnA3WDUtW2lud3kYZBNaXY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend! Food tastes great, and portion size is generous. Good service, nice ambiance, and the metal soup spoons are reminiscent of the food stalls in Thailand.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9tVpa3ps_Z7tztj3O4DTNzvb3qv8xS6d1524\u0026fid=0x0:0xa61af3407795f607"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Kamil Chocimski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiqh1VSZRODqN-Djl6vCyrZVFOC1F520DSa-G8lhjPI6NkKSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Thai place in town. Fresh shrimp paradise was delicious, their curry is full of goodies and Pineapple chicken rice was divine. Gotta try fried banana Icecream for desert. Such a wonderful atmosphere, and great service! My first 5/5 place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOfB4cGE5N1d2SOotqgx8Nf9b0vw212UE_9bQp\u0026fid=0x0:0xa61af3407795f607"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"What did Dada buy Today!","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7GTyMhR08A6awgaZC75A11vjN-sR6OzhegVertGwB80jthNLK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly staff and quick service. Food was delicious and excellent. We will definitely be back to enjoy more items off the menu. We ordered Chicken Satay, Tom Yum Goong and Pad Thai.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZmLqLcKg2ED98cIIfivtBuv4P6MuwACtjsQx4\u0026fid=0x0:0xa61af3407795f607"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Kaily C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKc3zGqSWfPVpFaA2IwnqPG6a7FfO86mHdvH_UHjMqk15C2TQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time to try Laos dishes, surprised us. Even though that is little spice for us, but taste good, especially for the drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRPctHkruO2Yshz6MoY8DhovLHyGSvWK20jbUE\u0026fid=0x0:0xa61af3407795f607"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"604 Eats","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKydooBZGXt2w5Pplqp4pqyT8VrJYMUXmY8f1v2W9oYs1nCEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"2nd review:  the flavours are all there - rich and robust. Portions are still on the smaller side, but presentation is nice and food is decent.  Ambience and service is great.  Although I wouldn't come here often, I would come here once in awhile since it's the only Lao restaurant in the lower mainland.\n\n1st review: The flavours are alright.  The portion is smaller and doesn't justify the price.  The ambience is nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7kFWtW1ydOnHQNPKnTN1Vb_fvdMxZp6PmPj6v\u0026fid=0x0:0xa61af3407795f607"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Foodie Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6n06QAfqStqer1ZgBILsv-fiSHmrGRZuznSS1ny9iQFfb_Ognuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The taste is good, the service is excellent, the environment is clean, the Tom Yum soup is delicious, but the Pad Thai noodles are a bit hard. Price is reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWjG80fHMX4xXxGdSqM1EORsiol0mO4RsCTu0B\u0026fid=0x0:0xa61af3407795f607"],"When":"2024-6-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"M B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYexcx0e6ICfw7JRjDUlQZ6JZl_1Bu5kNsviXXR5RZevzfYHC9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The BEST Vietnamese food I’ve ever had. I’ve tried multiple other places in BC and nothing comes close. There is a reason they’re not on any delivery apps, they don’t need to be. You want their food you’ll make the drive.
#47 and #69 are my favourite. My BF loves the pho soups and wonton appetizer, we both agree the salad rolls are 10/10 and that Thai peanut sauce is A1!! . We’ve both been eating here for nearly 20 years.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbRRqdvys3rq4SyKI-P9hgZ1o7c1VHR66p41Vg&fid=0x0:0xce6b0868bbf046f3"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Aa Aaa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYaHKLgugfuCn8Vt_ts-yLXAptZH5HdNUsAmogbrtXm6yTYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"#27 deep fried wonton 4/5
#13 pho 2.5/5

Wonton was so good.
Pho has big portion, perfectly cooked noodle. but the soup is kinda sweet, not my cuppa tea. So low rating for me","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8sE5c-S2exX4XaeGnkdsVHKqTohM1Z5T7-mDK&fid=0x0:0xce6b0868bbf046f3"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Maria Kristianne Santiago","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUropq5pa4AHt67VGg3QJuvN05K0Jqqd0Qy0g8cIiDWG6NP6nXx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We've dined at this Vietnamese restaurant multiple times now, and we're always impressed! The service is unbelievably fast — the staff operate with such efficiency, it’s like watching real life robots in action, no exaggeration. Despite how hard they work, they always greet us with warm smiles, which really adds to the experience.

The food? Absolutely delicious, and the prices are incredibly affordable! The portions are generous, making it a really great value for money. Even though we drive all the way from Aldergrove, it’s always worth the trip because this place never disappoints! We highly recommended this place for anyone craving authentic and affordable Vietnamese cuisine served with top-notch service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"RIA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcNYzyYLe1_s-hZFbDwk--0zTwl73jt3QsEr6gpup4Z2N0IzfIyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Langley Vietnamese Cuisine offers amazing food with generous portions. The pho broth is both clear and flavorful, while the savory stew and fresh bread contribute to a delightful dining experience. The constant busyness reflects the restaurant's popularity, and the great value for the price, coupled with fast service, makes it a definite go-to. The crunchy wonton is an added bonus. I'll definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOr_xEkUpaSccsjwwmaLK_ladUX3sWKQq-S60x9&fid=0x0:0xce6b0868bbf046f3"],"When":"2024-2-15"},{"Name":"XRY","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWjcq2yPDAK-eKEjLBxPQ_EVcnqDDuIZAfL8rDiILU9B1BrSaa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Special spring rolls filling with taro, really like the sugar cane shrimps, juicy and sweet, very flavorful 😋😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzaHDtsdoSKxgpsFLpnw5sLgqhSsjsvx6UYAku&fid=0x0:0xce6b0868bbf046f3"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Leslie Ngo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWy4prG9zC06GQVwfW5XW99I_e-35MyO4tIy1Trq9RLD0fbMwOv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is such a great place to enjoy Vietnamese cuisine. Most notably, the food is delicious and comes out quickly, even if it is busy. We usually don't have to wait unless if it is during lunch time, but even so the wait is about 5-10 minutes. The service is great too as they do their best to serve everyone. There are ample amount of seating inside and take-out is also available. However, parking space is limited and most of the time we park at the adjacent parking lot or park on the street. It can can quite hectic and loud so this place has this fast food type vibe. We really enjoy coming here and we will be coming back for more. Highly recommend this place if you want to enjoy high quality Vietnamese food with little wait time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJxjLVFgsEwM9s3AJNTuSLPV7pbikdzOvVUfIu&fid=0x0:0xce6b0868bbf046f3"],"When":"2023-2-20"},{"Name":"Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWH0VcKAVTe7ZDh01hlHgR0aElCSuLJDgRSdfNkG4TKG7360ZlL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best place to have tasty big bowl of Pho and
All menu  is amazing and our family love this place a lot.
Kids favourite place from all langley choices","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPREki4iVrDc5oaXGQ1DobICrnaFANSCbB-xCb0&fid=0x0:0xce6b0868bbf046f3"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Chang Wun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXinnRETbtdmwq0G3dzHpocXq4c0y1kT8tCLTmXT5-MPrsCx3WH9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is good and price is reasonable the portion is good! Small size of pho  is suitable for girl! Busy restaurant a lots of visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwHnzzx-80C5ODdXviCKzEmcqHKvVQj10FhkDl&fid=0x0:0xce6b0868bbf046f3"],"When":"2024-5-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hassan Mk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn8XljJKUWtM5hZCcrws3Ntw3dFgRbwi5l6-83UHe5aX-z7xYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently dined at this restaurant for a family lunch and had a mixed experience. I ordered the lamb neck and the vaziri. The lamb was well-seasoned and cooked perfectly, but it was a bit too oily for my taste. The vaziri, however, had some room for improvement—the chicken was overcooked and a bit dry.

On a positive note, the customer service was excellent—attentive, friendly, and efficient. The ambiance was also quite nice, offering a comfortable and pleasant atmosphere for a leisurely meal. While there were a few dish-related issues, the service and setting made for an enjoyable overall experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtjE2R0xpMi0EXvpLTbOBlGP43pdnJs0QzfDri&fid=0x0:0x95841dbba01e6c46"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"K H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo2hR2qKHBGSuFyVVc1kqvuNnr23GVLd19IdZCsiU8tz8tbtW-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good, this place is always recommended by my Persian friends. It feels very authentic inside, from the music to the decor. Loved the complimentary tea they provide. Food was very rich and delicious. It is a little more on the pricey side but the food comes in large portions and you can tell it is quality food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsZAOHv5lGtwXc9JzRRURXB0Xi73l9JVk_nSVB&fid=0x0:0x95841dbba01e6c46"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Sarah Kosari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRKJF1Yntnp-zRLmumvc9e-i3Wwazxmkif9r_MkSiD9JZJ8ngfpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We enjoyed a late lunch at Avishan, a charming Persian restaurant known for its quality kebabs. We sampled a variety of dishes including koobideh kebab, chicken kebab, lamb neck, and appetizers like marinated olives and shallots with yogurt. The lamb neck stood out, cooked to perfection, while the other kebabs were decent but didn't quite impress. Meals are accompanied by a fresh salad and fragrant rice, and they are happy to provide extra rice upon request at no additional charge. Overall, a cozy spot with some standout dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbcQTB7mHACTjJ6sm58VoaCn7oEHw7FpXnKmMK&fid=0x0:0x95841dbba01e6c46"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Mounika P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlrnW_AFUjRmmd7lKhMq5nZT_eiPE-cEtUlqvjcjDqoy9no7qI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When we arrived at Avishan, they welcomed us with complimentary saffron tea, setting a warm and inviting tone for the meal.

We started with two appetizers: juicy chicken wings and Kashk Bademjan, an extraordinary eggplant dish that quickly became a highlight. For our main dishes, we chose the salmon kebab and Vaziri, both of which were exceptionally well-prepared. The lamb skewer was particularly flavorful and complemented the rice perfectly.

To finish, we indulged in their famous baklava and Persian saffron ice cream, both of which made for a delightful end to our meal.

The ambiance at Avishan is truly a reflection of Persian culture, filled with warm hospitality and meticulous attention to detail that enhances the dining experience. From the decor to the service, every aspect of Avishan makes it a must-visit destination for anyone looking to enjoy great Persian cuisine in a welcoming environment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_vaMyC9UAW45D_EMq7-_ik6Tzvr5vK76PaorI&fid=0x0:0x95841dbba01e6c46"],"When":"2024-5-10"},{"Name":"Zeeshan Sohail","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQzSgXcEIo5d0fY039IL3LLi7k1i-9eyjB9u0xnur9BQekUdtD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You won't find better koobideh kababs, steaks or lamb chops (shishlik), king of the hill, best of the best. Must-have for any meat lover in BC. Kitchen and waiting staff is incredibly friendly and courteous, always a top notch dining experience. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7nAtpi9ZbyQ_LqpugOdr23sxxMuIgk2cIU0N8&fid=0x0:0x95841dbba01e6c46"],"When":"2023-10-2"},{"Name":"Parsha K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu47MMs78Zh70xQTUat167UUfVc1TKgAopuGm6DQ9eewv85NloeA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic food and service.  Had the koobideh, which was amazing.  Also the waitress was extremely friendly and courteous.  Will definitely make the trip out this way again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5nagX-wf_kwyjoD3tF3vfPREBf-5L1KfMHaG_&fid=0x0:0x95841dbba01e6c46"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Shervino T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6zkqt2zKitqKAocpq4XdjLGLKYwV6h6SPfkXKLCO94ZOjBHOX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic family restaurant
Great authentic food and great staff. Most importantly, the koobideh, the lamb shank and lamb shoulder, and all kebabs are authentic and taste great. The prices are also very reasonable for the quality and portion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZq_jZzM60d0gzJTDGQx-MMg3Qny3AUo4pW1Ph&fid=0x0:0x95841dbba01e6c46"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Melany Roa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDaqmc7hNUPKajxQaQq8twL_yxdm9E9kZJX3NBeub-ZWDsbbbG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I found my new go to Persian food! The lamb is very good, positions are generous and the price is reasonable. I’ll definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8o8GUQ3SpagIeVl0XJkivRzDd_i-fFPKBkIjj&fid=0x0:0x95841dbba01e6c46"],"When":"2024-9-30"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Deep Sohal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbrUY_7mxDrcdTxV-U34Kx3PepQi1ZVKmaR-neWyZGWg9W1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to enjoy a peaceful walk in nature. If you enjoy bird watching, want to learn more about the salmon life  cycle, and are looking for a guided tour or art classes for kids or adults, you should definitely consider blue heron resort.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMIXfXRILxopC_Cjo26cOmF127pbd2KZrCsEIB\u0026fid=0x0:0xa5e90b2b068d9ad8"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"TheReal Facts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZcqAY_oPaMqbg2q-mcQVaJVJl-HmTCR2imk-crEkb78OMnZDK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Truthfully I’ve ordered 7 times using skip even took extra steps as calling to confirm my order is correct unfortunately it has not been one time. Went into the store to show them my soft bun wasn’t toasted they informed me that this store only offers 3 pieces of vegetable per item request 3 small slivers of onion , 3 pieces of spinach and the option was there for extra … please do better it’s a sandwich shouldn’t be this challenging and toast is toast not bread . 1 star because I didn’t eat it or get food poisoning but also never offered to remake or add vegetables after I drove there on a skip order left hungry and lost money . The franchise owner should be ashamed  as his employees laugh over the phone and gaslight to your face they didn’t do it.. we don’t sell sandwiches … what do you mean it’s subway ? This is the subway behind the 7/11 in Langley if you can’t make sandwiches properly I’m sorry but your future jobs may be very difficult\n\n41$ spent that time and won’t be going back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hardeep Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0hz4YikW8gkA46NHVIQPA0yKMo4JqfTtlAg4Pfsg266zdyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"rahul was very helpful and his customer service was great. 5 stars best subway in langley. excited to come back again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Barnes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1ca2s2Ju78fXB3WcTna5eoONK6rtbXd-or7AsBLVFqiGf04UKIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down the best subway. This location loads the sandwiches with a ton of fresh veggies. They aren't cheap with the toppings. You get great service from the owner Wendy. She's there quite often and always makes you feel special.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mileena Suarez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKSiPLl0JlWn6blrKUTvhpT5azC9xWnMEQA64aj4D1UfrJOcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I came in to order food on a work break. There was one person who was currently ordering my food and me. The employee was asking the man multiple times if he wanted something as if she did not understand his answer. She was very slow and did not seem all there. While making his food she stopped half way through and topped all the bread with cheese. There was no one after me and this caused a 5 minute delay. When it was my time to order I told her the sandwich I want using the items full name. She tried to sell me on another sandwich 3 times despite me telling her what I’m wanting. She was extremely slow and resulted in me not getting to eat the food during my break as I spend 15 minutes in the restaurant","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley Moline","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJoUWmgAKxQWjC5zrWLHkhTP776FIKuvo-FRSMqftLx0l9laQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really good food. Nice staff. A few times got some bad tastes in the sub. That's why I took away a star","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Harleen Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJM1nji-KQHQwGQU-pVI86lYRWoWmHmVBs11pOpNjG90NUkqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly staff and excellent service. Always clean anf tidy store","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Feysal Mohamed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYWMlZdd81pmhEdPAbdjlaFFBhbLb7QKdtvcP0ym_xAkz7vg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rahur has costumer service and the store is always fresh and vibrant and the food is delicious!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Sarah von Innerebner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX02Bcygz4hSFQhNZDY8pR5lMHdZU7n3AFW7bOZFNTJ81Oo4W0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I used to live in Brookswood and always went here during the 2000s. Was visiting the area this weekend and was thrilled to stop in for the western bagel and a specialty coffee. Was just as good I remembered it. Still a cute cafe with a great vibe, great variety of options, and good quality. I also appreciated the price point. Such a gem for the Brookswood community. Good memories and glad I was able to stop in!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"georgia susheski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVonT73Ed6O_A6z7oiiURRpX3VsVuc7mqo3_7780QgUNUjM1uAK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"probably the worst food Ive had in a while. The coffee was also really bad. We spent an absurd amount of money for literally the worst food and coffee and it took over 30min to make 2 food items with no one else in it. The breakfast plate was gross. everything was soggy. everything was cheaply made for high prices. bad service also was rude and forgot so much. muffins are good tho","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Avyy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLG3iryD04xCpgPgcDN3u_KbmFIGkZ23GIVuMXPuVn9Wb3y-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This local coffee shop is really cute. Love to spend time here everyday. Very calm and friendly atmosphere :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Premjeet Singh Sekhon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXm69X8boGSiFr0p3kFeOvm5wJXbTaUTzV60KiULJDsqbHy_QeC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommended!
Yummy breakfast!
10/10 coffee☕️
Great atmosphere!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCM3lnJX6JRlAArk18gIVdM9gEwKcA2ZnpOFr7&fid=0x0:0xf5c5af865a77d365"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"Taylor McIlvena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1D8kc30EBnSC2m506bjAqVfSvufDH5pkiFqlAbGEfmCbvhg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"ordered the breakfast bagel and a nanaimo bar, egg in the bagel smelled sour and the nanaimo bar had a hair in it :( very disappointed and they refused to refund me over uber eats","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"George","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWliILiIXuMKV6wQsjYog1vW5Rq7K0f5WrMPTo2qBqbpuYPzCrj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good food. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amanda Pack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5OFRosWldEFLKsJNzuvdaysvmYk8HBI93ZnGL4Vo3yCa1lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service was great 😊🤗 everyone was super pleasant and friendly 😁 Hanna and Lisa were fabulous 🤗
The zucchini sticks were fantastic!
The portions were very filling! Good value for your money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcnaiEpGQg1BjZ9vuoSm0Nt0iUuZ8lEtaGn5cR&fid=0x0:0x43462f5485523ab6"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Huang Recca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDF647f8wTC9xYKRRSNQV8CPkQJrc1Y81nFNPZerRiknh_jw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was decent. Service was great. Our family enjoyed the food here. Fries seems to have stayed in the fryer for a little longer than expected.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkOJ4PsGsp71bbcmm7nPr9MiO-iuMXdVvjyEf6&fid=0x0:0x43462f5485523ab6"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Beatrix Cendana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrgEz8zi1JhWvuye6FwpWxBtelZ_X_lIGR9nTlf8HQ6_8C9mu0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was good! We ordered seafood platter (tiger prawns with shrimp and fries) and rib eye steak.

I love the fries. For seafood, it was okay, not the best. But the steak was sooo juicyyy! Cheese bread is recommended as an appetizer.

The service was exceptional! This is the best steak restaurant thar I ever went to that is affordable with best service ever! I will definitely come back when visit Langley area again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOR2pBgjPKYoqQjRmuETrOHYeh1n8XcRmFwQSQX&fid=0x0:0x43462f5485523ab6"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Edward Stirling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn_anUrf8wXWCL0BThp-c_RZvARspPqKQikQmLrdt8iVc1bMmx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent steaks.  Excellent lobster tails.  Excellent value.  The restaurant is not impressive looking.   The service and food are great.  Generous portions and competitive prices.   Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN22Nm4U6toTDtmweMg_at595UbwyX7wsUkYBCQ&fid=0x0:0x43462f5485523ab6"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Elmira Nazari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS8psOPde-fgvVYsglTVKj-j9hpNdB1347mGr_T9d11yAStREO4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is delicious! Ordered seafood and steak with baked potato and rice. Everything was high quality and actually very impressive in comparison to the price. The prawns were a little dry and the rice was a little flavourless, but in exchange the baked potato was phenomenal, they let you load it with as much bacon, sour cream and chives that you like. Steak was cooked perfect to the wellness requested. Flavours, quality and texture were very good. Their chicken soup was also surprisingly delicious. Dessert was nothing special. Service was timely and friendly. This place is above expectations for the price!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-tg4_9_m_JzCGSM5P_EAOwKYRpbXoXHtQ6Ztb&fid=0x0:0x43462f5485523ab6"],"When":"2023-8-31"},{"Name":"CROW","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX35ZOmUx0U-Hu7ZIfEi2KA7Rrf-o_FWKZ_YUgAE-RENSTtH3i2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been coming here for years and as always the food and service was incredible! My partner and I enjoyed our time and meal here
Thank you for a memorable evening","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwWnaKj4DHCVZjgoLfwjI3-nTdsiiEf1dARdgS&fid=0x0:0x43462f5485523ab6"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"Britt Owen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkZAoDOfQL5iO7GSqFH948ODd92l0avDiyKBQUYufV-0XVCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in for dinner last night as the restaurant was right across the street from an outdoor play my friends and I were attending. Our server was a delight, her enthusiasm genuine. Irina is a gem!   Big menu, lots of options, including seniors and kids choices too. We all loved our food, steaks, prawns, chicken all cooked perfectly. Excellent value and generous portions, quick and attentive service. We will be back. Give this place a try, you will be glad you did!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Travis Curtis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJoVvOhgn0KHOqrrG3gY0wJp9xLtjdejQQ8KUgoJeZ1CglZ_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't say enough good things about this restaurant. My family and I have been coming here for the last few years and it's always been fantastic. I was just there tonight for a birthday party, and the service was on point despite there being 11 of us alongside 2 other big groups. Food was delicious and I guarantee you that all of us will be coming back.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cassie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVDFwcJpPSNZ2RWAsqoCPmucl16RgeATwSsfORQgvC_aaXJtGK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an amazing experience at Atlas! The food was all amazing. Our server was even more amazing. You could tell that she genuinely loved her job and was having fun and happy to be there. I look forward to coming back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRQAcuCP92UmBh5m8hp_jlCoyWWd-pt6Fr2_Ss&fid=0x0:0xc08ace3e4357f3f5"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Grace Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJv2Qb5BK8BlHD8B-fNqpMIiwBP96of3n6s7qsHpu4xPXVSJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am going to come back for the soup!!! Mm!! I don’t typically order a soup but I wanted something warm and cozy with the rainy weather. The Josper Smoked Potato Chowder was rich and creamy— perfection. I prefer my meat medium well and they made it perfectly to my liking. The meat was juicy and delicious… I also had a mojito for my drink which was refreshing. I was pretty full but still had some cheesecake for dessert. It’s a really beautiful and classy restaurant. Servers were attentive and kind. I asked for a straw for my water and they made sure I had it right away. Fantastic service. Also.. don’t forget the fresh bread it’s sooooo good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdpjFBofkA53TfnBZUCRXQnLBqZCzbz5fQUj9j&fid=0x0:0xc08ace3e4357f3f5"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Jean Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKauUtY-eHEVaqqy_5FDYhs46hew-lPpSWVfzpOfNvHxfjz3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’ve never left a bad review but I had very disappointing experience here when we visited here to celebrate an occasion.

Happy hour oysters tasted old. Sea bass tasted old and dry. There was zero seasoning on both the sea bass and the brown butter sauce. Other people had steaks and they were okay.

We did not feel welcomed by our server. We had to ask for our complementary bread after seeing all other tables getting them. Our server was rude to us but she was clearly more personable with other tables. We left there thinking if that was because of our race. We had to rush out of the restaurant as we felt very uncomfortable.

However, the hostess and bussers were friendly and helpful. The atmosphere was nice.

I do not recommend this place at all if you are looking for a pleasant dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcRaGCR0ITu_Lvs3OD0H3ZkYfkNMvE1qF4mYV2&fid=0x0:0xc08ace3e4357f3f5"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Alym Amlani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGCS7cfdRd9yppSIvIAypDkWBSXz0qghmJF3r1Qs4AKnQ6BCK-zQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful experience here, celebrating our wedding anniversary. Our server was super friendly, attentive, and personable. The food was delicious. We had the “gunpowder” tomahawk steak but I personally preferred the original one from when we were last here. This was still delicious though :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvPbj7bL4wgDmplKPh6lS_fYplkdegM7iXb8m-&fid=0x0:0xc08ace3e4357f3f5"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Kevin Mattinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWN5HoU3WCvhzOkA6OoRbX8N3fA9KSHr1_21jegruOgbAE2zCdN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just came home from an absolutely perfect dining experience at ATLAS with my wife and a friend. Everything about the experience was more satisfying and memorable than I had hoped for. Sadie at the door went over and above her duties to make sure my party was comfortable and satisfied before we even sat down at our table. John and Liz were our waitstaff for the evening and made the exquisite food appetizing and extra appealing before we even got a first taste. Chef Jason provided an amuse bouche that I wish I could remember the details of but I wanted to order MORE of that delectable morsel of flavour explosion. My friends went to a different chain restaurant on the same evening and I felt bad to decline, but after dining this good I doubt if I could be tempted to ever set foot in one again. If you want a great ambiance and dining experience, I highly recommend ATLAS. Why are you still reading this? Go make reservations already! Thanks to everyone else on staff that contributed to our evening that I did not get to personally interact with. The bar got set a few notches higher tonight. Much appreciated","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlLMT4sbm9NP2l18vwwYyErqEnD3Gjn0Dt4sG1&fid=0x0:0xc08ace3e4357f3f5"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Al So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLumQHIv-5W9wXPr4ZbA1zWCVnPk2w1Kc3bjsO93-VMG-v7JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Atlas Fish in Langley is full of surprises, starting with its convenient location connected to a casino. I wasn’t expecting it to be so busy, but clearly, the word is out about this place. We went with a group of friends and were definitely not disappointed.

We started with the prawns 🦐, beef 🐄 carpaccio, and oysterswhich we're awesome choices across the board. Each dish was fresh, flavorful, and had us wanting more. For the main course, I went for the surf and turf with steak 🥩 and lobster 🦞. It did not disappoint. The steak was cooked perfectly, with those beautiful grill marks that make your mouth water just looking at them.

All in all, Atlas Fish is a great spot for anyone looking for a good meal with a side of excitement, thanks to the casino next door. It's definitely a place I’ll be visiting again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbm8v4LWUOUzjDFiPs-x8moyMVNDa0Jz72vCkr&fid=0x0:0xc08ace3e4357f3f5"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Anny Velásquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIHwa1y0w-ZfHh0fg0DMJTEHFDHgyvucLz7bV4m3ixulWyWKjgZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was perfect! The food was amazing and our server too. We went there to celebrate my husband’s birthday and had such a great time. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5oivo-sSuQ6rZQzi5TQm__O8yAAa0IkyHuX94&fid=0x0:0xc08ace3e4357f3f5"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Colleen Yee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpsidLuNMQmiiJ7G6_DCNBVPCXA_23d9kjZqOPSrCn8oiIvlNz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Of the steak houses… Atlas in Langley BC is my absolute favourite place to go for a special occasion if we are looking to have steak and seafood.  The food is always consistently good… BUT… it is the tier 1 service that keeps me coming back.  Whether it’s the host who establishes relatability right away, or Tracey remembering me from the last time I was there or our server Devon who had to handle my relatively fussy mother with all of the grace and professionalism of a champ, to the piano player who played happy birthday when Devon brought out the cake… it is the considerate and consistent touches of customer service that sets this place apart from all other similar style restaurants.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMk58OjJ2ip8d1FisJucZMAIXiEgQ67EwQDZ9PT&fid=0x0:0xc08ace3e4357f3f5"],"When":"2024-9-1"}]

[{"Name":"Stephanie Southern","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJy_HnS391vB2FxV_dCZYH7EIBxy7l-b_tuqoGcLGvtkwxQx-2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped by yesterday for the first time and was pleasantly surprised with my experience. I ordered some chicken teriyaki rolls to go. They were made quickly and tasted great. Definitely will be back to try more. Staff were very friendly too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnKVkD3CB2G2ou0WiL_JnmM07J0pxfLW5Bads4&fid=0x0:0x446931c67a16a72"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Jessica Han","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI--Jv94Tg0FPNMmnzQ9uMdjx5jjoL9Y0_yiKbFFs1-NT3vrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried creamy prawn and it was 🤦🏼‍♀️
I love every single items and servers were so friendly.
I love this place at very first visit.
I’m pretty much sure I’ll come back to try their other menus as well❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOv7fjg9YQdVlLBLfG302xtWRZlulsVnrSZVbrr&fid=0x0:0x446931c67a16a72"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Patty Lawa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyJ57zaddManS-BKaF-6lD-R2YkZkW8O9B-vtES-NEKTLDRgU-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was our first time to eat at Hitori and it was the best decision ever! Lol. ;) The place when we came was quiet as it was after peak lunch hours already. We were seated originally on the left side as soon as you enter but we requested to try the cubicle style seating on the right side and the server was happy to accommodate our request. The service was fantastic! We were served with hot tea as we got seated and our orders came pretty quickly. We ordered the teriyaki dishes and I had Salmon Teriyaki while my husband got the Beef Teriyaki. We both were very satisfied with our orders but for me personally, i loved how fresh the salmons tasted. You can tell the freshness of it because it melts in your mouth and just really good quality. The teriyaki sauce tasted really good as well, it’s not overly sour and not too salty. For me, this by far is the best Salmon Teriyaki I have ever had. Price is definitely worth the quality, But, I hope they don’t do price increase so we can go back and enjoy their food again. One last thing, our server was really friendly and she was efficient! Thank you Hitori for the good food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOW6gWdUtwOLj0qe8RZXlmU_l7W80QYVCMtj4gZ&fid=0x0:0x446931c67a16a72"],"When":"2024-5-25"},{"Name":"Camilia Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWigkoqaNhHJinW1sDEWmiP5-QkCbLl16QFp5xZiy1DDMYI0dmUuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is our go to Japanese place in the area and for good reason. The prices are great and the portions are reasonable. I ordered the Sashimi and Sushi Roll Combo while my boyfriend got the Spicy Chicken Yaki Udon and he found it spicy last time so he asked for it with less spice. Patrons be warned it is spicy!! We both thoroughly enjoyed our meal as always with Hitori. ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGtRICh2tQRHFKKKH6yD5d8MsJvqmiJk5eFwu_&fid=0x0:0x446931c67a16a72"],"When":"2023-11-24"},{"Name":"GDM Live Action Unit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9oZxCeXJ6z00Vx30lgtb9YetRrXQLjplMkpErmusXjy69I_OZUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered from Hitori last night for the first time and are fully impressed.  We loved the tofu twist and their original take in the house roll. Nice vibe here. We'be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gagan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHfCjGlwbJZKgEVGM-M5aBC9jSuki0r-GYISPYpBM7474iqw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is great, definitely recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-jdAgS9rTwTKPxdQolu9j6GWuMvF0pRqHCyuH&fid=0x0:0x446931c67a16a72"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"justin mckillop","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXycL53shbjuiaMD6urzpkXK-Gz6EEnmXV8W8247HHolXRLn9Od=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome first time & awesome first time dine in experience. Was lucky enough to be seated at a booth with my wife & baby. Delicious Food, friendly & fast Service. Definitely worth checking out. Will be moving to the area beginning of August & will definitely be back to try new things 😀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPljARym4DNNg1tA1eAVd1lIPZBF_hAEdBygLiO&fid=0x0:0x446931c67a16a72"],"When":"2022-7-31"},{"Name":"Dana Noh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlmQqx5HOfp8yIOHKO7DhS9P98X-FnubtAW7-CCM9T2dJdLw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"salmon was so fresh. This place was a choice without any regrets. I would like to visit again. staff was also kind that I was more satisfied:)
Thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrG3g19zW6pGdP2pj-bxPgPkES7YAcrssSyQkc&fid=0x0:0x446931c67a16a72"],"When":"2024-1-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"justin mckillop","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXycL53shbjuiaMD6urzpkXK-Gz6EEnmXV8W8247HHolXRLn9Od=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried this place for the first time tonight. Got the dinner for 3. The food was better than how I thought it was going to be after reading some of the reviews. Everyone has different standards.. however I found the food to be actually quite decent!!! My only 3 problems I had was the way the sweet & sour pork looked.. it tasted better than it looked. The lady at the counter was lacking the enthusiasm & didn't smile once.. & unfortunately we didn't get any fortune cookies with out order. Overall food wise it was good and we would definitely give this place another shot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6-lFbEmy4xkreV--NCnQk0qROs1BZ4Z8yTtth&fid=0x0:0xd6e3fbed6ae4945d"],"When":"2023-5-7"},{"Name":"Dhirendra Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfttp3KtfePWZJ7Wnf3gTPuVn-yVGLsSCf_lt0jbBL7gjW9RhX3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The food was so bad that I had to return it inspite of me and my wife being super hungry. We left a note for them as they had closed.
Felt like they gave us microwaved left overs; onions tasted awful, chicken was chewy, cashews weren’t fresh. On top of that it was tasteless. I don’t know how you all are rating this 4. Good luck eating here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_NB3DgDF8aagPkUAKoAbnF6TxyIIIpxggwqwr&fid=0x0:0xd6e3fbed6ae4945d"],"When":"2022-7-8"},{"Name":"Erich Enns","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiQ0Xqv7V188Ace0lASKq-MPdvwe9fHAuAAon3mEk6q7DrCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A genuine great local take out Chinese restaurant.   Just need to add a little bit more protein and ginger to their ginger beef. Lemon chicken, deep fried squid, veggie and pork dishes are outstanding.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ian Daniel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJj94XYMUK7R0Gel4vbrQ-ONAa5ruBiNP3-bsB6rZfTL0HAuw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Toki's is excellent food at good value.  We are really glad that they are in the neighbourhood !  We've relied on them for 15+ years.  Soooo good, consistently good and reliable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shayne Switzer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfVvRjSKCBKoykCdVtyLss0Y1d5JICznK1J2aZ9ovFIwSkc7Ku=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Awful take out, order dinner for one, over cooked taste like it was four day old out of the fridge.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sheri Cyprus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqTBFvYC4mrByPHDf0yjtJVQc-uEII9Mnjg2GI6N8rgY9J28Cx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My five-star rating is for Toki's Deep Fried Prawns which are the best I've ever tasted!! Not only are they deep golden brown battered crispy perfection with perfect prawns inside, but they are CLEANED prawns.

This review is based on the two times we've had take-out food from Toki's. The rest of my family enjoyed the other dishes, but I didn't - only the prawns for me both times as I found the other dishes kinda 'off' and a lack of the red sauce on the sweet and sour pork.

But perfect prawns are hard to find and one of my top fave things to eat so I'm okay with only liking the prawns and ordering those for myself for a perfect prawn feast!! Thank you, Toki's!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Samantha Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYwXnezguSoJ7JdmOkVZMRHLMdQsnCc4Kx8YAfXWRcz6H9vQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Chinese in Langley! Dry garlic pork is 10/10.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Catherine M G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzP573oCsGFP3Jmr2rC6j3js3elc_GeM4D6eRxY39IyjjAsw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had Toki's for our first time last night, and were super pleased with the quality of the food, generous proportions, and the reasonable prices. The beef and broccali were cooked to perfection, the chicken chow mein was very good, and the wonton soup delightful. And it all arrived at our house super hot. Toki's is a hidden gem.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Haleh Magnus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZGl2rvHWlqbzuuFKZ9pHQfQXwlTmRHH4ep4A1K4mjlsDM4dQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A cozy little restaurant that design like a local Mexican restaurant in Mexico. The dishes are very authentic. We order soups. They were amazing taste and it big portion. You can possibly share it. Service was fast too. Perfect when you are in rush.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMe8GVfwO-GokUSlCBqU0rg1_oi3ib1l29owlw&fid=0x0:0xfd7dd3ba62d4bcdb"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Rob","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4MsprCpC8FFjfHncD_i6ehbgUYgj1onkIOSl8mBsLVyiHqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was our first time and it did not disappoint. The food was so good. The service was excellent. Our server was wonderful.  We have tried many Mexican restaurants in Surrey/Langley and hands down this one is the best and will be our go to spot from now on!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAQeCwi4fW0O2_sYc52UEOeQXWjrrxMb1Wlyhs&fid=0x0:0xfd7dd3ba62d4bcdb"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Tiffany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmBipHLVmLNTpk3raSEF81Fz_yYjDdhbPrar5AlArNmyvM1kYtHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious hidden gem on the langley one way! There are 3 other Mexican restaurants in the area but this one is the most authentic. The food is so good, the veggie burrito is GIANT and stuffed full. I had the chili rellenos and it came with rice, beans and salad. We were also given complimentary chips and salsa. This restaurant is family owned and run by very nice people. Definitely recommend to anyone looking for an authentic meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJoU5SvBlYX8OnhvYAnJOQWvQmfh9cJs6WLgbt&fid=0x0:0xfd7dd3ba62d4bcdb"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Zia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4XSCizrqCxV5l-dktcH1a__SkR8NSGVXg9MQNW9HbBtksN1XK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Took myself on a date to Cielito Lindo, and honestly it was amazing! Real authentic Mexican food prepared with lots of love. The woman who helped me was absolutely sweet and the atmosphere in this place is lovely. I ordered the enchiladas which came with a side of salad, beans & rice. I was able to substitute the meat options for veggies as well! Definitely coming back for more. 💛","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVR4nGBdJ7-XZzQkTPZEubArC-pHiffRsY9kel&fid=0x0:0xfd7dd3ba62d4bcdb"],"When":"2023-8-23"},{"Name":"Mas Rostam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn9N6jo_YK6Nshi-kTKKBlL6s75IIqo4-4Z0DhozzunRxm2uG_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This was one of the smaller of the three Mexican restaurants on the same strip, but one of the better in terms of food. While it's a small restaurant with slightly higher prices, the food quality is good. They work hard and are very polite to provide you with prompt service.

I haven't had such good carne asada since eating in the United States; it's been difficult to find a good quality, and while food preparation varies by persons region, this one was tender and flavorful, whereas other restaurants are bland and tough to eat.

The parking at the strip is difficult to find, but it's a nice little walk if you have to park further away; I've returned many times despite the higher prices. It's worthwhile.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfDy7nzkK6bSSHIFOHiH_Pqof23f3oNyBQKkJU&fid=0x0:0xfd7dd3ba62d4bcdb"],"When":"2023-7-12"},{"Name":"D. M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwV7_2wvNf8BXxeCFtq4cWeYsAjwc85npawAOtRNzG6biKoD7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can only speak for the giant burrito. I had the chicken and it was very, very good. The green sauce is absolutely delicious and has the right heat. Complimentary chips and salsa is just an added bonus. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"LC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgKXDcGIDcbkesef0FqudeAjvBmr8QtlNItEK7Lr5yWNkI3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I'm glad there's a Mexican restaurant like this in Langley. Quesabirria is really delicious. However, it is a bit expensive at $22.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFFCFTgvh1yuxPjPlqF53NftVSGtRkfDb_rlsP&fid=0x0:0xfd7dd3ba62d4bcdb"],"When":"2024-5-20"},{"Name":"K H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo2hR2qKHBGSuFyVVc1kqvuNnr23GVLd19IdZCsiU8tz8tbtW-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you want some seriously authentic Mexican food then this is the place. The interior isn't the fanciest, but it's cozy and simple. Our food was made by the cutest grandmas who you can tell put a lot of pride and effort into their dishes. We had the pork enchilada, jumbo chicken burrito, tamales, and salsa chips - our favourite was definitely the enchilada. The salsa was also very fresh and light. And their homemade hot sauce is a must try. Prices are cheap compared to other places. Definitely stop by if you're in town, you won't regret it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORXtLSLuRYSpQyAEE9id40DnhT7yuSSI9DgfOM&fid=0x0:0xfd7dd3ba62d4bcdb"],"When":"2020-8-30"}]

descriptions: Casual, brick-clad eatery for Indian eats such as   tandoori dishes & biryani in low-key environs.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jennifer Ramirez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAFq69iTIcaZDekD27us44d8ngDu8WdKsqDyyYnNu7GaC-OA8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Came here for lunch and ordered Combo A. The samosas were so bad, I wish I had taken a picture. You can tell their from a frozen box. Secondly, the “complementary” rice was days old… tasteless, bland with no life to it. We told the waitress and she took it away. She was very apologetic, but we did pay for it. Butter chicken and naan tasted mediocre felt like it came from a food court. I don’t understand how this place is highly rated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOp3jt01fmIve15EBt_BEBHTZi5q-B7aDV8R5Cd&fid=0x0:0xcb6003f47d7fe769"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Kaveesh Kukreja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyGM5Wur1OIcPaIKHk8y8hADl72LlmzqOApRwMvp0cKEQAxid2PA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Not much to say so I'll stick to highlights.

Sev Puri is the only thing I would come back for.
Chole Batthure was Average, Lamb was Average and masala Pappad was ok(I'm a fan of fried Pappad) but this was roasted which I will say is atleast healthier and it came with no chutney.

Service was ok, we had to ask for plates and cutlery which is crazy.
Maybe I ordered the wrong things but yeah not worth another visit.
Prices are on the higher side!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPt_FOqtpTbDfWTxxQUX7jRypx4mI9AGnvHzYyN&fid=0x0:0xcb6003f47d7fe769"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Rajpreet Sondh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAk7ZbG_RZVGzOZ6pWcbFMXmqGN7O5Sh0c2FNyLITx2MVQDCI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Never been a good experience. Some or the other way they would screw up the order. The last and my final order for Chicken Manchurian, where they left the chicken balls or the chicken in the Chicken Manchurian dish, their argument, we asked for gravy? Why would one order chicken Manchurian if they only wanted to have gravy? thus they assumed no chicken!! We open the container at home and are surprised to see this is what we’ve got! Major misunderstanding and post that ignorance on the whole issue from them has left me baffled.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKivOVR2-awFoLTPAE8eFL3SLTsFyzp86d7zx0&fid=0x0:0xcb6003f47d7fe769"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"Tanya H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWEALA4eWsh5WLGY9qcuVFJdo_zm9Aj4UgrzkmZfg7H394SQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I literally didn't even get as far as ordering. I went to order on Uber Eats, but the Ashoka page didn't indicate which items were vegan (I don't know why UE doesn't streamline this for all restaurants - some use "V" as vegetarian,  some use "V" as vegan, and some don't mention anything. Very frustrating!). So I called the restaurant directly to ask which, if any items are vegan friendly. She started rattling off chicken dishes! Huh?? I told her chicken is an animal and NOT vegan. She then said butter chicken, and again started rattling off more chicken dishes... again, I told her, neither CHICKEN or BUTTER are vegan. So incredibly unhelpful/uneducated, that I didn't trust even ordering! They lost a first time, and potentially ongoing customer, as I really do love Indian food. Please educate your staff on what the different food preferences & allergens are (vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, etc.), and the dishes that correlate accordingly. Besides lifestyle or religious preferences, there are many people out there that may be allergic to something, and that can end very poorly, otherwise.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gurpreet Singh Gumber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLuF3jN0JFgvBLB3WR4oJdPVDhgpPMUwV8NLcVhPj87ePZbWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pleasure of dining at Ashoka restaurant for the fourth time with my family today, and it was another fantastic experience. Our visit was elevated by the exceptional service provided by Sapneet, who went above and beyond to make our meal enjoyable. I also want to commend the dedicated kitchen staff for their excellent work. The entire team at Ashoka truly contributes to a memorable dining experience, and I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for delicious food and outstanding service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxsiRDAeubO1THPmrUHVDmT6bLEHIBTiZUl5YI&fid=0x0:0xcb6003f47d7fe769"],"When":"2023-11-1"},{"Name":"Maya Tarin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfKEnpihwYljZjv4ZEkoGZwmySggwhnvvx-CrDh6prjpGabQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service! Our server was very nice. She explained very detailed about their food.
We visited here for lunch. They have a great lunch menu.
Everything was nice and clean.
They have 4 spicy levels; mild, medium, spicy and very spicy. We ordered medium chicken corma and spicy chicken vindaloo. I did not find big difference between medium and spicy. Spicy one was not too too spicy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcJd3JAjJnmppazHIQHsjujx45JuI4X9byrmpM&fid=0x0:0xcb6003f47d7fe769"],"When":"2023-9-8"},{"Name":"Emma Bryce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkV2QE01SMTq5pWmdu7hEwuFK41S0j-1hMeveEqFezfjrBoDxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food was good, a bit confused in regards to the garnish for the veggie samosas. Like 3 pieces of cabbage and a green pepper?!
Service however was slim to none. Waitress did not stop by to ask if we needed anything or see how the meal was and I had to go up to the counter when finished to ask for the bill and to go containers. I would go again for the food but if you’re looking for friendly service to pair I would suggest elsewhere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdBXy6gQJ1FsVwpGO_xKTOg0v2tlbs-FtoNzu0&fid=0x0:0xcb6003f47d7fe769"],"When":"2022-12-29"},{"Name":"Atif Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQ0jz1-8jq4lIhW-054jNy3keG7xjoLa3PjupI1zYKo2EE77MV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was absolutely perfect and delicious. cozy and nice place. We enjoyed the food and portions were perfect size the most amazing thing I noticed was the server was extremely polite , and caring and service was top notch. She treated some very old folks with so much patience and a little girl with absolute love and care so good job on exceptional customer service. 10/10 :) . Highly recommended and we tried pani puri:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7spDZr6jnVAvVafB7s6G1jBj3vdX0GawyCBRq&fid=0x0:0xcb6003f47d7fe769"],"When":"2023-4-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"M Prins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYWCMj9HZ6_2jMol4qrWBbE6l7uCmTatsMh6ch4jbiMYWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Friendliest little sushi shop around! Very tasty crunchy and crispy role, and good miso soup. Only about 7 seats in a very tiny shop, but take out is their thing. They know everyone who comes in the door to pick up!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONlp_-_5mMKapSOXwhz5m02raon6OAtuVKc1w&fid=0x0:0x8475e78b4f28102d"],"When":"2022-2-19"},{"Name":"Hanna Jewell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxWQjrpZc-2HMLDPhdCRe3DwngfeYMJHS5Cyakm3eNp-4xzioPdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been coming here since I went to the highschool up the road!! One of my favourite sushi places in Langley!! The couple who owns the restaurant are so sweet and friendly, it’s what keeps me coming back!! Love it here","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Branden Boudreau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMaGFz2XK8ZljP91Gwv4dJx7GtV0yv9TFj8CNhHd1lyAhK1A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owners are an absolutely adorable couple.

Best sushi I've ever had and I've visited Japan.

Average pricing, great location! Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ron Chandra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMUKEp9NFVbFVKFyxQlhQ50VwTmMMSQVQjHTfLly7PyXiMeq63Vg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service, the couple that I’m assuming own and run the place are really nice. The pricing is a lot better than some other places in the area. It’s not really a dine in place, the food is fresh and the service is quick, what more can you ask for…I will be coming back here more often when I am in the area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bailz steinmann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLb9sLGE0NjiM1RPf_dkq41OgCHC6CeUxfeyusVSogEZGwDok=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I havent had proper sushi in a very long time, as I moved to the east, but while visiting my brother we enjoyed a wonderful meal from the most kind and respectful couple who prepared us dishes I had not been able to enjoy for a few years.

The food was so good and I feel so satisfied after such a long hiatus from proper sushi. This is a true west coast sushi restaurant.

Thank you for the hospitality and we look forward to coming again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Liz Ogilvie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_-RBPkWGRyeniYq8md2TT7b7vRa8auuRHuJH7_szqf-JiMg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Togo is more of a to-go place. Not much seating. I am a regular there. The food is great. The prices are good.The owners are absolutely wonderful people!! So nice and friendly. I enjoy visiting with them when I'm picking up my order!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nelson Van Aert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNJx9H9VfOYLwJ69XJ2GzXgViDrnDuJyuu16Jd1B58khfxXJM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered a spicy salmon sashimi rice bowl and it was incredible. fish was fresh and the sauce was flavourful. Customer service is always too notch and the owners are extremely friendly. Definitely coming back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Katie Cromarty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRbO688X2HIRjswSD_MQMYJlPw135vb1EyHemdhqh7Hby8LZADIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time eating at this restaurant. I got an order to go. The dynamite roll and California roll were delicious and I really loved the Togo special roll. The Miso soup was a large bowl and tasty. The chicken teriyaki was good too. The prices were very reasonable. And the restaurant itself was impeccable - so clean and orderly. The owners obviously take pride in their business. Thanks!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Monica Doho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOTHuolrZH19UOKe0vKcYt9tjE2H-0_lsqkQqnkryuXhDKow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here because our kids love sushi, and it was a very satisfying dinner for the whole family. The kids especially loved everything on the menu.
The chef shush is a gem that offers delicious, well-prepared dishes at great prices .
It’s a place you’ll want to visit again and again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUH98I0LI5tXc2Ohs6v3zXafY1ALoUnDo5e9yq&fid=0x0:0x374ceae29d2f30d5"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Lo Paige","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYFkmJTwfMEhP0qCOlV-WGfn4ACddaNICO-xbSv6pvQo6xUgTP-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything we ordered was absolutely delicious, and the service was incredibly friendly. I loved that, unlike other places with fixed bento menus, I could pick four dishes of my choice. I’ll definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHHN-V7YsKOfnGaSXoVBBIksgoywuzbxX-NsQE&fid=0x0:0x374ceae29d2f30d5"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"yellowmellow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5urtml8s5y5XqqyR8eDd8sHB7clJY6Z2xCIoGcn2t6Z3J6Sob=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The store is very clean, cozy, and has a nice interior.The menu is easy to choose from because it has pictures, so it was simple for the kids to decide what to order. The food was very delicious and clean, and we enjoyed it a lot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZ5rCtQN7BA37rIvITCP7OdG-3de3yfKf_UMiM&fid=0x0:0x374ceae29d2f30d5"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Jenny Song","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURXtviHixDVBNP0MkPKaxbTaPYS1B0CN4r6OgZ0JpfjJ7ct43i=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"UNDER NEW MANAGEMENT
It's a nice cozy place with good food and friendly service. I was really impressed by the presentation of the dish. The sushimen take their job so seriously! It's going to be my go-to sushi place from now on😎

Plus, I really like their combo option that allows me to have little bit of 3-4 different types of food for around $20.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMr0IespfTg2AoyPn-heQtpLod4Trg1izNz5Ri&fid=0x0:0x374ceae29d2f30d5"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Jessica Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIbdxVhxB2KdwggS9-3NjE5kQgCh7FTzakOqufgEioV4aUyCw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently renovated, this sushi restaurant is truly impressive! The freshness and flavor of each dish are outstanding, and the staff is attentive and friendly. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a fantastic sushi experience!🍣","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsh_eUdQuyu6a68Qyh0fBBJzQ5nkDSrBks-plf&fid=0x0:0x374ceae29d2f30d5"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"irina skarga","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyzD8ssuY3r-iWV0fXNI9XuD1lsgMmZ2Nrdiv4a6KUIrQxHlJfMA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I absolutely adore coming to this place. When we crave sushi, this is the only place we go, even though we live in Burnaby, and the journey isn't short. But it's totally worth it!!! The food here is incredibly delicious! Everything we've ordered has been not only tasty but also beautifully presented!!! I can confidently say that these are the most delicious sushi I've ever had. We lived in Toronto for many years, moved to Vancouver last year, and it's only at Chef Sushi that I've truly appreciated this cuisine. I don't know what these guys put in their dishes, but everything they serve is just unreal!!!! Also, the people working there are all very kind and positive!!! They exude great energy!!! It always feels like the food was prepared by a loving mother!!! Highly recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaV7Qb_dAel-AHvP0Q_V5cHCbonggo1b5pOw4Z&fid=0x0:0x374ceae29d2f30d5"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Kkkggg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4x3k3sDTtol6LKWiV5Wx73XEVq1b0XS6jjN9U_sfl-_EFoA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love their special rolls! I visited here on the way to road trip. Every staff was so kind and welcoming. Food was sooo delicious even I had it few hours later. Must visit sushi place in Langley🥰","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWzMebfaEr4-oWaAhsxq-RQTlABRlVIKJMfdyr&fid=0x0:0x374ceae29d2f30d5"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Sarah Tidsbury","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJu0Swia1IzMKszdPI1-1kVJzZBl18RKyviSO8oCJLBTSZByQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This was the OLD VERSION. -NEW version is way too EXPENSIVE and they took away my delicious bento box.New Management = $10 more? no thank you. 🤷🏻💔

Delicious and the price is always right. Great bang for your buck! 👍🏻💜","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvA_rP7Y5mIXhdBmVJ0YrS4ehu7DIEAtGsdGn0&fid=0x0:0x374ceae29d2f30d5"],"When":"2024-6-10"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Sunil Pandya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVj4H3hBVSDRbMxJH4IQ4XkDJPYbePXu8wjpN2N-WX6oMBBsQU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After nearly 2.5 months in Burnaby, I visited Langley and had an amazing pizza day at Pizza Factory. The taste was superb (सुपर से भी ऊपर), and although the pizza seemed a bit red, it wasn't burnt at all. The corners were also chewy. Above all, the lady at the counter (Ms. Sumanji) was incredibly helpful in suggesting the best items on the menu. I will definitely visit Langley again just to repeat the treat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLOfaAA7dhuqSldjaFFOp1Fj7VKPMglIpbKU32\u0026fid=0x0:0x90e64c07d781b233"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"0123456789 9876543210","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVorV37Vnl6ySspIDeQoOCD__b_vkHJ8UGPet0i2A2aEqZtm3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My pizza was not cooked fully. It was uncooked dough in the middle. I called them back and they said..... that's the way its supposed to be cooked.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjXt73K5ZFUkFpAUaICgPBnhSXp_KDZM1yXPBX\u0026fid=0x0:0x90e64c07d781b233"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Sheri B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5Nxp_GpA887_fJhFcXVHU4pEU2Em2vI5T8t0HdMNQuM91MQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I arrived to pick my taco pizza that was ordered with NO ONIONS AND ADDED CILANTRO  and both were screwed up. I hate raw onions and this pizza was packed with tons of raw onions. Then they ran out of sour cream and I had to add my own at home. My family all hate onions,except one. I should have taken it back but we were all hungry and just picked off all the onion. Not pleased that our order was completely screwed up and ruined the pizza. See photo for all the onions. Yuk","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTZw9pCx88wnpSnKyyFs4f3ZLJ19IgCGO9s4mJ\u0026fid=0x0:0x90e64c07d781b233"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Frank","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDSR6ld7IIeERLlI2cy9T-6eurgFxQ1iIIK-0vZvIP-61-tW6tzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good pizza tonight. Havent been here in years. This could be my new spot. Lots of toppings and cheese. Great crust and sauce too. Tastes very home made. Fresh vegetables. Also if you pick up it looks like a dump adding to why I like it! Those are the best spots. Looked very busy also a good sign.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brenda Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJm8b0Urv0K7A8ALJB3pIGSYKtF0Dp2rkrazlrYO9QBhrfmQv3F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Tonight my husband ordered me a large Popeyes pizza with extra toppings, pineapple, spinach, supposedly black olives, which I didn't receive. Any way something in the pizza was moldy. My husband didn't tell skip, because he already made his comment and it was too late. So then we ordered me something for dinner , from Maru and we didn't get it. They dropped it at another house. But totally disappointed! That my pizza tasted like mold.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vinit Shah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvOThjwY0PPbIXG7HP_JJd3g2CwbKkP_LHozt41E_UnWoHiF3IGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I never had such Indian style tasty pizza in my whole life. Specially thank you to Suman for serving awesome pizza. All pizzas are tasty and yummy. 110% recommendations pizza. #bestpizzaintown","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBjFPmqfe9_n9XEEDDf98RakyK0GM4BYuY3NJM\u0026fid=0x0:0x90e64c07d781b233"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Colton Onushko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHH77kvG3Rp1Zxqh948nasH4zzjYJdxz8iblCbl4dJe-YzNqBRvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Whole place is the biggest eyesore in the area. It drives me nuts every time I drive past to see it get more and more run down. Outdoor signs are completely faded from the sun. “Lights” are dropping all over the place and the sign leds have been burnt out for like a year now. No idea why this place has to be in such a prime location when they can’t even upkeep their building. Makes the whole area look so ghetto.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvwTCG_l1nPdychfGNOMNF9oQguuwnEC4AZzeT\u0026fid=0x0:0x90e64c07d781b233"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Todd Poirier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW65m2nKDL8AeXIMarnNT1yj7Hvh0dVf9vkHJ8Pf9qk83B1ds2B=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I started ordering from here lately and i feel that this is gonna be my go to place from now on.  Got some pizzas for my sons birthday.  Great price, great quality, super delish.  Lots of great deals and an awesome menu.  HIGHLY recommend this place.","Images":null,"When":""}]

And then tried the combo c - WINNER! 😍😍😍","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tannya Flinn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXRpKnlHRGmbdmMiuObTTi5D1nWpb3BWxHmS803n6C5SpnFccT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"China Bowl never lets me down. I order dinner for one combo A. Switched out the chop suey for beef and broccoli. It was Al amazing! Chow Mien wasn’t greasy as most places are, sweet and sour pork( was pork not fat and batter) broccoli still had a crunch to it as I love. Been my go to place for 12 years and still going strong ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxbbI61w4aPDIWdeSoWxhvcaRHmdHVMK5V8fgf\u0026fid=0x0:0x267c8ccfcbd60a10"],"When":"2022-4-25"},{"Name":"Al W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYe45YjImY5DPLiU8fCh6ZCR_Q9PUFw8kk9sbpk94BoMnmjw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very poor quality  formost.
