Other places in Langley far better at more reasonable cost.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Julie Jaggernath","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrLZyhcOWBgM5pLOZv-IoGPQX3EU86WQLxTmBhWdLt5kwGzpR7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our go-to Chinese restaurant for take out and we've never been disappointed. The food always tastes fresh and not greasy, and they can accommodate no MSG for many of the dishes. They get busy but always seem to get orders ready quickly. Keeps us coming back for sure!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kim Robin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYNJg1LYA-0eMWLIOs-d13T9RwHXEoAAEDUkbifCmTDyl4YqI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My husband bought a dinner for 3. China Bowl's website had the dinner for 3 advertised for $48 plus tax, which I thought was high to begin with. Once he got there the menu they it was $58 plus tax. If my husband had phoned me to tell me I never would have paid that much!!! He thought I knew the price. They would not honour the price on their website. The food was okay but NOT spectacular \u0026 the fortune cookies were stale. We will not order again. Their prices are utterly highway robbery!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"rachel wark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLjHMQQUMvp0yhpiM5evBzuiuURCnmOVQS-WWoDJZMp6tvw1w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go to place for Chinese food! Usually grab a combo dinner, eat it at least once a week. Always so fast, (they get busy) fresh (never have got sick) food isn’t greasy like other Chinese food places. Good portions and value too. Friendly and smiling service every time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jessica degenstein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPS_Xmv_idxg2Rl98MHbbBpjdPTE92k_rKNzFsO_nDVE-A4HWg1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It was OK. Not great not terrible just ok. The deep-fried wontons were the star of the show. The pork fried rice was well just rice and that's it, the sweet and sour pork was chewy and tough, and the beef and broccoli were good.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"PNW Wildlife Watch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsjdGdJ6XqbcDSMhzRNp2TpkDVuwkGF1FUMlfT5h3isfkF9Rob=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Quick service with tasty sushi. Miso soup was lacking in flavor and not quite hot enough for my taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJD5CXDf0WbEhJrI1uanttgm9VB_6RDVnCUTTz&fid=0x0:0xe0d71cbaf9d27022"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Vida Corvus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqINKLe9b1hKofrDcCLAKEL-6hQV6fdy1HehcGnPVwrDjBQXY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for my kids 8th birthday dinner and they ordered the Crazy Roll, which is a deep fried California roll. I also ordered the hot night roll and crunchy spicy tuna roll. Everything was excellent!! We made a reservation and they seated us in a private booth, which 100% added to our experience.

We will absolutely be returning here. The food, service and atmosphere are fantastic","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5L9wY971YD9c2IBUumOMUavrcUIzVmGq8GaP6&fid=0x0:0xe0d71cbaf9d27022"],"When":"2023-9-25"},{"Name":"Yedam Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjLA5bKCx4V5jK-Q0hYbDNsrpG_GfVmBG2OeMnq3vHkNcS6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best sushi for best price. Unreal price in this economy. Their crunch spicy tuna roll is best in the town","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoTYOTauTgXP67IfwxjXaxM7ETKe73iZIqau7w&fid=0x0:0xe0d71cbaf9d27022"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"ToothPick Tony","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVQ_CiBei8DBX6r81FhuD9joulsmUhtl1gmulEmmowKoxXST0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped here for lunch with my mom and was pleasantly surprised! When I looked in the area the other sushi places had 4.7 and 4.8 stars and this place only had 4.4 but we decided to come anyways because they had great prices on their lunch combos.

The service was excellent I requested to sub out California roll for gyoza without complaint, the food came quickly and while me and my mom were waiting outside they knocked I the window to let us know our food was ready and our server was very friendly!

The atmosphere was very relaxing with some down tempo music on the speakers, they sat us in a private booth that has privacy screens as well as a call button if you need your server.

The food was amazing everything came out perfect! The ton katsu was perfectly fried with an amazing sauce, miso was very flavourful gyoza was soft with a light crunch and we were also served edamame beans while we waited!

Overall 10 out of 10 would come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlmkSgst8RwvELizvL8FHvYe1pvb8Ci4SCm6lD&fid=0x0:0xe0d71cbaf9d27022"],"When":"2023-3-24"},{"Name":"Sandra Braga Davidson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVb0zhic3XQWJsDL0A4TJ6SQOyjsvK6E15aalppaOgkYRYZH2K2xQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delicious and super fast!
They carry Sapporo and it is such a nice place to have a conversation over dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMn8k6VnC7OnXeOUbCwMeePrmA5y7CznxtBPkpA&fid=0x0:0xe0d71cbaf9d27022"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Ivan Shtogrin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIzruMKsCEkLCnMQsS432l4LIrEOtMBbfRB-uT4sGio_bZ0O7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly staff.  Tasty food.  I really liked that you can sit in the cabin and eat.  At the same time, no one will miss you to communicate and eat.  In the cabin there is a bell when you need to call the waiter, which is very convenient.  Small price list.  We were very pleased and we will definitely return to this restaurant.  And we advise everyone to try their food.  Thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5ZpqiUubUxjXussxIXC1eyrxFbNhsqRt_Qg2W&fid=0x0:0xe0d71cbaf9d27022"],"When":"2021-7-21"},{"Name":"Gabriela Rossi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIk07NnPKE6IVgf1sbhh7dmKHLW2dA2a6Wz50WdRnHnHL5Wig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"As soon as we arrived they put us at a table and left the menu, they took a long time to come back and pick up the orders. They left a little plastic pot for the shoyu and the chopsticks, nothing else. They didn't serve water or ask what we would like to drink. I asked if they had water or tea and the attendant said yes and never came back. Another attendant showed up to serve a dish that arrived well after and I asked again about the water, she said she was going to check because they were out of glass. A long time later, we had already finished eating, the water appeared. They don't serve small plates for sharing. The food in general was ok, nothing too much. But the service didn't deserve even 1 star.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Renata Steele Vancouver / Kelowna area (Realtor Vancouver BC)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY5AYokNodhccb7bLk1A7kSxqiXee9yFcQzGTeTsQYbtPKFk2s-rk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Centrally located in Langley. I was happy to have been greeted as soon as I walked in. There is a great selection of sushi and wide variety of choices on their lunch menu. Miso soup is included in their combo. The reason I took off 1 star is because I asked for the 2nd and 3rd order to be ready in 15 minutes when my guests arrived and they brought it in minutes also I was not offered a tea refill and had to wait to ask them for it and for water. I look forward to coming back here in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZ-IionevXxSHq1hK69jd35Pf-6XedsbP1m6MV&fid=0x0:0xe0d71cbaf9d27022"],"When":"2023-5-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gal Dekel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUudcL3hPs5CYLhr5LqDYmFQ7ZypfmQbMrznr4CLXwJsCGp4EfL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The service was okay… nice people.
I think our experience was a 3 but this place could get to a 4 on another day. We had margarita pizza and the Juliet pizza. Both were good and the dough had a great crunch. The best part was the crispness of the crust. I think maybe just needs more flavour
Also atmosphere is nice and spacious, not too many people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJI1hyHJQ-W8dMhBH4o7b_6WxXDot7tGjkY26H&fid=0x0:0xe9ca684b5a900ad7"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Suneesha Arora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwxbIwT5IzXjj2ZfjAGFJU3Ji8UBgaH_jGWWsxdMkV-kDpSkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We have been there twice. Both times were pretty good. The first time was better. This time, the girl waiting on our table was a bit slow, but the food was amazing. Kids had a lot of fun","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLzJVAonKE9iOx4qfjxbYV3a_x6vGdqO6-rIRY&fid=0x0:0xe9ca684b5a900ad7"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Michelle Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2FVGSlFFnT4DTUmJ1_d9RmQclA7X9RJV9xRw03otVVcjs9uJP8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had not been there for many years for I remembered the pizza tasting like cardboard and tasteless. We had a rehearsal dinner for our niece's wedding party and family with no expectations .   We had some appies and Caesar salad, and  several pizzas.   It was good overall.  The taste of the pizza sure has improved.  I liked the smoked salmon one the best.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Olga Konstantinova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUH6KLgE1n1y3NPHXNNaUiczCbhF9S84Y385nZyTNmru5sT2Gk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to that location for the first time today. Staff were just amazing! So friendly and courteous and very attentive. My friend and I had a classic simple pizza and honestly this was the best pizza I've had in years! Can't believe it took me so long to give this place a try. I don't know what their secret is but the crust is thin and crispy, lots of cheese, and delicious sauce with basil. Yumm! Definitely coming back. We felt very cared for and welcomed!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leon Hong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6-KMw0P9pLdadDaXXdIupuy-a2gxL42t1TPJHI7r89HYZt3_3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here based off the Google reviews and wasn’t disappointed. Thin crust pizza acts as a great carrier for perfectly toasted toppings. Lots of options on the menu for both the meat lovers and vegetarians. Perfect place for families and friends, would definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPq8x2OUuoVaOsz7mjbsZ90KBPKZwZeqYom0v0w&fid=0x0:0xe9ca684b5a900ad7"],"When":"2023-4-2"},{"Name":"Dan Clunn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYf-u9opSoLeYYWWfM7aycSDzLyoSLymzFJjabdbUFJ9EQZIpLWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For years, my friends have been telling me to check this place out and I finally did!

Went on a Wednesday night. It was quiet but had a great atmosphere.

Had the pesto chicken pizza and it was delicious! Very filling and had some left over to take home.

Server (sorry can't remember the name but she had a septum piercing!) was attentive and very friendly.

Overall, great experience, and I'll be back again for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBnwLPPHa--plinacaNc8JPnR8JqzEgvGZfYNF&fid=0x0:0xe9ca684b5a900ad7"],"When":"2023-9-21"},{"Name":"Manie Randhawa (Manie)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4I6oHsIGvirVrYsWWRSF7sua7bht2B5PgwM4Up3ev0g3EE_oW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I would always wonder that how could an American pizza parlour sustain in Canadian market for such a long time ?? N I got my answer on my last visit to this amazing diner aka pizza parlour
I leave the task of digging into this place history to you guys and I am going to stick to my review of the place- So , the interiors and seating is very old style classic look. But the food is mind blowing. I mean the variety of pizza choices are mind boggling then there is garlic bread, nachos and wings along with sandwich and panini choice. Good amount of salad comes as a side and our vegetarian cheese panini was so soft and delicious. The bread is fresh prepared in the restaurant every day. Similarly pizza had the most thinnest and softest crust I had and that too made out of wheat.. so yummy but little bit expensive then the regular pizza place as it’s unique and freshly prepared. I m going again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObCBzKSzCRvEhFxlyxVVcTFiJvqnZW2zLViNez&fid=0x0:0xe9ca684b5a900ad7"],"When":"2023-1-23"},{"Name":"Noel de Villa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMDdEnO33EyYYYeZo_2ZfVwQtS-GcfpJ-ETGfvUvuXf7dIX24x=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best pizza in Surrey! Nice big place and attentive, friendly service. Red truck lager was refreshing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmnMDTglwHnaYgDV9KCYyQMzjWr1EZBQKhdu0&fid=0x0:0xe9ca684b5a900ad7"],"When":"2023-10-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Justin J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9qB0BPnH-SxgmMKD9knqz657T2834b2TJgDxXzOsqhmSY7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Our family came here for a birthday brunch, and we had a great experience. Our waiter was nice, friendly, and very patient with our group. The ambiance and environment were enjoyable, and the food, while deceptively filling, tasted great. Parking can be hectic—you’ll be lucky to find a spot close by. We highly recommend making a reservation, as there’s always a wait if you drop in without one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOa4uoPonS9TSsIolAhXEXhTkGrSvHgRuj5bW6K&fid=0x0:0xed138cbb6edda763"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Kuma Hettiarachchi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSmJYYcIaL5IyWFqSx2r32b36Wa0t2dSBlFY4nx237uNMhNI21=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Happy hour options were great and had the pleasure of being served by Imelda, and I must say, her professionalism and clarity were truly impressive. From the moment she greeted us.

Overall, Imelda provided an outstanding dining experience, combining exceptional service with a deep knowledge of the menu.

Thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhC-tvzycEX9xtEwRUM8hpwQb3ZRxo7yR5VPtA&fid=0x0:0xed138cbb6edda763"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Rachael Susman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPoMtlBFwD-2vPTOE73pyX7mXXMT1R0OArtKsfrdk0kZSo9Zzk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time at a Cactus Club Cafe and I will say, I’ll be recommending this place to anyone and everyone in the future. Everything was amazing from the food all the way down to the service. I had ordered the Filet and Lobster and it was the most delicious meal I could have ever eaten. The steak was so tender and the lobster had so much flavour.. even the side dishes of mashed potatoes and vegetables were delicious. We also got the Salmon sushi which was to die for. If you’re a sushi lover, you need to have this at least once. I also got the Riesling to drink which was Devine. It was a 10/10 experience and I cannot wait to go again. The staff were so kind and the atmosphere was so mellow and relaxing. I love it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiJgGXhjDAwawpt_SpPz93QbqLgL2A-nhUhexL&fid=0x0:0xed138cbb6edda763"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Jordan Blaker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_iD6bb17qljNA2aSFr9JfMC0Jg6j51TZ3bv9L9X_-KFOAVyjatg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Every time I have come here I have had a good experience up until last night. I went out with a few friends for some drinks and appetizers (Monday night at 9pm) and I was very disappointed by our service. The waitress took 20 minutes to bring us out our waters after we had to ask for them. We then asked for a second round of drinks and that took another 15-20 minutes to get. We were sitting close to the bar, and I could see that no one was making any drinks so I was confused as to what took so long. When we asked for the bill it took 10 minutes for her to bring it over and then another 15 minutes to come back with a machine. I normally don’t write bad reviews, but after my friend told me that they had had bad service last time she was there I knew I had to write something.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLVozWgSusR7by9oI5UaXw4Vb3ZVGQCnPDJZOm&fid=0x0:0xed138cbb6edda763"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Gen X Surrey Girl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnz98iwXPE1DskfLpfNg-zDV5mDy1tGmvmbNcHWdRqf6q4OTmNvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was amazing. The service was great. We went on a Thursday at 1:00 p.m. and didn't have reservations. We didn't have to wait long but the place looked pretty busy. I'd recommend reservations especially if you want to sit on the patio which looked beautiful.

The restaurant was very clean and upscale. The food was absolutely delicious. The bathroom stalls each have their own TV screen which made me laugh.

The bill came to $100 for a dinner for two. I had the $7 virgin mojito which was incredibly tasty.  And the spaghetti Portofino which had lobster and prawns. It was so good. I don't know how they make their food so delicious.

My husband had peppercorn steak with mashed potatoes and tea. He had the same comment as me, how do they make it taste so good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbFwjzNfWR6rvVUYuXjLbzMXkOzUXHQH7sMq0j&fid=0x0:0xed138cbb6edda763"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Marah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZv-rntCF5PMmTfmsmUbR5NBXphhWKaYdnqzRJHvCSkrXX8E7t=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is always good and great customer service. The 6 layer cake got me it was delicious you need 2-4 people to finish it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQa3PaUi7wwl4SqzsICohXFieP9iJ9sPqktIQM&fid=0x0:0xed138cbb6edda763"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Karan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIW4OtQcfRznpkA6fmLZHSlpfaLSQUpx9i6S0sK3DkkYcdSq4GD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrific and terrible food. Ordered well done steak for my pregnant wife and received it completely rare and blood. It seems that restro doesn’t read instructions and cooks food blindly. It was worst steak of my life.🤮","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNi9J9IIXBGpUoSTcGGocuNvHktDIE0lACvKGF6&fid=0x0:0xed138cbb6edda763"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Food Hunter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDYW8h-L0vyiCuSqxeTOVKrpbponkRXNcLpA7VOH_xiPkHt-q4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is good but the service was phenomenal.. People was so friendly and nice.. Kaela and Elise were awsome.. they made our dining experience extra special.. will definitely recommend and come back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjJvD0OlZBVHyrF_jCxvyGGvvm6Q4624qAM540&fid=0x0:0xed138cbb6edda763"],"When":"2024-11-8"}]

title: Sammy J's Grill & Bar Langley

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Martin J.G.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbSIw1FXNvsnT_WlUVWipfCnxov_J2a6OwyhmUMSL7utWt7cXE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Took my wife and son to Sammy J for the first time.  The experience was less than desirable.  Lady was nice when ordering or drinks.  Took over 20 minutes to get our drinks.  Ordered the chicken strips for my son and steak frites for me and my wife.  Waited another 30 minutes for our food, which is normal with the restaurant pretty busy. Drinks were empty and had to wait another 20 minutes to her news drinks.  The chicken strips were so dry and burnt. The veggies coming with it were dry and old.  The steaks were over cooked, dry and full of nerves.  It was like eating a leather belt.  Fries were good. But it's an expensive meal when an establishment don't care what's coming out of their kitchen.   Had to go somewhere else to get food for our son and his food was un eatable.
First time and last time I go there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5riAg3MYX5rxbufQAUXGDZM9orWbP0LklfUyF&fid=0x0:0xa1108e3b4f7b55b1"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Oberzocker 511","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAll_xEvA1rSl2y5kAtyiFKT1nQyPWdM4tCkfsEovR82UWnHI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went there tonight for a dinner and must say it was a great experience. Plenty of space to sit, tidy, prompt and very friendly service.

Nice tasting cocktails and great tasting Gluten- free food, I could even try their Poutine as it was delicious and Gluten- free. They have a decent Gluten- free/ and Vegetarian Menu there too.
Prices are good and quality matches the price.

Thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFLUEqYHYpRyCEnRPDp8L4O9C_Ec4-P-482M_a&fid=0x0:0xa1108e3b4f7b55b1"],"When":"2024-5-7"},{"Name":"Melody","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkveKXjhaflgRPGIPH62kWxkhDuVGqd6ylk7RJl2vdL7VHtoyn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"January 1, 2024 2 people.
Quiet and cozy, lots of window seating, has heated closed in deck seating, clean establishment, food is hot and delicious, plenty on the plate. Burgers plates are around $18, Breakfast $17, Chicken plates $21. Employees are young but attentive. Has a separate large bar area with seating. Handicap bathroom toilet seat dangerously loose and needs to be tightened. Large bathroom 9/10 for cleanliness. I do recommend this location. 5 Stars","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPApiMHu3KgFIIdyPUBLBuIukbyT2ahr-6bgFc&fid=0x0:0xa1108e3b4f7b55b1"],"When":"2024-1-1"},{"Name":"J T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhlRzWDXzdsN5IEg7ILK_EQ56zA9jcQ-fPPr3cS5cgV1YVlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Sammy on the drier side…

It has been awhile since I last been to any Sammy’s and this was the first time visiting this location.

This place is located across from Willbrook Mall in Langley. There are parkings available  in the plaza parking lot. Inside is a bar section to the left and a dining section with  booth seats and tables to the right.

Here were the food I ordered after scanning through the menu;

1. Original Caesar drink. It was okay, needed to be drunk before I say it’s good.
2. Cream of tomato soup. It was hot, rich and creamy. It’s one of those you either like it or hate it, but I personally find it a bit too paste like almost like pasta sauce.
3. Wings and drumettes. It was on the small drier side with a southern hot sauce.
4. Panang curry mussels. The sauce was okay but the mussels meats were a bit overcooked and small. Felt like another one of those frozen prepackaged ones.
5. Mini cheeseburgers. The patties were pretty dry.
6. Coastal salmon. That’s one thing about sockeye salmon, once overcooked it will be dry and powdery, needed some mastery skill to get this dish done right.
7. Cajun chicken linguini. The sauce was okay but the linguini was a bit undercooked.

Overall, the atmosphere was casual but the noises projected from the bar section were quite loud.
The service was okay and pretty straightforward from the staffs, tho could be a bit more attentive.
As for the food, more of an old school pub style and a little on the drier side. Not good enough for me to travel a distant for.

A 2 star experience…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzQg-8T8Cn5azLNX7LQrUi22qjoZsfFN-yJXtM&fid=0x0:0xa1108e3b4f7b55b1"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"Kiky Kiks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgIvVxxSYrbvp4RuGlQoIF1h8IVgflOoKH0hZNsG2lqQIRbhkfUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a really good experience, saw this place so many times, but didn't pay much attention to it, so finally decided to give it a try because I was craving mussels. We got there and surprisingly it was happy hour (they have happy hour every day 🎉), lots of seating, got seated right away, the server was nice, and sevice was fast. The restaurant is clean, food is good, portion size is good (tacos were kinda small with no side, but good), mussels were great. Will definitely come back 😊","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bobbi Borys","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVcGA21I8ksYJFNDaU6nUNZED52a53WcOe0HWQHHSgH3u-Gta0Dw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Staff were friendly and efficient. Food was great. Atmosphere is welcoming and cozy. TV’s throughout the bar for watching sports. Reasonable parking options for smaller vehicles but not necessarily if you have a big truck. Accessible parking and entrance available. The bar has mostly stools for seating at tables and a few booths.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"x","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhmJKDr7DJ4CGvY4IhEGbbWGqO-ap4CiO1rDd-9zbUBZo3Dg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always a solid happy hour here. Food is consistent and the service is excellent. Fave thing has to be the mango habanero wings! They never disappoint! Great outdoor patio for the summer and nice and cozy indoors for the rest of the cold seasons!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tommy Byun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQhlW94B8T2fhww-HWh0iFh-RYIvFitfF4mjJX2E5t_heAv3Lb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Average family restaurant with spacious seatings & booths. Staff was friendly, but the food can be hit & miss. Linguini was too saucy, but the buddha bowl was delicious.

I would recommend this place for a bigger group!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv5cage5PwQpYvumF7wY1yDCEcF16t3nYej_39&fid=0x0:0xa1108e3b4f7b55b1"],"When":"2023-9-27"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kevin Fergusin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGFARUIwpKmpNmVXVmqd9T6Q3ptiD7veE8Scs7dppCUxjQWz-z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thx buttery chicken pizza is soo good it taste authentic Indian food on pizza . I was hoping it was too good . Taco beef has more spice than expected! I'm extremely surprised and glad this will be my new pizza place can't wait to try the pizza slid outs. Great deal for a huge selection of special pizzas. Thanks to the Staff","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUlEy1SI4nBBqoYciiIz3s6-bISlO4my0MgLMQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x206ef4aa0bb7554f"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Kyla McCulloch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4gca3a4je7jHNkfYZtOKrjtWOTTo2YLaEjbW4k8fp3G_xerJ2Kw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were helping  someone move and I just saw this place so I got the two med three topping pizza deal . Came out to about $23 with tax. The girl at the counter was very nice. When i got back to the apartment we were so hungry I said I don't know if it's just really good pizza or if I'm just really hungry. My child said it's both. But this morning getting ready to drive back to Ontario and eating cold pizza for breakfast, I can honestly say it's really good pizza.🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕. I give it a five slice rating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDfTSYBBMVzvjKWQS5J3HJGimhUzGFec_W8W6-\u0026fid=0x0:0x206ef4aa0bb7554f"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Yashleen Chhoker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6HO7fpinefAl9owVBXCqUJ8y6e8kzAdGY_QST0BHvpIhc4A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here with my family and had a great experience here. The service is amazing and the food here tastes superb, also the staff is very cheerful with the customers. The christmas vibes and decorations were great, liked the place a lot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSoY3Ge7CnsYOZ-vjdx6Ot1OvuKWSCx6176FAq\u0026fid=0x0:0x206ef4aa0bb7554f"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Sandra Guay Bennett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJbGCuUJYmo2VN0Qw6wjNLfgxDBVDQW6V8vaIW5Nuh8N3_WBGO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just tried their gluten free veggie pizza today and it was actually really good!! I never get my hopes up when it comes to gluten free but I was pleasantly surprised. I'll definitely order again!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bunana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4ddJ5_63nc2rd14npI2ffcGD50ysQ4MnzfQNq96bQYTYqmMkx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pizza is super yummy here, favorite to get is the mozzarella,  tomato sauce, cheddar, bacon, BBQ sauce drizzle. Jasmine in the front is super nice and always cooks the pizzas perfectly, would recommend :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAsG6vq_jnuwAY-v7ce0vb5bb3vbam9BzWhGTw\u0026fid=0x0:0x206ef4aa0bb7554f"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Sam Gunit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLi6oH4BD26VeCHItNz95xFJhdGKfMeFeqW7CfZx9yKEQc5Rg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So good! The crust is so yummy not too greasy just perfect and they have the good type of pepperoni, the small kind that goes on top of the cheese not under.  Dominos used to be my go to, it tasted good and it was cheap, but HellCrust is SO much better and a better price! I always get a medium three topping take out pizza for 9.99 and that’s the normal price, not a coupon price. The girls who work here are always very nice too, top notch service! My new favorite pizza!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtrOohWaHxjPsV02cpD5n_5PI1r0zUUuo0Fi5Y\u0026fid=0x0:0x206ef4aa0bb7554f"],"When":"2023-11-11"},{"Name":"Полина Старостина","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSIfB2TuiQtzcxuN83X9_ajmz19loQ9ekBYw1LKBbtIV_t7QQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hellcrust pizza is really nice place! I like to have lunch here, atmosphere is so good. At my time there is usually not busy, so I can calmy enjoy my pizza and take a breath.\nPersonal is really good and friendly 🙌 No one rush you when you choosing what to order! And I usually use Uber eats for pickup my pizza, they make it always in time⌚ Pizza...Oh this pizza is one of the best pizza in the world (trust me, even Italian pizza not so good...) They also have more things in menu and I think it should be good too~\nSo I definitely recommend this place! Go and get a mood booster even in saddest day🍀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO97tnPtS6-xM8Ou8vVuHyMcVBLSFAjd1ZHsZY\u0026fid=0x0:0x206ef4aa0bb7554f"],"When":"2023-8-30"},{"Name":"Randy Rennes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvDo0XaZOQgWh2HXERPFz3rUz8xVyyWiSJhwiCm9TkTJW3GA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a x-large pepperoni pizza that wasn't on sale day and it was the worst looking and tasting pizza I've ever had. I could see the dough under the cheese and what few pepperoni pieces there were. And it was only $22. Should have ordered from a REAL pizza place 🤢","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nutter Butter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4bQmphmJ7AwOSl6TTncB5zHAMUhdRclRrmN9jhN5uhjNatFw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Brought my family here for thanksgiving brunch. I haven’t heard of this restaurant before so it was a new experience! Amazing delicious seafood, lamb, turkey and a large variety of dishes and desserts. For the price we really enjoyed our time. Drinks are not included, coffee and tea is $2.50 but refillable.

Place is old and under-maintained but I’m reviewing on the food. If you’re looking for an aesthetically pleasing venue this is not the one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP73snwFGmv1HYEI5WmvK0y7jF7AN7mqvr1K1DE&fid=0x0:0x821217911c94e822"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Geraldine Sangalang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcAsqfNVs6uRfmsJ5FtsU66GdsPGBE4zo_tn8DnG79e7VADqel9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Bright and lovely space for brunch. This was our first time visiting.

We brought family visiting from out of town following a recommendation from a family friend. I understand why she likes it here. The decor was quite dated, but clean. Staff was kind and welcoming. There's a nostalgic vibe.

This is a great space for a crowd. There was quite a lot of seating available.

The food was ok. Impressive selection for a weekday. I'd return to share the ambiance with someone looking to experience it. The food selection was what you'd hope to find. There were savory and sweet options for everyone, including accommodations for allergies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJia1sv3x41eH5PVyUmmHEUAAEcQGAxlGz5xyv&fid=0x0:0x821217911c94e822"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Stacey Kirby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPb28pTFySN3BgYZ502Z9f4g8Iv8yEU9CURvlvXDolbMg-zg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Staff here are fantastic and the atmosphere is warm and welcoming. Busy , bustling place to enjoy a buffet .All the other guests appear to be having a great time. The buffet stayed full with a decent selection. The food was average not overly spectacular but worth the price.. I would come again because they offer evening options","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqXwt7Bf60ioBt7LJeFjW2cd9TLQf7rNzVHLn8&fid=0x0:0x821217911c94e822"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Mike Lapenna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFIvBa0AGMBL5-B8OS4f3WOp-gipDoffwdpfbukNi-vL6h9rwvJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Massive buffet.  Room for hundreds. Was going to give a 5 but sometimes the food ran out and it took a few minutes to get a new tray in.  And it was about 75% full.  Imagen the crush when it is 100%?  Did selection was pretty good.  Maybe the desserts could have been more varied.  Otherwise the woman taking care of my table was excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8LJ8Ff2ifDb6_OGSRIAkTdUlez3bR2bBACuJw&fid=0x0:0x821217911c94e822"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"Angelina Maslova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmqYcdzB5962vLwTMFtfGG9VjqWGEK-RLXMK_rMVqocvzhuw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My mom and I have been regulars at this buffet restaurant for a couple of years now, and we are still always impressed with food and service. Despite some negative reviews and experiences others might have had, we absolutely love this place. The staff is friendly and attentive, making you feel right at home from the start. They know what we like, from our preferred table to our favorite drinks (Mimosa and Moscow mule 😁).
The chefs here are the best! They consistently deliver delicious food, with a wide variety of dishes to choose from. There's always something new and tasty to try, which keeps every visit exciting. The quality and freshness of the ingredients are top-notch, and the atmosphere is warm and inviting. I highly recommend this restaurant for a delightful dining experience!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joel Caldeira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiIllfU4OEaywL8MS3DlkygK6oNzJGcJwR3CFd1DFfL3KLTOZkWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent Buffet with a selection of 3-4 meat dishes, salad and soup counter and dessert section. Went in for lunch on a Saturday and as of Nov 2024, it's around $22 for adults and kids under 12 is $15. Wonderful service by Nadja and the view facing the golf course is beautiful!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWxwSkzgA7oZNX40KR8oHzaW0WpcBvtKHvv8A3&fid=0x0:0x821217911c94e822"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Esther W.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZ44_CjQ6-wehLPc33Ng17kPOWOSFrXqo3jg5WgP7CtwNUYUeR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A bit dated with chairs and furniture.
Service is ok, asked for condiments and they never came back with it.
Food average. Potatoes undercooked and shrimp over cooked.
Price is ok","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSAHxABA7eqCQ7W-KqujkOxy79StWuR6uYxyxq&fid=0x0:0x821217911c94e822"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The place is beautiful and reminiscent of the glory of the 1990s and early 2000s. The buffet is pretty good. Their salmon was great and their Yorkshire pudding was on point. The roast beef was kinda dry and well done though as you can see in the pictures. The selection for the price is very reasonable and it’s a buffet so you can eat all you want. Very nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQPLURT4rjESopnInc44b2qEr9fwnUUl8Ipg9t&fid=0x0:0x821217911c94e822"],"When":"2023-6-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Debbie Tuit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUl1QRhiGTE0pawpm2Mt3BIssODHhrthbrxd62Ea1dwXPs0h0E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had such a wonderful dining experience today at the Match Eatery in Langley.   Maddy, was an exceptional server.  Sweet.  And friendly.  The food was really really good today.  1/2 price wine during happy hour was bonus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcre6yNEiuAoVX_vcWF_akOt1CvJGcVpwDllhp&fid=0x0:0xf1a600718ca0db9"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Kara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2RJAU9Ey6KrgoN0yjXNLbzTVWt--atIW-NoVOtJPdfkEZYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried out some new game day wings tonight after a great recommendation from our server Brie and we were pleasantly surprised. The Nashville wings were good but the Rising Sun wings were the real standout! Service was quick and friendly, the drinks were cold and the food was delish - all in all a great night. Thanks Brie!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOR8SeHHnnoV0t4g6s15gBuu_oIBVQJhA-GzfxW&fid=0x0:0xf1a600718ca0db9"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"MG_FXV","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiigFyUNoiwP5bHSXlNRrOpnatj6VSziAvS6zd1X48n-qBzP4n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to eat. Bottomless drinks. Went during happy hour and didn't disappoint. We ordered fries, nachos, tacos and burger sliders. We had a great person catering our needs. Friendly staff and I love the individual bathroom. We would definitely eat here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOI6jCh97dC7REXYWWHE0yXR8kdZHJTyYBOxORF&fid=0x0:0xf1a600718ca0db9"],"When":"2021-9-9"},{"Name":"Daniel Schmitt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLOzsYV6DBSAoeEyNct7Y3fw_y_lnOMmh5h-We9se2jMTj7MkL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The staff was friendly and the food is great I recommend the baby back ribs and the blackjack burger. And the barbecue chicken pizza 🍕.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8cG3UL4oS1sNwIruZ6o44C_Ce6vurst9XO-Wk&fid=0x0:0xf1a600718ca0db9"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Brady Yurik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICVVUH9sup9wD8SzLzSse2xCtFmsFEH57o9wufUhNDg3JlAA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have come here to eat and have a few cocktails many times so I thought it was time to finally write a quick review . The food is always consistently great, everyone is very friendly and accommodating. Also has the best bathrooms I’ve seen in a restaurant. Aryz was my server today and  we never had to wait for anything. I’ve had him a few times before and I can’t say enough good things . Drink never got empty and always checks in to see if you need anything .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eternal Senshi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTRrG77sAyC2Zc9gMBDh6QXUjLx_NMhahkW8Uy7mBoHFH37GK7PA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like to come here often because the food is very decently priced and the service is always friendly. They have several various events that go on during game days and such.

Our server this time around was a gem named Aryz and he was a blast. He was absolutely courteous, friendly, and caring. He made our experience so much better than the usual great service.

I highly recommend coming here and sitting in the outdoor heated area. It can be a more quiet and intimate experience. And if Aryz is around, say hello to him!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Howie Y.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXD4mFYNLrhmouUG8HDSxtKZr3rHrib8bLXPruDpfwlU6cD46WXcw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing service and amazing food. I went there during super bowl and I have to say, the manager, the servers, the hostess went above and beyond. The food tasted fresh and was really well made. Definitely check out this location - it is both spacious and definitely meet the vibe check!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNksDQ7_56QixhKP6KlCQMkX-TpzFXUBugkQ6P3&fid=0x0:0xf1a600718ca0db9"],"When":"2023-2-13"},{"Name":"Jess Yarko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBC-DIRtE4Qc09jaYl-RH_WQcAMSfXlzG2Mzv4NWqBxFr63DB-tg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went here late night Saturday for a birthday treat. Waited about 1 hour for a table which was a little disheartening so went into the Casino to pass time. The dining area was super busy and loud. The food was absolutely delicious only issue was that I wanted my steak a bit more well done. Our server was nice and food was served roughly 25minutes after we ordered.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1L4KYx1_hY_Vlw1_N20gTDYVHS4TUeCmcZ1Yc&fid=0x0:0xf1a600718ca0db9"],"When":"2019-4-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Happy Hobbits","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoVSyRTBWzOhwutkjaRPhGDbFDYLAlTdso8ILDATwQgXeAw6M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A unique location for a restaurant of this nature. On arrival it was surprisingly busy. Initial service required some prompting to get some water and took some time before the order was taken. The Virgin Caesar was mundane, and only 1 option for non-alcoholic beer choice which seems very limited. Once ordered the food came quickly. The calamari as an appetiser was quite good, the roast lamb was tender, tasty and well received with appropriate sides of green salad, rice and potatoes. The Greek salad dressing was very good. The Lamb Souvlaki was average. Finished the meal with a Chocolate Ice Cream sundae that could have used more whipped cream. The live piano music was entertaining. Overall, an excellent night out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkWw-EcsckVETUk4OMAQf9wcaCvanKbfR35jEt&fid=0x0:0x6a0f8af7795713ec"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"clark clark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3kMkSp6zIIdXN_93bZqDEA94CrfRkmXwNB7FzKR4LsL556sCH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything is brilliant.
If I give you a tip for the lunch, plz ask for Schnitzel as 'Dinner Size'.
If you order it as a lunch Size, you won't see any vegi on your plate.

Otherwise, 5+ stars as well~","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnhYb0Ne5lfBPeMhE1SiQGaq8RwfyHh6VbzXzo&fid=0x0:0x6a0f8af7795713ec"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Aida Cowdy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYOSMyUOPMwT4wqDue1PDS2-0KlV4tjaFl0JOj2dSBgi8VQ6U8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s our first time to visit. The food was great! My husband had the schnitzel and I had the specials. Although the meat(steak) is a bit fatty; but overall it was a great meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3vyuebvgmkGdgXRTihy6ki37PVrIIFQwYntBA&fid=0x0:0x6a0f8af7795713ec"],"When":"2024-4-6"},{"Name":"Grant Phillips","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPVZjzTgRdA5uoLvVKg-CsCX0iXRgVZ445oLaupTWQZfw4R7aZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food, great location, good value. Comfortable seating, interesting menu, everything I've tried was delicious. Staff are cheerful and friendly. Very helpful to an old geezer. Families are there with kids. No loud music!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lewis Mood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI9-ctSfMHMyCKHO78910Rv3nF-Ed741100dRAeSxMof29eIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food was OK and arrived promptly, we found the restaurant to be too dark and quite cold, certainly not inviting. It annoyed us that there was no barrier other than a curtain between the dining room and kitchen, as we had to listen to the raucous banter of the kitchen staff and the sound of meat being pounded the entire time we were there. They were unprofessionally loud and regularly dropped f-bombs. Our 2&4 year old , who were with us, were much better behaved than the carnival side show that seemed to be taking place in the kitchen. I'd expect much better in light of the $40 we were paying for entrees. We won't be back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R CHAPMAN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJp7yDTmDcpkKb5Q8eCRFiAkvEprLEjeg1Az3tEpfNDaNF0-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I had heard nothing but good things about this restaurant - I guess I must have been listening to about another establishment.

First - I changed tables twice to get away from the noise of the kitchen. The restaurant had nice piped in music - the kitchen was playing R & R and the staff was singing to it.  (Really - you can't come up with a better division of kitchen/dining area).

Second - Even after changing table the acoustics were disappointing.  I couldn't hear my guest most of the time.  They had a baby grand in one corner and I hear that they have live music on Friday nights (god help anyone that visited this place then)

Staff - Yes they were understaffed and our waitress did the best she could given the number of patrons in the restaurant on that night.  Can't fault her for that's on management.

Food - I had a traditional Greek Dish and it was fine BUT I am glad that I had the Greek Salad in a separate bowl cause my whole plate would have been swimming in oil if it hadn't.  Why did they have a soak the cukes, tomatoes, etc in a vat of olive oil and then dump it on the plates.  ???? Oh I know - no culinary class

AND THEN THERE WAS THE DESERT - I ordered the New York Cheese Cake.  BEWARE they don't make the deserts they serve and they have no idea what goes into them. ATTENTION STAFF - It is called a ingredient list and I am sure your supplier would give you one if you asked.  I am sure I tasted coconut in the crust of the Cheese Cake (the waitress couldn't confirm) and by the way I was sick to my stomach the next day I am sure that there was coconut in the crust.

So no I won't be going back to there.  And good luck to anyone who walks through there front door","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ken","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0ghF60f0AHkdMsmksZ3q7ScyjYWd1IQvAbNuPKzvoIfPHU7A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"27 Classmates from the Sir Charles Tupper Class of ‘71 met at Adrian’s last Saturday, Sept 16, 2023 for a group 70th birthday.

It was a virtual perfect night and setting for old friends and acquaintances to get together.

They set our group up on the second floor so we could make noise and visit each other at will.

Our server, Bella was outstanding - Bella is actually a 10+.  Due to the size of our group, we were offered 3 different entrees to pick from - Schnitzel, lasagna or Souvlaki with a Caesar salad starter as well as dessert and coffee for a reasonable price.

Thanks for a fantastic night - we will be back!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaJnz1IUXkUZbG0Y_h7urlgCtJrTHsIA6Lc8Uy&fid=0x0:0x6a0f8af7795713ec"],"When":"2023-9-23"},{"Name":"Adette Balot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwGX2Ljjm03h2iaOHeJA0peR8s3wviRjr9IR8JHZWk73D31okDgw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good food and big serving, we order the mixed greek platter which is good for 2-3people.
Cleanliness of the restaurant and good atmosphere,and affordable.
The service is excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQgEANAWrGILlGeexBcHzQCG-inFy0LXg2zzVG&fid=0x0:0x6a0f8af7795713ec"],"When":"2023-9-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tennesee Fafard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtAhgb8ZBk8R8mwqhdaWybrAgGBNZLgKzw5jzuPfTzk12GuWKbjw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was amazing! I’m very impressed with the quick and quality service but more impressed with the quantity of drink! They had tons of different Mnt dews and Arizona’s. The food was also extremely delicious. Good place to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3iIWOOoWfjlbrwWlPV4AoL_TyEUFMieMkeXrw&fid=0x0:0xeaa5b6e396981615"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Shahrukh Islam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocITgqgO0djSb_HSRBnLIwds0Zd-4BnA3WDUtW2lud3kYZBNaXY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food tastes great ! Servers are great and welcoming. However, perhaps this store has changed how they cut their meat in the recent months because the meat slices for beef and lamb are now the paper thin slices like German donair style kebabs. Because of the quantity received in terms of meat by weight is quite a bit different than some other stores or like this one before but more aligned to German style donair places. But the food still tastes great !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"N Prasad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqG1vB0EkjrfhX571hMLSRtKiSPHm51yK-oGL_xujLvLRGsAf2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A local gem for quick and tasty donair. Their wraps were fresh, delicious, and great value for what you pay for. They also have plenty of sides to complete the meal. I'd never noticed this place from how tucked away it was, but it was definitely worth it for take out. The staff member was friendly and quick, the restaurant was small but clean.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S Bansal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1TZbIDK9B79onJjhHBxnn6sya3bvuXFA5FESWwEchs0hPrCwRoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried for the first time and had a pretty decent taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8QvI3dCMhbCvG5PaPNmBPGzwid-TJ-UZ0-qRs&fid=0x0:0xeaa5b6e396981615"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"bear36chambrz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4Zx_VVWBlOSvSfpabHZS9xdcePwYogtQyiCqfcEHl5Jlqow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I didn’t realize it was in Langley when I ordered on uber eats so when it got to my place it was too warm but it was amazing I loved it Lebanese donair was so good I need to go there for sure and try it so good thank you","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michele F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDMx6n46qma1M05HLf0Rh8d1WOUD3NEo22c4UT5GhAHxY6Kg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love the butter chicken with rice and naan special on Wednesdays and Fridays. The sauce is so good! For a while they switched to brown meat, which had a lot of gristle, but I can confirm they've switched back to white meat.

Only other item we've tried is the rice platter, and while it's okay, it's nothing special. Meat and rice are quite dry despite the sauce, and nothing is really flavoursome. There are a number of other places that do it better, as far as we're concerned.

Parking can also be quite a challenge, especially when everyone goes to grab lunch during their break.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Thor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5xAvZiN8ssGDzQMOEOLiRye9_-kGUSZq54UEaj2QaI884qUZu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm happy with the place. ok portions, decent flavors. I would go back again. Honestly I was amazed how good the lamb was today. It's always nice to see them cut the meat from the cooker.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"KEVIN GAGNON","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXM9w-UEpyxXFYXWuoiPJZCa4dzbdZCoPcG9wBzjCIIChGic-lr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fairly small, tucked in a corner... but big on flavor! The combos are a great value, fresh ingredients, and seriously the best fries around. One of my regular places to go.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Aliyah Janzen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfQcapUfid0msuuOS1wIJTZaHTUCxc_YpuGm3QtG8MZi007dM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The butter chicken and samosas here are good, but when I tried the pizza for the first time it tasted alright, but I ended up in excruciating pain from food poisoning.
(UPDATE) tried again with Indian food, ordered online charged card $40, went to the store it was locked with no one inside and no one answering the phone. Extremely unprofessional.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley Lilley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1AVXG-09fpqwR7vrRVqlU_gVsakUeNhfUOQSZKiUeEEqdhw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have ordered the spaghetti and meatballs from here a few times now and every time it’s been amazing. There is always lots of cheese and sauce which we can’t get enough of and it’s always so hot and fresh. My daughter is an extremely picky eater so for her to tell me she’s love’s their spaghetti and that it’s the best reeeeally says something. It’s now our go-to when we are wanting a quick pasta night.

Thank you Camy’s Pizza!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dave","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKmFP4EfECAwa62KvjAlz3vB6KXvYvzyfLw5OQ5MLftSrOpbg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is great for some quick pizza slices. They have a good deal 3 slices and a pop for $7. Everytime I have been in here around noon they always have lots of pizza pre made. Pizza tastes good no complaints. Try the butter chicken lunch combo as well it's very good to. All employees who have served me have all been very nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIDG3hF8mtftN7KxHKHL7ZfYRs8e2qKBr1mROn&fid=0x0:0xc828948c644ed492"],"When":"2023-3-17"},{"Name":"HKJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJBW91mxv0efGkMIYzvJQ_YUcJ47SnBH_hj5AN2jcANNTCfLYM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered ravioli and cheese pizza it gave me diarrhea for days. I was puking and had the most horrible fever and pain. They dont use gloves and proper sanitizing methods as you can tell by glancing. Please go somewhere else","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kashmir Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ20FZkviqFBx9VpVYebB4Ld04MetS0XIb2DF8Txmsmq7lXbw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The girls working front very rude and very wrong tone. Do not know how to speak to people who know right and wrong. This is why Indian community is being ruined. Wrong tone girls who speak horrible to everyone. Please go kwatlen pizza or gate way. Nice staff family friendly !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"HARPREET Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7SkHflKukI9OZsEWifkT39sce3SWiJ0tuIzu3MM8c8-s1lA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had ordered Indian style veggie and garlic paneer pizza's.... These were very delicious 😋😋😋 I liked the way of serving and treating the customers..... So  really appreciated 👍👍😊😊😊","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M Prins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYWCMj9HZ6_2jMol4qrWBbE6l7uCmTatsMh6ch4jbiMYWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Quite an array of items on the menus... donair, Indian, pasta, and calzones. Our kids got pizza by the slice, but it had been in the display warmer quite a while. I enjoyed a huge, packed donair. My friend enjoyed a lamb donair and I had the chicken. Chicken was good but lamb was better! Only a few chairs available along some counters. Staff did their job satisfactorily.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMHkNa13vLXYxvHhlVKIfcwRNRF2sQj8594VM&fid=0x0:0xc828948c644ed492"],"When":"2020-11-6"},{"Name":"Manpreet Brar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmx3ourTJtOHt1d-pHiXPvx3dQAq4Wxvux0yWb4VX8gy_wNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great job guys i love your pizza that’s fantastic.
Great service with my favourite food😇😇","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Andrea Till","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkAM6v731ouSbWkJSGb72C7yjI8qfxRIAh4EPMK-wxLFoqUA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We stopped here and grabbed my husband a donair. Thankfully we didn’t pay too much for it. Because ummm…..where’s the meat!?? And the lettuce is brown! I definitely do not recommend this place to anyone. The girl inside had zero personality and the place is not very clean. There are lots of other places to go eat at near by. McDonald’s might be better then this place","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzi-kyRojyVfe6PRKClBulA5nEX6gNGtoD5qeZ&fid=0x0:0xd65da48001a0f20"],"When":"2024-2-4"},{"Name":"Mucahit Mert Alagoz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlZFzlr8OmJ6ReNSeqILjiXkPYOR-Wi6HlJhjaTTE_xGsRl7kohA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Although its name is "Istanbul donair," this restaurant has no relation to Turkish döner at all. It's not döner; it's something served in closed lavash. Not döner. Taste 3/5, service 4/5, atmosphere inside the venue 3/5. If you consider it as meat and salad wrapped in lavash, then it's edible. But if you're looking for Turkish döner, this is definitely not the place to go. Apart from that, everything is good.
Just like an Italian would start a fight if someone put ketchup on spaghetti in front of them, as a Turkish person, I feel like starting a fight when I receive this "döner"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrPo7qW1Lp_QW4qduOf0L8uyru3eQ6oslBPpYc&fid=0x0:0xd65da48001a0f20"],"When":"2024-2-13"},{"Name":"Ben Korman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5L2ACarH73g0VnzpPBLwXjZultIvoscPC2NJ-Pv_o3GjxfX2DAg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Don’t go here. Sketchy place

Lady was rude. Lamb was old, burnt and dry. Worst donair plate I’ve had

Baklava was stale and dry

An absolute disgrace to Mediterranean cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOweVCR1NIIuwNdebhhfQZr-eMcuGJyRmeGuW-Z&fid=0x0:0xd65da48001a0f20"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Kathy Cook","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZQTbqSANZv1SIZYpZMG3qHiN26EhHKI4MnyCufypfpYBSA1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve seen some bad reviews for this place but I’ve been twice and the food was fantastic, tasty and fresh.  I had the Greek plate and a chicken donair plate.  Both were delicious!  Service was good, and fast and prices are reasonable.  It’s a fast food restaurant not fine dining.  If I lived in the area I would go more often.  Don’t knock it until you try it:)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven Huhn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjPgKgZCO5PZiQnT0cs9yON3NEoowbu1SmDyHWquv1i9Z5rrCk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I remember liking this place when I first went and tonight my partner and I were disgusted by the lamb. So we drove back hoping to give them the benefit of the doubt and not leave a negative review but the chicken donair was just as bad and the service went from poor to worse and the girl showed a serious attitude so she left me choice but to leave this review. This was a Terrible place both for taste and for service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mamma Bear","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ0M6Qh60UoqRB7gBHhR76swtq_sn84713ssVCukopRv8obA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Service was terrible, took my kids here for lunch today. Ordered a Brazil salad and Donair. The Brazil salad had advacado on it which was so hard and not ripe, the dressing very bitter and tasted off.  Went back into the place to ask the employee for something different as the salad was terrible and was told "that is what we have, we can cut up another advacado".

Asked if they could give something else for my son to eat as it was not good at all, instead and she said "no' and was very rude.

Threw the salad out. Will never eat here again and will not recommend it to anyone. Poor food quality and poor costumer service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhJLA39GO5wSlJ2sweHrYoLVucggy6HzL2DOs4&fid=0x0:0xd65da48001a0f20"],"When":"2023-7-19"},{"Name":"Erfan Forghani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViQeUcI5jPldQOn-43NzHlzG69COV0b1geAjtP7crg6eEF6OD7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had the Turkish plate. The chicken was tender and well seasoned. The rice was cooked beautifully, but the dolma was still frozen!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpOEsCy2apVYZgziveSAR9T9J_VgAIFM-vUrVY&fid=0x0:0xd65da48001a0f20"],"When":"2022-11-15"},{"Name":"Austin F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUbk7FQhvLtKwjdS068ukXcfQMAnk-8eMfY9PBfdPtkoph0mM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Come here often due to living near by and it’s always good bang for your dollar. I order the Lebanese plate that comes with rice, chicken, hummus and tabuli.. I thoroughly enjoy it. The owner is great, clean place, really good chicken and some of the best hot sauce I’ve ever had! Also great homemade baklava .. I recommend this place, much better then donair affair.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzOnySbPSFtlUjXQKSsV5CAR6g3eP59G_WctYp&fid=0x0:0xd65da48001a0f20"],"When":"2020-1-3"}]

title: Flourishing
descriptions: Informal eatery with live-seafood tanks serving standard Cantonese & Sichuan dishes.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dwayne Guzak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJaeXUCsWogbI98tALSvw3TcJMEZkzXrvwQmAD2akhoRrCZiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered take out and we really enjoyed each dish except for one . ( out of 5) we thought the other dishes tasted fresh and full of flavour. We were not expecting it to taste so good , so we will come back again for the consistency…. The chow mein was the only dish I thought was a little blah","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSDhI6vk4OWxPUCMNxLQwk_EXPJqmsh6EfxTRk&fid=0x0:0x56363bbcb783c802"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"HELENA GON","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLktHfCx_rJjeaSRgRipTv2XhUqavkvlNeiKP82rVVcqR8bLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"If you’re looking for an authentic and satisfying Chinese dining experience, this restaurant may fall short of expectations. The dishes lacked the vibrant flavors typically found in quality Chinese cuisine, and some items were either over-seasoned or bland. The service, while polite, felt slow and inattentive at times, which detracted from the overall experience. While there are likely a few decent options on the menu, the meal as a whole didn't live up to the standard you’d hope for. It might be fine for a casual outing, but if you're after a memorable meal, there may be better options nearby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnZMK8nbqu8MSNjbvSDG0FEse3Dv4Y89ocln4E&fid=0x0:0x56363bbcb783c802"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Robert Sparling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRw2V8hJCQ-ifVs9Hb3UVn7BCeWt6c1t8x_mYc6UbKvVLKUqeC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This was the worst Chinese food we have ever had.  The sweet and sour pork was basically all fat and no meat and soaked in sauce.  The spare ribs were all bone and no taste it was gross 🤢.

I would never come back again and highly recommend people to stay away from this white washed so called Chinese restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPDGwwPWMSTcuJzumrOjDeyiB4-4HNtB-_tCgz&fid=0x0:0x56363bbcb783c802"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Alexander Hunt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKntg94WsHup3cVgJBk3yO0jaRf4K-ndL2T0xGy94s_gBQtie8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My family and I ate at this restaurant for dinner and we have to say that the food here was pretty good. Although I do not remember precisely the names of each dish, I believe we ordered a shrimp and vegetable dish, a ying Yang fried rice and a beef cooked in black bean sauce dish (please see the dishes below).

Overall, the food was cooked on top of a good stove with high heat and it seems like the chef at the back knew what they were doing. The food was steaming when it came out. The food was delicious, but portions were smaller than what I have previously seen in Vancouver. The atmosphere of the restaurant was nice. There is ample lighting in the restaurant. There were drawings and Chinese calligraphy on the wall which added to the anesthetics of the restaurant.

There was good customer service. The waitress was friendly and kind.

Parking is limited for the restaurant. However, there are lots of nearby food and places available which is good when you want to walk around first when you are waiting in line.
This restaurant has two separate washroom for people to use. The seating in the restaurant can take around 40-45 people. On the night we ate (around 7pm), there was not a lot of people. There are lots of options to choose from on the menu, and there are combos and sets available for a selection of food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYxt-oAhLV8QxnrwSN52IULb66rZZfBoX7X8Ig&fid=0x0:0x56363bbcb783c802"],"When":"2023-11-17"},{"Name":"Jackie Kasprick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5Cb0eLxi1Ypnowcn27aOB6PqTL9EpMyewprNKWoM2il6XY8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First time after hearing such good things about it.  Very busy but got a table for 5 fast
But…. One hour later after ordering we still had no food !!
Others coming after us had theirs
Simply because server said I asked for no sesame seeds sprinkled on top ???
We were starving and ready to walk out
Once food came it was very good.  Hot fresh and tasty
But no compensation for the extreme wait we had …","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Janine Darang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTcIfDh0jRj-gdPJHqWtXR9hp50ulYfihjcYrm6jxXailGuXM6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time eating at this Chinese restaurant and it didn’t disappoint. Food was good, big portions at a reasonable price. Will definitely come back here again and great customer service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBqvseWBJjZ-X4yESJ0wTQuc6GmUqeBC6H_C5l&fid=0x0:0x56363bbcb783c802"],"When":"2022-5-28"},{"Name":"Cynthya T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU14ob3DrporWGSE5XX-kSbqd7LKC4gTzGeQ90Iyb6c_uIt1rX94A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Came for Dim Sum.  SUPER SMALL selection, overly steamed, the rice-roll was hard and chewy as well as the prawns, the portions are very small and expensive.  For sure I won't be back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi1bJRJFI-yDrjYbWEeXP64KNe-bKJyIv9ootJ&fid=0x0:0x56363bbcb783c802"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Ainsley DeSouza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYjw797n6jfGy93jxGrScxWRUlsr8mhFrdy3V1YC0-ZoS68N0X=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is great. Everyone who works there is super friendly and nice. The place is a comfortable place to eat. I can definitely see why this place is a Langley institution.

Also, I post menus because I like menus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqiDdKyGrLkbZHtLXXDXJr0aqjugninU2m4JPK&fid=0x0:0x56363bbcb783c802"],"When":"2024-12-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Oluwayomi Adebule","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXqcIg8ujO4XiC50cD8_FM6q8RuvnCHkeqVI4f08BodMBvibbJTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The meals were larger portions than expected. Very tasty especially the short ribs. The service was really attentive and ensured my order was modified to my taste. Had the pork and prawns crispy spring rolls with a sweet pepper dip. Requested for fish sauce too, which made it tastier. The S4 special item which is marinated grilled pork sausage (skipped for extra lemongrass chicken ), chicken and bbq short ribs with vermicelli rice wand veggies in the side. Extremely tasty. And suited to a rainy evening. All meals can feed two","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPyH2paRKZMz5gP13aW6LGYba2NdJ327irZcDW&fid=0x0:0xe072fea0ca6a9ca0"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Josamm Felices","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXslb7R0f3e1oSlcF7KtYyVv10LV44dHgzWJLqop5_m1KV_P1FW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly, the best Vietnamese restaurant we ever been to. It’s so good that we frequently eat here at least once a month. Great customer service too! 💯","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZ42__QERb78mQx9OC3ca1jnrYzXkWuUT135-f&fid=0x0:0xe072fea0ca6a9ca0"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Patty Lawa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyJ57zaddManS-BKaF-6lD-R2YkZkW8O9B-vtES-NEKTLDRgU-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food here is really great and the prices are so worth it! I ordered R3 which is grilled lemongrass porkchop and chicken and my husband ordered a bowl of Beef Pho which was so delicious. Service was a little slow, my husband’s Pho was served way ahead than my order and so he had to start otherwise the soup would get cold. It took probably another 10-15mins before mine was served. It would have been better if both were served the same time so one didn’t have to wait while the other is already almost done. Otherwise, staff were friendly and nice. The restaurant is spacious, washroom is available and there was no waiting when we came, we were immediately given a table.  Parking is free. Food portion is awesome and really tasty👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9V2zyWHTWWniEpqHQuiYCjfrM3wAJMNygTf-W&fid=0x0:0xe072fea0ca6a9ca0"],"When":"2023-8-5"},{"Name":"Bernie W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWL64yNcTn3hXOcEu6nvvEg8pFW8x0LnR_Lz6dsAr38shCFhbI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pho 777 catered my mother’s 80th birthday party at the restaurant.  There were about 30 guests and I have to say the food, service, restaurant space and decorations were exceptional!!!!  I can not imagine a better birthday for my mom.  The owner took care of all the decorating and the venue really compliments a party atmosphere (the restaurant used to be a schnitzel haus so it has Bavarian/Swiss charm).
The owner is so very accommodating and her attention to all the party details was amazing.
Birthdays, weddings, Christmas parties would all work well in the restaurant:). And the food was excellent, even those guests who had never tried Vietnamese food loved it.
Thank you for making my Mother’s birthday so special!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBuiat0tnjY_7pbkejtOMMb7pdag2vvWC43TjR&fid=0x0:0xe072fea0ca6a9ca0"],"When":"2023-8-27"},{"Name":"Aurora Borealis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxcvuKA9k7vcVWbxk1F0qb1OBc4jUy3IV-yls5YmSt6HsmRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I used to order from here a lot. They have a great customer service. The food is good but I felt like it changed a bit when I ordered it the last few times. I used to order #32 and the meat portion was way less than it used to be. Other than that, it's a good one to try, you won't be disappointed. The environment is friendly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lesley White","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUN5hZZOWkGC0Xm_8Ts_oULx6hXMKJu4N_MNa2rGGo0JXdtk1B2fA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"True Veggie Pho! This broth is so flavourful,  and the quality is always consistent! Friendly staff, very reasonable,  $30 for vegetarian pho and a beef brisket pho. I recommend this place. It's a long time favourite (the White Rock location too!).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMy58Q2OyruJC-ahxKUxIqULOwQyfxQ-VnfbGk9&fid=0x0:0xe072fea0ca6a9ca0"],"When":"2024-2-21"},{"Name":"Trent Omand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIa33CPX_a5xXp8XMPsdVSEGV5uH9BmmvTAfFq0tCpXgqTaTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Second visit to Pho777 and have to say pretty happy each time we have visited.

I have tried the well done beef Pho twice here, the 1st time I tried the large bowl and was unable to finish it, this time I went with the smaller bowl but still a generous size and portions of beef and managed to complete it.

As usual so far the taste has been fantastic and if your in the mood for Pho you should definitely give this place a try.

My disappointment today was with the service, the had two servers working and the dining room was not particularly busy. My wife ordered a grilled lemon grass porkchop and chicken which clearly takes longer to prepair and cook.

However they served my Pho so far in advance of my wife's order coming to the table that I was at least half way done before she could even start her meal. In the future it would be better had they waited until hers was complete to serve both dishes at the same time.

Looking past that one issue for today, the restaurant is clean and bright, with friendly staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8-m9zQHgjO_vlppJ_6GlHNwZfGEc7sg-jtyx7&fid=0x0:0xe072fea0ca6a9ca0"],"When":"2023-8-5"},{"Name":"Maya Tarin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfKEnpihwYljZjv4ZEkoGZwmySggwhnvvx-CrDh6prjpGabQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Vietnamese restaurant in Langley.
You can not see anything from outside, so you might hesitate to go in but once you open the door, you will feel homey ambience.
Staff was very kind!
She was super busy but explained throughly  what she recommended.
Food was great, price was also good!
I'm sure I'll come back here again soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRQjoM4Bm2VVFJu2wIsjbqf_NS5sR74OT2akDN&fid=0x0:0xe072fea0ca6a9ca0"],"When":"2023-4-11"}]
