user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Y B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLe_uWuGjJC5N5iu-JaBiavq1jUZsl1XnXEXU1b1TYLkk7wZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really good experience of indian fusion fine dine.
Great food and great service. The only let down was the rasmalai parfait which was a mishmash of everything including gulabjamuns and was wayy too sweet.
The service was top notch though and unlike other indian restaurants this experience was really fine dine with the waiters checking up regularly but still not being bothersome. The food is definitely worth coming back for.
Avneet and Harman rocked!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODdoNxmftYrfJrehYw0SpSyB-vf17KNQXISY0K&fid=0x0:0x89f7d838bf3bd3a2"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Harvir Mann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlu8YaUsOyyrDrUMW2qzgyGGIvYS8bw1884dkSJK16AUKvDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Have tried this restaurant many times in the past for dine in as we live close by and for the most part it's been great, however lately the last few times we have gotten take out via doordash the food has not been good at all. Paneer pakora looked and tasted stale and hard, nothing like the pictures on menu. Garlic naan was incredibly chewy and difficult to take down to the point my teeth were hurting chewing it, chicken tikka masala was decent but not a whole lot of chicken and mostly peppers and onions, the only saving grace for our meal was the fish pakore. Sadly for how much we spent on takeout dinner for 2 that's just not enough to keep returning. Would only recommend giving it a try if you are dining in, better indian places around for take out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjOuFDaKwBY2SZkPBKrfuEUSWmDj_-ROzfW0_H&fid=0x0:0x89f7d838bf3bd3a2"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Nikola Novoselac","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7JDxQeoyCLOCzqpGdXOhU6Y6_c0VtBevtdRBEt5bXg1enTA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Is it the best Indian food in bc or Canada wide? Maybe not, but is it delicious food at very reasonable prices? Most definitely. In current times where restaurant food tends to be overpriced even adjusted for inflation, this is the one place that I can say with full confidence respects the customer. I've been coming here for the past 3 years and will continue to do so.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIv3Y9XewqkrDtkCT6RcltpCKfboTdEcTLGmve&fid=0x0:0x89f7d838bf3bd3a2"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Mahaveer chand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMfsynj_DbQAhJZdZ_nx7spRuZ-2RWU1hnOn89PcIeNQCVVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place is open until 2am (most of the week) We checked in around 10.20pm and the place was busy and had to wait around 5mins.

Paneer 65 was too good with the tangy spicy flavors. Delhi chat was okay, portion was good.
Chole bhature was average.

We ordered jackfruit fritters which were pakodas with jackfruit and it was good.
Rasmalai parfait was okay with loads of cream and one rasmalai and 2 gulab jamuns topped with strawberries.

Overalls it was a decent dinner for us at this restaurant .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2iIMEAhuJrq6qruPvkMYMhMcKV1w9bqmqF-T_&fid=0x0:0x89f7d838bf3bd3a2"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Laura","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_RS1mQyOId369aU82GfW5Z_wC6Ko_fLlXQoPIg5SAm3Q5tqns=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dined in for the first time tonight, very impressed with service + food—great value with a diverse menu. Pistachio lamb dish was unique and delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgccLn2zgxgPv-ysTR6Ys2t_b1MoFqDg14sFXU&fid=0x0:0x89f7d838bf3bd3a2"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Robin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtX8hZiTDgtX03n_iUUyby7X-O2CsbwatYuRvPU55hz_h1LUO6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent service and food. Will continue to be a return customer. Tried through a promo and loved it! Hidden gem for sure.

Tandorri momos - Tried these for the first time, and they were great. Mint sauce compliments well.

Chicken Tikka Masala - Personal favorite of mine, perfect consistency and big chicken pieces.

Butter chicken - Wonderful as always. Simple but deep flavor profiles.

ORDER THE GARLIC NAAN ITS WAY WORTH IT. Best Naan I've had yet.

Dessert ( I can't remember the name. See attached photos) . This is a must try!! It tastes like a fair donut served hot and vanilla pistachio ice cream paired with it, is to dream for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZ70BA3MTqBu6wEcRnAKtsf32ToutBABowP_SS&fid=0x0:0x89f7d838bf3bd3a2"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Shama Ahmad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHmN7LNQrpqlGu9RQpiZ-uvW4VUQ9kO7f1dHH5Uk28oOGGQtXS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time trying this place and it was a great experience. I had been wanting to try a prawn appetizer I saw and it was the best Ive had in years. Its their Gunpowder Prawns that come with tasty sauces: mango chili and jalapeno cream. So tasty and perfect for sharing.

They asked us to try a new menu item: Schezuan Spicy Veggie Momos which I did and they were absolutely delicious!! So tasty and so much flavour in each bite. My friend ordered Butter Chicken, Garlic Naan, Rice and Raita - all was so yummy and the butter chicken was a large portion.

The only reason for 4-star is the service was too slow and it wasnt that busy. Also there was a moth and fruit flies around our food that we had to keep swatting away.

Overall a great place with tasty food - I will be back for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIZYmilG00yn2EEZGzEaCihJKtAcYlvNpVBLsq&fid=0x0:0x89f7d838bf3bd3a2"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Júlia Fonseca da Costa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe-9XYi95Rrw95VLOd_wwZPz1LE1R239MH7zQNUdavZXb007i2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing Pistachio Panneer and AlliGooby with garlic naan. First time eating on site, despite having ordered it a few times through doordash. The atmosphere is amazing. Cold beer, clean place, very comfortable boot. Will definetly be back here soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZ6pdRzmxZoOmKnekCMcM8oDzHjTbPI6thpZm4&fid=0x0:0x89f7d838bf3bd3a2"],"When":"2024-10-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Aarti Jindal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPaOrSmA76tnAHbyahr9q0W6xIx_LyYSbHt3lJdrDJpY9KZtygQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Started with Drinks- Long Island which seemed like without alcohal and Strawberry Margherita which was again okay. Live Music was a good touch. For food we got Butter Chicken and Seafood Linguini which were good. Although the portion were small and garlic toast wasn't garlicy. For dessert we got Deep Fried Cheesecake which tasted good. Service was too slow and the patio wasn't clean enough to be seated unfortunately. Suggestive to sit inside and order all at once if you dont want to wait too long between drinks and food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgz0-x7XZl4W8ypalYVZFRD0l-obCMkIkHujiQ&fid=0x0:0x1904ead5721364d"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Nicole Beaverstock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINlxlqrls3P2n0sb12ZhDTVLEoEcSNKk-nM6JWCwRB8vGQug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It took a minute for someone to see me at the door but the bartender offered the bar, and I was one person so I agreed.

I was really craving some brisket Mac n cheese but they didn't serve brisket.

The bartender offered a few protein options, I chose a side of steak. He said it'll be $16 on top of the Mac n cheese $19 I said that's fine.

Originally I wanted half on top of the Mac n cheese but I'm glad that isn't what he did though he did get them to cut it in half which was a blessing.

Both steak and the Mac n cheese were very flavorful on their own. Steak was cooked as requested and was a good blend of fat and meat.

Mac and cheese was very cheesy but not overly rich. I was very impressed with the Mac and cheese. I didn't expect it to be so unique but yet still comforting.

I'd been wanting to try this place for a few years and I'm very glad I tried them today.

Service was very friendly and personable. The area I sat in was very clean and I will definitely be recommending this place.

I really appreciated how easily they tried to accommodate my cravings and also that they gave an accurate estimate of the additional charge.

Thanks bob's, that early dinner really hit the spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBJoxR47Y1nUstpsM1y-ugv_1TZ7tvNbRXjdmk&fid=0x0:0x1904ead5721364d"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"MV","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvfVhpnXOXuei59i-3akb3KPUvOt6gC0aiAnhYDy5QxYwFiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice little restaurant! We were looking for something close by as we just finished swimming at the Otter co-op pool a few minutes away. It was nice to get my kids to try something other than the usual white spot.  The service was friendly and quick, the portions were big and everything we ordered tasted great.The lime margarita on the rocks was like a little taste of Mexico! We all left happy and full. Will definitely come back the next time we are in town.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUB4eL_OaFnMfmdNT-2PMjK7lBTShFfRN-LHiQ&fid=0x0:0x1904ead5721364d"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Andrea Till","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkAM6v731ouSbWkJSGb72C7yjI8qfxRIAh4EPMK-wxLFoqUA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My first time here since the new owners took over. It has changed quite a bit. Strange new decor though. Very modern, which doesn’t really go with the rest of the place!?? And of course we miss all the old staff. They definitely were a big reason why a lot of people went to bobs. Anyway. The first thing we noticed was it seemed very dirty. The floors, windows,. food, utensils, napkins on the floor, and even the tables were not cleaned. Our condiment bottles were even kind of gross. So that alone was bad enough. And it wasn’t busy. So someone could have been at least tidying up. Then they had country music playing quite loudly. Which I am not a fan of country. But I dealt with it. Lastly, the food. It wasn’t bad. My rice was bland. But that was my only complaint. My husband didn’t like the gravy. But again, not a big deal. So the food so far would have us come back. But my concern is, if the dining room is that dirty, what does the kitchen look like!?? So that is my only hesitation to return there. I will probably try it again. And hopefully things will be better for my next visit. We need a nice restaurant in aldergrove. Hopefully this can be it again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6xUU857uUpr1cHqjvu8U10ZMlN5g2SCZ9Xks-&fid=0x0:0x1904ead5721364d"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Ali G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFnoXEKCJnraSJ4NAEOGZ2XrIpF9aCyZioFg5Qtpnn7oxdWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place is hit and miss. It has been a miss for a long time. We have tried to stay loyal through each owner in the past 10 years not for the food but more for the fact we enjoy the live music and a place to gather with our friends. No matter how many face lifts you give a place you need to still produce quality goods and Bob’s is missing the mark. This last time has done me in for ordering food. There was so many mishaps this particular Friday night from screwing up the reservation to running out of steak. Servers not remembering to bring items requested. I realize the restaurant was busy on this particular occasion however there is no consistency on how this place runs on day to day as same goes for food quality. There is no consistency week to week.

Examples of the evening: Ordered yam fries which came out and served cold… reheated to be served overcooked
Order placed for a steak but sold out so replace with prime rib which was served cold and under whelmed with cooking of it..
Order placed samosa appetizers, asked for a sweet dipping sauce was offered plum.. I am allergic to pitted fruits so declined.. server argued back there’s no pit in the sauce…asked for sweet chili dip was given hot sauce asked again for sweet chili sauce and took 30 minutes to get a dip for 2 small samosas.

I do commend the atmosphere or vibe of the place because the changes made to the building show some nice growth and opportunities towards improvement.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anastassiya Kunitsyna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtvTKMqeWu6OVW3uNRzqNVD2yKDfmNlPsgC5aGS1stmGlnbwk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a Christmas party with our coworkers, and everyone really enjoyed it. The service was excellent, the food was decent, and I highly recommend it! The manager Aakil did a fantastic job. He listened to all our wishes.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Radun De Silva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxk3xHyhVExGifpLPFh9O4Eebl6b9bnhImKfZKxTJgLTUM7fy7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had breakfast at Bob's Kitchen and Bar, and I was thoroughly impressed. The menu has a great selection of breakfast options, offering something for everyone, whether you're in the mood for something light or a hearty meal. Everything I ordered was fresh, flavorful, and perfectly prepared.

The cozy atmosphere and friendly staff made the experience even more enjoyable. The portions were generous, and the pricing was very reasonable for the quality. If you’re looking for a top-notch breakfast spot with a warm and welcoming vibe, Bob's Kitchen and Bar is a must-visit. I’ll definitely be coming back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Seth Fab","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDGHmBKdAIwVcg7lAIT9Wyzg_G_ufG8VYnnVKqKtZxWr9hF-6V=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Overall good classic burger and Yam fries, however wife found the chicken penne alfredo bland. The burger had quite a good sized patty for the price and was a good burger. Nice portion of yam fries. Sauce for the yam fries not my taste. Penne alfredo just lacked much taste with semingly unseasoned chicken but was still OK. Loved the patio and will probably be a great place to sit in the greenery in summertime.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTAgWrDdZF82EowZLEM59vnJlEQMPk2ErPC2SW&fid=0x0:0x1904ead5721364d"],"When":"2024-3-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jade Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyrhwf0sQZy53d7UKsdRX3bII-__zAaf9Z3962Pp4-lROIZJt-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food at reasonable prices and great quantity! We had the ravioli with tomato cream sauce, the calamari, the mixed grill, and the cheesecake with raspberry sauce. Service was excellent as well. Only downside (was perhaps uncontrollable) but many flies flew by us during the entire meal and even landed on our plates at points.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVrjZrS1K9MCDs56y3_JnI_cXxTcplHzAhTbks&fid=0x0:0x73d141e3ab072493"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"D S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuROdrsF7vogaT38uZexLigYz1e5VXiDiWb4Iq30REJ6CyNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Greek food we have eaten in a long time. Let's talk first about the portions of different items on the plate. Over 95% of restaurants, mall food courts, takeout places and other eating establishments will fill your meal (plate, gyro, sandwich, wrap etc.) with fillers. This takes the form of all the cheaper items such as rice, pasta, hashbrowns, bread and other simple carbs. This place does not! It is the first restaurant in years where we did not have to request "easy on the carbs" and "more meat please". The portions on our plates where perfectly balanced with rice, salad and lots of meat (see photos for details).

The before-meal Greek salad was very tasty with was not overloaded with onions. The Bruschetta was wonderful with light perfectly toasted bread. The Mixed Grill was an excellent way to experience three meats: chicken, beef and lamb. All meats were moist. The chicken and beef were tastier than the lamb. Please note that the lamb is not the same as Roast Lamb and instead is the lamb likely used for Gyros. If we're being picky, this lamb could have used a bit more flavour. The rice and mixed vegetables were perfectly sized and with tons of flavour. Even the pita slices were warm with drizzle of oil.

Service was excellent even with a slight language barrier. Do not be deterred by South Asian staff and chef in a Greek restaurant. The Chef has over 10 years experience in cooking this type of food and it shows! It appears to be a family-run business. There was adequate street parking directly in front of the restaurant and a free parking lot across the street (which was mostly empty during the lunch hour). We felt that our meal was very reasonable given the portion sizes and taste. We shared an appetizer and ordered two meals (one from lunch menu and one from dinner menu). We did not have any drinks other than water. With taxes, the total meal was $52 not including a tip.

The restaurant has been open for 9 months. They have over 500 Google reviews. We hope they stay. It is simply outstanding and you should give it a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQ9We5CoKH0WRTWGcsxTC_raymMN6WD9aK79Te&fid=0x0:0x73d141e3ab072493"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Cayden Gillies","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-qMY7VbcVg2__MwHI9cGdDcZkgGsaRwvmpR0qTWVodE6vyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I loved the atmosphere of the restaurant and the service was really excellent. The appetizers was amazing and really recommend to get the Bruschetta. I also loved the food very good selection I got the Chicken Souvlaki it was really good. And to top it off for desert I got the Cheesecake it was very appetizing. I highly recommend to go to Ellas Grill.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP19UhkDYBZaRC6xCYI-N7LgSu6FLcG7nwBOd5G&fid=0x0:0x73d141e3ab072493"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Tamiya Woods","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVla8UsJK0b560RBCZD5YbgxihUuQPW---iMEoUS6NAmbwf1zM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely loved the service and food here! we were new in town and wanted to try this restaurant and was not disappointed. The server was so nice and kept apologizing for no reason we knew the wait times and saw how busy they were, we were more than happy to wait patiently. The food came out fresh and steaming can’t wait to visit again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3JT8LH7I6Zvu3LjFBChD_QvaKH06RL3SJDy8v&fid=0x0:0x73d141e3ab072493"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Maria Kristianne Santiago","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUropq5pa4AHt67VGg3QJuvN05K0Jqqd0Qy0g8cIiDWG6NP6nXx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I celebrated our anniversary here earlier this afternoon. We also brought our baby along with us. I will say that we all genuinely loved the food. Yes, including our 12-month old. It was very flavourful and seasoned well! The dishes were a 10000/10, taste and presentation wise. We are true admirers of Greek food and this restaurant by far, exceeded our expectations, and we have eaten at many others! This will be our new go-to for dining in if we crave Greek food. Great to know their location is only 10 minutes away from home. We are a bit shocked that there are negative comments about the restaurant because even when it came to our baby, the host (which I feel was also the owner) made sure he was taken care of. We were given a high chair, his own plate, cup, and even a book and popsicle after he ate! For me, that’s great customer service! I highly recommend for others to give this another shot. Maybe it will work out better for you this time around as it seems they really took all your constructive feedbacks to heart; to better improve their business! We love, love, love Ella’s Greek. I have inserted photos for new customers to enjoy. I wish I can upload the video but Google is not making that possible. Thank you for treating us well. You will definitely see us again. 💛

IT IS ALSO AFFORDABLE TO EAT HERE.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOaQMwZwq338Pa9Ndhew8ziFh1UzkWYam_QuDc&fid=0x0:0x73d141e3ab072493"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"Chinedum Nwokeka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXV2I7zs85THenDM3DAsNPBASTd5_yg4bTzHkDvQAAfqSw7r2qOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great time at Ellas Grill. Ordered the Gyros meal and the portion was more than I anticipated, with Greek salad and was quite tasty. The other meal - chicken was good too and as spicy as we wanted it. Lovely and cool place to eat with family. Loved the ambience and the friendly host checking in to see if the food was good. I definitely recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeBH_IaLaDj2m8HIOmo7OwSBYQ0uqxBmzfZdSp&fid=0x0:0x73d141e3ab072493"],"When":"2024-3-14"},{"Name":"Jared Mitchell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYSLYyLA5kqveYP5QP3HKPjb8ui1HJPrPmnuOApeWIwcB0_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We really enjoyed our meal, wine and atmosphere. Will be back. We had the mousakka and the Ribs. Both were very good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1RBJ9kBi-Ii91mLqSWqZGsRj35r25qf-1MlCc&fid=0x0:0x73d141e3ab072493"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Shalabh Goyal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXV36zLUGwoKS7t1KnCguwsorNmpUwQyDaKg1AWS2pMnSK6ala0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited Ellas Grill yesterday to have some greek food. I would say this is one of the best greek food I ever had.
Chef was passionate about the food and everything tasted so well.

Would recommend this place if you are in mood for some greek food ❤️❤️❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1BNg9mNhoYsaA7nbjPT4neTwMOuqzcEdXv00A&fid=0x0:0x73d141e3ab072493"],"When":"2024-7-22"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Harvir Mann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlu8YaUsOyyrDrUMW2qzgyGGIvYS8bw1884dkSJK16AUKvDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried Burrata recently for the first time after driving by the restaurant storefront many times which said coming soon for what seemed like forever. Pizza was delicious with a nice thin crust and good amount of cheese and toppings, as were the garlic cheese breadsticks. Nice to have an authentic italian pizza joint locally in Aldergrove and will definitely be ordering from more often.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjVTvrTWrxizG_8kvtAp5v9IkFspPZIJ8fLqfB\u0026fid=0x0:0xc5282872acd75bbc"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Wendy Lucas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVv6cY1fqbarrhFBSGFdj3C3I2rE6-mnUcxrJS3SXgH__ANDF_4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A must try if you’re looking for fresh, delicious and flavour packed pizzas! Cooked to perfection, with just the right amount of toppings to cheese ratio, that allows you to savour all the flavours without one overpowering the other. The service was quick and friendly too! Will definitely be ordering from here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgxL_ZiEbqP2xOzn0pnK_d1LySu--lsIIRXuC8\u0026fid=0x0:0xc5282872acd75bbc"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"james zaro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnFtCgYodVp434_5LziSpVlovWpzHD639aggla5DCRv3XBz8ir=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered arugula today it was amazing so fresh every time i try different one they never disappoint very professional guys and super clean pizza place I highly recommend it. Hands down to The best pizza in aldergrove  💯 🍕💯","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPROjkXIZRVzfpzzMoKki0DehqfRjQEgNqj6sck\u0026fid=0x0:0xc5282872acd75bbc"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Tal Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdcX5lteMW7YGdoBC5XzBwLnJaPXqogWXPCXIWpiTDj9lk9pSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered tonight off of doordash. I've been waiting for this place to open up ever since the signs went up in the windows. I ordered the veggie garden pizza. The toppings were so fresh. The crust was crispy, yet light and very flavorful. I highly recommend this place if you are looking for a Neapolitan style pizza. I'm looking forward to my wife trying their vegan pizzas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCHCaAhGCseg05ACAWCZeTNBfFjPJKfCMgB42o\u0026fid=0x0:0xc5282872acd75bbc"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Billy Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYxsGyfWGXlE94IetUEXRMs7pbM4Vsd3d3EwuDTwGPxX62aw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at Burrata pizzeria The [pizza/service/ambiance] was absolutely fantastic! The crust was perfectly cooked, the toppings were fresh and flavorful, and the staff were friendly and attentive. I especially loved Gandolf pie. The prices were reasonable and the portions were generous. I can't wait to come back and try more of their delicious pies! 5 stars and highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPz2LUvfiCwo2HuoFvZGIB8VGSKWMqyPPV_t8a6\u0026fid=0x0:0xc5282872acd75bbc"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Rick Fuchs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFmRocjhAt97GEWpUfF5ixdJ3jSlqZ24KEmmbbzeYXccNP2eY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We ordered the Italian Quattro meat lovers pizza and added pineapple as well. Flavour wise it tastes good, but I feel it lacked enough toppings and not worth the money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOkxvOMzd_kfMR_i-sWVexFZA1H6vwGasK3r3v\u0026fid=0x0:0xc5282872acd75bbc"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Kerry Lalonde","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnO1EtuiftPdXK7JZyAC4cWuhHoZKVtGhsFHxAsxSCiWmhF7M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our new favorite pizza!  The crust is thin and crispy, the sauce just right.  They said it would take 45 min for delivery and it was less than 30.  The toppings were all good quality.  All around great pizza!  I can't say anything about the atmosphere of the place as we have only ordered takeout, but 10 out of 10 recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kim P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKL6KM77ID3nCb74zaq1Rpb6znV1JRl0NLsfSBLmGUL2YAwgw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pesto pizza was delicious and the owner is so kind. I am shocked.\nHighly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUdb0eFfUq6MHYFlhcHQPKjVhuc-UlROlwRwKh\u0026fid=0x0:0xc5282872acd75bbc"],"When":"2024-11-28"}]

[{"Name":"Alyssa Gongob","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNlMc_4Pca1irifaZPd0ufKNx3OiD3E7_cxzLUT95XDlCM755L=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Customer service was excellent. If you want some mexican breakfast or lunch, I recommend this cafe. Food was delicious. They also have mexican products like candies, sauces etc. cute cafe and affordable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPadmZoJOw82KUZaZLrAaD2wcCYszJ9AppnjZlP&fid=0x0:0x3dd3046ad3033203"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Aarti Jindal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPaOrSmA76tnAHbyahr9q0W6xIx_LyYSbHt3lJdrDJpY9KZtygQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the really good cafes' i got to try after so long. Service was great and server was polite and welcoming. It has great food especially Mexican. Tried their Cowboy and Chicken Fajita and they were flavorful plus appetizing. Definitely Recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtZaXIQHC7iLuTDypBaCuRmVAAbbhdl831EYVm&fid=0x0:0x3dd3046ad3033203"],"When":"2023-10-15"},{"Name":"Sandra Braga Davidson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVb0zhic3XQWJsDL0A4TJ6SQOyjsvK6E15aalppaOgkYRYZH2K2xQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food!
My huevos a la mexicana were so good, especially the refried beans.
And the tortillas come in this adorable warmer.
Will definitely come back 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8nYFbe6CXqQe-oG3tL6bIiTKkgC9tBstHgvzO&fid=0x0:0x3dd3046ad3033203"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Rodrigo Flores-Recinos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIaBWZJzy8cq9baG6OWaEhyUlGJSZXfWG7VfizL07VnMzFWYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have started coming here weekly. The food, service and quality are top notch. From owners down to the workers you all contribute to a fantastic dining experience. Thank you for the past and future amazing meals","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Peter Huynh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLRwahT3KmYGHbGiemCVu6o8EWAomGocCFiRiMngKTjG_xLZ2GnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I live down the street and have driven past this place numerous times for years and decided to try this place out. I'm no morning guy, but I decided to set aside time to wake up early and come in. The waitress greeted me very kindly and was very attentive throughout the whole experience A+. The food was hot and fresh, with no complaints. Overall experience was fantastic compared to other restaurants I've been to.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMoT6z9qayLFWwnxbcXhYayBn3Lk_Sje-J-5Ya&fid=0x0:0x3dd3046ad3033203"],"When":"2024-2-13"},{"Name":"Michelle Souliere","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIKhFzY2_gWceiFZGnE_XbvcK3HR7NLfK18aTaT-9k42yY7Qw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just ordered takeout from here and it was the best takeout breakfast i have ever had. Great portions, still hot upon arrival and DELISH. Love the fresh fruit they threw in. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhXgMN0xkbNoSBiBgVCtjLIYUZwz0_rI_WzrkK&fid=0x0:0x3dd3046ad3033203"],"When":"2024-4-26"},{"Name":"Jessica Carey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL5DrpaNBvSBAXHE2wKjJaV_PGnUudBkE1zRoRW7921tcwN0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I will never go here again.
I specifically asked for condiments to be removed when placing a burger order, and when it arrived all of the items I asked to be removed were on it. When I brought it to their attention and asked for it to be correctly done the way it was ordered they were extremely hesitant to do so.

When it came to the bill they tried to charge me for the burger that they wrongly made. I had to argue to receive my proper bill corrected.

Appalling customer service. I will not be going back.

Food is not worth the price, barely cooked hashbrowns and frozen food reheated .

0/10","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matt “Dmaxus” Lanner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUH2hEDCUXc-zSAL7AjkAcqzhp6pBxvBJiH4s-mIl-TEa6MQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Couldn't ask for a better place to grab a bite.  Excellent quality ingredients, proper home cooked feel to your meal and the staff are the loveliest people.  If I could rate 6 stars I would","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anthony Basuit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEYhWfHjUh15TSXerDR9pdROZey3hc-Wf9Ifr-wSt9eaVQraAF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best indian food,  super excellent 100% authentic we will comeback here and bring other friends to taste this yummy food. Highly recomended,
Service is amazing very friendly
And the location is very accessible lots parking outside,
Very welcoming place, best food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOctzhUZO6Heh_PBOBASkpWqEcABxulElSiEFSZ&fid=0x0:0x6f52bd5298c9a5c0"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Shalabh Goyal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXV36zLUGwoKS7t1KnCguwsorNmpUwQyDaKg1AWS2pMnSK6ala0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really good food everytime! Anything you order its always good
Paani poori, frankie, kulcha, dosa, etc. all are really good

Once advice, please stop asking/confirming if its aldergrove branch TWICE.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4eICEKlIHy9ZvYd3zL1u5GCgywWoT0p_2xWa0&fid=0x0:0x6f52bd5298c9a5c0"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Moorthy Thanesh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImnhTA9xNI910kAYicnsArgcyAtO6PgVtFWtRAiFim8VTZZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"AHA Restaurant offers one of the best dining experiences I've ever had. The lamb
Briyani was absolutely amazing—perfectly cooked, flavorful, and beautifully presented. The quality of the food and attention to detail were outstanding. Highly recommended!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"j s","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBDQ0STglvovnlOKwfwLjgy5VNOpQA07KPTSJYHtuOWgCZDg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found this gem this week and is now my favourite restaurant! This is my second time going there because the food is delicious and the service is amazing. The chefs are extremely passionate and friendly! Best authentic Indian cuisine! Their mixed berry mojito is so refreshing and I absolutely loved every dish I have had so far! Look at how amazing the presentation is but the taste is even better! Must try for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPHeTxBpej5oTJM6LsyQxSzGI1FNoneGGBNJ0b&fid=0x0:0x6f52bd5298c9a5c0"],"When":"2022-7-9"},{"Name":"Saranath Ranasinghe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2O4uyOR7HD2ShgnvZYOBv7BPVQSjCclnmkp3N2vYxCc3ivg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food. And great service by the staff. Place was busy when we went there but they served food very quickly. Portions are really worth. Overall 9.5/10. We went in a large group. Only had one washroom for both men and women. Otherwise this place is a 10/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOFoulOdEuTU86LR-GqLEFxJItmq2y_MTjMs6N&fid=0x0:0x6f52bd5298c9a5c0"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Somu Chettiar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYVXWi_2p9diw8m_eSO01HDQOgLvHKx-8VgGFCp1Zjmvkp_Eaw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was amazing and high quality. Everything we ordered was 10/10 and delicious. The Frankie was a unique dish for us and everyone’s favourite. We will be coming back to explore more of this awesome restaurant and menu soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNW1wwIfilxvQmQOMHE0_K0x6zSTDL4HsZRkM1R&fid=0x0:0x6f52bd5298c9a5c0"],"When":"2022-10-19"},{"Name":"Aditya Kolli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWIuF_o_IPWBKHdd0bVcBWgPzmrLUl9DsppW5LsioPhGXDOLFnng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful time feasting on some amazing delicacies. The host was very kind and the chef paid a visit to the tables too. Some of the dishes are a fusion of cuisines or a new concept and that's what makes this place very unique. Must try dishes include, special frankies, burgers and of course any of the traditional fair. South Indian tiffins are a blast to have! Thank you AHA!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOqnme8U1BWsa63hxT9Fgy1Z-U_MHeNPNGsGBO&fid=0x0:0x6f52bd5298c9a5c0"],"When":"2023-4-25"},{"Name":"kate wb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgnCFTjLEdbGK3hxUVIOcv_19gIOfZhA3Zw_oi-5_Vsn1K_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Dosa was one of the best I’ve had for a long time .. fresh and with the right sauces. The onion pakora was excellent . Great to get a salt lassi too. Service attentive and friendly. .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtwN8CZJjKSdtWIK_rVsUds8PbyStnPPrFiUte&fid=0x0:0x6f52bd5298c9a5c0"],"When":"2024-9-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hao Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSLvJrghuDRqW3-I3ViJ2HDjVtct7GKG_2a4lKVwleiRTLz4PA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The butter chicken is great, the spices and flavour is perfect. The rice is great. Nan is fluffy and used the salad to wrap with the chicken. Only $12.59! Price match volume of food. They just for got the dessert. Try not to get extra spicy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPze8ro4whh2td7T7lil8PRuAgrh1Qjs-RhHzVq&fid=0x0:0x624737fc973b2ada"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Uzzi AO","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHD8epRQi85m5VfYaHOMnoiEuY_dlYA3QZcUayKUYmHcRDXzwa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good restaurant. Fantastic food, great service. Speedy responses. Everything we ate was just pure deliciousness! Rarely do you find authentic Indian cuisines on the east end, and this is one of them. The hype is real.

The malai kofta is one of the best, the chat papri is amazing, and the chicken tikka is fantastic! I’d not recommend the butter chicken though, it’s not the best. But everything else is just delicious. Highly highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRGbnx9Hm19Bi1tlRf9K-md6koyxDm-rDmZ1Gx&fid=0x0:0x624737fc973b2ada"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Doug Kingston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1h-7LDUDqr2--w8r_Khw16K9AHb-WYTHvouoSW56TnwPdVw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We live close to this restaurant so it naturally became our go to Indian place. We have tried others in the neighbourhood however we have come back to AIB exclusively. Their service is excellent. The recent renovation makes it such a welcoming and warm vibe. And the food? Amazing! After a recent visit my wife and I both commented that the food gets better and better. I don’t know how they do it but we are customers for life.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUriy3ONGIN19xPULb0NDAKSlcD-Pb9LH5kEL1JV9pkTsjC3XP0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped by for 2PM lunch. Each of us enjoyed our meals. The Butter Chicken was so delicious. Curry goat was also amazing. The staff were very accommodating and the service was quick. Very nice ambiance inside the restaurant too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Saoirse Doyle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKkdDR2NTMLtlagzoqYAdQkPBFK-zTSXcvZ8eKvUdJ6zDzXjk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I moved to Canada from the UK in 2001. I grew up on authentic Indian food (especially my best friend’s mum’s). This is the first time in Canada I felt like I was back home. Food was absolutely amazing and the staff and atmosphere was brilliant. You now have a customer for as long as I live in Canada!!! This is a MUST VISIT for Indian food and a fabulous restaurant to have a wonderful relaxing meal at!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHyuRrtA07WLDOEaN2E3SsUeFHBFmamsbTtbhn&fid=0x0:0x624737fc973b2ada"],"When":"2024-1-28"},{"Name":"Poonam Patel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk5UTlCT8UjJqLXWq8j8TaXUEugWzGDmpzTKY6TUxfF5UJSaGG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We drove from US to Canada and tried this restaurant; their service, ambiance and food everything was amazing. I would surely revisit the place any time given a chance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOF_fqDdTHhAT9y3iRJ0kwjZ1P-VpwFAXVAej4v&fid=0x0:0x624737fc973b2ada"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Joleen Harder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ52DTRR6KzlP9qybLgex75KE2OdX0fjZv3v8JOTnA4qrFFZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We always love it here at Aldergrove Indian Bistro—it’s our oasis of authentic Indian cuisine that never fails to delight. From the moment you walk in, you’re embraced by a warm, inviting ambiance that perfectly complements the incredible food. The newly renovated setting is clean, beautifully designed, and adorned with soft tea lights that give the space a cozy, charming vibe. It’s truly a warm and wonderful place to dine.

The food arrives in sizzling stone bowls, each dish a vibrant tapestry of colors and textures. The fragrant curries are a symphony of flavors—rich, indulgent, and beautifully spiced. Every bite is an experience, with tender pieces that melt in your mouth and perfectly fluffy rice infused with delicate aromas.

And let’s talk about the chai. It’s absolutely out of this world, with its aromatic spices and perfect sweetness—a comforting hug in a cup that leaves you wanting more.

The servers are super friendly, kind, and impressively prompt. Their genuine smiles and attentive service make you feel right at home, enhancing the overall dining experience.

If you’re looking for a place that combines incredible food with a beautiful ambiance, Aldergrove Indian Bistro is it. Highly recommended for anyone seeking an unforgettable dining experience!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Denise Beaton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1I-_NHPAq0ZJO1n0XjgdDXjhS5RsQ_Td5Nbr_0Mf0jSi-BhY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A hidden gem of a restaurant! We met our daughter for her birthday as it was near her place. I have to say it was the best Indian food we've had and we eat frequently at Indian restaurants. Besides great food, the prices were so affordable, and came quickly.  Our waitress was adorable. She brought our daughter a warm brownie with ice cream, and a candle and sang happy birthday withe restaurant patrons. We will definitely come back and bring friends.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"David Metcalfe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrMrJ0JSPRHjPcQ00kFyZ5vrQR0urepQSkHgiW9SzuyDU8f5yyvg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Since this place can't be bothered to update their hours on Google Maps for the better part of a month, they can enjoy a 1 star rating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPmg4QHVjF0I6Sd_tKgdeyjjTfaKyrG7szJoN0\u0026fid=0x0:0x450e9eb3483d8c71"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Tanya Molberg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKGggw1Zl76Emt2uXHEsEBSQU-7f_jmL5K5qISB2QCo7adcOQ1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's a true treasure in the wall. It was very unexpected, but it was the best burger I've had in a very long time. If you're looking for good food, shockingly inexpensive and a colorful atmosphere, this is the place","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aarti Jindal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPaOrSmA76tnAHbyahr9q0W6xIx_LyYSbHt3lJdrDJpY9KZtygQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food was okay. Nothing extraordinary! Portions are small and taste can be much better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsiqakfKxnwL2FJc8yhGaR-8OoSTB-reIXs3PI\u0026fid=0x0:0x450e9eb3483d8c71"],"When":"2024-1-21"},{"Name":"KrisS1084","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfckZiHvl87_16NWdBFh7qsYSCes3SFIcL-x4Wtqhe_l86-p4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had breakfast here and was not disappointed. Typical hole in the wall kind of place. Delicious food, well priced and good service. Definitely will be back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kam Bad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5SkOynajuWOz_iWniekJ_SC5mMff_5XyxHVvDlSPZRFVWH21M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great solid food, hidden jem for sure! Clean inside with plenty of seating. Staff is very well mannered and attentive. Most of all the food omg the food! Hits all the right notes straight to the soul. Thanks for making my day start with a bang.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPPRy5PnFzjT59BR8uk54LDML5PhFnXXH5IjYu\u0026fid=0x0:0x450e9eb3483d8c71"],"When":"2020-8-30"},{"Name":"Jeremy Hannaford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJh4gJaa4fTCJIngBRIGMrmmqMdx4ZxIh5c_eHCdtOqz7VOAFhyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"These guys have been here for a long time in Aldergrove.\nSince then, they continually provide good and fast service and the food is well made and decently priced.\nWould definitely recommend the hash.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCNo3NBBZYWy-2lcE_vQg7bx-muntk7t5Rx-Xl\u0026fid=0x0:0x450e9eb3483d8c71"],"When":"2021-2-20"},{"Name":"trankimuyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJW_uChKZC6e2FOuMYvpdU8K-CFPOAqD--gQhW76oSuevbn6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is amazing and portions are very large with reasonable prices. Their daily soups are also so good!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jak 251","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULRmfDkzrFf-N2A7ojNm3_oHU1EESAM3HbvXQBakALlJWeU2mJ_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love this place!! Super cozy! Amazing food! The cornbreef hash is my favourite! Great prices! Great coffee! Fast service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhmnEqu7u9Z1ZrZBtoFT8DcembXTsb5FlNVCiX\u0026fid=0x0:0x450e9eb3483d8c71"],"When":"2019-10-16"}]

title: Fox & Hounds Pub and Restaurant
descriptions: This kitschy recreation of a classic English pub offers a large beer selection & hearty bar fare.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mike Purll","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKp9olksuTs36tLNMvT-9ebPEzm11UiByldBsfftlfLptxX-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Biggest Yorkshire pudding I've seen!  Actually acts as a bowl for your Bangers & Mash.  The pudding was a bit cool on the bottom, (maybe warm the plate a bit before serving?). But don't let that discourage you from ordering.
Recommended by Shawn (Sean?) the bartender at the time, and wasn't disappointed, just like Mum used to make, but much bigger Yorkie!  Good serving of veg, with not too much, & not too little gravy.  Rest of the dish was hot & had all the flavours expected.  Will definitely order again, I'm anticipating the cool Yorkie was a one off, and the next one will be 5 stars!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKAh-Lg0sy9oSVPxwxkGWNJYR76EkVAvesJ8TS&fid=0x0:0xac95bd63ad3ec7a4"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Douglas Adam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJh7X2l1n40Q404LG-G1iJN2KQhArmqDLO6UPUQnf1JG28Quw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to come for food or a brew. The interior is like something out of a story book with brick work and figures all around. There's even a big ass on the wall!

Pretty standard pub fare at reasonable prices that are getting hard to find.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4JLg06FBTutjF-nZq-dIAN9hLyY60NSQqynZI&fid=0x0:0xac95bd63ad3ec7a4"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"liberty facundo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNBp5rH1To4BVHWq1Mfj3iKJNDPtZ8CbWa3yq0RypDCjJicJtkRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Second time to eat here and food never disappoints. Huge portions :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQOUStIWI0LXn4ChAT2JOk6_6OZ0fuppvfyr6x&fid=0x0:0xac95bd63ad3ec7a4"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"M K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJruYuSTVatzI528cgQdO9_N_ixrS_iP8DX8m6lgpCEK-mAkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Very Enjoyable from my first visit it was good, the place is popular and they have a great menu! The waitress was fantastic","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVRa49F3USVBlpcRyGldfSzGwbTEOIqUrxzeDt&fid=0x0:0xac95bd63ad3ec7a4"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Definitely a different kind of pub. The decor has strong Disney theme park vibes in some areas. Atmosphere was fairly lowkey and seemed like there were lots of pockets of intimate conversation.

Service was very attentive and friendly, and the food was good. Would recommend a try if you’re in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjLtDCVN_GqvqTKvkHgzJWKgZZO3-GuBWvPn8Z&fid=0x0:0xac95bd63ad3ec7a4"],"When":"2023-10-7"},{"Name":"Mark Royer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCTBWZctKVbXLo_R3by2XLM-2T6Iq-7HPq6SIpzj-7QYb96YKp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Loved the style and decor!  Food was delicious!!  Ordered Sizzling Fajitas; menu claims bottomless tortillas.  When they brought out the food and we asked for extra tortillas, by the time thet arrived, the fajitas fixings were no longer sizzling...","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rod Boss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZ8bWvBqQdVdlR8CAIVrDmGyVwu1ywLx5ZZqCiiK1M7zCYkh_z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When you first enter the Fox & Hounds you are immediately met with a very unique and beautiful interior. It makes it fun and comfortable. After I sat down, the bartender had my drink in front of me within 2 minutes. I didn't order any food, however there was a Father and Son sitting nearby, and their food looked great. All in all it was a bit too quiet for me but a great place to go out for dinner and a couple of drinks with friends","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMorEPK3JUX1QEXqMX04YZWk0dzgxs8UIQ2YlQ9&fid=0x0:0xac95bd63ad3ec7a4"],"When":"2024-1-4"},{"Name":"Randy Vannatter (Randy Vancouver)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXA4_J2kKqCfy52net3jr_46DfnAluk9Vgol7ONVDmHdfF6TfJ2ZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had Dinner here in September after golf. Looks like a decent pub for the locals as it was pretty busy.

Staff were great and while I had a couple beers, my friend had a soft drink.  Only reason I mention it was he has three free refills.  Wished they did that for the beer......lol

Food was good, so a good experience at this pub.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBsPcwXzXg0XdhmlfFNC-t4hrxPLm7qgMJDQTD&fid=0x0:0xac95bd63ad3ec7a4"],"When":"2022-10-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good Korean fried chicken that's on par with those in Vancouver.

We had the half and half with the original and sweet and spicy flavour. The bite sized chicken is tasty and just the right size (not too big, not too small).

This place is great for takeout, especially before or after going to The Outdoor Experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCy7QRKXH2ehH54GNnPB2YcHf9l4G36qRn2Adr&fid=0x0:0x63b82931e122d9a0"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Daesang Kwon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNXkCk3azbq3Y23gsGxmwY_KHLjEw4uhn7N74k05paCPXr2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m not usually one to write reviews, but I just can’t let this one go unmentioned.

I tried the Original and Yangnyeom chicken, and honestly, it was the best Korean fried chicken I’ve ever had – even compared to what I’ve had in Korea. The batter was incredibly crispy, and the chicken was juicy without being greasy, with a crunch that lasted till the very end.

As someone who truly loves Korean chicken, I can confidently say this is hands down the best I’ve ever had. I highly recommend it!

The staff were also incredibly friendly, greeting us with warm smiles and bright energy, which made the experience even better.

I really wish I had taken a photo before digging in, but by the time I thought about it, the chicken was already gone!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Laurel Anne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2r68KcVxlaBbzNNCUC5EFoY8CgogCX1UJLt6olScSoGlOeU8I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down the best Korean fried chicken I've ever had! The batter on the chicken is so light and crispy, and the chicken itself is unbelievably juicy.
We ordered original, yangyeom, and soy honey garlic chicken. The yangyeom was so flavourful, mildly spicy but I can't handle spice and it was the perfect level for me. The soy honey garlic was the perfect balance of sweet and savoury. Don't skip the cheese fries either - I would have these as a deathbed meal.
10/10 can't wait to order again, and can't wait to see them hopefully expand to more areas so everyone can enjoy. This is truly a gem in Aldergrove :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2qHgBQhRku54BDRnoXvtTo2_TVodCKseCMG61&fid=0x0:0x63b82931e122d9a0"],"When":"2023-7-20"},{"Name":"Miss Asia Canada Vancouver, BC Patty C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVvGXqNWoYaCyfXFYAejHk320OBSpPOuBn3M8eruqJH-qPLIRx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been eyeing this place before it opened and it was definitely worth it! I ordered the Oliv party combo which came with 3 chicken flavors of choice, cole slaw, and fries. Their Korean fried chicken was crispy, tender, and bursting with flavor. My favorite is the original chicken with the onion sauce as it was such a game-changer. I just never thought of tasting onion sauce with chicken before. The employees were so welcoming and friendly and even gave 3 drinks on the house! I wanted to try their cruffle waffle dessert and it was a pleasant mini treat after all that chicken. A must-visit for anyone who craves fried chicken! Can't wait to go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJ_dLOERz7kqE1-etTDkq6eCDx307GNTmOS5yq&fid=0x0:0x63b82931e122d9a0"],"When":"2023-8-22"},{"Name":"A Cam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdc4yAx8KI59xffsXe3vJtCvFKTIjlNn_W1Zx4iGb8O9oMaw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My landlords love this place and mentioned it to me. Tonight they were ordering some and I asked if they would order me some as well. I chose the soy honey garlic. Prior to this I have never tried Koren fried chicken. It was SO good!!! Crispy and crunchy! Sweet and savory! Hot! Juicy! My son and I absolutely fell in love with it. I will definitely be ordering on a regular basis!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"안은숙","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJQT0HC6tdSWus0-Dh75zuonu4hk2GClpzfZRlWAzHMtW3BA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staffs were so nice and the lady, I assume she's the boss said she made all the sauces, the coleslaw and even the kimchi, which taste was above beyond.
I loved their Korean styled sweet and spicy chicken, very healthy and the chicken  was so crunch and delicious. Thank you! Me and my family really enjoyed it!^^
Try the party combo to try three different flavours:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPneU91VRGSMxDg1JgTBs4TA6p8Sxvcz4MBvK9H&fid=0x0:0x63b82931e122d9a0"],"When":"2023-8-9"},{"Name":"mckenzie w.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7Ah7R-f0ZM6ZOKzP3Bhq4cTN8jgOsQzArcjFloYh3ojSAnhq_fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time having Korean fried chicken. Very crispy and very good. Beef bagogi is delicious. There was almost no seating so we had a trunk picnic.
Edit; trunk picnics bring fun memories to us so we were not bothered about the seating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1tC9EaSa3HFXcxOYepb8QgQWWuLx2_hFUvB5A&fid=0x0:0x63b82931e122d9a0"],"When":"2023-10-13"},{"Name":"il sun song","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5HEBvXIsbmaUpL_BhSS--tD0159gB7YDQHHarQxWsyN1_95k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Several time.. I tried Buldak chicken and stir fried kimchi rice only. Was enough good to me. Tonight, Owner, lady recommended K Bibimbab(various kinds of vegetables & Bulgogi with sweet&hot sauce)..wow! awesome, great!. ...Amazing!!! K food is right always! Never regret!  Probably she is best chef of Korean. Thank you Raina!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lindsay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1Shag5Tb8-nf_OCQaRD1gu3nZLKWR0QEBqrAlUQowP0-erEE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely delicious, fresh and authentic! Very cute homelike atmosphere with great service. We had the complimentary chips and salsa, and ordered the enchiladas and carne asada a la tampiquena for our entrées. We were very impressed by the flavours and quality ingredients. Will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGTeY3uPNOuoUZtneWLtzEQVzuyJ_qSWJiVvdn&fid=0x0:0xb2df31515fcce42b"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"McCauley Glen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWashyF1LO9wiL39Ym6Li0vBzZnzySbDzo3c6MNbknKJLbFnGN6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An absolute gem! Couldn't be a more perfect place, the food is unreal and the owner is such a great host. You have to try this place it's so much better than any of the fast food around that area. Will be returning!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxDwrXhX5wWZImDuT2Baz1ugVAxEfriFw4-UPb&fid=0x0:0xb2df31515fcce42b"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Katarina S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3JHDohClYoWx6ioXZ8jOJACbumlV5fcQaG7zeOo16W5hEVIa-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Unique experience. Not fancy, small family owned place with 5 tables. You feel like you entering into someone's  kitchen, and hosts will prepare  food for you. The food is delicious and very fast. Hosts are amazingly friendly and always ready for jokes. If you do not mind food smelling clothes after and you do not look anything fancy, just good food, this is the place worth your visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPArHuLpcRTw7_jqkSdnQ8Nj_WoBiQMUbQ4c0eL&fid=0x0:0xb2df31515fcce42b"],"When":"2023-2-5"},{"Name":"Clara Chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoMWRC0cDGP4nCpQ1_Zdm86daXS0A0KJbVAa9QczqqbfD7fWIZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here randomly on the way to the Christmas market and it was a real gem! Tucked away in the industrial buildings was this cute little restaurant with fun music that's run by a lovely couple. Ordered 2 appetizers (guacamole and Mexican fries) and an entree per person (enmoladas, pollo con mole, and tacos d'cochinita). At the end of the dinner, he told us about the churros and it was DELICIOUS! Food was really filling and the drinks were good. We would be back again in the future!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNd-7TUhgZjQ7xyREPKNDyu3kPluCc0KTp5p9TX&fid=0x0:0xb2df31515fcce42b"],"When":"2023-12-18"},{"Name":"Lief Swanson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs7aITkChhVriFviCEGmL8jRC4lXsrvFm4Yd4mjF-7NT1RBlg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I loved the smiley and welcoming demeanour of the owner... and he is a seriously good cook.

This is *the* place to go for genuine and excellently made Mexican food. An awesome little hole in the wall sort of place. It has an atmosphere  like it was made to be somewhere the owner feels at home, and that shines though.

You have to try it at least once.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Naomi Sommer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuegoQ0JsMGpYYpB8ypvjuC2ipVd5iZeZqVGQpWbyK4uCdpOCY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Unique, hole-in-the-wall, charming experience. This small, family owned place has about 5 indoor tables and 4 outside. You feel like you are visiting a Mexican auntie for lunch. The hosts are very friendly, always ready to crack a joke. Free chips and salsa to start, very good. I had the burrito, which was delicious if a little on the salty side.

Important to note that you can only pay with cash or etransfer so be prepared for that!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thomas Tricarico","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhws5bVYDwmrI4nzI8NtjFY5tCFNmhM_PZ57tj9M9bdO7Dag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great little place tucked away in a commercial park on the corner with an outdoor patio. Small Cozy atmosphere inside run by Mom and Pop.. They open at 11:30 and we waited a while, as they must've been running late as we met them arriving as we were leaving so we backed up and stayed. Glad we did. Very Friendly Mom who thanked us for staying and we ordered a couple of margaritas..which were very good, home made. What I thought was kinda funny is that the ice cubes had holes in them like in Mexico usually indicating that the water is purified.. Anyway, the food was really good. My wife had the Mexican fries that were loaded with cheese, peppers and salsa and I had the chicken burritos which were very good. A great meal overall. Payment is cash or eTransfer only. Worth a visit when nearby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmRXNVocGsdVkR0XmUe9m2QtcrRYSSS_PvhHF-&fid=0x0:0xb2df31515fcce42b"],"When":"2023-4-26"},{"Name":"Wendy Wood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmkokdu6ApbPHoird8KDulgHxfmcxQVvRHP_prUOSvHuz-auI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was an authentic Mexican restaurant!! Lady at the counter and a cook was an extremely nice and friendly!! Music was excellent and just fun!! Fish tacos were sooo tasty 😋 she even gave me a big hug 🤗 highly recommended!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVbeZGoW22oGzaaclQWBWXaB1mTmA0HmSNKd0v&fid=0x0:0xb2df31515fcce42b"],"When":"2023-10-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Wes Jamison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlloxxuqMRq-c6n85oTKnEJQjSJoGGxrSOU4RCcUpC7I_nkACu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Out for lunch after shopping. Good menu, reasonable prices at 13 bucks. This is an older restaurant that was taken over a few years back and its improved. The veggies were hot and crisp as were the prawns in combo 4. The owner said he personally shops for the vegetables every day. We will be back.  See my pic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKhMAqov2nhgvU8-2Zkd3Qbzazz1s4HQAnAwCr&fid=0x0:0xc33fb80dba01832d"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Gen X Surrey Girl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnz98iwXPE1DskfLpfNg-zDV5mDy1tGmvmbNcHWdRqf6q4OTmNvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Average sized portions, prices were high, food was average, service was great. Food was ready in a decent amount of time. About 30 minutes for takeout. The staff is very friendly and helpful. They had a few people waiting around dinner time.

The chow mein was average, the barbecue pork fried rice was great and full of flavor but had an insane amount of peas, the almond chicken was good with an unusual twist, they sprinkle sugar on top, in all my years of ordering Chinese food no one else has done that. They blend the sugar with the crushed almonds for the topping. It reminds me of the sugary coating on donuts. It actually tasted pretty good.

I was not a fan of the honey garlic pork. My usual place in Surrey puts on a generous coating of sauce leaving a pool of sauce in the bottom of the container. They're all sticky and dripping with flavor and you can spoon the excess sauce in the container over the food on your plate. But the honey garlic pork at this place was almost dry. I couldn't taste the honey or garlic at all.

I also wasn't a fan of the size of the pork pieces in the honey garlic pork. For me the smaller the better. I like the nice crispy ones. The pork chunks here were very large. I got a few super long ones the size of chicken strips. They should be diced much smaller. The pieces were so large it just wasn't appetizing. The chunks look like chicken wings.

That spring rolls I guess are hit and miss. We ordered two. One was perfect nice and crispy and the other one was completely soggy. I don't know what happened there.

Overall I think their prices are just a bit too high for what you're getting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcUIp0jf3EaOI6OSoFptclS72dZDw-s3hAd1dx&fid=0x0:0xc33fb80dba01832d"],"When":"2022-6-28"},{"Name":"Liuyi anne Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPeMXbzK_zxfQcTdoZbLil-2cY-Ve-4rCHrHE9xb_WljZHc6I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to this place and the people were so kind to me the food was great I got the BBQ pork fried rice it has so much flavor and it was just so delicious I also had the egg rolls and they weren't too greasy which is great and they tasted awesome I totally recommend this to others","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Happy Travels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8gwB52_vB4Z1eS3qVA02GQnIsvYEL83tvsPSkH0k1kn-TBwEJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered here first time in along time. The vegetable and chicken dish tasted like canned veg,  chowmein looked like scissors was taken to it, sweet sour pork was chewy. The beef was beef and a tonne of onions? And top it off no fortune cookies  a tiny bag of cashews?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley Third","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIksvYLJq_Nv4hyDZmteKRmFuj8Ld9KnSOAi8WO_0oUSvcU5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Went to pick up my food and the lady at the desk said my food would be out shortly. Immediately after food was brought out and placed on the counter. She didn’t say anything but did look at it. Then 4 other customers came in over the next 7 minutes and they would go into the back and grab their food and bring it out to them. After 7 minutes of my food sitting on the counter they said “your food is ready!” When asked why it was the only one left on the counter they just said “have a good day”.  This was clearly on purpose as it was a very fake interaction. Terrible customer service. Food was alright.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"teresa campbell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKw0U_RhegUVAknkm9hUzIAniWfrWrF88GbzSEQGyV-DtCZvA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place was horrible. Years ago it used to be dragon Fort and it was so good. Well now that it’s dragon house it’s a big no. Portions are small. Expensive. Disgusting. Food tastes like it was sitting out and reheated. One dish we ordered was deep fried wontons. I have had them many places and never seen like this. Was all batter and the supposedly “wonton” was the smaller then my pinky nail, a spec. I called and asked if they would exchange the dish or issue a store credit. They told me it was a 10 year recipe and would do nothing about it. They were very rude. Don’t eat here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPG1QExtfMhunkn6DAwyRl3SOQYGno-y_T8MLOD&fid=0x0:0xc33fb80dba01832d"],"When":"2022-7-26"},{"Name":"Damian De Silva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyC4cQ6ZYwXgtf_2CSqx1WcQ7VvXuw9rfGPAdmiFlCXf5cmA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a beef fried rice take out. They prepared it less than two minutes. It got Hardly any meat or vegetable on it. No flavor at-all. Waste of money.
Highly dissatisfied. No more Chinese food from Aldergrove  again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8WSbcVVwKmLjquUwN6SAi5eC4qKeO9aXTitV_&fid=0x0:0xc33fb80dba01832d"],"When":"2023-4-20"},{"Name":"Ronny Harvey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkyEJ77YlpYtNT5dUPYr4jYYYDONLf4Xxs9JUwKEASZI7OQo8e=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was really good, colorful and vibrant. Meat was real not some processed stuff some restaurants push off onto you this was real authentic Chinese food, reminds me of the one my mom used to make. 10/10 also, very good with children. Staff was very accommodating. Thankyou!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nic F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzngRWbgson5EbvmU8JQY3sJu6bgl1wtw8NnVGV9ipbUgZMNhR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered from Curry Haven for the first time tonight, we thought we’d give it a try. The butter chicken was NOT like regular butter chicken that we have had from other restaurants. It was extremely salty but that was about the only flavour. Not spicy, no hints of ginger…just overloaded with salt and MSG. The naan was chewy and doughy. It seems like they don’t use quality ingredients compared to the other Indian restaurants nearby. The samosa was okay. Now that we’ve tried it…we will not be ordering from here again. A shame.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaspreet Khinda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWFqNbQnES7wkDEHCGjzR2RJdvoWO9LgQVGmtFuMmsfZ36ig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered thalis yesterday, their goat curry butter chicken is awesome. I must recommend this place. Everyone should visit this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLVoTSgauSLi0_XKOgAlHhg7D-vos96-qyyFcp&fid=0x0:0xc8369f40cbc984ee"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Sheena Rattan-Prakash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzCBWr4GGn0jjYqWtJO2V81TUgQNysMUf6XkigOSEnz2h5np8a=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nestled in the heart of Aldergrove, Curry Haven offers a dining experience that is nothing short of extraordinary. From the moment you step inside, you are greeted with warm smiles and a welcoming atmosphere that sets the stage for a memorable meal.

The service here is impeccable. The staff is attentive without being intrusive, knowledgeable about the menu, and genuinely enthusiastic about ensuring that every guest has an outstanding dining experience. They are quick to accommodate special requests and offer insightful recommendations, making you feel like a valued guest from start to finish.

Now, let's talk about the food – it is simply divine. Each dish is a harmonious blend of spices and flavors, prepared with the utmost care and authenticity. The menu boasts a wide variety of options, from classic Indian favorites to innovative creations that showcase the chef's culinary prowess.

Overall, Curry Haven is a shining example of what an Indian restaurant should be. The combination of exceptional service and mouth-watering food makes it a destination worth visiting time and time again. Whether you're a connoisseur of Indian cuisine or a newcomer eager to explore, this restaurant promises an unforgettable dining experience that will leave you longing for your next visit.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Inderjit Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLG3SE7wB81SKAh_zwBBBUxO9cPnofesf8Dj7UVFa-v7lofr7a8A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food and the best quality. I recommend everyone must visit there and try the delicious flavours
Good service and great experience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoVrxIWJ7McS5pXpn-E0SOTitz_zsGGRAYzo9w&fid=0x0:0xc8369f40cbc984ee"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Sonia Anchan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTB0oZy0xOPZ642yyWdH7-Z5w_LjA3G3TPkCuQB4BsjMRUyEIT_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing service! I ordered food for a party and kid you not everyone was in love with their chicken masala, Dal makhani and naans! Their thali was an absolute must have if you like Indian food. The staff was super cooperative and helpful. Thank you guys for making my party a success.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cassandra Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWs3Cto7aM6OTIU6Er9ApeDcnwCWrKqJN1bIvKHvzQJgS1d4StStA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service at curry haven is excellent! The staff is polite and attentive, going above and beyond to provide a wonderful experience, the food is so good!
Theres places to sit as well, but I ordered to go, a good place in the mix of the many flops we have in town, give it a try, you won't regret it at all!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"navneet jaiya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZ1t1nRsVqs_NjgC83xuj8Vg4w04wrgxSqrz497ofFObnBTA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best Indian food ever. I ordered there Dal makhni and Butter chicken. It was  excellent.There Indian sweets are good as well. Highly recommended.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kumkum Gupta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWE5njzXczxcQsYQ240R42r70255RJeGE2MmVRuiRiZaUZJUhA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an amazing meal at curry heaven . The paneer tikka masala, chilli paneer , and  tandoori soya chaap were delicious and packed with flavour and we’ll definitely be back!"  Highly recommend!"","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Mother India caterers & restaurant takeaway
