about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Catering","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"V K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvePfh29sdRgf0mTUfJXf4ltd9IP8MiF82BDkjzhbShMUOjZgG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great option for local well priced indian food. Chicken is tender, and made with a decent amount of care and attention. Comes with rice included too. Not a sit-in restaurant. You get lots of naan even when you order just 1 because a huge nana is cut into 4. Value is A+","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNS9fWBmh8gVuTPb35rsuBHQ2K3nOMZ-jOfw57f&fid=0x0:0x88904ada95bb7b3f"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Karan Creation","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0lTXfxL1ZhKAZyMvdkg7THq0xxAgLUhWetg3_oir8OtEVd1E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're craving authentic Indian cuisine, Mother India Caters is a hidden gem that won't disappoint. From the moment you walk in, you're greeted with the warm, inviting aromas of spices and herbs that are the heart of Indian cooking. The atmosphere is cozy and welcoming, making it feel like home.

The menu offers a wide variety of dishes, from classic butter chicken to vegetarian delights like palak paneer and dal makhani. Each dish is rich in flavor, perfectly spiced, and beautifully presented. The naan and biryani are standouts, with the right balance of texture and taste.

One of the best aspects of Mother India Caters is its attentive and friendly service. The staff is eager to explain dishes and accommodate dietary preferences, ensuring a pleasant dining experience for everyone.

Whether you're hosting a party or just in the mood for a satisfying meal, Mother India Caters delivers top-notch food and service. Highly recommended for those who love traditional Indian flavors and a warm dining atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPGjKHp4ZTtWvH2ArlDO1Qt-rMG2Vvin8xgyOE&fid=0x0:0x88904ada95bb7b3f"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Gaz Virk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkH7NkkMgpsiOk3d7oJjy91ikp4CbXdxsk61JXx5zq9M4WIV7K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":""Absolutely delightful! The English-style fish & chips at Mother India Caterers transported me back to my incredible visit to England, where I first fell in love with this dish. The crispy, golden batter encasing the tender, flaky fish, paired with the perfectly cooked, fluffy chips- it was a match made in heaven!

The flavors were spot on, with just the right amount of salt and vinegar. It was like taking a bite of nostalgia, and I couldn't get enough. The portion was generous, and the service was top-notch.

If you're a fan of authentic English-style fish & chips, look no further. 'Deep'- chef from Edinburgh, the vibrant capital city of Scotland has nailed it, and I'll be back for more. 5 stars, without a doubt!

P.S. - If you're a fan of fish & chips, do try it with a side of mushy peas/gravy, just like they do in England. It's a game-changer!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTHcclRKVJvK2ShaVlBTzSH-mMq5uP8nn6jXfc&fid=0x0:0x88904ada95bb7b3f"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"chester dixon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4OVZM3iowg7vbxhfXh8fDk9tX1DqAZ9B8r8t6fbCpZgl4OLP4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you want flavorful, spicy, Indian food, with portion sizes that are HUGE, this place is it. Amazing. kheer was super delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoiz5rR5he5guj9lUbAjmsUoFGvgCK0gG5W3wt&fid=0x0:0x88904ada95bb7b3f"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"kiran nagra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBcRWVeaWl-mBAayDJdMFBec-TdipfvbbeofOiEp-7zq3x_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the fish pakora it tasted so good and fresh! user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anmol Bains","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIqs-DEEam06WIATuIgQ4_uYHyxJBjj_4IGyu-BtbI9QBaxYMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Current: I use to like this place as a quick bite but its gone down hill. For what I'm paying, the portion has been reduced in half (literally half of what is seen in the picture from 2 months ago) in the mixed donair plate and it isn't fresh! The food today was just barely warm and not hot. The meat was dry and clearly just kept on the "hot" table prepped from hours before. This is the 2nd time in a row now.

Salad dressing taste like the krafts italian dressing (quite sure thats that it is) - was never found of it to be honest but it did the job.

Wouldn't recommend coming here anymore! Much better donair/shawarma places in Langley and Abbotsford.

This review and picture was from 2 months ago: So glad this opened up in our area! Their food is amazing! The chicken is seasoned to perfection and the hummus is one of my favorites as it's not the typical plain old hummus with just tahini,  salt and minimal garlic like most. I like ordering a mix with lamb and chicken - best combo","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdEaFrqS2Oo4jKs4pQFv42p9cZCYMc374_HY_g&fid=0x0:0x2b01e7e8e1b2986a"],"When":"2023-9-12"},{"Name":"Parteek Maroke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVf8LqPmR5qVUgiNSIY42f1zPZ0VekkYkyxhK_5WKoqNAjgfa6N=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a work event and ordered catering from Hashtag Donair, and it banged. Everything that was ordered was delicious and was loved by everyone there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN59c-xI2jO6944ezvzlW5gpgl39mLALYJkZePy&fid=0x0:0x2b01e7e8e1b2986a"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Nicole Beaverstock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINlxlqrls3P2n0sb12ZhDTVLEoEcSNKk-nM6JWCwRB8vGQug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered: Donair loaded poutine (Lamb, fries, cheese curds, garlic sauce and taziki sauces) they offer hotsauce but im not a fan of spicy

I've been to all three Hashtag donair locations and they're all fantastic.

This one just opened last Friday and I finally got to go today. So happy to have one close to home! I hadn't had a donair poutine in a hot minute.

The staff were super friendly and personable. Fries cooked fresh from frozen. Ingredients taste amazing as always.

Definitely the food I needed tonight.

Also, they give you a fabric bag with your order.
If I could give more stars I would!!

PROTIP: You can reheat leftovers in a frying pan with a little oil.

EDIT (cause I can't review twice):
Went for a second time today and ordered the loaded Donair fries with lamb, feta, garlic sauce, taziki, cucumber, tomatoes and lettuce.

THE BOMB DOT COM my friends. $15 🙏
Sorry for bad photo, had to eat is asap as I was soooo hungry. Well worth it. ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrbSRc-cYSEKzwcnRFpHLEFP7vQbAgTm9Lqjsf&fid=0x0:0x2b01e7e8e1b2986a"],"When":"2023-6-24"},{"Name":"sukh kang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbJgTPpAmZHVzQ46ye3J8LwL5TBJovZKofq4lqL4ZjNO2DqYOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered hawaiian donair for take out and it was Amazing. Definitely coming back to try more. I recommend this place to others for tasty donairs.☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8fhzaVuDO4jV-muk1dQ3EMIGKFxH9DN7wd5h1&fid=0x0:0x2b01e7e8e1b2986a"],"When":"2023-12-14"},{"Name":"Jason V.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBXDpyZaxkjHFTndYd2VHF2DVpGqiU6kpV9CA_8J-sqmIRq1InBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent food. Reasonable price. Service was decent although ordering was a little confusing and wasn’t what we expected. But worth the trip.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nic F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzngRWbgson5EbvmU8JQY3sJu6bgl1wtw8NnVGV9ipbUgZMNhR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The donairs here are so good! I usually get the Greek chicken donair with no olives, and their “sloppy fries” with tzatziki.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charissa Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXksrH5todun7kxHpj2scssptCGpR3TS4axJA5Ri7r8wKxeA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and friendly service.  Our first time to this location and we will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3yo0e456KZ-bKaMvWxjxfS1g5AdRLDCIN3VDH&fid=0x0:0x2b01e7e8e1b2986a"],"When":"2024-2-15"},{"Name":"Daniel Sproston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVG4vFSFnutzVXL3nHxra1xZDmIJiLMzYOl55-nkmfV6o7tgIXy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just ordered from skip the dishes and I must say that the food was very good.I had the Super beef donair and the wife had the loaded rice bowl with chicken,also had fries and gravy!!
Thanks for the new find.. food was great!! We will be back again!
Best Regards our happy stomachs!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Upasana Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHFvebGTEjsWdA3Rawh2ja5vLonvJTP-FsuufqFwoeesxvLg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
I recently visited Chicko Chicken Aldergrove, and I must say, it was an exceptional experience! They serve the freshest chicken and cook it immediately upon order, ensuring that every bite is super juicy and crispy. The dedication to quality is evident in every piece of chicken they serve. The flavors are outstanding, and the texture is perfect—crispy on the outside and tender on the inside. The staff is friendly and efficient, making the entire dining experience even better. If you're looking for delicious, freshly cooked chicken, Chicko Chicken Aldergrove is the place to go! 🤍✨","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rachel Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxMCePZFz2PcZTvOdWgM4GMHk8fsmJU2r-7cfCz1GF8gXb4g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"10/10 that was amazing
Chicken was hot and fresh even at 9:15pm, so shout out to Mehak in kitchen.
Gitansh took our order and he has some of the best customer service skills I’ve seen in a while, and I’ve trained fast food crew for almost five years now. Outstanding service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"SorrelCritter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJevXn8zwl51aYOqoNQe3SpLC5RangJ4KHJn7sVXt95mTUs5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Found out their secret they use frozen chicken sometimes, because I saw it sitting there already cooked and they put it into the deep fryer. Chicken that has already been deep-fried has a dark golden brown color, which was exactly what this was. I also saw them drop food onto the counter (counter looked rather dirty) and just put it into somebody’s order without discarding the piece that fell.
I ended up  ill and threw up most of the night. I will never eat here again. Not as long as they keep up with the non existent health practices.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Therealsanosa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKS_BNs1oUjiNm3tLqKatEP5Qwdib2G6qba7nTIKk02QMzTCg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Used to be good but did owner change? All I got in my box is just batter. Crumbs. Used to be lots of actual chicken meat pieces. Hope I’m just unlucky this time. New Owners please don’t let this place down. It was such a highlight to Aldergrove!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNPFNQyCUqtAk1fKL1JoWgn8ihsnAJdgwxNXim&fid=0x0:0xbceb7a36f13a60f5"],"When":"2023-11-15"},{"Name":"Taylor Munroe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfAH8WY8qWubkYvoF71gc9NY2dMLcgf5lv3KbMZqeXAAwyp_eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"With a craving for chicken and a desire to try something new this definitely fit the bill. Easy to find, lots of parking, and clear menus for ordering.

I like the fact they don't have dozens of options - there are a few varieties and that's it. Ordered a half & half pack, which ended up being quite a lot of chicken. It took a few minutes (they made it fresh) but was well worth the wait. Deliciously crunchy, but not greasy.

Restaurants have gradually been raising prices while dropping quality and shrinking portions. It was pleasantly surprising to find such good portions (it is $27 for one box so not exactly cheap but you don't feel scammed).

Worth going back to try more flavors next time.

The only issue I had was with young (under 8) kids in the dining area the staff decided to blast 'In and Out' by Lud Foe (a heavily explicit, uncensored rap song). The music was also beyond loud for a restaurant. It seemed quite out of touch and actually quite offensive, but I'll assume it was one person being unaware and hopefully not the norm.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNb9AHAGNBDACt6EExzv1yGpxJnBWXDZKjRqD_D&fid=0x0:0xbceb7a36f13a60f5"],"When":"2023-6-4"},{"Name":"gregory poirier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUK4iTnygveNDyqdBIiIWQ3rBKcFh9QJ64iwQLJ_B_2juzm93k1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chickos has been our go to when we are craving fried chicken for a while. They are super consistent and always fresh.  We love thier soy garlic, order some chives on the side and enjoy!  It took less then 5 minutes for our order to be ready.  And stayed nice after 20 minutes of driving home.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roxane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnYq6FpOjiy74mU6OFTo8LZltsrOnT2KWUZJrp6XQomQtD1w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ever since Mother and son left the food hasn't been the same unfortunately. No crispy thick breading and found skin on our order. I hope it improves like it was before.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jak 251","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULRmfDkzrFf-N2A7ojNm3_oHU1EESAM3HbvXQBakALlJWeU2mJ_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"SO GOOD! The Chicken is so crispy the portions are huge! This is the split order and 2 orders of Fries! The Fries are unreal! Everything was so fresh! Order ahead for pick up!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqmrOsdicFe8hBXEqgOMQrbWj5lvO1bzbo8EHs&fid=0x0:0xbceb7a36f13a60f5"],"When":"2022-2-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't believe I didn't give them a 5 star review yet. This is our favorite pizza place. Really good and friendly customer service. I don't mind to pick it up because it's really delicious. I don't eat much pizza but can't stop eat their pizza.. hehehe","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhzW5f_bkKYFqCmYwmsFxxgTwqJDr14b17keqx&fid=0x0:0x9aef7082e8f29ad2"],"When":"2024-2-15"},{"Name":"Julie Sherwood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTr_NJ1Aob-1dPJkR5kAPdHikX9SsIBMiMkWN9IxQRlpB6xJPH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered 7 large pizzas to be delivered to the Otter Co-op in Aldergrove for my daughter's birthday party. Since I live in Coquitlam, I took a chance ordering from a pizza place I had never tried before. The gentleman who delivered the pizza arrived on time and was very nice. The pizza was just delicious and the kids loved it. Exceptional quality and the sauce was really tasty. I'll definitely order from this pizza place again if I'm ever in the area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Madi Weiss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdN_7Dx48TLxOVLJowLEbAOvERMCJFN8bIAXr6i7wl0s4KHzKH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The people who work here are such genuine, friendly and kind people. I went in asking if they can do a heart shaped pizza for me and they said they’d try! and it turned out great! not to mention their pizza is absolutely delicious. Forever my fave pizza place","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGfzKIpP4X5niFXpk-z4Lp7YqbVE8AC42QCclc&fid=0x0:0x9aef7082e8f29ad2"],"When":"2023-9-15"},{"Name":"Amandeep Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKyzMmM-hifpvSuTipXYlZ8D-0PVxH__j6oOf4Xglcv2BJSZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s not just the best pizza in Aldergrove, it’s ‘The best pizza ever’. I have been their customer from many years and their customer service and food has always been top notch. With their wide selection of pizzas, they always use the best quality ingredients in their pizza and are generous with their toppings. Whenever I want pizza, I know where to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUFSuwP5X-hkv7GQBiKKgSru7zAU7Qzf4wLSNV&fid=0x0:0x9aef7082e8f29ad2"],"When":"2023-7-24"},{"Name":"Nancy Olson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIi-XhUbbfsZ4-LDhNRfOQEFwSw1HghnpU1bUUWqI06NjB1sQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have lived in the neighbourhood forever and just recently decided to give Choice Pizza a try. I was pleasantly surprised to have such a tasty pizza. They always offer to put fresh cilantro on my veggie pizza which really takes it up a notch. I highly recommend, the flavour is absolutely delicious.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Apar Dhanju","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQtV3X9RUUJWlsdhpp0E3dn0M8OkCjIwS_2qRJAafYbfE_wA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious, osm
I came from Surrey

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gen X Surrey Girl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnz98iwXPE1DskfLpfNg-zDV5mDy1tGmvmbNcHWdRqf6q4OTmNvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"People weren't kidding when they said the lowest tip option on the ATM machine was 15 percent. That's ridiculous considering they do take out only. The options on the machine were 15, 20 or 25 percent.

Food was very tasty. The service was nice. The restaurant has been closed for dine-in since covid began. We called for takeout on New years Eve and there was only a 20-minute wait. They were out of some toppings and called back to ask if it was okay if they skipped it. Of course they didn't offer a discount for missing one topping. But they sure don't hesitate to charge if you add a topping.

Lasagna was very good. Lots of cheese. It came with garlic bread. The pizza was average. My husband got the barbecue chicken pizza. He loves getting barbecue sauce in place of pizza sauce. In this case you could barely taste the barbecue sauce. Also the bacon on this pizza was really gnarly and my husband spit it all out.

I ordered pepperoni and bacon. I was disappointed that the pepperoni was like bologna sheets under the cheese. I prefer the Pizza Hut style with the crispy, greasy 1 inch diameter slices on top of the cheese not the fat 6 inch wide sheets of meat that look like bologna placed under the cheese. I guess it's just a personal preference.

Oddly enough the bacon on my pizza was delicious. You can really taste the smoky flavor. When we compared our slices you could tell the bacon on my pizza was completely different than the bacon on my husband's. Not sure what happened there. His was awful, gnarly and grayish in color. Mine was pink. Strange.

I parked in front of the restaurant where they have street parking. It's usually hard to find a parking along the street. I'm not sure if they have parking in the rear.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQEJqsRLnHB4VOcBe-kaed2U1T4KLvZIX9Mb31&fid=0x0:0x3d3e6ef388481383"],"When":"2023-1-3"},{"Name":"Traci Currie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2yCVMJ6TOXZt15phALmUlVF_ShVyFIyRY5Kyu1Xfwt7m8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We often have delivery. Great food options, always hot and good prices. We recommend","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pete MacLean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5kdEgWG8rNy6XAmjYXVq_7Ovaj56gCJkJaw_5cIHHv9ztUVM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good cheesy pizza. Was more expensive that cheap Dominos but much better quality and tasted very good. Was ready in 20 minutes on a Friday night.

The restauraunt is still closed for eat in and only open for take out or delivery but not a deal breaker for me.

Will definately try again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzXg6rx_i0eH7iUY_yDAmIySS3-e0Sqze1-ikU&fid=0x0:0x3d3e6ef388481383"],"When":"2022-6-22"},{"Name":"Painter Dave","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPm-0DQnbmajvDnkBVj6usloVH7omiAsTdyMuT6wG0LPB77Z4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It's a far downhill from the glory days. Food is very good. No dinning in service. The guy serving pu has a real negative attitude and extremely condescending. Had to fight to get a wooden fork and a single napkin. Good place for a hostile take over!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Isis Goode","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPe-8SfLM1IvjMasEaMTfKGhJkRTNSxyUhSBqDENUMMlnn9PO8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"RATS! DO NOT EAT HERE: If I could put negative stars I absolutely would, after placing a take out order at the last call I went in and no one was in there but a young male and the owner. While sitting there for already 10 minutes my best friend, little sister and I were in absolute shock when we heard a group of what sounded like very large rats run through the walls and the roof for about 5 minute straight along with chewing. When we stated we wanted a refund and that they should really close down because its a safety hazard the young male went into the back and we heard him say “they don’t want the food now because they heard the rats” so they already knew about them, the owner comes out and starts yelling and arguing with me acting like we were doing a disservice to him because we didn’t want food from a place infested with rats. When we said we could call the health board they said they already knew and they’re were told it was fine and I have no idea what I was talking about, it seems unlikely they would still be in business if the board knew. Any ways very concerning and I wouldn’t eat here if I were you (I inserted a picture of what a already covered rat hole in the front lobby looks like)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjvSWkeBDLdjNlrN_6-56kuMAmxhPX-OSXDBGK&fid=0x0:0x3d3e6ef388481383"],"When":"2023-11-13"},{"Name":"Greg Dietlein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9UkJNp9uMeV37Upe_GGK8pHLehqrqM8mY2CTh2Nq32-JM3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is an amazing restaurant. Great food and very reasonable pricing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dan Uyen Duong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr0V5wEvhPPcQnA-afbHFMhtw3wYt_rzpvtLqHaXlGVmZ2ZSG6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The kind and generous owner gave it to me. Thank you so much, I’m very appreciate that.
Taste is really good and yummy, I’m totally love it 😍
Cheers,","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMR245Bfr15yZxQB6XcqAbU3tXEcBvZVIaGhhlB&fid=0x0:0x3d3e6ef388481383"],"When":"2021-5-16"},{"Name":"Alex Ocampo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMt5X2rIPheFZw2mQlWPedA6h9JBzBx4XpCxFlcTxHHiYV8z9S=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pizza. It was my first time buying and it was really good and fresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0_-Ei0VwhJhWrx897fsk8_K7oYBLzf4R8x7nj&fid=0x0:0x3d3e6ef388481383"],"When":"2023-5-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Preet Sidhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlEXZq8NkVRk9QaPYrqE7CMvUst53KW9MGJ-tsny_HmjE_U-w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's the best place for punjabi cuisine in alder. The new management is really good and kind to their customers. Really working hard. Very delicious food I ordered panner bhurji and salmon tandoori. My family loved the food it was very tasty. Recommended to everyone. Good management, delicious food, not expensive, cleaned area loved it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMO-quGYILpxAKeRVL0D019pLOoUIb6FmjL87_V&fid=0x0:0x51bf20010fe73d62"],"When":"2022-1-6"},{"Name":"Harman Sidhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9FMTrK05C7PyiOJ4NYcuSKIQLLeOPv8cze83SdBf9skyN=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really nice area and the new management working hard for their customers I ordered  chicken tikka and Dhal makhni.
I would definitely recommend it. The new management are really kind and sweet to their customers. Ordered  alot from here. Worth ordering food from here not that expensive. Very delicious food everyone should order once from here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsIiw8Z98cfeMZ6pAAfJCCdAmRgmJh5MT93HM&fid=0x0:0x51bf20010fe73d62"],"When":"2022-1-6"},{"Name":"Navdeep Kaur Kahlon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLKIvKJMYqlmuYqvslxeEMDWnbxprwcp4KG5dvNO-df3PlLr7c=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You all have to try "Veer Ji’s" chicken tikka, Dhal Makhni, Salmon Tandoori, and Paneer Bhurji. It’s so delicious and the staff is so friendly and easy-going. Just a day before yesterday, I ordered all these items for a house party, and everybody loved them so much that I had to make a special request for more of them on the spot.

Thank you for this delicious food and the wonderful service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGIoYCaEzr3AU7VxNVUYIXeg32qP3VJJ1AgbSs&fid=0x0:0x51bf20010fe73d62"],"When":"2022-1-6"},{"Name":"Amitinder Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiFXQTpQt47PZMLRxMUi6cQBnkib8DDh3RYGlHatma-MrpFWwh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My personal favorites : butter chicken and fish pakora. And the Indian sweets they have - Laddu and Jalebi - definitely recommended when it’s fresh. The girl at the front counter has a pleasant personality. So overall experience gets 5 stars always.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUoRTM0w0GwQ_YPQkVgQ2bt090ESljN682mxEy&fid=0x0:0x51bf20010fe73d62"],"When":"2020-10-29"},{"Name":"majhail","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPfH5DPbcbX-7NOH5X7vXB75TGmPMtKzNiPEvNYtYuuwnsJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered fish pakora. Worst taste, returned it. Even don’t took money back but please don’t serve this type of food. give 0 star if I could.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kristen Stokes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnB8TMgrLX1kBisa0c99bM2sYxfA3ketCbxuwRgoUidWe_Fwar=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"One star because there isn't anything lower. Although I would love to support this business because they offer to feed the homeless... I just... I can't. I called to order for pick up, after giving all the order details I get hung up on. I call again to confirm the order, to again, get hung up on. After calling several times to recieve nothing but their voicemail, I tried calling from another phone, just to recieve their voicemail. I tried to give them the benefit of the doubt, that their having phone issues, that they received the order details and that it'd be ready in about 20-25 minutes. I get there, and they have a mask required sign in the window- which I respect. I put my mask on, and go inside just to see that absolutely no one is wearing a mask, let alone gloves for handling food. I ask for my order, and they say they never input the order because they couldn't confirm. They tried saying that they called me to try to confirm but got voicemail. However, I was by my phone(s) the entire time I was waiting. I called them on their lie and they were silent. Nevertheless, I ordered again and waited patiently. However, within that time I noticed that the place is filthy - every spot that the customer could see is clean, although when looking closer there is dust and insects in all the nooks and cranies. After receiving my food they said they were having technical difficulties and had to use the debit machine from the business next door. As long as I paid for what I received, I don't care.

HOWEVER, I'm once again let down and disappointed from them when I get home. I asked for spicy butter chicken and it is the most bland butter chicken I've ever tasted. Lacking all seasoning and flavor. All I can taste is the yogurt. Their Naan is more like flat, tasteless, pancakes than actual Naan. Veggie pakora is also tasteless. Only flavor I taste is in the sauce.

Won't be coming back. Highly disappointed. Disastrous experience. Not worth the money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI7RK4WYfKLf8Gl3tFcgnhBYao4nAioTMdsD-7&fid=0x0:0x51bf20010fe73d62"],"When":"2021-8-11"},{"Name":"Harsimran Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDa1UNDMjPgv8WXJwYPcX6bLZjELBQG9JAUIMHAF1dX03GPxu_PA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I got one dish from here and I believe all locations preparations are same and good in taste. The service was quick and easy. I ordered my food on phone and it was hot and ready when I reached.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPFXo3SgsypzW_EfzQt123IJPlNRbBZ5jFhU3m&fid=0x0:0x51bf20010fe73d62"],"When":"2022-1-17"},{"Name":"Nam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6uXfmmArUYZbtjHP5ojEJ-Wc2-DJpCPohc0IRcSdAOp7csOA-ng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best Indian food in town.
The tikkas and pakoras are to die for.
The chaat items are my favourite.Butterchicken,chhole bhature and samosas are best sellers here.
Lipsmacking food indeed.
#SmallBusiness
#SupportSmallBusiness","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6NgGctFDT3MKlPGs9Uqb_wHHDdggXD_trf8l6&fid=0x0:0x51bf20010fe73d62"],"When":"2022-1-8"}]

[{"Name":"NAVDEEP BRAR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWnnyrdYHaKVyRjZIxIcNSoGkweuPo-y4tvj4Qqu7vv-YPJC8G=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very delicious pizzas, specially I love barbecue and tandoori chicken is so mouthwatering..quick service with good staff","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lyall Sharman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeZZNXTAE-VlfRBsATp7-ReU9jG4EpkURbjYf_ZJ3cNG8PpkA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time ordering.  Ordered through Uber eats. Fast delivery, hot, great flavour. Did a cheese and a meat lovers. We’ll order from them again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf4IqJmmA8A6imncOjqrMPoPT0f8MDAOVXb6hz&fid=0x0:0xa0485e3cb63f81b2"],"When":"2023-12-23"},{"Name":"Logan Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJL2z9Cb6E5C2kfa5cSri6j6_xobMqZXkZe9-nNiIrUZf1p2YIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped by for a fresh ready slice of pizza and was welcome by a very kind man! The pizza I received was very hot, the crust was nice and thick, and there was tons of cheese as well as meat! Would highly recommend","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sukh Tattla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlvbQH7EPHJB0AuM5BZW02Rl7r_YDI6BwXru5bTWTsgHaNtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"First of all, jan 28 at 5:47 pm the lady on phone was very rude. And i ordered two pizzas from this store.. no ranch in the box and worse service ...this store is close to my house ...its better to order from pizza hut on 264th street ... much better quality and franchisee service.....they never compete them ...
We support local business but their service and staff provide worse service
Train her well whoever on phone ....","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephanie P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-4V5W0G1mVSiYPlXNP3e6PmWdiwm9d2AsXHSO3qltApSdfAI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Has always been our go to ……for good quality pizza 🍕
Tonight was definitely a confirmation along with the friendly staff.

We did an order on skip the dishes but something went wrong and our order didnt get Picked up.
But to the rescue….. the kind gentleman at the restaurant decided to bring us the order himself.
I am beyond grateful for the kindness.  Thank you so much for taking care of your customers.   Highly recommend this place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jas Buttar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMF1NSTQHF27_gXQtRex3cK4G05wyrsIHZhYepX3CsiTAwpYVc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"on friday morning, i ordered shahi paneer pizza. pizza was very tasty. the girl on the front was very polite. i really appreciate her service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sun dental Gallery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6VUhgokDBgj2CWFu2pHUVlp60rf3tKON7trz0lvtIml2r4y8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best pizza served in the whole Aldergrove area .we came here to visit and tried their pizza .it's yummy ,pizza was loaded with toppings and blessed with cheese .I would recommend everyone to try it.Staff is well managed ,helpful and too polite .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Game ER","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdGk8mL9XR7caz6k1qefYV-hzkp7p4VFzX1zukgyBKiFKH-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Every time I order for pick up over call they get my order incorrectly. Sassy and dry when politely stated the order was incorrect. Food is good but service needs work.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Felisha Tucker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwCaUa7h30nsqeE-2T2HYOwFO3Eb8SGz8JxAAtZlKkSMGROi0WZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"0 ⭐️ stars! 🤢🤢 SAVE YOUR MONEY!! we were super pumped about pizza night until we opened the boxes! The pizza did not look appetizing &&& DOES NOT TASTE LIKE FOOD FOR HUMAN CONSUMPTION let alone PIZZA 🤢🤢 waste of $35","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5TwWqpSL4yBu2pU0t_CVtkNnOSPLCOQz_m_E9&fid=0x0:0xc6d1902ee44eca96"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"marty bryant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvv-VrS9mltOA7EntyGXzUvvzCfoz3eKA8CBi16U2gbr5UxCTS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If I could leave 0 stars I would. First time ordering from here and definitely the last, Lasagna had no meat/tomato sauce and was literally swimming in water. Wouldn't redeliver and would only offer a credit for the next time we order, which obviously won't be happening.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhoydB719-ZrA14lUP9b6OmyuaD7YuapDqxcjz&fid=0x0:0xc6d1902ee44eca96"],"When":"2024-1-14"},{"Name":"Alex Connell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIaCUfxY-AUpno1w5l43b8vJwy2YCRWUGPFRmrJcXOddhvunQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just bad pizza..cheese is processed garbage...7 11 is better than this...save your money..Aldergrove sucks for pizza","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel E. Tennant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEWOxow4SEdaLYYMU-Un4mYsgfW7RnehW4KEuKVB4tn_uZ-w0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's always good, but I only order new York no 4, so I'm not sure how other pizzas taste. But I know the owner puts love and effort into the pizzas I do order. Way better than dominios or any other pizza place in aldergrove.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Holly Gaden Williams (GUDGOLLYMSHOLLY)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAsDGFEOwjetTVSnGFXXHaOSK0wyBGP2IxrGkFfKr4Ujw7iAjMzw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"WOW!! if it were possible Id give this place 110🌟 outta 10🌟!  My Husband & I only went in for a Pepsi.  my husband only had his debit card and so said forget it..the owner said, "no worries its on the house" we ended up chit-chatting for a while and letting him know that we had just moved to town less than a month ago and he said well you must try pizza so that you can see him in the picture making my very own personal ham and pineapple pizza...again on the house.  this man makes the most amazing pizzas real pizza the kind you'd expect to get in Italy!  absolutely mouth-watering not over greasy not soggy from too much moisture perfect perfection all the way he also has an assortment of other Foods he offers like pastas and many other items!! you have to check out the menu!
Youll also see 2 pictures of hand written script. Both those letters are to say "THANK YOU" from a Dr Mary Pollack as he donated prizes for community events.
The owners are a Husband and Wife team who demonstrate their LOVE to everyone in our Community through allowing us to taste their the love in every bite, as well as by supporting different events through donating prizes!
if you're reading this and you're nowhere near Alder Grove they also have a pizza business in Hope and in Abbotsford!!  and all sincerity I mean this if you are thinking of where to eat tonight go to Abby pizza not only will you be over the moon with the enjoyment of the food but the way you are instantly welcomed by the staff is something all businesses could learn from!!  WAY TO GO ABBY'S PIZZA!
THANKS AGAIN FOR THE WONDERFUL HAWAIIAN PIZZA, COCA COLA, AND THE KINMAN SHIP!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN65K2EUTYzHdGCp27bvgmgU3AXAj2A-avPFh7S&fid=0x0:0xc6d1902ee44eca96"],"When":"2020-9-23"},{"Name":"Robert Crocker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUJqnDzNzEGXgPTp-lea1CbYKeiHJs46oBS6svu0BkRcOihzc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Couldn't tell you how the food was. I walked in in the old man told me to get out before I could even order","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike MacDonald","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi3y0x87VpcaaMqpny7_x6ZHjri-oH1DMeyUeUZ6UqasGGVW0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was great~!
Crispy crust, good flavour~!
EXCELLENT PRICE~!

I’m sort of new to Aldergrove, and have tried most pizza joints over the last 2 years. This one is my favourite so far~!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nate Russell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHMvwEIS8Nq8ZkbcbQbybUfqVHOW2egdTILLTG6f3FxzBEaP2fAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pizza is absolutely fantastic. My new goto joint for pizza hands down!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tamiko Charlton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWm9fd67VLhYDr_32h8nNlnyMIQJaD8dOdn9G-eK6FPBIKYN5vb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here and was so impressed. Warm welcoming owners who really try to please. We ordered a variety of rolls, a yakisoba, and tempura. All were served quickly and tasted delicious. The waiter brought us all a little treat when he found out we were celebrating a birthday.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Seohee Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ25qsllRXbvfBEm0A729E4P0nnqoHCaWDIJxjqQIg1vtLnujF4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a really good time here tonight. Everyone treated me like a family and made me feel treated! The price here was reasonable and the taste was indescribably amazing! Foods are absolutely fresh as well. I think I'll come visit this place more often:) 👍👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgtz_cO8CZdTuvc_RKoZBsyrjt_v_W0-8IbF53&fid=0x0:0x897280d284a36061"],"When":"2022-11-27"},{"Name":"Tyrell Black","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrwMjTzNpWt5aqPOKlvj6DkkbwLIJDQl27B3wIyL1L8EVKQ0d6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Most likely the BEST VEGGIE BENTO BOX  I have ever ordered! The server told us that their restaurant was super new only 3 days open and they are already serving with such amazing quality! The restaurant is super clean and good atmosphere. If I lived locally I would eat here frequently for sure!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Ivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWawoRuhcvA5BxfL_MgMGARz5R8RJaIoCFWWwRQCzTPfpwUFYU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family had the lunch bento boxes and they were wonderfully larger than expected. I had a roll as well as this cream cheese and prawn wonton! Omg so delish! The staff are wonderful, the prices are great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgdVqRMWuANsQnzAtjxtuda-gtTvb777g6ISHb&fid=0x0:0x897280d284a36061"],"When":"2024-4-16"},{"Name":"Minhee Sung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzmhrcM5_NmrLZUPk897P_c4YJMcrDKf_P9g9x2vheSBJ4jY3h=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"stopped by for a quick lunch and I was very pleased! Staff was very friendly and helpful, and the everything I ordered came out super fast and delicious! I have very high expectations for sushi, and this place is definitely on my top list.
I was very happy with the experience, will be coming back again and would highly recommend this restaurant!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeremy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUo10XvP_8jjif3E5WaTwwWu6Q-XV6QYZ6DdP2Ldz5EZnmnYuXc_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food!!!! Very fast. Lunch sets are huge. Great price!! Sunomono salad is the best I’ve ever had with strawberries and grapes and shrimp 😃🤤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4V_iQJlNGM3Q_hQqIGsQ9latkk9m0IGvHqfP0&fid=0x0:0x897280d284a36061"],"When":"2019-11-16"},{"Name":"James Hill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQipfW0x8YBFWRmLu50JMimhaqsWkFJc-Ck73RheA6Zb59tg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I been here about 15 times, the first time it was decent kept me coming back.but the last few times I've gone it going down hill the tables are sticky an looks to be very little cleaning happening. I take my wife an kid this last time to have dinner ,the waiter brings us 3 glasses  of water an im big on looking at the rim of my cup at any restaurant,l look at my wife cup after inspection of mine , there literally a gob of spit or lougie,we informed the waiter.
This place needs to be health checked or get someone in there that has a cleaning background. Ps we got up an walked out.
I used to enjoy this place a few times before this happened","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S Jolley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCE3mrKGfyop6M-Rp4VC1UQG9ZiJeI79WOfXHZ9Uk4mVLYYaKh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite sushi restaurant. Everything is always fresh and delicious, and the staff are lovely. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Alex Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWh2B0SBidCJr18JIydy1YvgrNEDCrAGnyabxL4oDVJbnt2_Cw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"They charged me for water and dip when I bought the chicken strip it was small and not good. The prices is ridiculous I’ll just head to white spot. The only good thing is milkshakes and fries but they keep increasing the prices the milkshake large used to be 6.25$ now it’s 8$+. However they don’t get to choice the prices. The workers are so rude besides my friends who work there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mark Royer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCTBWZctKVbXLo_R3by2XLM-2T6Iq-7HPq6SIpzj-7QYb96YKp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Was recommended to try Triple O's by a buddy.  The closest location was at the Aldergrove Community Center.  Food was OK, but the price left a bad taste-- $43 for two sandwiches and two shakes???  Will not be returning.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wax Media","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlYLWDEwUY7kbjq9MSQFitSBzRMnr0oo2LyJEDq3N_qMybidTK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible the service was bad their fryer was so dirty. My burger was built upside down. We asked for extra ketchup the manager threw it in the bag rudely and walked away. No care was put into these over priced sad looking burgers. Ow and the fries had a hair in it","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"savana bibi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGqh62e2hztrYgtCMldzCzG6ZIAM8KYnvd4ijjmq3HnB6_FaM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I feel cheated. My husband and I bought two drinks, but only shared one. After a few minutes, the remaining drink reduced to half. I realized later that this is why there was so much leftover drink in the jar after pouring it out into two cups. An employee gave the rest of the drink to another employee on break. It's unfair that we paid full price but the employees got the leftovers. The drink didn't taste good either…I'm really disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAn8xeTAuW7nQfdVl2UDrES6NzlVSKkM_TQPjl\u0026fid=0x0:0xfc1de6f09e267f1c"],"When":"2023-5-27"},{"Name":"Maria Kristianne Santiago","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUropq5pa4AHt67VGg3QJuvN05K0Jqqd0Qy0g8cIiDWG6NP6nXx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is by far the best branch of Triple O’s I’ve ordered from. I always request for “extra, extra” sauce and they never disappoint; may it be a breakfast or lunch burger. Safe to say they really follow their customers’ requests which I honestly appreciate because their burgers are one of my favourites! 🫶🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHc9jTn-Qx6UieGxO2DfUFfW7sjnuqyU3W97lz\u0026fid=0x0:0xfc1de6f09e267f1c"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Rob Sebastion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjakSj6i9_7dOk20y3wCpxp4vXE8xXOrxZQc5WQ3-s5BmvTvRT-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Very young workers that felt that it would be a good idea to sit on buckets and play on there phones. I understand it's in a community center/ice rink and not very busy but they need to look professional.  My burger did not look fresh nor was it hot. These employees need a tune up and do there job in a professional manner. As an owner YOU should be embarrassed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVCS_l2tEBg0UwqR18Bwu1Bs9SuGuJkZ8vAy0IMHtf5Cf48p-ETQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was friendly, food was yummy, our order was ready super fast! Much faster than any other Triple O's I've been to. This is a take out only situation, so there's no restaurant seating.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"megan O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCl-QWBmLm167HWP4fhPjtpmTHw0LW08YEj9uIQ_l3sOiTjdoWhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Sooooooo\n... Im here now and am having a horrible experience!! used to love the girls here last year....and well today it all changed..im the only.one ordering food and the girl who i was clearly \"disturbing her cell phine time\". Was such a cow omg! I fidnt see kid meals on the menu so i politly asked her if theyre was kids meals...she says uh huh with an eye roll....Anyways long story shortAnyways long story short it wasAnyways long story short it was the worstAnyways long story short it was the worst customer serviceAnyways long story short it was the worst customer service I've had in years!\n...... I could have understood the attitude if they were really busy but I was the only one there.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Red Swan Pizza Aldergrove

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nikki Colson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyfGy7bgl6e1bYlSbWx0h26IQAyFi7RSREOXmjIe2hyywXt84=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I know I know “OMGGG ALDERGROVE DOESNT NEED ANOTHER PIZZA PLACE” and I hear you, it’s getting out of control.
However, I want to talk about Red Swan Pizza. We are lucky to have this place.
We tried it out tonight and out of the 15 pizza places in Aldergrove, it’s officially my new fav. They bake their dough fresh in house every morning. They use quality ingredients (none of those gross bacon balls, REAL bacon!).
It’s not paper thin like some of these other places.
Prices are really reasonable.
I would highly recommend giving them a try!
They only are open 4-9 this week for their soft opening while training etc but they did say they would be open 9AM-10PM in the coming weeks.
Customer service was amazing, food was amazing, 10/10 from me!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipManN_jvCzj4pkduhEpTiKNu2lioHKbcgNam4zC&fid=0x0:0xbcaea6b148b4ce05"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Khush Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXq903wJ2hPG1CHHvXL4Czl5soM3U_M05nA24u-XDXDXHsxMgA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Literally saying must try guys…the quality of pizzza is so different as compare to other pizza stores and the customer service is also so  gud . They are so polite and carefully listen and fulfill the customer’s expectations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIa5WriLqhXra8vCTHfJ7mTXI2h3YhWBepwa3v&fid=0x0:0xbcaea6b148b4ce05"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Shane Hamelin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHaeLcdNDLqpeufB3tUG327uD13TtqfER8ekqx_Ozn2D_uew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing service, great prices and the pizza is AMAZING. We will definitely be purchasing their pizza again very soon","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Harneet Walia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIEUPxwvvW-LlHPsCHzjV7mWsSsnMicr1NtOURwfAfiuK0SjA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing pizza and amazing customer service

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Paul Intile","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-RdF6AqnACOqZqUL4lGMbRn0v2LQUG3z990_n-NEYD3TIS02q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the Deluxe “Bro pack” (9 perogies) hot lunch with sausage on Friday. It was delicious! Better than any fast food place for the money, that’s for sure. Their frozen perogies are also amazing; we’ve had them several times. And everyone’s always friendly here. Definitely recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeaDUQKEJlbvPjbAG9SMVsfMCIX5RDC6pcg7zu&fid=0x0:0xe24f9eb92ae6477d"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Gurv","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhwceJhFcjYo11eH0UjktVpbt4vgW7SS5aHechrSipNjogSGM7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing service and perogies! I’ve been wanting to grab some perogies from Veronica’s for years now and finally had the chance to pop in yesterday. Service was delightful. Even talked me through the best way to good them. I got the deluxe and made them last night, they were delicious. Also got the jalapeño popper and plan to make them tonight! Please support this wonderful local business! I’ll definitely be returning!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQ6fwsSHBI6QqspPHKo45iyEp6zruzML6c8rcK&fid=0x0:0xe24f9eb92ae6477d"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Rachel Stephens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGsdjSv1O_vgn32KLkelaO9Nw1vBtGCZ0CTwqr6vVKEq3Kybo32Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I joined yet another gluten-free group on Facebook and noticed someone posted about Veronica's Gourmet Perogies making gluten-free pierogies once a week to pick up on weekends. Apparently they clean their entire kitchen so it's safe for celiacs like me to eat their pierogies.

Within 30 seconds of seeing the post, I messaged the business by leaving a comment about how I wish I had known about them earlier because the cut off time had already passed to place a gluten-free order for the week. Within 2 hours, I received a response and they let me squeeze in an order because I live in Las Vegas, USA.

Two days later I flew up North and drove our rental car to pick up pierogies after sitting in Vancouver traffic. We made it 20 minutes before they closed and they had my frozen order waiting for me. I saw that they also sell a gluten-free pork sausage for $7 CAD (precooked I believe) and added that to my order.

We had a kitchen in our time share so I cooked up the sausage. It was very nice. I brought a cooler picnic basket with me through the airport full of ice. Because I have Celiac disease, I can bring food with me on planes. Security checked it and luckily, the pierogies are professionally packaged, labeled and sealed so I was able to bring them across the border.

I believe we paid $16 CAD for 12 pierogies. We got 12 garlic lovers and 12 delux that are seasoned with feta and bacon in the mashed potato filling.

The instructions were clear and accurate. They were easy to cook once we got off the airplane.

If you're Celiac, preorder from them. I don't know of a single place in the States that even offers gluten-free pierogies, so this is likely your only chance!

Visited: April 2024","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6C08OqboGv0jjfCp_rby2YVTNEIA734rsUFln&fid=0x0:0xe24f9eb92ae6477d"],"When":"2024-4-22"},{"Name":"Scott Perry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXA62UgdjYO9FAc0ZgOmsWeN-u7IMpZi09R1jSwr4rklxDZlO9l=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently my wife and sisters ordered a large order that was being picked up by my sister from the Fraser Valley and driven to my home in E Van but part of the order was not grabbed as part of our total order that we were going to serve for a family reunion type of meal.

Veronica's son, Logan, drove into E Van on a dark, rainy evening (in Canucks game traffic!) plus they added some treats and other products to the order!

Unbelievable service - going the extra miles to keep customers happy (and it's fabulously yummy food)!

We're so grateful for this company!! Thanks Veronica & Logan!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tal Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdcX5lteMW7YGdoBC5XzBwLnJaPXqogWXPCXIWpiTDj9lk9pSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Veronica's Pierogies never disappoint. My family is vegan, therefore we always get the vegan pierogies (you can't even tell they are vegan) along with the vegan borscht. We always load up our freezer.

The shop is super clean and all the staff always greet us with a smile.

Highly recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxWLEY8QfvnQ1zFAMmyTipQ8TTAVGUpox44KOQ&fid=0x0:0xe24f9eb92ae6477d"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Gary Pihowich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo_Zm_pNpWzz3n303EJRGHhQPI1rpyoUxD6ICc39Vp8kMvZuJg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Veronica's makes Authentic Ukrainian style Perogies that my Great Grandmother would approve of. I highly recommend trying her Sunday's Fresh Perogies (Variety varies each Sunday). Numerous Frozen varieties available throughout the week.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tasenka K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJggB8xHx4ewr3cXswiDul_7Z4Fu83e2sAxOp3FYStNygTb0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious perogies I don’t feel guilty buying (instead of making them myself) because I know they are all hand pinched by real people- like babas and Ukrainian women, Same as the ones I learned from! I usually get the Vegan options. My favourites are the dill potato and Russian garlic. I’ve tried her fruit  perogies in the past when they are in season and the Blueberry ones are out of this world! The borsch and cabbage rolls are also good, but usually I can muster up the energy to make my own. They also sell things to go with perogies like sauerkraut and sour cream and sausages, etc.  And seasonal crocheted perogy ornaments for the tree! I love this small business! Veronica is always a delight, she makes you feel good when you come in, and I see her giving back to the community. I feel lucky to have a business like hers near me, and so should you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amy Strobel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlXZnWwbPYeEBjVfx0mAELywBS7D4ukLoqLoZ567llPGFVKIk_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Celiac review- Veronica’s perogies are amazing! So tasty!! They clean the kitchen top to bottom, sanitize equipment and wear fresh aprons! And best of all I didn’t get sick!!!! I will definitely be back for more! 😋","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Platinum edge Gaming","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5z7ocM7A9QGCTqPxscn445CrJd9uzX5h5N05_dFzvSl9S1tk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I want to give a huge shoutout to Brian. He is an absolute gem of an employee—always hard-working, incredibly polite, and goes above and beyond to ensure customers have a great experience. Every time I visit, Brian's positive attitude and dedication stand out. He is a true asset to this location and deserves recognition for his efforts. Honestly, he has all the qualities of a great leader and should be promoted to manager. Keep up the fantastic work, Brian!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dylon Burkart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXbBNxKMca5c8VkQhPG8kij4oFnOrQPPEKvaFictbFaQY6qg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A review for Brian. In an industry where customer care tends to fall behind and each customer is nothing more than a numbered order Brian has remembered us. Kept it professional, while keeping his job #1 but returning a sense of appreciation to his returning customers. His ever positive attitude is a breath of fresh air, we wish him the best in anything and everything he does. McDonalds is lucky to have you on staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kristin Cote","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlsZjHQpVbzUo519-_sdr7hAomHbNkLWSEndEh5R9rhgRHn8UE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This has to be the worst McDonalds ever. Every single time I go through the drive thru my order is wrong. Last night there are 5 of us in a truck going through the drive thru. Whike we where ordering the lady was super impatient and rude. When we get to the window she hands me some bags and I check my order because well its always wrong and sure enough they shorted me a medium fries and my happy meal. I asked for the happy meal and fries and she gets me the happy meal and than says you didn't order 5 meals even though I did have 5 drinks. So I said I ordered 4 meals and 2 cheeseburgers and a medium fries and medium drink she gets super rude and goes and gets her manager. The manger comes over and says you didn't order. So I said than I need to buy one and she gets super rude rolls her eyes starts arguing with me than slams the drive thru window as hard as she can and goes and grabs me my fries. I don't know why they have to be so rude. I always thought McDonalds was about good customer service. It was a medium fries that they didn't hear me order so I said I would pay. I don't understand why I had to be treated so horrible . My husband goes here almost every morning for the first 2 weeks we lived here for breakfast but since they never had McGriddles he stopped going there at all. The owner needs to teach his staff customer service training. I will drive to Langley or Abbotsford for McDonalds from now on.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarbjit Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpoeiFX0Oi2mfwjcYcqPfDfAfZCjegbPMFxUajM_OhXawvtHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It’s 2:30 AM, and I’m exhausted. The last thing I want to do is write this complaint, but my experience at your drive-through about 45 minutes ago definitely warrants sharing.

The girl at the drive-through, wearing a brown sweatshirt and large glasses, was rude while we placed our order. My son had changed his mind mid-order, which seemed to confuse her. I thought she was adding a second meal rather than replacing the first one, so I tried to clarify by repeating everything. She abruptly snapped at me, almost yelling, "I got it!" Her reaction took me by surprise, and even my son, who usually stays calm, was shocked.

When we got to the window, I mentioned that I found her response rude. Instead of apologizing, she got defensive and agitated. When I asked for her name so I could speak to her supervisor later, she refused to give it and then slammed the window shut.

I visit Aldergrove regularly, staying weeks at a time, and switched to McDonald’s for my coffee from the Tim Hortons across the street because of the incredibly delightful service I receive from Brian at the drive thru. I recognize that working the late shift is unpleasant and difficult, as I too have recently done graveyard shifts in a restaurant, however,. that is not a reason for attitude towards paying customers.  I genuinely think this young lady could benefit from some customer service training from someone like Brian.

As a Punjabi person with years in hospitality and service, it really frustrates me to see rude comments about us on social media. After tonight’s experience, though, I can understand why people sometimes feel that way. I hope this feedback is helpful and that it encourages some positive change.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Trevor Shaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbti2GWbWUVVS1VT-Cwy_QcvMGjcL36n3i03y_nnekuVXxyjMJNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"McDonald’s has ALWAYS been great even though I will sometimes eat at the other fast-food joints… But because Trump loves McDonalds AND because they got world-wide attention when one of their workers called 9-11 that led to the capture of the “CEO Killer”, Luigi Mangione, I’m very happy they did and put the Altoona, Pennsylvania location on the map 👍🏼","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Natalie Bryant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-o7CKzU-dl2H0f_Qe9d5EC0Xb6pfbvuB9_pTU6vmREbJvIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This location says that it is a 24 hour location for drive thru and eat in yet they lock there doors anywhere from 10pm onward almost every single night. Tonight I
came at 10:10 the doors were locked and some guy came to the door and said the store was being power washed inside and that it would be a danger to let me in and told me to go walk thru the drive thru. Are you kidding me you want me to walk thru the drive thru I come to this McDonald's almost every night before I go to work and the service keeps getting worse and wo
rse. There is clearly a customer in your restaurant for 15 mins from 10:15 - 10:30 but I was told to walk thru the drive thru worst customer service ever!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhndW9IiVbXQVR9Rtk70ZoqU0V1ZUINLNMDfc2&fid=0x0:0x70b5126d66e3a256"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Irish King","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQw6fRdFF-VQ_YAc6zYe44z2Sv-O_zd3aKMHNb9rY9y56E8g9iGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unfortunately for the community members of aldergroove were stuck with the horrible service at this location.  Just ordered a double quarter pounder Blt.  They chucked the food in a box and kind enough to included a huge end of the lettuce.  The location needs a complete audit and some mystery shoppers.  Hands down worst McDonald's around.  Don't stop here plenty of great choices at each corner, they would be happy to take you money and give you quality in return.
This is not the first time but it is now the last. Can't knock the staff when managment is to blame. Hands down worst McDonald's in BC","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ben Evans","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2iXAqjVeneujT02InS5UMF4w8VpzuiRrMRXbpdwHnJFSEdSJ8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Service is the worst I have seen in years, as one who works in service industry it was completely unacceptable. The customers around me felt the same way, everyone was talking and saying how no orders where being taken or completed. The crew was in the back fumbling burgers and not having anything ready, the least they could do is acknowledge that the customers are there waiting to order, the most we got was a finger pointing at our face to wait. Honestly disrespectful, one person I would like to highlight was grace she was rude taking my order ruder serving my food and had some of the worst body language displayed I have ever seen. She repeatedly rolled her eyes, scoffed at my order, and had no sense of urgency I was waiting at least 10 Minutes to order, all I was getting was a refill on my drink and a hamburger using my monopoly game piece. The customers around me would agree and had very similar experiences. When I received my hamburger it was clearly sitting there for a long time the Ketchup was all the was trough the bun soaking it, while the top bun was as hard as a rock sitting under the heater for too long. It is honestly unbelievable that people just don’t have manners anymore or the decency to be a good human anymore it shows a lot about who the company hires and how the service industry is just going down and down. I come here often after baseball practice and it never changes this was the last straw for me.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ryley Crayford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZ7Bsz8BtdfGGrw7WPcBw95UDG6XqixPZHKBnp8SAmEMK7W1I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We stopped in as a couple to have a quick meal before the movies.

Ordered  2 Teen Combos, the restaurant was busy with 3 people ahead of us and at least 5 still waiting for their food.

After taking our order it took 15 minutes for the kitchen to produce our burgers and an additional 10 more minutes to produce our fries... Needless to say our burgers were cold by the time the fries arrived.

After taking 25 minutes to be able to eat it was disappointing to say the least.

Been to this location many times over the years but this was definitely the worst service I've experienced here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shenandoah Schmidt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqqyWHIdvWbCR0SUbsytrSLAtU9KSLuFOcqs1soDWxH_UWQ1rj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My husband went out of his way to pick up burgers for us tonight because I wanted burgers, but I am allergic to cheese, so he asked for one without. But he got home after half an hour of driving and both had cheese all melted into them and it's too long to go back, so now I'm washing my burger and hoping it doesn't have any residue left. We're both sad that we paid for this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNw0GqnrgN8KBf4imVwn2jvxZ6tmYo1jLXn8qAl&fid=0x0:0x2eaaace5097b6da3"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Nancy Pech","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqMSXXkUn-mA21ybHJLVVItfwPo-HXe0gG56O3z08Tq4KlwA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Went here for the Halloween kids pack and decided to get dinner for the family. We waited in the drive thru for over 30 minutes and found out at the payment window that the kids meal is not free unless it was dine in. I went through three advertisements and it was not noted anywhere that it was a dine in only deal. I was surprised to learn about the stipulation at the window and the cashier proceeded to ask me " do you want it or not?" In a rude tone. I did not appreciate the customer service provided when given misleading information through A&W's advertising. At that point, we took our food and left and additionally, to our surprise, the drinks provided were also wrong. I would not recommend coming to this location.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arun Sarasan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpb7xy7H2HMPhXGtXxAE_Iujiw1TWe6jr5snMAUyzbODzyhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exceptional customer service by Shubham. He went above and beyond today.
I was at his store for breakfast and I forgot my wallet; and he paid for my meal. Is that amazing and we need people like you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wayne Ellis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSW27WloSv-Ltl4n7UXxgV821Nl6OZFtsc45AZkP9nS4WkVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Drive thru order and now almost every time I order they tell me the total but when I get the machine to pay there is no total so I ask them to show it before I tap and they say they can't, couldn't really understand what I was asking ? Seems a bit sketchy to me, anyway asked for a receipt and will compare my bank charge with the receipt and if it differs I guess I'll sit on hold with my bank for an hour until i reach a customer service agent to complain. And the the fries are cold !!! Seems like they are now always cold ! Gone down hill here...w'ont be back there as gave them too many chances.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mark Royer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCTBWZctKVbXLo_R3by2XLM-2T6Iq-7HPq6SIpzj-7QYb96YKp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Orderedbthe Chubby Chicken sandwich.  Received the Anorexic Chicken sandwich (chicken patty was very thin).  Staff was friendly.  Fries and root beer were good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"C vdM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqpCDnjz1LQHBT6m_-XpDVyKgcFVlaaO6F0r9gUqhOAuQBf1I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently used the A&W drive-in service, and it was a great experience, largely thanks to the excellent service provided by Shubham. From the moment I pulled in, Shubham was quick to greet me with a friendly and professional attitude, ensuring that the ordering process was smooth and easy. As soon as I place my order at the mic he already knows it's me and what I usually order.

The food arrived promptly, hot, and exactly as I ordered. What really stood out was Shubham’s attention to detail—he made sure everything was correct, checked in to see if I needed anything else, and delivered everything with a smile. It’s rare to find such attentive service, especially at a drive-in, and Shubham made the experience that much better.

I’ll definitely be returning to this A&W drive-in location, knowing the service is consistently excellent. Thanks again, Shubham, for making my visit a pleasure!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amyann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9h724YdvHaF1NyioaDsN6xRNEeWTOAdoL8U7OK9zewN3n5MCP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The cost of food here went up. The quality went down. Usually when I have a mozza burger and poutine I can NEVER finish it. This time I finished it and wasn't even full. The burger patty was comparable to a mcdonalds kids cheeseburger patty. And the poutine when you dine in is served in a dish thats half the size of the take out container for the poutine they give you when you go take out  ... I was appalled. So expensive for mcdonalds quality...never again am I going to a&w","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nicole Beaverstock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINlxlqrls3P2n0sb12ZhDTVLEoEcSNKk-nM6JWCwRB8vGQug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Called with 45 min left till closing and asked if they'll still make pizza, they will!

Domino's came in VIP clutch. Got a pepperoni pizza at 12:30 on a Tuesday night.

Absolutely hit the spot. Just what I needed. Gave a $5 tip for a $21 pizza. 🙏

Thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYjItPCaMS8oDIvY1PHXeTM5K4qaY0Ttd-pNn_&fid=0x0:0x984fd7a3c9156984"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Andrea Ross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdZW_b7rUJ_f2WCuBemTQvKzKHUd5lEuApubxMvKRaw08GFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nothing is better than Domino's pizza fresh out of the oven.  The staff are always polite and quick to make sure your order is complete.  I love that I wanted pick up at 12:15 and last box was being closed as I walked in the door","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kaitlyn Dee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIoHAqOtAEUqJFw107CA4cLJjDozjZNYc1mIC-rCMqsK9wJvAx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good pizza, fast service, and more affordable than most other pizza places in my experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMyq7L08S2bAEP2EsfM4Wl434pAJQk_cSFK1p1&fid=0x0:0x984fd7a3c9156984"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiTo_wMls_R6ZNJ6aOiyMQXWh11V6szVkBrZy0NIS70n918Byl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered here a number of times now and they’ve been fairly consistent with me. Be wary of people who give 1 star reviews who have had one bad experience out of their many and throw up a bad review.

They’ve been great to me every time and I’d go back to them if I’m ever in the area of this specific location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPj1ZXjqB0eZY6kwdgh6gRDIcyzeU5GjzpIDnU3&fid=0x0:0x984fd7a3c9156984"],"When":"2020-1-24"},{"Name":"Thomas Waite","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZnL5d79bpI4w6UuYfxXFy-IlThp-PA5mIhGiGAcrgzokBw2doHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Piping hot, what felt like pounds of dough, delicious gooey dough and was finished more quickly than their tracker. (Which is admittedly automated and not actually tracking what's happening in the store though I still like watching the little bar fill)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Devin Mowbray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8o9zHvcXHzuepg1gIDqB2ZneIWb6K2fXDNZyAJ5lCGDvdovcq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They used the wrong sauce on the pizza, I called and the guy said he'd add some store credit to my account. UPDATE: never got the free pizza. I just made an order for the first time since then and I got a call from them saying they cant deliver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYJtoZvhultrvK1Wqy1C6NWZq6mfvXXBKvoxs7&fid=0x0:0x984fd7a3c9156984"],"When":"2019-4-11"},{"Name":"Jill S.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXI5ikzdbEeWw39PyuQSQkjtuQFCGzsAQQZw6KJbatxyDlFr78TsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such amazing pizza!!  We love the 6 cheese, Canadian and the spinach feta (amazing with a thin crust!).  I’m sure the others are great too but these are our favourites.  Love the coupons too!  Makes it affordable for a large family or party!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Taylor Jurka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8Q4YZeKE_kYD6glXOeyWCX6U02LFfLD97Bz1YyMXIccr3Cg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’ve been getting bbq sauce drizzled on top of my pepperoni pizza for 10+ years but today all of a sudden it’s against policy at the Aldergrove location and instead I was offered the chance to purchase a dip which btw is not the same sauce. I ended up taking my tip and heading to another location who low and behold had no idea what they were talking about and put bbq sauce on my pizza 👍🏽 will not be going back to the Aldergrove location!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNESHsRNIiC4VrQqqicOp4fMHqgkPTrcPeuckrX&fid=0x0:0x984fd7a3c9156984"],"When":"2023-5-14"}]
