user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Danny Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7uIYz7vEyRlzc_sXf7AZKfTfm0JEbWhx8kEmQrYQim7HLQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food quality was stable as a chained restaurant. The turnovers were however a bit disappointing. They were cold like they were taken from the shelves of a supermarket...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9IPR5wNa8BWjXIg1kmA6fANCdtbi3u6z33gg7&fid=0x0:0x49f9dbeda8426cf0"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow, what can I say pretty impressed with our first visited. Right we walked in, wow clean and everywhere looked wow for us. I like cleanliness and organized especially the restaurant is the most important thing for me. Amazing customer service and we loved everything we ordered. I normally didn't like fast foods and I barely have it but Arby only place I can eat without upset my stomach or dizzy or throw up. I didn't like french fries but can't stop eating their curly fries, so delicious! Really clean washrooms and a lot of parking spot. We just moved here so this place will be our favorite place. Thank you we had such a great time today for our first visited both me and my friend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMECWt9h7gpEwwo-8iHNpelq1sAVjty_JjamA48&fid=0x0:0x49f9dbeda8426cf0"],"When":"2023-1-12"},{"Name":"Sathiyaseelan Suhashini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGCDhZwAvUF3Q8iMEpEx8TQCvKbwiXzYFJN0uOrenEt7v0wxGX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh and juicy burgers with curly fries. I tried spicy fish sandwich and that was good in taste.

Friendly staff and spacious outlet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0Stb8TePWGt4rvAIuHqLHJyG_7tYiF--Q9T4u&fid=0x0:0x49f9dbeda8426cf0"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Alex Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWh2B0SBidCJr18JIydy1YvgrNEDCrAGnyabxL4oDVJbnt2_Cw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ate the number 1 combo. I enjoyed the messy roast beef until it actually got repetitive. It was getting everywhere and salty as ahh. Plus the curly fries are actually so garage. 1 stars for the fries. I don’t get why people glazed the curly fries. I’ll try more but honestly this is a solid 3 stars for mid.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elijah Levesque","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7Aczv7Ghc-Yorwk6DsXa-HtxJfAu1znMhtnvYvSc2hJofQRM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very clean space, good architecture besides tables, not too much leg room. Appreciated the open layout plenty of space while ordering. Cashier was nice. But at the top of it all the food is what made this dining experience incredible. I got the chicken Swiss and bacon sandwich and the variety and strength held in the flavours were remarkable. Going into the restaurant, expectations weren’t particularly high, but they were most definitely exceeded. 8.6 out of 10 overall. Will be coming back soon if the opportunity presents itself!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Melody","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiY8ysBjyJcViql_ofFIiOqubIUSlFxB5EgVEOmpGrGAkCTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Order the new Triple cheese turkey blt. Looked so good in the photo on menu. What a disappointment. Bad lettuce, Mushie tomato, thin precooked microwave bacon, squished bun. nothing like the photo - size wise and presentation wise. Husbands double beef and cheddar was good. Photos added.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNE4Y4724N9BMHmoFm3ZObQcDjKspg1b7QO_-qt&fid=0x0:0x49f9dbeda8426cf0"],"When":"2023-4-20"},{"Name":"Poinciana CPU","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdibQ2gubUyoRUvTaX40BeneNjXu2Ge9hW-Tz6WToj05_X6cM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Decent But they are missing some menu items that the US Arby's counterparts have such as the potato cakes and the arby's rib sandwich which is OUTSTANDING -
Hey Arby's management - bring the rib sandwich to Canada","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTlvv5fXWpnx2YTbOTERFQ7Qf2gZ-xWEl2aSQ9&fid=0x0:0x49f9dbeda8426cf0"],"When":"2022-12-27"},{"Name":"Dean Ziyone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDfsPi251XGpQm-15MJODmGslvopFJzSP9iFENEYFLmKJP2LgBNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Sunday night 9:00 pm purchased 2 smokey beef special 2 for $9.
She said they were out of battered oinion string. I asked could I get some cheese for missing onion. She told me the cheese cost more. I said just some to make up for the missing battered onion.
I ate one and started feeling sick 🤒 4hours later. I started loosing my caugnitive ability. I thought I was catching my friends couff from a throat irritation he had for a week. Went to bed that next day I felt okay and ate the other burger. This time it hit me instantly and went back to bed the whole day. I am still having this insatiable appetite to eat to make this feeling go away. I hope nothing jumps out of me? It is getting me concerned. I still have the wrappers. Anyways that what happen and that gut feeling is bothering me alot right now. I half to eat something.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joey Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVZMVi230Ra3hWeAcKIoMpyeLMSWFQ2xkY9PdwY9F1OSbaUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great donuts!  The apple fritters are huge.  I couldn't finish it and saved the other half for later.  I really liked the strawberry chocolate one.  It has chocolate cream in the middle.  So good.  Definitely worth a try and I'll be back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFvjrN6cyeaAKfZm6WgG_X8bOdi79LATQwOx1j&fid=0x0:0x5c86981b5fa373e1"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"M Prins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYWCMj9HZ6_2jMol4qrWBbE6l7uCmTatsMh6ch4jbiMYWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The variety of donuts—plus bites and twists and the huge and delicious apple fritter(!)—is worth it. Fun and just enough funky enough. Price is very good for the quality of food and service. I’m going back for another fritter and to try the cinnamon twist!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOZyaYgvz72iO5mKNhcbvHQCb_66_eW0Oukaw&fid=0x0:0x5c86981b5fa373e1"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Princess K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCM_T1SBbdqP6IOybsih_CsnLLCQsc8VKA0xXgB_lNDV064K9U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a MUST-try hidden gem of a donut
shop! Drove out from Chilliwack just to try their fritter, as it is so hard to find a real in store fried fritter that are huge!

Their apple fritter is so BIG with nice chunks of apple and all those nooks and crannies. This is definitely my absolute new fav place for fritters!! They’re so crispy and crunchy and so so tasty! Made fresh and not that pre frozen junk most places sell..

Staff are amazing and the owner (if she's the one that runs the social media who I chat with) is absolutely amazing, kind and so helpful! Truly make you feel like a valued customer.

Can't rave enough about this lovely place!! ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQuhrg5QUSPFRpGhkg0yWA5TGtMWGrbiK6Vc7y&fid=0x0:0x5c86981b5fa373e1"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Miss Mayhem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGowE1po-uzevgz4y-llWcltZGBd0Jj1Qx_2rqJzm0bNHjXwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing all around! Food, service and atmosphere.

The lady behind the counter greeted us instantly and was super helpful. We got there shortly after lunch so there wasn’t a full selection but still good options left to choose from.
I’ve been following this place on social media for a while so it was nice to finally make it to try it out.
Highly recommend the fritter, it’s huge but well worth it! We bought a few different ones to try out.

Highly recommend Hive donut hut!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNP2ZIc4F7PK1-FU_mo4Nf3GWWPaWKyYjaXX9Aw&fid=0x0:0x5c86981b5fa373e1"],"When":"2024-2-22"},{"Name":"Brittany Koop","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCN6yVI0iNR54-Bax9vL7yIbxC43H2vamEQzdqUvMeQ4Gm3I8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I love the location, the vibe and the staff. I ordered some Homer donuts and the smash burger fries. I will 1000% go back for those fries. The donuts however I didn’t love how they had a flavour in them? Possibly strawberry? I’m not sure but it tasted artificial and I just didn’t love it. The donuts were fresh though! Just my opinion on the flavour.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Doug Wiens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEJQzlwSnFNgwZgIz_49QUIh5YrmXuvexImjfYGx12BGWMkw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great to have delicious “old school” donuts.
These are quality donuts the way they used to be made before companies started using pre-mixed ingredients to cut their costs. You won’t be disappointed with any they sell.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lynne McGowan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJREMz7O6lI7R8CYca-rB2EslZb-5GTzrVjw6hb7uE-7kWrHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been looking for an amazing apple fritter, I can give up my search. They are amazing and actually have apple in them. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMATz_WcbEa5uXrzJYqAKgN74GpGQux4pbvS0wf&fid=0x0:0x5c86981b5fa373e1"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Cody","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWySkgkaQ4CPfZtn9M5Rfs6puRSJsfmEg_J8FeELmGC9RhjaR6nfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The donuts here are great. 4 or 5 stars depending on which donut you get. The smash burgers though are amazing! I've had the bacon BBQ and the mushroom Swiss so far. Bacon BBQ has the perfect amount of delicious homemade sauce. The garlic aioli mayo is so good and the BBQ sauce  is even better. Fresh pickle, crispy onion, and cheese melted on a perfectly grilled pattie. The bacon is weaved together like a lattice and bites through clean. All on a softly but toasted brioche bun. 5 stars all day. The mushroom Swiss is top notch as well. Perfectly grilled mushrooms and real Swiss cheese on the same patti with crispy onions. Also 5 stars... By far the best burgers you can get in the Fraser valley/lower mainland area. I'm writing this review in my truck after just leaving their and I'm seriously contemplating going back inside to grab another one. I love that they are close to my place, but it's worth the drive if you don't live close. Just don't be late. Everything is fresh and I have come by at 2:00 and they were sold out of their burger patties. 5 stars all day. Riley makes an amazing burger.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Dairy Queen Grill & Chill
descriptions: Soft-serve ice cream & signature shakes top the menu at this classic burger & fries fast-food chain.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alex Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWh2B0SBidCJr18JIydy1YvgrNEDCrAGnyabxL4oDVJbnt2_Cw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friends and I went almost every Friday to 2016-2017 after school club. The service is great because they would call you up when order is ready. The manager use to give my friend free food because how often he went haha. The cake designs were actually Comedy gold. The manager would let any image or writing slide on the cake.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pam Buckshon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkGcrsTBdpsfDJmbTx0BC6ext62NUK4FmnjrTCFHP1rQHvL465XQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good burgers and fries. The kids love coming here. Ice-cream is obviously decent with quite a few variations available on some items. Not the cheapest but that seems to be the case everywhere these days. Like small fries and two medium blizzards are $20, for example.

The ice-cream cakes are also popular with our family. Pretty tasty if you like a lot of sugar.

The staff is very friendly and even brought our order outside when it was ready. We walked over as a group for a birthday party after our session at the Otter Outdoor Experience. It's only half a block and turning left onto the Fraser Highway can take an extraordinarily long time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvZ1UemfdLEaSKMXCiYDIAVD13sKu7cBCkFSgd&fid=0x0:0xf39edd4df21f4a37"],"When":"2022-7-15"},{"Name":"Dmitry Katyshev","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3lxr1C1amiUkWVzIk5XGrDSxKb_gp3vJf1cdhUP4ICo9ujVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I am beyond disappointed with the manager at Dairy Quin. His behavior towards the staff is absolutely unacceptable. He is rude, condescending, and clearly lacks basic managerial skills. Instead of leading by example, he seems to find satisfaction in belittling his team. It’s disturbing to see someone in a leadership position acting so unprofessional. No one should have to work under such a toxic environment. He thrives on making others feel inferior, and it’s disgusting. This restaurant deserves a manager who respects and uplifts their employees, not one who drags them down.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just went in for treats. Really clean and organized plus good and fast service. So will be back for meals. Pretty happy with our visited","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHp_VpEt3O8NzvTcq3K61MB7WYFTT5Z49vw4LJ&fid=0x0:0xf39edd4df21f4a37"],"When":"2023-3-14"},{"Name":"Deb B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDbP3nEX_Uf7JWJnDafGPKEq7T3muGuMsq_lGLaRwInbUMrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This DQ is absolutely horrible! I had tried this place a few years ago and I gave it 2 stars... now it is down to 1 star! 👎The food was awful and the portion of gravy you get for dipping is a ridiculous joke! It is barely a tablespoon of gravy in a tiny container (manager says it is 1oz)! And when I asked for a bigger container of gravy, I had to pay $1.05 to get a slightly bigger (2oz) one which was equally ridiculous! I'd also ordered a 4 pc Chicken Strip Basket... I got a bunch of TINY and hard as rocks pieces of Chicken Strips instead of 4 actual normal sized Chicken Strips! If you tried to bite the pieces you could end up with broken teeth in fact! When I took the food back in to get a refund the manager Robyn did apologize and give me my refund, however, his explanation was that the Franchise reduced the size of all "dips" and "gravy" due to inflation raising their costs... and the Chicken Pieces was the fault of "suppliers". What ever the reasons, this is unacceptable and is a for sure rip off for customers! Please see attached photos of both the gravy containers and Chicken Strips.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEHIWC8Hrpf9Dlit__uyIrFUMGXrEaVUBNNZHj&fid=0x0:0xf39edd4df21f4a37"],"When":"2023-10-2"},{"Name":"Chirag Panchal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8-qc6-zQY5U0Yo7X11gH3apizNJlw_cgpHt6gbvWyDmO2vg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Paid $8.18 for strawberry cheesecake Med. I have got only 2pcs of cheese in blizzard. I would like to say here is just don't be so cheap. At least give 6 to 8 pcs that's is the reason I ordered the blizzard.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5yefQ7ybGMYUNfTd94LzfoxYioTEg_UARPOQr&fid=0x0:0xf39edd4df21f4a37"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Tanveer Wander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAIPlZNHmLocy0goFK6XoaNOq46o80Vhqu7xjCx2zKuuGRyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yesterday i bought a cake for my friend’s birthday from this dq. The decoration of the cake was very nice, also the staff of this DQ was very nice and helpful. I will defintly recommend everyone to visit this location😊.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOq8Ff5G9cKQgPS8-SWzPVigJrxbGx4b9HE3Kur&fid=0x0:0xf39edd4df21f4a37"],"When":"2024-2-29"},{"Name":"Krystal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWH0fZcwF77tlJ3T7Myml3PBpzzu1nQHXbdRqUrvoTR7La7-xRx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love coming to this location because you always get kind friendly service, food is always fresh and the restaurant is always kept clean.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jak 251","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULRmfDkzrFf-N2A7ojNm3_oHU1EESAM3HbvXQBakALlJWeU2mJ_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the best experience here the other day for a solo lunch on the patio! It was surprisingly quiet! The service was friendly and quick! Best steak sandwich I’ve had in a long time! Big and so so flavourful. The fries, super fresh and crispy! Sunshine, beer and a book! Wonderful!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4Em6an6SiuGHviAh3u7M7ROwKIkGEhN9wyZIf&fid=0x0:0x21ff93eefc747c20"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Cdn Bev","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvlpNw6NTcP_Twj-s_iapZEnvHYblTTl7vDtXCUfJo49kX8A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Four of us went and met up this past weekend here, was pleasantly surprised they had a Breakfast Special for $5.95.  Two eggs, 2 bacon strips, hash browns and 2 pcs of toast.  They had a breakfast egg sandwich also available along with their regular breakfast menu I believe also for the same price.  Before we went there I was looking online for a breakfast menu and couldn’t find anything on their website,  or here on Google, so I took a picture of it and am posting it.  I see their regular menu is online and here on Google.
We all enjoyed our meals and will be back for breakfast.  We have been before and enjoyed regular items from their menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFlNlhpjp9m60a3Jj-aCJDtcioSAaXs41Srdng&fid=0x0:0x21ff93eefc747c20"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Mr. L. black","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpEcd6DvCmwZhn7TZ4jf3R5N0DEOYxkaK-L0-gRYLD1XZeVj0t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My steak was ok. Vegetables good, potato good. My wife fish tacos were cold. She didn't finish them. Happy hour was only on winter beer and certain wines. Very limited.  Would we go back ??  Carpets need a hood cleaning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSskvdn1-gD3-B1Dc-AHKsNEGs5YKvoNHb8NA6&fid=0x0:0x21ff93eefc747c20"],"When":"2024-5-29"},{"Name":"Nicole Beaverstock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINlxlqrls3P2n0sb12ZhDTVLEoEcSNKk-nM6JWCwRB8vGQug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Firstly, I know it's not their fault but damn the flies!!

I came for ribs but their menu didn't state they aren't served till after 5pm.

I asked if their calamari comes with Jalapenos or banana peppers. The server said it did come with jalapenos (but this detail wasn't listed on the menu)

Stuffed mushrooms weren't in a mushroom serving plate. Just a standard deep dish.

Poppers were decent.

All the food tasted wonderful.

Atmosphere was quiet for 3pm on a Thursday. Parking was easy. Servers were a pleasure.

I'd recommend they better advertise the time for certain dishes and also their ingredients per dish but otherwise the servers and chef made this experience.

Management seems to be going down hill. Their chaulk sign outside was for March/April... It's July.

First time coming here. Not sure I'll return due to the lack of attention to detail with menu and other displays but definitely not the servers or chefs fault.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQhvOmVtOKrSg4jH-Ra0z7fmARu3-YT5pfz2zl&fid=0x0:0x21ff93eefc747c20"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"J M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqJzKIxq5auEW8yna1-gGEfd9AqCnDkW4WBUWAmRF_i9a9SQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It’s a pub with keno.

It was quiet this morning, service was prompt and friendly and the food was ready in minutes. Super fast.

Breakfast was good and the report was that the poutine with bacon was sublime.

Pretty big menu so we’ll come back and try something else next time.

Basic beer selection and they had my choice of drink on hand.

And a fireplace!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_lxcgpL6lcczjTp_4mBmKriUzdU8WTSFSmZw&fid=0x0:0x21ff93eefc747c20"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Deb B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDbP3nEX_Uf7JWJnDafGPKEq7T3muGuMsq_lGLaRwInbUMrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped for a bite to eat at about 1:30 in afternoon on a Tuesday. I was very pleasantly greeted by my server Allison who went on to provide me with truly excellent friendly service. I decided to try a Classic Burger with added on for a price of $2 each cheese and bacon, and a small red wine. This came with fries which were really nice. However, the bacon was undercooked so I sent it back to be cooked more. Once it came back the burger was good but now fries were getting cold so I added a side of hot gravy for dipping. So, food was okay overall... but... sadly the wine glass was dirty and had to be sent back, and then the knife was also dirty. So that turned me off a bit, but overall... the good made up a bit for the bad, I'd give the place a second try in future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnCsjr69rM4IifwHArOl6e8v8bpZao-61ZM8sK&fid=0x0:0x21ff93eefc747c20"],"When":"2023-11-2"},{"Name":"Chantel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLs5rRaALXvXPDJJ2MOsJewagdU58VU_wcydk_UrHj0aotl0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible experience, we order our food at 530pm waited an hour , tried to ask our waitress Kalyn I believe her name was, how much longer for our food, she told us the kitchen is busy so we waited another hour, after waiting almost 4 hours for our food we never got it. So we left. We watched so many tables come and go, they got there food but we didn’t. We were really nice every time we asked about our order & she was so rude to us, once we asked for the bill and to cancel the food we have been waiting for , she rolled her eyes at us and walked away mid conversation when we tried to explain how to split the bills. I’ve never in my life have had an experience like this. So many other servers apologized when they realized we never got our food, but our waitress Kalyn didn’t apologize, overall her whole attitude was not appropriate. I’ve never been so disappointed in the station.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kim Reid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJw0q72H8Wchjy2biIgai0XMbh4QYk1_63MicA6TKZvnaR1Rg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Food over priced for quality.  Portions getting smaller and everything and I mean everything extra.  From dipping sauce to salad dressing, horseradish. Surprised ketchup isn't in there.  SHP, you are doing yourself a disservice if you keep this up.

Won't be back unless something gives.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kolton “kolton honest reviews”","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLn8DP_xqAJTPd83Hy-6p1uX1qHXGtx3qKpalqF_JqVjsMnHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My food came out in like 10 seconds. Don’t know whether that’s a good thing or not but, i get a weird vibe from here like it most likely isn’t fresh. The food I had pretty greasy but overall it’s kfc so I kinda expected it. But not the worst thing I’ve tasted. This would be probably the last place I go for the restaurants that are in the area lol idk just based on the other reviews.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"peter x","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINkfwQjnNgZXiLHNYVUVjjbRcgOxxj0mRIXNPuG8BODjEuDw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I bought a bucket of spicy chicken to take out. I emphasized three times that it must be spicy. When I got it home, I found that the chicken in the bucket was not spicy at all. They were extremely careless about customer needs, so I give a bad review.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Hildebrandt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTVhbl7hd3Us-RB4Ypzg87bw0GG2ZLS1uhOqj-pMirgp1wL0_S=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Our family has been long time customers here, today the manager yelled at me and my husband, accusing us of asking for free food when we asked for a side of spicy mayo. We were picking up food for our family and asking for a condiment that is not available to order online. Hamed, the manager, was very rude. He started yelling at us the moment we tried to explain the situation. Every time we have gone there they don't charge for it and it's not available to add to the online order. The manager yelled over my husband and I as I tried to explain that we tried to order it online and it wouldn't allow us and he says alot of things aren't available online! Stop asking for free food! Upon opening our family meal, come to find out 4 crispy chicken tenders didn't make it in our bag. Call back and all they can do is make 4 tenders if we come back. No real resolution as we live 30 minutes away. They denied not giving us the chicken tenders but say they will make them for us if we come back just because they don't want to argue. They don't believe their customers and they don't value our business. They are the dishonest ones who accuse us of trying to ask for free food.

Won't go back to this location. Disturbed by their service, or lack their of.

I made a complaint a few days ago and still haven't heard back from them. This is why Popeyes chicken is WAY better. You actually get what you pay for and the chicken is way better there. And check this, when you ask Popeyes for a side of spicy mayo, they give you it!  No questions asked! because like the rest of us they realize it isnt coming out of their pay check and its not food its a condiment! If it was on the menu we would have no problem paying for it but they decide to charge however much for it when they so chose. Also, Way bigger pieces of chicken and way crispier yummier fries at Popeyes. Save your money. This place will scam you and leave you with a headache.

I tried to give this location another chance after they double charged me and didn't refund me for 3 months, now this.  Should have learned my lesson the first time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tim Hildebrandt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocInlTjAfA3g8wkYqT4L1grFtpXQyGBE_ZKaL5rtbNbXRRWxGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This was a horrible experience for our family today. We have been long time customers but today will make me never go back there.
First off we ordered the family special and we never received any chicken strips for our order.
Secondly we asked for spicy mayo which we have never had to pay for before and you are unable to add to your online order.
Hamed the manager insisted and yelled over us saying you don't get free food... We just ordered a large meal from you which then came incomplete. That's not food it's a condiment.
If I could give zero stars I would.
Horrible customer service with no resolution
Save yourself a headache and go anywhere else","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thomas Rafuse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4c9_an6z0kXI9VEp7Ywq8f-8j1a0wiUvIX1HEZmeS_zuk_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Count your chickens before they hatch.
Annoying how you have to count the chicken pieces to make sure you received the correct number.
I was shorten on chicken from this location.
Will never order from here again. Should have gone to chicko chicken.....my wife was right again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brandon Wetherill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfIpQVRyVxTx8o--98h8Jm4QiG8wmiftkgK9COtB5YG7hMIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a 10 piece bucket of chicken and the skin and batter was soggy and smelled like fish sauce. I felt a bit ill after eating some of the chicken. My girlfriend felt nauseous every time she brought the chicken close to her mouth.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"T W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjiuQ_wZpZ4orSMIhGbpqHuBlz2rX-pXKqo019UH3obN2vKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Pathetic !!! No spicy . And are you kidding me ? This is a drumstick , never in my life anywhere have I ever seen a drumstick this small , both meals had the same as well as the smallest thigh pieces I have ever seen .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_I64499C3AsO0HqKqTBTg5huRFzMfx4DH6C9L&fid=0x0:0x9f21303a884523e5"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Ross Ibrahim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0EnCgqia38eou2tJUYfICq-nAPdJi0JQkpkowChIT3sd5HwGQUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm not sure, but I found the chicken pieces here were smaller as compared to another KFC outlet 😆
Dang, how I wish I should have taken some photos... But I was starving!!
I ordered a three piece meal, with a request for a piece of ribs (my favorite). Upon checking, there's no rib inside. Glad I'm having it there, and not home. So, back to the counter, and they were kind enough to give additional ribs with no charge.
Still, it's a simple request for one piece of chicken rib and it shouldn't get screwed up 🙏🏻","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Devlan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUM1WGpVmQ8GMr0lpbrvDP3HJ1p5BpA4mdAh6hWVWnWnv04p29=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hey there, I ordered pizza after camping on the long weekend. It was very good. I ordered again and it didn’t really taste the best. I called asking for a refund, the lady was sincere. She felt really bad for the bad pizza. People make mistakes. I recommend this place because she could have just said sorry I can’t help you but instead she gave us some good pizza.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Our daughters were craving for pizza but the one we wanted to visit no dine in, we didn't know so we walked in to this pizza place which no customers. A guy was on the phone so I thought a customer or delivery guy waited for food but later turned out to be a staff there because he didn't welcome us. Then a lady came out with serious face, not even a smile or greeted us until I felt awkward so I asked if we can dine in, she said yes. We had to connect the tables ourselves. She just sat at the counter remaining serious face like why did you here I really wanted to walk out but the girls insisted to have pizza and hungry. The whole time my husband ordered, no smile, nothing until we were about to walk out. She came out to ask if the pizzas ok. My husband liked it so she smiled for the first time. So we won't go back. Not only one place we can have pizza in Aldergrove","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyijSPPpygRAR4_KQL59AUcmGWeDuBel3yX0OS\u0026fid=0x0:0x10d432607e47bccb"],"When":"2023-2-1"},{"Name":"lela grierson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKovxPHlP_pSw5I-5WV5o_M_DPjC1CM9dY20-rbWPo1FMOUtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Pizza not good any more last three order pizza old doesn’t taste good will never order again.. used to b good what happened??","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sherried Moore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0Z7_tVpj4QCds8dWontqVSw8ATN1p-8LRd2I1NgjVirNfz8JT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Received my pizza still raw. Will not order ever again.  Use to be a regular.  No more!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cory Slavin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9SCXWjB9FR1hnbluEf-ozYRa2R2fNslzT9zPOmpE_hf1cUyBb9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ya....no thanks.  The only.thing not burnt was my ginger ale. If I could leave less than 1 ⭐️ star I would.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2WW6I9yc6n9bsEn7ERfXratLI3WI0raQnscu8\u0026fid=0x0:0x10d432607e47bccb"],"When":"2023-9-3"},{"Name":"JC Stargirl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXOX1tIbd1kEJ85iGaTnIVt0_FHXonqIVCJIcyeqLfCrE7RYCZhw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely delicious and tasty, ! 2nd time ordering like the homemade taste. Ordered 2 smalls and added my own toppings xtra cheese. Pick thick crust as it’s also thin","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Juanita Sjostrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7qWxX4V5eATVNbtAq5TOQ4B6o2ufbUNs4sEhlaC_aFQdE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered a taco pizza because they used to make the best.  Sooo disappointed.  Barely any toppings maybe a handful of cheese on each pizza, lettuce pieces just thrown on.   Sparse toppings. I'll never order from there again not worth my $$","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Mckay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnk1tQoRHUFH53PQ36XCkijTTN0Jjb4JlgvHXvf94uX1Nyc0WB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is not very often you come across a 5.0 rating, so I tried it out. The delivery staff was absolutely amazing. He explained how it's family for 35+ years that keeps it great! I tried super Hawaiian and chicken fajita pizza. Both were absolutely delicious and I couldn't put down. Even as I was putting it in the fridge I snuck another slice. The toppings are real and fresh! The top layer was just in long enough to create that beautiful cheese topping that crunchs when you bite in. Honestly I don't know where they get the ingredients but I am going to believe that they buy everything fresh from the farmers markets they have all around Aldergrove.\nThank you to these owners and family for keeping it real!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Best Western Plus Country Meadows Inn
descriptions: Straightforward quarters in a relaxed hotel offering free breakfast, a restaurant & an indoor pool.
about: null
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jenna Bolton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXPbgCWPOjI_9JHuI_cxAwmmp9-1xJ-SgnZCALSVNpJM980wQSDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We come from out of town to come to the Langley Drive-In car show and we have such a great time and I would like to thank all the staff and management for such a great stay. They're always so accommodating. The rooms were clean and if we ever needed anything all we had to do was ask .They're kind. They're patient  and they look after us really well. Thanks for making our stay so pleasant..
The pool is clean and available. There's a nice continental breakfast in the morning with all the fixing, coffee all the things that I like!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Max P1991","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD1rg881dkmkTleYjGzl56qGGoPtdSQsukO-lqroFbyO7Tgw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The only way I'd ever stay here again is if I have absolutely no other option. I contemplated giving 2 stars but the room was so gross, you get 1. The doors in the hall slam hard all night long and they shake the beds. There's no soundproofing. The door between adjoined rooms blocks no sound, so I got to hear every movement from them, even the russle of clothing-couldn't believe it. My room was filthy! There was some mystery reddish brown stuff that smelled like iron on the floors and walls, and also all over the bathroom walls and inside the bathtub and shower walls. Just enough to make a long drip streak about 5 to 10 places across the entire area, bed and bathroom. They need to wash their walls, seriously! It was very noticeable upon entering the room. There was no cleaning staff at 6pm, so I actually had the front desk give me their mop, and I cleaned the entire room myself when I got there because they had no other room available. There was very clearly fecal matter on the wall under the toilet paper holder, so I went to the grocery story conveniently across the street for some bleach, and I spent a couple hours washing everything I could before I felt comfortable enough to sleep there. I told the front staff, but she said she's new. I asked her to tell the manager. I'll edit this post if I ever hear back, photos were sent from my contact info, as well as the complaint, so you know how to reach me. I submitted pictures to the staff at front desk already via email, but I have more. I tried 3 times to talk to someone about this, with no luck, so you get a review now.

Of note, the ground floor rooms have windows that can open, overlooking a very sketchy gravel path behind the building. If you're uncomfortable with that, like I was, be aware.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jake","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYNTn42uhzKgc1iwTMYa-IKKV-A_0UKLwpYNWzz8LHzh1rYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I stay at a lot of Best Westerns to travel for work and this has been the first one I have had issues with. When I checked into my room there were empty beer cans on the windowsill that weren’t cleared off or cleaned by the staff before my arrival. I was moved to another room where the sink was covered in toothpaste stains. This is the second time I’ve stayed here and both times the hotel has been taken over by youth sports teams running and yelling down the halls. Definitely not a pleasant experience and will not be returning.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kristen Exelby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8tVmZEeABud1-vlZvanzt47CC43ogxCDA0xC7DBMsUqSb4YUY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"General Manager would not return phone calls or emails regarding a reservation issue.  Something that could have been handled so effortlessly and promptly took over 2 weeks!  I was forced to stay a night at a higher rate as they would not honor the  initial rate I booked at.  Just a stressful, unprofessional experience with Barry the General Manager.  Our team won't stay again.  Was also left waiting at check in while the agent picked up the phone half way through check in and proceeded to spend 5-10 minutes helping that guest whilst a line up at the desk.  Other staff member (supervisor) did not jump in to assist at all.  Just a really bad booking experience.  When we complained of slamming doors and kids running and yelling in the hallway the desk agent gave my husband ear plugs and did nothing else.  We had to solve the problem ourselves and confront the kids ourselves or it would have went on and on.
If you are playing sports in Surrey this is a bit of a drive.  I would book something much closer.
Beds were comfortable and rooms were very clean though. No issues there.  Breakfast was good too.  My daughter loved the waffles!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tanza Banza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqOLfeirv8oiZiBkLMOAoiPJ6jWIxc0bGZ_dpoNplQRlEmh4M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"this place is extremely outdated. The blankets had stains all over them. I did not feel comfortable taking my shoes off in my room. Very stale feeling no ambiance at all. Way overpriced and not up to snuff compared to the other Best Western ‘s. volume on the TV didn’t work so we couldn’t watch TV and they didn’t seem to care. The man that works at the front desk is not nice at all, and if you read all the other reviews, people will say the same thing. I would not go to this Best Western I would go to another one usually they’re pretty decent but this one needs a little bit of work. I will not repeat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ed Prior","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUw8wFZqq3xihcHKQj9lvL6q0GqZwzsiw-Wi1plZsbhHIZsJf9a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This place is a great spot to stop after a long drive before facing the craziness of Vancouver traffic.  Clean, comfortable, and relatively quiet, surrounded by lots of places to eat if you don't want to patronize the on-site White Spot restaurant.  We didn't go in the pool, which looked nice, and enjoyed trying the fitness room.
Where the place really falls flat is the breakfast.  They provide hot food as is probably required for a Best Western Plus, but the quality and variety of foods is not very good.  Both times we visited this year the choice was dried-out sausage patties, lukewarm potatoes, and anemic egg patties.  Aside from that, it's a pretty good place, spoiled for us by the poor breakfast offering.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"B W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QfHhPp0vyvo1Wo3WY4NH1G5QOPAHGBMv_XiebXLZtHzVwVa3wkRhb3dykyKrUCZPlawDA=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"This was my second trip to Best Western Plus Country Meadows Inn. A group of more than 30 of our car enthusiasts were in town for an annual car show. Same as last year, our stay was awesome! Great service and great staff. All around excellent experience!|The on site White Spot restaurant was also great. They took great care of our entire group for dinner after the show!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shah Babur Rais","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfpy04fX8eU1SWBi1gGmmSfUYeKEsc_ozYdpzlC0WdiYmJpUog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome breakfast and very clean room. Not sure why they have a 3.9 rating on Google when most hotels surrounding this hotel are in a very bad condition and have higher rating. This hotel deserves at least a 4.5 out of 5. Thanks for your accommodation","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Jen Pavel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2Z7PIAMsfPx6AMANg9-gSiokubxQRIi6L17qEDMpEDO1IvM0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly staff. Yup, 6 flavours in 3 large pizzas!!! Used to be called Classic Pizzas.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chinedum Nwokeka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXV2I7zs85THenDM3DAsNPBASTd5_yg4bTzHkDvQAAfqSw7r2qOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love the pizza from Classic Pizza. And the good part - it’s so filling. Couldn’t finish the large pizza we got. I definitely recommend the classic pizza!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuXXU7TSh2VrCYYOIy461XQrO6FuZUssUTf4gb&fid=0x0:0xdd892cdcc06de99f"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Ryan Lua","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1b7AaoAW8_3i4HIQEbwmNLNvn-Kr7gPxNxKc_OZ9_pL4K5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owners have been taking good care of this place. They made sure it’s clean and the pizza’s are always fresh upon ordering.

You can definitely tell the freshness from your first bite!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Renata Kirkwood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtHYuCdQoGI4awm_jires8z8bbgVXlt3qMJFU-SYubP1X1WWM9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such good pizza!  It is our new favourite.  Fresh toppings and the crust is amazing.  Super friendly staff as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tristan Sparling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzXkwrDlMEPefpQXePw4SVfAKq8ClSXI2sxNZN0PVV9o0ZSA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time ordering here, and will definitely be going here again! When I arrived the told me the accidently toasted one of the pizzas too much, so they just didn't charge me for it! Amazing customer service, even if the pizza wasn't good I would still probably order from them. Super delicious pizza with tasty toppings, way better than all these chain pizza places!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdAGrDd8Hw5c0LBYHzitnXEp4TdbYq5gMkhWem&fid=0x0:0xdd892cdcc06de99f"],"When":"2021-8-7"},{"Name":"Baljit Rai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKK3Z-9L8Nibxt5RnPPm1HBiA2rCtLahAI_GkbVzPasT9e3yg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered two pizzas this Sunday, one was desi style veggie and other one tandoori chicken, pizzas were so delicious,  best pizza I ever tried , I recommend everyone to try once","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kam Bad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5SkOynajuWOz_iWniekJ_SC5mMff_5XyxHVvDlSPZRFVWH21M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was great until after a few orders in. They are really stuck on making pizza a certian way. Second time now asked for extra sauce and no cilantro. Lone behold for a third time now time to write this place off.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnD3IZZBZxhblsfw2QDFv8NK6gbf6sHZnVN9JW&fid=0x0:0xdd892cdcc06de99f"],"When":"2019-6-3"},{"Name":"Wheels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsz1Rg53Q2-m5JHAwzfaowNSrC2JEVYhO1hHp4iyxB4sDy77VI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Staff extremely friendly! Your typical pizza place but it definitely is good. I have absolutely no complaints about this place, check it out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBiD2iDcIdMnLauEIG5Ci9k6Hhxe4aaeNBzWsb&fid=0x0:0xdd892cdcc06de99f"],"When":"2021-10-16"}]

Tried calling the store to tell them, but it only went through to the call center. It's their policy that they cannot transfer calls to the specific stores. This isn't the first time from this Panago location. Will be checking out the other local pizza places from here on.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Harrison Goeldner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUv-_CrEOXVFYwpSQ_LfCH8ko4UyTLcFpt8ablig3f4s3p4JYy_Ow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love their pizza combo! Super cheap and a great deal.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Korrin Morrow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5nVHTxdx9Ej4BUXu9qpCk3NelfsQz_Zgz_ZbvmPdpwtt1S7kUFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The flavor of the toppings is good, but Im not too sure if I ever want to go back. Every time I go the past few years, it's just less and less toppings on my pizza. Even when I paid for extra. I dont think it's worth it anymore.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adria Matthews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtlH1X0bTerXnMeZ881-UKoz48lH1gPtf-FGNx3nv-gcIyhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Missed a part of my delivery order yesterday , when I called the store to explain the situation as I had already paid, the owner went above and beyond to make it right. He could not issue a refund over the phone since I used a debit card, so instead he sent a driver to reimburse my order total in cash. Did not have to go out of their way this much, and it made the world of difference. Really wonderful customer service ☺️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nathan Andrews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwFR_3k4ynSGS9Rbo-tQTLLK9HK1DqUQDA5jU9vKCvECgxuCgIkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Of all the fast food pizza places, go is always been my favorite. Even for a quick snack the cheesy bread is great, but pizzas are awesome too with lots of choices. I think during covid most of the panagos took away their seating. Can you please bring that back?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Al O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4p7gVERHUN4Zg5wNIoeNpSLmOtu9BpWLdzo5oFBiHGASqAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I won't give a one because we did eat the pizza. I traveled the country for my work and have a favorite Pizza place in many cities, so I kinda love pizza.
Here is my review: Been going to other pizzeria in the local area, which all have a different crust and flavor profile but you find the ones you like. Which most people will agree on.
Now the comparison. There is a Panago Pizza at the Abbotsford Canucks hockey food court, which we have had several times. It has been good every time, right up there with my favorites. We have had the New York Deli and Hawaiian, both were cooked nicely and a good balance toppings. The Hawaiian has more than the standard load of cheese with a nice pull to it as you would expect. The Deli was good, period. They both had a nice chew with some exposed crust for you bread lovers, but not a jaw workout.
So.....we figure the local Panago must be the same, it is a franchise after all?! Simply put, the pizza was hard work to chew and the toppings were just not up to a standard I expect anywhere. Cooked a bit much on the bottom then gets doughy and tough as it progresses thru to the toppings. Should they not be able to replicate a franchise standard? I hope they can fix their issues, maybe I got a bad dough day......
No I won't be back and no I don't want anything.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sandra Vleeming","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIG1qVUP-bTaTnRkR2Vt1QZDJ6h0TXVO7kR_EJ_MKQQpgLLNg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This has been the worst experience. I was at my grandchildren house and ordered pizza. 45 minutes later panago phoned and said they will not deliver. I asked why and they would not tell me. I asked if I could pick it up and they said no. They made us wait 45 minutes with hungry children and wouldn't deliver in Aldergrove. I had to phone pizza hut and they delivered but we had to wait another 45 min. Last time I order from panago.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Luke Raymond (Lukeo2412)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrjPAWuMoqQafvFWNpdnVSR9URjp96ycbpNnDbAoFIiCPOmarW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rajinder (the owner) and his team are courteous, and friendly. Excellent customer service and delicious pizza. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"A J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWT-f-BZITRWNIiwg7QeaIeIvXsLL2gp9kNPvzSVjrcnSg6y5xK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Going to this business was a complete disaster.

Worst customer service ever !!

Beware of these scammers!!

The owner won’t return my money after dispute with delivery timing.

Before confirming my order i explicitly asked the owner that I want delivery in evening only ! He agreed & took my money. Food gets delivered at 2:30 pm. Called the owner for clarity, he says 2:30 is my evening. Cuts the call & blocked me.

I show up at his restaurant in Langley. The owner lies about his identity and claims that the owner is in India and operates from there, he’s just a manager. He was able to fool me once but in my 2nd visit to his restaurant he revealed his true identity.

He is using multiple names/accounts to fool more & more people. Told me he wanted to teach me a lesson & says people think that we are chutiya !

More importantly he tells me that he hates PUNJABI people and since I am a Hindi speaker he will return my money otherwise he wouldn’t . I don’t even understand why he is even using name “PANJAB tiffin service” when he hates punjabi people.

Tells me my review can’t hurt his business as he regularly buys positive reviews from a marketing company in India. So basically all their positive reviews are fake !

There are many people who didn’t got their money back from this scammer.

Also, nothing is fresh in this place they start their Kitchen in midnight and deliver that food throughout the day.

His tendency to take money without providing services is concerning. I even complained about this place to Better Business Bureau as well.

Kindly refrain yourself from taking their services. Save yourself from scam !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJRwwyN8SC7anc3qEIzHY2AXOe06NcI58huA9o&fid=0x0:0xf7b85445f5ae47a8"],"When":"2024-2-21"},{"Name":"sukhi Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFXjuYqWABJAIBXE5fAIXOIDftHYIkkdTmJUIKn5oIH1IuJvg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst customer service ever. They don’t deliver as they promise. They are two companies working together and putting the blame on each other. I was said once in a week they will provide chutney which they never did. Not even once. Chutney was the only reason I paid for the tiffin service… They really don’t deserve to be in a business.. just ripping people off ….","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Abhishek Garg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKinQbqGx-6bt2q5n5zYZU1u4npwEF0nWYfPqaw-xCC2MHuvA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst customer experience. Owner is arrogant, once you subscribe the service, you are stuck. They had to create new page to get paid reviews. Be aware.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"amit singh joon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQ2hQRqdIDwgrDry9y-vAmme6iThubItzEQTXa0xwlVbFQOvYvug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"karamjeet Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI47LcOzUMr68ppYKLPxkEbX4JWvkkumZm6TdI2NXqbcU6Sig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daizi Purneet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvpv6hU_6ffvEdYVlgU47Pky3WuCImW_g1dz9HtcymWcAnL5M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Mendonca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDOYVs1G-8iT9QF6Fj3_nUauDo1DS6zISrEp3lZ9wij4inDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sonia Gulati","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISwjEfCJ3dEQ-adfBYB6TgnxSmA_PCuqTGoMHNbTQBB-s-Pg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]

We’ll be going elsewhere","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDZiD9OuUVuOH3hGcC8A1fuc-AxsGYdwSuUArL\u0026fid=0x0:0x16096b7719cab017"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Laura Olson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKMQ6nNO1m6ZgKfHihON38zVs8yBp5UtJfu8aqE6M-O-Zzvdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great customer service. Good job guys !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"My Opinion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJL_Fql7Y-7boJtyqi51bxY2bV9rOMDsDaGkg0qlq7Og6v7uQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ran into this Pizza Hut on my way home from a wedding.  I quickly ran it and asked for a personal cheese pizza. I received the best service from both “Novjot” (on the reciept) and the female who was also working. The kindest two individuals. It’s so hard with a toddler but thank you so much for being so prompt and caring and making my life easy. Thank you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Parm K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4JxF1M8HolbH49iJIemH6fc5B7sv55hwilicTpmweu_Z-hR6uIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place and the new hires have been awesome. The food is good, the prices are great, and the staff are very nice as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Al O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4p7gVERHUN4Zg5wNIoeNpSLmOtu9BpWLdzo5oFBiHGASqAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I can't rate anything but the pizza as it was a pickup order.\nBottom line is that I will not be back. Even if offered something, just no. Pizza was not cooked thru and crust was limp and wet. I had to cook it more myself at home. We had a similar issue here about a year ago which kept us away and never again. This time seals it. There are several local pizza shops that are better. I gave a 2 because  once it was cooked properly, the taste was OK.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGTaapUcoTLzKHPLrOXIPM2vpC7DVw1uWFZna0\u0026fid=0x0:0x16096b7719cab017"],"When":"2023-12-17"},{"Name":"Gardengal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLoqVczeUTEhCIZRlifT2tA4bbrsY96bS0xtR0pR7QWQY5iRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here a few months ago but wanted to do a review. Great service from everyone. Friendly family feel .  Nice to see personable people as fast food places front end staff usually have very little interpersonal skills.  Keep it up!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Local Guide","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2StfQ_LA4_dIAlkPZiWyzeuwEpusBQU5Q3aMyrnygsq_Myg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible treatment by a young man working there on the afternoon of june 14th. I walked in there was no one in the line up he had his back turned and did not acknowledge me. I waited and he kept on working on a task that should be done during free time as every supplie on the front end looked completely stocked. Regardless he should have atleast acknowledged the customer standing behind him for a while. I even said thank you and walked out and he didnt even bother to turn around. This kid definitely needs better attitude and better training.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tatyana Bridge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBWkbxLGUPfFrnA0JiNZwnZPHYvBvopqwVW-w0wXT3qUFKK7fvnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unfortunately my bread was stale on one side complete. On top of it falling apart .
I told the lady and she asked if i wanted it re-made she ignored me for a phone call.
And on top of it cant even eat my snadwhich that she didnt then remake. Id be careful ordering here.
Unfortunately the customer service was great just the bread issue","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh4Q7-WQi4tDqb7OpPhHtMA64NSrMhvmOqB9QJ&fid=0x0:0xbb1fdcc6607ac6e9"],"When":"2022-4-29"},{"Name":"Dayne Wadden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILT-VuQHqmE1jqW8oAlNXomAmke29XFIeU7RIeZ6WMcsts=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Awful location. Never enough staff and they will ignore you unless you call them out from hanging out in the back. Just save yourself the time and go to McDonald’s.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jackie Dog","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_8r1Vdsy6qcpWStCl0tml-SlF_HbMZe9yltq-A4wBj8H8hA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was passing thru Aldergrove a couple weeks ago and stopped in at this Subway for a quick lunch. The Turkey sub I ordered tasted okay, however the next morning I woke up with abdominal pain and vomiting which lasted a few days. My doctor told me it was most likely food poisoning. I did a quick search on the Internet and there is a Newspaper article from a couple years back, of this Subway and apparently the owner was using expired meats, and that she would get her employees to hide the meats in there vehicle's when the health inspectors would come by. I couldn't believe what I was reading, apparently the owner has another location at 264th. just off Hwy. 1. Scary that they were allowed to even keep there business licence after this occured.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ash Foster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW496aNkY5ZOZwky7LtjYW0dl0ZVTVPAS0mIKWFE6rn_wuoOoQh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered on doordash, my order came soggy and sopping wet...literally dripping with condensation and wet lettuce, gross tomatoes, I gagged on my first bite and almost got sick could barely chew it before I couldn't handle it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"suzan kadri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLe2M5U32LAIcu2eriuTFp2hs1BB8_nQ9mSudDGHZZBC3wPoA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"There is new trainee guy, who makes my fun on my pronunciation. I belong from the area which have different accent. I think that they don’t have to make fun of language, they should respect it. I was so embarrassed on that day. I will never come back to your place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arsh Bhatia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJO38hFlxXSTe-YUSj_tW7r6Hzy9inKOas7iwiVKetNkouFnw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst service and experience. They don't know how to deal with customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUbw4S2hlz9RKLB_d3PHIHsYZRYYlzpN5gnYmo&fid=0x0:0xbb1fdcc6607ac6e9"],"When":"2022-11-22"},{"Name":"Darren McMartin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3CLe8YXrZS1Q6jV1h0K1fDlhMQcpOPmK13Rhj8_FYlCakSdrl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"J W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJo-Cmrc1HZduOPETsbTPLkBkL6YnB-OGT_-IXnca5j7zZRJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Been renamed! Changed menu and maybe new management.

No longer has the fish burger but we got the cheeseburger and it was pretty good. My kids gobbled it up. I think it was because of the thousand island sauce, similar to the Big Mac. The big news is actually that they serve Starbucks coffee and beverages now!! Haven’t tried it yet but I suspect this is a huge upgrade from before and will definitely be stopping by for a coffee/beverage at the start of our visit so I can just stroll, sip and enjoy.

Also final note that I think the trimmed down/focused menu is a good move. Do a few things well rather than trying to do a lot of options with subpar results. Also no more microwave.

—
Concession was surprisingly decent with options. Fish burger was good. Strips were alright. There’s plenty of seating. High chairs for babies. A microwave even! Washrooms were clean. I would recommend making your lunch stop here. Only wish there were healthy options for kids — I suggest you bring your own food for young kids.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIkj_gFn199kHOCSK4boFzxw3mTuvnHAvlS-uf&fid=0x0:0x2929b1f51257e599"],"When":"2022-9-11"},{"Name":"FanShu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmCCNWhQTwnhquddpyVMJ9b-ZtdWkwlYZK_d701v1bu9bGGOVl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Their cheeseburger is surprisingly good with fresh ingredients in it. Their popcorn chicken, not so much...

Definitely would NOT recommend the popcorn chicken. It was mainly chicken skin and was nowhere near the quality and quantity in the menu picture. The chicken was way overcooked and were extremely small. The meat was about 1 cm by 1 cm. Please see attached photo. FYI, it didn't come with the fries in case you were wondering. Kentucky fried chicken's popcorn chicken is way better.

I tried to eat it all since it was $8 but it was just too hard to chew...

Staff were nice!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlwx4Hb4jGZhF7Q9UunfLFydW0Rv8HH5wYxq68&fid=0x0:0x2929b1f51257e599"],"When":"2022-10-15"},{"Name":"Hannah Ruller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHhxJJpRHtEYJW_ZI5Y6rlkEnAXueiHAGLY_eVWkULiEit3lU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I thought there was a good selection of food available, lots of variety. It was simple, not fancy, but that is what I would expect and I wasn't disappointed by it. The food was basic but good, and the staff very friendly. It was a busy day but we didn't wait long for our food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Khalil Humam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWu2nsX1kO6ZTnH8AeJY0oTR9kbXahxFMCaIV2zau0ZDMlYx7qB3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Don't ever buy here, tasteless and disproportionately small.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-lwZ85xJfhSKFduUwynVT-fX4cpfOfV0I_YFp&fid=0x0:0x2929b1f51257e599"],"When":"2023-10-7"},{"Name":"Gennady Zhygailo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7_xvr--5l9KDKAzkpHu9resc7gIabH-KOvOn9JxuE_AwO-8o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Safari Grill is terrible! French Fries, Popcorn chicken and poutine were really bad.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tony Edwards","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmBOF4BwGARqh_pPA9fyaIYbnR_P2diRan8FYnAHcDU0Oxbg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I believe this food court should get an upgrade","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aman Deep","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5_WpJlk3HnDrKvcMK4a_SU7PU0hcgbzcCGb6T-HYBxb8x4r3d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Must visit","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsD9lgjA2PKksDs1PRL6zCHpHX9kSBajjuu6sJ&fid=0x0:0x2929b1f51257e599"],"When":"2022-5-22"},{"Name":"Kayleigh Mcleod","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYkm9sYwn-_P5MVnBcfXpJU8zZ4zhwLzEMPSSwpsjRUOD9Hf50=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alice Hernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpdWdwSsRHLUbyrF4Vytj6Xf_tQrR0o9iXBICD1k_VuCVXUdh_WQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a fantastic day we all had! The lazy river was just perfect! The kids loved the water slides too! Than last they did some jumps off the diving boards. Great day all around than finished off at Kentucky fried chicken right next door! But first we had some delicious mini donuts which they sell at the water park 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9t4uImJQLVGW4RrIPehC_gWGMlz_3s2KAdeDp&fid=0x0:0x3b97c626df8734df"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Jaime Steegstra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_69Du1PZfGxazKfgNnHYlmYRixWPxPAN8PxZ4U_WfmP2GeTREiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The outdoor pool feeling is super refreshing. Sitting in the hot tub with the sunset light peeking through the palms was giving the tropical getaway feels. Staff is super friendly and the lifeguards keep their eyes attentively on the swimmers. Great spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpq_ymnTx-tw2Idt0rJ4Ibp60Ipv6nuwYXtGCO&fid=0x0:0x3b97c626df8734df"],"When":"2023-11-26"},{"Name":"James Von Broembsen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKSVAjpgMKiRQD813I3Kq_VvMtL4StpegKVcaFm9AjKcixgbg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a great facility right in the heart of Aldergrove.  Gym, swimming pool, ice rink, walk/jog track, children's playground...truly a super place for quality family fun!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ania Kruger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6eVZdvhgupxaSbVxtb48imUCLhn24LHkj73VeCMkgplnIwBg6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The water park is amazing!!!! I could not believe it was our first time there I wish we had known earlier how amazing it is. Do your research before u go, plan to arrive early to buy wristbands (all ppl must be with you when you buy!) and be prepared to stand in line to be let in. But all so worth it. We bought a double pass so we could stay from 10am straight thru til 430. Otherwise we would have had to leave at 1 and that would have been so sad. And the time btwn 1-130 before the next set starts is a glorious lull where you feel like the park is reserved for only a select few... Some water features are turned off (sprayers, water playground) but the slides are still running with no one in line! Seriously trust me, just go!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWNMEudkMkNXmekG7jnC4zv56li7VNKPb7h-yA&fid=0x0:0x3b97c626df8734df"],"When":"2019-9-3"},{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the warm pool! The staff is super friendly and the lifeguards really pay attention to swimmers. We went to the pool almost every weekend. The girls love the playground outside. Really clean, organized and well taken care of.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZYuTiRGh_2Rd-CpRE9ABr6Ja4Bl4-LiugLO_z&fid=0x0:0x3b97c626df8734df"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"gurwinder singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlls_DXznvwTrIfJx7-fEKR_E1ojx5Fz7czeSxr0FYJt9g7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"front staff = mixed review some staff is super polite and some are cranky..

water slides and pool area is awesome.
sauna is awesome.

gym membership not worth it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Luwana Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFhCJVLvFalkJYDJb-SHX7KD6Q7sNniYFK7jE51efePmLd2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is warm , clean,  but u can watch the game best from one side","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU94yT9P-xH7w0fLaAefed311WJD7FZpMPIMw0RGrUvU_Xkux-R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was amazing. So much fun for the family. You can take a double inflatable tube down the  2 large waterslides which is perfect with younger children.","Images":null,"When":""}]

Though food was amazing but never gonna visit there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kam Bad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5SkOynajuWOz_iWniekJ_SC5mMff_5XyxHVvDlSPZRFVWH21M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They really need to hire more competent people. & serving customers in such a polite way
Keep growing sonia……..🙌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMElkM9urGvncBlf2rF0aAPdcP0ARKTz6-SlCpZ&fid=0x0:0xe5a880f8cae2ade8"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Saiedeh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGOc4PmppX7bh2WE8KyY7P7RD2GjAwf29pveKv3kgUqnCdy3yR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered roast beef with crispy onion sandwich and iced cap with a espresso shot, and after waiting so long, they gave a totally burned bread sandwich with an iced cap that had no espresso in it. When I told them, after waiting sooo long again they said "oh we gonna give it to you on the side, then after waiting again they " said oh the espresso machine does not work and when I said then please return my money, the lady took my cup and dumped in the sink right in front of me and said " OK come and get your money."
That was the worst branch I've ever been.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKn9F7DIYosGyWdmQt594nbQFXe5MhKkUwpYNo&fid=0x0:0xe5a880f8cae2ade8"],"When":"2023-1-5"}]

[{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pretty happy for the first time in store with "Michaela" who took my orders. She was so nice, greeted with beautiful smile and  helped me with all the good suggestions for my toddlers drinks. They loved their drinks! Not too inside busy so we had a good relaxing time. Clean washroom and a lot of parking around","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCg-Xn2w9h7G_ek3BUSzXp5u4kYRbaCfHWV2qW&fid=0x0:0x58f53acb42e453c2"],"When":"2022-12-29"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Give the barista Kyra a raise ASAP, she was awesome!! Due to my best ever Starbucks experience, I know found my favorite hot beverage! She was super awesome, extremely friendly, approachable, patient, knowledgeable, helpful and kiss really down to earth.
We were totally 'umming and arring' & being totally indecisive, she made me aware of the delicious matcha latte they have and how I could customize it to my preference which tasted incredible! I'll happily slurp these bad boys all day and night long.
This Starbucks is a great location to grab a cup of Joe to take to the great local drive in movie theatre round the corner which has fantastic service.
The joint itself is also extremely nice, modern and has a great upkeep with convenient drive through if your in a rush for a COVID friendly approach.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTyxW8ljtz90oSd1WhzW5uQtyXf_z72n0za7Ed&fid=0x0:0x58f53acb42e453c2"],"When":"2021-3-23"},{"Name":"Dale H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrzIxelfLvOsb2q0wLQBfux-LrSREuhcYcy4WgP0MX3zMo7nugKg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The coffee is the same overpriced over roasted flavors as usual. However, the trend for less customer comfort to potentially discourage loitering has continued with bathrooms that no longer have paper towels. Don’t wash your face or you are screwed using a hand dryer lol.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ekta Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI9zfUlfUKwABpvG9ljbjWm-OMsuXeF5SHDKCPNeRPUZZiGtA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect order every time :) (hopefully didn't just jynx it lol)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mariena Bui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Nw1jeBXne8haJacgZytBHrMEqU2gmOMAF3l5QWK0CwO3rXPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favourite Starbucks to go to with my friends to hangout. I love their new lavender frappuccino ☺️☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHQzAjBZ5YxdXfHDmwZrGaaf3Hh-UYIXmqAv7h&fid=0x0:0x58f53acb42e453c2"],"When":"2024-3-26"},{"Name":"Plamen Apostolov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLnM3ZOB4bib1Bw4ceRk1uFZq6uaDn6mUrX8jki5vCKXfex0pIuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not much of a hello from the partners. The store looks nice with the lights and setup. But the partners all looked unhappy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Purple Vibes999","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpix98RRjzff0GslqveV9rLncUQQj7C1cTCXAVwHv4_Ch09ubf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They keep getting my drink wrong i always ask for a tall Iced chai with 1 extra pump of chai and they mistake my drink for a grande and its too milky if i wanted a grande i would ask for 2 extra pumps of chai its the chai flavour i like. Not extra milk or how its regularly made thats why when i ask for a tall it should be that size with 1 extra pump of chai. Not a grande drink because then theres not enough chai unless i choose to orser that size and get even more chai. I am tired of my drink being made wrong because you guys dont pay attention","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Casey Quesnelle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6QYLmw3s1cQuwQMdXAN-TZn_NVcjdQk0bJzRFeifTiBlMf0to=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always love coming to this location because the staff are always so kind and welcoming and they always get my order right and have the items in stock that I am wanting. The store is always clean in the inside and well maintained and when it applied, there was proper covid safety protocols in place. I will always come here for my daily Starbucks :-)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlILQK21AfKXjDr7EtNaRol1-N64ww6Izkh0M&fid=0x0:0x58f53acb42e453c2"],"When":"2022-4-4"}]
