[{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great spot for pick up asian grocery items that specializes in Vietnamese foods. But I also found Thai ingredients that I never seen before so pretty happy. Clean, organized, good service, fresh produces plus have a washroom. Reasonable price so would recommend you to check them out. I will definitely go back again because I was in rush so more items that I want to buy there which I never seen at T&T or Henlong","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPs-Wja5ui9u58EEtVQ69h0liKkOVdTmZHJ6g4J&fid=0x0:0x7ab8737ab256138e"],"When":"2022-11-6"},{"Name":"YOU Create a Password","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqnlNYq6_kt3mPp0YyppTbpbw-bljO8Wx-gKCLHMCNOM9TfqCJ5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really cool little shop and very friendly staff. It might look small from the outside, but they have a wide variety of frozen foods and some delicious bakery items as well. The white bread is the best. It's soft and slightly sweet, and cut into thicker slices, it's amazing. I think it's the best bread in town. Also, this store is a hidden treasure for affordable beauty and skin treatment options. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Se Rene","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJMVjPO3YMLKyt6X6JQQ7SAO_Q6lAbeE4d3eRMimE_p0DiRzc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small place but had everything I needed.

Plus the sweet dish, bánh da lợn, was SOOOO good! I can taste it was made with real pandan leaves (not the artificial flavoring of pandan), and the sweetness was perfect (low…like the way they really make it in Asia).

Also, both a frequent customer and person working there were super helpful and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6FIfmaj0uV2tamW4QBYXf4BUQHcWyxcXMOQBP&fid=0x0:0x7ab8737ab256138e"],"When":"2023-12-30"},{"Name":"Roly Russell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbOEKy0zW5N5SyNdO6_NAE33y3-U-iw_-JCdbSOCKZX0LKvc1w8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This might be the best Vietnamese and Southeast Asian grocer that I've found yet in BC!  Super friendly and helpful staff, and an amazing selection from what looks, from the outside, like just a house!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sam Feng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXq913LzXO5v-5RQvUoT-WilzXhRpytiESZ0Vb03qY5O5JMgk2NOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little spot to pick up some Asian grocery items, particularly for Vietnamese dishes / cooking. The shop is quite small, so there isn’t too much in stock, but it is well organized and it seemed like most of the basics were there!

We picked up a couple items, including bean sprouts, limes, fish sauce, and pho noodles. We’re were impressed with the quality and freshness of the bean sprouts! Will be returning!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Heather Clark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxjs1ij4Xc98jpdLqVHM-CMHuz8zXIVzoKcDBFMiLF-U5-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really nice family run business. Super friendly, helpful & fresh local produce. Great selection at reasonable prices. You will never buy bean sprouts at the grocery store again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Babs Ben","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJZhEcX__fOasawWraEsXKFOxPAu13IqEilgu1jdyBhz1126mF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alitalia neighborhood gem. If you like cooking Asian food, this is the place to get your hard-to-find ingredients. A very nice family business.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mootook Channel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3k26TeYFvRdsSS12VomA9T_bMsLhoM0bmcK0MvdBLIgtjyWA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best asia market that I have ever been to!
They have almost all i need for cooking
Prices are very fair ,,, the owner and stuffs are so friendly and nice and even when its busy i never had to wait long for pay","Images":null,"When":""}]

If you are searching alternative and effective, this is the place to go to.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrea Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLuTZG2I16rQm7TDZtIq8gQFg3dXgcJxer-Zw6JLQk1kYiBcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ben is the sweetest most knowledgeable man with herbs and natural remedies! He is so knowledgeable and helpful. I highly recommend going to see him and his wonderful selection of supplements!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOeC5VCbc6g3HH3dxXpDS9bE993HEKMDVI3SjHX2aNdHbQOJHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Heart touching experience, loved everyone here and they helped me exactly what I was looking for and I was amazed by the rest of the selection too. They even have the best Asian products.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNK1YAcq3eYyZNnR3NuUbM898alWuF_8PYYcgkI&fid=0x0:0x6f6db44bd6c94037"],"When":"2020-10-25"},{"Name":"Theresa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSypVKECwCOwWCvHZ8R-aUJYRpp1DhGrbMHmP_SCTUf8yUIjVS6g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I bought a box of tea. I went to the counter to purchase and found out it was 50% off. Oh, okay, awesome.  Got to my car and after wondering why it was on special, I checked the box and saw the best before date is Feb 2018.  That is over 4 years out of date!  Tea that is made with organic fruit as far as I know is not supposed to have preservatives.  I have no trust in this store keeping their stock fresh after this and won't be shopping here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsyS9_zKFdnyoaMBWmJgu5Z7CXBnf-smiMRP_s&fid=0x0:0x6f6db44bd6c94037"],"When":"2022-8-4"},{"Name":"Bart Pukacz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwhyc1_aZKwBjY5et488IHwGY8XOIAlmX_tYjEaDjQCJ5zdp8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best and fully stocked herb and natural supplements stores in the lower mainland. My new fave and go to from now on!

Unfortunately, his soup is not gluten-free, but he knows what items to recommend  that are.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"emily h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYl8f1DnVSR0AisDXPOJnL_xknz7FiGN8RoqAKWrtHxyl5RA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love that it has grkcery store, sushi , pizza pkace, a very nice second hand store in just one complex","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicholas Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4WJx-JJgKviBLyVz_cTlboNMYSIxQNem301jPp9dZTX06cw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to afew different stores went to the adult store with my fiancee the lady was awsome she knows her company and supplies makes u feel comfortable with being their we were abit shy but she has a Ora that makes you feel comfortable and has decent prices.then we went to the liquor store and they had excellent sales on friendly staff also","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gen X Surrey Girl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnz98iwXPE1DskfLpfNg-zDV5mDy1tGmvmbNcHWdRqf6q4OTmNvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lots of stores. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"katelyn best","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqHsKJ0tsRPO7vEBRpNRoqIGqWhKeHKSRjLOSGGL8_YoCSvQBN=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just went grocery shopping for only a few items..
the clerk doesn’t help you bag your stuff like everywhere else does? So this poor older lady is struggling to bag the many of items she has while the clerk is rushing me to pay (my items sitting unbagged as well) and she’s doing nothing to help. I can’t pay when someone is bagging their own items in front of the machine!
I felt so bad for this woman as she is obviously flustered and the person hired to help is doing absolutely nothing about it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sir Kozy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9LGLRXx8rL3KQgTh4a6t5uAgtO9e2rfq3WSlnHu_xZ0Hfs2s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I suggest you avoid this location if you can.
Staff is unhelpful and rude.
Being ignored when asked a simple question is not the way to treat a customer. If the employee did not know if they had any more flats of water then say so. Do not just walk away.

If a till opens up , customers next in line should have the opportunity to go to that till , the cashier should not wave other customers to it.

When at a till I expect to be treated with decency , not ignored.
No "hello" or "have a nice evening"....Nothing.
The cashier didn't even ask me if I had a Scene card , luckily I know I can use one there so I held it out to him to scan. He still didn't say anything.

From my experience , I feel the employees simply do not want to be there.

Prices in store are ok for mediocre produce.
They had no cucumbers and the asparagus was limp and dieing , the one flat of water I found had one bottle leaking. Celery browning on the ends.

There's my rant 🙂","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lisa Bouzan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXGQwx3Yq_TbHOw2u6N0Yn5d4seOdPlTSD5M0ooVr5-gEw11Lelw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Somewhat higher prices than No Frills, Superstore, etc.  Not the help needed to find product.  Asked check out lady if they sell whipped cream, she answered no.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"G D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDZWR6lQj1vDd9BHHwdE9NF0022LotVlNu7k_k61uio-Q39w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Always long lineups because there's only two or three tills open , the meat selection is very limited , the featured sales in the flyer have been mostly terrible for the last couple of years and what's with the security guard that follows me around if I come in in my work clothes , pretty unsettling.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Geoff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISURJARSlgqhBGCA2nHTzI1xMiwRjN7lh6Wjzm09g_ZfTCXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The security guard follows me around like a lost puppy half the time I’m in there.
I do the majority of my grocery shopping here and spend a decent amount of money here but for some reason this guy follows me constantly and looks at me like I’m a criminal. Pretty unprofessional stuff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Theodore Harwood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfPR9CFtAr9EtgGUWuJgAOZTHg9LA2a2Qj8liCNhmi925NxynJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Staff is helpful (pharmacy even saved me decent amount of money with my meds) food variety is alright and the prices are better than most other grocery stores","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Baker View","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrde3A_zV4DarnZuVnx7vpK_XIp3RkE6lFSQWDtHUL-2vipw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unfortunately it looks like this location has been affected by Canada’s main immigration problem. There used to be a diverse staff there, nice and friendly and Canadian kids would get hired, now its like Amritsar","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cat Cha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL972MgZRReWMOxJM8juDWpd7nGXF0KbLOPtRP8Zr4SICQUUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Convenient place to shop. Some items can be pricey.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Babs Ben","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJZhEcX__fOasawWraEsXKFOxPAu13IqEilgu1jdyBhz1126mF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent customer service and care. Sukh and Brandon are the best! They always address my questions about my vehicle. I will certainly keep coming back. I highly recommend Cromptons.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCqgTA8NohfyXWghR_6QkjcNOInreq8VN38wbi&fid=0x0:0x8f0e80e0d69fa539"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"D Cutch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzOcgRK1hd1EulYvWvHLEPoXCq9kz-Zj9Gs32gbGChLNdpKZPZIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The front staff is lovely. Always welcoming and happy to see me. I attend the swim & gym as a support worker 3 times a week and never have had an issue. The pool is incredible and the gym is well kept. Wish the gym was a little larger though","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a cool place for the whole family to have fun, to spend time together. Clean, organized, good price and good customer service. Can't wait for summer to come! Our favorite place to visit in Aldergrove. The girls love that awesome playground included me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJQB9OMrGYpkKEwlnXUvbkriFVOvtvjRnozxAs&fid=0x0:0x8f0e80e0d69fa539"],"When":"2023-2-1"},{"Name":"Pare de Pensar Pobre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0E-G6nVkWoWdyIf2H0c81tlIO1UN1nw_M5gDJwit-nsPI04hA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small but wonderful water park with an amazing lazy River! Cheap, clean, and super fun !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPC7K8OIHU1OVKO9nH1O_oXE1hRrTzU1bwJ1cC2&fid=0x0:0x8f0e80e0d69fa539"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Alex Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWh2B0SBidCJr18JIydy1YvgrNEDCrAGnyabxL4oDVJbnt2_Cw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Five stars, because as 18 year old I pay around 180 dollars a year which is a excellent deal for a pool, sauna, steam room, ice rink and a gym. However, there are little improvements I would love to see events during the fall, winter, and spring instead of only the summer. Plus, better website for applying for ice skating.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Assad Zafar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwYfFKBKEXtzZNT2gZ-VYFxMqjF1sri533q-EFAnMi-kgf2gx4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love their outdoor pool activities. There is an arena inside a cafe to cater your carving. The outdoor water park is open in summer only and by reservations so make sure you book your reservations well before time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erica Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfKklqYTHFe4H-myiGLwZ_peF8Bupz6avpXB624e6P5qRHlQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The registration is very annoying,  wasting time!
Stick and puck for children only once a week, one hour, always fill out too quickly.
Front desk employees are not friendly. Agreeing with someone else says, especially the one with curly hair!
Too bad this is the only rec center near by. If there's other option,  wouldn't want to come here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Caroline P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZngfTd73NeJ25oW1c9jXgnEkYFaCWVEKEMtVlUuYzNIQaqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Kids love it. Way too crowded for me and water is very hot for summer days when you are looking to cool from the heat. Tubes should not be allowed in the wave pool. We all keep bumping on them, and it is a waste of time for staff to collect them all the time. I rated a 3/5 because it is pretty fun for kids and super affordable. Would love to see slighly cooler waters during hot days and no tubes in wave full","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMl7XFMUXKFW87XY2KMIKS52iAX__39gcE-q7Ia&fid=0x0:0x8f0e80e0d69fa539"],"When":"2023-8-31"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"k c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsSNYtOGZaqNFzm5iSQ1zgMqrwlIk5_tsnUTCFW_wJEYxrVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Last night the closing announcement was made 30 minutes prior to close: Too early for standard save on franchise policy. Workers had produce covered and put away by 9:30. Saying you stay open until 10 is misleading. I felt followed, rushed, and pushed out of the store by children/ young adults who don’t want to work clearly. please invest in a better work force who cares more about save one, western family, values. atrocious.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nic F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzngRWbgson5EbvmU8JQY3sJu6bgl1wtw8NnVGV9ipbUgZMNhR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I advise people to avoid buying meat from Save On Foods. I bought steak yesterday (it looked fine) and when I came home to cook it, it had a horrible sour smell. I didn’t feel comfortable feeding it to my son. I’m not sure if they have issues with refrigeration or something, but the meat there is sour and not safe to eat. I just had to throw it all out and I cannot afford to replace it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mark Royer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCTBWZctKVbXLo_R3by2XLM-2T6Iq-7HPq6SIpzj-7QYb96YKp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great little store.  Stopped in to pick up some takeout lunch.  The wings looked OK, the other offerings look a bit risky.  Plenty of grocery selections, friendly staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thomas B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_MiigoCfxL7MF3KeCr9U5_uSN_1oTjGspaj98Ocajs7seg4M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’ve spent my last dollar at this or any Save On/Overweighty store indefinitely. The customer service is nonexistent, and the arrogant, assuming pharmacy staff don’t care about the customers wellbeing and would rather flex their imaginary authority for no other reason than to “teach you a lesson”. Save yourself the time, money \u0026 spend it elsewhere, somewhere that actually appreciates your business. There’s a Pharmacy at the Shoppers DrugMart right across the parking lot where the staff were BEYOND helpful in assisting me with my needs. The Dispensing fee for medications is CHEAPER as well 👍. There’s lots of choices out there where to spend my hard earned money and I’ll be exploring them, hope the rest of you do as well. Be well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chelle M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJD4jvKV48E_xMiSwE6h9wn3LmToL3JyFJD9gJ6MTCP77CBwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Used to be a big fan, but have had nothing but problems in recent orders. I'm talking meat that is 3 or 4 weeks expired, multiple orders in a row even with a note asking them to check expiration dates. Or mushrooms that are a week gone off and totally covered in mold.\nGave them several chances to do better but after 4 orders full of expired and moldy food, I've had enough. Sad, as I've been a customer for over 6 years. But I'm going elsewhere now.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lisa Parker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPSdm8wtUbt_csEAcYMTirzFJYHuyBH3jGQAhFvs4SJ1GvGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place to shop and staff is always friendly to me but they did not treat my husband with the same friendliness when he took my son for shot.  They were not busy at all but would not do his shot without appointment.  Saying it just wasn't done, but yet they did just that for me when I was shopping on the weekend.  Lost a star and some loyalty in my eyes.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jen Morgan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrZxzJG5PgolxJj3a9JPmhcpjn8cy4DGqzLHvRCh2z0y1oVrzk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Save On Foods is a reliable grocery store with a wide selection of fresh produce and quality products. The staff is friendly and helpful, making shopping a pleasant experience. Prices are reasonable, and the store is well-organized. Overall, a great place for all your grocery needs.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Madison Cupello","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVdTa5WdSsnno8XY_Tnw1CLY5B5nn6EPgVHTEWVsi3ZTNIK_M0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is probably one of my favourite stores in Aldergrove. The place is so nice, and the prices are so reasonable. They have a wide range of items, and the produce is so fresh. The employees are also so helpful and kind.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ronald Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1AA0COaI7rivDW2feSPCNyXG0VQ-phrOsoMTKHPA9vE24xGU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent service with great food! Lots of options to choose from. Always nice to come here. Pleasant dining experience always!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZ3VBFY09lQcBV6uZgveEpGpysbRMb0_5J3CjE&fid=0x0:0xaa38658f04d8a008"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Austin Fedrau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBhJi_X1ADNHaw873MP9NTeH11BUo4xxZwo2tVnoVJSN7ERbeR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went to white spot during our lunch break when we were working. Hands-down, the best lunch break of the year! The food was astonishing, as always, as well as the service was beyond compare! Our waitress, Fatima, deserves a raise, and a promotion. She was outstanding. She was very friendly and interactive, and taught us that to eat at white spot you had to be awake and sitting down. Highly recommend her as your waitress at white spot. we got a dessert on the house which was clean and very good. All in all just a wrap this review up, we had on exquisite time at White spot Aldergrove, highly recommend attending, you will not be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOz1FkCFR6K2Pj3-mhdASDw5h8C9WJ_ppnuDRN&fid=0x0:0xaa38658f04d8a008"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Pare de Pensar Pobre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0E-G6nVkWoWdyIf2H0c81tlIO1UN1nw_M5gDJwit-nsPI04hA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food, fair prices, great happy hour time (2-5pm), & 8pm-late) every day. Best wings and onion rings that I’ve eaten in Canada. So delicious that I didn’t have chance to take photos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsUntwxAoI6rJ9jhKmk5oAVdq4rXGiJdqQdq-X&fid=0x0:0xaa38658f04d8a008"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"David & Patti Ens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCrwxnBL2_VqJnEgLg0JtK_fNSDOCo9bnsDqabFska_Kpl4DON=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were four couples with various needs including one wheelchair. The staff accommodated us nicely and set us up in a back room with a fire place. Our server had fresh coffees in front of us (both regular and decaf). Soon our orders were taken and we sat and chatted. There were several TV screens showing the ball game. It actually took quite a while to get the food to the table, but I was impressed that they all arrived at about the same time and all were hot off the grill. I went with the Legendary Burger as it is their signature. I recommend it. We also ordered variations of breakfast and brunch that looked tasty. We had to wait a bit for a refill of coffee only because they were making a nice fresh pot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObt48Gx-QZESr2i7GDDeuAlQmvLC5MAkphMBUU&fid=0x0:0xaa38658f04d8a008"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"David Juras","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmTuNiSSXEtYWd7WU1cSJaKv3adp1TPVJwNjnDgIiiGZ4sgk8vVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had lunch at White Spot in Aldergrove, and it was a nice experience. From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was just as expected for a White Spot — casual, welcoming, and relaxed.

Our server, Anna, was absolutely fantastic. She was friendly, attentive, and made sure we had everything we needed throughout our meal. Her great service really added to the overall experience.

As for the food, it was delicious. Everything was flavorful and cooked just right, making for a satisfying meal. Overall, it was a lovely lunch, and I’d recommend this location for a great dining experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"DoctorPepper0","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRsOKJNw6wFTuC10khJg9LT3Z_fAKKPiQP5gav4l9bh2oaKA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing dinner. My wife and I met at this White Spot working as hosts 10 years ago, and we were lucky enough to bring our baby to get her first Pirate Pak. It was amazing, and it was also nice to see how great and well kept this restaurant still is 7 years later. Service was great and we were even lucky enough to run into some old friends from our serving days. (Also, the Chipotle is still the greatest sauce at any restaurant)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzOX5c33LZWMpEeAR8WRiWJ4hsrgR4B5PbTw5x&fid=0x0:0xaa38658f04d8a008"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Brian Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWU1UtiVhrA3MqUkqG6HvwLdPfMoRYgYmpagV4AO4QNNsrN5VIx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I had the pot roast, 2 tiny pieces of roast on a tiny scoop of potatoes in small Yorkshire, tasted good, portions are meant for seniors, 😒 and the horseradish arrived after I completed meal, Iam still hungry thinking about Mc ds","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVHgrJUsZyS9y-iCc-z2_e9i_uY_x3GfLF7Wlv&fid=0x0:0xaa38658f04d8a008"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"David Large","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEl1keGTx9sV65ZdqCt2FFQUPQ5pgkCuE-qdyAWQmUgsmY2l8H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was amazing came in for lunch sat on the patio enjoyed an amazing burger with my brother! Waitress was very friendly and professional outstanding come in check it out !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvCfVs6eGtmMKJHqQHrEdZogv9tBqap8KeVQ4z&fid=0x0:0xaa38658f04d8a008"],"When":"2023-8-11"}]

[{"Name":"Jay Trinca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6xYhqAOfxjRzPh9l3XT62ds3D8DImj9Jcn_UZ1Ze8_eTkXw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First off. The staff is lovely. They're always nice and welcoming. I once frequented this place 4-5 days a week for their fair prices. Infact I loved this place and felt I never needed to bring a lunch to work. 5 dollars for a pre-made bread sandwich just last year. The same bread sandwich(many varieties) are now $9. I get the economy pushes prices but ill be back to making lunches again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Bridge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxGZq6jQto_wvYCkfqzlC0Vib6_uZ1CjzvUJnHaKx1SxJIYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried a cinnamon bun from Firehouse Cafe and it was excellent! Sweet, warm, and lots of icing. I will definitely try more from them and I would recommend you give them a try!

Their Sandwiches and brownies are also excellent. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxT5crfScPCvkO_ZhQltQE5Sr5z4E1469XPA3s&fid=0x0:0xbfd9f70b2231a212"],"When":"2023-2-24"},{"Name":"Jason R. Cummings","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeJ31fMrZTYCW3jao-64EwjkyZoizf5bzU6-AVqKzFj_36RnM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a gem of a cozy cafe and community operation!  The staff (all volunteers) were delightful to meet. Baked goods looked amazing and are all made on site. Next time i will come for the $7 hot breakfast.

The Americano was delicious!  Not all coffee shops get Americanos right.  They did!

I was given an orientation to the meals on wheels program of 300 made in house meals delivered daily to Aldergrove and Langley residents.  They sell containers of frozen soups made on site for $5, and frozen meals $9.

And, The space to sit in is lovely","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brayden Hilbert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-HqGp9Mmulp3tCtregm-5Syt0OuSieeBNpytdHS_AXPaNSg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's hard to find places like this these days! The prices are unheard of, food is amazing, everyone is so friendly and it's a really nice Cafe to sit and enjoy your meals in. Definitely come check this place out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alice Hernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpdWdwSsRHLUbyrF4Vytj6Xf_tQrR0o9iXBICD1k_VuCVXUdh_WQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place is amazing! Meals on Wheels is run out of here. All profits I believe will go to supporting Meals on Wheels and most of the people that work here are volunteers! They are very kind and lovely people with kind hearts 💕 Also they have a food bank once a week on Thursdays but please check before you go!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMt3U9kJ4EVrfdkxVMMX9qNHf1S1HM2pSgdSPpH&fid=0x0:0xbfd9f70b2231a212"],"When":"2024-4-19"},{"Name":"Lori N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmtMtkjNfkcOZjUstSIaPewdazX3LaSbWZ-fPdp_MqWNPH1dsX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is perfect for meeting up with a friend to have coffee or hot chocolate and a treat. I tried a hot chocolate and cinnamon bun and they were both delicious! They also have sandwiches and soups, as well as a fridge with soups that you can purchase and take home with you. The staff were super friendly and you can't beat the prices. I will absolutely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1xp_oNVlzsgoA-brCzRL0I0NOjVzgsSGHMBWS&fid=0x0:0xbfd9f70b2231a212"],"When":"2023-11-16"},{"Name":"Babs Ben","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJZhEcX__fOasawWraEsXKFOxPAu13IqEilgu1jdyBhz1126mF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful baked goods , hearty big sandwiches, and tasty meals at very reasonable prices. Nice environment.  Come by Mwals on Wheels Langley volunteers. Check it out M-F 9-2.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nick C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsW6auhWOj2lADkUJrGuRJI5lGDMuRwRNuJ-b5P6rjeEhx2c5f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome pastries!!!
The cinnamon rolls are the best. Good and friendly service.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Katie Zaharik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpdMoBs2HYyaSVc9z5gmTf70-rPz1U3yQX_sH3RShYQa_8fQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic food! Tender, flavourful, perfect amount of sauce, and probably the best fried rice I’ve ever had.  We ordered multiple dishes and were extremely happy with everything. 10/10 will be ordering here again.

The lady we placed our order with over the phone was SO lovely. Very impressed with the customer service, portions and quality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mariena Bui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Nw1jeBXne8haJacgZytBHrMEqU2gmOMAF3l5QWK0CwO3rXPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The temple is my favourite place to have Chinese food when I’m out in Aldergrove. The staff are nice and the food is delicious! The delivery was so quick when I ordered. I couldn’t be more happier with this place ☺️☺️☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMvR_BwrewrkX46DDt80oJNqECJb-7P9tXxgHW&fid=0x0:0x60f6218ec456de4c"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Carmen Poley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdnYhToXtdEZQWNLyMuuIIzP903XYDvhxUrlLIR3EmV7olWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thank you so much for the continued consistency, and quality of your food.
This is a great restaurant that treats you like you're part of their family.  I highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nikki Colson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyfGy7bgl6e1bYlSbWx0h26IQAyFi7RSREOXmjIe2hyywXt84=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered from temple today (second time this month) and once again the food is amazing!
We were apprehensive to order from there since in the past we have had some less than mediocre food which we were disappointed with but I can really say they have turned things around for the better!
So stoked to have good Chinese in Aldergrove again!
Good portions as well and they are always very friendly and personable.
No more driving to downtown Langley or Abbotsford for Chinese food 😀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUPG2NIh0PXCo1sqtOCj4emLmGCHSbw6fa3P1S&fid=0x0:0x60f6218ec456de4c"],"When":"2022-1-2"},{"Name":"Kerin Swift","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJW9r2HQxO01vhxYCvZitD0_3FSCABlRfD2KAKEU39AMRMzfes=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Not bad but 18.45 for prawns and its all batter....I threw it in the garbage...portion is good....i just wont order prawns again...that was disappointing😒Just went to eat my wonton soup today...they charged me extra to put broccoli in it...guess what? No broccoli in my soup...I will not spend my money there again...too bad that I will be telling everyone","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOv5miffcvSpMqyYPnRllMcS6YofT_N32_xzFU-&fid=0x0:0x60f6218ec456de4c"],"When":"2023-3-1"},{"Name":"Cliff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGdv9jHpJK2CzTr44_aLBKd8m9dEDYvf61S2lfLke-RAVcWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly and polite staff the food was excellent I ordered chicken Chow Mein sweet and sour pork and beef vegetables and of course spring rolls I'd have to say the best Chinese food in Aldergrove and best I've had in awhile","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7iPm7KVUgKoTVIm4u7ENu_KQ_g2wxj5HGhj7D&fid=0x0:0x60f6218ec456de4c"],"When":"2023-8-22"},{"Name":"Blake Marsh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIS8nadzo-VCRBlWhSlB7Gtb9x14z6uDU3sdeU9k4FHJ3-tJA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered temple for takeout for the first time last night and the food was great. We ordered honey garlic chicken and at other places it’s usually very doughy and heavy, temple’s was super light and fluffy almost like fish n chip batter and the flavour was awesome, it tasted like real garlic, not any fake flavouring. All around fabulous food, we will definitely be ordering from them again! I’d recommend the chicken chow mein, veggie fried rice, sweet and sour pork and honey garlic chicken. 10/10!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rick ab2006","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgFSSofTCIrCtkecXcNssOMjKsiwKWHeliX5Faj2LqdDqIAkc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The only place for Chinese Food in Aldergrove. My only present critique is the pricing is getting way out of control.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience here. Staff were super helpful with menu recommendations, and encouraged us to get a little adventurous with our choices. The portobello mushroom curry was SO good. Awesome samosas with beautiful dipping sauce. Perfect place for Indian food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_HQ1myQexWvcuLbF0ZirzRYpmYOhZVHqbbjLP\u0026fid=0x0:0xe007072e6d585b59"],"When":"2020-12-6"},{"Name":"Joe Roback","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3h5-bqIRt1PQmNIdoUGyI5EuHQ4kS6khRU6CSP8dxHhUHLRJtqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Staff were friendly and professional. We asked for vegan dishes but they brought out naan with butter by mistake. They changed it before we realized.\n\nWe liked that it was open late. One of the best vegan options on the North Shore.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6q9KOOcBwHyBh1BkXkeeiTu7ih84btZ1d0o0q\u0026fid=0x0:0xe007072e6d585b59"],"When":"2021-9-4"},{"Name":"Jizelle Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJyzSeMMMmQJNd8WDethczxr3uXNdjORpbX-butxHOVp0pXxetz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Wow. Some of the BEST Indian food I've ever had and that says a lot as I grew up with it living where I do. Initially, my boyfriend and I were going to get a light meal from a Japanese restaurant but we ended up parking nearby other places. So we figured why not check them out! We hadn't had Indian food in a restaurant in a month and decided to go with Vaades. And we did not regret it. It exceeded our expectations for being a spontaneous choice. Although it was humid walking in since there was no ac, we forgot about it after drinking a glass of water. Our server was friendly and accommodating, and happy to fulfill any requests. For instance, extra sauce, more napkins, water refills. We felt taken care of and I loved the small touch of the utensils being wrapped in thick napkins, minus the clear tape. The washroom was also clean and spacious. Now on the topic of what really matters, the food: I ordered the baingan bharta, my boyfriend got the lamb and onion curry, and we shared the crunchy okra because we've never seen anything like it. They piled our food high! You can call it a plating issue but we were ecstatic to receive such a great portion with how delicious it was. The starter was in small crispy pieces and had a lovely sauce to accompany it. My curry was so creamy, had my preferred spice level and my naan was cooked perfectly and fresh. I ended up packing my leftovers for work and it tasted just as good the day after. We will definitely be returning here again when we're in the area. I would give it a 4.5 star rating if I could :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0XD_Ej81c7eZVbv1Z58gY_l05bSu-5CoLFI6o\u0026fid=0x0:0xe007072e6d585b59"],"When":"2022-8-6"},{"Name":"possible dreams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxIa3BzWqnXDQUO8jtY20RLIc-e_dcFVWRfnXKg4PTTzFJReRSSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an early dinner here with my kids and the food was delicious ! The eatery is quaint \u0026 simple in decor and very clean. The service was efficient and friendly without being too much ...My sons gf is from India and knows great Northern Indian food and she loves this place.  I love Indian food but have never eaten here before today ...but will again very soon I'm sure . We had Pistachio curry chicken , a baked white fish , tandoori chicken , basmati rice, garlic naan and Papadum . I always though I didnt like Tandoori chicken but after having it here...I LOVE it . The white fish was so perfectly seasoned with just the right amount of spice and the pistachio chicken was mouth watering ...had a sauce that was great with the rice. We all just drank water so I cant report on beverages.  There was some traditional music playing in the background and it was a lovely time spent catching up with my kids who took me here for a late birthday meal . Oh and I love chandeliers...they have mini ones for lighting:) They are located in a small shopping complex with some parking . Definitely try them out , you will be glad you did !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMF6dedH8Zh5WbaEGauxw-XjkLC_wEPCkbrj3y5\u0026fid=0x0:0xe007072e6d585b59"],"When":"2019-4-21"},{"Name":"joshua lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKy89EiyrYEoRIPM9lNlgsVi8PFWjSFOnXkTQ28MhFW8iga_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Disgusting… first we ordered through SkipTheDishes and the restaurant got our order wrong so we had to order again through Uber eats. This time we got the order we wanted but there was a dead fly inside of the rice. The orders here are always delayed and even though the food is usually good, this is unacceptable. Horrible quality management and order accuracy. Please fix this","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOC3BmTk_zlKQI01tmkqKlRtnxQjJNrLrnQ9otr\u0026fid=0x0:0xe007072e6d585b59"],"When":"2022-6-13"},{"Name":"Naveen Saboo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXILEC3XZdTUWvzuZ7oFBTZr8ElrCiHDEL8hp_C6UHXRV24h91P=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tugged on a busy street but with its own parking. The host were welcoming and accomdative. The washroom was clean. Food quantity and presentation was good. Food taste was bit bland mostly to accommodate local requirements.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkMm-MOolzHQLDIJhPOGtMPror9U7_GzgM0Nsf\u0026fid=0x0:0xe007072e6d585b59"],"When":"2022-8-30"},{"Name":"Tyson Watt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0ERnm6xwZ1UGgexkuL1SIOvWwXcFrPQNOWhObFi2mgPhcL4Uh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food great service. Found this spot by way of google. Ran deep our server was great, her recommendation of the Cashew Chicken did not disappoint. Not fine dining but affordable quality food served by great staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGaPfgzL6Kxu3Zr_lHg7V-Clhs-nN7tnOzggam\u0026fid=0x0:0xe007072e6d585b59"],"When":"2021-9-22"},{"Name":"Mr. Beaver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWL3M8ZH3qEl_RyevO5nyLbhHPG0gb_f64YALWS11Pc92lQ0bBO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"well to be honest i was skeptical at first. the place looked flimsy and poorly managed. but oh my goodness their butter chicken is out of this world! the sauce was so thick and rich and the chicken was tender it just melts in your mouth. im glad i found this place. the only downside was the heater which was too close to my seat. but other than that, perfection. ill be back for more food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIQZJyaVHloeDHt0qyZ01-taDa7ZcoWq7m-dg1\u0026fid=0x0:0xe007072e6d585b59"],"When":"2019-11-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mariena Bui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Nw1jeBXne8haJacgZytBHrMEqU2gmOMAF3l5QWK0CwO3rXPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am AMAZED by the food here and I think I could honestly say this is my new spot in aldergrove I will be going for pho. I also want to compliment how nice the staff are here aswell! ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlCbrWPqH2WyI1-s0TczgvRdojKWM-BQigcg9V&fid=0x0:0x8ca89fae3fab2ecd"],"When":"2024-3-30"},{"Name":"Catlin Jorgenson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_rZ9BSPSpadq64xRxCiMIt7uthE7_o09vsF387xNpQ9FbwA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Placed order for pickup for house special and spring rolls and was definitely not disappointed.. best pho I've had!!!! Portions are great  and food was delicious would definitely recommend!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dan Uyen Duong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr0V5wEvhPPcQnA-afbHFMhtw3wYt_rzpvtLqHaXlGVmZ2ZSG6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best restaurant in Aldergrove
Awesome place, the staffs are friendly and helpful, the menu is diversity with a great deal of delicious foods, particularly soups.
I love new dishes (Pasta with butter garlic). It’s really good that fits for children and convenience for eating in office. ❤️❤️
Cheers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6XxY3yikx0XWmaRdThUnprvytC-CVfIvhsGTv&fid=0x0:0x8ca89fae3fab2ecd"],"When":"2021-3-28"},{"Name":"Dyana Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJofCZU_atylCGRODdYMU9FKDXMS6qQczNTgSmX4XMnWoJPDmc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow just wow! I picked up Pho for a friend healing from a cold and had to pick some up for myself too. Firstly the owners are lovely, secondly this is THE best Pho I've ever had. Their chili sauce, which is homemade and authentically Vietnamese, is Sooooo hot and so delicious! This is now added to the list of some of my fave spots! Can't wait to try some other dishes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMne_v2rqvPrijvUx4GBRo2lEKhyjVMY-j1YvEb&fid=0x0:0x8ca89fae3fab2ecd"],"When":"2023-11-21"},{"Name":"crystal .dodding","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUZ-H4dgDe8GMnhoAdR8EWXp6w95OE3rk82_6_nCStoEPDLmCI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bought it through SkipTheDishes, and I just have to say A+ effort all around with this!  Everything was packed so nothing would be lost.  If I could’ve sat in there to eat, I would cuz the beef rice noodle soup was amazing!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Miles P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-Hpfcsh-5YUkphb7Gj8zjmyb-3jxrzSmAcEonVaY-w5hkDIdV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I had late lunch here today after visiting the thrift shops close by. Service was good. Staff was friendly. Food was tasty in general except for small amount of meat added on my pho. The meat balls were small, not so tasty and chewy. Aside from these issues everything was very good. My friend said his food is delicious. I will give this place another try the next time I'll visit Aldergrove. Hopefully they'll improve.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lala Po","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7IFkTC193THn7-U9Tc6fJ88mrBZHHxmnokTSrgMZgjrQ11w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their Pho (House Special) is really good. For Large size bowl it's only $10.++. Definitely coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDeVA1cRYKzzKS1v6nDOV9WGJreHV7JG1IUq5Q&fid=0x0:0x8ca89fae3fab2ecd"],"When":"2020-11-23"},{"Name":"Amy Doan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlEfJhhW-4pHX8_yb3yhVNNdGFrIS1lw2KOWlMigxtp_x_Py4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem. Honestly came in with my family with low expectations but wow the food is so good! Have been to a lot of Vietnamese restaurants in the lower mainland and this one is by far one of the best for quality and the amount of food given is perfect. Highly recommended!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Chris L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlo27yi0c3tMg1MEFW8gltVROJwlBrQGtk927fnMS7KkAAA0UJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What does one do when we finally get some sun? BBQ! I'm so happy we found this hidden gem. We love our tandoori, lamb and paneer. The prices were outstanding, the lady behind the counter was so helpful. Also, this place was so clean inside you could literally eat off the floor. And the meat, and paneer was outstanding. So much flavour. We will be back. If you live in the area, this should be your go to meat shop!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6zcBhQQhhKBJ07SFTgifSZx0Bwp09obCXSr2G\u0026fid=0x0:0x954d6697fecc31c4"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Barinder Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhvofUUEXMK5kb9WyOpMavh1Tx4T4rcJcePiA2gELU4j8q8A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They are selling bad old goat meat . I bought it . At Home while goin  to cook it was smelling bad .I have to return it and they refund after some arguments. Food safe bc should visit them .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley Deo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHCU_2Txxwfb1KamyralXLP5TOF9Wj24W0WXHgiSW2jlma4YI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Everything was good til I found out last week that their boneless chicken drumsticks were priced and advertised as boneless chicken thighs. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shez Nur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNMeNokGGhBUAZIr69dHUmDoQ-dYiukEbTF3m0RcDe1NxGQgk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fabulous food, great atmosphere and great service by far this is the best Vietnamese restaurant in Vancouver.
Our server Jasmeen did a great job. I highly recommend. 10/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpVfm1lUGXicsUz5AiOXokh9FALIM3JOdwAvXX&fid=0x0:0xc35c95ebafdc70cd"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Mariena Bui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Nw1jeBXne8haJacgZytBHrMEqU2gmOMAF3l5QWK0CwO3rXPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food at this restaurant was delightful and the people that worked there was incredible! I ordered a vermicelli chicken bowl with fish sauce and my husband ordered lemon grass chicken rice plate. There was so much flavour and they really hooked up the chicken for our dishes ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrWXpxw6n6mMmf75s_lcKJn6t-E---Lgn_-CBE&fid=0x0:0xc35c95ebafdc70cd"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"T K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBjs_8XvvkzBMG-1HmgIjTdYzywRXtx1m_K9OxV4qzE99dY0-d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You gotta eat here!!! Omg delicious signature seafood pho. ORDER THE SIGNATURE PHO. My seafood pho was over the top yummy for your tummy. Come on a rainy night and it will make the soup taste even better. Jasmin our server was fabulous. Sorry for the picture … I couldn’t wait to eat my soup. But you get the picture (😂) no pun intended.
PS - try their spring rolls!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfTXkf7eqC_VtuuorZCQW_yJ6RXxM-kg48vR0&fid=0x0:0xc35c95ebafdc70cd"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Pretty decent for the foods, nothing special for me. I can say because I've been tried a lot of Vietnamese restaurants. My first time here but second time for my husband and stepdaughter who ordered seafoods noodle last time and complained that too much noodle and too little seafood so she ordered extra seafood this time. I ordered spicy seafood which didn't asked for extra seafood and my stepdaughter was right about it. Had only one server who did everything so can't complain because she was pretty busy. I like the restaurant to be clean and organized so we sat right inside which a lot of stuffs pile up next to us so would be nice for them to organize to make the area look nice, not messy and dusty So 3.5 stars","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMT5ye0A1ikDH0UC_7zlwu2x-e_oH2gHveK-kFZ&fid=0x0:0xc35c95ebafdc70cd"],"When":"2023-2-12"},{"Name":"Se Rene","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJMVjPO3YMLKyt6X6JQQ7SAO_Q6lAbeE4d3eRMimE_p0DiRzc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really appreciated that this restaurant serves tea (instead of cold water and making you pay extra for basic tea).

Dishes were simple but flavourful. I was pleasantly surprised that the fish sauce and other sauce accompaniments to the dishes were WELL BALANCED in taste (not sugar bombs).

Atmosphere was nice & easy-going.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipND9RcORcQMD6Rl2mwGknH7-SrexPHGjZDW3et8&fid=0x0:0xc35c95ebafdc70cd"],"When":"2024-1-2"},{"Name":"Naomi Fazan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8X_K9zqJBscJ5-zT635d-5KkttndwKSf6nQ7WUK14aNp8eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"3.5 - Randomly stopped by this spot and was impressed. The beef ball broth was actually really flavourful and not oily. I also ordered the veggie spring rolls which were also good and a bowl of white rice. Will be back to try more dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCg29g3IrsXuJNQJKLirpsjNnPcHUUKySlhdjZ&fid=0x0:0xc35c95ebafdc70cd"],"When":"2022-5-23"},{"Name":"Al","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXhuzY9EtR995iv_JzHNxVgZDDRgXt0WC3JFvr8EOcJVa9t_1N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pho Tran is my go to Vietnamese place in the Langley region.

The food is good, the service is excellent and consistent.

Pho Tran is a family business not a franchise. In December they even ran a customer appreciation discount for the month.

It isn’t a fancy restaurant however none of the best Vietnamese places are. I go here time and time again when I am in the region. It is even comparable to the Richmond restaurants which I usually eat at.

Pictures attached.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHTSpuMg0u6lhOMaNOKYNhLsFSHWsPSKoaMOPs&fid=0x0:0xc35c95ebafdc70cd"],"When":"2023-6-20"},{"Name":"Cassandra Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwc-16-1MJ_LmQ7eq3bs-alapEfhCMPc7TLsuKBsQdOwzApxUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time experience here was beyond great. The food was phenomenal, the staff were friendly and the service was fast and efficient. 100% would recommend and will return to this establishment again :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGW1P8kHo_FgmtXkwfcH9dl17eTplZlhq5UJZ_&fid=0x0:0xc35c95ebafdc70cd"],"When":"2023-9-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joey Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVZMVi230Ra3hWeAcKIoMpyeLMSWFQ2xkY9PdwY9F1OSbaUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great sushi place.  Food was fresh and tasty.  Friendly service.  Will visit again when in Aldergrove!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzTCOh0PzihBGSg_rDWuI8LgMh7YPvWSt_vrvF&fid=0x0:0xf9ae362f4bc20624"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Nadja Burmatoff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP-YEPighB8iaB6Ge-ID1tY71GflN0sb09YQj8M2k-zRWXCgqf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This sushi restaurant is absolutely amazing! The food is top-notch, with incredible quality that stands out even among the best sushi I’ve had around the world. The flavors are fresh and delicious, making every bite a delight.

The staff and owners are fantastic. Even though there have been changes in ownership, the quality has remained consistently high. The team is super friendly and attentive, ensuring a wonderful dining experience every time.

I can’t recommend this place enough. Whether you’re a sushi aficionado or just looking for a great meal, this is the spot to visit. I’ll definitely be coming back again and again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dawn Petras","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGvKUD4J1CH5PwPcCeW8yV0QmQs98tEoraxrTkUspYovG0Qg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Impressive! Fast service even on a Saturday night, and staff were very pleasant when I picked up our takeout order. Food was excellent, large portions and reasonably priced! Awesome chicken tempura, Agedashi tofu, Crazy Girl roll,  mixed tempura, tempura udon bowl. Will definitely go there again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zachary Bay and Jacqueline Bay Mortgage Brokers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKHzAYRmGe3PtU6SGBLOKn7z5Jf7I2mF-Di7Z9zLiI5KxrWk5C=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great Sushi experience here. The atmosphere is nice, service is great, and the sushi is fantastic. They have some great lunch combos definitely worth a try, as well as some very reasonably priced platters. I highly recommend this sushi restaurant. From your local Mortgage Broker Foodie","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow, we had a really happy time here! We went in for late lunch which no customers in the restaurant but they were busy with take out. Got warm welcome along with fast and friendly service made us so happy. The foods were really delicious with fresh ingredients! Reasonable price with perfect portion. My daughters made a bit of mess on the floor by accident which normally i tidy up before we leave. I never leave any mess wherever we go because I used to work in the restaurant so i know what I should do to make them happy to welcome we back. He saw and came to clean the floor, thank you again! Anyway, we cleaned everything after ourselves. So can't wait to go back to try more because many things that I never tried before.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_vRI61AUtLc5Bu1eh3DaFHNadFxATupfu973X&fid=0x0:0xf9ae362f4bc20624"],"When":"2023-2-19"},{"Name":"Kate Snow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPCjE5BkQiytaMbxjVpZ5vTBKSSzY4cn6MV-sEdQDQ5piCWZ73Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lunch special was delicious and we also had teriyaki tofu. All very tasty, nice portions and quick friendly service. Will definitely go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIJHbHKQKjhtfSshrGulLS5K5YqC_Ko7fs994Q&fid=0x0:0xf9ae362f4bc20624"],"When":"2024-1-29"},{"Name":"james C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcO3h6TuKOSwOtsHvIzzHMtZ5I5xM0yqZ7rhWl4TzLVMBkaXe9og=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is an absolute gem, great service fish quality is extremely good and a very diverse menu. Great pricing and really impressed with the sear quality on some of the fish I tried like the unagi and Ika. One of my regular new go to sushi bars and just a short drive across the border.  Soo is amazing wonderful server and very fun and helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOG9DRXB-wA9K01LJ5sECezrE5Z6jPv7lYbBAP2&fid=0x0:0xf9ae362f4bc20624"],"When":"2023-7-27"},{"Name":"Sharon Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEiQdhVGKuiRx9GE3sfld5Qj0ICZz_zuQ8FvE8IvVrBqGM6w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant serves the BEST Japanese cuisine I have ever had.  And trust me, I have had a lot over the years.  The food is awesome!   It is fresh  full of flavour and beautifully presented.  We have eaten there several times and keep going back because of the delicious food, you are NEVER  disappointed in your choice, the flavourful dishes, great selection of dishes to try,  and the pleasant, comfortable atmosphere.  The staff are all wonderful!  It is a relaxing atmosphere and you feel very welcome,  ot just another customer.  And did I mention the portions?  Large portions very reasonably priced.  So come hungry!  They are located right in downtown Aldergrove.  Don't miss trying  this culinary delight!  It is our FAVORITE JAPANESE RESTAURANT.   I am sure it will become yours too.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mike de Ruyter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4fHJPLcB7U6roP0gaw7wGdDG2qyZmqMKo63QW9TF_pyAOMnDN8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my wife’s and my first Thai Food experience and what an amazing experience it was! The service was fast, friendly and so helpful. We went with 2 friends who lived in Thailand for 6 months and they confirmed that the food was VERY authentic. Such amazing flavours, incredibly fresh food, very friendly service and all around a great experience! They make the egg rolls in house and all the sauces as well! We can’t wait to come back again soon. Thank you so much!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"MJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlm_XRYtoUIMsDe0r0YhYfxDQnj37a3FGprKGl2_zxeQCNP_XX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic Thai cuisine! Great Flavours, delicious food and great service.

We got the green curry with rice and the pad thai noodles, they were delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmEyYR4Qv4QeNbfOCHMqlpXc0RL8wDyDn1K7eV&fid=0x0:0xc951f34cc481d826"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Andrew McClure","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_55THclAZgHBmB1Gd0ZQZxnRRAMZSJQyTzy9dIfOj0pGY4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Easy to find and what a gem! Food was great, service was quick and attentive.

We had chicken satay for an appy, chicken was cooked perfectly with a peanut sauce that was well balanced.

Three of had: stir fried eggplant with tofu, stir fried cashew nuts with chicken and stir fried beans with prawns.

Spice level was medium, which was mildly spicy. The server offered more spice if we wanted.

We were impressed -- we will return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3kFBePYITMVEW1SkugJm6j4ln_FGKbuK6G3S7&fid=0x0:0xc951f34cc481d826"],"When":"2024-2-5"},{"Name":"Troy Bernier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICsDHybS3oeNAGUD4jNT_Hmct40z_t2lFk2nnGHT-_IxT9vw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is absolutely amazing. Discovered this restaurant about 1month ago. The food was so fabulous that we returned the next night. We have had the food about 5-6 times since our first tasting.  The food is fresh and the you can taste the love that goes into every single dish that is made. The dine in experience is fantastic if you take the time to just enjoy the quiet and small space. The walls are decorated with actual pictures of Thailand and dishes from the homeland. The owners are make up probably 90% of the working staff. The main waitress is the wife of the main chef in the kitchen, the mother also cooks, I believe the daughters work there aswell.  If a small "hole in the wall" place is your kinda place, well here is your spot!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"soya park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3BbIsAbqHMj9yballU7VKGiLGQnx_k5l78PcJHfa6dZvIB4U=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is real authentic Thai food. Highly recommended. So impressed with the service and food. 10 out of 10.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB5tsjvFtbeWmmU0uIwYztWuPeKKsfArb4F--_&fid=0x0:0xc951f34cc481d826"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Al Pet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4S6TtNY95AWDSzYl5wiI07Vb9AXuT9xsZfe3YQyZ3HtAmpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious authentic Thai food!!!! Lovely family owned restaurant we loved every dish. Go here if you love Thai!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPz_4R_pE0695dV9VL2WruNEfo5j0D0SEuOvI3r&fid=0x0:0xc951f34cc481d826"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Derrick Gee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWpp_KG_hQdFfpFLv9uNssyI4T7ANjWKXCriTixdtBeLuMvic=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a fantastic lunch there on Friday with colleagues. Started with the roti and peanut sauce followed by the shrimp pad thai. Food was hot and tasted excellent! I will definitely be returning again. Serving staff was attentive to our needs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPVdLSZnGVdP1hXJnunJJyCs6SG8cBAMGZcpI&fid=0x0:0xc951f34cc481d826"],"When":"2024-4-8"},{"Name":"Rukchanita Olivia Wajitdouol","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDA2GHAy8STGZ6LWcIR9hVRlZrCoU9wR3tVMZMotRS9wGSn7Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found new favorite restaurant in Aldergrove. Great authentic Thai food with Chef Sek’s signature. Great service from Khun Mon. Have them a chance and you won’t disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOakpTph3ull1fsZVcAt6CwUM-q3qAjRlK4d5t_&fid=0x0:0xc951f34cc481d826"],"When":"2024-4-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Airstream Dream","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGPv1o7Kf7jlPbCS59uvk5AFZBl2qxXtr-2KQSkEnhltD7hoc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely delicious!! You can feel the love that went into this soup.  We had the beef stew and pork wonton. The bubble tea is great too. Staff is nice and friendly. Definitely our new favourite spot in town. Thank you Pho Seawall and see you soon:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhu5Q4q2iXPWi18e_f2OJZ40WVtm9VjTu0OUwe&fid=0x0:0x893dfdcac3ca69c9"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Ohad Okon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX302A6boj9UFqYFCOB_0YcTBmLRgnIO_ais5CmlKeAJ4Yfyn3o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food and even better atmosphere and service!!
I live in the great Vancouver area and this restaurant is not only as good as the Vietnamese ones in the city but actually better than most I’m truly impressed.
I had the lobster pho which is something I’ve never seen before at other Vietnamese restaurants and it was absolutely delicious. The coconut green tea with juicy mango jelly was also phenomenal if I’m ever in the area again I will absolutely come back 😊
(Picture is the pho with chili oil basil and bean sprouts which I added)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3I5f5saS4H-_wMCueBsg1OsF77xmf86HKFTo&fid=0x0:0x893dfdcac3ca69c9"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Christina D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdbzCgX2mAlkgoRDRpQdmyhvqkcWi1Q4oMSB2c7X4rmlkfGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here after a trip to cultus lake. First impressions, beautiful restaurant with a big party/karaoke room in the back. The server greeted us kindly.

As a person who loves Vietnamese cuisine, I had low expectations of a Vietnamese restaurant in aldergrove area. But I was very surprised on our food. It was delicious.

We came as a group of 6 adults and 2 toddlers. Ordered rice dishes, bun dishes and pho.

Rice dishes were amazing, big portions, very flavourful. Even the fried rice was good.

The vermicelli dishes were all good and flavourful.

The pho soup and meats were great but I’m not a huge fan of the noodles, it’s a bit stringy but my friend really liked it.

All in all, I’d eat here again if I was nearby!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEJTeXFjQs1pBwwZ3EArLk9OaXIUcdcrg-RDn2&fid=0x0:0x893dfdcac3ca69c9"],"When":"2023-8-10"},{"Name":"Sarah D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnpZPF22ME7vibqUyGYLQd7rosHPbSc95u-GY2pmm4iooT_IYa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered takeout last night from Pho Seawall since we've been meaning to try this new restaurant ever since they opened a couple months ago. I should preface this by saying that we're not foodies, nor are we very good judges of what is good authentic Vietnamese cuisine, so if you want to know those metrics, sorry I can't help you out. What I can tell you is that our food was delicious, and the portion sizes are ENORMOUS. We have eaten 2 meals each from our two dishes, and still have one portion leftover that could be another meal. Excellent value for sure. I ordered the lemongrass chicken vermicelli and my husband got the pad thai. I was pleasantly surprised with all the lovely colourful vegetables in my dish. They had our meals hot and waiting for us when we arrived to pick it up. The dining room looks fresh and inviting, and we look forward to dining in when the pandemic dies down.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_Hyhg7LWaC4qfSkHQO2Jz-ELbp4NMxiw5tW_Y&fid=0x0:0x893dfdcac3ca69c9"],"When":"2020-5-22"},{"Name":"Jennifer Bullis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJIZgqzlZtkN9Tdc7Ih-y7aryMLksKqFC3u7JMS1k3E8JUdA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ok, I’ve found my favourite Vietnamese restaurant. I got the pork vermicelli bowl and it was so good - everything was fresh and they weren’t skimpy with the meat or veg. Other people had the pho and it look really good, ill try that next time!

UPDATE: I went back, this time I had the Pho - it was just what I expected… amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0VZyFhEB6rNLY7bNELQ6SiR31noQKtZjsQ3zS&fid=0x0:0x893dfdcac3ca69c9"],"When":"2023-6-10"},{"Name":"Simm Pandher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkMzdbffjbeICLS63J0VcaLdi715EA9fa_D79BP35EDsRI_gu7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is the second time I've ordered from here via DoorDash and didn't receive the extra pork. The pho wasn't very good. I wasn't a fan of the broth. Could be because it was delivered, I can't say for sure. To order chili oil was an extra dollar, and you get the smallest portion.  Unimpressed, won't be ordering again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vivi Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIokdCA9t79WcqMQW_PpuhXv-LCk0OQTU7Io2_eGyShdvPzBzM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was great. Their pho has a different texture. It tasted more fresh and chewy! The soup was very tasty too! We sat at the room with the tv and enjoyed our lunch a lot","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Manmeet Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMXWGi0PTwBnnJPx-2zRWWQX9viRcadnjBye5zp3cT1qRomGuzzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered takeout through Ubereats, it was a quick order, overall took like 30 minutes. The quantity was surprising huge, it was more than enough for one person. The chicken tasted really good in the lemongrass chicken vermicelli. However, the vermicelli was way too bland. The sauce they gave was not enough. But it still tasted pretty flavourful, except the vermicelli.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMz6igZ70PsA8LajX87-7Q3NgP70Z-7eKywAgEb&fid=0x0:0x893dfdcac3ca69c9"],"When":"2023-10-24"}]

title: Tomo Sushi

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Art Ward","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKREvj9N5sCAlhMaL2ttZWAoa_ePfZEBayeT_zJsd4z-lgakYx7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The original owners were awesome. They were friendly people. They knew how to serve you when I read reviews that people are giving this place a five star restaurant. I think you need your heads examine we ordered skewers of chicken. They were so dry. They’re like they’re old not one person in that place smiled. The lady that served us was constantly on her telephone. It was like they could not wait that we got out of there so we felt very unwelcome. So people take it from me that we visit a lot of Japanese restaurants. They are right at the bottom don’t go there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mariena Bui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Nw1jeBXne8haJacgZytBHrMEqU2gmOMAF3l5QWK0CwO3rXPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I never been here so I decided to indulge and order a variety of things. Let me tell you how everything I ordered tasted amazing and had a lot of flavour. I ordered gyoza, miso soup, Gomae, ichiban roll, caterpillar roll, yam roll and beef teriyaki cone. They had my order ready in 20 minutes and when I went to pick up the food I didn’t have to wait ☺️ I’m a super happy customer and will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0FsApmm1ZZVKCJ547zo4Ys4jATgiFr79os34C&fid=0x0:0x57e56aeaf53a4080"],"When":"2024-3-30"},{"Name":"Nicole Beaverstock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINlxlqrls3P2n0sb12ZhDTVLEoEcSNKk-nM6JWCwRB8vGQug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small sushi place next to/attached to a gas station.

Relatively fast sit in service (only one single table left available) (were also filling take out orders while hosting an almost full house)

Went alone to dine-in, ordered:
- Philadelphia Roll
- Chicken Karage
- Rice
- Miso soup

Total was under $25 before tip.

Friendly, welcoming and kind service.
Food tasted surprisingly good and fresh.
Miso soup tasted a bit funny but otherwise pleased!

Also very easily asked for no wasabi no ginger and was pleased to have that fulfilled as well as the sushi didn't have any residual of those flavors either.

Edit: I've gone here many times in the 3 years I've lived in the area. They're fast and reliable. Food is always on point. (Take out)

Edit: September 2024, rainbow roll, chicken teriyaki roll.
I don't usually like tuna. With this rainbow roll i didn't even notice there was tuna at first.
Not usually a fan of chicken but this teriyaki chicken roll was better than anticipated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5CWkEKlnFhhGXYdjHInJ2AnCqYTRPW1sUfU86&fid=0x0:0x57e56aeaf53a4080"],"When":"2023-5-12"},{"Name":"Culinary Slut","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxK_lkCU4fd_RQlg9nZ4gMHwzV5x-r0tALs-GITthQjkvDASA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A nice spot for inexpensive Japanese food. It’s not great, but it’s not bad. Food is priced fairly for the quality.  Good middle-of-the-road fish is used in the sushi, but the rice was a touch stale. The karaage had a nice spicy kick in the sauce. We enjoyed the tempura. The Goma-ae (spinach with peanut sauce) was just okay.  We wouldn’t go out of our way to dine here, but if you’re in the neighbourhood it’s an acceptable option.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMA8QsW0Cu7HVpc_4SDZtVey6-0Y-smgFsKRVjL&fid=0x0:0x57e56aeaf53a4080"],"When":"2022-10-28"},{"Name":"Parvesh Raju","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKyirvXqL3ged_ilNdZ3FcZC6U-NlUwPlR7ghVuaYQdqNcpOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Disgusting food. The sushi roll had stale rice and brown avocados. Disgusting. I called the restaurant to inform them of the quality but they weren’t interested.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsySXPr7qdPZWT1uNtOIgGyl9PipLESSSqmaLw&fid=0x0:0x57e56aeaf53a4080"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"West Coast Mini Dachshunds","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxuq6syWw9T9CsBhKm71Kjz1HXIj0GLsrwdCbSrdk3e1K1EQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A pleasant sushi joint.  Their prices are great.  The chopped scallop roll was great, lots of eggs in there.
The lion king Roll was nice.  Pretty much a dynamite roll with chopped scallops on top with spicy mayo dressing.
As you can see, I enjoy scallops and ebi.

Overall, a good bang for the buck.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwiu97IgWXDOJO_Bs2XWBU4iaCSzqjq17Kr-Og&fid=0x0:0x57e56aeaf53a4080"],"When":"2022-12-23"},{"Name":"Ryan Hamman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfODq72KSeDrZd3H6EycvxaLRTq0HOQffqMFV_PiWZtRyCRWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The restaurant area is small but it was nice and clean inside. The service was excellent. The food however, tasted exactly how you would imagine “gas station sushi” to taste… Our rolls were slightly cold but mostly room temperature and the avocado had  looked like it’d browned due to air exposure. Not appealing. I ate as much as I could salvage.  The Sunomono was ok. The tempura was good! I believe the prices are a little high for a no frills restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmwCMs_Lt4_xZpH4cDTTRJfkK4hqoHRMm91e_a&fid=0x0:0x57e56aeaf53a4080"],"When":"2023-6-13"},{"Name":"nick tassone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK04y85EYj4Uf_FEbLmpvugnJmMrJ7CYNn3YcwnQ2aUmydFlA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered sashimi that was paper thin. Thanks for the edamame Beans that were free I guess since order was 130 dollars. Asked for wasabi extra on the side and they said it was extra. Never heard of anyone ever charging extra for something that comes with the food. Hope they enjoyed the money because now I will never go back there.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Murrayville Town Pub
descriptions: Homey neighborhood pub serving beers, burgers & bar bites in a low-key space with pool tables.
