user_reviews:
[{"Name":"TE Alba B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWja93ZRsxtwFym-fSrklsHeV99P939k3COcBDstnzDYN8CpFvF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As usually very nice pub, great ambience and delicious culinary .
This time we were a table of 11 people and Cassie A offered us very diligent, courteous, professional and nice service …..impecable .
We love to go back anytime from Burnaby to see family and to celebrate with them .

Nice restaurant pub. Very great service and ambience .
I will love to go back .
Waitresses are very professional and friendly.
Food is very delicious , great culinary.
House White wine is delicious !!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2i2qiAHx_uQjsWQGj_KDlcAfJy7WTR5dph8_H&fid=0x0:0xb48b14db609cafb4"],"When":"2022-6-8"},{"Name":"Kartiki Bhatnagar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWR2hN7n4UdD4WBGEEsoR9or_Ztn5wSsBSC6xMHcAchy-6EyHbywg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and atmosphere!

I got the chance to try their French onion soup which was the BOMB. You’re gonna regret not getting it - it’s so flavourful and the cheese is just right. I also had the Mile High burger with the fries which is enough to feed like 2 people. Didn’t take photos of it because I just devoured it. SO good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQvdtgvLpP5hdhTmJK-xJA1l1FQhV73dgqBKTp&fid=0x0:0xb48b14db609cafb4"],"When":"2024-3-30"},{"Name":"Robyn Haley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVw3kWQpqm9DMTN5UjARhhcn4_dmcycLwJPQ3oNmuWeXMPj5pA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had not been to the Murrayville pub in about a decade and I was there last night. My server was Mel and she was beyond fabulous. Honestly, I could not have asked for somebody who would Be more attentive or considerate of my needs. Honestly, I haven’t had good service in five star restaurants. Mel, thank you for making my terrible day end with a smile!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Severena Godin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX987JJsNcQDxvFIUWVOFfzE8IQ4Z_zA7IXQcPnHnXSJpHY2GnJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for my first time tonight & had the French onion soup. SO good. & our server Carly was the sweetest. Checked in on us lots & was very engaging. I’ll definitely be coming back :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Martin Oram","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6NZn3T0dV3MqJrLmDa5abNn06kP3ZllmfR3Gic6il666P1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The food ordered was grossly overcooked and unfit for consumption. Upon pointing this out there was no attempt made by staff or management to correct the situation and when this was pointed out there waitress became belligerent.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"robert fogarty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfg0OfIZoLwFOb0qhPjH5w1cOOZtzizUHltV2S7WkNLRzFlQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is what a small community pub should be.
Friendly welcoming people, who made us feel at home, even though we are from Toronto.
Great ambiance, great food, waitresses are very friendly.
There are also a couple small pool tables which is a nice touch.
Highly recommended!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bryan Bosch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBJALiTaE9-Mot5pHuVyUxBg5uRZb7D6sR9r6mLdk3YWOqONIa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good food and nice atmosphere although the menu is quite limited especially when compared to another local pub The Fox & Hounds whose menu much larger.
All in all it's still a great place to have a good meal but just wish they'd add to the menu many more meal options. I've eaten there over a dozen times and would go more often if I had more to choose from.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jan Timmers (VE7JBT)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEVBXecTkWs0YfdbYKSKLEwi6tF5_Gx86PpHLzcLy5ZYey8Voehw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pub food, friendly neighbourhood atmosphere - like in, everybody knows your name type of friendly.  Lots of TV screens with all sorts of sports and entertainment playing.  I tried a Red Stripe beer here today - first time I've done that - they've got a good selection of beer and wine.  It can get busy and the parking lot will fill up fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7M-PrYG3ObIcb4HEVVZi0hINJOaPxDbZbfdlr&fid=0x0:0xb48b14db609cafb4"],"When":"2017-11-26"}]

about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true},{"name":"Healthy options","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true},{"name":"Vegetarian options","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Breakfast","enabled":true},{"name":"Brunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Family-friendly","enabled":true},{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":false}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true},{"name":"High chairs","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tamara Barillaro (TamB619)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlEHZ4rs9QlMhGJd_Sp0_TQXexQI_Umgvb7b6nraCZLQ3cOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time at the Hot & Toasty Cafe, the place is a cute and a bit out of the way as it's around the corner of all the shops along the main street were the parking is, my dad and I decided to have lunch there as he had eaten there before with friends.

Was happily surprised it's a cute cafe not very big but nice and spacious inside.

I ordered a matcha latte, a small cream of broccoli soup ( it comes with a bread bun) and a creamy shrimp crepe.

Loved everything I ordered the matcha latte was nice and warm not to sweet. The cream of broccoli soup was also very flavorful, but my favorite for sure was the Creamy Shrimp crepe it filled a whole plate the creamy sauce was delicious and the shrimp were medium prawn size were very yummy.

Dad had Earl Grey tea and a club Sandwich.
Which he greatly enjoyed as well.

Will definitely come back again and would recommend this place to anyone looking for a nice place with hearty savoury food or perhaps if wanting something for breakfast or lunch! 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMG-UliXoMMJN9AP4xvF3N3gYNruf8GaETnam7v&fid=0x0:0xfd3f985fb85ccb0f"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Rose G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvEHi00G2AzkQpToYhYZc_konbx2PTx2U0JWsCjrJO4pm6XQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Chicken sandwich was good but comes with nothing no fries no drinks.. order separate.  Very cold inside the restaurant. I got a little bone in my chicken but i didnt want to mention it as this is a local place. Beat luck to them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcciLpFA7ftBzSTDJtkJYRJZ9b6GQ7bLZ-WCdL&fid=0x0:0xfd3f985fb85ccb0f"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Emelyn Escobido","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXShaF-4CfqDIwiHgp6GLvqOIjErZkZveWLt-likxVp-osP2JLX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in for breakfast in this cozy cafe. had the western omelette and the french toast. both were delicious, i devoured the potatoes. french toast with delectable. service was great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdwqxVsfTNs8eSovhiQRdvtE2f4BpMM12hxMcG&fid=0x0:0xfd3f985fb85ccb0f"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Jack Peters","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6tuotdk1_dATGiaaY-PEJ7e94vRmmulQ4gtBej1xawfyQQRAu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were looking for a casual, breakfast place and that's what we found. Great home cooked style breakfast with order at the counter and they'll bring our food to the table. I like this style and the food, the service was a "10". Clean comfortable family run restaurant and next time we have a hunger for good food, will definitely remember this toasty café.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNINFQewF9e0LP1tHQRYj8yy2QmG4aJ_MzMqIzp&fid=0x0:0xfd3f985fb85ccb0f"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Ginn J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFOOQZPhZylsgMOLmtSB5bJOkt-NwtAZ31Ulkb5_TUEpijBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely a hidden gem!!  Great food and enough choices anybody would find something they love on the menu.  They have great prices and a great environment!

We really enjoyed it and will definitely be back!!

Extra tip, there is more parking options closer to value village.  Best way to avoid dealing with parking on the one way section of Fraser Hwy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMk0Sl4XlbtRgGFuaAsbJ0OwyAXSqLXKKEtGBFE&fid=0x0:0xfd3f985fb85ccb0f"],"When":"2024-4-28"},{"Name":"Rajesh Thapar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-W5YbV-tquP8g0FytVLNeeQ1-zIZQosGq_0WkzJFia7FubG__=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic soup and sandwich shop! The sandwiches were fresh and delicious, and the soup was absolutely comforting. Friendly service and cozy atmosphere made for a perfect lunch spot. Will definitely be back!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2J2wcxHg0NTmwEML54gF2Yx0mweLPXQPaLzGP&fid=0x0:0xfd3f985fb85ccb0f"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Rodrigo Flores-Recinos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIaBWZJzy8cq9baG6OWaEhyUlGJSZXfWG7VfizL07VnMzFWYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down the go to for a quality, delicious brunch experience. Although no other waffle or seafood chowder taste good now that I’ve had them here… no regrets. Love the owners and their food. Please visit with confidence","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0qT_m2vaYbQYUyWrd9SnEMhdiXPihXgWLKt2H&fid=0x0:0xfd3f985fb85ccb0f"],"When":"2022-3-27"},{"Name":"Andre Nasim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLtmab-DJHOweJLa0jTLG-9E5GYBkLE9jaDRzrlKmfqaMab6fU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great French toast and veggie omelete.  Even my picky wife enjoyed our breakfast here. Cozy hidden spot . Very old school and relaxing.  Friendly owners.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dale Carr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVl496F52IXXOFx8IZn_3Hwez8W82C881ygySzf8RPc_NvZ83c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was a very busy Sunday morning at the restaurant all staff were very pleasant especially our server Tammy. She has always been great when we go there.  The wait was a little long but considering the volume they were dealing with it wasn’t really bad at all.  The food came out perfect and hot. My wife had the Brioche French Toast and Chicken Tenders ( I ate some of the French toast!) I had the meat lovers breakfast bowl with poached eggs. It was super!  We always get great service and food here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUjEcOtpiKCjQRWSQ3p3YGNGFauHuu6hPPaYLo&fid=0x0:0xe3fe0f1e468925f8"],"When":"2023-5-7"},{"Name":"Ryan Riot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtmR4bHM6f5Ai32Kc7RL0q7X5k3VRaCdwWxeNfmfaJmBwiTkb-SA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I hadn't been to a Ricky's in several years, partly due to lack of nearby locations, partly because their menu (as I recall, anyway) used to be pretty abysmal. Don't know when -- maybe it was gradual, or maybe they did a major brand revamp -- but at some point in the intervening years Ricky's became awesome. Seriously amazing menu filled with excellently-made dishes that focus on flavour over trendiness etc. To read the menu, it just looks like something similar to IHOP or Denny's or other breakfast joints, but what came to our table was like a lesson in Canadian eating, whatever that is. Yeah whatever it is, it's fantastic. Wish I didn't have to cross 6 time zones to eat there 😉","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ewa Ferguson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCBR5Z1sedqnSKsdtprQWdSpfuAp1YS4j3Dmn7iIDMmxPhew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to Ricky's with my husband a couple days ago, and we were both impressed how well this place is run.  Service was very efficient and friendly, even manager is involved helping servers.  My husband all day was bragging how delicious chicken strips were. Also, this place is very clean, we visited in the evening and bathrooms were spotless.
Highly recommed this spot for breakfast, lunch or dinner.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"tannis flynn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLyhclPfH4WMe8mtC-WGRmguEuya-54wzDHYBp1rBgukBAoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We often go to to Ricky’s for our team meetings and the service is always amazing fast and food is great. Our server Hailey always greats us with smile and even remembers our coffee order and food orders before we sit down :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lyse Bissonnette","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKkXFM2-NNP4N3mCXkiHi7YNlJJzel8izjvXZKg9Es9_qNN76p=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were there for breakfast at lunchtime and we were not disappointed. Food was delicious and plentiful. Service was prompt and our server Laura had good humour. I wasn’t sure I’d like it there as I’d had a disappointing lunch at a Surrey location but I have changed my mind; I’ll be back for breakfast!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOA-Hm0i3hwUs25ioDkMta6EceASLSiRWE0FWee&fid=0x0:0xe3fe0f1e468925f8"],"When":"2023-7-6"},{"Name":"Alana Toms","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAS6rrJG7aCG1weCxvplonQRK6FHUI-qrIuqIVUMr0MXZRgw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The lack of service from our server was ridiculous. I believe her name is Nhang, but not sure since she didn’t even introduce herself. She sat us at the table, came back 10 minutes later, and said “are you ready to order yet?”. I ordered a ginger ale, and they were out, tried ordering their frozen coffee mocktail, and they were also out. My partner ordered a burger and I ordered a grilled cheese with soup and it took over 40 minutes to come out to the table - no explanation nor apologies. We came in at 3pm and were one of three tables in the entire restaurant. Food was fine, nothing to write home about. Asked for the bill, and took over 10 minutes to bring the machine over. Honestly, the experience was a disaster, and I cannot comprehend how this place has ever received a 5 star rating from anyone. I have worked in hospitality for over a decade and usually find myself to be pretty understanding, but I found this to be ridiculous.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Berton D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6fcYxhd4DazB0tuw-35SfyOvRJu1fYhORZqPZrnm_DkatQSmzRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Had the lasagna and salad for lunch, Ceaser salad was excellent, although croutons were very hard, try biting one,  there is soft and then there is hard.  Lasagna was overcooked,  smaller portion so it overbaked and dried quickly,  pasta noodles were dried to the bottom of the dish, side garden salad did not have enough dressing so asked for more,  prices are higher. $$$
Overall the facility is great but the franchise should provide a better Lasagna. Serving sizes should be checked to ensure the value for the price is there.  Service was good.  Will return.

12/15/18
Ordered the Wine briased beef short ribs, very tastey and the risotto was excellent.  Pesto veggie flatbread was also good, flavors of the  tomato an avocado, pesto and feta cheese. Very good.  Fish and chips, French fries could be crispy, too soft,  fish was prepared perfect.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0OzYkw7rUkfDLAvwjDH6sskcCSiAgniB9zkT-&fid=0x0:0xe3fe0f1e468925f8"],"When":"2018-7-17"},{"Name":"Karen Neal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3q2bxQBJbbxJgUNFaf7m_Uehwt0UmqiHbNPK7Gjgea7QpS2-8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is always great and the servers are very nice. The prices make eating out affordable, glad I live nearby 😁","Images":null,"When":""}]

descriptions: Casual setup for Canadian smoked meats & pub fare with Cajun cooking, desserts & full bar.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Robby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJ-mLrUBAdbxFI-rq7JMdzcjfcQ46QLRBeK1iakz6QSOQJV1hw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is an absolute gem! The food was incredibly delicious, the service was impressively quick, and the ambiance was warm and inviting. The fried chicken and waffles were perfectly crispy and flavorful—an absolute treat. The cauliflower 'chicken' wings were out of this world and a must-try for everyone, ev
en non-vegetarians. This spot is perfect for a gathering with family and friends, and I can’t recommend it highly enough. I’ll definitely be coming back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTIf1_m3DKZQfuywNYQB7zvF5t8jr9RBh9yq-0&fid=0x0:0x4c13000de7104ed4"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"carmen e","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVUc_8fh43fFEQy9wzmkwODQOjFiZPwpRa6TaijEnz3fzDAjp4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Smoked meats were full of flavour. Service was outstanding. Parking was easy and the portions were fantastic. A great place to dine and love the New Orleans bistro vibe. A pleasant experience and already looking forward to our next visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlNhd2971Ljj2bzHbjlZYK0pRFm9M54huIkIRz&fid=0x0:0x4c13000de7104ed4"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Metellingtruth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2Ixwi5jN-cdh2Vu-fk-hv_6VlCc2I9AVnxQXyHSyTUw_H5WWv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Upper scale restaurant with great comfort foods. The menu is sandwich heavy and they are delicious, the star of the show is the 22 delicious sides you can choose from. The meat dishes are delicious also. The atmosphere is great, it’s very busy so be prepared to wait to be seated and be patient with being served. There is a reason why it’s so busy, the Montreal inspired menu is a fresh change of pace out west.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlr9kIlvozLGFodhRXg3z9GuVcb-nX4-qtZwc_&fid=0x0:0x4c13000de7104ed4"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Courtney Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyx7MeNfi-eae1uVY7Y9G6xoqjuwf55HncCeIYFmU3QoEapLfn2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great new transplant to Langley. I had heard of this place when it was further out in the Valley but never made it out there. What a neat space. Totally miss judged its size by the outside! It’s huge! Has a very French quarter style. Loads of delicious smoked meats on the menu. Our service was amazing. The waitress gave us a tip of getting the ribs with the sauce on the side, and I would suggest that as well, as you can dip the meat for the amazing sauce but let the meat with its salty rub be the star of the show! We also had the brisket beef dip, the smoked wings and the blackened catfish. This place has 22 sides that do not disappoint as well. We’ll be back with friends for sure. Welcome to Langley Brodeur’s Bistro!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM28bjWKKaxfPoTRwn35E2GiB5qNT3mESZ6GE6n&fid=0x0:0x4c13000de7104ed4"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Rob Collins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUE8MC497TiO7p2JzTE0vIQpoUNfrufkc1U90jG5UYlRz7ho70a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every so often in life when dining out, the “Wow Factor” sneaks up on you.
We were expecting the average dining experience.
Brodeur’s is anything but.
Their Cobb Salad was a home run including the Tomato Bisque.
My wife couldn’t say enough about her Salmon salad and our son was extremely satisfied with his Beef Dip.
“One of the best”, he stated.
The atmosphere is dynamic.
Their servers are some of the best in the business.
We know you’ll enjoy Brodeur’s as much as we did from the many comments from other guests seated nearby.
With plenty of covered parking with the main door about 50 feet away, that’s a really great sign you’ll be well taken care of.
One of the best dining experiences you can have in the Lower Mainland of Vancouver on Langley’s north side.
Congratulations Brodeur’s, you’ve hit a home run with your format including your excellent customer dining experience.
We’ll be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcZGfM-4dtCwGIc5rL7mP2-e-espMCEjNHDPPV&fid=0x0:0x4c13000de7104ed4"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Andrena Koch-Schulte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVELDNYR0HaRqqWJ7easUnxTlESOoCrQvhptP7NYFaeZyFJhOKG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic all around   A menu full of choice and staff was charming…  I walked in carrying travel luggage   The young fellow at the front entry offered to carry it.   (I said yes of course)  I’m 50 plus years old, so I don’t think he was flirting… or was he?   They got off to a great start and only progressed from there.   Will definitely be back.   Had a great Cobb salad    I found the pricing was fair.   Great server also!   Attentive!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPy1fAWFDe3PLF8kpuBz6fN-iurCtED1xQyYqNv&fid=0x0:0x4c13000de7104ed4"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Fionn Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6QM4xX4rnjDy7uQ9_UX1ud-FeXhAIPbUGuv1ks1vTREnqqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here for happy hour and it did not disappoint. They had a double Caesar for $9 and it came with celery, bean, olives, shrimp and bacon, but I got 2 shrimps, I assume they ran out of bacon. The food was delicious as well. Definitely would go again. Service was excellent!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-BuZef02TGxc7xml4dX-RpCm0MnEms1BvY-7r&fid=0x0:0x4c13000de7104ed4"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Nayara Ferreira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW62vboM0fy5NVkcmbVoWLfS4l7sIJerjlDofuPwsVg4_ETyLyW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Superb! From the appetizers to the dessert, everything was perfect. The brisket we ordered as an appetizer was melt-in-your-mouth tender, the wine selection (a 9oz Cab Sav for $11—such a great deal!) was excellent, and the main courses were equally fantastic. The mac and cheese was delicious, and the crème brûlée was the perfect finishing touch. It’s already our favorite restaurant! I couldn’t recommend it enough.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxzADpmhGIgXzIz3dbnsmQnH0sETw5tahwbhCl&fid=0x0:0x4c13000de7104ed4"],"When":"2024-12-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"J Q","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWLFaR2htiLNLIQAXB2-FbuNystyoB794RiAm0Uo82lJgg8OdK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food, great customer service, and great atmosphere.
I feel like they have a bigger portion of food than other places nearby.
Their Benny was served with perfect poached eggs, which were so good.
Personally recommend the omelet dishes, the Philly steak omelet was moist and well balanced with veges and meat.
Definitely would go try more dishes in the future!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2L_GYTYldatrcLfabIGpnzGX3xX5WeBpaW3nx&fid=0x0:0x2cc5bd5f08f128ab"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Lawrence Lacandula","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfi3e35cU96zJJGkk7nxa2yLrVqrq6MqycUwswRzdSuhVKf7xD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food in a somehow industrial area. Service is efficient and friendly. We will definitely be a regular here.
7months after and yes we are still a fan of their food. The Smoked Salmon Egg Benedict is so divine- flavours are delicious and so balance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOn3edCDhOV2i_6dEly05EAK4Cdb9-sBpdwFbT_&fid=0x0:0x2cc5bd5f08f128ab"],"When":"2024-4-2"},{"Name":"B P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLx5LXiqNb9rmzqycwSvm0oGejfC5s7Si61_ns6_WoImlJIm18e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is so yummy! Their omelettes are so fluffy! The staff is super friendly too. Can’t wait to go back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqnIqnzywyhIzXbAunrn0JiV2gfi4nI4yR9uJI&fid=0x0:0x2cc5bd5f08f128ab"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Shauna Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURWeI9v2UNbZk0uTwXmzSH--OukymD85DXZiaUVON0cQ9rJpBA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love it here. I just recommend car pooling because parking lot is small. The food and service is amazing, this is my Favorite place ever for breakfast!! Amazing Pancakes and Real whipped cream!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUaXFhXxkcAARbNPPh62GU0T3Pranwu3t1wqjV&fid=0x0:0x2cc5bd5f08f128ab"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Barry ---","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7w9lOZdpI_JJrG7tsj_BF4aqaUmXHv1GXs1hLY3N061lodfJa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here.

Great little restaurant!  Really good food and good prices for what you get.

Got an omelette and the pancake combo. Both were really good and the omelette was absolutely loaded with ingredients.

Parking is a bit dicey depending on how busy the lot is.

Will definitely be back.

Would recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjkte0mKnlYaBEIlDTxMYGIBMOEkfiSxBWg0gw&fid=0x0:0x2cc5bd5f08f128ab"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"Kiky Kiks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgIvVxxSYrbvp4RuGlQoIF1h8IVgflOoKH0hZNsG2lqQIRbhkfUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good restaurant, it's on the smaller side, but if u r lucky - it might be a slower day, u ll get seated right away; if it's busy it's usually about 30 mins wait. The staff is friendly, the food comes out pretty fast, the portions are big - you get 3 eggs for your Eggs Benedict 😳👍and the price is decent. Don't expect anything fancy, it's basic and clean, with good food and friendly staff. Great brunch place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOD-ETaA0jAQ9G6tu_jAbYc260R89wSntDgEap7&fid=0x0:0x2cc5bd5f08f128ab"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Andrew Gaudet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOLu4aR_S7XPHh8hmADlyGir6MF_Mw1r8lRlZMEB-vCJ_0iw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came to buy soup for my crew, and the price was fair. $5 for a small soup. I believe it was clam chowder. UNREAL. Very tasty, the dill complements the soup nicely. I came back with my brother shortly after to get a large soup and try the BLT. Very very good!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kyle Lamb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxMV720K156UlWiPoX74pPRNfTqO_xMWxyKMj7B2cW7Z_FSg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"THE BEST THERE IS!!! It’s quite far to drive to Northern Cafe from Langley and the lines there are terrible - that being said who cares! Roadrunner is amazing! The staff are so lovely and the food is the delicious. I highly recommend this place for breakfast.
The shredded hashbrowns are INSANE","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOizl0qdoLCXbbzsvGysws_vsQoZ43KNd1qxPqy&fid=0x0:0x2cc5bd5f08f128ab"],"When":"2023-11-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Priscilla Lopez-De Leon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeAN6kUMCG1Ms1k3qvSXnf5fQPaJ3e7N5XotyQBC2Gxq2Pw4_XmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their food is very homey. I’m not Korean but I feel like I’m eating a home cooked meal by a loved one.

The place is clean and well maintained too. I lobe their katsu chicken, their rice is excellent. All that we ate was delicious.

Finding something that does not cost so much but the quality is amazing is a gem nowadays.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8nHhU8yi8edpCE-uyPxA57d4OPwvvXPPFAZDi&fid=0x0:0x9356f4839ccc6594"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Rubayed Nehal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpNBYlhjBFu9HX4rVFcnPIyepZ-39jj2U3wmjzdVrsNRGsA0g23w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice and cozy place. This is one of the best buffet I have tried in greater Vancouver area comparing the price and quality. This is a family owned business. Both of them are very kind and helpful. I don't know why there are some negative reviews on Google. Comparing to the price with quality they are the best","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOc18y3AaHNmHzNLKBMm2zR1for6wF_gzpBEnDN&fid=0x0:0x9356f4839ccc6594"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Leslie Ngo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWy4prG9zC06GQVwfW5XW99I_e-35MyO4tIy1Trq9RLD0fbMwOv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a basic and affordable Asian buffet. We went here on Weekends for lunch, so this is reviewed for that timeframe. The lady server is very polite and welcoming. Apparently, she is the only one welcoming people while setting up and cleaning tables, making transactions and assisting customers. There is one male chef who prepare the meals. The food, to our standard, is good. We enjoyed the various dishes available, and the food are generally made well. The cleanliness of the place is clean. The overall atmosphere is peaceful and there is calming music playing in the background. The interior décor and bathroom is, well, basic. The price is reasonable for what is provided. Be warned that if you waste food, they will charge you $10 extra, so take only one scoop or piece if this is your first time trying. I notice many say this place isn't good. We all have our expectations of how something should be, and with a buffet like this, don't expect anything big like Cascades' buffet. There are other buffets in the region to try if this isn't for you. I recommend this place if you want an affordable, accessible and quiet Asian buffet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPL7WTLyeKIil1NRqoSM5W-2hoiYrpfIikiafQq&fid=0x0:0x9356f4839ccc6594"],"When":"2023-5-22"},{"Name":"Owen Hsieh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjOZEKm4Dm4FMZQW7jb56czEZ-9yVZKfU1C-Z1WoAkeVCrIBKnTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"No good service  the owner attitude not well

When I ate almost finished and waitress said 90 minutes limited ! !

What ? ! Are you serious?

You should told me at the beginning not end of my meal almost done it’s not reasonable and why only said to me not said to others customers?

Food tastes too strong and food was so so ! !

Terrible experience in this restaurant 😮‍💨","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMG4VgK3gvgYIxDjZ1YAgYrfps9LkEoeUoYes-z&fid=0x0:0x9356f4839ccc6594"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"David Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVius2vKggf3Zi4PNzAK1fmoDVsEJzmcNSqPnFdpzq52xizMnLjlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I recently visited this all-you-can-eat Korean-style buffet and found the experience just okay. The food was too oily for my taste, with too many fried options. Even the non-fried dishes were oily.

I arrived at 1 PM, and the trays were not empty, which was a plus. The bulgogi was decent, but overall, the quality wasn’t great. Kids below 8 get a half-price discount, which is nice for families.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsACdzhn-9rS00CwqSigwJFYA4lLcSqmWcv29M&fid=0x0:0x9356f4839ccc6594"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"Kerry Owens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDuKwrRJvlDUaoluTk70MNVCvf7WS3XagJ3TxbLO_nBQ7tMnCD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pleasantly surprised! We were a little worried when we arrived ay 630pm and nobody was there. We were graciously welcomed and made to feel at home. Food was fresh and very tasty. Highly recommend coming. Value is super!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"D. Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwN0XFE0840Kf_k12bWeM50WUzwUqBVLNBvWuQOCEQeLt_u37X=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food was okay for the lunch buffet price ($12.99 - March 2024) but not too much seasoning to my taste. Fried chicken was over fried, meatballs are bland, tteokbokki (rice cake) had just the sauce on it, not much flavour. The selection isn't the greatest and the refill of the one or two meat items were few in between so you often end up waiting for a while before they refill but given the price point, it's okay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXIdxm1hXPO-qC78s0ayBdN7RnctNSo4uWhcBc&fid=0x0:0x9356f4839ccc6594"],"When":"2024-3-19"},{"Name":"Yui Chit Jiff Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-uUyC4o_20rrkv3nCKHjaAwDrVoN7ihm8gdC7o5yMrUXzfOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The service was great but the food was okay at best. The fried food are too oily and not too crispy at all. The somewhat tolerable food were the tempura and the coleslaw. The soup was delicious but lacks choices. Also, eating lunch here is way cheaper and only misses the dessert. Overall, I think this is a good spot to try as an experience, but not as your daily spot for eating.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Scott Kerr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXt6DQb0_mfxPgudV6ZRq4wI7VtstDgc7Qb_uCCLV1ODQpq4Ky2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The experience had at Omni, where we had the pleasure of being assisted by Luke, was nothing short of excellent. His service was top-notch. Very attentive and gave us a good bit of knowledge on how certain things came to be on the menu.

The food was amazing. Super glad we began with the starter chicken bites as the house sauce was delicious. Moving onto the main courses, the cajun honey glaze mac & cheese with beef was incredibly filling and had the perfect amount of spice in it to give it a bit more flavor. Very heavy, but so tasty.
The chicken Parmesan was also cooked very well. Not my meal, but I had bites and I definitely would order it myself.

I think that Luke and company have something really special here and I am very eager to come on back and try something else.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGb8n7ae8J1saMml4QcGYMtnrVwlujcowe2Gw0&fid=0x0:0xb69e31edfea8c6f5"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"mikayla schneider","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK9ytTAwuelhxrLWhPzheXBmt7RewcKxL5Xs2Lokw9VuE5vgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Paige was incredible today!My girlfriend and myself have had some questionable dining experiences lately, and Omni was a refreshing new place for us. We had some fun with both the food menu ( very accommodating to my girlfriend’s allergy ), and ventured for a “Dealers Choice” cocktail in which our server made us the perfect drink based on what I’d already been sipping on. I would recommend this place to friends and family alike. Food and drinks both get a “wow” from us both. We can’t wait to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEl42tXtLlQFSVIPV-QzY8r_lE5jMCCu0c2dMI&fid=0x0:0xb69e31edfea8c6f5"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Nicole Bradford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2llpjC_3F5XtBLolWo4KUGvZmOsJHVACThhG2UwCY1oH0dc4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I came with our toddler for lunch on a Sunday. We both got the spicy chicken burgers with Cajun honey fries and our little one had the chicken bites. Luke (owner) served us and made us feel very welcomed. It was steady busy wise. The food was delicious! We will definitely come back again, as both my toddler and I have dairy allergies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmVSImg6OJcQBArDgDedxtcZmECygb_l0kkEcA&fid=0x0:0xb69e31edfea8c6f5"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Ginzo Milani (Monckey100)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZJAMXcJZ4Q-fVQ1hK4TmeQ5-UBO877OkkYfk78A4TFUsqJzc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Four cheese pizza is a thin crust pizza, shareable with two, the crust was baked to a slight crisp which enhanced the overall palatability of the mix of the acidity of the tomato. There's bocconcini which has a goat cheese like flavor with mozzarella notes which added to the overall experience. The garlic oil added to the overall taste and wasn't overly oiled. The chef did a fantastic job balancing these elements together.

The spicy chicken burger had small notes of spice which accentuates the chicken. The burger has a great balance of vegetables and was well seasoned.

The Omni burger was the highlight, the bacon was well cooked without being oily. The smash burger was correctly smashed and was well seasoned. The patty was very fresh as was the bun.

The truffle fries were spot on and amazing, the poutine was well made but the bowl style plate made the poutine suffer. If the poutine had a wider bowl, the top cheese curds would have been able to melt better. But the curds that did melt was really good.

The peach Bellini was sweet but might have been a bit too muddy for my liking, but if you prefer a more alcoholic experience, this is perfect.

Their signature drinks like the electric blue was amazing and definitely worth returning to have again.

Overall the food is really well made especially with the price point, it's clear that this establishment has put extra care in delivering quality food.

Some bonuses to note was that there is dairy free, and gluten free options, including plant based patties and plant based options for pizza too.

Final notes: A quality place, one of the only places you can get a good smash burger. I would consider this place more of a restaurant than a bar, I would consider the food too good to be considered bar food. Additionally, I believe they should advertise and highlight their smash burger as not many establishments provide smash burgers. The chicken burger is excellent and my co-reviewer even preferred it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHJ7aeBqWUqh1JaZh2Y8LzcZsqmL9Qq038Phss&fid=0x0:0xb69e31edfea8c6f5"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Ursula Galvão","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnsRxiZN0DybNpuvqmxWQWm-edIin_sVOWzR85r44e8kPLlSM5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredible food and service. I’m vegan and was so happy that I could order anything on the menu and there would be a plant based version of it.
Definitely one of my favorite eating spots in Fort Langley! Will for sure be back and try more from their incredible menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUkcHlS_WHMsHyI2Y0W4wsBgtB5IY6JhYso3zs&fid=0x0:0xb69e31edfea8c6f5"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Harvir Mann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlu8YaUsOyyrDrUMW2qzgyGGIvYS8bw1884dkSJK16AUKvDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried Omni Kitchen recently on a whim as we were close by and saw it had good reviews. I can say it definitely lives up to them! Menu is small but effective as it has all the comfort food staples - we had the spicy chicken sandwich and mac and cheese both were really good. The hot honey fries are a must try, we also got a salted caramel brownie dessert which was also great. Restaurant interior is small but modern and welcoming,  service is great - The owner Luke was very friendly and came over to introduce himself and chat and gave recommendations for some dishes. As someone who is also self-employed I really appreciated that as it shows he truly cares about his business and reading other reviews I can see others appreciate it as well. Nice to see a place like this in Fort Langley, and hope it continues to do well. We will be back to try that pizza!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuIJgUp-uOxH5OO-50OsBZELb1Twh4UtpfFQfI&fid=0x0:0xb69e31edfea8c6f5"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Quinn DeGregorio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWB20063ffVAZslOX6k8eokxKEwWHQ9Ar7q53qmdnQP1JIVSn-9jw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent pizza and service. The owner is very kind, professional and attentive. They take great care of you and very accommodating for any allergies or food preferences. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2N-px2Kam1YZXV3YA-wPMUf-y2EA7Z7DeSn-K&fid=0x0:0xb69e31edfea8c6f5"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Parbh Klar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVX6pSTgVnAnKtW-yNe01BuPBUDSt_PHb5p5I2ROLPfXIm_MuEH_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"As per reviews, taste is way basic! Mexican bowl and margarita pizza were little good but very disappointed with Benny!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN21Bg-MySTignJGQeqdJHlGVBd8qn-Q_e7zadK&fid=0x0:0xb69e31edfea8c6f5"],"When":"2024-11-27"}]

title: Friends Indian Restaurant
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true},{"name":"Healthy options","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true},{"name":"Vegan options","enabled":true},{"name":"Vegetarian options","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sarwar Alam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdLN8fos8BYd8ys9UvqY2yvLT8sMxEbBPZcHsHAMB94WL2Wf1ywQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their food are very good! I specially enjoyed the "egg bonda" as shown in the picture (we can compare it to egg-chop in Bangladesh!). Plus it's a pleasant surprise that all their food are also halal! Finally, the Hyderabadi chai was really heavenly!! Hope to be a regular here from now 😇","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh0dWu-cpNvoZOmJj8uSAAG31cXQKi4vjRLDKs&fid=0x0:0x97c7d84b6caacd36"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Swapnil Kambli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdhhWN0KCMgQl8JxSlRxuwT7oQItuYRCMRTco9Mv-DKvRQLHe2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"- personally, I found the biryanis very mediocre.

- Kodi Kura gravy was watered down to the extent where it barely brought out any flavour, and just felt like it was too saucy.
- chicken seemed to have been boiled and put in sauces, so the overall culinary expertise was way off.
- we paid extra to get the biryani gravy, and found it to be very watery consistency. Same with the raita  (usually such tactics are deployed at establishments that are optimizing food cost/ profitability at the cost of quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxWk6aMlSQw3ttc_dwgFxM1NQ2yK0PSWN0Qqpu&fid=0x0:0x97c7d84b6caacd36"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Nitesh Reddy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCDak6iDPAO5NknQbSbO-mmxu1E4cZKGdQYyI-Lk7sGueM41c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"From the moment I stepped into “Friends,” I was greeted by the warm and inviting ambiance that promised an unforgettable dining experience. The restaurant’s dedication to authenticity is evident in every dish, making it a true gem for Indian cuisine enthusiasts.
The menu offers a delightful array of flavors, each dish crafted with a blend of traditional spices that transport you straight to the heart of India. The Butter Chicken is a must-try, with its rich, creamy sauce perfectly complementing the tenderly cooked chicken. The Lamb Rogan Josh is another standout, offering a robust flavor that is both comforting and exotic.
The service at “Friends” is impeccable. The staff are not only attentive but also knowledgeable, providing recommendations that enhance the dining experience. Their passion for the cuisine and the culture it represents is contagious.
To top it off, the restaurant maintains an immaculate environment, ensuring a pleasant and hygienic atmosphere that aligns with the high quality of their food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJ3fW1xjCVOOst_uriypigvuvqwkvK8u6hDj_L&fid=0x0:0x97c7d84b6caacd36"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Mehmud Iqbal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzdKzd7CEtSWik7PUDkAL2bm7hm1Q3Nn4JMf0vY7aaPod9GjZfWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quite a unique biriyani recipe with tasty sides gravies. Fun fact - the number 65 in the name of the recipe came in as it was invented in the year 1965! The service is top notch and I appreciate the sincerity of the server. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDLOsAgraBeRDbFxGGUzm2jLVsbtWPNYMVFx4K&fid=0x0:0x97c7d84b6caacd36"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Akhil Raj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkeUREjk88_RFA3h3TzuP5Xdg-hAzENDtD4-abKjwoB6cAG573TA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the ambience. I went with my family. We had Hyderabad biriyani after so long and it was worth coming here. Delicious and Reasonable!!
The restaurant staff is friendly and they also customized lime juice for my son.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMacWafclTuFf2mVFanOIU8QQob4vxEky5iqzzJ&fid=0x0:0x97c7d84b6caacd36"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Clara Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLu5QyaJnjZZNpUDZRriEXp4ntqPQ7lkWGjk-JYwvl9SHS0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic South Indian cuisine in Langley at a very reasonable price point! The fish pakora is a MUST try, and it comes with a lovely mint chutney sauce. I love that spice levels can be adjusted (our table went with mild!) and they really do cater to all flavour profiles.

We tried the fish pakora, chicken lollipops, chicken curry, and goat biryani. Portions were great for sharing and service was awesome as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO49i9blnhTPN0XJ6mUiCVVUWmYd0bq69Rr0VA&fid=0x0:0x97c7d84b6caacd36"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Howard Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWgoU1Vg6B6QN9_7lEa3Sz3zzeO_TPqKlZfue8fuwvDYyYug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"By far, the best Indian dish under $20 I ever had.
I gave this place a chance because of its 5 star rating on G maps while having a lot of reviews, which made me a bit suspicious, seeing that it's not that busy. Let me state up front that this place definitely earns a 5/5 on G maps: stands out amongst the crowd of Indian restaurants around just because of one dish.

But before I get to that, let me get the not so great out of the way. The appetizer I had (I think it was the lollipops but I'm not sure — pic attached) was a solid 6.5/10. Spicy, sweet, salty, savory, but not much else going on in terms of flavor. It was somewhat tender though.

Thali was a 7/10. Lentil curry was good but not great. The chicken curry makes up for it though.

Their magnum opus and what keeps me coming back is their Biryani as many of their G maps reviews mention. NINE POINT FIVE out of 10 with sauce even after coming here multiple times but 6.5/10 without sauce. Seriously, use a generous portion of the white sauce; it's included and refills are free.

I would say that Indian spice profiles are high risk, high reward. If you mess up, the food will taste disgusting even to the most unpicky eaters (I'm one of those). But if you nail it, the dish will take you to flavor town and back; and back to flavor town and back. And this restaurant nails it with their Biryani.

In addition, their rice is always perfectly cooked: fluffy and soft, yet the grains are individually separated and not falling apart. It's just a bit dry, but that makes it perfect when paired with curry or sauce (as you should) as it won't get mushy as easily.

The atmosphere is adequate: clean, and there's signs of effort placed into aesthetics. It's definitely not fine dining.

Serving size: huge. Expect to be full after only an entree. They can definitely serve 1.5-2 people.

Summary: definitely come here for Biryani if you want some Indian food without destroying your wallet with those Michelin recommended restaurants.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwps4_fdX4YjQlgVqT04e8Of9DFXlLJMVfYrE&fid=0x0:0x97c7d84b6caacd36"],"When":"2024-3-3"},{"Name":"vishnu viswanathan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkkvVnC4XYZ0OswhnAV1UJR62w5i_u7SRPGRlZgiLQTTivcWcp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered chicken 65 biriyani for a group.
Absolutely loved the Chicken 65 Biryani! The flavors were perfectly balanced, with tender chicken pieces and fragrant rice. It had just the right amount of spice, making each bite a delight. It's definitely a must-try for biryani lovers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEEYyCeofE5erfsd9EH64fRONY0MUzJphSWraB&fid=0x0:0x97c7d84b6caacd36"],"When":"2024-5-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Golnaz J N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwh094AvMjRiNSQoo9HjnFTPUMh8c3XSGOFZ78okUlI4KLdqnN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The café had an inviting atmosphere, and the staff were absolutely amazing—friendly, attentive, and eager to make the experience enjoyable. However, the food left something to be desired. I ordered the chocolate cake and the cheese scone, but unfortunately, both were stale. While the texture was disappointing, the richness of the chocolate flavor was actually very good, which salvaged the dessert a bit. I also ordered a latte that was okay. Overall, I had a mixed experience—great service, but the quality of the sweets could use improvement. Would still return for the ambiance and hospitality!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3kXu4yONvJUHT_HCLoS7VDmDWPtRXNdKdqYg9&fid=0x0:0x2ef72d1dd313a292"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Jordan Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW11-xeEA0Ih57ocfphXt0C50QwI614ll6t2qknklEqHoDt3aVy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice cafe and bookstore with some good good options for brunch, though very limited table space to sit and eat. The short rib mac and cheese on special was pretty good, and what I believe was the Thai coconut curry soup was decent. A simple solid option for food in the area, with a neat bookstore area to browse as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHzOquZzu58zMEjh7qGHK4OuZlVQ8Rv_phoMIs&fid=0x0:0x2ef72d1dd313a292"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Gerry A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVtoo7d9k-jl8g8Olh4q9lMKjWQOCXf8VHpTk3fUjsRUEkuuL-pA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here for lunch and were able to get a nice table outside.   Pro-tip: you can find your seat outside scan the barcode order at your table and they will bring it out to you!     This will save you having to wait in line and avoid the temptation of all the beautiful and delicious cakes and pies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTvvzWohNQ3sDC30O0zigGZOh34eoWV-W0gGYc&fid=0x0:0x2ef72d1dd313a292"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Dani D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOGG8I4GIq7TGLsN0IQW0rGa_W6AS9VgHWmtPmBvQMWKi_VP1s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute place for breakfast and brunch, easy to grab a sandwich and a coffee on the way to school and work. Sitting down is another story because my table was very close to the cash register so people were constantly behind me. The Avocado Benny barely had avocado.. but the oatmeal was good. Also, two people in my party got their meal just under 10 minutes before me and another person got our oatmeal.. so maybe ask for all the food to come out together?

Enjoyed the experience and the food regardless.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5B8rWeb9rwImPxzxqmyuac3FHC3nnkPEUjbdo&fid=0x0:0x2ef72d1dd313a292"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Luna Yoon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrSWH180GU0prt7Q02XLGOunXawSpGLg-4tuh-HUvyxrXPOjZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sooo good, I didn't expect that much but it was really good. Even in the morning time and week day, still many line up for taking order. I couldn't ordered that chicken wrap because it's not lunch time yet.
I would like to try next time.
I ate there and take out for my bf.
Becasue I really want him try this place food.
I will come back 100%","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9dmerpiNWfrQqKDTIBaqaPF03ijKRAgkk69d0&fid=0x0:0x2ef72d1dd313a292"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went to Wendel’s Bookstore & Cafe hoping to grab some lunch, but the line was almost out of the door and it was way too busy on a Saturday. We came back later in the afternoon to grab some coffee and dessert and it was still busy so we gave up. We did check out the small bookstore section though, which was nicely organized. But it did feel a bit clusterphobic with the queue and diners eating near the entrance and we didn’t stay long.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2PVKaWHyB4cVKJpKb_SfIBWkvEBiCqU_aBJhs&fid=0x0:0x2ef72d1dd313a292"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"MiCap19 nerd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWR0O1WpksEG8SnIbTdyAuIebW4CtfJmRwbqcUOCwM6bvDmtNnu8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great desserts, drinks, and atmosphere. I especially love the connecting Bookstore.  It's always fun. It can get cold in the fall sitting anywhere near the doors, but still a nice place","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzt7cvXTD1TwTnQlSnI-Yly1MjhBRkPnS1GaNe&fid=0x0:0x2ef72d1dd313a292"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Gal Dekel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUudcL3hPs5CYLhr5LqDYmFQ7ZypfmQbMrznr4CLXwJsCGp4EfL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute place and friendly atmosphere. Ate breakfast here with my family and it was good! Avocado benny was very disappointing… there was maybe a smidge of avocado on that. The mushroom and spinach hash was great! Gave us 2 meals out of 4 and then another 2 meals so service was a bit iffy and it wasn’t the most busy timing, but overall nice people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuE223PcDX3AJPr_1x3NIHe82h3O6wWSjkR3H1&fid=0x0:0x2ef72d1dd313a292"],"When":"2024-7-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cassandra Torok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGJoCec7fBtFvCfBVUrJLXpwxFlcfft5nkmxHkZpZbOKNckx4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We absolutely love the tacos here!! Has become a regular stop for us when we are in Langley. My husband is from San Diego and grew up eating Mexican food. He’s definitely found his little piece of home. He says the Jamaica is the best he’s ever had. All the tacos taste so fresh and flavourful, both the meat and veggie options.
The staff are always friendly and the restaurant is very clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDh2kglMUFgMVGv4xkjdN_ZdneT27sX9eIOpqu&fid=0x0:0xb812d1c24d7aba47"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Ben Jamin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBIrMGp3ssnTdFXw942j2bs17qo6QnaMCC5En6PFKO8oF8KavW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tasty tacos and friendly staff. For first-timers, I recommend ordering sides with your tacos—it really enhances the experience. I only wish they served Al Pastor during the weekdays as well. Overall, a solid choice for tacos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8TnPmJz4-okGDE5eif-4x7SZmIInC47jFdwpF&fid=0x0:0xb812d1c24d7aba47"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Anurag Bains","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDVAiQjIqkVl9gS2UN9CAcU6qscY_EFRmFX2LfHlTQjO68277m6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredibly delicious and authentic tacos. Definitely recommended 💯","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMT3vdex23FwI3d4ioFWTV5mVY42pTX-CnNKxSE&fid=0x0:0xb812d1c24d7aba47"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Anshul Bhandari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9zXUcEYBL1-7oQ2JLSl6rdYd3Es7REsppaZZGoZlNWMoKVZKSOw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped by for a quick bite after workout. The flavors and ambience took me back to the streets of Mexico (Mentally!).

The lady at the counter was super friendly, was prompt to suggest vegan options, and also gave recommendations. I'm glad I stuck with those.

I'll be a regular going forward.

The only critique - They don't have a water station or offer water in a glass to their customers. I avoid pop, so it sucks that I have to buy one to quench my thirst while dining in.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiqF_IBvl9FBdUB1friyYR8w_s8BYBY9Ms1bPq&fid=0x0:0xb812d1c24d7aba47"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"Mika","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpz-LbOV3-7TFDacJGAFh4bHBEPCFpmAXqvtIJiqnM9wSmVzJ-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great taco place in Langley!

OK, I'll be honest. I'll say I had better tacos before but this place is clean, folks are nice. I think they could add more cilantro & limes on their sides because they didn't seem enough but tacos (we tried beef, pork, fish) were all nice

Their guacamole was a bit different from my expectation as it came out well-blended sauce like  (perhaps their guacamole is authentic version in their hometown?) We prefer their amazing meat based (port & beef) tacos over fish ones and will continue to try rest of them.

Plenty of sittings, clean restaurant, interesting music (haha)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJ8XxlE_kPfzYcvyRiVz6fCFG53MNMsbsx5Nri&fid=0x0:0xb812d1c24d7aba47"],"When":"2023-11-27"},{"Name":"Wesley Quadros","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLINb6T4aH2oH2pFtLjTPKAIzy260CAbUE0O9DZEzKKzy9kg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Small portions, these are 4" tacos instead of the more normal 6".  The flavors were bland.  The service was quick and friendly.

The guacamole is store bought cream.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqcOjqLNqAVMLJ5SZU9j1SotH8t0fKfhCDObMz&fid=0x0:0xb812d1c24d7aba47"],"When":"2024-4-6"},{"Name":"Miss Mayhem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGowE1po-uzevgz4y-llWcltZGBd0Jj1Qx_2rqJzm0bNHjXwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The tacos here are amazing! We went at a busy time of day, the front area was a little congested but well worth the wait for the food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbTZggWxTBRWPU6QVcK_4sgaaExTeoPro8En0Q&fid=0x0:0xb812d1c24d7aba47"],"When":"2024-4-9"},{"Name":"Suhas Vinchurkar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU67shuljcZ-cOz4YBpwYk720sJSjpQHLDKBd1ZYZBUsyf0teNKyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice little place to try the tacos. Tacos were nice and just the right size that I like. Taste was good, good service, great prices. Would definitely recommend if you were looking for a Taco place …","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN18RrOpi10bfwVfqPOThict539lh3EU9Pe6XA8&fid=0x0:0xb812d1c24d7aba47"],"When":"2023-4-7"}]

title: Townhall Langley

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Abbiee L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQah8oDFlL_LzeWtJxyJt5YWvZIt1zTGTVUa4-ubawFbvjjoEU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We made reservations last Saturday at noon to celebrate my niece's 10th birthday. Unfortunately it was anything but a celebration.

We were told the restaurant was heavily understaffed. However when we arrived the area was quite empty. There were 6 people in our party and we ordered drinks and a couple of platters to start. We were not offered water or given any cutlery. We asked for plates twice as we were sharing and were told they didn't have enough plates, so were washing the used ones.  We never got the plates, and as seen, we resorted to using napkins as plates. No one checked up on us during the visit, and once we gave feedback on our poor experience, our server became very hostile. We had the supervisor come over who was very responsive and said that he would bring this up with the manager who is in later that evening and would be contacting me. We never heard back from them. Also, we were overcharged on our drinks. Safe to say that we will never be returning to this establishment nor recommending to our friends and family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5-0AnnBmbjwDoheeg4U90W9FmZ7A4OLgQLI41&fid=0x0:0x3db86c98b54ebcd5"],"When":"2023-8-22"},{"Name":"Steve","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVzye2bejZi9is8vCHJK2PG4wfBMpqZvIa7DUB9fY1EmXEow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food is good and the weekend brunch is the best deal in town. That said, the service is laughably bad. I've been several times now thinking "oh maybe that was a bad day for them" but no, their service is genuinely just awful. Expect to wait 15+ minutes just for them to take your initial drink order and give you a menu. And half the time you'll need to go to the bar and collect your drink yourself because it's been sitting there for 10 minutes with no one bringing it over.
Prices are good, food is good, the atmosphere is fine, but the service is so downright embarrassing that I think I've given up on giving them another chance.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emmy Lou MiKoula","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8UCkcFL0A9py0FpngKTmCyQA-1m6TEhMMNrMDJ5dfK8KPNw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We ordered from skip and didn't go in. Didn't find the food anything to write home about. The caesar salad had so much lemon juice squeezed on it, that is all that you tasted. The burger was pretty small and quite tasteless. And the chicken strips and fries were really small. My 7 year old niece actually ate them all, which normally she wouldn't be able to finish an adult meal. Most disappointing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Newwstgrl82","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJm6h7s4OVvX1EAtozk4hqnD851AD1pW6JN0M33WtPJHM3ULQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent weekend family brunch spot. The quality of the food was pretty decent. Service was inconsistent. We waited 10 minutes for someone to acknowledge us/seat us despite a mostly empty section, and watched others have the same issue, with 1 server but not the other. Will go back but fully expect to wait.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"saran samy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocId3tLOAv75Dn1v7FhYDfK0ZjoMAHpnlb_HoxyOl4wRaK0o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Dined in here by Feb 2022 for a dinner when the Covid relaxations were relaxed a bit.

Very spacious with a bar and the seats were nicely spaced.

Raylene , our waitress did a wonderful hospitality from beer selection to attending us regularly.

For some reasons, we did not like Spicy Ramen bowl that we ordered and they offered to replace it with another dish. Excellent customer service.

Ample parking but it’s hard to get parking when crowded.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkBLX-CdmtsNJRNskJ6q7tWBfqWyE2SQcUnUI&fid=0x0:0x3db86c98b54ebcd5"],"When":"2022-2-19"},{"Name":"Phuong Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhl-qI4b5XW1hOGSCXgriuHTcfEtZ7r_f5L2tvHJefwqiz-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We come on a Monday night when appies were half off. I counted three other customers there. They were training a new server and it was hard to hear her over the music; which wasn’t too loud.
It took a while for our food to come but it was good. We had the beehive pizza which is basically honey on pepperoni. We ordered it for the novelty of it and it was good but nothing special. The wings were perfectly cooked; crisp and juicy. There wasn’t enough sauce in my opinion but I enjoyed dipping it in the crispy Brussels sprout sauce. It was the BEST part of the meal and I’m obsessed with it. I’ll come back for that alone.
We also ordered the truffle tator tots and it was also really enjoyable.
We also had the caeser and Lucky lager. Both really good. An overall delicious experience","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kami A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfyBLZ-EdU9UP46CqzC54eCVK_QlTJ9qkraPPbrTn9w1HK0iY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Went here with my family the past weekend and oh, what a waste of time, money, gas and effort it was! It was supposed to be a special occasion for my niece’s birthday.

The food was below average. We ordered two community plates to share amongst the 6 of us. Aren’t nachos supposed to have cheese?

We were sat for 43 mins before the food came out to us. I asked for plates as soon as the food came out and the server told us “it was in the dishwasher”. Not sure how long their dishwasher loads take, but they might want to consider switching up for a faster one, or buying more plates. We ended up eating on napkins. Not once were we checked on. There was no water served or plates given to us during our entire meal. The table next to us ended up cleaning their own table (pic below) because of the lack of service.

When brought to the attention of the server, she decided to get argumentative about it and make excuses. We asked for the manager, but no manager on-site (convenient). Spoke to a shift supervisor who continued to make excuses (as follows) for the horrible service and provide us with almost expiring coupons. Excuse #1: “you came during our busiest brunch hour” (the picture below shows how empty it was)
Excuse #2: “We always wait for the customer to ask us for water and then bring it to the table”
Excuse #3: “We’re human too” and on he went…

The one and ONLY restaurant I’ve been to where the word “sorry” is as scarce as the people at its busiest hour. If you’re the server or supervisor, you know who you are. I won’t mention your names, for your sake. Hope you’ll learn how to provide better customer service. Never coming back here again and don’t recommend it to anyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM55wBaiGqdUAhWXi7wE_j2eB_GMFtGRwhThHdq&fid=0x0:0x3db86c98b54ebcd5"],"When":"2023-8-22"},{"Name":"Jina Estrada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjz4Dd1aF85Wxta5MB_gJChlVEvd-lxhjIye7x6GqkBOMB08sy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good price. Good value. We sat at the bar and was nice. The bartender who was working on Valentine’s Day and was helping us that morning was seriously amazing. Super friendly. We will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbDku9funNxjredeYtOXg3Sl3mmsSYXpgJAPhr&fid=0x0:0x3db86c98b54ebcd5"],"When":"2021-2-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Danny Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPFpxTFJ3u9SzLCSXea0v-aXlg3umR59y0nfTLYbCzwas4amM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I would give this place zero stars if I could.  Worst meal we’ve had. The chicken was cold, stale, and definitely not fresh. The portions were small and overpriced, and the side of coleslaw was ridiculously tiny. It’s no surprise there were no other customers. I’ll never return or recommend it to anyone..

Owner, please take action to improve the quality of your food instead of just offering generic, unhelpful responses. Customers expect better, and if changes aren’t made, you’ll continue to lose business.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Doug Kasdorf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsCkpeLH63sLQLetj3g11ngy3dL7wlvrbEo92jXjxVPeMskrSP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Usually only order when they have a deal like the Batter's Box This summer was a fantastic deal during the Blue Jays season. Yet to have a bad experience. I suggest ordering on the app. Our first order was a walk-in and the weight was too long for my liking but you can order a head on the app and even specify the time and it's always ready when you get there and hot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"T S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJoiWMySe73NNM6qtYNuA3bcP79qgYNw1vF7gg3l5P375EI0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Atmosphere is Average, as expected at a Fast Food location, nothing bad.
Have ordered from here a few times now, never an issue with Food or Service.
Go to place/location for Fried Chicken orders.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ritesh Kavungal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIT7ub_0gtR4cA1CzMeXYd8O33SAFBrB0oUiEstNQ70ckoC--QyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Wasted $40 for bad tasting food which looked stale even after the long wait. The portions were small and expensive. I would not return for any fried chicken here. Very disappointed with my first Mary Brown experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tyler J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWK0nzUMOj7GHKry-ZCGLN2hHT-_6TubDdjThUfW7o4jHDyhHmq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I will not be returning to this location, the fried chicken was tough and tasted old. The tenders looked like they were cut from random pieces of chicken and the coating was barely existent. Id rate it lower but I've had great chicken from other locations..

I emailed them before posting a review (off nights happen) and was offered a 15% discount on my next visit instead of any refund. I wouldn't have accepted it but the offer would have been nice, I won't be returning here, the overall experience was disappointing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3fR7wNPxCJvyna1TqQKDVCMrlW0yyr_b9585n&fid=0x0:0x2c02a98a5e9b37cd"],"When":"2021-10-30"},{"Name":"Ellaura Dean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2a3DgcX76zCyZhDpyhEE7R790fzy2ui7yLTQXgfgG7oWLQA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Never been to Mary Browns before, it was the best! My son loved the poutine and I loved the Buffalo Mary browns burger and the service was friendly and timely!
Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Vo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVot8ZwaPBXt4APjYLH0mRztluPP5wDP4QONOwCz4AmdYj8ZbLR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been getting the K Crunch Sandwich for my mom from this Mary Brown’s for awhile now since it came out and the food and service have been great. Always super fast and friendly. The $5 sandwiches on Mondays are a great deal as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anthony Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjLBVGvYMuQ_7irAafqyFenF84IHbDebi7uNt8G5dE291E5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good fried chicken and wedge fries.   Clean tables and washroom.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYEnCEtkrLVX0fb2GCRW-Oo0LkIiD3PN_kndwc&fid=0x0:0x2c02a98a5e9b37cd"],"When":"2024-7-7"}]
