user_reviews:
[{"Name":"shelby krenbrink","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRSz_Zlqx8GRPEOgrqaqcJMA5TK4109Wyb_ARg5cP4zLgl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in for a quick breakfast before work with my partner and was greeted with the best customer service I have ever experienced at a restaurant. Our server Ashley went above and beyond. Her energy was so uplifting and the food was great! I look forward to going back and seeing her again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4UNZjKOxRSBN0in2gT5_aGnJSJJUzHILpzc4&fid=0x0:0x7ef47ddb37d968bb"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Parneet Kahlon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqz_l5BzN5_mBY3QC7SEZWEVervEPkE_VocF-ECzkBQsGcdPO6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best breakfast places… Very friendly staff, our server Ashley was very kind and made sure our order was perfect. Felt very welcomed.

The facility is clean and staff is friendly..

The food tasted really good and at all times they made sure our coffee mugs are filled.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBB7m8Gqi3nBKAdFkgN-bb8v7TAAOPwoyXVbWR&fid=0x0:0x7ef47ddb37d968bb"],"When":"2024-3-12"},{"Name":"Mario Villalta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5ZMFC9NS7kSmQkOqaAlMEID3js0wHxnU6mKTorP0Y-9ZMqIUvnw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Cora's Restaurant impressed me the first time I went for breakfast. Since then, the quality has declined dramatically. The coffee is terrible, the sauce for the eggs benedict is far from acceptable. All in all, it is still a place to be able to share with the family in a pleasant place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_oZiXHWY-xFjC_4mipUbfnd9T9JpOjf4beI7d&fid=0x0:0x7ef47ddb37d968bb"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Bubble BENAS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4m4lYcXYD5-vWeSNCEbY3JBPm5RjwzL8p6j1jH5SzhotO286Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We loved the Cora's for breakfast. I truely recommend Cora's fresh and the choices is well done. Loved the service for Maria's who accomodate us and  she is a friendly person,  Be back here again ,","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-quXkoVbYUubzfNo6iJyDdE-irD-fBM4YQOeb&fid=0x0:0x7ef47ddb37d968bb"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Dennis Graham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLC2KM0uD3-o2TDsNfvceuhRF2Thy5gxBBzglcneYM2Vp_THg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food and service here are pretty good. Unlike most places these days, they give you as much coffee as you want to drink. No charge refills. My only hesitation is that there is no sort of small items like toast or a muffin. Only meals. No seniors menu with lighter fair. Would be nice to have those choices.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ginn J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFOOQZPhZylsgMOLmtSB5bJOkt-NwtAZ31Ulkb5_TUEpijBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favorite breakfast places!  I love the food.  The service is always friendly and they keep your coffee full.

I really like the fruit they serve with a lot of the dishes.  The menu is broad enough that everyone is always happy.

The only problem is the hash browns are always cold.  Not sure why. Still a 5 star due to the yumminess of the hollindaise sauce and fruit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsoc-if3smOaVKOYTPtO3A2pfnhPg5aS4mAs-7&fid=0x0:0x7ef47ddb37d968bb"],"When":"2023-11-21"},{"Name":"Sagar Amrelia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwetO8AN8lDxrrPrPJ9sFIBKLjVHU2FVw6Vqk9Fb5cxinxAl4j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent place for breakfast. Their early bird menu is really good and affordable. It was my first time at this Cora and the service was great. Server Ashley was really welcoming and charming person to talk to. Overall, it is a must visit place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Johanna Copeland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwmfsHhMJwEF72G9qRa38x3dEAwbxGzYYYvbdhOeduL_AhOPez=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Worst breakfast in a long time. I couldn’t even eat it. Overcooked omelette pretending to be scrambled eggs and so much unwanted debris on the potatoes. I ate one and it was undercooked and greasy, while having burnt bits all over it. The waitress was very nice and listened to my complaints. She asked if I wanted a replacement and I said no thanks. She brought out replacement eggs and potatoes anyway and they looked just as bad. There was a huge chunk of burnt to a crisp something in the new plate. The bacon had debris on it too. The only good thing was the one (not two) slice of toast I got. If I’m going to pay more than $20 for breakfast I expect it to be decent at least. She comped it for me, which was nice. Even my breakfast partner had burnt grill debris bits in her pancakes.
Please go to the Surrey 10/152 location if you want an actual good plate of Louis the Undecided!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_vw6lZ2qLgmOoIb4UnRHPIJh2a2-gFOmv74Cc&fid=0x0:0x7ef47ddb37d968bb"],"When":"2024-5-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Khatija Govani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIl6CPRCd66LqZ8ix4_ub44ULLqN6rYkvv7aTNL6WxPu-nhKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I just don't Understand how hard it can be to make a salad with no dressing or dressing on the side this is not the first time they've screwed up our order at the store absolutely ridiculous￼

This is now a second Review wow how special this place must feel that they are getting two reviews from me both at separate times!
My partner went to this particular store yesterday to get her salad on her way to work simple easy a salad the person serving her at Freshii were the same gloves to operate the register as the same gloves to open the refrigerator door and the same gloves to do all other task tasks and then make the salad but hang on. There’s the best part to this.
As soon as it was time to eat the salad, guess what it was not fresh fresh at all it was actually really gross and slimy. The cucumber was old and you know when you have old stale cucumber it’s slimy. That’s exactly what the salad was.

Please please please food safe if you’re reading this get over there quickly to the store before they poison. Somebody and Freshii please get it together. If nothing else at least serve fresh produce you charge a lot for your salads. I would expect it to be fresh as in your name Freshii.!!! Too bad there are no options for ZERO STARS!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephen Arnold","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvIsI5gxWYQ7sNmU5D6_9KFtT59zGK8Pmc2Al3lfWiZxM2X1dy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I noticed my first Freshii in Langley, B.C. and had to see what it was about. It had a very small frontage and was difficult to see inside the store. The only clue as to what it was about was a sign which showed a bowl of soup.

I went inside the store and only by looking at a large sign on the wall could I tell what it sold. It was salads, wraps, burritos, soups and drinks. When I asked the young man behind the counter, he said Freshii was a franchise.

I subsequently purchased and very much enjoyed a salad and a wrap. With all the fresh produce and vegetables, I thought it was a very healthy meal and look forward to returning. It was reasonably priced and had a friendly and helpful person behind the counter.

My only other observation is that they must throw out a lot of fresh ingredients at the end of the day, especially when they are in a start-up with what seemed to be few customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_u7-yWDc_2eYdaWi9sedYIrIMpg-ofUMsbZmW&fid=0x0:0x862f279a2df40e8f"],"When":"2018-4-11"},{"Name":"RICHIE WATTERS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9oUKKu2XIt4xqmsQmmESsLxpATEw-c2eS19mkwl2F5PyRd93q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the berry crunch salad with egg","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPN-iAOuE4rBg0lfg16KCbPBzpY1NvtF4plCA_c&fid=0x0:0x862f279a2df40e8f"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Karan deep","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLG1tMaW3G_ZiwulMrWTInTHz3i7m0gv4PLt9i-WpmuupjF_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Freshii Langley is a very healthy place to eat. It has a very spacious sitting lobby with large window panes to enjoy the sunlight. This place has a very peaceful environment to sit, eat and chat.
The menu is vibrant and has seven different types of menu categories ranging from Salads, bowls, burritos, wraps, Soups, Smoothies to Juices. Freshii also has a separate kids menu. It offers a variety of ingredients that are tropical and as well as exotic.

I enjoyed a metaboost wrap that was loaded with spinach, kale, carrots, edamame, mango and almond slivers. I liked the combination of all different textures and flavours.
The other things that amazed me was their meal box and juice cleansing plan . These plans helps in gaining muscles, loosing weight and detoxifying your body.
A visit is must to give your body a healthy fuel.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipND71cxhtduNe7sg9rBTYJrfAwgjkc-C3IjZjWt&fid=0x0:0x862f279a2df40e8f"],"When":"2018-4-15"},{"Name":"April W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnxMIO1H6g9Fo5769E-Za7PHE7pa5eNJSL-V9HTyr3lT-8RnE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasty and healthy fast food option. Variety of flavours and customizable. I had the Buddha satay which was delicious, filling and rich. Staff was very friendly and work fast. We got our food within a few minutes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvSKTLMfb8OEcckDOl7Dxw6FmwpfvQXq35ndVx&fid=0x0:0x862f279a2df40e8f"],"When":"2018-3-31"},{"Name":"Mrs. Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoL6O9oFl2JFJOkNj4FqA9U08vZcTq4P2CCRSSAggaPXyyJeTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I've had this at a different location and it was awesome! I had the taco soup and I was raving about it. I opted to have the same thing at this location, dragging my boyfriend along. Sadly, it was not even close to the same in taste and freshness. I guess these are franchisees and can make small changes to recipes if they want. The avocado was not fresh it looked as if it had been sitting out all day and the taco chips were likly a week old. The chips were so stale I would not have feed them to the birds. The service was slow and the cashier was so soft spoken I had to lean in to hear her. She had a hard time understanding what I was asking and need me to repeat myself multiple times which is slightly frustrating as I was ordering right off a menu with no customization. You can add different proteins to anything which does not already have it for an upcharge and/or add veggies and sauces as well. They offer cold pressed juices, diet soda and energii bites for dessert. The takeout is packaged well I must say. I did take the soup to got and it was packed so well there was no way it would have leaked. Overall, I'd return and try something other than the soup. Pro Tip: Split the soups, for the cost of one it feeds two adults.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOE9tp0OZBxYxMJd8Ncq9iGCFy68rgE3B9mikQN&fid=0x0:0x862f279a2df40e8f"],"When":"2019-4-14"},{"Name":"Austin Jeng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWS3bKhNX3_g9M3yHfepBhtWSLaRXzLilJUhsUhP1XxrisR-SZxcA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious fresh food at a decent price. Proteins cost extra.  Flavours are yum and well put together.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOK4Su3ulTtggijTc0sQt_ECiIzVZUErKgAr2od&fid=0x0:0x862f279a2df40e8f"],"When":"2019-1-5"},{"Name":"Dillon Shantz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUGqv-nS5skqNd72kTJl0ksdNPNL3MRIdARokPUAJG7V6b8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious vegetarian options. Most dishes are vegetarian as a base, with options to add proteins. Bowls, wraps, burritos, smoothies.

I have not tried one thing from this place that I didn't love. Wide variety of flavors to choose from, very health conscious. Also takes less than 15 minutes to make unless they're super busy (which is rare, I think Freshii just started getting noticed)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYOclsBpaRy3IGTQPa1LQxCX3UweXaBHLl5bnU&fid=0x0:0x862f279a2df40e8f"],"When":"2018-8-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rizwan Ahammed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQVmLM5E8mqwZKQpg0yOi38K_fOmq_LhYvSO0LRr1mjd7K3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am very picky about Biriyani . The reason for that probably I come from Thallasserry a small town from Kerala known for its aromatic Biriyani. The Biriyani you get here is the best any place you get in North America and I am sure it will stand out even back home. I ordered half tray each of Beeef and Mutton biriyani, The meat was tender and got  DUMED so well it comes  so nicely. The rice he uses is special biriyani rice called kaima. Trust me one of the best Biriyani place here and one among the best if you compare even back home. The smell when you open the tray is unbelievably aromatic and makes you mouth water.
I don't write much reviews but this one deserves.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMK-_5DTeDJb3SR7OosXQoWynVGFfH_pc00rROM&fid=0x0:0xd4975d1f5fca976c"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Heather Simpson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvInqByCwsHj7QVVeyALvkK3evD1ASUvRTClrlrurzXx-PLmjt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The amazing reviews led us to Abu's Kitchen and it was just as delicious as is shared. Seen here is the lamb biryani with roti. My son had the chicken biryani. We enjoyed our meals and will be back. It is a community kitchen space so expect take out. You will be glad you put this one on the list!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZA1O8DEur6XuJIBlpKu5BL-PDptfXO2OcrVVs&fid=0x0:0xd4975d1f5fca976c"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Sreejith K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwBp1rve9njGLnF4aJWeECWi31mRu8DQ4Sn3626eCTaVNdJgCeuw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you are craving authentic Kerala flavors, especially the iconic Malabar dum biriyani, Abu’s Kitchen is a must-try .  I ordered one Chicken Dum biriyani and one egg biriyani. The biriyani is perfectly cooked, aromatic, and deliciously reminiscent of home. A true treat for anyone missing the rich culinary traditions of Kerala. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsLYg_wlxPRjTqwt6NugNcseEYpFEbm6Eb9YyS&fid=0x0:0xd4975d1f5fca976c"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Aju Mathews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIi9GLIdvi20o3TwkqiAWh86xVNaAGfM3JUGO77WLmBtBA3JWI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently tried the Chicken and Beef biriyani from Abu's Kitchen and it was fantastic! The rice was perfectly cooked—fluffy and fragrant—and the spices were spot on.The chicken and beef was tender and packed with taste, and you could really appreciate the traditional blend of spices in every bite. I highly recommend it to anyone who enjoys biriyani or wants to explore Kerala cuisine.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Simran Fredy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2SxU3jF_gDPiAEJH3SF0sAWjqfPHpstUnejOhqcE_ruAbIGdl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently subscribed to a one-month plan from Abu’s Kitchen, and after using their service, I can say they deliver on their promises! Every delivery was perfectly packaged and arrived in excellent condition. They even sent a message with details about each dish, including numbering, which made it incredibly easy to allocate meals for different days.

The quality of the food was outstanding. While I’m typically more of a non-vegetarian fan, their vegetarian curries were so delicious that I found myself eagerly looking forward to them.

Overall, I had an amazing experience with Abu’s Kitchen. It’s a hassle-free option for anyone in need of a reliable meal service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rajinder Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOckAJ04tRtFKHCC7Wu9_dV_EWsxNpkSsgtDBT66vt_xV1SA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The biryani from Abu's Kitchen is hands down the best I’ve ever had! We ordered Egg Biryani. The flavors were absolutely incredible—each bite packed with rich, authentic spices that make you feel like you’re enjoying a meal back in Kerala. The portion size is generous, and the quality is top-notch.

If I had one tiny suggestion, it’d be to add a bit more raita to complement the dish. But honestly, the biryani itself more than makes up for it. I highly recommend this place and will definitely be ordering again!

TL;DR: Best biryani ever. Don’t hesitate—order it now!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rizwan Rasheed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIP8_0L1bc6N9mFbJFmFUVmPL14_YlATtYSeZJmuXZtGshGmg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently tried their chicken biryani and fry, which was absolutely delicious. It reminded me of the authentic Kerala cuisine I enjoyed back home. I have taken their tiffin service, where they provide delicious, home-cooked meals at very economical rates. It's perfect for busy people who want fresh, healthy food without worrying about cooking.  Highly recommended to anyone looking for convenient, budget-friendly meals.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"fathima chekintakath","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiJ88eSMouTq3FzvnFaOSuiUSb8Ug4fzEp-7patC3oHlxgU5Fi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered whole chicken potion of tandoori chicken yesterday. I Don’t think any chef in the lower mainland can make tandoori chicken, more authentic, and more tastier than this. If any of you haven’t tried this, you’re at loss that’s all I can say. Highly recommended. Looking forward to try other items on the menu as well next time. Keep up the good work.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nathan Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULis9x-C7u8jouJ6bmV-m7Mb2r-esn5uJaOqGwjwAA9z2MADUV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Happy I stumbled upon this place for lunch. The pizza was fresh and tasted great. Not used to the crust but it was thin and crispy. The crust was glazed in some sort of honey. Napkins were needed for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiQi2cDiN3FaijY4Twipx1T6Tl2LuvX343cfZN&fid=0x0:0x9099f5cea5a5fe8b"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Amar M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBQWZODVOR5EgW_ud4WGBoPZzS3E7_T_DuyVRfFsnuGSHVIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Unique pizza place with lots of great options.  Follow on Instagram and try some of there limited time options.  Gluten free crust is pretty great and calzone for $13-$15 is great value.  Not a dine in spot and take out Parking is near impossible lately so recommend delivery if you can.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNacoNCgmhLBJw9AjBNoXoh75msYF2xi6gZv5g&fid=0x0:0x9099f5cea5a5fe8b"],"When":"2024-3-12"},{"Name":"Kristyferr Arizala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOiyKUGqXqBNtbNLmS8wmqU3zHKkaodcEzR1ZZ8F-bn83TmDOs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I've always loved this hidden gem. Fresh ingredients and always freshly made. The crust is my fave, thin, crispy and dressed in honey butter. It's on the expensive side but I think it's worth it. You get a free dip with each pizza and their garlic ranch is delicious. The customer service is great as well. One star off because parking isn't the best and it's in a weird corner. Food is 5 star.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNM4EG9n0-uw2ZJegEEU7Uc97c_zQ6MEsIhoKY&fid=0x0:0x9099f5cea5a5fe8b"],"When":"2022-10-6"},{"Name":"Harrison Goeldner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUv-_CrEOXVFYwpSQ_LfCH8ko4UyTLcFpt8ablig3f4s3p4JYy_Ow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s more expensive than other pizza places but it’s also some of the best pizza I’ve ever had. I’ve enjoyed every pizza that I’ve had from Emilio’s pizzeria. The honey crust is amazing.

The staff are also always super friendly. Never had a negative experience. I think the only con is the parking is sorta tricky because of all the construction in the area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMkax_2fXXooiAm9665uAreOW8DfWCb1muQl5VZguzF-YboA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Parking: probably 2 spots in the front, 3 spots in the back(harder to get out).

No dine in.

You gotta try their calzones! I had the Al Capone and it was amazing. Stuffed with cheese, meat, onions, and the crust on this was soft and thin. The calzone was better than the pizza we got. The pizza crust was a too thin. I knew the crust was going to be thin and I have nothing against it, but this one was thin to the point where the entire bottom was actually hardened and difficult to bite. But the flavours were great. Recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMY_oFdIolMQ-F3-Fk2J7vMLd9-lXE1v8B20sCt&fid=0x0:0x9099f5cea5a5fe8b"],"When":"2022-7-16"},{"Name":"Brittany Bandura","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmHgvHChGos499xC_WEU4J7X-j7LXDT4Xv7LK8S3t__Sl6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Pizza in the Lower Mainland. Nothing compares to the quality.

They really take care to always give out the best quality products.
I have celiac disease and enjoy their gluten free pizza! Though advertised as 'Gluten Friendly' due to possible cross contamination, etc. I have never had a flair up anytime I have ordered from there.

Note: parking is very limited and it is take-out only essentially BUT their pizza is SO GOOD, those details don't matter.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M Prins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYWCMj9HZ6_2jMol4qrWBbE6l7uCmTatsMh6ch4jbiMYWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Worth the hype! The crust really is one of the best I’ve ever had. And the toppings are also very good and well portioned. Primo Pepperoni was a big step up from your normal pepperoni! Prices are a bit higher but worth it for the taste. Way better than franchised pizza joints. Be warned however — they are only a pick up or delivery place. No where to sit and enjoy your meal. Also, there ain’t really a parking lot so if ever more than one car pulls in to pick up, suddenly it’s a traffic jam.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2uk6NKRvdPpIO397IAZECaTMqlD3Yr3NtQg4&fid=0x0:0x9099f5cea5a5fe8b"],"When":"2022-8-31"},{"Name":"Sarah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW052h_iZ3oec1jGvib9E5styWT6Vsc8nbAQ0k_SEHdDqcD1LWD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Holy smokes- really good pizza. Person at the front was really nice.

Only wish that there were some chairs for waiting!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIGoDUqlE4cHZoIKQx1b9BHHQDTrus10hFvEQl&fid=0x0:0x9099f5cea5a5fe8b"],"When":"2024-8-11"}]

title: Sushi Ami

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"RIA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcNYzyYLe1_s-hZFbDwk--0zTwl73jt3QsEr6gpup4Z2N0IzfIyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here on a weekend around 5 PM and they were busy however, we were looked after right away. We ordered the party tray, their mix tempura and their house salad and everything tasted amazing. They have the cutest set up as well. Great value for the amount of food that we have ordered. Will definitely come back again. All the staff members were so polite. We even got a complimentary deep fried sushi from their chef.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHFxisTBryLbuopISLZoYz8ry2JsAQb-pd6cVm&fid=0x0:0x526d9d690244e4a6"],"When":"2024-3-6"},{"Name":"Kristina Willing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuy27s0OcvtoC0MNpOrcc_H95qISV567q2IiSiwmlo3o1umoo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is still exceptional food, service and atmosphere as it was when operating as Seh-Mi Sushi. The prices have altered since my previous visit a year ago, as expected with rising costs all round.
I have included images of my delicious meal, as well as a picture of each page of the menu. You will not be disappointed if you choose your next meal here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIOsIecryZL4GNxpIf3VftqULuDhSLBAyf_bU&fid=0x0:0x526d9d690244e4a6"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"Elisha Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdAmKDvZioBsIM8sw5lBj2d02yGCX0OMJF7a-J753LM6I6X0wv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A really clean and tidy restaurant. All the food is so fresh and delicious. While eating at other sushi restaurants, digestion might not go well, but here, it's very comfortable. The staff are all friendly and attentive. Every time I come with my family, we eat deliciously and leave happily. The best sushi restaurant in Langley!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRgeX-5RdV_CFx8-Vb9r6KJIBnohDOdxi0pbiv&fid=0x0:0x526d9d690244e4a6"],"When":"2024-5-6"},{"Name":"Наталья Кошик","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJOkf15zOTrM6iDn6jfgE-geBwUiBVYjMFUoNhIL49oYyVLH7_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Order from here often, have never been disappointed. Love dining in as well, very friendly staff, great service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLtSlHdxNJB-NPntCagjBe1BT_HZMnRoR1xZD1&fid=0x0:0x526d9d690244e4a6"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Ross Manson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEpVSqeqsTvRNtUJOrSLjIA9rzMulA6RrCY8I-EdxSNnHKVrVT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I really liked this place and they had great lunchbox options. I got the chicken teriyaki with sashimi and upgraded to sockeye (Lunch box D). I also ordered three aburi rolls, one toro, one hamachi, and one ebi. The only disappointing part of this meal was the aburi which unfortunately I was most excited for. They smoother the aburi in this citrus type mayo and it overtakes all other flavours and mutes the fish. I would note this on the menu and offer the sauce on the side to allow for a better tasting experience imo. Otherwise, great sushi and I will go back and next time just ask for aburi without the mayo sauce.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXuwzPuZJ-ZQDdagyRcrfv64cQk0kdEsTMLCQ3&fid=0x0:0x526d9d690244e4a6"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Sargam S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnxwMBfNosAe5HYx1f-zyY5AfrRpmZ-TGLF-Blzt79fdG_lsPN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My FAVORITE place for sushi in Langley! Quite easily the best service here and the sushi tastes amazing!!

Ordered the Boston roll and another special roll (left image) California roll, rainbow roll and jalapeño roll (right image) - the jalapeño roll melts in your mouth it’s so good would 11/10 recommend all of them!!

Definitely also recommend any of the dinner boxes they are huge and portions are amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKXJWCxYHkB8mbAEjymDCyvVLPvb4OL4jC2GaB&fid=0x0:0x526d9d690244e4a6"],"When":"2024-5-3"},{"Name":"Dustin Christie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgoRlW7wyKUurnue58IGxqlfwR_zK9zAOmy2Sn6TZWMrJPBA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exceptional Sushi Experience with Outstanding Service! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

My recent dining experience at Sushi Ami was nothing short of phenomenal! From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with warm smiles and genuine hospitality from the incredibly friendly staff.

Not only were they attentive and accommodating, but they also went above and beyond to ensure that every aspect of my visit was enjoyable.

Now, let's talk about the sushi – it was truly outstanding. Each roll was expertly crafted, with a perfect balance of flavors and textures.

What truly set Sushi Ami apart, however, was the impeccable service. The staff made me feel like a valued guest from start to finish, creating a welcoming and inclusive atmosphere that made me want to linger long after my meal was over.

In summary, if you're looking for not only incredible sushi but also a dining experience where the staff treats you like family, look no further than Sushi Ami. I can't wait to return and enjoy more of their delicious offerings, all while basking in the warmth of their exceptional service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAa13Z_fzsTBG3PwOWOpSdcoy5ob0eCSjB3ZLA&fid=0x0:0x526d9d690244e4a6"],"When":"2024-2-7"},{"Name":"Elmira Nazari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS8psOPde-fgvVYsglTVKj-j9hpNdB1347mGr_T9d11yAStREO4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quick and polite service. Really cute atmosphere and up to par sushi with a few unique items on the menu. Lots of parking and a fairly big restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvheFpI36frkOxh8d5dxYyvg3YZpy2y-L_aWd1&fid=0x0:0x526d9d690244e4a6"],"When":"2024-6-3"}]

[{"Name":"Richard Mah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVa96SNko-8FpbFVlwxpnyXoCoNoW45QNrjLups3dwaiZQjxmC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food and tasty. - Wonderful portions. Great service. Nice family-owned. Will come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaoIO3PiRi6wV2VJJG1-JuwanA9bSi1Y5-8OEq&fid=0x0:0xc3808ec90d0f7f54"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Simarjeet Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKT5C9ANCpSsw7teTh6yZuMRRabAqatvHw2nyygzBhIeVT2GyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"i went with my family last night for my birthday dinner. we ordered chat papri which was good , chicken tikka which was not as flavoured the way it should be ( could not take the pictures)
for main course we had bhindi , chicken rogan josh , were delicious. lachaa prantha didn’t have the layers and softness , but the garlic naans were chef kissed . we were the only customers on that time so we were served fast which is obvious . Front desk girl was very friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwsSCs763-FmS1nflDhjWb3RXbCRPYoHpAlz4q&fid=0x0:0xc3808ec90d0f7f54"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Wild Wanderlust Photography","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYPQeHy2fRvptt6V1NtTq0t9CdOFiP_rQd_Emm8iYNczU9hCDSwA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is DELISH!! owner is so friendly and they're always smiling
The Butter Chicken is So sooo soft! Falls apart in your mouth. Unlike some places that taste like a rubber chicken from the dollar store All food was good ;)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHgdimJE5P4Oqw0EMP1LgHLSzjXYBo1jDCXc58&fid=0x0:0xc3808ec90d0f7f54"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"R Uppal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeg06kPCjasGvdDMLDI8dy_NDMzHY9N-e0n-9NDOAuYQu1gxA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"UNREAL FOOD! We ordered the chicken Rogan Josh and lamb korma and we were incredibly pleased. I ordered the food an hour later than I intended and within 10 minutes they had everything ready to go for me. The food is VERY flavorful. I don’t think I’ll be going anywhere else to get my fix for Indian food. 10/10 would recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9G6RYc1QqoQtl8NToA_2sKSv4r9LYzZTYSBCz&fid=0x0:0xc3808ec90d0f7f54"],"When":"2024-1-11"},{"Name":"Harsimran Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDa1UNDMjPgv8WXJwYPcX6bLZjELBQG9JAUIMHAF1dX03GPxu_PA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This review is now the latest where I am still giving the food only 2 stars.
Ordered fish tikka and it was not good as fish was not properly marinated and was very chewy.
Ordered Butter chicken, the butter sauce was okay but the chicken was not again marinated plus was not even cooked in tandoor which it should be because it's butter chicken 🐔.
Garlic naan bread was good

This review was old about 2years ago
Ordered Chicken Saag and it was okiiishh.
Haven't tried anything else yet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8GHurszlYL1MH9LiIwNSPtsT0BdNBLkDDhxvL&fid=0x0:0xc3808ec90d0f7f54"],"When":"2021-11-23"},{"Name":"Mr. Beaver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWL3M8ZH3qEl_RyevO5nyLbhHPG0gb_f64YALWS11Pc92lQ0bBO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"this was a really good restaurant. i was very pleased with everything! the food, the service and the atmosphere were all top notch. especially our server. he was such a nice guy and super friendly. kudos to him! overall a satisfying experience and authentic indian cuisine. 5/5 stars!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpqHXRVP97ahMExWgczXTC8FOT_A2uthnWaUt_&fid=0x0:0xc3808ec90d0f7f54"],"When":"2019-7-30"},{"Name":"sandeep sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwZGsbvIJafxVAC_uafkmfUCiShzJt1L497Afsik4fBNjifQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is very welcoming with charming service and the food is better than I have tasted since I was in India, easy access to parking in the back , lot of dining area space, nice and clean. would definitely go back here and recommend this to everyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wilbert Salinas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVO4_5cVex8IhimeOWomj2Grp5gDb8cr4ltDoyGdfVE00Kr-f68=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Staff is very friendly and courteous.
Thanks to SHALINI😇

Some of the best food in the city and the best Chicken , I ordered: Tikka Masala I have ever had! Perfectly spicy and yummy ,while still enhancing the flavour.

Highly recommended  restaurant in Langley😇👌🏻😇👌🏻it’s affordable price,neat and tidy restaurant, the music 🎶 🎼 background is fantastic I loved it. Thanks again  to Shalini","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJouKsTOzxz-sDVXuOVOsA4JkQCj9HlskvLvOd&fid=0x0:0xc3808ec90d0f7f54"],"When":"2023-7-7"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Michael H (RuggyRat)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAG5rJ2nNU8oIwu9GkwOKCp1xhy8TJ1pTXF3mkrIxYfxSolUsPRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Thought try this place on senior night, it is misleading. Ordered the food from the senior special menu and did not get 2 for 1 discount per sign. The server said it is discounted and that’s how it is priced. Interesting that another server gave us the senior menu. My father in-law 79yrs with dementia change his mind and wanted breakfast so I ordered that too. The bacon was so hard as in rubber hard vs crispy dry. Felt like it was nuke. After seated, took a long time may be 9 mins for a server to ask us what we want to drink. There were only 6 tables occupied and two servers. Anyhow, food was good except for the bacon. Just that not please with the server and the false advertising.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0jQGP0x043JOcQ-Dx5RT5-MEH8qa2sQAL6nRt\u0026fid=0x0:0x767d89d027f65037"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Dwayne Guzak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJaeXUCsWogbI98tALSvw3TcJMEZkzXrvwQmAD2akhoRrCZiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Not a bad place for some simple breakfast and coffee , especially if you’re having a “rough” morning … got the chicken and waffles and I wasn’t expecting anything amazing.\nOnce the food came I asked for some syrup and waited a while . Food started getting cold so I asked another server and she brought it right away . First time being here in years and probably another few years till I come back or have another “rough” morning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhNFufu6PrjV9Y7MeioqvAspVLluiGjS0fq8ZV\u0026fid=0x0:0x767d89d027f65037"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Chris Miles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKTtGuaXgd2G7qSKSudvMtp1ObHEpg2dBE5KgpOB-VqWQWqDs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We were there during the recent power outage.  We understand busy times and the servers worked so very hard, especially Haley. What is completely unacceptable was watching their supervisor/manager do basically nothing at all.  Served some waters.  They were overwhelmed and she took time to give her staff crap in front of customers. What she said and the way she said it makes me wonder how they have any staff willing to work for her. The staff deserved praise not that.  That very young manger needs leadership training (at the very least)and the persons responsible for placing her in that position would be replaced if it were my business.  The food is just okay. It’s an old style seniors discount restaurant at best. My wife’s fish was extremely greasy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rose H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8xgJdLMkW4HPYG6JB0SlKbNW0s8okrLiPb-ohhET0Uj0Kjg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Half of my plate was hot. The other half was ice cold.  I had the Turkey Dinner.  Mashed potatoes tasted off. My carrots tasted like they were previously frozen because half of them were warm and half were ice cold.  This meal was definitely not worth the $20 they made me pay for. Our server was awesome!! Too bad the food sucks. I won't be coming here again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Logan Forbes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqbjDee7q1exTdVtu7Ga0Z_YAEdGkkk47-GqAxGzesebpzuJo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Good food but don't ever come during a power outage. we came as it was the last place open near us and we waited around 2 hours and still didn't get our food it's crazy how long it takes to eat here. Also the serving is so unfair people who came in 20 minutes after us got there orders in before we even got offered drinks. And this is what the food looked like 15 minutes before they close... we got here at 5:45.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPa8phIaZ5IOZbLVdHon2Uy-8HDssDEA85HaNNp\u0026fid=0x0:0x767d89d027f65037"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Yvonne Dinelle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIZtHGBFv45NOHe6NAWBH0T__goJF_dKXdQGZ7IvKXg4MCbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Service terrible, only 2 tables filled. Server more interested in chatting to friends than working. Waited to be seated for at least 10 minutes, same to have order taken. Waited at least 30 minutes for food to come out.  Used to eat here all the time, was always a great experience but no more.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Justin Byjork","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKx5UiLHkQyGfMqJd6Wuu-_RdAKDczokUGz1ie4xLzdsINLqI4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden Gem in Langley. Honestly one of the best restaurants in Langley for food quality with great service at an excellent price. Relaxed country atmosphere. Every type of meal I have gotten here over several months has been top notch, whether breakfast, lunch, or dinner. We strongly recommend this Ricky's as it is far above average and even above most local boutique restaurants in terms of quality of food and great service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Buttercup79 G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDyr-lOV0AyH255wKeRXec7FGSojKgjddiAIgtBUhtcvjTfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Worst Ricky’s that I’ve been to by far.  Looks like cooks don’t know anything about cooking breakfast.  We ordered a big breakfast platter no hashbrowns on plate, ordered over easy eggs got over hard eggs.  We had already waited close to 30 mins for our food and didn’t have time to wait another 30 mins.  We order the works omelette no tomatoes, loaded with onions and a few mushrooms.  We got our food and waitress Tammy was very friendly and accommodating,  she told us our toast was coming right up for the omelette.  When Waitress went to check on hasbrowns we could hear cooks arguing did u order it,  waitress was like it comes with omelette, everyone’s meals came out at different times which I can understand a few mins but the last meal was almost 7 mins after everyone else .  Overall food was the worst by far.  Only reason I’m giving a 2 star review is for the service we received from Tammy.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Emilie Herbert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXa6gGO4bT4ElKcHiDo9r2yPxEVd5vEkF9aVJ5pj0jluZ2qhB2j=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We ordered 4 dishes for take out. Haven’t been to the coast in years and craving some good food.

Chicken Cow main, we couldn’t even eat as it tasted off. The sweet and sour sauce tasted like it was watered down.

Everything else was ok.
- chicken fried rice
- chicken balls
- sweet sour boneless pork

$60 and feeling pretty disappointed as we were looking forward to a good meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjnLNv5DlYOS_zcIR2KxTPIE1nKQCSxkBFlpXg&fid=0x0:0x4e1e2fbc496249ff"],"When":"2024-2-28"},{"Name":"Tannya Flinn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXRpKnlHRGmbdmMiuObTTi5D1nWpb3BWxHmS803n6C5SpnFccT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Don’t order the sweet and sour chicken balls. They are bigger than an XL egg and all batter. The piece of chicken is maybe the size of a quarter. Rice was good and the chow mein  was mushy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPihrYzWygeRKBb8grZWA3B5dD362iJuhnwNHbD&fid=0x0:0x4e1e2fbc496249ff"],"When":"2023-3-26"},{"Name":"8T8","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaHAe29LTwj-kDB4Rxp2LPyCtNn-xUw5U4xwT2905ny-JNkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ingredients are fresh.  The food is completely alright, nothing exceptional but definitely meets standards.  If looking for a typical Chinese restaurant, this place will not disappoint.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgj2b8lSOAnLghSidbiUkVtAZaR7NIWAvomtAN&fid=0x0:0x4e1e2fbc496249ff"],"When":"2024-2-4"},{"Name":"Kyle VZ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsBmQtD0NbHsbHXQgkoq4f4XKjpKhDnUyH5htVYUttnmo7lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a $8.97 lunch time special pickup. Sweet sour pork, chow mein and mixed vegetables. Restaurant was clean. Seemed super old school and basic. Nice employees to help me. Food was pretty good. Chow mein uses thinner noodles with good flavour. Mixed veggies were crisp and good. Sour pork was lightly sauced in more of a brown sauce than usual red  sauce and very crispy outter shell. Good amount and heavy. Very nicely made and good to tryout for yourself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNro1lmmrF6z7Fzi2BwEOoKeYy7iZ8JFXeKFhJx&fid=0x0:0x4e1e2fbc496249ff"],"When":"2019-1-24"},{"Name":"Tom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrt_8M7WZPCBAKCP9i-fwwy5nLfGoky_j2w3jmAdKuSN6kaes=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"No meat just fried shell in the wontons. Ridiculous and disrespectful. I’ve ordered here 3 times and the foods been good, but this is ridiculous. Was going to make this my regular for Chinese food, but not anymore if this is how they treat customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnzXnOQMI9o6PJEIvl0fjoxkzR_ScFJkx5ArWq&fid=0x0:0x4e1e2fbc496249ff"],"When":"2023-3-25"},{"Name":"R Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-jrBZr0L2Cohp23WTfYqu0s7jxp32ljcl18krkzsKHxnH3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A lovely family business and alway satisfies my cravings for Chinese food, the price is fair and the food is really good.  I've tried other Chinese restaurants in the area that cost a little more but didn't taste as good. Will definitely go back for again. Updated Aug 10, 2024 - dropped two stars because they've seem to be a victim of inflation. I understand higher prices to a pint but not smaller portions and lowering standards too. Hopefully things will go back as they were.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chad M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzyi9MjGLsk2OqEQpu5x3_hyL5AheIOqp-b_IYDFTXauiXjhbm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very good Chinese food, had the $8.95 lunch special combo of chow mein, fried rice & sweet and sour pork. Was able to substitute the rice for chicken balls for only $2. Will definitely come back. The customer service was excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHli_YFEyxbzzjwp5LVXw1FwGd4SEc9mXjrHeU&fid=0x0:0x4e1e2fbc496249ff"],"When":"2020-3-14"},{"Name":"Sandy Toews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQXDmkL3THG77kgX3p1Yea9Z0pycYW_ycHBM9iyOT7CjoDWw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered the combo meal for one, sweet and sour pork was mushy and and bland, almond chicken was terrible and the chow mein was bland and swimming in watery sauce, no taste, very forgettable, won’t be back","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Uday Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBuauSikHvtDIrQ4IuAiuDjA4upgMz0YY8-79QY2pPsnj9J7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Krishna provides exceptional service at Freshslice Pizza. He is always welcoming and friendly and ensures that every customer has a great experience. Whether it’s preparing fresh, delicious pizza or addressing customer needs promptly, Krishna handles everything with professionalism and a positive attitude. His attention to detail and dedication to quality make him stand out. I highly recommend visiting Freshslice and experiencing his outstanding service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adrian Wells","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJZUC21qXqZzYsYAWcrBuWIoBeN56lUrK69WURJucenLo01x9v=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently ordered pizza and catering for my company from Freshslice's Langley location, and I couldn't be happier with the service! The pizza was delivered right on time and was perfectly made. The catering process was incredibly smooth, making it so easy to coordinate everything. The customer service at this location is top-notch—friendly, attentive, and professional. I would definitely recommend visiting the store and ordering pizza from them. They’ve definitely earned my future business!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1ICy3O0LQd7GRt586JTV_9w8m5LUOoTjNZTme\u0026fid=0x0:0x62aa27733aae52f3"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Blessed Love Jamantoc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiJkDfqK1tLHwmtym7NT7sodUjHvZSVRt9FJ_NqcdWkISaxfG4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"pizza is paper thin not thick slice compared to other franchisees. the front people are insisting on giving me stale pizza that was made 30minutes ago and says it’s fresh. fresh slice maple ridge is better and their customer service is way way better than this location","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJ2oh2joR1H15CqXb8o9PHQQi1id-GRRQvPjw0\u0026fid=0x0:0x62aa27733aae52f3"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Pragun Gupta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAoMr4a6hxXRNj_r-xAf2cWke-P2xn2-J7VQmP6xCPs4NAAV6l=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh slice over here serves amazing pizza. I am always there i guess once or twice a week and staff over there are friendly and quick with their services most importantly what I love the most is  the cleanliness. The pizza is delicious over here and i love butter chicken and BBQ chicken bacon pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCIE9NLiLcpadljLoEmfL4-4Rs9EVAwl_KW5-L\u0026fid=0x0:0x62aa27733aae52f3"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"irshad Alam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBiceHD41WruRGOl0t2MOUIBPoRdfY8zh9XbILuuK-Rk-skw4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Another disappointment from this store. If you don't want to get sick then don't order here, I made mistake, but you should not, I wanted to order from other store, but excidently my order went to this store.   Dont offer free dip for getting fake 5 star rating, instead of that start giving better service and food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2tqKrKgQhVs06Anrtj1lcg_PNNyl9A9My6wyL\u0026fid=0x0:0x62aa27733aae52f3"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Raj MC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHryKGh5-s-zGL3wjeIXVJiDpMy7hHL8226xPGSy_g4tzhDw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The go to is the unlimited toppings medium at about $13 which is great value for money. The staff here are typically energetic and friendly as well, always serving with a smile. Every month they refresh their coupons too which is so useful when you're craving a quick bite. Food has consistently been really tasty and always hits the spot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jagraj Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFOEZS-hIKNVMrra1orgpYaUWzUC5fgsi4_TtCPG1BTYZNxmiG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today I searched the fresh slices location then i got this location when I reached there it was very great experience for me. As compared to other locations i had a good experience in customer service. I liked the taste of pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUTWbnakjJd9UCGe9EVLtJZ0Z0fusnl8RNs_rV\u0026fid=0x0:0x62aa27733aae52f3"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Ripan Rattu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKY0TDhCqVYimIaczMbzhLxcNnzFWWQJ1MWqEVRBz6EKCL5rG0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today I went to fresh slice pizza store and it was amazing experience because my order was prepared as per my demand. Moreover, I also take some slices for dine in specially pepperoni and BBQ chicken bacon and it just mind blowing. I would highly recommend this calm friendly place to everyone. Again thank you to the staff…all are so friendly and co-operative. Lastly, I will visit that place again and again for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqVLoRIMjipedmyamSIfSY7jc65trZrMkaI1MF\u0026fid=0x0:0x62aa27733aae52f3"],"When":"2024-6-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tara B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgraxt7PhvuON5FZNtce0GrkB4U-yhJaDhuiU7fLwL-Nu8nWCzyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't believe I've never left a review for this place!!  We absolutely love it here.  The family who runs this joint is so amazing, they remember our orders, they always say hello to me by name.  We have been sooooo sick for nearly a week, so we ordered takeout tonight and I can't even explain how comforting and delicious our bowls were tonight.  Thank you so much for always providing impeccable service and the most delicious meals.  Your broth is to die for!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rachel Ong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJd_vbCp1VtYrXCiD8dMsfZVNW0rhIThc2muY66NDVwjQZDtb-d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best pho in Langley! The special with spring roll is all you ever need. Soup is hot and delicious with a very deeply flavoured broth. They give plenty of meat and noodles. We love coming here for the soup but also would highly recommend the vermicelli bowls.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMnGZNnXJaenqknguFKi1jPLjSp0ncBMo3aQfP&fid=0x0:0xe6869299035276c6"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Melisa Woo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhlFUkHJtdvNfxN4zXzQ_tF66YFk9ySyx_Fe6dkHmy02nmbTl5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everyone was really friendly, and the pho broth was on point! I didn't expect to find good pho in Langley but I highly recommend. Will make this a regular stop going forward!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOASO-EifQrl81V2E222aF4cZ2rS7bFXDaenf4r&fid=0x0:0xe6869299035276c6"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Sara Levy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1JhGGc9QY0ccxxvZGwmT2tEdashPeQZVjS8AuaUc2oWuCJyhlag=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Top notch food ALWAYS!!! AMAZING SERVICE. I would give 20 stars if I could. Just simply the best place around. So this place exists. My husband and I have been going to Surrey Central location  for over 10 years and they just opened this restaurant Langley. I am so so happy. I love this place. It needs to never shut down. It honestly has the best food around the fried rice and lemon chicken and then the pho soup as well as the spring rolls. Honestly. It's a hidden gem for sure and you need to absolutely try it because wow!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sandy Truong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIC1A4LByBq6OUwZJWG8H7Z-MLb4lMquAtIidNi78o8npp66g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Came for their Bun Bo Hue. Large servings. Good prices. We asked for extra tendon. We assumed it would just be added to the bowl but we got an entire side bowl of soup and tendon. Definitely worth the additional $4.

The soup itself was average. Which is my reason for the 3 stars. I was tempted to give 4 stars because of prices and serving sizes. However, I feel taste is a better determining factor for rating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDdsxbD5lEUs_Db8jS1r3QcsmSOvti93pcQRMX&fid=0x0:0xe6869299035276c6"],"When":"2024-1-7"},{"Name":"Brock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtmm_4iDxx2OSV2INX_nRXJUoqjP1z-IH6_wIHH55Ix8fBZPU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here today. Thought we’d try something different, as we usually go to another Vietnamese restaurant in Langley, that is also very good. But I have to say, this place has now taken the top spot. Had the Bun Bo Hue, and it was fantastic. Lots of flavors; perfect amount of spice; lots of basil given (usually places just give a tiny bit); and a lot of meat in the soup. What made this place stand out to me was the quality of the meat; it had the taste and texture of a higher quality meat than you usually find in most places. The texture was actually a real meat texture; it felt rich, as opposed to something previously frozen and limp. Also had the fried spring rolls and everyone was correct: I think these are up there with the best I’ve had in Vietnam.

This place is a hidden gem. And it will personally be my new ‘go-to’ in Langley. Looking forward to trying some of their other soups and dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhKfG0fsbN48vvdq6OmWKDCBtmy-Y0fIYc2UT_&fid=0x0:0xe6869299035276c6"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"Diane (Dineoutwithdee)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJfHVJSjIKAcPEXNIfUcWAtOeYHaXavqJYPtVJZ3lhCbCbpeo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Big fan of this place! I’m a regular customer through Uber Eats but today, we dined in and the food is, of course, just as great!! Portion size here is good and the prices are very reasonable. I love how friendly and prompt their service is and their dining area is nice and clean, too!

I recommend the House Special Pho, Lemongrass Chicken and Vietnamese Iced Coffee. 👌🏼

Check them out online or in store. Lots of parking if you dine in!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJc16noCMt0r_RlP4KOMkmv4WPjxjXj_5QFfHO&fid=0x0:0xe6869299035276c6"],"When":"2023-8-18"},{"Name":"Elgwen Garimond Sazon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUr-YJetWFyKZ_qiagb4emhdFKuhDB-t_w-QykljS6ql5cQoR_-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love this place! service is kind and generous! Best Pho broth around and amazing quantity and price","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMk1AYz8zAt9XDfPZrEIxgUPId_jWmGM7N3bdbV&fid=0x0:0xe6869299035276c6"],"When":"2024-8-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bharat BG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqRKn1k2-qF3tXLN7A_OzGt0jzRFtpo5CTb7-YycXvV6j6OQGy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing homely Kerala style food.. and friendly service. They are really hardworking team and open to feedback and requests. I did a trial and loved it and definitely going to be a full time subscriber. 100% recommended","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Reet Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJC1mFMrd1KkJ9O8eoRxI7vklEKJEnkLEYVZoE4JtCwiGcd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My love for authentic South Indian food search brought me to Ruchi Kitchen’s page. Being a Punjabi, South Indian food is my favourite. This is the first tiffin I have tried in all these years after moving to Canada. I must say the food and the people are just amazing. Food is delicious, authentic, good portions and always perfectly cooked esp. meat (never over cooked or undercooked). I can compare because I have seen my friends bring their tiffins and they were not good in any aspect. So I preferred cooking myself but considering I am super busy now I wanted to get one to save my time but still wanted to eat healthy. The price justifies the quality to me. Binoy is very kind and polite to always accommodate as I live far from their business. Thank you so much for your impeccable service and delectable healthy food.I focus on healthy because my stomach is extremely sensitive to spices and fried food and they use whole spices and fresh ingredients which adds to goodness and aroma rather than just taste. Its feels like home cooked meal always 😊  May your business flourish more but please keep this  quality always. Thank you once again 😊","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sanju Sanjay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVa3TqCpZGozUeXBb5z_x8s_ecI3XX3ymWqw2S2vJAPjUkvQdWm9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Moved from Toronto to Vancouver! Now I feel I am really close to my home just because the food is so delicious I don’t miss my home cooked food anymore 🤩🤩
Hygiene- 10/ 10
Taste -  11/ 10  it’s definitely out of the scale 😋😋😋
Quantity - 10/10
I go for the monthly package which is under the budget even for a student like me 💯👨‍🎓","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgRJ5uh1IYhxKQwcF_9ravpC0OGUhQROQD5vMfPTkVp7-uhLh3yQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of experiencing food from Ruchi Kitchen, the quality exceeded all my expectations in every way possible. It was an absolute treat every time. The portion sizes were generous and the variety in recipes is amazing. Really enjoyed the fresh ingredients and traditional spices which made each dish a true culinary delight. They are a gem in the world of food services. I recommend them to anyone looking for great home cooked meals. Looking forward to more culinary surprises !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ALEN JOHN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGCHRdD5xN9QFcbxPv0Owg1zzqlKFJjLYaBjzO0xRPdxTaHx4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best in town!!

This daily meal service perfectly replicates the taste of home-cooked Kerala cuisine. After trying multiple options in town, I've found that their non-vegetarian and vegetarian dishes are consistently excellent. It's like enjoying a homemade meal every time, truly capturing the essence of mom’s cooking.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vishal Lewis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZFPGI4cUGSP1YTlC-yOcguIGaO8pIZ9atqAl8j7Whr8kTD1ip=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was recommended by a friend to try out the food from Ruchi kitchen, and I’m glad I did. If you are looking for everyday Home cooked meals, I would strongly recommend you at least try them out once. The food was tasty, just like home cooked food and the quantity just perfect. They also have a good variety to choose from.
Wishing them all the very best !!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dicco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXv8WTDyp7PJQiunq99sbV-IKRbHX2Zaal2bGmXMIjX3je-45zT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been receiving tiffin service from Ruchi Kitchen. I am genuinely impressed. The taste and quality of the food consistently meet high standards. Highly recommend for anyone seeking delicious and quality meals!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Unni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGYWXEM8REV18BYNpP3pkkh_U0sS4OdQc952rA09IMtlMq8t4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ruchi Kitchen very much deserve 5 stars!!!
Recently we ordered Biryani.... we loved it.
100% authentic Kerala style. Cooking was perfect. Spices & condiments were perfectly added.  Even the raita and chutney provided along with it were very special and tasty.
We are  sure the other items they cater are the same quality, the way it looks, and we are trying to try one by one. And also waiting to taste their Ona Sadya.
The prices are very reasonable too....
All the very best Ruchi Kitchen....","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Leslie Ngo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWy4prG9zC06GQVwfW5XW99I_e-35MyO4tIy1Trq9RLD0fbMwOv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is an excellent place to enjoy Japanese cuisine. We have been coming here a couple times as a family and we enjoyed our experiences. The servers were welcoming and delightful, offering us the menu and drinks promptly. There are a variety of options to choice from on the menu, from sushi rolls and appetizers to combos and lunch/dinner boxes. The seating were comfortable and includes many walled, rectangular enclosed spaces. The food came out fresh and in generous quantity while maintaining quality in a timely manner. For the proportion we get and the freshness, the overall price is reasonable. The atmosphere is calm, soothing and laid-back. There is no overpowering music and no loud ambiance. The washrooms are generally clean and functional. After paying, we got little natural fruit candies. I highly suggest giving this place a try if you crave sushi in the Williowbrook area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVZcFcxMhiyVrGvn22QNDPOW28mEA2a8Cu502Z\u0026fid=0x0:0x6bf1e6682e4d304e"],"When":"2024-3-26"},{"Name":"Pamela Laine Hoang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqrgGPhNg7LyO0ZZh9KDlIemtsBObXCLeRVArhIjoYDbDv4Mhu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family and I had lunch here and we made it for the lunch special which ends at 2:30pm , good value for bento box ($17.95)  the portions are big and was delicious ! They have kid size bentos for $11 super cute !  Food was prompt and servers so kind. We ate with our small children and unknowingly  leaving my phone behind one of the private booths. I called back and they kept it safe for me ! Thank you so much !! I would definitely recommend this place , food and service is great!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRjcCc0t_vqGGMb8cTtQftVu4YSfBMOPcnGngR\u0026fid=0x0:0x6bf1e6682e4d304e"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Lord Stanley (Lifepilot)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzQPaJP0C4QgYze9YWfcg4vOQGSlA7Fi1WI2IqpyzPqwuzcItLsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here a few times but just never got around to writing a review. But it’s a consistently good little sushi 🍣 spot in Langley with ample partying and decent pricing and well located. Service and quality is consistently good. They have lots of those nice little booth tables and private seating. Washrooms are always clean. Not much atmosphere per say as no music or anything playing. Just about coming eating and moving on. Not that linger longer type of spot. But definitely a great recommendation as you can always be sure about food and service. Enjoy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMg7KT9EKPzA8sK7i1zbduzG8rm4dZvhSRs082U\u0026fid=0x0:0x6bf1e6682e4d304e"],"When":"2023-11-7"},{"Name":"Frank Yoster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZTPyUwUA84CCd3zLpogXzpKk-oEtUA7XXG4qL8W0aIRGPFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing Place..actually infact the best place in Langley. I DEF WOULD RECOMMEND IT!  Try Their Seafood Udon! Its tasty and amazing! Staff is amazing, Their food is great10/10, and their pricing is very reasonable. !^_^ THANK You!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfeTvxFX7XsZRwhtFPDJ8iqqcNPLfnt_Lt0DF9\u0026fid=0x0:0x6bf1e6682e4d304e"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Javen Kay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoUSR-retmDaLP5Jg3xQCy8bsN49n3Y4bmHUv6t1vWUqWT5Kiw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went to Umami sushi and had some great food! I ordered a lunch platter along with the spicy salmon cone. The platter had plenty of food and the spicy salmon cone had large pieces of salmon all throughout it! We had also ordered an edemame to start and it had been cooked well and salted well (I've had edemame that was raw or too salty or not salted at all at other restaurants so this was great!)\n\nI highly recommend checking out Umami sushi in Langley for well made and we'll priced sushi!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCJZ8M9wFFgRev1K0AVAp3AGlYtm7p599GZOyb\u0026fid=0x0:0x6bf1e6682e4d304e"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"maria grey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8FEcpnfN1-xWJm6jpUVFyeTvrZDkt6N8m0gKvoNv1bcyE2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I always order at umami and this time I ordered volcano roll thru uber eats. It was missing a wasabi and ginger. Also the presentation was poorly. The taste was also a bit different.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiO_BBpL8soBEedvkCEThYEtuZvE_fhI13Zpzx\u0026fid=0x0:0x6bf1e6682e4d304e"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Christina Johnston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXO5iDvLphRNDMfh_xnJ_NCYYgSFpCIbEhnxUDyF57jGJKJ8tERAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been coming to this restaurant for well over 10 years. The staff are always lovely, and the dine-in food is superb! Note: I've ordered through door dash a few times, and it is hit or miss. Still giving them 5 stars because it's my fav dine-in sushi restaurant!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vida Corvus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqINKLe9b1hKofrDcCLAKEL-6hQV6fdy1HehcGnPVwrDjBQXY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly, as someone who works in this plaza and spends more money than I’d like on takeout food, this place is a winner. Their prices are better than most of the other options, the food is prepared fresh to order, the ladies there are SO nice.  I often don’t spend more than $15 for a complete meal.  I really enjoy them. I encourage you to give this place a chance, even one time.  (Pls note my meal is 1/2 eaten in this pic)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNP0Mv31xI8XBWO5-XVxyEUTYLuTIawpuQpjLLf\u0026fid=0x0:0x6bf1e6682e4d304e"],"When":"2024-3-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dwayne Guzak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJaeXUCsWogbI98tALSvw3TcJMEZkzXrvwQmAD2akhoRrCZiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love a large cheese pizza and this place did not disappoint!! You can actually taste the fresh ingredients and that fire oven makes the pizza tastes even better , will definitely becoming back .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGguY_JivUCjwf8EDTHNK8u1vl6_f6EE3iM5AR&fid=0x0:0xac90fa55516cd48f"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"V K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvePfh29sdRgf0mTUfJXf4ltd9IP8MiF82BDkjzhbShMUOjZgG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazingly good italian style pizza! They use italian 00 flour, wood fired oven and excellent ingredients. Crust is so light, right about of charr on the under. We stopped by for a dine in bite, staff are very friendly and pizza came out quick. Their "medium" size is actually pretty big!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPajTFgdRlq6kLVI7vmeH9JmHogRmLxtCvsE7ZR&fid=0x0:0xac90fa55516cd48f"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Daniel Loney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhVKtVI_BQxDYH7J6CSEw_I5RbEPGDUzsK9USmRR-WPIXfN9lj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s great to have a real fired pizza Murrayville. Lots flavors and they have a great hot sauce. Service was kind and pizza came quickly. I recommend the dine in.

If you would like to see more in-depth reviews, please follow my account.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoB-eRyzZcuZ1O3_BqCIBGC2oNp1WEXX1MNbpj&fid=0x0:0xac90fa55516cd48f"],"When":"2023-12-13"},{"Name":"M Prins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYWCMj9HZ6_2jMol4qrWBbE6l7uCmTatsMh6ch4jbiMYWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tasty! Menu is mostly Italian style pizzas especially with the choices of meats and cheese (so good!), and I love the thin crust. Price was as expected, and they have a few combo deals. Very professional service, and they even called when I was 10mins late to pick up. Restaurant seating is an okay atmosphere (- you won’t want to sit right by the door!)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-yDnLRXYzVn2yNT_LfZPwju-T4Jd66qZqsLw&fid=0x0:0xac90fa55516cd48f"],"When":"2023-12-11"},{"Name":"Riley “Waferquakey”","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKmmIJl-0SHVjFeKJiZv_FT5hm__M2RaxdH1AjnogPcdfQvQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":">Be me
>Lil tipsy, traipsing the town
>spot this gem, this jewel open in the distance
>"Well there's nothing gained if nothing's lost"
>Go out on a limb to give this place a shot
>They lemme walk out with some of the most balanced and delectable pizza for a small pittance
They have the most wonderful staff every night, with the best pizza at reasonable prices! I can't recommend for a night of good pizza enough!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOA0WDHwylEB-i4yXRbTtOaOU7vR8D2dtgDx3ZI&fid=0x0:0xac90fa55516cd48f"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Christine MacQuarrie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyfay5gtD9RuIuNIl6wAUE8BwVjDhSroEE4itVl29TaIzGw14I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing four cheese pizza! Also tried the pepperoni. Please keep in mind this is NOT typical fast food pizza which thick doughy crust loaded with processed toppings. This is true thin crust, foldable pizza.  The garlic dipping sauce is also SO FLIPPING GOOD.  Please support these guys, the employees are so nice too! Welcome to the community, La Pache!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMu6uiW6JTq71W9WzN2LP03hRjBQpvdDsEhIukm&fid=0x0:0xac90fa55516cd48f"],"When":"2023-9-26"},{"Name":"Anmol Bains","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIqs-DEEam06WIATuIgQ4_uYHyxJBjj_4IGyu-BtbI9QBaxYMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am so glad we finally have a good italian pizza place in Langley! The pizza was phenomenal. Amazing dough, fresh ingredients, and delicious sauce. Like many other italian pizza spots, they don't skimp on the toppings. Can't wait to go back and try some of the other dishes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMW0T8VimnXtjzsMozL-UWRIyMvXIG7yutqv8v&fid=0x0:0xac90fa55516cd48f"],"When":"2024-2-13"},{"Name":"Zar A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4mE2OSu-aljoa4oItdjDTLu6V5_KpVVKR5n01dL7vcAf84B8K=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were there today. What a delicious chicken pizza served with love and smiles. Zahir was the best pizza artist here ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhjQ58jCL9WvzNOvvlymzH8wtMUScB9c7A4uMu&fid=0x0:0xac90fa55516cd48f"],"When":"2024-10-6"}]
