user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tom McDougall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0J48kC1hZM1V1aRsvHOZVDophlDmEISwqhKMFe94oVeHk06c2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beatniks Bistro - Fort Langley

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

We had an early dinner at Beatniks Bistro with my parents, and it was a delightful experience. The ambiance was cozy yet modern, making it the perfect spot to relax and enjoy a meal in the heart of Fort Langley. We were seated promptly, and the staff were attentive and friendly throughout our visit.

The menu had a great selection of dishes, and there was something for everyone. We started with the crispy calamari, which was perfectly cooked and seasoned. For mains, we had a mix of dishes, including the short rib and the salmon, both of which were cooked to perfection and beautifully presented. The flavors were balanced, and the portion sizes were just right. My parents really enjoyed the experience as well, and it was a lovely way to spend time together.

What stood out was the quality of the food and the relaxed atmosphere. The outdoor seating area looked inviting too, but we opted to sit indoors given the cooler weather. Overall, Beatniks provided a wonderful dining experience, and we look forward to returning. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a delicious meal in a charming setting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIjf3DWc_qaY3F--653BEA8_r9sWDQKaMbjOSl&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Kat Sykes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUccyfg8kVkNFxM3K2eZWJ1jcQT3OuohgE_37gTeq5lt55yLpw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little bistro with a large outdoor space.  Service was good and the food was great.  Really good burger and yam fries.  The only bad thing for
me was the amount of salt on the fries.  I don't use that much salt and had to brush off a bunch to enjoy the fries.  Street parking is limited and there is a small lot in the back for about 8 cars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjyj2vUaYdPOS6m0JaZiSkNQ7plcF3Qqq0F7_w&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Daniel Vasquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfH4IGtDH-RZPfkWL0P5tVuSs9PJ8oLSHVNJs_o3NyG6_oaSvUng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It all starts with the atmosphere and location, the patio is fantastic in the summer; any occasion and for any meal, just super! The service is so good, all the staff have a smile and are so genuine in the service they provide. Now, last but not least is the food, so yummy. All the meals we tried were delicious and just perfect. Can’t wait to go back. Highly recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8GDPXlpZwQiZnq1SGfjwIEjBtrW-kbGozBVmR&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were assisted by Kelly and she was so full of positive energy. All the staff were helpful. Busy beautiful Sunday so lots of people. We had salads, burger, fries, and drinks. Everything was fresh and spot on. The salmon was quite overcooked so it was quite dry, flavourful though. Still good.

Will definitely come back. This place is a gem on Fort Langley!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZtCzzLZ1tYW1-f2P58jLaguOuDRZ540_swUAe&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"WanderingNomadJunky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLV5nGXazxvMsF1gu1JToxDjQdzN7lbcZ-wJLf6VmKi487Kmt5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got here before the rush. 9am. Brunch was 😋 delicious. The staff was very friendly. The atmosphere is interesting. Wasn't as busy as the other places. Classic breakfast 🥞🍳. Really large patio area. Prices are reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO08gSEmRYxza57UdCM-KA2jR2fiafgD3G77h0&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Oluwayomi Adebule","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXqcIg8ujO4XiC50cD8_FM6q8RuvnCHkeqVI4f08BodMBvibbJTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was a bit underwhelmed with the experience. I like my food more flavorful than they had to offer. The items showing on their Google reviews are no longer on the menu which increased my disappointment with this place. It was a busy summer evening so expect to wait at least 30 minutes before your table is ready. No reservation required, just leave a name at the front desk and you’ll be given an estimated time. Busy also means the service appears slower than normal .

Fare:
Coconut prawn
Crab cakes
Short rib braised beef on parsnip puree with rosemary jus
Halibut on wild mushroom risotto

Libations:
Beatniks Shirley Temple
Virgin mule

3.5/5","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaLtkfToaxJBrzuLy5lFBgvieoGqDGJ1v4C_Bz&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"FAIS KHAN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlKzzS_N_VjrFHFaIWN-Z9G7c1k4XbX_BTvMFUNoBuJ0tzmcRC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have a memorable experience to share from last year at this restaurant, which led me to consider revisiting. As a local resident, I rarely explore Fort Langley, a heritage village that mainly attracts tourists. Our initial encounter with the first waitress was lovely; she was friendly, took our orders promptly, and served our drinks right away. Unfortunately, she did not inform us of her shift change. The second waitress who took over was regrettably rude and unprofessional. Despite her assurance to refill our water twice, she never returned with it. Although we ordered promptly, we waited 35 minutes without any food. When we finally flagged down the waitress, she explained that there had been a mix-up as she assumed we had finished our meal. When our food finally arrived, it was a mixed experience. My wife's gnocchi was good, but my fish and chips were disappointing; the fish was undercooked and frozen, making it impossible to cut. The manager, who was very positive and kind, offered to replace my meal for free. I declined, considering the subpar service we had encountered.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6tkrcqkdnNfWUf01lAEQT9DVTO6JJ8PVX4kmB&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Spike Luk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVljR41LewaD1cz5kVqUD3bmc9ybJSH00GIF-DrHusS8cKNejJe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was a warm Saturday afternoon so we decided to get some shade under an umbrella at Beatniks Bistro.
We were greeted by a friendly hostess who was also responsible for clearing and cleaning the patio tables.  My wife and I were thinking since it was fairly busy the restaurant should have had someone host and someone else clean and set the tables.  Fortunately, the wait wasn’t too bad.

Once we were seated we ordered our drinks.  Somehow my wife was given a virgin Peaches cocktail instead of a regular Peaches cocktail.  I was wondering why my wife was not turning red.  Later the bill showed me a nonalcoholic drink was entered.  It tasted yummy though.
My IPA was cold and refreshing.

The deep fried pickles were good.  It had a nicely seasoned crispy batter.  The dipping sauce was just ok.  Personally a dill sauce would have been better.

The Artisan salad was fresh and crisp.  The amount of dressing perfect.

The salmon burger was good and came with nicely seasoned fries.

Overall it was a good dining experience and we would dine there again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7UT8AOPYwRxdwCdsDZmRvHv55kTZyEaHmJeAU&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-7-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"VISHNU DEV S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUH6h5mT-a0eO3jksZUAY9bPgRLzYy84Fq7HybAcYdVfmHs_Kgo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a wonderful dinner with my family at Apana Indian kitchen Langley.The food was excellent, beautifully presented, and cooked to perfection. The service was friendly and attentive. It was a perfect setting for a relaxed, enjoyable evening. Highly recommend for a great dining experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlf_50GIlCW2nRaRi-iPwfduvX0ETCzcFoxn9z&fid=0x0:0xd47f9b89a904dbe0"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"rajiv malhotra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQCQMj3G94-c35uv6vQI2xmTltiEbdYT0doqFtdkNj6IHOJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently had the pleasure of experiencing Chef Dhyan Singh's food from Apna Indian Kitchen for my Son's first Birthday and I can confidently say it was the best Indian food we’ve ever had! From the first bite to the last, each dish was packed with authentic flavors and made with fresh ingredients. The spices were perfectly balanced, and the presentation was exceptional, showing his attention to detail and passion for his craft.

Our guests couldn't stop raving about the food, especially the paneer lababdar and Honey Chilli Cauliflower. Chef Dhyan Singh and his team went above and beyond to accommodate our needs, providing excellent service and ensuring everything went smoothly. If you're looking for delicious, high-quality and very reasonable price Indian cuisine that will impress everyone, I highly recommend Chef Dhyan Singh’s Apna Indian Kitchen. We’ll definitely be returning for future events!"
In the Appetizers:- Manchurian, Noodles, Honey Chilli Cauliflower
In the Main course:- Mix Veg, Chana Masala, Paneer Lababdar, Rice, Yogurt , Garlic Naan and Ras Malai.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUK5Fe9UpkfTHgLS_0QbrFBxyMyqVGYuFYO3qU&fid=0x0:0xd47f9b89a904dbe0"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Abha Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIz-fxx-9FhjJeZBVOjAjYALrXo8vJBbKx-sHZerG5aR3UGRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"10/10 for authentic taste. Great value for money! Staff is very polite and friendly. I highly recommend this place. Butter chicken and kadai paneer I loved the most. Naans are always very soft and tasty. Overall great experience 🧡","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPb7VzdBP3TBj_45nNUGpcqH6F0oRjQr8uwp31l&fid=0x0:0xd47f9b89a904dbe0"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Danny Chaho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfl6p3PlByZ65HjhGr5R2hAltNBiIDERZrBs0LnzNtZi6g-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had googled best Indian Restaurant in Langley, and Apna came up. We went as a group of 8 guys on a Thursday. The food was simply amazing! So much flavour and the taste was out of this world.  Food portions were also extremely generous compared to other places. All the guys said that this was probably the best Indian food they ever had. The fish pakora, Palak Paneer and veggie pakora were so good as was all the other dishes that we ordered. Apna was also very reasonably priced. You need to try this place if you are in Langley!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjyb3fh76Qh6xVDnzCR_lmSDJy3xgn8OMYFEO7&fid=0x0:0xd47f9b89a904dbe0"],"When":"2023-12-15"},{"Name":"Dr. Sanjiv Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZdOonCGhZAJ_YOzeI3QSOxfh6TiDkTr9RNIx-E0qIakRX5CRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice Indian restaurant away from congestion of surrey . Paneer Parantha n Pickles were too tasty","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOQ1osG90q93rIv33utP4cmUcoowsB7ovwA2sG&fid=0x0:0xd47f9b89a904dbe0"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Benjamin Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAzrZNvmG0L4mBSCr27Mh8B-Fpc3EO5gD2Y0eZ6giQE029QxAZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently completed a school lunch order with Apna Indian Kitchen. It was executed flawlessly, our entire order was fulfilled accurately, and the taste and quality of every dish received nothing but praise from our students. The portions were incredibly generous, leaving everyone satisfied, including us parents at home when leftovers came home.

Not only were the students impressed, but their positive feedback was echoed by the parents during our taste test with another reputable Indian restaurant.  APNA showcased the essence of Indian food culture, leading into our Diwali celebration at the school. It's evident that the exceptional service was a result of your team's hard work and dedication.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTzsPUNBWoj238qik0gUQMeAZT_Dq443akB8nl&fid=0x0:0xd47f9b89a904dbe0"],"When":"2023-11-16"},{"Name":"Nihit Malhotra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfeHWYeDGkDTZNd33AgDsCmLoJ4NSwzG1vpopgAV9OU-hgspcS7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Yesterday was our first time eating here. We ordered Jaipuri seekh kebab and Murgh Achari with garlic and basil nan. Everything was super delicious. The chicken was tender and the kebabs were also fresh and tender with an amazing flavour. The service was good and we felt welcomed. Thanks for that.

Wondering why 4 stars well I wanted to give 4.5 but that is not an option. So that 0.5 less is for the Faluda Khulfi. It was the worst I have ever eaten. The Faluda was more like maggi noodle and the kulfi was too crystallized, we didn’t even eat it. We did tell the server about it. Hope you can improve that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv5RVUX73TocZSAtUOFMsDSlasS5HzwgFmEjvl&fid=0x0:0xd47f9b89a904dbe0"],"When":"2022-6-30"},{"Name":"Aida Cowdy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYOSMyUOPMwT4wqDue1PDS2-0KlV4tjaFl0JOj2dSBgi8VQ6U8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was very good! It’s just bizarre that they put a water in their vase because they are using fake flowers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCNvJHt7te-BEOtZKTKg2mTiN74LdzDbZYYqUe&fid=0x0:0xd47f9b89a904dbe0"],"When":"2024-5-19"}]

descriptions: Easygoing Japanese restaurant with a low-key ambiance specialising in breaded meat dishes.

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Tencia Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeace69KGm2UBszQAxnK8dcE4Sn56BqMcvPDZIpuTzIfoj_awQ5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The cheese katsu really fills you up. We got the assorted, and the kids loved the fish katsu. Also got the udon but there wasn't much udon or rice, there was bigger portions of meat and cabbage. The restaurants till has shields between tables.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7mC6EJDldlh7Yk-7ev8Xp_D6fY7KCDkUHTJc-\u0026fid=0x0:0xc20f5bbd674aa840"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Knives","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3BmCiyWD_sAHTxbiJc14skmpm80Tfy4n5KfCou7jITfWLhXU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and great portion. Its big and proper. Service is so nice they go above and beyond for customers. One of Langley’s best restaurant. And the price is very fair $15+ is the average katsu set and thats with rice, soup, and salad u wont see that price often these days. I really love this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHbH69BbsH_fz6RtZZkFgY30aXQYoZsVVX1tA9\u0026fid=0x0:0xc20f5bbd674aa840"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXclLzFOZebBq0D1P6DXbTNuAdCFzeYlMZFVvgi1A5VbWvym50Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"crispy and tender katsu that melts in your mouth! the salad is also really good. the only thing is that the sauce from some dishes such as the hot plate and kimchi cheese nabe are a bit too overpowering, and then you can't enjoy the simple tenderness of the crispy katsu. service is also really helpful and attentive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0PeVF9yLzj9pg3J5kTBycdoCRMumKeZ8WjGvK\u0026fid=0x0:0xc20f5bbd674aa840"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Sj C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBC2SqHV3Cxo8riKugJaIn71DjVvNX-TRuWGuRa0SPiKlavNJv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of our favourite katsu spots in Langley! Food is always delicious with generous portion sizes. The chicken katsu is crispy and tender pairing perfectly with the house salad. The staff are incredibly friendly and attentive! Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDngFnicQxFbHW65F9bO9IOHAiNcVg8-ysdHMf\u0026fid=0x0:0xc20f5bbd674aa840"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"erin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVquEl9bL8o3vlHvd9GxA6hbaHT4vCbvygBkdFHOH5UOS-Dn1sl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"delicious!! the cabbage salad pairs excellently with the katsu ❤️ friendly service and overall great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzlJe-mzpGo79xwnm-O32PgykzwBZMN9QTC2vS\u0026fid=0x0:0xc20f5bbd674aa840"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Haleh Magnus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZGl2rvHWlqbzuuFKZ9pHQfQXwlTmRHH4ep4A1K4mjlsDM4dQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I Work by the corner of this restaurant in Have never tried it, because the food is cutlet and in my perspective, it’s not healthy. So never had tried it before. Today we decided to give it a try and I should say the food didn’t feel greasy at all it didn’t come across heavy and it was done in a very, very efficient time. We got by there at 10 after 12 and the left 10 before one which for lunch is very great time and efficient. The service was great. The food this flavours really nice. It was priced very reasonable.  if you want to try something, unique and tasty, give it a try. The food was not dry and crispiness was just perfect. The salad wasn’t heavily sauce and the rice with the right portion. It also have pickles and a really good dipping sauce and it’s come with the soup. For the price you pay I can definitely say it’s really I must try this little restaurant in downtown Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQmnkKVxdhy2mYXP0WEI230HpO8vIxJzzgEUg\u0026fid=0x0:0xc20f5bbd674aa840"],"When":"2022-11-3"},{"Name":"Patty Lawa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyJ57zaddManS-BKaF-6lD-R2YkZkW8O9B-vtES-NEKTLDRgU-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Katsu Cutlet House in Langley is one of our go to for affordable, quick and straight to the point lunch spot! We have been here about 3 times now and we have mostly ordered all of their katsu options. I would personally highly recommend their Katsu Nabe its deep fried pork loin with mushroom sauce served on a hot plate! It was delicious! I wish their menu will expand a bit more for variety, and also for the rice serving to be a bit bigger. Service is quick and friendly and prices are affordable hope they won’t increase their prices then we will for sure continue to visit this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqWvrxAB_2Ocaku7EQGe4wXL9SQaBEQdlxrooH\u0026fid=0x0:0xc20f5bbd674aa840"],"When":"2023-7-21"},{"Name":"Yuko J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr7VQRx2aC62asoeQNaw7F9TIdulsTA0Q5xzEBMCXJd7YTPMBn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yummy pork katsu.  Good service, good food.  Ask for mayo as they don't give it to you.  The katsu sauce tastes different than the store bought bottled version.  They give you a bit of spicy hot mustard on the side.  When you mix the mustard into the katsu sauce gives your pork cutlet a bit of a kick. I add mayo too.  The pork katsu was a bit thin but still crispy and good with rice they serve on the side.  Recommend this food on a cold winter day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5R6Xv4-NH8Lr_RZqn99Yu8wbS_tnqrjC1cs_W\u0026fid=0x0:0xc20f5bbd674aa840"],"When":"2023-11-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fahmi C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHIg_ju3xMWDGGrFLwAnxlZSHkY0r6bRbXyM6ZUNDQNPSwsuk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've had sushi from so many different places. Whether it's an "everyday" sushi place or a fine-dining one, this place makes some of the TASTIEST, freshest sushi I've ever had. I'm a fan of the BC roll so I ordered one, and they actually put some salmon meat in it and the skin was so flavourful and smoky. Spider roll was also amazing. Price-to-portion ratio was also really good, you will get your money's worth. Great sushi place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Empower Lifestyle and Fitness","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLMMKHtC9Wb-32IBYMw6yd61r3EbIjZXVIxMDLvLtQD4rX8OY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"♥️Absolutely the best sushi restaurant in town! 🙌🏻
I love that I can order my sushi rolls with no mayonnaise and it doesn’t come out as just a hard crab stick in the middle of my roll. Mr.Ko shreds all the crab 🦀 before he adds the mayo so I can have a healthy mayo free delicious roll!
Such a wonderful family and wonderful restaurant. Been coming here for 12 years now and hate going anywhere else!♥️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPC4Q6293nK2YHXfP0ss9vleG6c7eI4h1usyDV9&fid=0x0:0x77a06884b690fe2c"],"When":"2023-2-10"},{"Name":"M Prins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYWCMj9HZ6_2jMol4qrWBbE6l7uCmTatsMh6ch4jbiMYWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Friendly and speedy service for pick up. Great selection. Caterpillar roll and squid tempura were excellent. Beef teriyaki roll was okay. Price was reasonable - not a great deal, but as expected.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPomkOKXRhFJI2fRyK1FYCwymuBzSjr0QM-CO4&fid=0x0:0x77a06884b690fe2c"],"When":"2022-5-13"},{"Name":"John Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXL9iw7NKpQ_JWISKkzBPzDTzXRkiULSm-j5BtQ-I_VXLXf8TMNog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my go to place for sushi in murrayville, Langley. The owners have run this place for almost 10+ years and their lengthy experience truly explains why their food is so delish! Love coming here on a cold rainy day for a hot bowl of udon and some sushi. Yum.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBpv-cMTOmhMGys4sKERP6W_pbTKzXbBSukAyE&fid=0x0:0x77a06884b690fe2c"],"When":"2019-12-11"},{"Name":"Neal Kwasnicki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdmfeWyjvIsA-FVUdhGfVc5_wZYMlKhFWG6ooPP8lVbA7t40w3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delicious and very reasonably priced","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPW-dTQRi1BoHCMykUDBBiWCEzWyBJ4DyOuxH15&fid=0x0:0x77a06884b690fe2c"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Jenn Harris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOsiw07SlCE0t7Px14TCj-HtanbQXE4SK93-3Ut3vrnU7fU-8h=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Constantly good quality and good portions. I love this place. Although we typically don't enjoy sushi as take out, this place is 100% the exception.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMd0EsifWDGJeBBS0VDKasu6uJQngJnsTz0C0&fid=0x0:0x77a06884b690fe2c"],"When":"2019-4-3"},{"Name":"Cindy Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiGw3-5GHTHju0Sr6jZ_sUHXKlflBcijWQCe_L7wpuUI_Tpg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I gave this restaurant 3 stars. Everything was good except the teriyaki chicken. It tasted like the pepper skakers lid came off. All I tasted was pepper. Very bizarre for the dish. The picture shows all the black pepper left.
But the portion for the dinner box was worth the price. I hope they read this and stop putting so much pepper in the teriyaki dish.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_W-2_URug7_WO-UlEafqczArfgXyN0Edtz-IG&fid=0x0:0x77a06884b690fe2c"],"When":"2023-5-29"},{"Name":"michael loyd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYRJ1YlHGmb7QXTlVMZi55M_h-MT79S7LOI8ceRdxTXigSWB7S=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came up from Bellingham for dinner.  Really, really great food. Excellent !   Serving sizes are ginormous.  The service was great. Nice place.  Thank you.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Danielle Dang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAn7qBUq1NwIyiRNQmG_ZC3gUdAYZmX_iARhCDrycqI7aT7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We stumbled upon this spot while thrift shopping and thought we'd give it a try, especially since it saved us a drive. The place has been newly renovated, but the ambiance feels a bit empty. Service was a little off—we weren’t greeted or given menus, which made me wonder if they’re more of a takeout spot. I felt like we might have been intruding, though the staff did share a few friendly smiles.

The prices are a huge draw! They have specials like $2-3 slices of pizza and a mango lassi for just $2.50. I ordered the Chana Bhature and Chat Papdi—both were delicious, well-seasoned, and the portions were perfect! I couldn’t even get a photo before diving in—I took a bite of the Chat, and my friend took a bite of her dish (a chickpea curry, I think), because we were so excited to try. 🤣 She also picked up a slice of pizza to snack on, which was ready to go but tasted pretty average, like festival pizza.

We tried the mango lassi, which was lighter and a bit tangy compared to others I’ve had. I enjoyed it, but my friend, who’s Indian, found it bitter and not quite to her taste. At $2.50, it’s still a great deal, so no complaints there!

Overall, I’d recommend this place for its great prices and tasty Indian dishes. A solid stop if you’re in the area and want some good eats on a budget!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVysvx9_wETLG8tdduhPP23pJifz6hCY8XmlHT&fid=0x0:0xfe93e59823a4b076"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"H.S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVawwjI3jTBIIuypRD-ffWOyIXBKBmow9aZMxBrnuyi0sbPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So glad I dropped by here to get some food on my way because its right next to the bus stop. The ladies at the front were all very friendly. My chicken birriyani came out delicious and had generous portions! The inside of the place is smaller but clean. Wanted to get some samosas as well but didn't have time to wait (takes 20mins to make).

Will definitely come back to try other items!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdcthv1fNBATzppJW6waxAOyKRFP_dbB_VzplZ&fid=0x0:0xfe93e59823a4b076"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Sukhpreet Kaur Chahal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuNRKEUH-6e1tLOMRXP9yQD0Bbdrb7R0j0qARGYzV-EugEE3I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After my class, I always visit this restaurant with my friends ...and believe me guys...just love the samosa here.
Today we tried ...paneer panora....
It was soo yummmm💎🌸","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJQa2zcgRRFDpwf4ej9Y8d2mWYmmnYQlDZThd_&fid=0x0:0xfe93e59823a4b076"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Ramesh K Yadav","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUr5RlL_ZR_RqxN0l0ojgwIoTu9EaQy22NGhHVIFnlBZ47GCMd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing customer service with very delicious food. Delicious Veggie thali.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpfAizz2RNGB8r9E-aNx8RhvacJoliUZdsf3Uv&fid=0x0:0xfe93e59823a4b076"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Yawer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVj-0msOT0dLoPmQKyWsee9UCHv27jZkm1HVKoctAWYRA-i_-sGFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a great experience, it truly is a hidden gem.
I had no idea about it until I struck gold.

I have had their pizzas, samosas and chollay bhatore , and everything was as good as it was back home, bringing the homely taste here is no easy feat.

All the staff is so nice and always smiling, gives off a great vibe, loved the experience will definitely go there again.

Recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmMQzASyNP9pRSeqJGiCD5gqbczXtY8sBJnh29&fid=0x0:0xfe93e59823a4b076"],"When":"2022-10-16"},{"Name":"Melissa Vogt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTdUQKEouIZgWQ_bi9deV7V4kudPGmF20u8n34UEdDQql4IQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the sweets and food here, i would get ladoo and samosas, very good prices. I used to come here regularly 2021 and 2022 on my way home from work via bus but then they closed no note on the door for when they would be opening again. Are they open again now? I would love to come by and start supporting this business regularly again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tanya Zee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXP8WzKrR4HiHUmnx-EjY1haqbxw-lbtwBK6ZNRh4rNEi4SkU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They advertise their sweets but my daughter and I just tried the veggie samosas to go. They baked them fresh and we’re ready in 10 minites. Absolutely delicious and only $1.99 each!  It’s small, and has a some tables to eat in, too. The staff was so friendly, we will be back to try the main dishes soon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqry0mt-JOKo4bZcT_ocPwp1TMRpQKg_YNnlVC9HGdY1rIvOCg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't think of any other place in Downtown Langley that offers the best service at such a great price. This is the only restaurant I have seen where you don't have to wait for samosas. They usually make some quantity of samosas and you can pick instantly","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Large, generous portions of Chinese food for the affordable price paid. They have lots of lunch specials for about ten dollars and some all day combos for around fifteen dollars. The taste however is quite average. We tried the honey garlic spareribs and they were a bit over fried such that they were crispy and chewy like jerky instead of being juicy and tender. The Wonton Noodle soup was good. The wor wonton noodle soup had a lot going on and is good if you want to get all your veggies and meat in one meal. You will get full here but the food is not gourmet or anything.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNV9WOtZ9DBLUX0pGs5TEuIpD9lxJkZMctsArLD&fid=0x0:0x7e82c39fdf5cf48"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Kurt H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUt9qqhyt7x-jjOyVi604n61SWqhZ8ogdUsO9ck6kcQtyfZFXAG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very Friendly and quick Delivery! Foods Canadian Chinese style and honestly the best we have found in Langley in 7 years.  Great pricing makes it so you get full and have leftovers that are pretty good! Def will be back. (Delivery driver was great to!)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSJuX9ps2aE8z4q22GgTGooC5zmyresR4byL_s&fid=0x0:0x7e82c39fdf5cf48"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Keisha Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWSBkJW7RrFGbKL6C60hxkSANvnbpvY9YnumLH9HrdDpLQ8AE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Where else can you get lunch for less than $10? It's cheaper to get food here than McDonald's! Friendly servers, huge servings, and fast service. I was in and out of the restaurant in 10 minutes. The picture below is their fried rice with sweet and sour pork for $10. Food is average, nothing spectacular but I will come back because it's cheap and the generous serving.

Location is old, no fuss, old school style where they wrote the menu on the board with a sharpie. I don't think I'll enjoy dining in, I'll always pick up. I also ordered their wor wanton soup--they have the best one!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPA3WFk9nTT5kDFzUC-DsD2WgOgi-2J7TNPuNc&fid=0x0:0x7e82c39fdf5cf48"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"B W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJp85P5JohieEKJOfTMzyjH1aTNit_eIhBL3dFVyxf0xS2BxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The Missus and I had lunch along with a sister and husband. You feel the vibes of an old local restaurant upon entering. The taste of the food was mediocre at best and wasn’t inviting for a return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPT9SeS5kVNrmcZLBcIhuCleFQ3OnXHzoq5FqH5&fid=0x0:0x7e82c39fdf5cf48"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"chalene jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXq6JiwCKX40r4ov0G96rJpeyicQvEj-b_Yzw5wshwztIKHyPM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best wor wonton must try !  Also there dry, Garlic, boneless pork as well been coming here for years was my dad’s favourite place before he passed ❤️‍🔥","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZ3A3U1JK04UJCXdltC_4HEET8JPOdQTRxf1Sp&fid=0x0:0x7e82c39fdf5cf48"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"J Q","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWLFaR2htiLNLIQAXB2-FbuNystyoB794RiAm0Uo82lJgg8OdK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Old local restaurant!
Interior is really old but still looks clean.
Foods are great, not too oily or salty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZyxdWpHtRHopaiGvZg_nz1xIj1n8PrkBUdmXX&fid=0x0:0x7e82c39fdf5cf48"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"8T8","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaHAe29LTwj-kDB4Rxp2LPyCtNn-xUw5U4xwT2905ny-JNkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow, love it love it love it.  I took the no. 1 house special wonton noodle soup.  It was not just wonton.  So many pleasant surprises inside.  The broth is very light and perfect.  Looks like I've found my next favorite place.   Restaurant is small and basic, that's all you really need.  Staff friendly and looks like a lot of regular customers frequent here.

Been returning a lot of times now.  I crave for the simple taste, ingredients are always fresh and the veggies cooked to perfection.  Still, go for the house special wonton noodle soup.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCQyxU9ekdXqNIRzPPyzjds8D2mV3_F4n3_XCm&fid=0x0:0x7e82c39fdf5cf48"],"When":"2023-12-7"},{"Name":"Willy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX7Gy9VNYbJCuQnyA84VmUWYab-LehPcYtkEkN0waXc47uIcaRLg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dont expect the best chinese food you ever tasted due to high reviews. However, expect best price for VALUE! Went during lunch and got giant plate of food for 8.95.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPstDly9IYnOm9npibGKSgaEYP9xTjkecpflvpx&fid=0x0:0x7e82c39fdf5cf48"],"When":"2024-7-28"}]

title: Luxe Chinese Seafood Restaurant
descriptions: Chinese seafood dishes & other classic fare including dim sum, served in a storefront dining room.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Grant M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRWL_i5cZiVpXExK1H8xMkwx4_6CHC_xRkP2HoYZIVJehiW1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in for Lunch with a group of 10 of us on Sunday. Service was excellent and we basically ordered the Kitchen Sink for the table.

Everything that we had was simply amazing, and all the Dim Sum was outstanding.

The wrapped Sticky Rice was very good, and so was the Deep Fried Spicy Squid.

If you're ever in the Langley area definitely don't hesitate to stop in for some amazing food.

We had a reservation for 11am and I would highly recommend that everyone do the same, as the tables were all full while we were there for the two and a half hours that we were all there for. And plenty of people were waiting to be seated when we were leaving...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNz7Uing-v9A4t-NVYZwLqWAks8G1hgyfr7usnV&fid=0x0:0xf025f09fef8ccf99"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Marnie Eudela-Umlas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg_gVRD_Hd9V3XIUh6_P71KHCryea9xsHYGqrZHTuXW_jdxEU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time here because we’re in the area. The food was awesome and did not disappoint. We had Salted Fish Fried Rice, Chinese Broccoli, Chicken Wings and Deep Fried Squid. So yummy and their service was fast and all hospitable. They also gave free dessert and fortune cookies. Not only that they packed our leftovers unlike other Chinese restos were you had to pack on your own :) Now we have a Chinese go to in Langley :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXbAFNE5EW9x2PMPYrKwOPioE0KpR-ZCBNnFe_&fid=0x0:0xf025f09fef8ccf99"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Kaylee Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrnelwesLWszVvjanLNlsfSIxKVIQPnh9SEyYTfIQJ3XkS9yt8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time trying this dim sum spot in Langley. The prices are comparable to other places we've been ($20-$25/ person), but the food quality is just okay. Our top picks were the shu mai, chicken feet, and rice rolls (we preferred the plain ones over the beef-filled). The service was efficient and friendly, likely due to the smaller size of the restaurant. Overall, I’d rate it a 7/10.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxeybXs-DtTfeYkdgLXpQEmvV8nIaYIbFC5YTn&fid=0x0:0xf025f09fef8ccf99"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Andre Jr Tache","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTr9Og2XxSKdpJ4we7DyLTZxqinbbHVcX993WJKMgDvzRwQpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you love prawns like me, I highly recommend their sautéed prawns. Not greasy at all unlike typical Chinese foods. Just perfect amount of reasonings for me. The seafood fried rice is also delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm5RdLTHosYuVdvorsdwRfG20WgSghHgIBYSHy&fid=0x0:0xf025f09fef8ccf99"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"J C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9moUz718_Czx-EoJfqOxPFnCqSD2qipPlB5XAYJyXR0_KI8Bj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Expensive and portions were small.
Fruit fries kept landing on our table. Unpleasant& unsanitary
At 2:30 they turn off the hall music and servers disappeared even though you are just seated and ordered.
If they are going to shut  the restaurant down at 2:30pm, i don’t understand why they even seat us 2:15pm.

Price was too expensive for the quality and quantity.
One small pan fried rice roll dish( 8-10 pieces withe very little veggie ( 5? 10 bean spruces) no flavour) is $16 plus tax !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMIWkS5_dRJuSVEKKDXFgQxezp6skw1mpxD14L&fid=0x0:0xf025f09fef8ccf99"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Stephanie Southern","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJy_HnS391vB2FxV_dCZYH7EIBxy7l-b_tuqoGcLGvtkwxQx-2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Luxe is one of the only (if not the only) places to find authentic Cantonese style Chinese food. Prices are high but the food is absolutely worth it. Growing up with a Chinese mother I had the privilege to eat at some great Chinese restaurants in Richmond and Vancouver and the Luxe is the only place in the area that compares to those restaurants.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhXW9n9HmdbK0SowMYvHL8nvNmlK8z3RSLtokU&fid=0x0:0xf025f09fef8ccf99"],"When":"2024-2-23"},{"Name":"kristalynnmcc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQeIDPi2Hja0NIoIW4zWtFLrr1wDCr58rxxOUlonTAf_SIxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was a great experience for Dim Sum in the lower mainland. Unfortunately they do not offer a cart service which is what we were looking for but the small plates were great as well. The food was delicious and fresh - it came so quickly. It is on the pricier side but it's worth the price. For three of us it was about $90 but we did order quite a few things. We ordered lots of dumplings, some fried eggplant, bbq pork rolls, sesame balls with lotus root which were amazing! And egg tarts for an end of meal treat. I loved their pork and shrimp dumplings and pork soup dumplings. Can't wait to go back and try more of the options next time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAMbY-ZZzAUckf21N0AmXd4UY0hNnhT6l9J9lMME3FnjY23Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered takeout for Sunday dinner, and every dish was delicious! The flavors were well-balanced, but the portion seemed not enough for the price. While it was a bit on the pricier side, the quality of the food made it worth it.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"B W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJp85P5JohieEKJOfTMzyjH1aTNit_eIhBL3dFVyxf0xS2BxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Missus and I along with sister & brother in-laws had brunch at the Sidebar Grill.  The restaurant was clean, received great table service, food was delicious and reasonable prices.  We had the fish & chips, Valley Breakfast, Meat Lovers Breakfast Bowl and the Mediterranean Lamb Burger.  The Missus has revisited for other occasions with acquaintances and gives Sidebar Grill the thumbs up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuZwS_v9WWkzNBvnJhY1_H1aPDCkSvpUREm99_&fid=0x0:0xacc21ee30ee27517"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Youstina Shehata","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzsTGVeU4-cUZZ1vushC5E3sYZe1CPneelgW4NyvHbbl4BPy0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited the SideBar grill with family and was thoroughly impressed. The buttermilk chicken and waffles were a standout – crispy chicken and perfectly fluffy yet crisp waffles with the right amount of sweetness.

The smoked salmon delight was another highlight, featuring a generous portion of salmon paired with flavorful cream cheese. The strawberry banana French toast, while good, felt more like regular toast and could have used a bit more egg to achieve that perfect French toast texture.

The ambiance, drinks, and service were all excellent. Highly recommend! Looking forward to trying the rest of their menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0GlXqh--ixZRO2ae4K5NoA6Q1IJbAKTzjrkGC&fid=0x0:0xacc21ee30ee27517"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Space Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOMK-3hBgreRBsc6bcZBxDEygFrkfm7M6r7DFXN3LY4r8BiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I have taken my family here a few times now and it has become our favourite restaurant in Langley. We have also done date night here and thoroughly enjoyed it. This time I had the ahi tuna burger and I was surprised at how much tuna I actually got. My server recommended the hot honey fries and I would highly recommend these to everyone.

I find that the prices are very reasonable for a family for lunch and dinner. The portions are a great size and the staff are amazing. And for a night out, they have some really fun drinks and the best old fashioned around.

They have lots of seating indoors and a large patio. My only negative would be the hard seats on the patio. They don’t encourage you to stay. Maybe some cushions would help.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlYr1sw7Oblmc8mSLG_y3Hl8-Db64M8Si4azWK&fid=0x0:0xacc21ee30ee27517"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Dwayne Guzak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJaeXUCsWogbI98tALSvw3TcJMEZkzXrvwQmAD2akhoRrCZiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Thought I would check this place out for our anniversary , try some fancy drinks and some food. When I booked it there was an option for a “special occasion “ and I clicked anniversary, but it was irrelevant. Nothing happened and no little dessert or acknowledgment to celebrate like other establishments I have been to in the past have done .

This place is really great , I enjoyed the setting and ambience and when the drinks came out they were amazingly delicious. 10/10

I must say this place had the best chicken sandwich I probably ever had my wife loved the vegetarian tacos

I would definitely recommend this place to friends and family but not if your going to celebrate a special occasion","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHrh49Wt--JPY5YJSL8nc3xG2DgroLeL9FQxKV&fid=0x0:0xacc21ee30ee27517"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Camilia Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWigkoqaNhHJinW1sDEWmiP5-QkCbLl16QFp5xZiy1DDMYI0dmUuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here with some friends and had a great time. Parked in the underground parking. It was not busy on a Saturday and we sat there for a long time without ordering cause we were waiting for our friend. The staff was very patient and accommodating for us. I ordered the Ahi Tuna Burger which was so good! As well as the spiced honey fries. Everything was very tasty. It’s a similar vibe to Cactus on its newer and cleaner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDzKaFmLtZfoFQ0W4HztV9YC3B6xoq4d72Dn5l&fid=0x0:0xacc21ee30ee27517"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Sarah H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1aCuZ1iTSalemEsIpXEd83G27AU4vIx7ChdMHOmdUfiPS8m0z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for the first time with some friends last night and had such a fantastic experience. The service was incredible from the manager, Jackie and our server Sarah.

Jackie chatted with us, checked in on us through the evening and made us his signature new cocktail to try. Sarah was also friendly and attentive through the night.

Decor is nice and we enjoyed the happy hour selection, especially the cornbread. Will be returning!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-0drpvQTo584Nblp8T4FaZzVH7FpaShFnh16Q&fid=0x0:0xacc21ee30ee27517"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Jeffrey Norgren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIk09aoTobt2Wh_hTk4z-4ztvVcxUyc8x1oxXPSH0V_8UfxwZY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first visit to SideBar and let me tell you… the service was PHENOMENAL!! Lauren London was my server and she couldn’t have been better! My water was always full, she checked in multiple times to make sure I had everything and that everything was tasting good. 10/10 service experience!

I had the chicken strips - and I’m not 100% certain if they are breaded in house, but either way, they were fantastic!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUThb74oQYm5t7ZqESbjJyxUmXSVm_skNMJKz7&fid=0x0:0xacc21ee30ee27517"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Sunny Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_Q9wwy8e1zmBkXce8UKHNDQ_RTLDIHp8PdamMTHl3h8GtqNXv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is absolutely amazing!! Such good vibes and the food and drinks are top notch 👌 Jacky and Marissa were so great and made sure that everything was perfect and well taken care of. Definitely will be coming back to try their other dishes and drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRuwVl2xdkPvetLQdsdkk5151InqZhjx3SciPh&fid=0x0:0xacc21ee30ee27517"],"When":"2024-9-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sunny Yerra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwX9GsGvRD4Rmzpnxnt1YRL-Eg5T-wGNmWnsfNs3vgSTgJL4bc9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"As someone with dairy and egg allergies, brunch can be a real struggle—especially since it’s my favorite cuisine. I miss having eggs and fried chicken, so I was pleasantly surprised to find specific vegan options here. The vegan egg was a solid substitute; while not exactly like the real thing, it was impressively close. The vegan sausage was decent, though it would be great if they offered dairy- and egg-free chicken sausage as well. The smash potatoes were my favorite, though next time I’ll remember to request them extra crispy.

The place was packed on a Sunday morning, but we were fortunate to snag a table as one opened up. With the rush, I hesitated to ask if items like the chicken sandwich could be made dairy- and egg-free or if the buns contained any allergens. Ideally, I would still like to enjoy chicken, bacon and some sandwiches if they can be made egg and dairy free. Might be wiser of me to call ahead next time. For anyone without dietary restrictions, the menu is an absolute treat, with plenty of mouth-watering options to choose from.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxR2IJYsTiMg99iExxUEDcPq9Yc5Po6MQTyveL&fid=0x0:0x145c8f4a8245af3a"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"pranav malhotra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSL5eeGcXR0Jz-YBh5IzstngyuiPHOiOg7aMPejaDXK3jwMy1bDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A very inviting and attractive place with fantastic food and beverages. It’s smart to have a full service bar seating that saved us wait time. The food was delicious. The omelette was filling and the pancake was savoury. The Benny’s eggs were inconsistent though. But, everything arrived cold and the service did not have any follow ups. The staff rushed us a couple of times as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvIN8Q7KX50PpjyhDLJWdyqCjv-wMLl_7BCppo&fid=0x0:0x145c8f4a8245af3a"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Chantal Bonnes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWr3RgJXrnA8Dw6L5LTg3myMJrgsQNHzxENkXXIQdK39anB0vEo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time at The Hard Bean Brunch Co. It was a great experience. My partner and I both got the same Mimosa Flights. Our favourites were the “Pogmosa” and the “Watermelon Sugar High”. As well as both got the Yorkshire Benny for food. The Benny was super good. For dessert we got the seasonal Pumpkin Cheesecake which was so delicious. Atmosphere was very nice as well. Would recommend it all. Will come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEWBQeJnrsk2mJeHriEHffbzGX4zxGljDkPEpg&fid=0x0:0x145c8f4a8245af3a"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Faith S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCrwZ311OzU1ncaoai9ZyVSP2gRJQPryRIbbSGJx16cP_YSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious food and friendly staff. I ordered the Yorkshire Benny (delicious!), however, my husband ordered the breakfast mac and cheese and was quite underwhelmed. The mac and cheese looked like (and tasted like) it was from out of a box, which was a disappointment when the dish was nearly $20. We expected better with that price. While some of the dishes are quite amazing, there are others that fall short and feel like a bit of a rip off.

Nonetheless, friendly staff and a nice atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZQu-CRQgJcFNWtp0tzHOgh9cCCdfyohxSrCG0&fid=0x0:0x145c8f4a8245af3a"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"x","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhmJKDr7DJ4CGvY4IhEGbbWGqO-ap4CiO1rDd-9zbUBZo3Dg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am a frequent visitor! Great service and great vibes all the time no matter what time I come! I’ve been here for brunch, lunch, happy hour and dinner! Amazing! The food is always on point and drinks are tasty! My fave has to be the pesto linguine! Their egg Bennys are also really good! I’ve had take out as well and the quality was still great. This is my go to restaurant in this area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzDxJQjf_atebMmoAEOTb-zHg_SvgRU6InHIMT&fid=0x0:0x145c8f4a8245af3a"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Trevor Ball","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0frHcSKEK2V-1uRZ1eE2LEFeXrCisGR32zw3WNqrTc1SQtIjS_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"honestly, pretty cool place, great atmosphere, great staff that are super friendly, lots of tattoos everywhere which is a big plus in my books...

The wait time wasn't even that bad, maximum 10 minutes even though it was pretty busy there.

They made me an affogato and it was pretty good. The food was excellent, and the cool cucumber salad is a go to for me now but honestly the menu is pretty fantastic with the choices of food.

has Terminator would say it.... I'LL BE BACK!

xoxo","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNl1LQ3SwH17n4vRm_6Gp4PlKcLy8HAmi3u7_dH&fid=0x0:0x145c8f4a8245af3a"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Anita Gaspar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQhWu67odWrQpaTFt7CgkA-_U6dvp0np3tAyYxfxLKPQnBxDnO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chelsea was a delightful waitress and so very attentive.  Super cheerful and helpful.
Finding such top notch service along with great food is hard to come by these days.  We will definitely be back for more great times and delicious 😋 food.  Thanks again for accommodating our dog!

Cheers 🍻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOexatZPm_ZSOp8Cd9yjwGaSSl3CEMI4-et2i0D&fid=0x0:0x145c8f4a8245af3a"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Fredrick Zoller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL01F2QlXvuCUnZwPCtofa0r29cQHvBmtrY6v5OjsG39ImLPw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best places for brunch!  Everything I’ve had here was amazing. The Yorkshire Benny is amazing, especially with the ham. The mimosa flights are also really good. Can’t wait to go back!

The outdoor patio is also dog friendly","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIpNF-xLH3pc1AvPYEwmTDmTjcoS83RLwdjQvb&fid=0x0:0x145c8f4a8245af3a"],"When":"2024-7-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Evan Northway","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL6ziVJpLyxdRklZ1N5zk_c2kHezlvCaEPFz4BD2TfQ6zJIvcM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Some of the best tacos I've had EVER. The guy who made our food is very good at his job and knows how to cook. Very good and will be coming back to try more options. I ordered the Gochujang Tacos and fries.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGiZG9Rmo1mTkE12aW6uc3x7s-l43Br7Qj27VQ&fid=0x0:0x5daaf82e14c640a8"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Attila Szamoskozi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2AAt3w8V6vnjRCqXfUE0xqvAqQuLl4Zs8C3rG6vUvIyME7FzU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My son and I had the Gochuchang Chicken Burritos with the Poutine fries combo tonight.  Delicious!  Ingredients were fresh with nice variation in texture.  The chicken was fried and crunchy with plenty of veggies cheese and rice.  Portion was size was good.  Prices were fair I think for what you get with regards to quality and portion size.  Be aware the Gochuchang sauce is quite spicy, but we loved it!   Service was very friendly and helpful, with good suggestions for us first timers.  Would definitely come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNl7NRAQAR6fJxP6YKKZblaOb28TBfB-ZvauvZa&fid=0x0:0x5daaf82e14c640a8"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Arteris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX30Dyu-QK7wHTj3eMSizkcuOLMJe3eY1W7TqusQxucea24_Ur2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a craving for Coconut Shrimp that could not be ignored. And after googling options for the Langley area I decided to try strEATS for the first time.

And let me tell you I was not disappointed at all. The coconut shrimp was perfect. Hit the exact itch I wanted to scratch and the Baja Fish Burrito I had with it wasn't super heavy or dense in the stomach while still being full of goodness and flavor.

Being able to wash it all down with a nice and cold Corona rounded the entire experience out. The staff were great and the location was very clean. I'll definitely be coming back again and recommending it to my friends.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cindy, CM Gan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwjkEy2R3SrN-ZWmN_JNrc8_mQxrR31avZlGYUkam1BC75jxY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delightful food : tried the Gochujang chicken bowl (my friend has her gluten free)
Service was great; especially this young server Brath (hopefully I got it right) who took time to explain gluten free options.

Lots of options to choose: added bonuses","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPp3lVnLib4mkt0y5AX3QHzlKx6-xRzUDWSTw&fid=0x0:0x5daaf82e14c640a8"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7RFvJkc5TcTHI1CNno7mWtnoVe5RPMM3SAlN-mtpAjXJnlFWX5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had peri peri chicken taco. Delicious sauce. Service was pretty quick and place is very clean. Harman was pretty awesome and very knowledgeable about menu. She also recommend best taco.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8of84kg8EiS4aY-Zr8zcg-8lKuY7Fnj8Qt9xN&fid=0x0:0x5daaf82e14c640a8"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Logan Dowie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBcQbhdTBWzPCaNK4V7L5zAUrb6ICXwA8YMYjEynp19ZBQcR5Y9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite places to eat. Out of all the streets locations, I’m convinced this one is the best. I always get the fish tacos and poutine combo.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPo1WQ67dyxjyZOTgagVJjCN9KFKY2BMsXoy4WO&fid=0x0:0x5daaf82e14c640a8"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Dr. Bill Hamilton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOOpO9U9EzDoHRU2ntsJ3YvH2FgT_9bEBTcuuF2Mt7K8ipCrna=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Three of our family ate here tonight. The food is consistently fresh, incredibly tasty, and so, so good! Tonight was no exception. The gentleman who took our order (Prab) and brought the food out was incredibly helpful and kind. And the burritos? Amazing! A great, great place to grab healthy, amazing good eats!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maryam BG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYOocnrrI0wz1xy1UzzrfX002uyW86PfiNNhxdXyfBusTbUhlS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered the fish burrito (Baja fish) as it was mentioned as the most popular item on the menu for the burrito by the front counter girl. It's definitely packed with flavour and creamy citrus hints in every bite. The coleslaw and tomatoes add lightness and texture, I just wish there was more fish in the wrap. Overall I think the price of 12$ for this burrito is spot on.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUZHjy-6t7ftn8fuAiNRU0_FpfeAtbe_JwuTbI&fid=0x0:0x5daaf82e14c640a8"],"When":"2023-9-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Roman Diulin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9wcwcJdQkG1bILW4K-Mu2hlRSdhs0Y3sjWuZrazejdWWJ4V0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited this place and was pleasantly surprised. The first thing that stands out is the friendly staff and the calm, cozy atmosphere that immediately makes you feel comfortable. We ordered breakfast: a bacon omelet and avocado toast. The omelet was juicy, although there was a bit more onion than expected. Unfortunately, the coffee selection was disappointing—only drip coffee is available, which doesn’t quite match the overall quality of the place. However, the ambiance and quick service make up for this shortcoming. The photo spots were also a nice touch, adding a special charm to the venue. If you're looking for a place for a quick and tasty breakfast, I recommend it. Our order was ready in just 10 minutes, which is very convenient for a morning meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMc47RN2YtXwlAwC-3RKveT2Z1W_1QX0IEL3bVO&fid=0x0:0xb8a9148fd201069e"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Tosh Reviews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIdmCEA6wFT3uk0g8rg0LilYkyyaWyf_o2WUOJ9NozdZG8Hg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Couldn’t believe this is a Moxie’s. Luxurious interior design with the appeal of a high class establishment, modern menu with trendy options, and a refined atmosphere the moment you walk in. Spectacular service from our server Jailyn. She went above and beyond for our table. Simply the best Moxie’s on the west coast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2bjT87UHYRIxbKq_UfCkhUepPTuPzrkwWPQW7&fid=0x0:0xb8a9148fd201069e"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"kenzie st.dennis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3IiK1JusZPNKOpAMznki3eR_elaK-RRfgSQNlRxvOGezdu57o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came in for date night with a GC from a previous Moxie's experience in Kamloops, and I must say, the visit did redeem the Moxies name in our minds.

I ordered a virgin ceaser (not pictured) that was good but quite warchestire-y. The rim seasoning was delicious, and the little snack stick was quite hearty compared to other places.

The virgin ceaser, poke bowl, and lettuce wraps (lettuce wraps were an appy menu item) was over $50 before tip. (I believe it was low to mid $60 range.)

Lettuce wraps - the chicken was good, nice, and saucy. Personally, I'm not a fan of cucumbers, so I just kicked those to the side. Thoroughly enjoyed that it was ice berg lettuce vs. romaine hearts, etc. The mayo sauce was also delicious!

My boyfriend ordered the Poke Bowl and said it could have for sure used some more fish and rice for what we paid for it. Wasn't a fan of the mushrooms as they were an odd texture. (Just kicked those to the side) Fresh avocado and eggs were done just how he likes them!

Service was good. Our waitress was friendly and hosted a conversation well. She answered all of our questions and triple checked our concerns with the ingredients list. (Severe dairy allergy)

The atmosphere was loud even tho we were tucked into a cozy corner, it was just loud. No real complaint as it is christmas party season and get together season!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMA-uWgBl2yRy-pngLAQgn3qKbk470gPyAIW-xD&fid=0x0:0xb8a9148fd201069e"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Rain322","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfhgisVz8guNZIE90tmDxeLuww3GLtbkL2J-6XXES04KcJHiFyNA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My Moxie's dinner experience tonight was a pleasant experience.

The food was really good. I went for the tried and true chicken alfredo, the Tropic Thunder mocktail, and the churro ice cream sandwich. They did not disappoint. I was pleasantly surprised with the texture of both the churro and ice cream together.

Jailyn was a gem! She provided some much appreciated help when we were looking through the menu. It felt less like we were waiter and customer, and like we were acquaintances!

We came in during the late night happy hour. The atmosphere in the restaurant really felt 'happy.' It was nice to sit and take in the decor, the happy chatter in the background, and the music choice.

All in all, I enjoyed my time and I will definitely be recommending this place to my friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6L5FsvBOVj0k5gGjVycMhDlZzd50qqnioP-SZ&fid=0x0:0xb8a9148fd201069e"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Marina Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZww_IgxoPGCPaRASjapp5LeyML7Y2ebsuU4hz9Ea-2zwM7A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely 5 stars for this moxies!  Olivia D was such an amazing server! My kids wanted to leave her a review as it’s well deserved! She is kind and generous! A great server! What fantastic food as well! We eat Moxie’s very often and we were extremely impressed with the quality and taste! Sooo good! We will be back as we are staying at the hotel and if the food and service is this good we don’t really need to go anywhere else! Five stars for sure!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlH1N8xqvSqFiHiy8iHEPlvX5mgyAPIySqfBEq&fid=0x0:0xb8a9148fd201069e"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s about as solid a 4-star establishment as you can get.

Service was friendly although at one point it seems they forgot a part of our order and we had to track them down through another waiter because they were nowhere to be found.

The food is ok/decent for this type of restaurant but a bit on the expensive side. $27 for a plate of nachos and $7 EXTRA for less than a cup (ie 250mL) of ground beef is a bit over the top. Another $3.50 for guacamole and we’re already at almost $40.

Mind you, they have many other things on the menu and no one said we HAD to get nachos. Also, high prices seem to be a Langley thing so what can you do.

The churro ice cream was really good and apparently they sell out of them so get them while you can (summer menu only).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOr3mvygY42wKgUZGlPqTtzz_40tK_LNCZZ0Nxd&fid=0x0:0xb8a9148fd201069e"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"J P Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVv-TZdheQ2KRgbv66PStcV7Bg2Aya6_K0c9TCrcSOX10hChF3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of the best restaurant in langley, they had humongous parking and seating area , food was mouth watering , we ordered kids meal and salads and Thai curry","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMadliHHxHefF_dYhl7C6l5GHvCOByTrExy48CG&fid=0x0:0xb8a9148fd201069e"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Annie Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnF8azbT8Lerz2gXJ6ATYREN60SCkJK_VFirXjkFbp6F4f70AJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our second annual Christmas luncheon.  We were a group of 22 women who went there for lunch. Everything from service, decor, arrangement was superb.  The food presentation was great and very tasty.  The service was excellent.  We will definitely return next year.  Thank you.  Annie","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSBXqsHDqHTQinbpu81IruTTvGM6-KpZ0pKmSx&fid=0x0:0xb8a9148fd201069e"],"When":"2024-12-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"scott Meaker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5VUhGdxkMXYX4iYr08Js8CTZEf_weyb2Rz41bOhmqztYmhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazingly fresh and delicious food! Lots of variety and incredible service. Plenty of spicy and non spicy dishes. Lots of fresh fruits and salads. Flaky, beautiful rice. Beautiful restaurant, could not have been better! My two sons and I went and loved it, and we are extremely picky about Indian food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7sXyMnt4DqOAhotuKG2Wb6ASnuh4sHWXuIOKU&fid=0x0:0x84ab0635ea22a8b4"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Ritika Taneja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0HNAqLaWKhHgkSFVq6yJKFz5k5tMGB377eM-hS0pBO8WrYQHcVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the lunch buffet. So cost effective and good variety. Weekends is pretty good compared to weekdays. Also, gratuity for 6 people and above!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOp_fLC5l8DrJesoIX7hUd2DImKtMzlAWZLWwWA&fid=0x0:0x84ab0635ea22a8b4"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"S Salil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHLEz5i6JHhYd1TSfmOhILHvAbA35-zO0yP4VKH163dIaYQCYW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried the non-veg thali and non-veg appetizer platter : food was good, service was great! Ambience is awesome. They have an outdoor seating area too. We went in late, after 10 pm and staff were still full of energy and service was good. We were attended by Simrat and she made the dine-in experience awesome! She even stopped by while we were waiting to let us know that the platter is taking time and will be served in next 7-8 minutes.
Will definitely visit again to try other recommended dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDdLPAFVTBsTzXtzuVFX0fQvQZDDHe2HeQX8Ea&fid=0x0:0x84ab0635ea22a8b4"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"harwinder singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFAdSF8NwMBI1oFViUDq1o7caoRayCWphbi12dB_Tcww11Eo_88w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time visited them. It was a great experience overall. Everything was on point whether it’s quality of food, hygiene and cleanliness, or customer service etc.
Highly recommended for families to have quality time meals, dinner especially.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaZlO_NKTSqDX2JMtGA4WcidcxfT5X7fSyeO_J&fid=0x0:0x84ab0635ea22a8b4"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have a lunch buffet from 11am to 2:30pm and it was $18.99 on the weekend which was totally worth it! The variety of foods offered was pretty vast for the price. Of note, the rice pudding was absolutely amazing! It tasted so fresh and creamy and not too sweet, I ate 3 little dishes of it! The naan included in the buffet was also delicious, fresh, and soft. Other highlights were the goat curry with rich bone marrow pieces and the ayce ice cream the server brings you. They have mango, strawberry, chocolate, and vanilla ice cream. The mango and vanilla ice cream we tried tasted good quality and was delicious.

The buffet had lots of food diversity including butter chicken, paneer, fish, vegetarian curries, noodles, chicken strips, pancakes, sausages, scrambled eggs, idli, tomato soup, chicken noodle soup, chicken nuggets, fries, fruits, salads, spring rolls, gulab jamun, snacks, and a chaat bar with pani puri and more.

We really enjoyed the buffet lunch here and it was tons of fun being able to try different dishes to find what you like for a fixed price which included naan and dessert.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpLs5adFz9NyI5iGTyoE-bxXRd5zo1eq_lDxUF&fid=0x0:0x84ab0635ea22a8b4"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Galaxy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2SAi8C8-sgv273rJCEAb7O5a4ePaNVM1avULjSFd14coppaA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited this place with my friend to celebrate her birthday and I ordered butter chicken. Personally, I asked to server that I want to changed chicken breast to thigh. Ekta was super nice and she was very kind to us. She accommodated all our requests. She is the best server at this restaurant. I am willing to visit this place again 🎵","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKNGJ6m9pRSedwVc4QZHgrAdKoFJEagB3wmoGW&fid=0x0:0x84ab0635ea22a8b4"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Wendell Mattos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrdluT8DLEPHBz4v-EfZpNbrNkl9OkjhUbWZovY8Wfcpx3BNmZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was greeted pleasantly and seated quickly. Ekta took our order and took care of us by making suggestions. All the food was GREAT! Great flavor and made fresh with minimal waiting time. Ekta was very pleasant. Definitely coming back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOv1QMOPNnFCYOZ6aOIzGYdF_a8XcBQ3mCNqslT&fid=0x0:0x84ab0635ea22a8b4"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Amit Dhiman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZMi5QPR24o6z6CzJ-Wh99g0_xF8N8jfPKdwKAwepinYGGAN-4EQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent service!! Ekta was professional, polite and very friendly. 10 out of 10. Consider her for your next serve.

Also, The Bar Grill's cocktails are a vibrant highlight, masterfully crafted and bursting with flavours in every sip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYRg-jmX5YeKHMZm_CM8wYFTlSVCkcGVi5m8dg&fid=0x0:0x84ab0635ea22a8b4"],"When":"2024-9-5"}]
