user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amy Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjXHHF3vPFKXXTvrLI9L9GLLX-x9A-g0rYHpm8C9R04tRthXY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Modern but cozy dinning room. Reasonable pricing that was at least 10% cheaper than Vancouver/ Richmond. Overall great dining experience

Room for improvement:
Servers could be more attentive as we often had to wave them over to get more tea.

Would Recommend the salad with ginger sauce","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2o1he9NOagZCPuyg9fPmeHWTzs4zOkKVwjJKk&fid=0x0:0xaa87de9b4f0b826d"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Russ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXx2YszxoSLymT99LyleLNEENIKqP9MmFQ5MbM6PHvvpLXivdOr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food. Great service. Generous portions. Will definitely be back to try other things on the menu. Highly recommend this new place. My new favorite Sushi restaurant in Langley by a landslide.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8Qzf2FDyWraKktW_mYPpelSPTgwV1nDR7QVBT&fid=0x0:0xaa87de9b4f0b826d"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Jessica Greville","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi1HmvfZo6ZEH-pJLpLVVhH1StEVSZjyscQoBq0jggNNlGwyJW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kai langley at Latimer Village is becoming our favorite Japanese spot. The restaurant is very spacious and we like the minimal decor. The dishes are all lovingly prepared and the small touches of arranged flower sashimi or shredded beets and daikon make for a nice presentation. We are huge fans of the Spicy Chirashi - Korean inspired seafood salad with rice and an incredible spicy umami dressing. It's served in a massive salad bowl,  great for sharing with a few friends! The dinner sets are also delicious, and such good value. The seafood salad is also delicious,  perfect for a solo entree. The only "miss" would be the chicken karagge according to our teen son (a self proclaimed connessieur) as the pieces of chicken are cut like fish and chips, and not as crispy and bite sized as expected.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8isku-UjRjMkJurnO3v5r02RORGmhujwUeBb1&fid=0x0:0xaa87de9b4f0b826d"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Laur Missy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULX_R-ECCOPi2MFWqqpF8vFhJUId8FgF-hsJniKlBjWklfCaye=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The sushi here is AMAZING.

However their chicken teriyaki is subpar.
I really hope they change the onions to sprouts… cause I’m sure nobody enjoys eating a plate full of honker onions. It did not go well with the chicken.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_lKleqIJ-RIrFo-wOM_3Om-80cQo-KsNUd_ie&fid=0x0:0xaa87de9b4f0b826d"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_km6RslliP6cTTiQcv7eI3BYv9_LkkJf-8xS0POhDRp70O4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious and fresh nigiri. Loved the toro here.

The only thing I would not order again is the spicy sashimi - it was a little fishy, portion was small and it was an odd flavour profile to me with the pineapple.

Service was good and restaurant was clean!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNT8CYinzLdoJRyzPn5QpODHT1n3S1YpNfK2Nst&fid=0x0:0xaa87de9b4f0b826d"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Lisa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQwku8o1ZSoTroEApjrO8qHTMjU-5Kjd5FWDYg_XlI6fBz4W-Z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great quality and consistent. My favourite dish is not always available but it always makes me wanting to go back for it. Quick and precise services. One of my favourite sushi places.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTijvqVgnskC74L9JvI6tj9uDv_6vyH2BCsc2a&fid=0x0:0xaa87de9b4f0b826d"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Helen H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfR5ySpx_X9vVhECEymbWsEn0sw6FJ6xhDOOiMkfgVM6UlruWW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The sushi is incredibly fresh, of high quality, and served in generous portions. The seating is clean and comfortable, creating a pleasant dining atmosphere. The service is attentive and very friendly, and the prices are reasonable. The lunch set offers great value, and I’m already looking forward to returning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJXV4vcu0_nQz9SRxTaYyfSPCZY0dexLHYFu03&fid=0x0:0xaa87de9b4f0b826d"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Fionn Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6QM4xX4rnjDy7uQ9_UX1ud-FeXhAIPbUGuv1ks1vTREnqqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delicious. The price is an affordable. I got the deluxe sashimi, and it was $70 and enough for 3 people as an appetizer. We had 6 people so we ordered 2. Definitely recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmlgW8Pdo87O6Pwk26VpZ9Ctx7vBayt4_ZvJXL&fid=0x0:0xaa87de9b4f0b826d"],"When":"2024-10-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gal Dekel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUudcL3hPs5CYLhr5LqDYmFQ7ZypfmQbMrznr4CLXwJsCGp4EfL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a cute and simple place, pretty on the outside and toasty on the inside. It did smell a bit like the coffee was burnt but the drinks were nice anyway. I ordered the tiramisu latte and it was very tasty, not too sweet. My friend ordered the raspberry mocha and it was pretty but a bit bitter. The service was good, clean place, tasty looking desserts and pastries, and a lot of people!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPv4P37PpqdURqSYx6UDNq5P9FLVA-V54KPqmJn&fid=0x0:0x3d364862d98770ea"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Sabrina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXW7GOiTfxcq5DHknLdFBCCgjBAUa3QbkBltMJ88diGwUdT3MqWGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Spinach danish, tiramisu latte and blueberry almond croissant.

Both food and drink are delicious. The server was a bit of impatient as we were deciding what to order (we stand on the side and no one else in line) so 4* for service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcKtASUaYgo0hODyGaCU6X_EQ4hKG_oHAHldJL&fid=0x0:0x3d364862d98770ea"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Alex C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0b11JbJLcOSJbME_vWYkdgNV4w5Laypesod5V5b1SVCUTUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pistachio raspberry croissant was light and delicious. Coffee was amazing. I went twice during my visit.  Very busy location tho and lot of people just sat there and using their laptop after they have finished their drink, so  hard to find seats.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPv-goE8Dzv4zNk9kTZX5N3_BgxsqBAFCbCnXMa&fid=0x0:0x3d364862d98770ea"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Ruitong Guo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhZF2dm1h0HNptc6eGn02-_AEoat-dH0vAjLcxg-Z2_jtR41o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every time I come to Langley to change cars I will come to this coffee store, give me a comfortable feeling, the environment is very clean especially the washroom. And a lot of people come here to buy coffee in the morning,also open at 8am. I've loved Panini since the last time I had one at here, almost a whole avocado.This is spicy chicken panini，I pretty like this taste.❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlEinMErwpekPVj7zc9XPu6M3ou0jXh63bpqZt&fid=0x0:0x3d364862d98770ea"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Anisha Kainth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO_c4F0LuATTOFlPCUAiyJGZeJW1IPki4zmOJiuFkTD3yjIdtF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gratia is literally the best cafe in langley!!! Their baked goods are to die for, another review raved about the chocolate avalanches and compared them to those served in paris cafes. Although i’ve never been to paris, i wholeheartedly agree that they are to die for. Their iced lattes are so so good and the staff are so sweet and friendly. This location is always packed and for good reason! They are busy regardless of the day of week but if you plan your visit strategically you are guaranteed to find a spot to sit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPq2emyTJgkCpEvRHK0eIL4m6CZodUHX4fYHTAs&fid=0x0:0x3d364862d98770ea"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Michael Tetrault","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOblNGbdNZ4FfoMdwgRA-V8sixAEwnNyg7ZpUaoUxqov7wNyQphQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gratia cafe had lovely coffee drinks and lunch options for our group sandwiches and salad), with solid pastries for those with a sweeter tooth. It was crowded, so if you go for solitude or conversation, you'll be hard pressed to find it during busier times. And if you decide to pop to an outside table for more privacy, traffic noise can kill the atmosphere...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKqZ90pxUyR4l714_yFB3rYUAbQghB0IMnR0i7&fid=0x0:0x3d364862d98770ea"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Skylynn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_43WPNfQZiPxkQNg46xeN7C1rm_Vp_A-msfxFSPDUSzZ_gHU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been the maple ridge gratia for years until I’ve come to this one and realized this is the best gratia!!!! The quality of the matcha at gratia has always been the best quality but the sandwiches here are incredibly made compared to the ridge location. The different drinks are a plus. super grateful this place is here, my boyfriend and I come here all the time. :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHxsmT0MwSXEHDP2aKvEXAXL98I2uN10rPYo0w&fid=0x0:0x3d364862d98770ea"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"Dash Car Productions","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFXIkiwP_B3w8bR5Kv0hUcwxIR8TrJJKCnoNWdMmN1R5BApilx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chocolate Cream puff was very good as well as the tiramisu cold drink.

Highly recommend.

A little pricy tho","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI9RP0TPdOVevi1Qn8xeKcan1GPYpbaHNxoXt9&fid=0x0:0x3d364862d98770ea"],"When":"2024-7-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tom McDougall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0J48kC1hZM1V1aRsvHOZVDophlDmEISwqhKMFe94oVeHk06c2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

I can't say enough good things about Woking Dragon in Langley. My family and I visited with my elderly father, and the staff went above and beyond to ensure he was comfortable and well taken care of. They were incredibly respectful, patient, and attentive throughout our entire meal. The food was delicious, and the service was outstanding. It's not often that you find a restaurant that takes such care with every detail, from the quality of the food to how they treat their customers. We'll definitely be back. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMNBdTRC5588tx_s69TMEBbvdmCRVEFGd09cM2&fid=0x0:0xa6258da5a08fbb2b"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great option for Chinese. Puzzling that they don’t have (or know of?) mapo tofu. Decent portion sizes, maybe a $1 or 2 more on the expensive side, but the flavors are mostly there.

Like another reviewer said, it seemed the fried rice was mostly rice and peas, and lacked the BBQ pork and shrimp. But the batter of the salty spicy squid (they refer to it as calamari) is unique.

Langley is lacking good Chinese but this place definitely seems to be worth repeating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzfIvld4t-6Sdf1oPJ6Aq1IWilOJNWbOQPi27Q&fid=0x0:0xa6258da5a08fbb2b"],"When":"2023-11-6"},{"Name":"Adam Rostvig","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMPPVe9oF6txApzCa2nMasL0fGXlH6i4AcxNXEKwPqVLIkW2dX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered for the first time tonight after deciding on a whim that we wanted Chinese food. Beyond impressed in all aspects. Granted we only ordered takeout, but the place had a great, clean, upscale vibe to it.
Service extremely friendly!
Great portion sizes, and even better flavors. Hands down the best we’ve had in Langley, we will be returning  without a doubt","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shiji J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgV_I_kDZenbRkSCZUtMN4Tzqh3CtpRE_xgAc0xQ_KjJXeZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered their one person combo meal.  please just simply take a look. Do you like it?
T&T is way better than this. don't waste your money here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNp4ja4EfIu0M0V_V23LoXADNmHlgG9bgdaWOYs&fid=0x0:0xa6258da5a08fbb2b"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Marcel Larouche","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxqpQNtg59HN-L13kMF__0BKj72X-mn32oyE9DKg2veqUE6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"From driving by it looked like a fast food place. Greeted by our beautiful young server, Jesse C quickly impressed us with her knowledge and skills. Which proved that you don't need to be of any ethnic group to properly serve and be knowledgeable. At first glance it looked like Canadian Style Chinese food for Canadian market but as the food arrived in proper Asian style we were so impressed.
We'll be back.

Update...
Returned
9 of us... loved it.
The whole crew is awesome.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roben Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK03MUxcEpowcAnfZgg61DSfZ74V3XK2C1i-42ZPk-KPEQ2OA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Sad to leave this 1 star review as Woking dragon Langley branch was until yesterday my fav place for chinese. I ordered as usual sweet and sour chicken balls they were extremely bad taste was awful not sure if they are serving fresh chicken special rice was terrible the other dish was beef and broccoli  and literally it had 4 pieces of beef if I’m paying 20$+ for a dish at least serve more protein. I wouldn’t recommend this place unless you want to waste your money.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Clint H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCTsCTHF1FSzvzBhUd3dc_32en4hG6D5V6xeiSagdhUFomOopV6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an amazing dining experience at Dragon Wok. We ordered the Buddha's Feast, spicy salty calamari, chicken and corn soup, and beef lo mein, and every dish was flavorful and fresh. The Buddha's Feast was packed with delicious veggies, and the calamari had just the right amount of spice. The chicken and corn soup was a comforting classic, and the beef lo mein was perfectly cooked.

The restaurant itself was clean, with a stylish contemporary ambiance that made for a relaxing meal. Service was excellent, with friendly and attentive staff. We'll definitely be back for more. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David McD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIf5dYz0v0RNVsAyFADOYMlbexBoChLyAntMr16EmmjYxmoDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great service, clean restaurant, all the food was fresh, some of the dishes were great, a couple of dishes were pretty bland in taste and spice.  Overall it was good and I would visit again but be more selective on which dishes to order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUtSf2p8eEuIQx-W-mLVoIGqKDkJMNhLK6giXW&fid=0x0:0xa6258da5a08fbb2b"],"When":"2024-6-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"A L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDuox32jyJxnkzAm48h5i9Ht66Z7AvtkXQcQV08flbS_JcS1Q6eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious Hawaiian food! The garlic shrimp plate was the star! This will have me coming back time and time again. Amazing!! The garlic furikake chicken was also delicious. Portions are quite generous, especially for the price.

The kalbi ribs had good flavour, but the meat was a bit tough/chewy. I think I'd pass on this next time.

The staff were very welcoming and pleasant. Our overall dining experience was awesome. Looking forward to coming back and trying other menu items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNde4euAogjtqV5CQeyT7q2V2FfsECYOG2NA1PD&fid=0x0:0x6e972474131ba192"],"When":"2024-4-18"},{"Name":"Maggie S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUL47eQAiOWvOk20OV8KK8Xv4VLpdpXwPJLDMNXa7bN3YIpqUP88Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time here. I had the spicy mochiko chicken and my husband had the garlic shrimp….. it’s sooooo good! Check it out! Decently priced and decent portion sizes. Look forward to coming back to try more dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgfLhpSMECGe_DqFY1lfquyIRa2TZB-WEg_vSb&fid=0x0:0x6e972474131ba192"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried several of the dishes here. The loco moco is pretty close to what you might find on Oahu; the hamburger patty is delicious and the gravy is good enough, a bit thicker than what we’ve had in Hawaii. We found a bit of inconsistency with the gravy (sometimes perfect, sometimes really salty) on three separate occasions.

But it’s pretty good. The macaroni salad is addictive and has a perfect savory flavor that goes well with all of their dishes.

The interior is spartan and only has a few tables. It’s more suited to a quick bite than it is a dine-in experience (and it’s served on disposable plates and cutlery).

Surface parking is hit and miss but there is an underground parking garage and street parking behind the McDonalds is also always an easy option.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5tt8iQCD2IVyHbxyLM2F1bkLp2fDG8p74w8UQ&fid=0x0:0x6e972474131ba192"],"When":"2024-2-27"},{"Name":"Tim Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8g5hEHIdu2XxQGUBSgYxE-aY89YP9JdLTndKcxvu6k0fn_XdJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wanted to try this new restaurant in Langley; very unique type of food.

The food here are traditional Hawaiian meals that are served in Honolulu local cafes.

Greeted warmly when entering.

Great menu.

Portions are pretty big.

I had the Garlic Furikake Chicken and my daughter had the Beef Short rib...

Quaint little tables and both amazing meals! So good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYOlSq13wUmu6juN2TwCtW1aAalbI7X_uUr5H4&fid=0x0:0x6e972474131ba192"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Diane (Dineoutwithdee)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJfHVJSjIKAcPEXNIfUcWAtOeYHaXavqJYPtVJZ3lhCbCbpeo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So happy to have tried this place! It’s a little gem in Langley where you can find delicious bbq! Portion size is good and the meals are quite tasty too. We have tried a number of things including Loco Moco, Furikake Chicken, BBQ Combo, Spam Musubi, and more! Check out their daily specials if you’re looking for some savings.

Staff is friendly and helpful, and the space gives off chill & cozy island vibes. See you again next time! 🌺","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJMwTYnYYDxD-y6fZZvC-E03137YItd-OphZ-L&fid=0x0:0x6e972474131ba192"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"fourest","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNekehJvkpAL3Jtf15ZiZW5WR7mglgg0yoPUdXMlIjhKhD6SIkDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the kalua pork is SO good. currently writing this review at 1am with a grumbling stomach because I'm reminiscing about how good this plate was 😂 huuuge portions too! next time I'm ordering extra mac salad ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtPJgzTcnffsYaGmGr4xGjwv-a8xZRaWdL_XKR&fid=0x0:0x6e972474131ba192"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Jacque Pang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1Nzhti5TcnBjaVntfaR6AdqmLFLzIJBwNkX_N175H22PnOGM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Have been here twice for take outs and have tried both the garlic shrimp plate as well as the spicy mochiko chicken, both were delicious! The spicy mochiko chicken has got a nice kick to it! If you like spicy, this is a must try!! Only thing I don’t like is the macaroni salad that comes with it.. would prefer more veggies. Service and atmosphere both excellent!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brandon Lieu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1l6wN98L8CMs2OejtfywOkLZPKh8R8jVEhQtWEIkzvjWy4Xk9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I was excited to find out I no longer needed to go to Las Vegas for Hawaiian cuisine. However I was disappointed by the food. So much that I threw out more than half of it away.

I understand it's primarily a takeout restaurant and they don't want a lot of dishwashing but it was very difficult to eat my Loco Moco in the small round take out container. The taste of the beef patties and gravy was not what I was accustomed to and it fell short of my experience. I love mac salad, but this also tasted different in a bad way. I hate throwing out food but I could not eat any more or wanted it for later.

To be fair my brother and sister in law enjoyed their food. It did look better than the food I ordered. I hope they tweak the Loco Moco and mac salad. They also should use plates disposable or not for the Loco Moco.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMw8UPjSmnJ8JUkiG3fv-TJVZFqXXygCO9E8OpH&fid=0x0:0x6e972474131ba192"],"When":"2024-3-16"}]

title: E. M. W. - East Meets West

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"F M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiAuxCOUxOthoh8wyw2iAy6CmojcgUKL0veulsM0a6veQ3OQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everyone in the reviews was so right about the bbq honey lemongrass chicken wow I could eat this everyday and the prices are so amazing for this economy!! Obsessed with the hot sauces too( must order on the side if you enjoy heat) so umami and actual spicy unlike most other generic ones at restaurants . Also ordered pork shrimp wonton soup not pictured. The wontons were perfect and the broth was light","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPn81KT0LZuMQqRfLofTHJzRo7QOsUGOk2Dkoc&fid=0x0:0x41d864853751e009"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Nihit Malhotra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfeHWYeDGkDTZNd33AgDsCmLoJ4NSwzG1vpopgAV9OU-hgspcS7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tasty Asian Fusion with Great Service

We recently dined at this charming Asian fusion restaurant and had a pleasant experience. We ordered two dishes: the Chicken Honey Barbecue Lemongrass and Pork Chow Mein. The chicken dish was a standout—flavorful, tender, and absolutely delicious. The noodles in the chow mein were well-prepared, but the pork was just okay. I’m definitely curious to try the chow mein again, perhaps with beef or chicken next time.

The restaurant seems to be family-run, and the service reflected that with its warm and polite demeanor. Overall, a nice place with great potential. We’ll definitely be back to explore more of the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHqfbSA0mj95bpCbsJBR_a4nsHQF18bIHsaPGT&fid=0x0:0x41d864853751e009"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Island Girl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbJGwIG62aQA1csb4fnlABcLNnj_cBRZiqDGK6Io0jurINt5-pag=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has amazing tasting food. We came here with no expectations. For sure will visit this place when we are in the area. Ordered item number 22, 36, 37","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyLQ428AewqmmC8t9EtX8Pc4_Pi40lXqm8Gd32&fid=0x0:0x41d864853751e009"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Benzi Schnauzer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUg4Da1Z4WzIs-k4nrBAmbrswcwf-49CVVRmHpcw6VLF6kUyoZl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"EMW is an interesting blend of flavors.  The menu uses fresh ingredients to offer up dishes which are Korean with Vietnamese and Chinese twists.  The result is a very enjoyable meal.

It's a small restaurant with a basic decor.  Everything is clean; but there is some wear and age apparent.  However, this is a small and relaxed place.  There is nothing to distract from the excellent food.

Service is fast and friendly.  Our waitress was watchful and attentive.  Dietary requirements are carefully considered and we appreciated the extra caution.  We were not rushed at any point.

As mentioned, the food is excellent.  A nod to tradition is notable in such items as the spring rolls wrapped in rice paper.  The salad was not overwhelmed by dressing and the chicken wings were fully cooked without being dry.  Portions are generous and we shared our dishes to sample the eclectic flavors on offer.

This is a strong recommendation for placement on your list of restaurants to try.  Well worth your time and money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLzkxbsd_ei-oo4HHnSaeZp_Hh_bBb8eZfURQU&fid=0x0:0x41d864853751e009"],"When":"2023-5-31"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow… underrated and not well known. What they lack in decor they make up for in flavour.

Their food is best described as a Korean twist on common Asian food court staples, but better and (arguably) cheaper. Family of 4 ate for $67 all-in, dine-in.

Was originally curious because they had a 5.0 rating on UberEats, and saw they had 4.7 on Google. They definitely deserve it at this price point. The honey BBQ lemon grass chicken is charred rightly, and the salad has a savoury deliciousness. The fried noodles have an authentic wok hei.

Portions are “right-sized”; not overly generous but not small. Service is very friendly and attentive.

Would definitely come again for a quick bite or takeout.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJcO7xU-ndBnLiRtxO9LBMlilB5sdnKrFpFRXG&fid=0x0:0x41d864853751e009"],"When":"2023-9-30"},{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved by many and locals, this place feels cozy and offers very nice Asian fusion dishes which can satisfy wide groups of people with different taste.  We love their chickens and noodle dishes.  Their spring rolls are great as well.  However the place can be busy at times and food ordering can and may take awhile.  Overall, this is a nice neat hidden gem in Walnut Grove Langley for both dining in and take out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN95WAURH3boyuAoqkqZ0RFp-i4QOClFD-cHhfd&fid=0x0:0x41d864853751e009"],"When":"2023-4-26"},{"Name":"Vanessa Siemens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJKCfF96Py35XeRij3LfZ7iw1-PArlS476_Zv-0lpjLz3Xkx3yww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Got take out through skip the dishes. It arrived in a timely manner and we really loved that it is packaged in compostable containers.

We were missing one of the dishes we ordered, and one of the bubble teas was different from ordered. The flavours of the food was good, but the meat was extremely overcooked and tough. It tasted like food that had been reheated and didn't sit well after eating it. I really wanted to love this restaurant, but unfortunately the takeout experience was not positive. Maybe it was a one off and we will try again down the road.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLUSAzWbBY8wOQ-6ScYyYMrayCivhWXfSvnOar&fid=0x0:0x41d864853751e009"],"When":"2022-1-9"},{"Name":"S K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4AoCV3ThS2upSiegNZVplG9h1vtRpgDjKYyRHdLkGlEb1QvM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just found this korean restaurant. The food is amazing! One of best tasting korean restaurants I have ever been to. Dishes all incredibly flavorful!! Service is fantastic!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPD77azPY0MFgTa9p0kPSSV_j9q3cgMB5hqw7gA&fid=0x0:0x41d864853751e009"],"When":"2024-6-1"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"M K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIbAZO04GwTHBmesMD6Kud2HmFft07_QE_1tY4KuTUSwin3qwi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great location but car parking is stressful.. nice staff working as well.. however sometimes they need to focus on order taking on the phone more accurate and confirm everything. I asked for full whole chicken wings but ended up picking up small pcs of seperated ones. It is not greasy like\npopeyes which is nice and good prices unlike marry browns! I really think Hi Five needs more dip options with garlic. Halal everything is what I like so will be coming back for sure 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkrzBpJFD4ZuchuUW-FzdUF-Z5yyjqZKxnTnVS\u0026fid=0x0:0x445eb184695202e1"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Farida I","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNMTkKwdOMr4ub_wKd9GYVELWT4EByE1UnnnWA19O9vpX_Flsy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Was reluctant to try this restaurant as I've never heard of the chain. Luckily, we had a coupon from our local entertainment book. Staff were friendly and helpful. We bought a 10 piece and were able to try their spicy fried chicken and roasted chicken. It was flavourful and juicy. Their dips for their roasted chicken were different. French fries reminded me of Costco fries. The gravy was not good as it was watery. The biscuits would have been ok if they were fresh and warm. They tasted stale. We went with our kids and got lucky to snag the 4 person table. There's also a 2 person table, and some bar stools across the front. Overall, would come back for the chicken. Thanks for the new experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN04Kl-2QWTZvFJNq_xpOsxEI-Vj16XyhYbUdpc\u0026fid=0x0:0x445eb184695202e1"],"When":"2024-3-2"},{"Name":"Xin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKplMZu1128ZiuURn3P_L-DboDjYwnF20gV7ZQI2V-IyfkDzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is the third time they’ve missed items in my Uber Eats order. This time, I ordered two chicken meals, and they forgot to give me a Diet Coke and fries. It’s clear that the staff at this restaurant are not paying attention to their work, resulting in missing items. Every time I place an order, I have to check it myself. Today, my friend helped pick up the food and didn’t check, which led to the missing items. I’m really frustrated. Can’t their employees work properly and take responsibility for customers' orders?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIGRCMOKaMA0jN90J6FmppXeyecN8sTXRrnnz9\u0026fid=0x0:0x445eb184695202e1"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Gerd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXG60pGjMF1_zRmFDjvcKxQFu0FW0NtKCeu57FksxgohZXZr-Qp6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Newly opened and thought I would check it out. The manager was very polite and helpful, the female clerk was efficient and also nice. I ordered the classic chicken sandwich, fries and three pieces of spicy thighs. The\nmanager gave me a roasted drumstick sample as well as a container of mashed potatoes. All in all a good experience however a drumstick at $3.99 seems a bit ambitious. The food was properly cooked and tasty. Good luck with your new location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIhFzSD3AX2LTzBzW9zo1CfnHuAmmmtIFfSqry\u0026fid=0x0:0x445eb184695202e1"],"When":"2023-8-31"},{"Name":"Helen Alvarez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMeNERA4_Lnbv5noQ1HdfnlgwsXB_oWH0PLyi1LK6dmIhhKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We finally tasted HiFive Chicken when we visited their store in Langley to buy chicken for a friend's birthday and for the celebration of Father's Day! So crunchy and juicy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_ZYadfU_rAkpm5R71bFom4cXqTxIsSr5pldKl\u0026fid=0x0:0x445eb184695202e1"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_km6RslliP6cTTiQcv7eI3BYv9_LkkJf-8xS0POhDRp70O4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Freshly made, tender, juicy and crispy fried chicken. No complaints with my first take out order here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPt93jRV9q8M3DnY323u_l0N7CABpxYG-AEyJAG\u0026fid=0x0:0x445eb184695202e1"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"TBouzari N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_baPpMukUoOzON-1Bc0WVviV8MaaWCa_-KjbtB-g1KBRs9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the chicken tender meal and biscuit. Fries were good (a little bit greasy) and the chicken tenders were perfect - not greasy at all, just the right amount of batter. Was made fresh to order so we waited a little bit - what a welcome addition to our neighbourhood here! We needed a little bit of eating out variety within walking distance with later closing hours! Also customer service was amazing, very friendly front staff!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJjKWD9Vnp-4xVciaadxkOyT2vGPt3xExCVwgQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x445eb184695202e1"],"When":"2023-3-8"},{"Name":"Theo Stonewall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwUMWVXXDHRJo3toI31UXB0A82O8Yx8XcYZ5yKkJ1ziR22mA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It’s ok at best. The bread for the sandwich was stale, the chicken in it took up less than half the sandwich. The fried chicken was basic and overpriced. Best part was the fries. Church’s Chicken is 10x better than this place. They’re also paying people off with discounts for good reviews. As you can see in the picture. The staff Do Not wear beard nets/ hair nets. When we came in, the staff on break were spread out on most of the tables forcing us to eat on a high top in the corner. So no respect for their customers. Don’t think I’d come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIA-lMDUcQzKeUQ8C_osacB6XrG04cpX-azosh\u0026fid=0x0:0x445eb184695202e1"],"When":"2023-3-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"aida amini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzivz-wpDvxhLwFN5-ux45jGL5WgToKsHQSSj01Z8se_TWPzdi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We recently visited Koran Bistro on a beautiful rainy day, and it turned out to be the perfect cozy spot to enjoy a meal. We ordered the Pork Belly Dop Bob and Bibimbap, and both dishes were absolutely delicious! The flavors were rich and satisfying, making each bite a delight.

The service was also commendable—attentive without being intrusive, which added to the overall pleasant experience. If you're looking for a warm atmosphere and fantastic food, Koran Bistro is definitely worth a visit. We'll be back for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4qR0uAiQDj4l5PrQSC3iux26IUbF_UsQv-TTS&fid=0x0:0xcfe58da922a51b8d"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Aly C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX14qJbGiu4ErnYNSYxXYO3vH_ZM_lhqNC51lsGZwrws0uvOvDF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at Banchan Bistro! The atmosphere is cozy and inviting, with modern decor that still feels warm and comfortable. The food is absolutely delicious – every dish is packed with flavor. The pork belly was soft and the Korean fried chicken portion was massive. The staff is friendly and attentive, and they make sure you're well taken care of. Prices are reasonable for the quality of food you get. Definitely recommend for anyone craving authentic Korean cuisine with a modern twist!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPQPrd964XGMds_2owkXgxKNAGv3ToJ_3OHKqx&fid=0x0:0xcfe58da922a51b8d"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Dele Balogun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvbghNhAsYYTLY9mGDqPUV3nfN-RCVIESmLU5pze_ElSP51vKp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing time at Banchan with the family. It's a lovely atmosphere and the food is awesome. Fresh and tasty. Price point is also quite reasonable. Will highly recommend...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9RknlP4Ssa0MxqmdbFgAHmVhF4Pb2aoPAe03m&fid=0x0:0xcfe58da922a51b8d"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited in late May 2024. First things first,  with a name like banchan, I kinda expected to have a lot of banchan (little side dishes) or maybe unique or different banchan. Instead, we didn't have any banchan. Not sure if it's due to the dishes we ordered or if they just don't serve banchan.

What we did order was the LA kalbi dupbap which came with brussels sprouts. Good flavour to the ribs but the bowl could have used some other veggies.

We also had the seafood pancake. This had a thickish batter which was a bit crispy on the outside.  Inside, it was mainly veggies and not much seafood aside from the large chunks of octopus.

The spicy rice cakes that we ordered were tube-shaped (like tteokbokki) and slightly fried giving it a bit of texture to the bite.

The soy and garlic KFC bites were Boneless and quite meaty.

Overall, food was pretty good but I kinda missed having actual banchan dishes","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPs_Di9fkj6279_KJJn6onIVJA5bnhlAsxLUtoz&fid=0x0:0xcfe58da922a51b8d"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Pilo News","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFId9ZdkkvXmcYiLmTK0bEP9YVRba_LZHmLxWEpHSLdGMlepoT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Banchan’s chicken dishes are a standout, showcasing a perfect balance of flavor and tenderness. The crispy, well-marinated pieces are bursting with savory notes, making them addictive. Whether it’s the spicy gochujang glaze or the soy garlic variation, each bite offers a delightful crunch followed by juicy, flavorful meat. The chicken pairs beautifully with the assorted banchan, elevating the overall dining experience. It’s a must-try for anyone looking to savor authentic Korean flavors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMu9qqm7Q0jPQ78yUvi6MrFJ_I2R18zCowB6Fwy&fid=0x0:0xcfe58da922a51b8d"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Mike Allan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_kVO0xRO4Ad3bvJX_b-ifHPpp4O7CjaLfpLCJdbf7BFYm7eky=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here three or four times over the past two months. Each time has impressed. Service is very efficient, food is delivered incredibly fast yet is still very fresh and very hot. Prices are reasonable and food quality and quantity are top notch.

The Angry Chicken Bowl is the favorite so far. Chicken is plentiful and extra crisp even after coated in sauce (I’m assuming it’s Buldak). Cabbage is fresh and crunchy. What more could you ask for!

Full orders of boneless fried chicken are large enough for three hungry adults and are still very hot even as we were packing up the leftovers.

A surprise star was the seared tuna roll, the Tuna Bap. It’s better than most sushi restaurants Aburi Tuna Oshi.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLMw7o8OcMf7PeJBt5_rUcXx7SO8iv1VZIjkkb&fid=0x0:0xcfe58da922a51b8d"],"When":"2024-1-7"},{"Name":"Blessed Love Jamantoc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiJkDfqK1tLHwmtym7NT7sodUjHvZSVRt9FJ_NqcdWkISaxfG4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love their beef tofu soup! so tasty! with the side dishes and rice… i’m a one satisfied customer. 😊
i’m also someone who doesn’t do veggies, and they didn’t disappoint me w the amount of beef in it. although, a little more of tofu too would be awesome next time 😉
thanks much again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNG00IyfPIMHsJI1cMh5HCRzUy6k4hxn-bbklm6&fid=0x0:0xcfe58da922a51b8d"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Paul Turner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi0iAFfRalNBMoShb3oKZB4f1oP9aLD_ijNnWuJCtX8F5JPOI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food great portion size
6-9pm $5 beers and cheap soju","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnoPltjmMaRvaeUbG-UtfR2VjfnlAEh6suGV6a&fid=0x0:0xcfe58da922a51b8d"],"When":"2024-12-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Securetwo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3TGrOYZYOifICWTCzhL4QiPqfHhgakPTnEwxPz7NNqefC6gpU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Update:
Late November I returned after a more traditional experience = lasagna and Tiramisu; this was time to *try* something: Squash and Brie Canelloni and Canoli(last two pics.)

The Canelloni is an incredibly creative blend of flavors- truffle, maple, squash, brie, spinach- AND green apples on the side- not for a Normal-seeking palate. I had a Moment on first bites at the sheer range of flavors and how well they melded; I found it was really well done.

I followed my entrée with a Canoli- I think fairly well done. It had more of a "fair food" essence(fried) than I would seek out but I took my time and could definitely appreciate the rest of the flavors.

Service was pretty good, just depends who you get and how busy the restaurant is!

I still enjoy the ambience- quieter music than previous time, apparently at some of the [few at that pre-supper hour] guests' requests, but noise has not been Loud either time. It's been a few weeks and I'm hoping to return[again] soon.

Previous review, Nov. 8th, 2024:
If you want details on food, server and atmosphere(and first two pics.):

I ordered the lasagna and, as mentioned in answer to one of the questions here, I found it smaller than I expected(takes up space width-wise but is shorter than what I expect from lasagna) and tasty!! So, a bit confusing on that note, and for $31+/-.

I finished with Tiramisu- the lasagna was easy, and then I found the mousse quite heavy(kind of to be expected...ish) that, while the flavor was soo good it was hard to put the spoon down(!), I didn't get very far before taking the server up on a take-home box. I enjoyed some warm tea for the heavy mousse later. 😄(Lasagna gone before thoughts of a pic. dawned on me!)

Server Keira was just right in not hovering but also attentive enough to ask how it was as I progressed and promptly notice I needed a water refill. Her table-side manners were so approachably professional that I was quickly at ease- and at Friday supper time!

Warm but modern design inside- balance between low-grade pub and stiff-and-expensive. Lower lighting this Fall eve., but brighter for window-side tables. Music loudER but it wasn't overwhelming as I thought when I walked in the door. 👌

I would like to try other dishes- cannelloni, pizza?? And mayyybe another dessert in the near future? 🤤🍽","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPe5WGld991JNFkPAdN0SZSA11X7gUGjVSe5oLX&fid=0x0:0xa8a72d1e570d4071"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Debbie Tuit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUl1QRhiGTE0pawpm2Mt3BIssODHhrthbrxd62Ea1dwXPs0h0E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cannot say enough about this fabulous restaurant.
We are staying nearby and walked over just as the restaurant opened.  First to be seated.   Turned out it was half-price wine bottle day as well     Our server ( Brittany ) was incredible and recommended everything that we ordered
Honestly, one thing was better than the next !
Such comfy seating in the booths.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGUbeR1uF5F0qs6zYaGXzAIKvcIdkxIBZU94ti&fid=0x0:0xa8a72d1e570d4071"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Cleemar M (CLM)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGCGYDgdTLDzn3zRPmQzI47thdkSDXTgZ2wOwEV-c1M78oYSBe4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely a popular place. Servings were huge and I saw empty plates going back. Both our pasta dishes were really good and tasty. Service was amazing with some great recommendations. We were comped a drink as it was a birthday meal and that was a nice surprise. We will be coming back to try other dishes we saw being served up. Great option for Italian.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0ZH8XdxcHKSEfj1-vvBhB2JAB7A9JUhktelK4&fid=0x0:0xa8a72d1e570d4071"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Rosa Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgxwKwGYZa5ZolcnIrIix77qAMZ1zxGI9KVT5k_Mku76RimgEn_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem in Langley! Today was my 4-5th visits and every time everything was perfect. Our server Morgan was very professional and attention to detail. I loved their signature Beehive pizza, truffle pizza and Ricotta Gnocchi. First time I tried Bruschetta as an appetizer today and It was absolutely delicious. 👍 I HIGHLY RECOMMEND to visit here!!! I can’t wait to try different menus on my next visit. 😆","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMM2e9tL3VWMWHx_iQrxBDD-4w41J2-uDQCkSSQ&fid=0x0:0xa8a72d1e570d4071"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Erin Vetter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUV7qc_5aDVd9QZ69vNa1t7RvSBZoFqu_CqQEizZk8KQ7VwgXo2eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I came here for our anniversary, and we couldn't have been happier with the experience. The food was delicious (special shout out to the carbonara and tiramisu), and our server was very friendly. Can't wait to come back and try the pizza next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfUu_0VQKXxOQC8A9HvO3Qs0Qn45AHEGwFR93I&fid=0x0:0xa8a72d1e570d4071"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Enjoyed our dinner here. Happy Hour wines were quite nice. Cheesebar concept is interesting: there's a menu of maybe 15 cheeses, you order 1 or more portions, and it comes on a board along with crostini and (too sweet) apricot jam - photo is of one portion of Manchego. Pastas were quite tasty, especially the Prawn Pesto. Quite a loud room though, and when they dimmed the lights around 5:30 they went wayyyyy low.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuP2vQMBijny4PHqrk_XCc5GN49-QjLNOJfRpb&fid=0x0:0xa8a72d1e570d4071"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Aarti Jindal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPaOrSmA76tnAHbyahr9q0W6xIx_LyYSbHt3lJdrDJpY9KZtygQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of a really good Italian place tried after a while. Ambience was plesant and definitely was jam packed. For appys we got Brusschetta and Crispy Bocconcini which were really good. For Mains we got Nonno's Sea Food Pasta and Truffle Mushroom Pasta which agaim were delicious-though could use more flavour to it. For drinks sadly didnt like much on the menu. Got Ceaser so thank you for that(loved it) and Italian Margherita which was just okay. For dessert we got Nutella Pistachio Cannoli which didnt reallly live up to the hype. All in all was good experience. Service was decent as well. Recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1JSoltxQx0JYkdGz79VlweOQ_H0al5F0i1yPW&fid=0x0:0xa8a72d1e570d4071"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"roxy rants","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTmDohIJrwjIs4PRBUUmFY63FmyRP83fnQusiGCBXNeJt6Kp58=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow this was an experience.
I enjoyed every bite. The service was amazing! The atmosphere was inviting and warm.
I felt at home, definitely will be dreaming of this meal for a while.
Highlight of the night Tableside Tagliatelle Cacio e Pepe","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqsE5kEJQchEY2hchhpkAacirVEe8c1RaiZNpY&fid=0x0:0xa8a72d1e570d4071"],"When":"2024-11-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Justbeing Sam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM9hiJK-AfVP-qSHlK2ogC-KKU9aHv9jB-f8Zpy8fNkox9PG5e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Definitely insta vibes. I tried their Bellini ( not on menu ) but our server kind enough to make for me , haven Soda ( less flavourful but it’s soda ) and passion fruit margaritas ( too soury but delicious ) food wise I had their fries like in photo 11/10 sooooo gooood. For main was Ohana bowl yummy loved it great quality wish it was more quantity.

Overall great experience will visit again for their summer patios 🍸🍹🥂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPuMvbDhKhduJsapssp_erVNno-XzxXfrIhQCr&fid=0x0:0x88168481ab6ec60d"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Dylan W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbRiLfrHQc4OYC-IaGiC3v50Ld3wZILX8k8tQZMv8k8ZitbIyS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The decor and ambiance are quite appealing and often remind me of Cactus Club. However, the service is just average. Unfortunately, the food is quite forgettable and comes in small portions. I ordered the roasted lamb, which was slightly dry and consisted of only five thin slices for $43—an absurdly high price. The side salad was also small and lacked seasoning. Overall, it was a disappointing experience, though the atmosphere might make it a suitable spot for a date.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3BDqGHoMAZKGd4fNi6yO6OoZztD9rlOOrFyjB&fid=0x0:0x88168481ab6ec60d"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Mike C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFQoUSgNwKhSz205rcM0tW5K8pPs1r-mXzH5P-LiztofmWmkY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"WOW. The food and experience was first class. Great varied menu suitable for everyone old and young. Salmon was super tasty. Chicken wings spiced just right. Hummus had great texture and taste. Outdoor patio is nice. Value for money all round.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3SEWiG1LX-283r8NyeNue7cA_zSFymJmd80Tr&fid=0x0:0x88168481ab6ec60d"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Attila Szamoskozi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2AAt3w8V6vnjRCqXfUE0xqvAqQuLl4Zs8C3rG6vUvIyME7FzU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5 stars straight across?  Yep, they deserve it.  Tamara our server went above and beyond to make it a special  experience for us.  It's one of those places where even though the prices may not be as low as you'd like, you still feel it was worth it due to the superb service and excellent quality of food.  Good value overall.

We started with the Truffled fries which were excellent with the sauce on top of it.  My son and I had the fried chicken sandwich dish and my wife had the Ohana bowl.  We traded bites and both dishes were superb.  The fried chicken was crunchy and had lots of flavor.  The dressing they had on the chicken burger really complemented it.  Even the brioche bun was high quality.  The mix of flavors and textures in the Ohana bowl were tasty and complementary.

My Spicy Guava Margarita was excellent.

The Peanut Butter Raspberry Cheesecake with Vanilla ice cream we shared deserves special mention.  I have had many desserts in my 55 years of life but I can honestly tell you this, it was definitely one of the best desserts I have ever had in my life.

The decor is tasteful and very relaxing.  Well insulated from the sounds of the street.  Did I also mention that Tamara our server was awesome?  😊

We would definitely come back here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFZO0OtXyOdnIiEfobhQ-lxgA8LFyH5wcA6_08&fid=0x0:0x88168481ab6ec60d"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The vibe and decor are definitely the draw, giving Langley a boost of chic urban energy.

Unfortunately the food was forgettable and IMHO not worth the premium. Dry, batters that are too thick, etc. Definitely need to level up their kitchen game.

Also, they tried to REALLY upsell us on the drinks which I didn’t appreciate. I ordered a double Caesar and there was no garnish (bean, celery, something) that you might expect.

I wish it was a better experience for the nearly $50-60 per person we spent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoct0d7l7e-zPiLgE1drHSEroO1jng6Jqwm61z&fid=0x0:0x88168481ab6ec60d"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_km6RslliP6cTTiQcv7eI3BYv9_LkkJf-8xS0POhDRp70O4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been wanting to try this place for so long and lunch here did not disappoint. Such a fabulously designed and decorated restaurant - everywhere you look is picture ready. Miso truffle fries were next level! Truffle fries are common in restros but this was a cool and tasty twist. Coconut shrimp and main pork belly dish were also well made. No complaints here! Tasty food. Tasty mocktails.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOajSC0O_yJbAmv7HZmgQ4r2W2RYUw03PrTu08W&fid=0x0:0x88168481ab6ec60d"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Sawyer Moore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW18yXDLdsMmoU9cfP8h5sX8nTLFLzJtIlI45p-t0SrPGl1-a_X=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice on all fronts: food, service and decor. Had a great 3 course meal and I definitely plan on returning. The Briased Pork Belly, Fried Chicken Sandwich, Dill Picke Chicken Wings, and Strawberry Shortcake were especially noteworthy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPefPQa4pEXGW8vkMiR2ZAN2iciplQlbhMnqT25&fid=0x0:0x88168481ab6ec60d"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Richelle B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXADAI4nqLu77CydGzFV7q63AtNd_ARea8M_3Mo4b8F9H-b6Gk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an excellent lunch at this wonderful restaurant. The ambiance and the food were amazing. An unforgettable dining experience with exceptional service. A must-visit. Our team would like to say a huge thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhOasy-FonOx9TRxTHkImRn-43F3KAgDciwOKM&fid=0x0:0x88168481ab6ec60d"],"When":"2024-6-29"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Lloyd C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJl3aJ9rbobarlfW473XtZtR4ioD0jdwBkMU4_GNW3LJ2fiL3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"First time trying chicken donair at this place. Chicken is way too dried. Feel like they cooked two days ago and left in the fridge. Hard to chew so ate half of it and left.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAeKbxq2Fs4ulg5GmNFISk7oyy11XBNPiFHF5I\u0026fid=0x0:0xcf9390b83236e2be"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Fernando Braithwaite","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7A5Egxzd2taER-3JJ8TD6YI0NSv4a_YJdCdMZhadI4ta85A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a 2 protein Donair.  The meat was cold and sparse.  The steam table needs to be put on a warmer setting or better yet cut the meat right off the spit.  The person preparing the wrap put a blob of Tzaziki on one end of the wrap so when I first bit in to the wrap all I got was a mouth full of sauce.  The pita was cold and stale.\nThe veggies were nice and fresh.  If I were a vegetarian the wrap would have be 5 stars.  I would not recommend to any donair lovers out there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Garry Sahota","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJpE854hYnFO-GxwJgtscbCCfWhHwm2nf3M7gg_sbmxdbr8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Made the best double beef, falafel, fries donair wrap. Great service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2sxbNt9_jX1IZATbmI83I_QXt7n07B5uPEsvl\u0026fid=0x0:0xcf9390b83236e2be"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Prab Sarah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOJpqtDQ-DHNKCRCM-VxfgpgAXeoMOpG1iGcgsIi9fh6l_AcsQ_w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I see lot of good reviews but I didn’t get the same experience as I was expecting. Probably because of the lamb. I’m not a fan of lamb, I’m more of chicken person. But I thought, I should try something new this time. I feel like the brand name is too hyper but the food is okay enough if you are hungry. I would not recommend but go head and give it a try if you want to explore local food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqK3mB2TeFrWG1qZ3pCyXG7wYCqbvJLtAcDLCg\u0026fid=0x0:0xcf9390b83236e2be"],"When":"2022-3-6"},{"Name":"Sean Fetterly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRGyCF8cLybWdGVzCy2EP8eY4oCndGvoou6fhhiU0thk8NWOYu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent Food and Service every time(I go here for lunch 5 days a week). There's one woman that is very intelligent and remembers my order and gets it perfect every time which is nice and not common these days.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ML B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPP3s2QYzucZYTOLwcvPb8YR0qcSSTYsIAJL5j_OVl6ocHwA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing service and food! The staff were very friendly and took my order and served up some delicious grub. A must very filling for a 8$ wrap!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-SkCLD4guemXztroc19EcF5Q-qXKIGa7nJTG1\u0026fid=0x0:0xcf9390b83236e2be"],"When":"2022-5-27"},{"Name":"Phil V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpjl1Y21skGRQNlBmsFhHWXae2yxtJoUrEFk_TE2jl2W71vg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Used to serve really good donairs but this place has gone downhill over the last couple of months. Donairs are cold and they are stingy with the meat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Poole","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocID3bg98bqWLZ3EFFjnOgPi3dpbN8ZzpZ8HSIYD88q4sx5qFg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The young man who works here (tall, black turban) deserves a shout out. He always makes perfectly consistent donairs, is fast and has excellent customer service skills.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Noh Ramen
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Curbside pickup","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Healthy options","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Y H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVt4Wu9x3vJ3lbIDFMmSMZKPjYEeK1aHJW6cp32mecQZ8iznXMm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This Ramen place is not authentic Japanese ramen but it is decent. The chicken karage was more like black pepper fried chicken. The house sauce it came with does not balance out the grease from the chicken but makes it even more oily.

Usually Japanese karage would come with a vinegar based sauce to balance out the grease from the fried chicken.

The cha shu itself is not well marinated, you can taste the pork smell that's supposed to be covered. Maybe add a bit of ginger to mask the smell?

Soup is on the light side, definitely not rich. If you prefer a light taste bowl of ramen this is for you.

Unlike traditional Japanese ramen place, they provided spicy sauce on the side for you to add to your level of enjoyment.

My summaries, and I did enjoy their tea!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3y1ckIDUUCWT2yUO_TC7g7TXieta3gIjd89E&fid=0x0:0x7ebc97856c4269b1"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Mai P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7MpCKHi-lCJTFIoJ2DzoljsWEkGn0D_UOzmpDCQbwu4t30gUF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I can see why people say it’s not authentic Japanese, that’s because it’s Korean, nonetheless I still enjoyed my shio ramen. The chashu was extra thick and juicy and I ordered extra but was full with the original 2 pieces it came with. Gyoza was crispy and tasted like any regular pork dumpling would. My only complaint would be my chopsticks were moldy? I would probably still order ramen from here in the near future if I’m craving it since it’s a decent spot and not too far from home, I’ll just use my own utensils","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkXG342PBDOgDo96a3ilbQfsP7D5_iUy4WNFpp&fid=0x0:0x7ebc97856c4269b1"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Anna Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEY89kMSzy7L18qwlW-T9Il5JxLeW6nvbQzk85EeuMK1eFzXMw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just heard about the place from a friend and thought I’d check it out.

I ordered takoyaki, the crispy dumplings, the spicy ramen and tonkastu (I forget what everything’s called exactly). But it was I really loved the mains, and the dumplings were SO GOOD. The atmosphere is good, I went around lunch time but had somewhere to sit. It’s small but clean, simple and the price is very fair.

Loved it !̆̈ definitely would revisit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM03d7CxE2SwmSeAoBPRhdUaf_95eIGRElN6d2f&fid=0x0:0x7ebc97856c4269b1"],"When":"2024-3-9"},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_km6RslliP6cTTiQcv7eI3BYv9_LkkJf-8xS0POhDRp70O4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time trying the ramen here! Super clean restaurant with attentive service. The fried chicken was juicy and tender but the sauce did not taste like anything. Ramen broth was tasty, the green onions were fresh. The noodles were the perfect firmness and texture (really enjoyed the noodles here). Also the pork in my ramen was amazing - tender and perfectly torched. My egg was slightly over cooked, which was a little disappointing but my partners egg was cooked perfectly. Overall.. Probably one of the better ramen stops around town!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWnXzWyS1hP3FwURL4BM6SMxfhueNf3kJbNU9I&fid=0x0:0x7ebc97856c4269b1"],"When":"2024-2-24"},{"Name":"Lanie Zulueta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIjacOZZNFIlv1T1yr25Te9nNNi1G78MhV6gOT7cCRO1Lr8sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Spicy Shio Ramen was really tasty. The chasu slices were thick and juicy. I really liked the gyoza, it’s like a fusion of dumpling and takoyaki. The staff that served us was very accommodating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfcVBbWMOFkvOgTO4GqNEJfnKuTQQOpsY8W5zg&fid=0x0:0x7ebc97856c4269b1"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Daryll Ymbang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkL6T-BR-WabBAbGcCe-seQJO7i-mIMBoF-dJYx3h5EtnLsyhv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The wife and I enjoyed a dinner here and we loved every time. Looking forward to coming back and trying more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0c-gOLxeA_thvzAy4NXYiLhXaICUE9Ij2NrEf&fid=0x0:0x7ebc97856c4269b1"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Jerry Rocacurva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnpTBXh0SfEJSu5-bHpEGJL0taYoLD_2NUwDnc0ZCgCyqUa-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of the best Ramen noodles restaurant. Since I visited this place 6 months ago my family and I keep coming back. It’s delicious and I ordered the same ramen since. The lady server is very friendly and helpful. Nice to have this place in the community.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzn-Oul0CU4F0_eBU8a1IbYkQ5hvFYbie3-OEp&fid=0x0:0x7ebc97856c4269b1"],"When":"2023-11-9"},{"Name":"J Q","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWLFaR2htiLNLIQAXB2-FbuNystyoB794RiAm0Uo82lJgg8OdK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I think the noodle wasn’t homemade, but was still good.
Soup has cinnamon smell maybe because of the chicken karagae inside? :)
Store was very cool under the AC on.
Customer service is beyond the average!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0U9hzQEqc-fwFKQBo_4h44VMsOl7z0wR5m9b3&fid=0x0:0x7ebc97856c4269b1"],"When":"2023-7-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ms. Fancy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBQaNfblq64oqWShq2FuM-_BC-1ScwkOJu_eYkfqvQy0DjNuPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I enjoyed my breakfast here. The young gentleman serving me was very polite and kind.
My scrambled eggs were amazing, the bacon cooked well and not greasy and I loved the toast. It was well presented!
My potatoes a bit off...perhaps fresh oil would fix that.
Overall, I loved my breakfast and I would happily eat here again!

Exceptional service and a cool vibe. Thank you!

Ms Fancy
Google Reviewer
9 million + picture views","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-504Fc9za_93HRDvAIH3H9ISlHhR97ENQj33w&fid=0x0:0xa4eb056a6caaaf59"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Nihit Malhotra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfeHWYeDGkDTZNd33AgDsCmLoJ4NSwzG1vpopgAV9OU-hgspcS7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We visited The Bistro after seeing its high ratings on Google. The ambiance was pleasant, and the staff was friendly and accommodating.

We ordered Huevos Rancheros and Chorizo Sunken Eggs. While the presentation was impressive, the food itself was just okay—nothing exceptional as we had expected. One of our dishes had to be replaced due to an issue with the eggs, but the staff handled it well and even offered us a free muffin, which was a nice gesture.

Overall, a decent experience, though the food didn’t quite meet our expectations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbdXvBb4O6qLEyF4lF1XmDg4WFwAjZxVl1kgLF&fid=0x0:0xa4eb056a6caaaf59"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Camilia Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWigkoqaNhHJinW1sDEWmiP5-QkCbLl16QFp5xZiy1DDMYI0dmUuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here twice in two weeks it was so good. The first time I came was for breakfast with a friend and another day I grabbed dinner. The breakfast was great. I’m obsessed with their lavender latte that they make. Lunch was also great and I ordered the goat curry of all things. Everything I’ve had has been so tasty, this place is truly a hidden gem in Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJ3ocZr7icFNXAw98rVDgGGm-WVQQQdELE-quu&fid=0x0:0xa4eb056a6caaaf59"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Angela Jeffery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtGyld6d4wIU2Lb7oe7xsoiq4r77iaBdF6nkFQ8ek01eF1q7c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Open cafe space. It was already decorated for Christmas mid November, though and playing some Christmas music. 😑
I got the breakfast wrap, which was quite good. The other people at the table enjoyed their food too. They have water on a side counter, so you can get your own refills.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOsH7pON0rYvBJylm038XMuDZW_Df21cbn8kWO&fid=0x0:0xa4eb056a6caaaf59"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Julia Segers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5Cr9XcQGc80U3UEnSy2K93Fs6U0AVc6Jg4gAQ9NTkCDom6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is what I look forward to coming to every Sunday.  The owner Patty has become a friend since coming here for a year now with my husband.  Not only are the staff all fantastic and friendly, the food is phenomenal!  I've tried every item on the menu and have always had a great meal.  The lattes are to die for and pair nicely with an in-house baked good.  The Bistro is one of the best hidden gems of Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwGRWIaYuo9fbdVDH2CUJtGaIY2A7Rl7VUVFu0&fid=0x0:0xa4eb056a6caaaf59"],"When":"2024-1-20"},{"Name":"Roberta Berzenji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWaRSKdx-HLRG0S9Y5WPHbwyVKiaViRayx1-anf3tkgEIMXi_-aw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Variety on the menu was good. I ordered the sliders, my husband ordered the Thai chicken wrap.
Both came quickly.
Both were cooked really well delicious.
Will be returning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9knsjgBf-YJdpcxgZgDuTDjKosKfV34m7fcBA&fid=0x0:0xa4eb056a6caaaf59"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Clint H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCTsCTHF1FSzvzBhUd3dc_32en4hG6D5V6xeiSagdhUFomOopV6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This establishment, situated in a light industrial area, offers a delightful dining experience for brunch, lunch, and dinner.

The service provided was exceptional and prompt, ensuring a pleasant dining experience.

We savored the goat curry and Thai bowl, both of which were exceptionally flavorful and freshly prepared. The soup du jour, a broccoli and aged cheddar combination, perfectly complemented the main courses.

During the summer season, the establishment opens its large garage door, creating an inviting outdoor dining area.

Overall, this establishment proved to be a valuable discovery and is certainly worth a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWivGRsllYIWf42dk0v3bF8QztR_zTzXnL6xI5&fid=0x0:0xa4eb056a6caaaf59"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Manmeet Sohal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAFj9DrnYycDPwPe308BqNgQ5LPf_kkdLO8iQvK63Eh4cUkg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Remember--sometimes the map app will take you to the back of the building so just know that it is facing the main road!

Anyways, the food really has some flavor! I ordered the Desi Nashta (consisting of an spicy veggie omelet with green chilies-it was a bit spicy but still tasty!) and spiced hashbrowns were on the side. It was flavorful, but more on the oily side for my liking. I also ordered the pancakes and the portion was quite big, though a little dry. Also, the toppings cost 2.50 extra. I asked about the vanilla cream and was told it's just whip cream... so I'd skip that next time. As for the atmosphere, the place was very bright and clean and the layout is interesting. The garage (larger door) is open during the day, so you can sit on the patio, but it does get quite cold because they do not shut it for the people inside. Overall, service was okay. There is only one main server serving everyone and sometimes the chefs would come out and bring the food to you, if it gets a bit busy. Overall, the Desi Nashta really stood out, but the rest was like any other café.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObgJzk027qrejpMrCOwtDEL8EeYo03P8168FwL&fid=0x0:0xa4eb056a6caaaf59"],"When":"2024-8-21"}]
