user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Harjeet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKJGKTn6KInLt5BIXAhV_eEC0YJDJS-rAKmZ9asmCB1hC9AAc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Considering it was opening weekend, I already anticipated longer wait times - especially since brunch on weekends is already popular as it is in Langley.

With that said, we had a really good experience and the food was absolutely delicious.  We loved everything we tried & the staff was really great at communicating the wait times while also being apologetic about it.  I’m confident with time and practice, they will become more efficient! Can’t wait to come back here for some more pancakes and croffle’s!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtJNOAx6FymiRlE9RUck7IsA8ofMGB_pyFfLfB&fid=0x0:0x53511e834a98cf03"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Gregory CN Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ76gG0YKDpRto4lxqvkYyyxmkUYYk9gHJykKS3tsTg-AMGLg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Six of us attended the grand opening. I was pleasantly surprised to see a long line of people. We waited about an hour to get inside to place our order. Things moved slowly as we expected if they were preparing pancakes fresh. The food was fabulous. I enjoyed every morsel of my smoked Salmon egg Benedict. I've never had salad with pancakes before but it was a great combination. I really enjoyed my experience at Fuwa Fuwa.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPu3PkiaVvZHgrbhwos5tudCzO1ASyzL8jDQIL&fid=0x0:0x53511e834a98cf03"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"MJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlm_XRYtoUIMsDe0r0YhYfxDQnj37a3FGprKGl2_zxeQCNP_XX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been hearing a lot about this place lately so decided to go check it out. Initially went in for the pancakes, however I was hungry and didn’t want to wait 30-40 minutes for a pancake. I ended up choosing the savoury Croffle (in-between a waffle and croissant) and it did not disappoint. It was filling and very delicious, overall I’d give it a 5/5☺️.

While the Croffle was great, the service here wasn’t the best. I had to wait 5-10 minutes to be looked after, and get recommendations for menu-items…and there wasn’t a lineup. I didn’t get much advice or help from the staff and just opted with a random menu item which worked out for me fortunately😂.

So, little bummed out about the service here but food seems to be delicious! Can’t wait to try the pancakes when I have more free-time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORcFdy24H5fOxbRy1dR2-gsnSHvAW_bjfmmIqt&fid=0x0:0x53511e834a98cf03"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Vina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfKIygN7nK9JzhVk8hB_aqT35aXn4InaAC2_i5q8iu7tEllQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was delicious and not too sweet. We really like it. The only down side was they took quite a long time to prep the food. Definitely needs more training as I could see most staff were struggling and not having enough confident on what they are doing. Strongly suggest the staff should wear hair net as accident may happen if hair is not well tied and held up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVaydg_vgwrQZAcoZqbW5IG29e31DdIh-VOYsZ&fid=0x0:0x53511e834a98cf03"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Edmund Tse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUj1_HuZisWr7CytcMG4RWWGN3zGYGloHDj6Y4xsUPtDv8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Came to Fuwa Fuwa. Ordered and got a seat right away. I would say there were only two or three tables in the restaurant, we ordered the crème brûlée and cookies and cream pancakes. Waited close to an hour just to get our order, even when there are multiple workers. Two people in the back making the pancakes, one up front assembling and one it cleaning. I did follow up and they gave us complimentary cookies for the long wait, which is appreciative. Complimentary cookies in my opinion were hard. The food was average at best and definitely not worth the wait. Due to the long wait I won’t be back anytime soon as there are better alternatives in Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqZEzSTKqRRos_-0KBj-qmrLZxVCEA2HQUDA8&fid=0x0:0x53511e834a98cf03"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Ms. Fancy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBQaNfblq64oqWShq2FuM-_BC-1ScwkOJu_eYkfqvQy0DjNuPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I come into new restaurants as I am an avid Google Reviewer!
This place, recently opened but they are off to a good start.
My recommendations
✅️ greet customers as they come in
✅️ check on customer shortly after they have received their order to ensure all is well.
✅️ the coffee needs to be stronger for a true American
I would also recommend mugs that are lighter or that have a more secure handle. Older people will find the heavier mug with small handle hard to hold.
The food was excellent and well presented. I do recommend the 'Original Cheesecake' and the 'Tiramissu Soufflé Pancake.'
The atmosphere somewhat plain but I understand the business is just getting started.
I will make a point of checking it out again in the future and willing to re-review.

Ms. Fancy
Google Reviewer
10 million + picture views","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4gThqtwl7u1OEmmexeWRpwtRww3jVufAGmiaI&fid=0x0:0x53511e834a98cf03"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"QTee me","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpJw9EZqKaTYTHvjLyvP_e_xMPv9A7BxzzD9E8lv_Bb3Vw369w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"best pancake I've ever had in my life!  Every single order is made fresh from scratch. So there will always be a waiting time, but it is very worth it. Staff were very sweet, friendly and kind. My pocket book is not going to enjoy this place. Lol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGkSUIDie71vYd_sVhBgTiOdjAMxpMk7TciUv8&fid=0x0:0x53511e834a98cf03"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Candice Yiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtmdnhcO4pUNN87PxXq0FORI0efuGLN7igqsoyLbniZ9f-x00=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My family went there for the grand opening Nov 2, 2024. We went there because they advertised gifts for first 50 customers. But we observed that the male owner (or manager?) didn’t seem to follow through with the advertising, we saw some groups left without a gift. If I didn’t stand there to tell him I’d like my gift, I would be skipped as well.

And the kitchen had prepared some cheesecake samples on the tray, the same male owner handed it out to the crowd, SELECTIVELY!!!!!!!!  We saw one table got to sample, then he walked away ignoring the twenty people lining up/sitting down beside him. I guess not every guest is equal in there.

The female cashier definitely needs more training, the guy standing beside her had to constantly pointing at the screen. Maybe spend some extra money and training them off hours? But not during a huge grand opening rush?

I was lucky enough to be able to order the pancakes and had them in a reasonable time frame. The food is good. Everything else is horrendous. Based on other reviews, they even stopped taking orders completely! I am flabbergasted! Not serving on a day of grand opening, what a PR disaster.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOfUkRjtPKGKVpsQtdJx75FfpoimLuibZ_z-Am&fid=0x0:0x53511e834a98cf03"],"When":"2024-11-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"K H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo2hR2qKHBGSuFyVVc1kqvuNnr23GVLd19IdZCsiU8tz8tbtW-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We enjoyed celebrating our birthday here. Thank you for the princess tiara and birthday accessories. The meat is high quality, but it is very high prices, so don’t come here if you’re looking for value and quantity. The 6-7 person set meal was more for 5-6 people, definitely not enough for 7. *Maybe* 7 people who don’t eat much. We ordered a few more dishes and it still wasn’t enough. Service was really slow.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_KL3uvn99lx99zv6lMGw1OYQ2yCG932aGmk3C&fid=0x0:0xb75282c5dfe07ded"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Gyanendra Lama","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURtsvQycg6FXXzN7cPvP4bQtpsQGC096JaeWWsJUSPSpxkbuOr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My sister's family and I visited this restaurant to enjoy Korean BBQ during our trip to Canada, and it was a fantastic experience! The ambiance and decoration of the place were warm and inviting, creating the perfect atmosphere for a memorable meal.

The samgyupsal was absolutely delicious—cooked to perfection and full of flavor. The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, ensuring we had everything we needed throughout the meal.

Overall, my experience here was amazing. I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a great Korean BBQ experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuAKZ2pHunv4m0SlZm0nDdLl-2L37yh2d5On4u&fid=0x0:0xb75282c5dfe07ded"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Kristine LC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjV1Lh2nh8HCioueYroOivTrs5XdRaseNKbAWi-VUPIahXGEAM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family celebrated, my daughter's 7th bday here yesterday for dinner. It was definitely memorable. The atmosphere is definitely nice and lively. The food was delicious and excellent quality, and portion were generous. The staff I tell you are the most nicest and attentive we've ever came across. My daughter felt the love because the staff really went out of their way to make it memorable for her. We will definitely come back here and super highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkeFlVQ1roUr3KHLmxxHh0VvCRlUSgHOgcBoQb&fid=0x0:0xb75282c5dfe07ded"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Ess November","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuPJ8X9jOZ2CtOO2jCad-r9UmiPcylLXs6WZsf1PzrAZBsBSHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried Skobi for the second time in a 5 week time frame. Both experiences were good. The first time we tried Skobi we had ordered the Woodae Galbi bbq and it was phenomenal. From the service, presentation and tasting all that flavourful prime rib beef finger meat left us full and with no complaints to speak of. Everything is carefully prepared and fresh with plenty of side dish options (banchan). Our second visit to Skobi included ordering squid bibimbap with side dishes and Japanese wild salmon Oshi plate. Both dishes full of flavour and not too long from ordering to having our plates in front of us to enjoy our meal. Overall, highly recommended and Skobi will be our new “go to” spot for fusion Korean and Japanese cuisine.

First visit w/ Woodae Galbi: $150++
2nd visit: $45","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzNwp-JvrYaeF87cfYjbO8s9ylII025M31OIsd&fid=0x0:0xb75282c5dfe07ded"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"augy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWALNLzNsGWj3mHYKd-NQzcrua3n-BWaS1Oo5yunbFTYZ3Y0pV_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely fantastic, it is my 3rd time ordering the Woodae galbi here with friends and family. The marinated wang galbi is so fire, crazy how tender the meat can be. The atmosphere is lively, grills are very clean and always a fun experience. The way the meat comes prepared is unlike other Korean bbq spots I have tried.

Their sushi is amazing too, usually only order the Mom’s Roll and Crazy Boy Roll, goes super well with the BBQ.

Anyways will be back occasionally thank you SKOBI for the experiences and great food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3NywPeQqeJHvsUBd8mYGDeBfy_RWv_L3ZjkNk&fid=0x0:0xb75282c5dfe07ded"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Andre Radsick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0Rci7uWGpSxS4b3POkRS8ht67niB_Jhj1sLVBsgaelTMozRDF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had great family dinner, super fresh and high quality meats, the atmosphere and service was outstanding. We will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7vFC-UaTJnryBkpznsG69lBOJEoHJp0QdXiTH&fid=0x0:0xb75282c5dfe07ded"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"LeahTV리아티비","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgfhVEigY2Q6vvTqBVLRfSsaQGYeIi97XpHykM62pz4zskuNs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As I walked into the beef restaurant, I immediately felt a sense of nostalgia as if I had stepped into a hometown eatery. The atmosphere was calm yet warm, making me feel like I belonged there. The staff were friendly and provided prompt service, making the ordering process quick and efficient.

I ordered the combo, and I was highly impressed by the freshness and tenderness of the beef. The steak paired perfectly with the cheesy gratin potatoes and the sauce served alongside it, creating a delightful harmony of flavors.

Overall, my experience at the beef restaurant was delightful, and I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a satisfying and enjoyable dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOC4AjpgWAfHCrppzeivPK4DT8OCWW9NPRhJ7VZ&fid=0x0:0xb75282c5dfe07ded"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Annie H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_TiRGmvMe90ybCMhTvsUZAGobj5UlXFQJ0oEqHtn-W1rxw1_d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here! Passed by quite a few times and always wanted to come here and glad we made the choice today. The food and service is amazing! They even have sushi - which of course we had to try! Ordered the salmon oshi but only 4pcs though as we had a lot of other food to try! Decided to also order their bbq items such as the beef ribeye steak and the pork belly. Both were very good! The banchan dishes were delicious we just had to ask for more. Best kimchi and potatoes ever! Will come back :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuqWSZKMEAxxLFll82v680X0pd6yx0_6slYQWD&fid=0x0:0xb75282c5dfe07ded"],"When":"2024-7-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Donnie Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKrgFCWWAgyr6oyOSTC_agl8Ej_NIyJg60Fr6ShfF4Psi8Kps=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":""A Feast Fit for a King at Katsuya in Langley!"

If you're looking for a meal that delivers on both quantity and quality, look no further than Katsuya in Langley. Their pork cutlet isn't just a meal—it's an event. The portions are so generous you might find yourself wondering if you're supposed to share (spoiler: you're not, it's all yours).

The set menu is the real star of the show, offering an unbeatable combo of great taste and wallet-friendly pricing. You get a perfectly crispy, golden-brown tonkatsu that's tender on the inside, accompanied by a lineup of sides that will have you feeling like you’ve just won a flavor lottery.

Whether you're fueling up for a big day or simply treating yourself, Katsuya strikes the perfect balance between indulgence and value. Pro tip: bring your appetite (and maybe stretchy pants).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFSgY7Qw0TI4_FF_Knyw5QWoOn1h6jOF3B4Ipd&fid=0x0:0x7549bf650c090cbe"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Bala888","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwpXKXLnWVbmRWE49mxf-yYsdsA4jpYsnTuSzc7_Jf6iiW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First time here everything looks good on menu. The best was the fried chicken, maybe the best within Korean and Japanese fusion I’ve ever try; however, the honey fries was too sweet for me, the drumsticks were too salty same as the miso. The katsu rice portion was not enough to get full and tasted soso.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjuzjV2Q7L-kkda4I84hUu7Ry5XWCaKaO4Yu4&fid=0x0:0x7549bf650c090cbe"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Fionn Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6QM4xX4rnjDy7uQ9_UX1ud-FeXhAIPbUGuv1ks1vTREnqqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was delicious, however they were sold out on chicken. We did come near the end of the night. The service was great and they were very attentive. The atmosphere was cozy. The pork loin katsu was my favourite! The bulgogi poutine was pretty good as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMm1kMnyP_OdwUSSsrJScTEQX1YnfQtubrGS6d&fid=0x0:0x7549bf650c090cbe"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"JP Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9vi3Bp36xsGTL3r3KclHMk5eg4_F8gSie3yx2AA9q4iEIFuFLAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The clean and modern interior of Katsuya creates a pleasant atmosphere from the moment you step inside. The space is bright, well-organized, and exudes a sense of comfort, making it a great spot to enjoy a relaxed meal. The staff were exceptionally friendly and attentive, providing clear and detailed explanations of the menu, which made it easy to choose dishes even for first-time visitors.

The highlight of the meal was definitely the pork katsu. It had a perfectly crispy, golden-brown exterior and a tender, juicy interior. The texture was outstanding, offering a delightful contrast between the crunch of the coating and the softness of the meat. The flavor of the pork was rich and satisfying, and when paired with the accompanying sauce, it created a harmonious blend of savory and umami notes. Every bite was a joy.

Overall, both the quality of the food and the level of service were excellent. It was an enjoyable dining experience that left a lasting impression. If you're looking for delicious pork katsu served in a clean, welcoming environment, Katsuya is definitely worth a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZM6yqgkpTbplluuzIHWPwIF12LGyifJgf25Vz&fid=0x0:0x7549bf650c090cbe"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"N Prasad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqG1vB0EkjrfhX571hMLSRtKiSPHm51yK-oGL_xujLvLRGsAf2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem for Japanese and Korean fusion dishes. The food arrived quickly and was all served nicely. The taste was excellent and we enjoyed some dishes we hadn't found elsewhere. The server was quick and friendly. The restaurant was very clean and neat. My one small complaint would be that all the seats are hard wood with no cushion. Would definitely return","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNosMrwG1hn5NS98MLB_q_1Z2dda5Pie23_CKn5&fid=0x0:0x7549bf650c090cbe"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Nihit Malhotra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfeHWYeDGkDTZNd33AgDsCmLoJ4NSwzG1vpopgAV9OU-hgspcS7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We visited Katsuya Langley and had a great overall experience. The ambience is lovely, with touchpads on each table to order food or request service, which makes everything seamless and efficient.

We ordered the Crazy Chicken Shrimp Pizza and Carbonara Katsu (pork loin). The katsu was good, but I’ve had better elsewhere. The pizza, while very spicy (as our server humorously warned us), had great flavors and was enjoyable. Both dishes were fresh and nicely presented.

The service was quick and friendly, enhancing the experience. Overall, a good place to try, especially for the modern ordering setup!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAb8VAR_2bG3wg7hgDzB48l26fkAXM4vH9z4Di&fid=0x0:0x7549bf650c090cbe"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Candice Roxas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJ18HELMGAoB5rBTjrGZdp3HNt5l0SgnYRpMry7MP9POyoBw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the special set, half-half Korean bulgogi and sweet potato pizza, and takoyaki all to share! It was more than enough for three of us. Both the katsu and takoyaki were crispy and flavourful. The pizza was delicious but we were bigger fans of the bulgogi topping! Definitely recommend to anyone looking for a tasty lunch in Langley!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8DCtxBGLYkDby30a_lGD9sGBPf1JLt-9y8x7n&fid=0x0:0x7549bf650c090cbe"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Arvei Mariano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQYBEIqtvWKeTOR9NTN9UasWMIvU_iA6WF-ug9gff7MnG-bw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time at Katsuya and we have been wanting to go there for a while. We finally went and it did not disappoint. It had so many choices and food came fast but hot and it was so delicious. I enjoyed every bite also tried my husband’s and sister’s dishes and they were also very yummy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPd_X2MYVlxCZPJ5RYGSH3w-gOB41XC4xe2NaCR&fid=0x0:0x7549bf650c090cbe"],"When":"2024-11-3"}]

title: Empire Garden Chinese Restaurant
descriptions: Local go-to with seafood tanks dishing up dim sum & an extensive menu of Cantonese & Sichuan dishes.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We don't find ourselves out in Langley very often and we were pleasantly surprised by this spot. From the outside, you couldn't really tell you could find good Chinese dim sum.

Inside, the interior reminded me of your typical well appointed Chinese restaurant.

We tried their beef meatballs with bean curd sheets. While the texture was a bit firmer, it was still pretty good. I really liked the deep fried squid in spicy pepper sauce - nice crispness and a good bite.

We also ordered the beef and cilantro rice roll (which fell apart easily but wasn't bad in flavor), the Empire prawn and chive dumplings, and their stir fried vermicelli with beef in hot spicy sauce... liked the spice level of this sauce.

Overall, a definite good find in the area for dim sum.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsSaz1Hn8Uz5loxUhNxKXjrTYdZE3SmoEN6cqt&fid=0x0:0x9a431f8c5176422c"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"R Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-jrBZr0L2Cohp23WTfYqu0s7jxp32ljcl18krkzsKHxnH3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Surprisingly hard to find good real authentic Chinese food and dim sum in the Surrey and Langley area, really happy my partner found this place and we're starting to become regulars now.

The food offerings are board and really delicious, in my opinion as good or even better than the restaurants we went to in Richmond and Vancouver when we used to live there.

Highly recommend to those who want authentic Chinese food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXntKZOibat6lSk7S5HDGX4XJoCY9kKXsEVp2J&fid=0x0:0x9a431f8c5176422c"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Brandon Lieu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1l6wN98L8CMs2OejtfywOkLZPKh8R8jVEhQtWEIkzvjWy4Xk9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Looking to have dim sum closer to Langley this would be the best spot and better than Lux. The prices were standard but the food was good for being this far away from Vancouver, Richmond, and Burnaby. It's not the best I had but it's passable for a good dim sum.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiYBWOZ6aR3IHW3Qj17TWwJhMD2CiL_XC0tf0W&fid=0x0:0x9a431f8c5176422c"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Hannah Briere","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2oTVJ6meTgC0xIDTntXzOciMZw20AfFvFvTuYuG1kUFbP9pM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Empire Garden Chinese is hands down one of the best spots for authentic Chinese food in Langley! From the moment you walk in, you're greeted with friendly service and a warm, inviting atmosphere. The menu offers a fantastic variety of dishes, all made with fresh ingredients and bursting with flavour.

The honey garlic spareribs are a must-try—perfectly tender and packed with sweetness! The dim sum is also exceptional, with the shrimp dumplings and BBQ pork buns being our personal favorites. Portion sizes are generous, and the prices are very reasonable for the quality you get.

Whether you're dining in or ordering takeout, the experience is always seamless. Highly recommend Empire Garden for a delicious, satisfying meal. We'll definitely be back soon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"13 Gears","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOBcTPNRdVGWuYDWhBEnwYxKqzRWxPI_fTQ0b841dyDHECp14Mxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've eaten here 3 times, and now producing this review. Each time the food was fresh, tasty, and served timely.  The service was speedy. The food isn't revolutionary, perhaps a tad bland, but not overly salty, or full of MSG. For what you pay it's very good. Remember that we're in a new era now, and while they charge $18 for a combo meal, consider yourself lucky. A Big Mac combo is now what, $13? Remember that this food is being served to you in a clean setting. Remember to respect a place while it still exists. Go anywhere else for Chinese takeout and you'll get half the plate and pay twice as much. Trust me, this place is still rocking it old school. Thank you to the cooks and servers of Empire Restaurant. I will see you very soon again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUepS5mU5WFNahjN2_H5_qypZBxBt-eN_Xlciu&fid=0x0:0x9a431f8c5176422c"],"When":"2024-3-26"},{"Name":"Brittany Stockbrocks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWU7FuHIJtJkjXsiU8iColApclnR7Xh4gioj7gaaMXzPf0qNfEm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Well… empire used to be a favorite of mine. Now I won’t go back. Here’s what happened last night. For context I have tried Xiao Long Bao all over different places in the lower mainland, and so when I called empire I asked if they sold them. She said “yes it’s the juicy pork dumplings in the dim sum menu” I looked and clarified they are the pork dumplings with the soup inside. “Yes” she replied.
Ok I’d like 2 orders. I arrive 25 min later, then I drive home and I get them open and go to eat them realizing the dough is all torn up, they put plastic containers of vinegar in with the hot dumplings so the lid melted and the vinegar spilled all over, and there was not 1 single dumpling that was sealed. When you see these pictures, I wouldn’t even serve them to my dog! This is not even the biggest piss of though. This is WHY I’m writing a review. I called the restaurant and told them I would send pictures. She stated I needed to return the food in order to get a refund. The restaurant is a 40 min drive. Then she proceeded to tell me I did not order Xiao long bao and that those are Chinese not Cantonese, when we CLEARLY had that EXACT conversation on the phone. It wasn’t until I wasted my gas at almost 2$ per liter to drive the dumplings back up to her, that she gave me back my money. Not 1 penny more. I told them I would write a review and they seemed to careless. Would you eat these. Spilled vinegar from melted plastic containers and mushy dough?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNN4fdhpNIt3c6yegmkpIkwV-XtCAifP4dONlLJ&fid=0x0:0x9a431f8c5176422c"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"F Xu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6vHcN8tLOFToUPHk_F9AUzNJKmih1V2c7FVXEAPBTa5mDRWAq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for dinner with family last night. The food was excellent! The more senior servers did a great job and were friendly. The atmosphere was nice.
I believe one younger server was extremely new; running food to the wrong table, almost dropping dishes, forgetting to fill our tea pot after taking it away, and picking her ear while speaking with our table which was definitely not something you want to see from someone handling food. I hope she is provided proper coaching and training moving forward.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ken Nielsen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9RFXsBAxSZVz_eh_xkLBMifsrtKjTkyYMxCA57Lg70wIKbH8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We used to eat there all the time and raved about it. But that was years ago. My wife is sick and loves won ton soup and chop suey. For two dishes it was $60 with tip! We ordered delivery and my wife asked what was in the chop suey and it wasn't even close. 75% broccoli, 2 pieces of pork, 2 scallops and 2 prawns..and when we called to ask them about it (my wife can't eat broccoli and that's why we asked) we were pretty much told that's the way it is and the gal on the phone wouldn't share her name. Very defensive and it's frustrating. That's certainly not what their photo of house special vhp suey looks like. Very disappointed as this is not the restaurant it used to be. It wasn't great last time but we thought we'd give them a second chance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbtHty4je_h-Y4_XCP4IpOJapKbMS2QWpMIx5S&fid=0x0:0x9a431f8c5176422c"],"When":"2024-3-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nicole Beaverstock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINlxlqrls3P2n0sb12ZhDTVLEoEcSNKk-nM6JWCwRB8vGQug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the bean burrito two days in a row and also had their pulled pork bowl.

I like the varying sizes of burritos to order.

Their sauce "bang bang" is crazy good.

Fast and friendly service.

Once again had an amazing small burrito from here tonight. Tried jalapenos for a little spice. Was so good.

This place is out of my way but I absolutely love their burritos. Well put together with fresh ingredients, tastes amazing. Definitely recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM05i-95aeJBeJOpHG2LrTXeCcFdSOHAbJNuXia&fid=0x0:0xa0d711a07377dbe7"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"Sukhpreet Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAvMAxQNoO-6He6ZWC74SYNq9LUht2NUkQj5RASuB1M3BMtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited this place so many times and I love the food of this place. Even today, I visited around 6:00pm and I saw there were many customers but their staff is very polite and cooperative with every customer. I recommend their spicy chicken quesadilla and crunchy chicken burrito for all to try. Really appreciated this place. 😊","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Barbara (Precision Quilting&Emb)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgPsUsBR3IAd294tNGZCk2DEqHtypbild1ZBSCSbqWB1GEXw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered in. Birthday Dinner for 7 hungry people. It was outstanding! Food was fresh, orders were assembled to each person’s liking, even on a very busy Saturday night in Langley. Thanks for making our day memorable 💜","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"justin mckillop","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXycL53shbjuiaMD6urzpkXK-Gz6EEnmXV8W8247HHolXRLn9Od=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time trying this place out today with the wife. I got the  large burrito & she got the regular.. the Large is almost the size of my arm!. Only thing is there is no barbacoa for some reason 🧐 got ours for take out. Fast and convenient.  The wife's tortilla got stuck to the grill that's why I gave it a 4.. but it's actually a 5 when it comes to taste!!! Will definitely be back to try this place again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2mas6j7er9hgUYLJZQvuiNGC1fiXslAnwbMWv&fid=0x0:0xa0d711a07377dbe7"],"When":"2023-1-9"},{"Name":"Andy Perdue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyMRksLvniMGBt1nvwewvEq-Fg38g4r1qPAN0U8lOPOtUhO37j=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Employee with red bangles on her arms:
Argued with another customer over small issue, then was speaking another language and laughing out loud. She was condescending and rude. She should have simply apologized and fixed the small error.
She was more concerned about being right, opposed to being helpful.

Atmosphere:
Cheap version of Chipotle

Food is mediocre at best:
Mexican Rice = Rice a Roni (was incredibly salty)
Pineapple salsa = canned food

Crunchy chicken was actually quite good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"kuldip kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJURZaFRGETtgi5tRDGkRE6JHiteF5et4CiTJfenHmv1mMqxg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am a regular customer more than a year it's having nice neat and clean ambience. Food is always fresh and well cooked Healthy and Tasty.service is always par excellence by the staff accomodating ,helping ,welcoming . I appreciate the efforts and Hospitality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Walton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKala8w5j_tO6Cx3tn58Zn__eUr96Jx2XMaZEciaxP2_4Zo4A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I am not happy with my experience. We did an online order and it said the food would be ready at a specific time. I got there at the time it said to but didn’t get my food for 20min after I got there. 2 customers that came in after me were served before me, and the part that bothers me the most is that they had our burritos sitting on the counter for the 20min that I was there waiting before they packed the rest of our food so they were cold! I told them I wasn’t happy that my food was sitting on the counter and all they said was I’m sorry but we were busy. Now I get that when things are busy it is hard to keep up but you don’t leave food sitting on the counter. When I told them that they didn’t offer to make new ones or compensate me in any way. I am not at all impressed","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Manjot Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0fLAgHW02vTs1oVzHUum8dmqSGxVeeLaIawdEE0VbumJ1sOcX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a spicy chicken quesadilla, ended up with a beef quesadilla instead. How does that happen? Kind of disappointed as it was a pickup order while I was on lunch from work and my lunch was ruined completely and didn't have time to come back and get it fixed. Really disappointed as this was my first time having BarBurrito.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anju","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3NBFx2EqwPeNoEkV2MebyCIf0Znuxcr0FFtfaRAHKwPRpguQHlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE. The food we got was completely bland and tasted burnt. We barely ate it and asked to exchange it. The lady who said she worked there 3 years, with a nose piercing (I think) was atrocious. When we asked to get an exchange, she said “who’s gonna pay for it” - no sorry, no politeness, no Canadian etiquette at all. She claimed she called her boss but went to the back, said he didn’t pick up. She also went on to say “what kind of hour is this to call someone” when this dump is open late and it was not even 9pm. She was absolutely the worst customer service I’ve ever experienced in my life. The food was so bland, not even worth $1. If I could give zero stars I would.

This place is a complete rip off and the lady who was working needs to learn basic customer service. She was rude from the start for no reason at all. Power tripping over a fast food job. I’m appalled and disgusted. Save your money and don’t let them rip you off. Read the many reviews of the food tasting horrible and them doing nothing to rectify it","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tyler Phillips","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJznVYU9m7WEj5tyfvtkRewsBgYNzU2MtvG72GPlHg_7rSGfw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"GROSS. I haven't had noodle box for a couple of years and figured I'd treat myself to my old favorite shinapore cashew curry. But I was extremely disappointed. My food tasted like a microwaved can of chicken noodle soup. Noodles were overcooked, and vegetables were undercooked and didn't taste fresh. Chicken tasted like it came fresh out of the microwave. All floating it a soupy puddle of disappointment. What happened to it being saucy? First time I've thrown most of my noodle box away. It was just Gross.
Also, no more noodle boxes. It's just a bowl with a lid.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipME6_RyJLoYjbEUgSudp7PSQ_Y1OkHix7GUqqS1&fid=0x0:0xedeb9aaab30d7195"],"When":"2024-3-7"},{"Name":"Simran Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGfeZBvnLR3iZbVFBWPDks3S72q8fwzZHeR3XdXAhtv_v1h9cD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had dinner at the Noodlebox langley location and it was fantastic. Ordered the  Spicy Peanut bowl and the Thai bowl which were both very good. The ingredients used were fresh and delicious. I really loved thier Burmese Naan.
An extra star for the amazing service that we received. Andy was our server and I loved how he went above and beyond to ensure that people were enjoying their meal. They kept the place clean and tidy.
Thank you Andy and the rest of the staff.

The only downside is the place is too small and not a fancy dine-in.  Other than that totally recommend it. Would definitely return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN26pfmqh_nBkOPSBZEZ1syELlnYnpplsQ6bSxZ&fid=0x0:0xedeb9aaab30d7195"],"When":"2023-8-23"},{"Name":"justin mckillop","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXycL53shbjuiaMD6urzpkXK-Gz6EEnmXV8W8247HHolXRLn9Od=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Food was good. Fresh & hot. I got medium-hot which in all honesty felt like hot hot lol. Went with the wife & baby. I would probably prefer wok box.. however the portions were decent. A little pricey 44$ for the both of us. Seating at this location is a little cramped. I would definitely give it another shot just to try something different.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkSKlTVbe6giMyTIcieGuIpe68PMoIPx0c49Pm&fid=0x0:0xedeb9aaab30d7195"],"When":"2022-9-18"},{"Name":"Hem Trivedi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQt9DKVW5oFCcbeFCdDGlibvdWgRhpYnPVzNVfykxqcDyL1E-jlg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If you want to “RUIN YOUR DAY & TASTE BUDS” then definitely come here. The food tasted like garbage and when we told the manger to exchange it as it tastes so bad, she refused without apologizing and no care towards customer service.
We told her to speak to her boss as well but she replied by saying this is not the right time to call. Which boss would be so busy to not care about his place.
Overall this place is a nightmare so never visit this and thanks to their management this branch should shut soon before giving customer food poisoning and worst customer service.
Please be aware of this place managers she doesn’t care about customer satisfaction at all","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Neha Chaudhary","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPWAV0HQrvaBG3ToUewKT6Sr12H5cF9sDx7yE9Z6ih1Z6qXg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited the Noodle Box. The food was fresh and flavorful, with a good variety of dishes that cater to different tastes. The portions were generous, and the ingredients seemed fresh, especially the vegetables and proteins.

The pricing is reasonable for the portion sizes, making it a decent option for a quick meal.

Overall, if you're craving some quick, tasty noodles, Noodle Box is a solid choice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brenda Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGygcMYUNNTPgtJETonIh0SNZDfW3Wc7dlMRD0Jeu40XSxEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Noodle Box is Exceptional. Fresh ingredients and loaded with everything in the option you choose off their menue. Excellent value. Excellent price. Comfortable clean seating area to enjoy your order. Bright clean windows. Server was excellent. Kitchen staff hard working. Clean and bright. Take out and pick up are extremely busy. Very popular for dine in casual, take out or delivery. Check their menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0BnwzRqCSXOmLfcSwqjVlbqOzJiuxMLR2MG5f&fid=0x0:0xedeb9aaab30d7195"],"When":"2022-8-5"},{"Name":"Sahib Matharu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCevdGlV4uAqwcOXtEziHuPxRY-QmuotN1uMjsmoDKOajUQYz_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was tasty with fresh ingredients. Service and staff was also good. Clean seats and table. Ordered 3 noodle 🍜 for $50. Quantity was pretty amazing, I had to take a box to pack left over.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGClOCX9wcdhCJO-8_ULCMVp_reH6Apiv2BKkj&fid=0x0:0xedeb9aaab30d7195"],"When":"2023-11-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Angela Landymore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeDqQJEI7jhShjDMDF5a7C3Y9Hk8Yhvgi-eIOWnEw5NZjCXgMp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service is fantastic...they make you feel like you've sat down at the family dinner table! Food is so delicious,  and the atmosphere & decor are absolutely perfect.  Go on a Friday night to be treated to amazing live music by a very talented gentleman! There is even an adorable kids play area - what a great idea! And it is extremely clean; I saw the staff cleaning the kids area twice while we were there, same with the washrooms which were also very clean. We will be repeat customers for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUhl1kvSjqGCOtBqEO6jM8Qg2NVXejh85RzDqB&fid=0x0:0xbd02d50ab3beae82"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Oluwayomi Adebule","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXqcIg8ujO4XiC50cD8_FM6q8RuvnCHkeqVI4f08BodMBvibbJTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pizza. The crust is thin with a great texture , thank goodness. This helps when you need to warm it as leftovers. The marinara is not too salty or overpowering, which blends well with the toppings. Ambience is great and cost and can accommodate varying seating arrangements and group bookings. Service is also great as they are able to accommodate my requests to pack veggies separately. I would recommend this place as the best in the Langley environs","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfgYLNJhNi6aFn1qbnfmjnxzDVdZs9V9GmDwGS&fid=0x0:0xbd02d50ab3beae82"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_km6RslliP6cTTiQcv7eI3BYv9_LkkJf-8xS0POhDRp70O4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Pretty disappointed ☹️ especially with the great ratings I read on here beforehand.

Pasta was so overcooked, it was all mush and stuck together, the chicken texture tasted like the ones from subway, and the dish needed salt? Or more pesto? .

The pizza was just OK, your normal local pizza takeout chains are better IMO.

The best things from this meal was the cheesey bread, and drinks.

Maybe I’ll try this place again one day, but for now, I’ve been left so unimpressed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyMLACzfZy8gUTHbFve0FbgNfJ2XtyWVA3R0HV&fid=0x0:0xbd02d50ab3beae82"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"becky Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAcpzr_qZ0tHJ8i2epPczMv5nMp1TE0nZA9oYeqQ7f10pg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Seldom go to Langley and didn't expect much for good food. But Pizza Garden Lounge really impressed me. Nothing can complain. The food was good. Very nice environment. And love the service, of course. You can feel the chef makes the dishes  wholeheartedly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOH33xPL-0TxVxaEcxg01p5ZjTxh3Mihxd2-_Y&fid=0x0:0xbd02d50ab3beae82"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Yarek Hrywna Rivers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyhZ0JNTGGWwYVQc2x2RhSIADMCn9tcvBXTWwguc7T4aIyUAm7dg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"With so much mediocre (and frankly, bad) pizza around, it's always a delight to find genuinely good food.  Had the arugula and prosciutto pizza and it was delicious!  Will definitely be back.  Cozy little place, and very attentive staff.  There was live music later on that day, but couldn't stay for it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMadXjdMYGjxU5flNSa1_D7nq7EokdI-30eExvv&fid=0x0:0xbd02d50ab3beae82"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Ümit Demir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_uHDzWsdbW3ua-zfBRWHS2tHFkBpaaiVRXieRUB0eFZwRwjn0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything is 5 stars! Aysegul was 10 stars!

Everybody is smiling food was amazing , music was awesome! We enjoyed our moments.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZviUDqdziHbyEyOZe9PRmKThveC2eyhgg1kvX&fid=0x0:0xbd02d50ab3beae82"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Dana Meng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWns9Obqs0woSr1Ts68KiDwp_BFLjIHf7KQr8QzjN-qYhkyxpV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pizza tastes really authentic here. Thin crust pizza with generous ingredients. Even though the store was busy, the service was quick and friendly. The interior design was classic Turkish style with lots plants, very much ins style. The cutlet were all from Turkey with special design, very cute. They also had little indoor playground space for little kids. This restaurant is very family oriented. I felt parents can enjoy the foods and relax at the same time being provided a safe space for their kids while they dine. The price is reasonable but I found the quantity is a bit in less side. Overall, very recommended, and will come back again :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMg6PmZLEBLMf8K2XP8bLAlncR5wG9C1N7VkZG&fid=0x0:0xbd02d50ab3beae82"],"When":"2024-4-27"},{"Name":"Janet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJLdrp4_-PzGWs8I7cbVIruptxWktGjE-_19gAKtYsnjV7T8DB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I arrived with someone who wasn’t even a pizza fan but we heard they also had pasta options do we stopped by. Cozy place, lots of fun decor with cute mismatched furniture, and the food was delicious! Staff was amazing too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7oj6xFJZwVBeYR5psWOVHzNtMhQxgtnv8ZEnh&fid=0x0:0xbd02d50ab3beae82"],"When":"2024-6-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alex Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKk6OcUgg97XJYgUIgbZBwyuQahPR5Cpp_Cgf1zZeSPmw5_9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food was good but $25.00 was kind of Burtal for this, colslaw was not even full seem just over half. Brisket on a bun just barely bigger than palm of my hand . My hands are not huge by any means. Not like I'm walking in to a full on resturant , it's just a food trailer. Over head cannot be that much. Saving grace it was good. But price very Steep. For what you got. An awning off the side of trailer would be nice in hot sun or pouring rain. When waiting for order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOH8L3z3unnx1pGdsQFJUpkHxCs_uc-Xbe8R8N-&fid=0x0:0xc337a3f74351b29"],"When":"2024-5-11"},{"Name":"Anson Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpRG7sV65M0Vk9fJln2fqg-G8cTgdbnIHe6i_26HAHg5rk2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Overall, pretty disappointed at this time's  food - I've come here before when some items were sold out, so I came again to get the ones I missed because I liked my past visit so much that I thought it was worth the 1.5 hour drive.  Can't say I got my worth this time but at least I got the chance pick berries. Detailed review below:

Burnt ends (1 lb) - I think this was a borderline scam.  I was excited for brisket burnt ends, but all I got were super small cubes of brisket flat that were not caramelized but just covered in sauce - you just see that naked grey coloured meat covered in red sauce.  However the worst part is (you can also see in the photo) that it was 70% sausage.  I don't understand what justifies the price they are selling at, $27.99.  The sauce was pretty good though.

Beef rib - Singular rib that had smoke flavor but was dry and needed the barbeque sauce.  Overall, impressive looking but was not it, $31.99

Platter for 2 - Got this the last time and the star of the show was the pulled pork, last time it was the brisket that was juicy, smokey, and moist.  However, this time the brisket was dry and lacking smoke flavour.  The sausages were plentiful as always.

Mac n cheese side - Saw it being made fresh, nice southern flavor with smokey spices. Overall, it feels like a Velveeta based cheese sauce with smoked paprika.

Cornbread (jalapeno) - Nice fluffy, moist, and flavorful cornbread, but no jalapeno flavor, not complaining but there's almost no difference from a regular one. Kind of unfortunate that I liked the cornbread more than the brisket and beef rib this time around.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRm0Lpp7OrziOMUDrC2MxSIwf628NWaDxniiT9&fid=0x0:0xc337a3f74351b29"],"When":"2023-7-28"},{"Name":"Kelsey McAuley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnAzavtz8qT6KmCgwueB6IQD6a-EXZK-ht_DFi_J60y91Dtw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the closest thing to true Texas BBQ in the greater Vancouver area that I have ever tried. Amazing staff and people as well that truely took the time to show their passion about what they are doing here. Highly recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_7eexTW6HJW_-8kBrgQ2mRD9ZQ4jn3oJ-dZGV&fid=0x0:0xc337a3f74351b29"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Phuong Nhi Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzxQom_VZJiDiz-vAIgLw8-Rc1YUoxHeIREAoVH0A4wtFvsEbhEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Um, I’m literally obsessed with this place. Having tried sooo many southern BBQ places around Vancouver this is the only place that has never (or will ever, hopefully) disappointed me. I dream about them every week (not an exaggeration).

The pulled pork, burnt ends, and fatty brisket parts are top tier godsent. Sausage and sides are okay. I wish they gave us more BBQ sauce for the drier meats though (because it’s just so good).

Other than that, the service is great. The wait could be a bit longer on weekends so I would recommend getting there early!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP46pD58aC2c5J9z5h2JJn0den_3q4qeA6PmJfb&fid=0x0:0xc337a3f74351b29"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update: Truly amazing service and delicious food! Tried the burnt ends again, and this time the flavor was spot on; also the sandwiches were incredible!

Old Post: Got the Beef "Dyno" Rib on my third visit.. Just look at my photo.. It was amazing! I'm really glad she recommended me to try the Jalapeño Cornbread! Great addition to Coquitlam

Came back a 2nd time as they came by Mariner Brewing again. Got pork ribs which were tasty but... The Smokey Baked Beans was a home run for me.. I would bathe in it. Seriously, make sure you get some.

Old post: The food truck came by Mariner Brewing this weekend. Despite some negative reviews I read, I had a great experience with the service and food!
I got the Texas sampler and 1/2 lb of burnt ends.
I'll rank my favorites below:
1. Pulled pork (excellent flavor *one of the best I've had)
2. Brisket (juicy & flavorful *some dry parts)
3. Sausage (delicious but similar to other good bbq places *which is not a bad thing)
4. Burnt ends (although tasty and I ate it all *the sauce was a bit too sweet for me)
Overall I enjoyed the entire meal, and they even brought it to my car because it was -10° at the time","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrKyU0t_uD4kwBNfX0QWF1PG9UlKwcAdtTQOA0&fid=0x0:0xc337a3f74351b29"],"When":"2024-1-14"},{"Name":"Cole MacEwen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhpRS7fgywTci2-v2inzLsCrFpXqlOUccvdbBlGoooZY0u6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had our wedding this past Saturday and we had Texas Smoke come out to cater it. THEY WERE AMAZING. Every guest came up to us to tell us how professional they were, how polite they were, and how IT WAS THE BEST WEDDING MEAL THEY HAVE EVER HAD. The team from Texas Smoke far exceeded our expectations and we would highly highly highly recomend them for your wedding or event! You will not be disappointed!! A huge thankyou from Angela and I, we will definitely be using you guys if we have any event that needs catering in the future!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPM4xgncMQPsmciGTIVVu-T5elw1nIPFOjcKPfo&fid=0x0:0xc337a3f74351b29"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Chris L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlo27yi0c3tMg1MEFW8gltVROJwlBrQGtk927fnMS7KkAAA0UJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We live near this location. We have always driven by on the way home and can literally smell the BBQ driving thru! Finally we stopped in for the first time. We decided to try the Texas Sampler and Burnt Ends. I'm glad we popped by. The BBQ was amazing! I'm not a huge fan of coleslaw and even that was fantastic! the brisket melts in your mouth and don't even get me started on the pulled pork and sausage....OMG. Very filling, amazing food. The service was great, lots of parking, and some picnic tables to enjoy your food.  I highly recommend you stop in here if your a fan of BBQ. You will not be disappointed. This BBQ would turn a vegan into a meat eater lol. Kudos!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxzArQM2-knJZ9drDdpB5PcB7xCvKYc55QPyYW&fid=0x0:0xc337a3f74351b29"],"When":"2023-9-11"},{"Name":"Cassandra Dobson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUV6D3O8wzulTGMAbD-VbIDIHkG8XZiLYYb9ykJ9n9wL1grm94=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Me and my husband tried out Texas BBQ today for the first time and it did not disappoint
. Coming from a person who is personally from Southern Texas I would give the food 10/10. The brisket was tender and flavourful, the pulled pork was insanely delicious doused in bbq sauce which is a plus in my eyes. We ordered the platter for 2 and everything was super filling , it even came with pickles on the side 🫠🤤. This place made me feel like i was back in my ranch in southern Texas on a rainy day , with the smoker and grill out. The only thing you’re missing is the dos x ! 😋 pricey but worth it, only thing I could say on the negative side was that y’all’s brisket could of been a little warmer. Cheers .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMz9VzxhLdW8WiVi2h-ejXseyd_tqNrr0yOoMPK&fid=0x0:0xc337a3f74351b29"],"When":"2024-5-27"}]

I love that they have a jukebox! The burger with maple bacon \u0026 grilled pineapple is a must! The hotwings were so flavorful as well. I will definitely be coming back here often! We need more people like them everywhere!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cornell K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDvcx-pntlF4E-8CbyTjEg-pvvEO5ZKSkaJDYaT7Fjq3BWvw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The burgers were fantastic. I brought my kids and wife for a late night dinner and the burgers hit spot . Love this location as it’s easy to park and walk to . Enjoy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfJrbGxCis-XgdjDgcwLQmy1vsERjNIzV511DU\u0026fid=0x0:0xf9b433cdc447f9cb"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Taylor Wingert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0y55kUNUJd3nhPL3aUBHM4bik0HWURWdXweM5Hx467bu4eA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My mom and I came here the other day, because we do love the burgers. How ever we did stop coming here 6 months ago because we found it VERY rude and obnoxious that the cashiers yell across to everyone if you leave a tip or not. ( yells Tip or NO Tip) and I'm not joking when I say they YELL it in front of everyone. I was just getting take out so no service was provided, they just did their job. They made me feel that if I didn't tip they would do something to my food. I think it's absolutely ridiculous to treat customers like this at a fast food restaurant. I will no be returning here because of this, I was hoping it changed in the 6 months but it's still the same tacky service.","Images":null,"When":""}]

Portion sizes and presentation are a joke. It looked like one of those microwave dinners lol","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Laura C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUq4guapiizgdcTDv453bPSNkpj3Lkb9lCIVDCSwR6fxwWZ-E5u=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Really disappointed with the food at Good Taco. I ordered the carnitas taco plate with flour tacos. Portion of pork was miniscule, beans tasted weird and the flour tacos dried out and were hard by the time I assembled my own tacos (yes, you have to assemble your own). Ordered side of guac and chips. Looks like and tastes like the guac is prepackaged... definitely not fresh or chunky - it was like a blended \"avocado\" spread and the chips weren't even home made? They were like Cineplex nacho chips circa 2004. They were also broken into tiny pieces. Overall, I do not recommend.  If you want take-out Mexican - go to Sal Y Limon in South Surrey where everything is made fresh on site - or better yet, cross into Blaine, WA for Border Town Tacos *amazing and authentic*\n\nWhat an absolute disappointment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMo-w9hZXHWm4RZ1P7Hqs0Ag_IO_bcXDs9yFdb8\u0026fid=0x0:0x107083673ddd0d83"],"When":"2023-5-3"},{"Name":"Angela Stara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtAVEnhn_Fo3dP3PTqi6Ac9ynMLzPxMIU9M-GZnkbxlr5GUw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is good.  Gentleman that works there is great, got him a few times.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lanie Zulueta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIjacOZZNFIlv1T1yr25Te9nNNi1G78MhV6gOT7cCRO1Lr8sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We were greeted by the friendly staff as soon as we entered the resto. There are plenty of seating for indoor and outdoor dine-in options. The food was freshly prepared as you placed an order, and their serving portions were pretty decent.

The patio door was kept open, so some flies got into the dining area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObltuENzuS2Nz1zq-m1sGKiJCUizb0y8d7Ues4&fid=0x0:0x377d7ad54ec049a0"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Chris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmAGuTxcVGWR-K_AA7tgzU3JUj996tD1qBYlwy9cJu1EIREA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It would be nice if the food was hot when you pick up, wasn’t busy and I came to pick up food for my lunch at work in the same complex. Just would be nice to prioritize quality over speed when they clearly have time. I ordered Gyozas which were barely fried enough and not even hot at the pick up time. Not the first time this has happened either","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Benzi Schnauzer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUg4Da1Z4WzIs-k4nrBAmbrswcwf-49CVVRmHpcw6VLF6kUyoZl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Noma is very typical of sushi restaurants in local neighborhoods.  The menu includes a nice blend of the usual favorites with some in-house creations for those wanting something different.  We appreciated our waiter telling us about the flavor and scent of the seafood we were ordering.  It was a level of care and attention that was welcome.

The rolls and sushi were fresh and flavorful on the whole.  Large rolls were oversized for single mouthfuls and the vegetable roll was mostly spring mix salad available at any grocery store.  The BC roll was full of cooked salmon, rather than toasted salmon skin as normal.  However, the food was all quite tasty.

Where the restaurant misses five stars is in cleanliness and upkeep.  The inside seating seems more of an afterthought and the place is showing wear and tear.  One particularly bothersome part of our meal was the flying insects.  We encountered an aggressive wasp, house flies, and small fruit flies.  If we were outside, I would understand; but we were inside and away from the door.

Is this sushi restaurant worth a visit? Yes, I think so.  It is not going to be destination dining; but a good choice if in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMogORg7Koi9rfNi6I80M3yLTz8hw6VjnnrZ61a&fid=0x0:0x377d7ad54ec049a0"],"When":"2022-9-9"},{"Name":"Sonja Waeckerlin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjLfQuYhaqi4OWMugl3v93gs4w9pND2OePZRfBaF_eYfB9Sfte=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food, excellent service. Walked in and picked up take-out, took about 20min for them to prep, absolutely no complaints. Will definitely be back to try some more!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ricardo Amanda Paliotti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1-tWR3oImGXb1bh0eJaBkqqB4lKa--eRLaWv99DtP2gOoadI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best of all towns ! Never let us down. Very consistent. ☆☆☆☆☆ .Thk u ! #1 Excellence time & time again. NOV. 8/24","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDNMtGmraeBXH3Oi993M9Ycves47SHWh2gq649&fid=0x0:0x377d7ad54ec049a0"],"When":"2022-8-15"},{"Name":"Yui Chit Jiff Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-uUyC4o_20rrkv3nCKHjaAwDrVoN7ihm8gdC7o5yMrUXzfOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Heavily recommend here if you want a great meal. I will recommend you always getting one of the lunch combos. It’s so worth it as you use fifteen or so dollars to get a meal with insane portion sizes. Actually, all meals here have big portion sizes. If you’re looking for a Japanese meal that’s worth the price , definitely come here!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Свят Мысив","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX93F7wrB6Dc0ihsqMdg_UZCsT49nCSpKfsLxLjyzUVquEapYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's a feast for the stomach! Love you guys a lot ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZM9WN6A6Bdlu8Ni5DwsrncrAx1NlPBev_Gd4M&fid=0x0:0x377d7ad54ec049a0"],"When":"2024-8-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Olive Alexander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2xiPy8HKde93MjogE8geFF59s-ra1lbOxiwUDYpvHTORrkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came in here because it was close to home and rated well. The man behind the counter was so sweet and professional. We was cool with me choosing half rice half salad, since some places charge extra for that. He was also chill with how many of each side I chose. The bowl was huge and delicious, made with fresh ingredients. I appreciate the sauce combo suggestions they offer (firecracker sauce combo was a tasty blend of spicy, sweet, and umami). This might be my new local go-to!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkBzK2P-dfudRVQ4VGPp7411FLJLEtxzbpWI__&fid=0x0:0x98cd2633d2fda7ef"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"kerry andrews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPbC_mt5KZwWO8OIH7sD2YfrVDv5xCUx5mQyZ523roRd2onGU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Signature bowl Tuna so fresh. A great place for Poke. Dine in is comfortable and pleasing. We take out mostly but super fresh Poke.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7Gk73MT4x-At7_M1rlrhnGzYc4E34v4h8nLYB&fid=0x0:0x98cd2633d2fda7ef"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Aaron Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRwH-T4meTA46mZWwBX8SW-8HRP3aTbI4qdWLp7QDk8OwKOg_kvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had 2 bowls, my wife and I love it here. The girl that served us had great suggestions  that made them better. I wish I took photos. You wouldn’t believe the portion size. One bowl = 2 meals. If you havent been here your missing out. Worth the drive but delivery is great","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael-James Roman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyUHuACQAavj8UP8GoxL2c95ZNkVdxJ51KnMUKvEGYSQ6bWuY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Half filled bowls for 22$ each.
Highway robbery

Chipotle gives better portions","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJxDPhnKJG9JVk--bEO-BXjWIPUma-Nwod4Mk&fid=0x0:0x98cd2633d2fda7ef"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"J K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6uO_76uX1R0iBkaJFVU6WUtPchC8OEOsN73PrM4Xw8fbtl8Gr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my first time here and the servers were so welcoming! They recommended the fire cracker sauce with plain salmon and it was the bomb! One thing I wish it could have  improved is they could either put more rice or less sauce to make it a better balance. Overall, it was a delicious poke!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5ABCjjYvZcRV5taGpYArVkSR03RDsp8dwvQ1C&fid=0x0:0x98cd2633d2fda7ef"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Athena Allen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMml6gCYTxiKd_ngDzL7fxyNQfdZ62qCh-sjsb5_FJDO9sCNno=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was extremely fresh and I appreciated that the rice was warm and the cold items cold. Had the ahi tuna and salmon with firecracker sauce. Just the right amount of heat. I think the avocado added to the texture with the crispy onions. We also had one bowl with octopus as a treat! Very friendly service. Extremely clean and well kept restaurant.  Will come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODRy-0oGh2ZFS2TlWNrQbytcnMf0QOPrmpFLPu&fid=0x0:0x98cd2633d2fda7ef"],"When":"2023-7-5"},{"Name":"D MC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpC7RrSmxTvBQnrycmHk8RaExCMfuDFwhzqbvkpLlK-dzTjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update June 2023 - went in for another poke bowl today and was pleasantly surprised by the kale noodles. These were delicious on a hot day. The original sauce is yummy, I will definitely be back. Still 5 stars!

‐-----‐-------'

Nice poke joint. I ate up my small bowl pretty quickly. There's a lot packed in. Staff were very friendly and the place was very clean. I wouldn't get the imitation crab topping again though - it seemed a bit dried out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi7d0ocjVRY4qBQyKO_pCnCYpdW8xSt0uAN6Uz&fid=0x0:0x98cd2633d2fda7ef"],"When":"2022-3-27"},{"Name":"Vanessa Siemens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJKCfF96Py35XeRij3LfZ7iw1-PArlS476_Zv-0lpjLz3Xkx3yww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was so excited to see a poke bar in Walnut Grove and I finally got to try it the other day- it did not disappoint. The staff were really friendly and helpful, there were many different topping choices and sides to choose from. The amount they gave was very generous and the care and detail put into building the bowl was great. Each bite was delicious and I enjoyed it thoroughly. I was sad when it was finished because it was so tasty, but the flavours lingered long past my final bite. I look forward to returning and trying other combinations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm7YwM-oStQvFwy5n0MiuOsnA--t4FiGrSSYww&fid=0x0:0x98cd2633d2fda7ef"],"When":"2022-2-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lance Hakim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZwgA-Yqxa9xX_BrBrid0gcrr-1_HGW2J_cY60zLsmdt32Ogwl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sure! Here’s a fun and inviting Google review for The Mad Italian:

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

“The Mad Italian: Where Pizza Dreams Come True”

If pizza is your love language, The Mad Italian is your soulmate. I walked in expecting a meal, and I left feeling like I’d just had a spiritual awakening (but with way more cheese).

The pizza? Unbelievable. I’m pretty sure they’ve hired a wizard in the kitchen because I can’t explain how they’ve managed to make crust this perfect. Crispy on the outside, soft on the inside—it’s like biting into a cloud that’s also been to culinary school.

And the service? Out of this world. I thought I was a regular person, but after five minutes, I was convinced I was royalty. The staff treat you like long-lost family, the kind you actually like.

Do yourself a favor: Stop reading reviews and get to The Mad Italian. You’ve got pizza dreams that need fulfilling, and this is the place that can make them come true. You’ll leave full, happy, and slightly convinced you’ve found the meaning of life—hint: it’s pepperoni and their house made ranch dipping sauce and chilli oil!

P.S. Don’t ask for the ranch recipe….They won’t tell you. Believe me, I tried.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLYeqKv7TPyJmNvJ-HZrD0vKmVf4LVUceBOAQD&fid=0x0:0xa114619d66dfcfb3"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"S. T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvRR4_n7-aBEiZRKbznJjpT4F7lgVqLiemg5GhtgKa3AE0GA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend the Mad Italian! If you like Neapolitan pizza and good beer you will love this place. Recently under new ownership and the service was super friendly and attentive. We will be back! Great vibes here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO46CCQBEbx01D5zNuO5u53qdiYSC7Qea-w4Ewo&fid=0x0:0xa114619d66dfcfb3"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"R L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDo--fdptHZ71prIhGQPJ7FahkbWrF05rgkw3OmUDlyk4sGVAj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place and ambiance, great pizza with wonderfully glutinous crust. I especially liked the Nutty Honey. Pesto is a great topping.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjtG1_ziToolR_ONoQT7N2aEHFWnT6-iAFTnLI&fid=0x0:0xa114619d66dfcfb3"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Ricardo Amanda Paliotti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1-tWR3oImGXb1bh0eJaBkqqB4lKa--eRLaWv99DtP2gOoadI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great fast authentic pizza with quality toppings. Ready in 10 mins or less. New bar with taps ! Just onpoint each time we go nothing but delivering expectations. Or take it & stretch it yourself at home. Most lively happening place in all of the village on weekends. NUTTY HONEY my new favorite! New products added to menu. OCT. 23 /24. New drinks & brews Nov. 30 /24","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlNprgtol6HQGZH5YuEgI7VxG4X8o4UNlcw1U9&fid=0x0:0xa114619d66dfcfb3"],"When":"2023-7-21"},{"Name":"Vlad Kamchiline","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3okq3NQWPOJqiOl4zd0Qrbd6N2ENO97CMPubcw7yyamKvNg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here to enjoy some drinks and pizza with friends. I heard there were new owners so we came by to check it out. Great price on drinks, pizza was great, and I heard they are adding cocktails soon which is great, will come for that again! The owner was very involved and made the experience cozy and we all felt welcomed which is important for a small place like this. Looking forward to coming back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Janessa Harder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqH-3A-zadNRDmcAMQmEJeZe23N8e8eVIYcyCPWJNmkRedawwj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here for the first time with some friends. Great atmosphere, the service was great, and the pizza was phenomenal! I’m gluten intolerant and this was the first pizzeria I found that has gluten sensitive pizza crust and doesn’t lose any taste. It tasted better than regular pizza crust. I got a Caesar salad, Buffalo Chicken pizza and a Blueberry Limoncello Cider, all of which were amazing. During the meal, the owner even came by to check on everything which added to our visit. This is such a gem, we will definitely be going back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"T L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlZv7_BS76hKZVl0Wb4gyyjBqUyJq5wa407QgwWRTbVcuuHoaG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I’m a fan of a good Neapolitan style pizza (thin base, with a puffed airy crust) so this place is a favourite! They have a wide selection of different variations of “pies”. My go-to being, the Margherita or Vegetarian (love the freshness the arugula gives). I also appreciate how they have an option to create your own, although it’s not very obviously advertised. The only reason for the lack of the last star is that: one time I was ordering with someone who is gluten sensitive and we saw there was an option for them on the menu. Labelled as “gluten-friendly” or something of that sort, yet still contained gluten and wheat, just less. Long story short, they couldn’t enjoy the pizza with the rest of us because of false (or not clearly specified) advertisement.

Feedback for the company: Ultimately, I believe that they shouldn’t bother with any gluten related titles. As it can be deceiving and potentially harmful. If they want to cater to that group, they could make one that is actually gluten free. In that case, cross contamination is of course understandable and should also be noted","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlNmd8UTRerO9Ikk-8ZzTgQ8ApU9731lFl6jz4&fid=0x0:0xa114619d66dfcfb3"],"When":"2023-7-12"},{"Name":"Chris S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmYHb_KmQh-jaUeScM_TxpeioRL8O096fWi7rSR_TSHEj6B5M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a weekend must for my wife and I. We make sure to come here every weekend no matter what. Friendly staff, quick service, rotating local craft beers, great decor, and amazing pizza. Many friends have tried Mad Italian as well, and they are hooked like us.

Update: Lately, the pizza has been hit or miss. We have noticed that going on Wednesday's have been amazing. Veronica, our favorite server, is always so attentive and so cheerful and gives us the best service. On some odd weeks, when we can not make Wednesday's, and go on Tuesday or Thursday, the pizza comes out soggy, and flimsy and waitresses hardly ever check in on us. My wife and I will continue to try to make Wednesdays more often as those are the days pizzas are made best, and Veronica is there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNI9g7Jbi26mfcifzlA3PrJ9rajPgkhsGel40uB&fid=0x0:0xa114619d66dfcfb3"],"When":"2022-6-21"}]
