user_reviews:
[{"Name":"jen h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhCIsdNpI0zn0ln1R2W8y6FEnO7Rpwo3p2N6L3S94WtNoyzHf7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped by as we weren’t feeling like eating at the big food court in willowbrook. Captains oven has a nice little seating section for its own restaurant and had very lovely staff when we went. Ordered just  pizza to share and it was delicious. It’s nice they have their own seating. They have a pretty big list of pizza toppings and other entree dishes. I would go back to try some other items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUNlthm5V_ovWbwl56h3R7CHGOpZRnI4wJkCIN&fid=0x0:0x54f78ad4e8ff58f8"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"E (HiLite-ReeL)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiKv-aG6PfAesbUzVGhjDF72QYTRBtOWA90c4xgyj9F924_sek=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Had been to captain ovens in Surrey which was excellent, however I'm sad to say the standards in Langley are not up to par.

See attached photo, pizza was delivered arrived smashed into half. Was unable to feasibly eat the half of the pizza without rolling it to save it's structure.  Pizza also arrived cold.

2 pizzas for 65$. Don't order delivery. Or perhaps go to another location to save yourself the hassle.

Langley residents deserve better.

Update

The owner has gotten in contact with me and refunded the one unsatisfactory pizza.  The owner was very diligent and want to provide excellent service and standards. The owner went above and beyond to make the situation right.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqlhNAUnCKQ0WC1HXUjOZKy8pFs_RGtYj9OlG2&fid=0x0:0x54f78ad4e8ff58f8"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"R L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDo--fdptHZ71prIhGQPJ7FahkbWrF05rgkw3OmUDlyk4sGVAj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A nice enough option. The happy hour deal is good ($10 for a small pizza). I liked the smoked salmon, which was very flavourful, but unfortunately the toppings on the oceanside felt rather mismatched and consequently skimpy. But, the pizzas are freshly made, and the crust is great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4OcwxADQMlK6iTkYE1FaXQAEuqphnv4x-wG-t&fid=0x0:0x54f78ad4e8ff58f8"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Michael Pelletier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVK-E20DRsZ97S1VSwaaN3pwgz9CV_iLHYZWsjfHu3R__oCkuc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First visit; Pizza was fresh and delicious and for us the meatballs are an absolute must on any order.😋 Our pick-up order was quick and friendly.

Our second visit not as good as our first visit. Crust was undercooked and the meatballs were split and cold with less sauce than our previous visit. Kinda disappointed but you know, three strikes and you’re out so we will give it one more try at some point.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_izAfDejYUJbxJUUaSCUUF2xqLx1BCU-bUNCj&fid=0x0:0x54f78ad4e8ff58f8"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"SIMRAN KAUR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3cTVJLuZAVLfpEkGNLX1NonxvN2TtNLzM5XWxdPg17q1QTi9KhA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Captain's Oven Pizza in Langley is a hidden gem for pizza lovers. Known for its wood-fired, artisan-style pizzas, it offers a perfect balance of crispy crust, fresh toppings, and rich flavors. The menu features a variety of options, from classic Margherita to unique gourmet creations, catering to diverse tastes.

The cozy, inviting atmosphere makes it a great spot for casual dining with friends or family. The staff are friendly and ensure quick service, adding to the overall experience. Whether you’re craving a traditional pizza or something more adventurous, Captain's Oven Pizza is definitely worth a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7_3EWmpe9zPjK0yiEYBS7CkBinj4k5fMsDClK&fid=0x0:0x54f78ad4e8ff58f8"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Mary E.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK9nh07T0EebN2eLoKoCH_S2Qclfs3Uq2kh5AZrQu4tidrCoA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Captain’s Oven Pizza never disappoints! I tried their new steak and cheese, along with my all-time favorite truffle mushroom—both were delicious. They really take the time to treat each customer with care, and the quality is always top-notch. Can’t wait to go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXnHwk92bDfQTzfOYW9tYWNTX_4CWcsJu3fShf&fid=0x0:0x54f78ad4e8ff58f8"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"cole hebert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPF1KxzhAQhdEbgaopBh9Xv0GJ2vN3J6u931N_pXaSPhneYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"**UPDATED REVIEW***
Went back and dined in. The service was great and the pizza was better than the first time.

The burrata was very good and a reasonable price. Garlic sauce is very good.

******
Pretty mid and overpriced.

The dough is chewy, flavours are okay. Even pizza garden or earls is much better and it’s not remotely comparable to a real Neapolitan pizza.

Makes me question the reviews.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4seJZcrirXygVYWr4IrFe2z42Bai10GVUTiwz&fid=0x0:0x54f78ad4e8ff58f8"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Michal Kraus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXONDswkrBg_74UNWul4fJjVFyJmiztq2cbI0T2rn136buhSJjU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My and my family recently visited this pizza place, and it exceeded my expectations. The crust was perfectly crispy, toppings were very fresh and flavorful, overall probably one of the best pizza in the City. Staff was super friendly and their service was great. We got a good deal on Monday: 50% off on the second pizza, and could order half and half pizzas. I’ll definitely be coming back there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7DCpc2UD_tbCeERIqNmd0C6hOq2PeYaACvO1U&fid=0x0:0x54f78ad4e8ff58f8"],"When":"2024-9-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Charles Kang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIhP222HYnCrrnM6OwR1mxpDz1-Q3vBOO6Pkc57_AK76xDhMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered waffles with my family today as usual. We live around here and every time we visit the mall here, we get bubble tea or waffles with my family.

A little kid who looked like 10 to 13 was working as a casher. Looks like he's the son of a cafe owner here. I don't know if it's legally possible for young kids to work.

After ordering the waffle, I was eating it sitting on a chair in front of the café and asked for a cup because I needed a drinkable cup, and a child who works as a casher called an adult next to him, but she said I could pay it with a very firm look on her face. Before I paid, I felt terrible about her expression. I tipped it, and I hated the look on her face so much that I wanted to retrieve it.

It's a place I always visit, but I won't be visiting anymore. My family doesn't go to places with poor service, no matter how attractive they are. I'm sorry I've experienced this.

Do not respond with that look to customers who have purchased your food. Or, remove the tipping bin.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJjMt7TJrFNQ-A6WGSGP3Zb8xf5x2FYhJSymtm&fid=0x0:0x7962c38ec697663b"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"A L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDuox32jyJxnkzAm48h5i9Ht66Z7AvtkXQcQV08flbS_JcS1Q6eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A very satisfying dining experience. The meals all come with drinks, and you can add-on a bubble waffle for $1.99. Great value! The HK milk tea and lemon tea are really good, when ordered less sweet.

The dry noodle dish would be a pass for me next time (it was below average), but the noodle soup dishes (laksa in particular), hainanese chicken, and salty chicken nuggets are all good.

There is very minimal seating at the restaurant. They have maybe 2 tables of 4. There are some chairs/benches just outside the restaurant (in the mall), but even that's taken most of the time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOpFT2TLyrYzlsmQQ92rZaWCajevhjA4cb7i7H&fid=0x0:0x7962c38ec697663b"],"When":"2023-5-30"},{"Name":"Dana Meng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWns9Obqs0woSr1Ts68KiDwp_BFLjIHf7KQr8QzjN-qYhkyxpV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a very decent cafe style restaurant. I love their classic salty chicken nugget combo and laksa soup. The tastes are fantastic. This little cafe added points to whole Langley city for Asian community👏 Their combo set comes with a drink and add 1.99$ you get a fresh crispy bubble waffle. Highly recommend to try their dishes if you come to Willowbrook mall. Will be back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsoXKW5LvmU6lydHWLP_ZvLauWYBnMgar_H4Ra&fid=0x0:0x7962c38ec697663b"],"When":"2023-11-16"},{"Name":"Jason Chi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPKMARPtkW-qvBT6AAYyJlEjrXtkzgH4VYcK-ppxLf_WcPXzSE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"As other reviews have indicated, the chicken rice at this location was significantly inferior to other establishments. The reason for this disparity is unclear, as this franchise typically maintains a central kitchen to ensure consistency in taste and quality across all stores. Won’t be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chang Wun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXinnRETbtdmwq0G3dzHpocXq4c0y1kT8tCLTmXT5-MPrsCx3WH9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beef with laksa soup tastes really good
The chicken one is also good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdJqdFvQZYQKGDOLPFMY-LZuovzNdoIiIiAfwf&fid=0x0:0x7962c38ec697663b"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"G G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWd7SojLha7-aU_LM34r76xW6vbVQTqJEvYg87x3NV3Pu3c7Lk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Bought some chicken laksa and the chicken taste awful like being cooked a day ago and missing waffle in the order . My wife ordered chicken have throw away in garbage , very bad taste not even close to hianan chicken . Their chicken portion a lot . Hope they see this review and can improve the quality .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Caroline Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVF8jZLN678mm_3azpixielOe_0ASOiF1oRsCVhvJ3aGiGLuXA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The meal was worth the price, my favourite being the laksa noodles, you get a big portions of meat, veggies and noodles for just $15.99, plus a drink (milk tea is highly recommended), and for another $1.99 you can get a bubble waffle which tastes amazing;)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMD0ucZ4V3OuVJA_Rcy6iNAovBSG5Q22n_J9Taq&fid=0x0:0x7962c38ec697663b"],"When":"2023-4-16"},{"Name":"Vincent Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnvEhuepeT7_NyV52WbyTi48r4LaD51Z_k4do4aPwGie2_Og=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very very very bad service. Order hainanese chicken with rice and the chicken was cold straight out of freezer. It’s so cold that my laps could feel it when I was eating. Chicken is also super dry. Very bad service and rude chef","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"J Q","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWLFaR2htiLNLIQAXB2-FbuNystyoB794RiAm0Uo82lJgg8OdK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious main dishes, loved how they serve some bread as soon as we get sat down.

Thursday night servers were very kind and attentive!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhcsxdNJj-BYNQLaARawGLTCAPsyU0i53Cbxxq&fid=0x0:0xaa04bb6ed42d9de9"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Jim Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1fPXhj_0fpQCW37ng_LIGZTe2ztnaSFDep7vDCFRl9w_bSiCt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend took me to the restaurant to show me a different type of cuisine. I loved it! Wonderful staff and delicious food! And dessert was just perfect! If you’re looking for amazing Italian cuisine in Langley, Pasta Polo’s the spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJIU8RObgSdalF2cR9X09zvh6xU609kOmAd7J0&fid=0x0:0xaa04bb6ed42d9de9"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Danilo Teodoro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_rV4_xok36vIezJ6uAhpzSfyECA8ogmjA4ehyXVTr4dBqIAFv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Service was good and fast. The courtesy bread with sauce was pretty good! The main dishes were just ok though, not bad, but no highlights.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_O40pRD_kvZfIz8DYCcG1k6wkg_W8bMlnhDoU&fid=0x0:0xaa04bb6ed42d9de9"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Mehmud Iqbal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzdKzd7CEtSWik7PUDkAL2bm7hm1Q3Nn4JMf0vY7aaPod9GjZfWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Super good pasta and a big seating area. Highly recommended for a meal with friends and families. The service was excellent and on time. Also comes with a wide variety of wines to complement your main meal. Definitely coming back and making it my go to place for pasta.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPh6m6e_Y_-W9RlMSoPsx4YPWlPzZUvmqKRxQb&fid=0x0:0xaa04bb6ed42d9de9"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Lori Rusk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDOKCMJVoXErzqjfmX-UAZlf1u3sotEpsxDddtfjcgWyRVjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic place! Yummy pasta for 15 bucks 6 dollar glass of red wine for lunch - how can you go wrong? Generous portions and complimentary garlic bread. Icing on the cake - Creme Brulee! Best I have ever had! And the waitress was so sweet! Cannot wait to go back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yui Chit Jiff Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-uUyC4o_20rrkv3nCKHjaAwDrVoN7ihm8gdC7o5yMrUXzfOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good food! Waitress is very nice and the food incredible. Recommend ordering from the lunch/ dinner menu as it is cheaper with huge portions. Has lots of parking spots and this spot is a hidden gem. Come here if you don’t like Olive Garden.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amanda K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcvWUn8FhuekXSMV62W9VugVYaPIdUjExULdYkd7u6RDbe9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered a takeout lunch of the smoked salmon pasta and the lobster lunch special, with a side Caesar salad to share, and it came with grilled garlic toast. Everything was absolutely delicious!! My husband and I shared with each other and both loved every bite. The flavourful smoked salmon and capers paired so nicely with the olive oil and red onion. The lobster, shrimp and crab were juicy and delicate, served with a wonderful creamy alfredo sauce. Portions were generous, service was quick and friendly. We will definitely be ordering again soon! And will also look forward to dining in the restaurant when we have an opportunity.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEyeydHDEKOLxA4S_VCpAkduEDehA8AbPWxNRahiVa8ycb7rM8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Visited for the first time a couple of weeks ago. There was a large party that may have contributed to some issues.
Unfortunately, the experience overall wasn’t great.

Ordered an appetizer that never arrived.

Requested a sauce change on my pasta (no pesto, sub cream sauce), but was surprised by an unexpected $3 fee.

Ordered the classic spaghetti and meatballs, but was disappointed as the meatballs tasted off. Later discovered the meatballs are frozen in a bag, which was disheartening.

We took what we didn't eat home. The next day, it fell into a bunch of mush while trying to reheat so was trash.

Spent well over $50 - avoid this spot, would not visit again.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"David Tomlinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeebA1PMrrmuv4hPWhfRC7T3fZP_mmx-afa-rPxvLvt7LN7g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down, one of my favourite cafes for years now. The thing I love about this place is the fresh food, all made on site throughout the day, and all made with simple locally sourced ingredients (a story the owners really need to tell). Personal favourites include the rhubarb cream cheese danish, the breakfast croissant (or burrito) and the amazing chocolate chip cookies (with just a taste of salt on each one). During the summer months the evening wine bar is one of Fort Langley's best kept secrets.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmLmjeHM_fmky64NWFFjy8MivHrmcPWeewyT8&fid=0x0:0x8e0cf664852e7f53"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"wah chi yip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKBykHMUbkrtJ4cwRRXsjOnAzAcOzwrpq-XVjovUt6A3trFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's a hidden gem in this small town.  The tea, coffee, baked goods are all great.
The staff are friendly and helpful.
When we visit this time, may be they are really short of staff.  It takes more than 30 minutes to get the drinks and baked goods.
The courtyard is so pretty with some good seating old fashioned chairs.
A nice place for a tea.  Hopefully, the line up will be shorter next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNreasOQwkfHh_lvL6wENePhwzchN5rns8HWoBo&fid=0x0:0x8e0cf664852e7f53"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"GH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjL7JVV6ausdnP45ZqwT_MXpeCtJK50ZS4aFzmUFU_4i3_4eA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has very good service, along with the atmosphere of this restaurant which is nice and very comfortable and the food is amazingly cooked. I tried the breakfast hash, and I very much recommend it. This place is one of my favorite cafés. The only thing is that there are too many people sometimes so I think if they added more space for tables, and chairs, it would be better. But everything else is perfect for me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnAXqcY9T3f03DQL8Gau2GVYH5mKemMR8Pr4oO&fid=0x0:0x8e0cf664852e7f53"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Elisa Kazan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfnXq79FXK6SM_3Qr0x9E7eqGAf2iM5e785pouauMfz2nICrvAIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A cute cafe with indoor and outdoor seating, lots of baked goods, kombucha and alcoholic beverages. We went on the weekend and the line was insane so we waited a while to order but once we did the coffees were made quickly. A little too bitter my liking and no seasonal drinks but the cute atmosphere made up for it. I noticed a lot of gluten free and even vegan options for baked goods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUUMaRR7OIT4ui10e1mnR16A9KIeDdQCrCCtk0&fid=0x0:0x8e0cf664852e7f53"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKy_RY7OyFpWDMGpBPfEcNdhNvd_Bt7gU5qWs4wH5XumgCFAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place is such a little gem in Fort Langley. Wanted to visit the area as I had family in town and it definitely was a good decision. Food was soooooo good! Highly recommend the breakfast hash and mushroom toast!!! Wish I had an extra stomach to try more items.

Their matcha latte was perfection…
I hate to say this but their cappuccino was the worst I’ve ever had. Barely any coffee aromatics and it wasn’t cheap. That was definitely money down the drain.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfilL9hpCgiIr7indKKDg0KERZpB4AO28Nw8VK&fid=0x0:0x8e0cf664852e7f53"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXclLzFOZebBq0D1P6DXbTNuAdCFzeYlMZFVvgi1A5VbWvym50Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the best pastries i've had in a while!!! I loved the cream on the Danish, and the flavor of the pecan pie. the sandwich was also really juicy and fresh. there is a wide selection of baked goods and drinks. the interior is also really nice and cozy, and we sat outside in little picnic tables outside the cafe. we went on Canada day so it was pretty crowded and the line was long.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_RjCTwx-1QUZ4jpeKijSg0VbcBuZ9GPv3atNu&fid=0x0:0x8e0cf664852e7f53"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Just Me Traveling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX18amg9WNM9rF8Fs9axj8FE9tNtrVpXPgaMIl0yMbfuZ56ahzt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love, love this place! The quality of food and drinks are great. The service was quick even with long line up. The staff were great and cheerful. So many pasty to try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaXSkTqrkjc_NFs2DziIIVRWwF4z95hn1IhQZU&fid=0x0:0x8e0cf664852e7f53"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Mrs. Leci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFUu7tIDGHhiFP61EOIZLCOSzvwJkGN10CXxqa6MRhYpyxpm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had to try their goods here as it was very inviting! They have a lot of pastries to choose from. Although it was very busy when we visited due to an event in the area, it was worth it. Yummy!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMjJVp-_GFgolTtpmHEvTzB6ZAkmbF3SkFsFUf&fid=0x0:0x8e0cf664852e7f53"],"When":"2024-10-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Meriel D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdBZiOjd-GeyzGMWsBAXROxAGpgvxnw6omqBMdoCAEl3YzDBX0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for dinner with my two kids and hubby! We ordered pho and the cha gio

The broth is very clear and flavourful I could definitely have it without any hoisin or siracha. This pho restaurant stood out to me the most because they serve pickled garlic and had a house made chili oil not many restaurants would have this option it’s definitely a true northern style pho restaurant!

They were also so accommodating and brought my kids drawing pads while waiting for the food! 10/10 service and food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGYpahxdN6Tytjo2_E6UTuSxo5ibZ5mj5iIbrz&fid=0x0:0xa03ec15c415ade38"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"burgess andre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7LWDqT2dsXJc6o6IW1v0oWGKmOM4xURWSQbTOjG16Vr6PeA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such amazing food. The quality is exceptional 👌. You can tell how much pride they take in creating such fantastic meals with every bite. If you are looking for a well protioned, healthy, delicious meal on the go. This would be a top recommendation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnxQ6Otr8qhaY4acgC0qNlCQda5hT8cqfCO7xr&fid=0x0:0xa03ec15c415ade38"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Chi Hsi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcBbxQUmUDBINWW8gpiVBRZkPGVAvZUVKaxZbYRVQUj9Y0ACg0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried their pho last time which was great, so I visited again. I ordered the vermicelli bowl with honey grass chicken this time. The food tastes great and I ate every bite! The ingredients are fresh and the chicken cooked perfectly, so it wasn't dry and was very flavourful.

The staff are very friendly. I came right at 6pm on a Wednesday evening, so it wasn't busy yet, but more guests came in right after me. If I had friends visiting and craving Vietnamese food, I'd take them here for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3hrZAZv9mYiXQB0AXZlf0DSAg1dKycIRjyj6E&fid=0x0:0xa03ec15c415ade38"],"When":"2024-5-23"},{"Name":"Adam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJoX78mA_gvcMxPZj7-sh1J-GZvHMRCSKKa04yU5joj0ZwvUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My buddy said "wow, these spring rolls are really really good, better than my moms" and you know these are fighting words, especially when i know his moms spring rolls are super good too. i have no picture to prove it since we ate them so fast.

The cold coffee here was excellent, smooth and creamy, not overly sweet, Bun Bo Hue and the dry noodles super tasty, wanted to try the mango sticky rice but i was too full.

will def come back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9m3jm_lUKpqevOWnUu-3f6OTSVqoQ37D6xY4Z&fid=0x0:0xa03ec15c415ade38"],"When":"2024-4-24"},{"Name":"Reena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYlg624O4_V5cITO-2oeXE8EpXfvoKPej7---M08Beow9yozd2xw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious Pho was so good! The broth was full of flavor, and the ginger on the side was a nice bonus. 10/10!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlQ_w3NZzFE4Caw6rRSUGWiIfU2a-AQveYnXSb&fid=0x0:0xa03ec15c415ade38"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Linh Pham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKCOw3fQaWenPsQMxyxr1hU4-lI-2RuQ45Au2zrIWrR9ouchk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"edit: thought i gave another try for delivering but the packaging was poorly :( . soup arrived in a plastic bag with barely any soup left . disappointed :(

tasty food, authentic, and the service there was very welcoming! Definitely coming back!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMG-Udvs1Hz3MIXfmV4QI5Jel7F57rMqV57COCU&fid=0x0:0xa03ec15c415ade38"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Maika Cohen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgVVe2-N9QG0cUu4liW3cr-lqVYHmwr_762FonybtiOFORwA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pho and great service. Owner was very hospitable to me and my kids.

I’ll be eating here again next time I’m around the area","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSwqxkpRlmHO19FKfx4J0aukSDIk40l8NefCGW&fid=0x0:0xa03ec15c415ade38"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Kevin Ngo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKPFSfALFBknu9CxcX682fDqC-ChhHSKnHN8ClWhQUWNez1b-0dQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They serve delicious food with beautiful plating, the staff is super friendly and courteous, the restaurant is clean, service was fast, and best of all - they have many vegan/vegetarian options! Highly recommend their vegan beef with coconut rice and vegan papaya salad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwBiYG-v8sI7Wc-F1-XiQFe2T-UvjXDemtn69k&fid=0x0:0xa03ec15c415ade38"],"When":"2023-9-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Oscar Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXB3_Fw9rNwYym37txYKrOT_uoZwbfNcOPzJ-YoMMFv9jRagenEUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Was stopping by Langley so wanted to find a nice cafe to chill before the rest of our journey. I was attracted to the pictures of cookies here so wanted to try it. I really liked the pistachio chocolate cookie! The Ferrero one was nice too. I got the breakfast one as I thought it was oatmeal but it ended up being a vegan one so I didn't like that one as much. The almond croissant was alright but could've been flakier.
The whole cafe gave off a woody cabin vibe. Loved it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeTdH0bNPJvvkP4VjdKd1_3RKctdS43vAhgQ2a&fid=0x0:0x8272018ad5ee4cc8"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Cavemancavan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKo0DI4xCYv6JOqFu2lbTAM2xAfP9MVOG1jX4q5925hUFXV1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Never a bad meal here, I really enjoy their sandwiches.  They change the menu up frequently with special lattes that are all worth a try.  Really liking this Spanish latte.  The grinder is my favourite sandwich, filling and a touch spicy.  Expect to drop about 18 bucks for a meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPodcomvu17nuLfWSsCfxG3MlvhYGYCkbUbgHnH&fid=0x0:0x8272018ad5ee4cc8"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Emily Hale","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsqbwOyO0KY2OSwMgjsHg_CMRXLVwneH8sLmJi2-99SNOz4YI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exceptional quality, service, and offering! I picked up breakfast for a corporate event, and the whole experience surpassed my expectations. I also had the opportunity to meet the owner, who was wonderful and passionate about his business. I highly recommend this coffee shop for any one needing catering or any individual wanting a high quality, great service, and fantastic setting to enjoy part of their day. My favourite Langley coffee shop!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tenaya Jeannotte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIV9FNXs99F0Yhk_9aWFXkaszE5GpG1YI7pSWduQH3oUJ7pNg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you enjoy a friendly atmosphere, super good service, a delicious bite and a revolving door of the most wonderfully crafted coffee specials than look no further. The changing coffee specials are always so fun to try and the grinder sandwich is my personal favorite, although everything is truly delicious. I look forward to relaxing in store on the weekends, but because of the convenient location near the highway and the early opening time on weekdays  I am also able to stop by on my way to work. I loved that they opened up limited cake orders for special occasions, and I hope they continue to offer this service in the future because the cake was so cute, it tasted fresh and you could tell it was baked with quality ingredients which I always appreciate. I love supporting local and this place has become a new favorite for our family and friends","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgQdl8Nh3_73_1_W162Ez_8XcBUo0cCEfz0-9M&fid=0x0:0x8272018ad5ee4cc8"],"When":"2024-5-22"},{"Name":"Jenny Polanco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgaiAlCsgxv5UAp8UD__C-WmlBCBZPOtc7MkYmn3freRAPpx0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Archr is hands down the best cafe in the area. Checking out coffee shops/cafes is one of me and my husbands favorite date ideas and being locals we have gone to several in town but Archr has been the best and everything on their menu keeps us coming back for more. The cookies are to die for we have tried so many flavours and they never disappoint. It doesn't matter what time of day you go they always taste so fresh and delicious, never too sweet and perfect soft, melt in mouth texture. Their coffee and all speciality drinks are also very delicious, honey oat latte and spanish latte are 2 of our faves. That's what i love that not only do they perfect their craft in sweets and eats but their drinks/coffee as well. I love how they are always experimenting new, fun flavours and they do an amazing job at marketing on social media. You can follow them to keep an eye on what new item they'll be crafting up next. The staff are always very pleasant as well and the atmosphere, esthetic of the cafe is very nice and a great place to sit down and relax. Convenient location near the highway exit as well with tons of parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNj1r9W8M1T9cx69bBXsCeSIo34nftgzldJaVqQ&fid=0x0:0x8272018ad5ee4cc8"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Lacey Lee Elliott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBMqID7kV8-HDHJrRZqSDsZ94Jlrk-pl5519ak4NAzuHUphlQJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The best coffee I have had so far in this area. The açaí cocoa bowl is soooo filling and the cookies are delicious. Could have better seating and friendlier staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkeC99zyLQJvzxc7xLnXID6sB90DBuZ2IDrP8h&fid=0x0:0x8272018ad5ee4cc8"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Paulina Ayala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7lsjzD2WaeWYWLVDHXDaO90Enedqqm0OKYa8d7_AaFt_P028=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried the cinnamon bun, pistachio cookie and chicken chipotle sandwich. Everything was delicious!!

It’s a nice place, comfortable and family friendly (they have high chairs 👌🏽). And services was pretty fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoc81HXha3CumgpyFLGwxpJ3MHqeuE9f7LmhxR&fid=0x0:0x8272018ad5ee4cc8"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent Walnut Grove cafe that’s notable for their stock of  Elysian coffee beans, their açai bowl and their crookies (croissant + cookie).

The acai bowl is delicious and is basically like a thick acai smoothie topped with honey, granola and fruits.

Wasn’t a fan of the crookie but YMMV. The chiopotle chicken sandwich wasn’t quite as good as I had hoped. The bread is nice but the chicken is just sliced deli meat; I guess $12 for a sub style sandwich isn’t too bad.

Service was cordial and quick.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNk2X5P0qJi2YO2Gv-ZKdSgzMk2uvAu2FohYeML&fid=0x0:0x8272018ad5ee4cc8"],"When":"2024-7-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Ricky’s restaurant has a lot of good stuff on the menu, we choose some Eggs Benny and we were so satisfied. Didn’t wait too long for our order and everything went smoothly.
If you want really good breakfast near Willowbrook mall in Langley you should definitely check out this place, I highly recommend it 👍🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYFPIm3MyM2zdzZegPlnK4qOBtcU5UOHArxspl&fid=0x0:0x1e9e55d1c3c71570"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Matt Perrone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdZp_I4P2OXDvK4cl2PHCqK99yGasnW9PyGqrfl4Nn1QpPmbJ8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ricky's is a restaurant that is diner style, with a decent sized menu and good prices for the portion size. The service here is good, very attentive and friendly. The food here is good as well, although my one complaint is I wish there were more of the ingredients in the dish - I could barely see any cheese or chorizo in the loaded hasbrowns, and there wasn't much icing on the cinnamon swirl pancakes. Fix this problem and it's an easy 5 stars for food because the taste is already there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJYMGYV4syr6mmCZ0bKRYouldcAt3CIUQkk9BN&fid=0x0:0x1e9e55d1c3c71570"],"When":"2023-5-6"},{"Name":"G W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVG1FFo9GTnRGQNpjln74dhjBn3V4nGRQE_Yjur_OV6HYJsv04F_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good food, service was good and a nice quiet atmosphere. Had a veggie omelet, it was good. Fair price. Would say Ricky's is a good family restaurant. Nice Happy hour menu too.
Chairs Suck. No foam padding left, like sitting on a plank of wood. Little old around here in atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlA8uwS_js3oDTtRO22L01nhJXRIinqhaAjYyC&fid=0x0:0x1e9e55d1c3c71570"],"When":"2023-12-26"},{"Name":"Roberta Dunford (Bobbie Joe)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbooxYPmsQQy3M9gNBqsDaTUvLy_LGDh8YuZGn0Pxifh9VlkVDSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our family went here for dinner there was my 13 yr son, my daughter and her fiancé and 5 kids under 6 yrs of age also another son. Kate  was our Waitress and if I can just say anything she was amazing, friendly, helpful and one of the best Waitresses I've had in many years.  Thank you so much for doing a great job at your job.

God Bless","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessie Sahota","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPckNh8PiBxil3Jd_HV3K3pKKvA_WM4SQjtorJTtguRtqaW58=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an unexpected breakfast today and ended up here- had a coupon to use so thought why not. I had the brioche breakfast sandwich- i did modify it slightly- and had the stuffed hashbrowns. The food came out perfectly and it tasted amazing. My server Sophia made the experience even better- i will be back just to have her as my waitress- she was always smiling and on point.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Murray Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7M3SlI81Le17J-BgUA2RdIFt-TRnM7EQTbI4Y4soYj3hB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has better hamburgers than most pubs or restaurants in the area.  Probably best burgers anywhere in Langley in my opinion.  You can tell they use fresh, quality ground beef.  I ordered the larger “King size original” burger with an 8oz patty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtcGiqLlAlayr1dE0KeKYuJ5OwNamjtmu1ekQ&fid=0x0:0x1e9e55d1c3c71570"],"When":"2023-10-20"},{"Name":"S Bansal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1TZbIDK9B79onJjhHBxnn6sya3bvuXFA5FESWwEchs0hPrCwRoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tried first time, and food was average. Not that great in taste","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOmaid2dilYjhUP10HbOJHE5dlMVPJ0qMTKYNk&fid=0x0:0x1e9e55d1c3c71570"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Paige McLean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPw6gHXPfxLaQuylP3ixH2QGAalQB6SvGadHEO-T35fRdHRVlE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great service and food very tasty.  We arrived just as doors opened at 8. Because the restaurant is attached to the Best Western, if you are wanting a hot breakfast this would be it. We ordered the traditional eggs Benny and the breakfast bowl. Both delicious.  We also asked for 2 scrambled eggs to go for our dogs and it wasn't a problem!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAJxYIiy3IrVmZsR16oxv7gEhfp4HdtL4QMSNK&fid=0x0:0x1e9e55d1c3c71570"],"When":"2021-7-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Louise Borg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXW3YoQtRSnL6dSrftCznw3yk2Sm5YWWx8ViMh7-0b9LROb9DGqWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were charging our Tesla in the lot nearby and we were starving so Ricky's was the closest place. One of the best burgers I've ever had!!! I had the mushroom melt on a brioche bun, with sweet potato fries that were crispy and cooked perfectly for me. The burger was so juicy and thick and damn tasty.
My husband had the fish and chips and I tried a bite of it and it was an amazing ratio of fish to batter. It's a bit dated decor but the waiter was super friendly and Quick service. It was quiet afternoon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtH1sa34EbQm1J__FjFx3KCMWRY9yXZVSZ6J1i&fid=0x0:0xc8e748884dcda11f"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Anthony P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLs_ykHpfHDvJPmbpAk7xuu_rUuFVGzhemf4k3aZWq9pxQhww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just had our last meal in BC here.  We stayed right next door.   If I knew breakfast was this good I would have had breakfast there more often.  Lunch menu was great as well. Thx guys.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNR8ZD_DyZNxj_Tzgm3NdKgoa84cVO6GvRNJybJ&fid=0x0:0xc8e748884dcda11f"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Ricky’s is just across Holliday Inn hotel so very convenient if you’re staying for a night and having a breakfast, my recommendation is any kind of Eggs Benedict, serving is fast and all employees are very kind.
Plenty of free parking in front of the restaurant and fast connection on Highway one.
Thumbs up for this place👍🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTJ07lyrqeG59kL0i1O9MMvUF4SLACkCL0iBAq&fid=0x0:0xc8e748884dcda11f"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"Terr Bear","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUvJqIl312nnim5yQsoDvhmngJtTJvM4AIHciQ1yHjv2rkaA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This location was right beside our hotel so we met up there with an old friend when passing through town.
Our server was fantastic, very polite and relaxed. We got sidetracked so many times catching with each other’s lives it took us forever to actually decide on what we wanted to eat and finally have him take orders.
The food was delicious, our meals ranged from salad with grilled chicken, to a turkey dinner to a burger and fries. Everything was hot, fresh and fantastic!
And at the end of our meal our waiter even offered to take our pictures! I actually think his comment was, “No selfies, I can take the picture for you!” and he did, about three or four of them to ensure we had at least one we all liked.
If we’re ever in the Walnut Grove area again we would absolutely stop in again!
Keep up the good work!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dean Cosmic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDpjZ7Y2icN3G7Wuc6znZ5WsLhmGcHuOpA0KMZ25qf3dUCwP3T=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is my go to Ricky's. I don't go very often though. Our waitress was really good, nice, friendly, checked on us. Food was good too. I tried the loaded hashbrowns and they seemed to be mainly loaded with sour cream. Burgers were well build and tastes yummy. The Benedict was plated well and we enjoyed them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaXrtY_0Vyao599ubVUQk6531sVATQyaD3rwUY&fid=0x0:0xc8e748884dcda11f"],"When":"2023-5-21"},{"Name":"Miss Mayhem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGowE1po-uzevgz4y-llWcltZGBd0Jj1Qx_2rqJzm0bNHjXwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I forgot that this place existed. Used to luv Ricky’s in Edmonton.
My experience with this place was alright I guess.

I was torn on what to eat until the tent card on the table caught my eye and I saw the schnitzel specials. I ordered the chicken cordon bleu schnitzel benny. As lucky would have it. They were out of chicken so I got the latter option for my schnitzel benny. In the photo you see I lifted the piece of meat to show how cooked it was. I had to saw through that thing and it was so dried out and over cooked. Our server hadn’t stopped to ask how things were during the meal. Had she done that I would have sent it back. Was pressed for time, took the meal to go and fed it to my pups. The bf had a good breakfast though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvnCy02fXlANTWBRlPkjU-I48VsyUhl0jsXPrC&fid=0x0:0xc8e748884dcda11f"],"When":"2023-12-12"},{"Name":"brooke clemens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnz30--NRKBL_pJAp8N4YTaoKNRXtARZv7wySEZSj-V4GBUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the turkey club with fries. The lovely waitress I think her name was Tatiana ♥ suggested it and asked if I wanted gravy. What a great decision. I came with good company, the food was delicious and well served. Will definitely go back!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzl73gKyNHvoLHqscj0akm10CksNwrchKJ0EcO&fid=0x0:0xc8e748884dcda11f"],"When":"2023-3-21"},{"Name":"John Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVX_G2KhQ4UDvw4Nu1dqA3AsXfC53tIj_AZn0iIn-6oDOg1Yst1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tomato Soup, Pasta and Fish&Chips are all great taste and big size.

Until I pay the bill and ask for packing the remaining food, I don’t understand that ordering Fish&Chips is an all you can eat dish. Because my English listening is bad, I am very embarrassed. But the staffs are very nice to explain for me, and let me pack it. They are so friendly and thoughtful that I are very appreciative to them.

My daughter hope that It would be better if there was a kids menu and there were waiters at the front to greet us so we won’t need to wait for them to come. Since they packed the Fish&Chips for us which wasn’t supposed to be packed, I still gave it a 5 star.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODXpXZXXMv_IzCYOWxHvCJUxkrM2GP04K74zjb&fid=0x0:0xc8e748884dcda11f"],"When":"2020-2-14"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Mori","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzjNclSLYHoLurDMy1z6lBJJfgC1i3gQXUk28JpQQw8EIfuYkF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Randomly popped in for a smoothie since I was in the area and grabbed a Pineapple Kale and added ginger to it and it tasted great.\nThe price was about a dollar or two cheaper than Whole Foods smoothies.\nThey make everything fresh and the service was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPt2BHcnO9SkEjVcuom2crwVZNwaP0cTtrOPn1g\u0026fid=0x0:0xc919a3f877cd85af"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Simran Boyal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8Z-F0up2HpRnZd0qzbOx6hVzWsetDIlvX-bDF8sw8A30VnXI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and service. Definitely recommend trying them out on your next trip to Langley!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4-WD95_Q5hGb4f_sQEhuDjaZANQOwfEK1xWc4\u0026fid=0x0:0xc919a3f877cd85af"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Karanpal Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItE2neFvYPy0d-6eb8LHgSIvZ9zx9W9Ngg9RB2O1FYv8OyUg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really clean store and awesome service alongside great prices. Had a beach bowl with a SB supreme smoothie. As well as a Bqq chicken painini with a cold terminator juice which was amazing. Will definitely be going again really refreshing food. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwUPnzdFsj_8PNLZcaDHtNnu1EBJdfc_T0_Xpj\u0026fid=0x0:0xc919a3f877cd85af"],"When":"2024-1-7"},{"Name":"Paige Watson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTRUmQ1gVHkjUYghe0EOR-bBztbUsa1OdVm6FVfRrG53-8IhuO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time trying this restaurant near my apartment - got the falafel wrap and upgraded to a meal with a house made orange soda and side salad \u0026 wow, so impressed with the portion size and quality for the price!!! Everything taste great and cannot even compare to the corporate competitor chains.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephanie Kovich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUun1hIR6pND_b_Kc0hTAGQ81alJ51pWGJZ7PLgRQGTJg82SekF-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here, Turkey Bacon Avocado wrap is delicious! They have a good menu selection and the prices are actually quite reasonable especially compared to other places like freshii and chopped leaf. Excited to come back and try more from here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkAtSK4gqMFSixvM_8ngrAhaSMUZAORcCQm_mS\u0026fid=0x0:0xc919a3f877cd85af"],"When":"2023-12-16"},{"Name":"Cream Boston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZsWFjXbIFTjDiHihyGG9iN9aePu0XRw0UAbh1bLUIrX7E1t4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good food, good services. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Youngjoo Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDb89fHG9rM-9x5KJ2uVxn1e9rKOTtNCCqmNQRbiuX7_dOww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried two of the summer special menu items. They were really delicious. Spicy chicken was super spicy, but it was worth trying. The restaurant is always clean, and the ingredients are fresh, so I feel healthier when I eat here. The friendly service always makes me feel good whenever I visit. It seems the summer menu is available until September, so I'll definitely try it again before then👍👍👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOo3VIhZ-91xBA2xpu4ZkFewLQcMnpvqnDX8wy&fid=0x0:0xb4e921b46e9120d"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Eatman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLAgqYaBUMpkBHH0grtwcpA057yUOwkUSgmEx4Zf06NcojqCY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First time trying the langley location so YMMV... and strictly comparing it to the BBY location it's  night and day.  Portions are wildly different with Langley being on the smaller side.  Flavors of my favorite bowl, the torched ahi tuna was not as good, lacking in the flame sear, not enough tuna, not enough food.. might not try again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNO1vbBCVAbxH8Ed-BvEfMEKKt5W5Wy2M1m7pLQ&fid=0x0:0xb4e921b46e9120d"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Olive Alexander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2xiPy8HKde93MjogE8geFF59s-ra1lbOxiwUDYpvHTORrkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my new go-to for poke. Not only is it super close to my home, it’s also always fresh and the sauce choices are great. The folks behind the counter are always lovely, even when I come in close to closing time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOO95FJ_FN93cA4dKDJVQxTrmyB53Pex_JohxHU&fid=0x0:0xb4e921b46e9120d"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Maryam BG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYOocnrrI0wz1xy1UzzrfX002uyW86PfiNNhxdXyfBusTbUhlS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing customer service, very friendly and helpful, I ordered the regular build your own bowl. The portion size is big and the ingredients are fresh 👌😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIqCg282eDXpkqMV3HKsFZ-65IoAyiuHQ3cAfl&fid=0x0:0xb4e921b46e9120d"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"White Choco2","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLM9-6piqP8OaI-9voKDk_2ft_UsMpsjdFS-9jwitto10f3Mjc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my second visiting here. It is always great to find a place that offers fresh ingredients and a variety of options at reasonable prices. The Bul-Dog and Hot-Dog with torched meat on the breads are unique and delicious choices. Made an extra order for my lunch tomorrow! 😋  The food looks fresh and yummy as well as the serving area is clean. Having a favourite place like this is definitely a fantastic find 👌 ✨️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuoUhawmvI7wzNFZglj-arp7peb0y9kyBwlze5&fid=0x0:0xb4e921b46e9120d"],"When":"2023-11-28"},{"Name":"Sue Suh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2nTtbDS0xCdS3kuMushxldxDpU89Bk6U50jQf-_LkIGKnOvs42g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly the best poke place in the city. The restaurant is sparkling clean and portions are very generous compared to other poke places. Would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2V_gafT0IhgeEa8OEbHb_ub4lbA2iJXyspmz6&fid=0x0:0xb4e921b46e9120d"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"Armando Ortiz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8NahLMirfU1c4nTaaLQOD02Qg5Xms2bRNpu2Hblh5UtcWat8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow,🤩 super flavors. Really good and Jenna was so helpful with me thank you.

I sea Food was my dish, really good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPx9R-0UG1IB7Hd8aYkGFtMhpPSFj54zhfy2BaX&fid=0x0:0xb4e921b46e9120d"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Chloe Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0bbjEYedQmkdSCJzUmLQSdkTzrtomVoVwqK478pXZxUfuVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited yesterday and it was so delicious that I visited again today :) The biggest advantage is that you can build your own bowl using the ingredients you want to eat, and there are many to choose from. And it is more cost-effective than other poke restaurants.

If you haven't tried it yet, be sure to add cilantro to the mix-in and try it with “Umami” sauce. Now you won't have to go to a sushi restaurant and worry about which roll to choose from among the numerous rolls.
Trust me!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaKcaheoSSEMYYuY-A5HkQCsurkgrJRw-dqwn3&fid=0x0:0xb4e921b46e9120d"],"When":"2023-11-19"}]

title: Sushi Avenue
descriptions: House rolls join teriyaki & udon in a subtly decorated Japanese eatery that also serves beer & wine.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jay Nicolas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISYuWBNgB8O_ALq0LaNTBi8Vlq4hIOphJm21hG-Jlqcgv79w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We’re supposed to dine at the Naomi Vietnamese restaurant next door, but we’re not aware that they are close on Sundays, so we went to Sushi Avenue.
Thanks Naomi for being closed on that day.. now we have another restaurant to add on our favorites! 5 stars!☺️✌🏽","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKbPcB5u43QF1EKRV_mfNhqlkZ3TgPVTXKCW9N&fid=0x0:0x98c459884d00f266"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Camilia Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWigkoqaNhHJinW1sDEWmiP5-QkCbLl16QFp5xZiy1DDMYI0dmUuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here with a girlfriend for dinner and the service was excellent, the food was delicious. I had sashimi, and a dynamite roll and we shared the crazy california roll. Her and I stayed there for hours chatting and they never rushed us or anything. We really appreciated it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJzrs31e1_1lf9tapgoOG1VT0OM3Ksjo7RW5lv&fid=0x0:0x98c459884d00f266"],"When":"2023-12-21"},{"Name":"Miss Mayhem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGowE1po-uzevgz4y-llWcltZGBd0Jj1Qx_2rqJzm0bNHjXwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Was recommended this place by a friend. So we tried it for lunch one day. Very dark inside with some mixed decor.
I ordered a deep fried tuna roll and didn’t realize it had so much strawberries and ginger on it. The other one had banana on it and was interesting combination of flavours.
Not terrible, typical sushi joint.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHtWVMTtkqAynrLuNEpwCPYxJqCCVQME-6c0D6&fid=0x0:0x98c459884d00f266"],"When":"2023-11-29"},{"Name":"Ethan Beard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjFk4QRZjZcwaamzuqHs0jsv7VlxjYbvEG0NN06tN__s0ZwnFe=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every week I go here with my fiancée and we love it everytime. We always do take out, it's as excellent as eating inside","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Crystal Marie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkuby9XtFiQz5lywdWf4-Mxgn6iM_o22lg17NhhVqaPbYW-oWj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Simply delightful. Me and my 5 year old came for dinner before swimming lessons on a Monday evening. We ordered an assortment of small rolls, nigiri, and sashimi alongside miso soup.

Without even asking for it, the waitress brought our ice cubes for my daughter's miso, which was greatly appreciated.

We finished up our initial order and ordered a few more rolls & a second round of miso soup.

The negitoro roll was my favorite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXtgKkr59JssXqBXSJaH1HeJ29xa5GSG9C8Tc&fid=0x0:0x98c459884d00f266"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"Halina Stuffco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpwHvGDGN9FhcNhX-PP_0QUGNww5iQxqOyj5cv-y5IDG85Pcw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We have been ordering from Sushi Avenue many time over the years. The food is always been good most of the time , but this time was not very good at all .
I ordered 4 items , 2 of them where Volcano roll spicy tuna and Volcano roll spicy salmon , both items where in the same container, the rolls where soaked with spicy sauce which made the rolls  very soggy .
I call the Restaurant explained about the food we received and the only answer was: SORRY ABOUT THAT.
VERY DISAPPOINTED HOW THEY HANDLED OUR COMPLAIN AND HOW DISSATISFIED WE WHERE ABOUT THE FOOD WE RECEIVED .
Hope they read this comment and do something about it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_IfWdZ_FMtmtn9LmLZuFOzgKQkDCAyC54eY-t&fid=0x0:0x98c459884d00f266"],"When":"2023-7-2"},{"Name":"NALED Signs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5QyqM6yuvqtj76wPS2ozvG5cjLcdGQL4hBzrbVKz_i2t6pyk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have gone here for the past year or so, maybe 10 times.  Food is always good and fast.  It is busy, so best to get there before noon.  Our rainbow roll is made with brown rice, upon request.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNS7aaoqUs4XMmwabFWBWGPP5kBU8K0_pnT1VcR&fid=0x0:0x98c459884d00f266"],"When":"2018-5-2"},{"Name":"Paige Kurpjuweit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnGdztHgs-kfHt-TIpIt9Dw4AFZ7fY6rZG0k4cfXJBjW0CufA2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I walked in, was looked after right away. After talking with the friendly lady who greeted me at the door, I decided on the avocado delight roll. I waited around 5 minutes for it. Fast. Fresh. Lots of texture.  Crunch. And it really was, wait for it… a delight. Top five veggie based rolls I’ve tried in the GVA. Well done sushi Avenue! I will be back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwrrEs7y-5vcss9eDxuA2X6ULzMLS_Tdi-W3Pr&fid=0x0:0x98c459884d00f266"],"When":"2022-1-2"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"JAMES ST","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmLcLZwZ-ljLG5ZScgoCYkCeehGcCgZpE1muF_6yo1wmlg0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a wrap today and it definitely wasn’t a good experience. The one I ordered is supposed to have avocado and apple lettuce mix etc. There was no avocado just mostly a lettuce mixture and the brown rice I added on . There was one piece of apple . To top it of the wrap was stuck to the wrapper when I tried to unwrap it to eat . It seems like if you don’t add protein to a wrap and also do not add a tip (which is really weird to have a self serve restaurant) you don’t get very much in your wrap and it’s like they don’t care","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5vxSAAbwrBRYaTHa-Kyzn5k5D_wO04ESITRGj\u0026fid=0x0:0xeb77245be6509a6e"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Euraj Vivekanandan (TravellingWithEV)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDI9OyxUxRYP6XXNPCFZ9bD0J230TJQ2-8G5T5lDuLBrk5KHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been to many Chopped Leaf restaurants and this one is probably one of the best. Good number of choices (and try the new summer strawberry salads). My personal favourite is the Cranberry Pesto Chicken Sandwich. Friendly servers and the store is always clean. This place can get busy during lunch but you can always find a seat for dine in. Great location. Definitely recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOADVSSV0QWUDYryAxFHhOoJ0gO3lJh1ZvFGKiB\u0026fid=0x0:0xeb77245be6509a6e"],"When":"2023-7-26"},{"Name":"J3551C4 Bon6","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMR8YBfVP3M8rQTWOntgEn8nuPfFOve2gn60s2-Gqe8HN6OozG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food was good. Wish the lettuce was a bit more. I went back the next day to use up my last coupon which expired in that day 30 Dec, with my kid but the store was closed earlier than it should. A few people were disappointed too when they were not able to get it. There wasn’t any notice given why it had to close early. I saw the staff was still inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNW5z0oC97S04owyS6-6epgdnXQ8fj76IguUAL\u0026fid=0x0:0xeb77245be6509a6e"],"When":"2024-1-18"},{"Name":"Isha Verma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMJciArOeeSjHndxQ0XoXcUzL8SA1GQlEX1BVvRzfvovE8hbdaUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love chopped leaf but this location? My absolute favourite! The employees put their heart and soul into each item I eat there I swear. Bad day? I’m going to the Langley chopped leaf","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Whitney L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIvnVtbVSAqatecg6G6j22C2euGXfg6tpqtNN62ZsToRw1DA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly staff and always accommodating our needs and orders. We purchased catering salads and wraps and they've accommodated dietary restrictions very well. The only thing would be nice is to have is some more protein ratio vs greens.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Danica Scott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3NM9b9LKxIf2U8MS1VFj503rGnDPlfKiDIyA7riZrT6qDog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a pleasant surprise. It was my first time going there, I had 1 million questions and the girls they were so kind and answered all of them for me. My salad is delicious. I feel like I had a far healthier meal than most quick service places. I’ll be back for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPp_vuBtEXKW8o-8s4hRCceWxAFMuPN5ocVTiwh\u0026fid=0x0:0xeb77245be6509a6e"],"When":"2020-1-21"},{"Name":"Adam B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcoE_OY-5H2Y32HZz8a4_uBJWjxrkADeu4Qf4IhELQTjAEYTM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Chopped Leaf gets 5*, best Chopped Leaf there is, they give you a complimentary meal for your kids with the purchase of a regular meal; no one else does that! Simply awesome, my kids get a free chicken quesadilla.   They also do a better job of making your food then some of the other ones I've been to.  My new go to place for a quick bite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-CfEjlTNMOhvOb3pQt4bcJjEiHK6Af66Cn7Se\u0026fid=0x0:0xeb77245be6509a6e"],"When":"2019-11-27"},{"Name":"Negin Armani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpjYYWE5AfTviNgQ8_HJ3A4seNclSYiXKvqdSxxcz1p-_pZFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I've been a long time fan of Chopped Leaf and was excited to find one in my new neighbourhood. Food was always fresh and delicious, and I loved that they have vegan options! My feelings changed upon my last visit. Despite not ordering or paying for any extra protein or cheese, they put chicken on my vegan bowl. I realized when I got home and they had already closed, disappointed and disgusted to say the least. The manager I spoke with over the phone gave a few excuses as to why this might have happened, and offered a credit for my next meal, but I don't have trust in this food operation anymore. I then spoke with the owner who advised me to put vegan in the notes (on an already vegan item?). Nonetheless, I was refunded my order, and the owner did seem apologetic for this huge mistake, thus earning one bonus star from me. I do not recommend this location for anyone with allergies or dietary restrictions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0r4QjioZcvAePKjnyn4zzRkra3hbda4o0joYu\u0026fid=0x0:0xeb77245be6509a6e"],"When":"2022-9-14"}]

title: Kesari Langley

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Subhayan Basu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKePPal6vji1ypaw7ksrv-WF62367gT6oortoUL7wRr-6OWaw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a wonderful experience at Kesari Restaurant. From the moment I walked in, the warm welcome from the friendly staff made me feel right at home. The setup is cozy and inviting, creating a lovely ambiance that really enhances the dining experience. The food was fantastic—flavorful and authentic, with each dish clearly prepared with care.

Plus, they have a special Diwali collection on display that adds a festive touch. Check out my pics for a glimpse!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpdNYhjMH_ILV65ZklQHUtNhiXmFLOT8i3r-QB&fid=0x0:0xf34aaf1c71ec327b"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"B Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIYP5jmFbCqbITnyAWiIs9Fj2AQArMGIu-DD1rVrmHYnMhz3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They have a large variety of sweets. The shop is clean. Staff is good what sweet quality is not good. I bought sweets for Diwali. Too much artificial flavor. Smell is not good. Look oily and greasy smell like old oil. Jalebi  was fresh hot taste like old oil.☹️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-n3KiPGv03ZBzWKCpcndopA4_1o_SWpesaCY6&fid=0x0:0xf34aaf1c71ec327b"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Kevin Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfDZMKtA3XjsJkWC4nffIO6PLVbtjYbD8kEOv4LwKtW4ysYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sentiments for the food around the table summed up as fantastic. Friends had specifically come for the sweets all the way from Vancouver, which is an impressive feat.

Our server was friendly and considerate, no complaints towards the staff at all. They even provide a small sample if you're unsure about the taste of the sweets.

The interior decoration could use a little work but the seating has plenty of space and is comfy. Overall I'd consider it very clean, which is a welcome sight. To those with an aversion to Indian cuisine, I would absolutely recommend coming here to try it out.

Great place for good Indian food and desserts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOS8Y5mada5PIjkkTNai-JCLWvR9hzXUcgHtoFV&fid=0x0:0xf34aaf1c71ec327b"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"MJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlm_XRYtoUIMsDe0r0YhYfxDQnj37a3FGprKGl2_zxeQCNP_XX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The service really made up for the food. Kartik was really helpful and attentive towards our feedback. Nice to see them going above and beyond.

Will be back to try new dishes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsozdCUzIoxP_4YtWJsQmJYDUDghEtYx8MnuSn&fid=0x0:0xf34aaf1c71ec327b"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Eng Yap","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLh2IQYAoK3nxaVZpWfMZWLRwzyA5WC_mEPJiiR27jl3BzoXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our new fav Indian restaurant in Langley. 2nd time back. Place is nicely bright and clean. Staff friendly, service quick and food taste excellent. Both curry dishes (lamb korma and eggplant bhartha) very flavorful. The Missi Roti was delicious. Garlic naan crispy on the outside and soft and fluffy inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLj7Fa3owbb0rc6KWnKrVEUUVV2OAPHVyUqavl&fid=0x0:0xf34aaf1c71ec327b"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"Will C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmPJAX8E-CHB5oBjWtUxZ6yeG46HlqKB-LyNExUrMMzYXN1S4_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I came here to order a masala chai tea to go. Waited for the first 20 minutes for my order yet my tea wasn't ready. I went to ask about my order. The reaction on the server's face that took my order was she forgot about putting my order in. She rushed into the kitchen, came back out and did not acknowledge with me after about what happened nor apologized for what she did not do. This type of poor customer service typically happen at 'these' types of restaurants. I wasn't annoyed about the wait. I was disappointed by the lack of accountability. I waited for 35 minutes in total for a chai tea. I am never returning again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnDnRhabfNz0ExdQ6dLoSo3GahALQj-FhoIQSC&fid=0x0:0xf34aaf1c71ec327b"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Jaspreet Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX50ykZjfe39Iz2mUcZKX_Yb89OgAl4aOxbjOYbHGVcxSLdwkcV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We did the catering service from Kesari Langley for our Diwali party 2024; the food is sooo good; well packed; they delivered at our place with good care; food is very well cooked with perfection; thank you Kesari team for making our Diwali special with good and tasty food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOfEhMumeNp9I8OLcQ0ECe5msoIepRjZEyPXym&fid=0x0:0xf34aaf1c71ec327b"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Guri Kang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRgf15fYrF5yX1dbM1N-3wSFn3WYOfSLNC3t133fkmlAv3esr2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Owner is very nice and humble guy, we celebrated birthday gathering of 25 people of my daughters first birthday , amazing and mouth watering food and excellent service provide my front desk girls ,cook and staff.They are great and nice people🙏.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPl_ggM4xYqQ09mTwg4kDcBJtB-KhsBXvbu-af3&fid=0x0:0xf34aaf1c71ec327b"],"When":"2024-9-8"}]
