user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_km6RslliP6cTTiQcv7eI3BYv9_LkkJf-8xS0POhDRp70O4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time trying this restaurant and it was to celebrate a birthday. We ordered some appies and for mains, our table had dishes with each protein so we could try them all! Lamb, prawns, chicken, and beef. All were super tasty. Came with a huge serving of salad for each person. Our server was friendly and helped made it feel like a special dinner at the end to wrap up the dine in experience on a high note.

The PLUS was all their meats that night had the option for Halal available!! Such a bonus!

Will be coming back! Great portions, well made, nicely decorated and clean inside, and good service!

PS!! I forgot to take pics of half the dishes! We all dug in too fast!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlg8hGFX_7glyLPw16pBk4kUTJas9CgdELMmvH&fid=0x0:0x82bf87a3db20203d"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Ben Jamin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBIrMGp3ssnTdFXw942j2bs17qo6QnaMCC5En6PFKO8oF8KavW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I hadn't had Greek food in a while, and this place reminded me just how awesome it is. The wait staff were super friendly, and the food was excellent. I'll definitely be returning soon. Prices were very reasonable as well—overall you can't go wrong if you want Greek food :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOn0dAIUZHgphKiUuyhblxAzWcOTZg2ANdk7tLB&fid=0x0:0x82bf87a3db20203d"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Miss Mayhem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGowE1po-uzevgz4y-llWcltZGBd0Jj1Qx_2rqJzm0bNHjXwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good standard Mediterranean cuisine.
We had work lunch reservations for about 15 of us, service was exceptional! Thank you Viktorya. We were in and out of there within the hour. We all ordered a variety of dishes and they all looked good.

Thank you Zythos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOEv7iAznUjAEabsmjo0iB3FC5ZtYZ8APNTteg&fid=0x0:0x82bf87a3db20203d"],"When":"2024-2-22"},{"Name":"Kumiko Murakami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrzaF6KRvUp_QuDlErcjgBgm4H4mGAcgrFn7sjBqNDAMqeO3GY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came with a large group of 3 families to celebrate high school graduation commencement. The staff were so very nice and food was delicious!

We normally order take out and this was my first time dining inside. I will definitely dine inside again in the future!
Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipModp1_8ZYLxf_eG3UB-zHiFrHvg-cEUc20uZkr&fid=0x0:0x82bf87a3db20203d"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Tom McDougall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0J48kC1hZM1V1aRsvHOZVDophlDmEISwqhKMFe94oVeHk06c2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Having recently dined at Zythos Mediterranean Grill in Langley, I am delighted to share my positive experience. This family-run establishment, deeply rooted in Langley for many years, exudes a warm and authentic atmosphere. The cozy ambiance sets the stage for a delightful culinary journey that extends beyond mere dining – it's an immersion into the heart of Mediterranean flavors and hospitality.

The fact that the restaurant has been a staple in Langley for many years adds to its charm, indicating a level of consistency and community support. The emphasis on great food and service is undoubtedly crucial for any dining experience, and it's commendable that the owner took the time to personally ensure your satisfaction. Such attention to customers, like checking in on your dinner and comfort, adds a personal touch that sets establishments apart.

Additionally, the mention of Zythos being suitable for large groups or parties is valuable information for those looking to host gatherings in a welcoming environment. A restaurant's ability to accommodate diverse needs, from intimate dinners to larger celebrations, contributes significantly to its appeal. In summary, your review highlights the positive aspects of Zythos Mediterranean Grill, emphasizing its longevity, welcoming ambiance, excellent food, attentive service, and suitability for various group sizes. It's insights like these that guide others in making informed choices about where to dine, making your review a valuable resource for potential patrons in Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0h2LQuChQyp2sHnrB8vCA3kdqjbMcmzpir0fe&fid=0x0:0x82bf87a3db20203d"],"When":"2024-2-17"},{"Name":"Rick G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgZ9duDhu59qGpOJtffGNYBZe0o4MjQlXXDgFvd1GqyeK2Fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently had an incredibly disheartening experience at Zythos Mediterranean Grill in Port Kells. It is with great disappointment that I express my complete lack of recommendation for this establishment. From unhygienic practices to disrespectful treatment, my visit left a lasting negative impression.

Upon entering the restaurant, I observed three customers waiting for their meals at a table. As I stood at the bar, waiting to pay and receive my order totaling $110, I was approached by an older lady. In a hushed voice, she whispered, "I wouldn't eat here. Look how disgusting that is!" She pointed to the owner, who was using a mop to wipe down the fan above the grill, with food still cooking directly below it. This unhygienic act raised serious concerns about the potential for cross-contamination.

In light of what I had witnessed, I politely approached a waiter and expressed my apprehension about paying for the food. As expected, he laughed at me and directed me to speak with the owner, who was conveniently seated nearby, eavesdropping on our conversation. To my utter dismay, the owner greeted me with a smirk and callously stated, "That's just how we clean here," as if my concerns were unwarranted. His mocking attitude made me feel unheard and invalidated.

Attempting to explain the gravity of the situation, I emphasized that I have two children who depend on me for their meals. I expressed my deep discomfort in feeding them food that had been handled in such an unsanitary manner. However, the owner continued to dismiss my concerns and laugh in my face, showing a complete lack of empathy.

Faced with such disrespectful treatment, I made the decision to leave the restaurant immediately. It is crucial to shed light on the unhygienic practices I witnessed at Zythos Mediterranean Grill. Cleaning the fan above the grill while there is raw food actively cooking below it is a clear violation of basic food safety and sanitation standards. This lack of regard for hygiene puts customers at risk of consuming contaminated food, which can lead to serious health issues.

Moreover, I must highlight the unsettling reactions I encountered during my visit. Before entering the restaurant to address my concerns about payment, I had a conversation with another customer named Mariam. She claimed to be a frequent customer who knows the owner personally. I shared the video footage I had captured and explained the situation to her. Surprisingly, Mariam initially downplayed the issue, assuring me that the establishment is clean and that I should proceed to pick up my food. She even advised me to delete the video and refrain from posting it online, citing potential negative consequences for the business.

It is important to note that the waiter and the owner seemed to be aware of my intentions before I even approached them. This suggests that Mariam may have informed them about our conversation, further adding to the distrust and lack of transparency that I experienced as a paying customer.

In conclusion, my visit to Zythos Mediterranean Grill was marred by unhygienic practices, disrespectful treatment, and unsettling reactions. It is my firm belief that the uncleanliness of the establishment and the disregard for customer concerns should never be tolerated. I cannot, in good conscience, recommend this restaurant to anyone, as the health and well-being of customers should always be the top priority.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPjywBrLfYA-NnAv623KQt9w4PRPvRWwG1LOvZ&fid=0x0:0x82bf87a3db20203d"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Ralph Wyatt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUN28UZv5zBQyNqkHdh4edz4iBwoslU-5vQSp6k9ZPs8OvdAN6z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a gathering of 25 people in the group room.  Food and service were excellent.  Our orders covered the spectrum of chicken, beef and lamb souvlaki, moussaka, steak, and salmon. Everyone was very pleased with taste and the size of the portions.  Very friendly manager and staff.  It was a delightful evening with family, friends and conscientious servers,","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S Lavie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDg89QlGNoudCFoK2VbqQIuCoGJWL42o6nb1pdITun7YsWdA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a huge Christmas luncheon and ordered food from Zythos. Everything was so tasty, warm and we had enough leftovers for most of us to go back for seconds and then some. Thank you to Zythos for making us a memorable lunch menu. We will definitely be ordering from you again!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joey Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIncJBLfbVzRO24PRdfxE4-hovZn6C_s4RV_vqsGslULP8YEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We have been here a few times and the food was consistently good. Today we had lemongrass chicken rice, chicken sandwiches, and chicken wings - a chicken feast!

Price was reasonable.

The place was clean. The table was big. Service was good but not overwhelming - I liked it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLt_Rr3qdeT0CU53nLrQKLr2sVHeFsF6y3R_31&fid=0x0:0x72fc0b51f114e524"],"When":"2024-5-22"},{"Name":"Maryam BG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYOocnrrI0wz1xy1UzzrfX002uyW86PfiNNhxdXyfBusTbUhlS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quick and friendly customer service, I ordered combo 3(lemongrass chicken) for pickup at $17.50.

The food was amazing and fresh, I appreciate how fast it was prepared as well! I recommend this restaurant","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPm08YVbZ8or5AjKWZpLGVTzaf7C6zVGnl8rCyz&fid=0x0:0x72fc0b51f114e524"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Pho is a solid 3.5. The steak, tendon and tripe pho was lacking the tendon and tripe, and the portions were a bit small. Their menu seems to be more expansive than other places so maybe it’s a bit unfair but if you can’t do the pho well… Not too many places you can go to in Langley though so it meets a need.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvf3n4lx66xGC2wZgO7ByrQrJDrZCSr6Ms8Lo-&fid=0x0:0x72fc0b51f114e524"],"When":"2024-2-27"},{"Name":"Ray Dubs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWv4pQtKu2wy66jann-Dj8Exe3FIdSioz5JunQZJxz8XSK1GHcjzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Review from guy eating his way through the Vietnamese restaurants in the Lower Mainland.

It was a Tuesday movie night and just a few minutes drive from the Cineplex is Naomi restaurant. Who doesn’t like cheap movie night and to keep things under budget we found Naomi with one of the cheapest bowls of Pho around. In this day and age you will definitely not find Pho for under $10 in Vancouver. The regular size (small) bowl of pho at Naomi is priced at a low, low price of $10! Now don’t expect to be stuffed as the bowl is small (similar size to what you’d actually get in Vietnam) but it’s a decent size if you’re just wanting to enjoy a light meal. If you’re hungry than get the large size or order some appys and share with your friends and family.

I ordered my usual (Bun Bo Hue) and it’s decent here. I’m only saying that because if you’ve seen my other reviews I have high expectations for BBH and I have my favs around town.

I am intrigued with their other menu items as they have Banh Xeo and Banh Cuon. I will definitely try one of these the next “movie night”.

Overall a good experience with the food, service was meh as we didn’t receive much attention and no tea refilled.

Ray’s Tips:
Cheap Pho $10!
Free Parking
Credit card Accepted","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwu9tBI4x2H4Vwi-t1UIPbZi099lx3og8UREFK&fid=0x0:0x72fc0b51f114e524"],"When":"2023-9-22"},{"Name":"Atamjit Bassi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-CCAG1d3JAdmNUSxxvmUHR8304lfHA6Q1xca1y5nzjuQ4NkRBIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Service was quick when we went in during peak lunch hours but food is mediocre. Tried spring rolls, salad roll, vermicelli noodles with lemongrass chicken. Dry chicken lacking flavor. Spring rolls were delicious. Pho broth has really good flavor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4ZNVDq38txwalvkRu_1fbIQIz8K9v6Fcw9u11&fid=0x0:0x72fc0b51f114e524"],"When":"2022-8-18"},{"Name":"En He","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-fMPTnOQ_8eutpKukiF5Gmfty5Tf6KYmY2TuhxsQFYXzlAw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super sweet server! the food came out super fast and they are very celiac friendly. They have a dedicated gluten free fryer and have meats that are gluten free marinade. The food was delicious and satisfying. It’s heartwarming to know that there’s a restaurant that cares a lot about their customers health! I hope they open one in Vancouver!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfcj2lBqzcFo90s_tjY_kNIaRH_picxnajNmcb&fid=0x0:0x72fc0b51f114e524"],"When":"2023-8-4"},{"Name":"Taz C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ235c-1POJF85QGI4N_CFSzUmrADwRBXdKObCvBIDceTrCYTc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem. Finally, we found our go-to spot for pho. Consistent quality and good service.  Plenty of parking outside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2MDIrzqZb6ggVOFQY8amP1SSBiBepxrwKkeRp&fid=0x0:0x72fc0b51f114e524"],"When":"2024-4-19"},{"Name":"Tolga O.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK720GkofpuLF6k0F0cVtzPKeAqviQIj_uwn4AVLO-ALEMplQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After my nearby doctor visit, I coincidentally noticed this place. I tried their rice vermicelli with chicken and spring rolls. The food quality was excellent, and the restaurant was clean. I received a prompt welcome at the door. I’ll definitely return when I’m in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrgqKuKuR0M6sRJgMgk5rMd_ejoCeHOHoFotyp&fid=0x0:0x72fc0b51f114e524"],"When":"2024-5-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Savannah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn2CD0vRivO2-5giVteHZMjb-4fmhyLsD9FrkqVRezsAZo_yk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food that is ready fast!

Went for a quick bite after a workout. I ordered the chicken cheese pocket and the chocolate peanut butter smoothie. The smoothie was thick and tasted exactly like it’s name, chocolate and peanuts.

The chicken cheese was the prefect snack to go along with my smoothie.

The staff were friendly and efficient.

I would recommend Freshii to anyone looking for a quick bit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1zmSgkqqTpCR-EfIy-xMEhNLvGrVIY1UYIfg&fid=0x0:0xcae70f4f1972dffb"],"When":"2023-6-23"},{"Name":"Hayley McLeary","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpEB6x8eAyYiNwt--bZHEGdh4Y2uzplBGC3eGh3XHpbgIlDxO4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Bought 2 chia seed puddings tonight as takeout, as they are my absolute favourite healthy dessert. My son and I ate one at home shortly after and they were watery, had minimal fruit, and they didn't taste fresh at all. Huge disappointment, as we were looking forward to it. Never experienced this at a Freshii before.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"JAMES ST","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmLcLZwZ-ljLG5ZScgoCYkCeehGcCgZpE1muF_6yo1wmlg0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just went to the walnut grove location and ordered a Italian market chicken wrap . Got home opened it up to a soggy mess the wrap it’s self was so soggy it had no middle left . It fell apart before even unwrapping . Wilted soggy rotten lettuce . And there was so much liquid in it it was like a soup on the plate with some mushy pieces of chicken and a few weird looking chunks of chicken. This place has really gone down hill it used to be great ! freshii as a franchise has been let down as of late the quality just does not seem to be there in comparison from when a lot of the franchises opened a few years back . I will never go back to any location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNd6kRandZV0RM4QX132xNf95Rt20SFeJnRAHgr&fid=0x0:0xcae70f4f1972dffb"],"When":"2023-11-18"},{"Name":"Brandon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCG5YAfhN-NVJljLw_VfWC-IYbysKj8n3-4_heOTJpeUE7QXCs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Healthy and delicious! I ordered the “Market” with falafel and wow! I can’t get over the taste and texture this wrap brings. Super happy with the quick service and a well built quality wrap.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7Tn0IPMBSvE80AW54oBQRbIj6xa1SQBOWGPJD&fid=0x0:0xcae70f4f1972dffb"],"When":"2020-8-7"},{"Name":"Dee M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVab2fE-JTxbIpU_6Xaz7D7erLTwcKciIiwPVrTvvItgaJKeFKjEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They did an amazing job!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFjp_u7Cp8KWBPjVW08Gs7-YQ2fXhFE-CpOakv&fid=0x0:0xcae70f4f1972dffb"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"R Umlas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_2oKQdrRm72D4jK7VTX3K1lwX5J5bsZjfpeHXY1Ixfn43rFcWjw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"When I worked in the area, I was excited when they opened a Freshii in the area. Love the freshness of the menu items. First few years my food was usually prepared by a younger gentleman or the owner/manager? Recently the current staff are still doing a great job taking orders and fulfilling online orders. Like buying the mini bites. And their smoothies are good too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsO27P3UZgoJlW5hhmkjNHU2_Y2Dpz-IdlCAAP&fid=0x0:0xcae70f4f1972dffb"],"When":"2021-9-25"},{"Name":"Steve","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtdaZMTk_k3od8z3IkHbBj98tzGDZpHPmIMdodQMRqXpBq_-F0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Just had the tacos, my only complaint was that I wish the chicken chunks were larger.  Name checks out though, everything was very fresh tasting and delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPh3Vvhmg1bW8X2XpcwXjCbtWC6_R8ITCyz4Eo&fid=0x0:0xcae70f4f1972dffb"],"When":"2021-7-27"},{"Name":"Jylisa Knull","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqOR01Cm-yJcVpE-mWFaNJGjG1vA6p9qZI2rshOGpKQuVvOg-KdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I love Freshii, but this location is incredibly stingy. If this does not change, I will be continuing my business at another location. This is the only one I have ever had problems with.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO53bZVEZ3dZlFfQimfq70qN5BRP1ufZfZFed9H&fid=0x0:0xcae70f4f1972dffb"],"When":"2020-12-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hiba Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuHro-qapQOzrHp5ems5S0P5Yy5lxJqwsPP7Xxmp2p8J0h84Axfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Date: Nov 11 2024 @ 10:40 am.

My girls and I went out for a great breakfast time.

This White Spot is not welcoming.
As being a person of colour, I felt very uncomfortable. All waitress are seniors.
They should not have waitress who do want to work and only complain and roll their eyes.

There was four of us and I requested a booth seating than where we were given. The waiter said loudly of you want a wider seat , she stated it loudly twice, our seat there’s isn’t very much.

I said excuse me? What are you trying to imply ?

She said is that the reason why you want another seats.

1. How can someone just assume something, 2. Reason of us wanting a different sitting area because my mom was not comfortable sitting at a small table.

I ordered a class Benedict it was not tasty it was cold and my potatoes were tasteless burnt and they gave me the end pieces like the left over. (Attached images) the a bunch of small crispy unwanted pieces .

We all won’t be coming to this locations anymore.
Please do not hire senior waitress, because they can’t act normal and  simply do their job.
They might as well just stay home and pickup OAS

Just because you’re having a bad day, PLEASE DONT MAKE OTHERS DAY BAD.

Manager at this location please follow up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBvlTmE6fQvwfusLGkT68fcGtZr0PEzxWNPqKQ&fid=0x0:0x60f83ab675b3561a"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Adam Farrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMHrsBOCfw2yTxdERqQKMJ2ji-mtRUDAFRu6AyxgyffHuakcfm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff at this location has always been very friendly. The food has been good and fresh. The environment and bathrooms are always clean. We had excellent service from Colleen and Cheryl. Thank you for a great experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMjrDEGqJM1NlONbpOHrnF5klCsrDmmg1PvNVl&fid=0x0:0x60f83ab675b3561a"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Curtis Polysou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMRtlOyCuysRb72_UW2gH3zC2ril0xgJXLcNkjjH3WSYtc4ovc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for lunch on an incredibly busy day.  Parking lot jammed, dozens of people waiting for tables kind of busy.
I was blown away at the efficiency of the operation here.  All staff were friendly and professional.  The wait was shorter than anticipated. Table was comfortable and clean.  Music was nice and perfect volume.  Bathrooms were clean.
Order was taken quickly. Drinks came quickly. Food came quickly. Didn't have that annoying 20 minute wait for the check.  Everything was delicious & kids left full and happy.  Our server (Ashley) was great.

1 piece of constructive criticism - the salted caramel cold brew needs a rethink.  Just packs no punch.

Anyways, we rarely go out anymore due to restaurants mostly just sucking from start to finish - but today at White Spot was great.  Thank you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jamie Duncan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIECm4QI3OVBGvKkJlEPmvDEYqyH1xur_f8VWKkQ14RhSRrrw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a great White Spot. Food was fresh and came on time. I was also impressed with all the amazing Christmas decorations. Lots of effort went into it. It's a well run very clean location. Will definitely come back. Great location too being right across the street from the movie theatre.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Curtis Monks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsm0NwEzhgNKyW5m2ZaP3Iprs0UA0ntaOAh6Ole3B2mJXKeD0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm a regular at this White Spot location - It's not uncommon to eat here 1-2 times per week, if not more!

The food is always consistently good, no matter what time of day you decide to come by. It's hot and made exactly as you ordered.

The servers and hosts are all extremely friendly, and go above and beyond to make your visit memorable. The atmosphere is clean and open, and easy to converse with family or friends, or simply enjoy some peace and quiet if you're alone.

Highly recommend this White Spot location, and looking forward to my next visit!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tara Pastora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLw4umIy-7U4pWYJl8OMt0iFCX3W2f3GHcLpLanxRaenD6-zA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our family hosted a birthday dinner for our daughter here the other night. The reception on the phone when reserving was really upbeat and friendly and made us excited to be coming there for dinner. There was no issue bringing in our own cake. Service was fantastic.  Kara is a real professional and was super friendly and helpful and got us all eating in no time, no complications or issues. We had forgotten candles and she made sure they were provided without us even having to ask. Truly going above and beyond.  This was for a reservation of 13, so definitely a lot of work.  I would recommend booking here for larger gatherings and we will definitely be back. Amazing service! Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matthew Reid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_XYu-hONYlWVKFabmSHTAIJnFyzjrhHMnxnOR-St2VApePfRJVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably the nicest and most updated looking White Spot I've ever been to! It's definitely been renovated and more modern - I was quite impressed!

Food was fantastic, fries cooked to perfection and everything was very fresh.

Will definitely be making this our new favorite White Spot location.

Highly reccomended!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dylan Theriault","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUivnDREmWGUlN2hx1k5kow-bMR63m2_fh3w9YigKJHT2wONQfO7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our service was fantastic! Food was hot and delicious. No complaints at all and are already planning a trip back even though this is not our local white spot.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Manmeet Sohal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAFj9DrnYycDPwPe308BqNgQ5LPf_kkdLO8iQvK63Eh4cUkg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have no complaints! The atmosphere is so beautiful and though, more on the darker side when you first walk in, regardless the lights really do add a nice touch!

The food is really what makes them shine. I ordered the vegetarian combo (that consisted of a kappa roll, veggie roll, and inari pieces) and yam tempura roll. They are made with such perfection and you can tell they took their time. I love the spicy mayo with it as well. I have gone there many times for my lunch break and they are quite fast and efficient, and always ask for anything that you may need. I recommend it to my friends, it is definitely worth it coming here from Surrey!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUbnz80v5myfgo5lzw3wMOMKHAt6fEXvsL3ntX&fid=0x0:0xdc93bf01ac003035"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Brittany S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eFQkj626t8zGBNhG1j682nXYAY3vJkS1VdBBUNRvZlKC0L6p=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Popped in for lunch with the boss and tried a few things!
I ordered Miso Soup, Ebi Sunomono, Edamame, Agedashi Tofu and a Spicy Tuna Roll.
As soon as we arrived we were greeted with very friendly front end staff seated quickly and brought fresh hot tea.
Everything was absolutely amazing and we were checked on a few times during our hour visit.
The Mango sauce for the tofu was good but somewhat hard to get on the tofu. The thin sauce and the spicy sauce were my favorite and absorbed into the tofu nicely while staying crisp.
The only item I didn't super prefer was the spicy tuna roll and this is generally my go-to roll. I found the filling texture a bit off for my liking it was more of a ground tuna mixed with spicy sauce. Taste was good but texture wasn't for me. Will return to try more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPh7Gq9KuGdEQacgTY7mRdSWDO0kDuBh4nLoupO&fid=0x0:0xdc93bf01ac003035"],"When":"2023-11-19"},{"Name":"Janet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJLdrp4_-PzGWs8I7cbVIruptxWktGjE-_19gAKtYsnjV7T8DB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First, it was a really hot day when I went, so the dimmer lights and cold AC here was a huge relief. The staff were friendly and very quick, efficiently refilling our cups and keeping an eye out for anyone waving to get attention. Food was delicious, great both visually and in our mouths!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfe9osj4HXojqhtyeD0ZIcd-5F0SJ_SUHr24a8&fid=0x0:0xdc93bf01ac003035"],"When":"2022-6-28"},{"Name":"Savannah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn2CD0vRivO2-5giVteHZMjb-4fmhyLsD9FrkqVRezsAZo_yk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Picture perfect dishes and friendly staff!

The food is presented so nicely you can’t help but take a picture. The staff were very knowledgeable in the different kinds of dishes offered. The inside of the restaurant is well decorated and clean.

My food was tasty and fresh. I highly recommend checking out Sushi Gio.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6Wq4S41aqKhqU0z0tOiqo7v9BX5pUYbFX3vA&fid=0x0:0xdc93bf01ac003035"],"When":"2023-8-3"},{"Name":"Aaron T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6yeVYoOYlrWiU4-xdpCz0WgE82XOpObn1iG8FrHVsKVO78q4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great sushi spot. Good values on the rolls if you wanna just be full. A huge variety of specialty rolls if you wanna be a little more adventurous.

My yakisoba was so-so. Very catered to the western taste with very little actual "yaki" but I feel like most people would like it and the price was right","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyUwrTf0acRjLKUVrWxI_ggE9JV_9ork_Jrfag&fid=0x0:0xdc93bf01ac003035"],"When":"2023-7-16"},{"Name":"Justin J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9qB0BPnH-SxgmMKD9knqz657T2834b2TJgDxXzOsqhmSY7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Neat little spot for sushi. Like their aburi and fusion sushi rolls which are unique. Rolls and sashimi is comparable to other sushi places. Prices are a little higher but every order I had tasted great! Friendly staff. Sometimes it is a long wait for items on a busy or slow day, hence the 4/5.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKsvNJgdyVhkWGVkShc4cirIQB8FoviUkCvHLU&fid=0x0:0xdc93bf01ac003035"],"When":"2022-7-13"},{"Name":"Enza Filippone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_4T1sn4KIogGwerK4mNB3SJHh_N5oTotv9Hj7N7yIInmloIes1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was very good, nice presentation , the spicy sauce for the agedashi tofu was a simply chinese syracha as its flavor was very garlicky, i was expecting a different more authentic sauce.
Overall good, but  lost 1 star because they don't offer the miso soup as a starter of the meal included with the bento as any other sushi restaurant offer. I find the miso a characteristic staple, and it prepares your stomach for the following entrees.
The atmosphere is nice, although they keep the music ( modern reggeton or pop) too loud for being a restaurant. I like to talk and hear what my guests are saying, and that was almost impossible without raising our voices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtWoVpeE5uvUTCb3D7bT8eZS5lP-Q5jSo0mUHM&fid=0x0:0xdc93bf01ac003035"],"When":"2023-1-29"},{"Name":"Valeria R.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSwuyFcBm1yunK39jYL4GWencmZHfViUqyImRD3JWI6iVnhJ1W=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The tuna sashimi came decorated with a long dark hair. We returned the dish untouched and the servers were not apologetic what so ever. The reaction we got was as if it's a normal thing to happen at the restaurant.

Their special rolls are overpriced for the poor quality and presentation. The fish was dry and sauce was almost non existent. Needless to say we did not finish the rolls, they did not taste good at all.

Overall service was poor, nobody checked in or apologized for the hair in the food.

Definitely not returning nor will we recommend this restaurant to anyone.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Djay Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQWIPtpiI1kUa8bJsM7S_tCHAnnGa20KbZ_y2KUxS1BDgpjVaf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food here is more like Taiwanese street food rather than authentic Taiwanese cuisine. The menu is too diverse, giving the impression that the restaurant lacks specialization, and the taste of the food we ordered was also just like street food. However, all the staff are friendly, and the restaurant is clean. It’s a nice place to have nearby for when you feel like grabbing bubble tea or shaved ice in the evening.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzWcHlAcgzLEalv2z_SoOBa1nGntHPs1uB2-qj&fid=0x0:0x6e6afd1d8b47365"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"April Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJv8Q3xF_5q3hwprm_F5e0uNP3d-IJ_yVsdYKmqHn_BBdbEdw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service, food taste great. The best mango yogurt makes me a loyal customer. A Must come restaurant in Langley 🎉","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHx60NRFGA1e43iCL1KOlD1RGu5w03Prp_N_HV&fid=0x0:0x6e6afd1d8b47365"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Jake Holowchuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVe2bq5oIAxAQxtSZwzwlu7Jt24vsfj9wQH8ybgeqQ3A8lKfibQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I always buy the bubble tea here, and it's always so good. The food is tasty as well, and good size portion when you eat in, however, we have noticed that the takeout portions are extremely noticeably smaller than what you would get if you eat in. Not really worth the money for take out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMY5UJPIxJXHDXuyqLZElEQpaS4fHmRoXfX6jJj&fid=0x0:0x6e6afd1d8b47365"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"3.5 stars for the food. Not great, not terrible. Chicken nuggets were served warm and the chicken/batter ratio was quite low. Still, its the only Taiwanese place for literally miles so if you have a hankering for beef noodle soup, salty peppery chicken and the like it’ll fit the bill.

I didn’t love the interior, but there’s always a lot of parking. Friendly staff.

They only take cash or debit card.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPI1zn4Wohkfm6ittL83waROBI1nuOKaHNLEmHe&fid=0x0:0x6e6afd1d8b47365"],"When":"2024-1-8"},{"Name":"Leslie Ngo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWy4prG9zC06GQVwfW5XW99I_e-35MyO4tIy1Trq9RLD0fbMwOv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's a decent place for enjoying bubble tea and Taiwanese cuisine. We come here a couple times and generally, the service, food and atmosphere is satisfactory. We were welcomed and seated quickly. Tables and seating were clean and tidy. There are a variety of dishes to chose from, and we usually order the fried chicken, noodle and rice dishes. The servers were generally responsive though sometimes we waited for a while to get one of them attention. Food came out in a timely manner and it was made fresh. However, some of the food were difficult to eat like a salad side dish that had too much salt added in it. When ordering tea drinks, it comes within a take-out cup. The ambience can be a little loud due to the music, making having long and meaningful conversation difficult. One interesting issue is the men's bathroom door handle. I tried opening it but seem like it is locked. I also saw another customer try to open the door but was not successful and asked for help from a staff member. The staff were able to open the door, and there was no one inside the bathroom. There should be a label with instructions on how to open the bathroom door properly. Recently, they added a claw machine where every $10 you spend gets you one coin for one round to win a stuffed animal. It is more challenging than you think! Half of the front window were smashed and boarded up from a car accident, so half of the place is a bit darker. Pricing is reasonable. Interior is generally clean. I recommend this place if you want to enjoy causal Taiwanese cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaZOTZ_6bBpp2AT-Iv7mNTJ41D1kM-rqlF7UhK&fid=0x0:0x6e6afd1d8b47365"],"When":"2024-2-20"},{"Name":"Ken K C Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWiE-ckZJVCFaTlgDnG--FRxoEP2J-yrm5Da1Ic4EFe5gyemnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They do accept credit card 2 weeks ago but not anymore. Change their policy all the time. Disappointed.
***update 08/15/2024. relative bought take out and their portion is absolutely tiny! Beef Noodle in soup only have 4 small pieces of beef. Three Sauce Chicken was given in a tiny bowl and not even fill up to the top. would not go back anymore such a rip off!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9d1_yEzLPssDPPn2DMW5wRt67XYzvHs9isYaA&fid=0x0:0x6e6afd1d8b47365"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Richard Alexander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_OvnCzt8kv6LPfS1-ykiC6oaGDOx3JIiNrOCw2e1FBw4Gsz0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Servings are generous. Staff is upbeat and intuitive. Best chicken bites in Lower Mainland. Thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfC1C-7qR7Jyv4bGi4tebhyVbejWpIuHAYVTXy&fid=0x0:0x6e6afd1d8b47365"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Michael San Felipe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZ2E5pS_cjelbWDCytRTd9AImL7-fToxvELxDLl5-tyRR4bXmHfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"EDIT: the food is really good.  At really good prices.  If I still lived nearby, I would frequent this spot for the food.  I changed my rating to 4 Stars.

Original review: I love bubble tea.  Due to the pandemic, I haven’t had an opportunity to get it anywhere.  Really glad this place was open and I was able to just walk in and order a black sugar latte to go.   Unfortunately, it was awful. Really wish to have just waited to go to Tiger Sugar or the Alley.  It was a waste of $5.50 and would never really visit this establishment for anything else.  It’s a shame that they have the name Bubble World, when their bubble tea sucks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOq5hn89o5lElRVBuCrACiRPHrxtZX2QI6eLh25&fid=0x0:0x6e6afd1d8b47365"],"When":"2020-5-27"}]

Great Service i recommend it!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmwn0DuTkRsTY3Ks-ZQKScHDD1_nUvD8IwTMdG\u0026fid=0x0:0x6cc2dc6a805ae1c3"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"LOVEPREET SINGH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvVU72FNto_ehTNF9V84ZLQPeevuj3QQlHKikKZQfP3YdH7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today i visited at this location first time. The overall service by Kirandeep🧑‍🍳 was awesome.  Place was so clean and managed by the employee.  Pizza was fresh. Positive vibes.😇. Thank you!   Everyone nearby areas should visit here! If u want late night pizza. 🍕🍕🍕","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sylvia Boctor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7RCGfa4UG9FrwDQClkTn-kicIiLHfRx-KLA4dEzvYjrSDlUZvtA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place in all aspects! Will definitely keep coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlH-SAYm1ZSWTmKqfM7o1uVCJghfywCHN9ytu3\u0026fid=0x0:0x6cc2dc6a805ae1c3"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"NikkiMae 98","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjWFp3IHi8P5sqXRWTpPdoTz3YKnpB0VIoDRq8kQcBXukCXOIs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kiran (sorry if I miss spelled your name!) was awesome. Came in at midnights to get a pizza but they didn’t have the flavour I wanted already made so she made me a fresh one! Thank you so much!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Liezl Soriano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUp_7j8xU3wUUSKdkfQBSjfnMRJBq5GaLViZt-QYpDoNxGYE4EAFw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered off DoorDash and got the wrong order. DoorDash refunded me with credits so I just re-ordered it again. I’m not sure where the ball was dropped if it was DoorDash or Fresh Slice but either way, this time when they delivered it they gave me two additional free pizzas!! I’m not entirely sure what happened but I think this Fresh Slice location probably noticed that I had put another order it and that there was an order mix up so they just gave two additional pizzas to us. Honestly unexpected but thought it was a super nice recovery…  Thanks so much we appreciated the gesture!! 🙏","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Mack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlVS9T2QjpLmAjcf5lOKIlCUCEddOtmeZbWcChqxetcI2jsw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Staff is super nice. But, food safe It’s not the number one priority! I was not pleased watching the cook grab the dirty dishes by the garbage area and place it on top of clean dishes to be used again.  Also, saw the that she wore fake nails and was not wearing gloves when making a pizza…. I will not be going back to this location again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bhumika Bhateja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvsytwXSGnxxIZJK_JxEm4Bx-tVV3cKBqIoTd7Rfewg9dqsW4O=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited here and had a fantastic experience thanks to Harjot and Mannat. From the moment I arrived, Mannat’s warm greeting and Harjot’s attentive service stood out. The pizza was delicious, with a perfect crust, melty cheese, and fresh toppings. The combination of excellent food and exceptional service made my visit memorable. I highly recommend Fresh Slice for a great meal and outstanding customer care.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rajat Gupta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVokysEzEChfzr6FGWUrwD9FKTDTm0qbgi1P7TrnajFmVHnNZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent Pizza and great service.\nInder and entire team is Amazing♥️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQBtn_7a6BOThmWJnFPeDy-1uNcZ_5K4L-3JS8\u0026fid=0x0:0x6cc2dc6a805ae1c3"],"When":"2024-3-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Asghar Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNfWjxgyAnjpqRzrazj88HpSu3eTMpp2pHbm2Qphtw3-J5RA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was busy but the managers are fast. Ruby was kind and the other two was helping as i observe. Good store for pick up","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZ62FJSUBsR1AJ6D15JXd3ym0Xnl23_6lq-j68&fid=0x0:0xb79a06319eda5ffb"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Brittany S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eFQkj626t8zGBNhG1j682nXYAY3vJkS1VdBBUNRvZlKC0L6p=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I've stopped by this place multiple times but today was awful...
Drinks had no syrup so multiple choices were unavailable. Let staff know and they didn't add syrup during my stay.
I received the wrong burger and she tried telling me she asked me when she only asked me if I wanted it spicy.
When I got the burger I wanted it was half slapped together with half a breast and a massive amount of sauce making me use at least 6 napkins.
I finished the chicken from my burger and still had half a bun left..
And to top it off an employee was on lunch and took their shoes off in the restaurant.. Just.. Not acceptable when dining in.

Also this was not during a rush.. We were the only customers ordering at that time.

Flavor wise food was great but how it was received was not great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAyg5Zp7UEhlzzx0HarqK7cwWtkHWUdco2-xq4&fid=0x0:0xb79a06319eda5ffb"],"When":"2023-11-30"},{"Name":"Badshah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzo7lxV_fb7anKCi4Pbzzh9_Tf5sKp45hs1oQxQfjNhHH8BQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the food. Very friendly staff. Always best..👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8P6olDvA8f2hT4HwtOQsMJgysqZoRwhjX2E_r&fid=0x0:0xb79a06319eda5ffb"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Dong Seo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFRwRZ-nQkoVtq3jRxfwuSRGaxAX_dWjV6n0g1Z4NyeHXqiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This was an order on Saturday night 09/14/24. Just cancel the order if you don’t want to make it.
Edit, you definitely “fell short” and I am not comfortable eating at this establishment again..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4i-H0ecbS83c3a1vLf7xglqJcUnx6mWbVj7Px&fid=0x0:0xb79a06319eda5ffb"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Karan mohala Karan mohala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAb2WHSpf9PfI0jNlLmSLbEYgSTbqpuUqv4r0dfRZofFODXA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of being served by Sehajveer Singh at the Popeyes location on 96 Ave in Langley, and I must say, his professionalism and customer service were outstanding. As the shift supervisor, Sehajveer demonstrated exceptional leadership skills and an attention to detail that ensured everything ran smoothly during my visit.

From the moment I walked in, he greeted me with a friendly smile and took the time to answer my questions about the menu. He was very knowledgeable about the products and made helpful recommendations. It was clear that he was not just managing the shift, but actively ensuring that all team members were working efficiently and maintaining high standards of quality and cleanliness.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Harshit Makhija","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW11eqMDHv1CM1VPNLzDnjd5ToXojkAY1QhZrzMLJt4KMzRbI0j=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nisha and Ruby are fast on serving customers.and the restaurant is nice and super cleanz i tried the fried pickles and its nice for vegetarian","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORx-_z3C56iOMEgzNo4Nr0tEHrdjRPcyO08uKS&fid=0x0:0xb79a06319eda5ffb"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Ryan Ballinger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLD5a3B3-Ecgk2kT0trv96SQZurGDkcaK_Ugv4coToqzr4J1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Popeye's is the best. They were quick, friendly, and the food was hot and fresh. Also, the manager as well as the cashier that was on staff were so friendly not only to us, but also to two young boys who had ridden their bikes there, being extremely nice to them and treating them like valued customers. The boys were a little short on funds and the staff at this location took great care of them by putting kindness ahead of profit. They were truly exceptional. I will be sure to continue to give them my business in the years to come. Cheers!~","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Syed Zeshan Ahmed Live Music","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5ZSxrLMerHDPeEHq4o0gzwVxiWpmZF3lG54K98bmiioKgoo8ATQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My wife ordered chicken meal and I ordered classic sandwich, her chicken was good but my sandwich was not good. I had eaten this sandwich at white rock branch and it was delicious. This one was made in haste and the bun was stale.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKk_50NoZvp_oiAQJL03YPi_D0Cx8fId8Houbp&fid=0x0:0xb79a06319eda5ffb"],"When":"2024-9-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jennifer Decock-Hewitt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAzq-kOPXPPJ9Z3RXwBw12LLxpADVnalUhMobspt_e5Vcm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a kid's donburi meal to go this evening. This comes with donburi, tempura, and a California roll. I requested no crab in the California roll. I even added a note saying that it was okay if this meant the roll was small. Because I requested this, I was charged an extra $5 ($4.88 to be exact). They said that this is because they had to make an avocado roll instead. However, no amount was deducted from the combo price. So, I was basically charged for the California roll twice as I paid for it as part of the combo PLUS I had to pay for an avocado roll. However, despite paying for both the California roll and the avocado roll, I was only given one roll. So, a dinky kid's meal ended up costing close to $20 for rice with a small amount of beef, three pieces of tempura, and an avocado roll that was just straight avocado. On top of that, they charged 50 cents for the take out bag, and there was no option to select no bag. Yes, they called my husband to discuss the extra charge as the online ordering account is in his name, but at the time, he was on a business trip in Ontario and was working, so he just said "sure" in order to get off the phone and get back to work. I have been a longtime customer for close to 8 years, but I will definitely not be returning. There are a million other sushi places, so will be skipping this place in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR0J8TTkhhEfSH9Y07ayb2BixPt-JMUWnpbsw&fid=0x0:0xdb59e9ef3ff47e35"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Amor Tamayo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL6z7Y5zt5KEsfemCwbC7OVrt5TARVZWg59cmpaNErLVUV5ufQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food, service and ambiance are amazing!! This sushi place is one of the best sushi place ever I’ve ever been.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFKHsXyGMuNRihA4xQ7_-wSZu-4cye19SuYqRD&fid=0x0:0xdb59e9ef3ff47e35"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Sasha Moir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLsLV9T0TqEywh8ZWoxSazwjSuarB7jC3OnvRZ3QD4Q2HySpwo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has been around forever and I popped for a vegetarian lunch. The sushi presentation was adorable. There are a million sushi places with the exact same looking plates, but this was the first time I had my sushi presented in a cute little flower. It tasted great as well. The salad was super colourful and delicious and I even ate the little lemons and enjoyed them. Excited to come back and have another cute little tasty meal.
(The server was absolutely lovely, but she took the order of a person who was seated at a table after me and there was a few minute delay in taking my order with only bothered my because I was starving and a bit hangry lol)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_KbGHiIX14pfhGMbpMsRIHCWXMAf4GFH7aJsy&fid=0x0:0xdb59e9ef3ff47e35"],"When":"2024-5-3"},{"Name":"William Lew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvXVe082uTL5_9GCUp8oQIWNdXKRbDxlNmGV1lwQJE23VrMBqY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent quality and value! I picked up a few rolls for my son before his next swim session at Walnut Grove Rec Centre. Their app was easy to use and navigate. Appreciate that when you are short on time. The next time, we will dine in as the premises were worthy of a sit down.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN671TvhsZYBHGm_JClJCLi9i4UI3_a7J9tRVq1&fid=0x0:0xdb59e9ef3ff47e35"],"When":"2023-4-2"},{"Name":"D MC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpC7RrSmxTvBQnrycmHk8RaExCMfuDFwhzqbvkpLlK-dzTjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We ordered take out from Sushi Asakusa and it was okay. Portions were decent. We had the assorted sushi, prawn tempura and the spring rolls. The assorted sushi could use some more variety and the spring rolls were a bit out of place (I'd recommend removing these from the menu because they're more of a Chinese dish rather than Japanese, but that's just my opinion).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVwcWAetVbm5Ojo70IUideIcpGq0uYfNiFyo0x&fid=0x0:0xdb59e9ef3ff47e35"],"When":"2023-9-4"},{"Name":"Bryan Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHRgkPamGu_fJmJTb7XkEye36Slkr2B0jmVPRrsdmyAH0-qZtn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A decent sushi restaurant in Richmond with the standard selection of rolls along with a couple variations of their own. The special rolls were all a bit sauce heavy but not too bad. The seared salmon roll was probably my favorite of the bunch but it was just some seared salmon on rice. Some of their lunch combos included a skewer of yakitori which I rarely see in these restaurants.

Pricing is similar to what you'd expect from a place in West Vancouver, take that as you will. I liked the interior decor of the place.

Overall, I don't have many complaints about the place... but nothing popped out at me either.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZKKNvxgCKkiz_96bDN4SpF2EMtPgL143KK8F2&fid=0x0:0xdb59e9ef3ff47e35"],"When":"2019-11-8"},{"Name":"Ivan Shtogrin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIzruMKsCEkLCnMQsS432l4LIrEOtMBbfRB-uT4sGio_bZ0O7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yesterday I was passing by this restaurant.  I was starving and decided to stop by and take sushi home.  What can I tell you?  This is a cute, cozy sushi restaurant.  Many people make orders here.  Everything is clean and beautiful.  They quickly accepted my order and asked me to wait 15 minutes.  I came and my order was fulfilled.  Everything was very tasty.  Thanks guys.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPTN-nyf466EcMltv5Y5rNUJsxzVJ7Y1MgbC9c&fid=0x0:0xdb59e9ef3ff47e35"],"When":"2022-11-6"},{"Name":"Maria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDlnbTQJ5EW1HeoAL0pS_51JTJB-E2AhLvWqGV2LyXoA3-FdJB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time back ordering food from here in over two years.  Love being able to sit in the booths.  The tea is great and the quality of the food is still the same.  Really yummy and fresh!  I got the tofu teriyaki along with a bunch of other things.  So delish!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaDrJFvTISVZH4vRsI2gZjdaiA8CxslgpjlpNK&fid=0x0:0xdb59e9ef3ff47e35"],"When":"2022-4-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kelly Claassen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGWc9rf-G-to5Ah_r6pM35GRkEMWUfKpofp7vHNcYKo19TrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered a sandwich through the ap and they forgot to add cheese and toast it. There was no accountability for this and staff yelled at me claiming they checked their cameras and that the sub was toasted and cheese is on it. They refused to give a credit for the sandwich. Even after an apology from the owner nothing happened.
We love subway. Theres many in the area - do not go to this one, choose the one a few blocks away.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDWkQnB69qfLQucVHNBqx02XTF7J0UB1a1htdw&fid=0x0:0xb70f7cb54948660"],"When":"2024-5-29"},{"Name":"Danny Wilkinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQUrANOS_iZY3z6TuIgARQEDQnXqKuSvIqNodbiohNFQbBRw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Management 2/10 service 10/10

Yesterday my daughter and I stopped in here and watched a young girl working by herself make several mobile ordered ahead of us, our sandwiches, people behind us as well as work the till and clean up all by herself (was like watching an octopus at work). Management should be ashamed of themselves for only having one person working in that place, there is clearly enough work for 2 to 3 people. Do better and stop taking advantage of people.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"The PolishPrince82","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLUb8NkzYtT38fZ9E-8qwP_nvGUvlszMUx4OyC8fYBWisOPw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I know all the kids come from foreign countries…but bosses should train these people better, came in July 4th 2024, after 8pm, order the footlong cookies, the girl didn’t use gloves, didn’t see her wash her hands and saw her wiping her hands on her apron, not only that my wife got sick from the cookie after eating it, we didn’t even finish it…she was sick until the next day, she didn’t really feel better until after, she is pregnant and has a doctors appointment, I am gonna send this information to health Canada as they have the right to know to investigate…never spending another penny in this location","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pavneet Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg0W6I4RGhMThOJP_akYRkfFYxkX6HayB1338fwrl5a-UWh7cWqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I wish there’s an option for minus rating, the manager here is the worst person at job. I asked the person serving me if she could use a spoon to put rice in a bowl, she used same gloves that she was opening up the box with. She then said okay she took out the rice in a rush, showing passive aggression.
She brought serving spoon, and changed the rice in different bowl.
She then started putting up the veggies in so much rush again showing passive aggression.
At the time of billing the manager came she said just to let you know that we use hands to put rice from now on.
I said, just to let you know that she was using the same pair of gloves to put the rice that had already worn.
(FOODSAFE-in garbage) the manager started explaining that it’s like this if you dokt want to pay then don’t pay. What’s the point of coming to subway if you don’t want to pay for your food??!! If you are hungry and away from your house and you go to a restaurant. They started poking that why didn’t you tell her to change the gloves!? Where’s the food safe certificate and why do you even have that?? That’s for the safety of people who are going to consume the food.
Very dangerous place genuine eaters, this type of managers have stupid customer service and she was saying we have this for 6 years!
Doesn’t matter the number of years if you haven’t done it in a right way!
She said we use same gloves for cashier till and serve with same pair of gloves.
THAT IS DISGUSTING!
then she was saying nobody will listen to you. Everybody is still going to eat there.
I wanted my food hygiene! I am a customer. You take care of your rest of the customers.

Second part: it’s been more than 2 weeks and no one have approached yet! Just asked to email and that’s it. What a quality of service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shaun H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWiMM34w-089uYYKcNMELu4RC3pIRIL8KWIcwFgerDAGkxDOudR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Twice now I've been here at dinner time and they didn't have any bread. How do you run out of bread?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maxwell Patterson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0F6f2slSG5MxHg3CSzpvgciwdgGfA5kWqNxcP2pnJ8qtcLGhN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had one of the best sandwich’s made here. The sandwich was made with care, each bit had equal parts veggie and meat and bread, unlike other stores that slap the ingredients together. I haven’t been able to go back since to find out if it was a lucky shot or they just make the sandwich’s that good everytime, or if it was that one worker. I haven’t gone back cuz I don’t want to be disappointed if the next sandwich wasn’t like the first one I had.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Snehal Mahajan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLjnbCdUpu4-jqvy2ptctPvQRrpZr4MUMAGvgxRO18Z7L2uXVE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a crispy chicken sandwich from this store on Uber last time and a piece of chicken was uncooked somehow and I ate it first and thjust didn’t realize as I was working andwanted to finish my food and get back to work, I understand the food industry is very hectic sometimes it happens but today I wanted to order one more from uber but wanted to make sure that it is not raw again, the lady on phone said that she is not the one who makes it. Like what do u mean by u don’t make it!! She didn’t even wanted to listen to me she said next time don’t order from here, choose another store. I think the subway should take some action against such branches who deal like this with people. She literally said that we are not responsible if something goes wrong with the food that they make. I am not sure how I will be able to report this","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mohamed Almohamed Alfaris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJwRYa5Mrwnaitj8o8xBa3jX2f1O9Gxs1Q6YqTQdgqt_ecAxMb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I waited for a long time, and no one asked me what I wanted","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8RO3U4KFAvqbuFRYI4Q4EIxOrcT-NXp5EljE-&fid=0x0:0xb70f7cb54948660"],"When":"2023-2-18"}]

title: Lin’s Neighbourhood Chinese Kitchen

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Priyanjali Das","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj-NnUPdUrcf6vwRgWS0-NwaBK37hP6hHBr-OtHOL1NHIbnAjF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I live somewhere between two very prominent chinese takeout restaurants in the area and in an attempt to review Lin’s and Ming-Sing’s, I ordered both their choice of three and you can see the difference in both the quantities. I was very disappointed with Lin’s and how I had to fish for pieces of chicken in its KungPao chicken. There were no additional condiments. When requested for utensils, all they sent was a fork.

I will never be ordering from Lin’s ever again.

Ming-Sing’s 3 choice combo comes with an additional box of the third entree instead of cramming it all in one box. Generous serving of the side (I chose noodles) and they stuffed that box with so much food, it fed two adults.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJ5MSGTeCRVvQNnkImo1d4nfb1bhFZ4nYvq3F0&fid=0x0:0x7ff518ab7e41e384"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Dhen Ranoco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHbtN3g5UsisOKhWJCfbO_QlTRi7hT8HS4dho2ERrE2wiU0hUI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything went well and perfect. Food is amazing. The preparation is really good. It’s clean and tidy. The box that cover the Party tray’s are perfect. I regret I give a little tip. Sorry for that. You deserve more. Thanks to Cynthia she’s very accommodating. I promise I come back again to order. So happy I chose to order in your restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzb2fs8XGZwg0MDrHr-f1J4mJrrHtu1DtxLmBd&fid=0x0:0x7ff518ab7e41e384"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Adam Vengroff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmsRRNYkFlEzpBn64QsUc7tpFnpnQl_-UEHmdP_ZNdqjA_kk2e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our family of 6 ate hear for a late lunch.
The lovely lady at the counter was very helpful and made great suggestions.
All of us enjoyed the food.
The chow mein, the sweet and sour pork, the honey almond chicken, it was all good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLL0hQmoejWquCKNBh-OgGZAHfiWk1hylqh27p&fid=0x0:0x7ff518ab7e41e384"],"When":"2024-4-24"},{"Name":"chris scales","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLcQlGT_JebDw8TeR0BiT90PZSVOJbjeVfeeUktlVL2FJiKpg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Placed and order for the 3 items, came to over $50

Had a single bite of each item and couldnt finish it. I absolutely hate wasting food but I don't have a choice here.

Very disappointing as I was excited to try a new place out. I would hope this food quality isn't normal, however some reviews seems to suggest it is.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gerald Crone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQpW1yDqpqVoLP88S3TNGYdaBv6HK25fYzCkdXU-C46r-LcSx6lw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"When I picked up my order, I looked at the portions of food and thought it was quite small for the price I paid. Got the deluxe dinner for one, had vegetarian fried rice, chow mein noodles and sesame chicken with sweet and sour chicken. The meal itself wad quite bland and hard to finish, each bite was a challenge as there wasn't much flavor . Also got the wonton soup and wasn't much flavor, until I added some soy sauce to it. Unfortunately the food did not sit well in my stomach and lead to a day of constant bathroom visits. This will be my first and only time eating from this restaurant.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brad Allan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWafvXUQjDjB-n6LKFM9s_zLA1fkrAM0i_mXEMz6c-CQ9J5o6Oi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I bought the Deluxe combo at 2:00pm. With 1 can of pop. $20 with tip. Portion size was no bigger ( for the extra $) than the other combos. Size of a side plate. Very small. Food was Luke warm at best. Empty. Worst flavour ever. Dry af chicken!!! Very disapointed","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_vC8dxCnr55oyiXtJUtHAw1epuubuPGOPy1wI&fid=0x0:0x7ff518ab7e41e384"],"When":"2024-3-13"},{"Name":"Utah Cumiskey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIe-sp6283_2Xi-rfew6s5PohhP92TJ80TWxNpEnjed0QngSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Extremely disappointed. Almost spent $40 and had to throw it away after tasting. Poor quality food. No flavor at all. Tasted gross and disgusting. We got sweet and sour pork, almond chicken and lemon chicken with veg chowmein. Not a single good thing to say about it. The pork made me wanna throw up.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"suckz2bu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkW2zl756S1c7P-rqmazrhHcTb-d3ZySyEr3yZ2vW5Rq9IXQ8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food tastes like chemicals , cheap and extremely low quality , portion sizes are decent and service is ok but nothing special . I won't be eating here again . Better quality at Chinese buffets .","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Van Views","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrM3s9VvN73oN3M_Jgvg9z6zkphB0X5_vmIkd7XUnXjFdzlA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great restaurant with best ambience and mellow music!

Had great time with family enjoying the best food & drinks! Cozy location with plenty of parking.

Crispy cauliflower & Spicy Fried Chicken & Pickles tasted amazing as suggested by the staff. They were super friendly and supportive to utilize the social hour for ordering! All dishes tasted splendid.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_dwXjWsCKKCCrNRqmivsxUf-ZhtUYekrBsWai&fid=0x0:0xec9c257ad12b52e"],"When":"2023-9-10"},{"Name":"Yasmine McGuiness","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3QVxW3YPfBcpfD64_5CtAa_fQTX2Ej7X-Z8_Q91cxbC55og=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a very late review though I really needed to give my strong opinion of this restaurant. I had the dragon ball dish and it was unreal!  Our servers name was Jacqueline if I remember correctly and she was so lovely, I could probably say one of the best server I have ever had. She was attentive and chirpy, genuine which is my favourite thing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christopher Hiebert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbUd6n48gULqJ4L1DcJwZ9bLXyOLR-d5Qe0P3jjiPIKvYfWg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were served by a young lady by the name of Kassandra. She was extremely helpful with the menu and we were very happy with her service.
It will be great if the next time we go we get lucky enough to have her again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"walter mclean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-v8zLJPTfD-skaW2RnP7RzhmBJU7uRaoetNcBzVaDPKWfmDI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really enjoy the steak with the herb butter. We share the meal and then share the Brownie and vanilla ice cream.
Love the deck seating with overhead heat and protection from rain/wind.  Quieter than the main part of the restaurant and lighter during the early evening.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R.J.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIu75FgzkHTgCsonra3mExyyf8W9l-6QoIkTtWnqJrJTCkJG2W=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Very expensive for the small amount of food. Happy hour dishes have now been cut down to half portions “happy hour portions”  so really you’re not getting a deal. Everything was super expensive. Food was good, although my friend bought a dragon ball and it was so saucy, she couldn’t eat the entire thing. Staff are very friendly, although it seemed they were in a rush to get us out. My bill came and I was surprised how big it was for one small person. Good atmosphere although very noisy, and our booth was an odd shape that one person with us had no table room.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Camilia Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWigkoqaNhHJinW1sDEWmiP5-QkCbLl16QFp5xZiy1DDMYI0dmUuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Came here for my birthday, the service was fine except for the fact that all our food came out at different times which I know isn’t the servers fault. I ordered the poke bowl and it was very unpleasant. It looked like the cilantro had gone bad and they were still using it. Since getting home I am so sick and feel like puking. I think the Tuna gave me food poisoning because I feel severely unwell.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKwQ__pyZeQ0YNGNhFe5T2-hO1hAEtqXOJo07p&fid=0x0:0xec9c257ad12b52e"],"When":"2022-12-24"},{"Name":"Josh Gutierrez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfZRTFUo5WfmnEB21t3-krZo6AW-mmiY2zL-FsXNXdc1Je4g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is always amazing and their servers attentive. Great happy hour and very tasty kids menu options.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stacy Marinelli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULdwsUeInH7oQ7sLVRacCFxj4snvHDHT7ys2PTThaQpV1hz8iSSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There was 13 of us and the service was impeccable! Food came out quick and timed perfectly from appetizers to meals to dessert to cocktails. Had the calamari excellent dry ribs very good and I had the chicken tacos with side house salad. Both were excellent could only eat one taco.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzBd8EgqkAW1O5WhD_Bd3WYxgtBaj2BlaPiE1f&fid=0x0:0xec9c257ad12b52e"],"When":"2023-4-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"조아","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUwh3iCI9XvJ1_58Kv1Vd-K1t9bOp2QQxaWiCPL4gMTcenFsqU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Hi I ordered earlier and I got them in Ubereats app but I'm eating chicken, and all 3 pieces of chicken legs are bleeding.
It's not just the red part. Red water came out together. I had to spit it while eating it up. I was upset. That's why I called you 8 times to raise a problem, but you didn't answer. Also my brother is sick because of it. I often ordered it, but there was no response.. I disappointed .. Im going to Never reorder","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMp92BETmy2OY94D7y4TTQoHtHXdy4S2Q0d_iVQ&fid=0x0:0x6bd46f766736e802"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Jimmy M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsbYP1cWZHx71rRanOuz38YcAFiEQfK-do7A-NB4jJmRXyrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered the half and half boneless, medium spicy and snow cheese. I usually prefer white meat but figured I wouldn’t be picky and get a mix. It was alllll dark meat which is great for some I suppose but they should state that. I assume when it says half and full they mean half chick or full chicken, both would suggest a mix of white and dark which is what I expected. Mine was all dark meat which was super disappointing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPn_H7AJ_dVTSyYWP_u8lSlBdd_MRyi33aMKrIM&fid=0x0:0x6bd46f766736e802"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Carl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMHgpY4gNAcNxsjCJZezquqHjF2-t37wSg--P1LqmEVCp-Tg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent chicken. Highly recommended the “CHEESE SNOW”. A great wine pairing would be a Southern France Rosé","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFnqvVTzSKfYe3cC29Ty333-5GE6P1kM07yN-N&fid=0x0:0x6bd46f766736e802"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Jora Nijjar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1SrwCvR_91OwflsNXUktypNHNJBou3FUN2kfwRDbz6fyEg6MvHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered some take out from here.  The chicken was very delicious.  My favorite flavor was the Buldak chicken.  The original and Soy Garlic was also very good.  We bought the bone in this time but I would try the bonless next time.  The quality was good.  It is a little on the expensive side, that is the only down side to it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlBPIbz0pIj0ZAek1uB54KfbCHYXSZlb-r-meh&fid=0x0:0x6bd46f766736e802"],"When":"2022-1-25"},{"Name":"D MC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpC7RrSmxTvBQnrycmHk8RaExCMfuDFwhzqbvkpLlK-dzTjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious korean fried chicken at Chicko Chicken in Walnut Grove, Langley. Batter is a little thicker than other Korean places (e.g. bb.q chicken), but still 5 stars in my books. The original and soy garlic are my favorite. Staff are friendly and polite. Since they cook to order, I prefer calling ahead since it can take 20mins for a freshly fried and sauced order.

Update (Oct.2021) - I tried the extra spicy HAEK buldak and it is delicious. Yes, my mouth was on fire and I needed several glasses of milk, but it was still worth it. Serious spice on this one! Try it...if you dare. Love it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONoTKsfLRxZQ2uZWI7Kuceuhm0e4ognBkHOI_a&fid=0x0:0x6bd46f766736e802"],"When":"2021-8-31"},{"Name":"Alisha Thom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXujOxoEyJUcYNNvuzgsvO8ilLH0ZWp5Rv5b3mSVGZbk2ezq8qu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’ve ordered here many times before. tonight I ordered the exact same thing as I always do and when I got home, it was wrong. I called to tell them and the woman argued with me that it is correct. she agreed that the flavour I get (soy garlic) is a dark brown. I explained that what I have is more honey coloured and sweet and not at all salty, she argued. the entire time she kept sighing and complaining to another coworker I. her own language. I asked if I drove all the way back, if she’d look at it and replace it, she sighed loudly again sounding very annoyed at the thought that a paying customer might actually want what they paid for, then said they wouldn’t replace it and theres nothing she would do.

I will forever more go to Chitos chicken down the street. They may be more expensive but the quality of food is superior and the customer service is much much better. So disappointing for a Walnut Grove Business","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anthony Grecu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRF50Yszo6VHwTXer7CgPOABOaF-7CJkoAkbdxNc6_QZf4yQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I feel like not enough people know about this spot, only 97 reviews and it’s been open for a long time! One of the great spots to get Korean fried chicken in Walnut Grove! Highly recommend the cheese snow and soy garlic!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arsh Girgla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1LT1rdXwSzExuokFRAqQKlS8pagJkNyX-Hz7U-sqGsSLl94Dt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yangyeom and snow chicken is the most delicious chicken we have ever had.
I wish there were some sitting arrangements as well to enjoy the freshness and crispiness more quickly.","Images":null,"When":""}]
