user_reviews:
[{"Name":"C-live H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLf8Gw0zAUTAb4FMeWzfrzmYjSp8f2r3Lg9za-m1JISgeEP8A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience, wish this was closer to my home neighbourhood.

Food was clean and tasty. Definitely not heavy on the salt and oil unlike so many brunch places.

Price is very reasonable, fantastic value on the Big Breakfast (what I ordered), blows other breakfast places out of the water. Service was efficient, with very little wait for food.

Not for those who are looking for some kind of hipster "vibes" as the decor is simple but clean, just like their food 🙂","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Phillip Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDxeRsOu_38Vanl3R1pdCGsmerEkppvahiUYpCxDQNLI-FIgqgQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"***update
I have been going to this place for a few years since I posted this review and nothing has changed. I cannot speak highly enough about this place
***
This is the best breakfast restaurant I have ever been to. You can get a full size breakfast for $7. I'm talking bacon eggs toast and hash browns. The portions are awesome and the food tastes great. There are free coffee refills. The the staff is very friendly and the vibe is warm and cosy. I feel like I am in my friends home having breakfast. This places gets busy quick so show up early.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwU40ILuwHSuc2BftvwAPCwOLE1Kw5oA8F4C3F&fid=0x0:0x9787847656e434c0"],"When":"2021-2-6"},{"Name":"David Smlth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYXFizJJBMMwkBSXZCJI0PtWbwnBFKZAu_g1R-qjByc9YEmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is our favorite place for a relaxed, family run, wholesome breakfast. If you eat in the background sound, it is quietly played instrumental music that you don't have to strain to block out. If you eat outside,  you may have the added bonus of dog walkers passing through.  The food is straight up good and actually prepared the way you ask for it to be done.  Coffee is good and prices are reasonable.  The hard-working couple who run this place have been here for years and deserve patronage for consistent quality service and product.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vanessa Siemens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJKCfF96Py35XeRij3LfZ7iw1-PArlS476_Zv-0lpjLz3Xkx3yww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great stop for a quick bite or to sit and enjoy a good breakfast. They have a lot of menu options, and great breakfast choices. The service is wonderful and the tea selection is great as well- lots of good loose leaf options. My bagel was perfectly toasted and was enjoyed with a great cup of tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoCWV5pj25IjaZTOFJPbHo9MopkZDvZ0Ymn77l&fid=0x0:0x9787847656e434c0"],"When":"2023-4-29"},{"Name":"Ben Choe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJujsEXF9sW3w8CtUyu8Lt3kBfV7G_RcFbmsfLigBfOovHkTyybw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is my favourite breakfast spot now. The owners are very friendly and the food was excellent. The price was very reasonable as well, which was quite surprising given the inflation after Covid.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2YXFfMQA9Co6gFkDS2yL8tQ4_CHxAtrlDmAQq&fid=0x0:0x9787847656e434c0"],"When":"2023-11-4"},{"Name":"Mike","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXo3O0rzZKkH11dfT4gwU75BdFGpdwgDvdkqn2dZCmtu8SGSuM9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was a quaint little stop.  It’s a little cafe off of 88th, and had a small town charm to it.  I would recommend giving it a try if you’re wanting a fresh lunch.

The ambiance inside is quiet.  Classical music plays overhead as you enjoy a light lunch.  There’s also the option of sitting outside.  While nice, my wife and I opted to eat indoors, choosing to sit in a couple of comfy armchairs.

We both had the same thing: the Lux sandwich with a side of cream of broccoli soup.  While my wife had hers as just smoked salmon and cream cheese, I had mine with everything.  This included cucumber, lettuce, tomato and capers.

It was phenomenal!  The salmon and cream cheese were made that much better being on a fresh bagel.  We’ve had the bagels from this place before, and they have always been tasty.  This was the first time we had lunch there, and we were not disappointed!

Give this place a try for lunch.  You won’t be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUVWorMkYt9oClvrbp-sq3fkGut4fztecp7FEg&fid=0x0:0x9787847656e434c0"],"When":"2020-10-26"},{"Name":"Nils Brunzema","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlvH-DPNg2pPKODdv_uLSNxWeifgHLl2QiXTtd3lvU016SqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice place! Friendly owners, great food, very clean. You don’t fine places like this very often these days.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matt Stanley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMhTNcGIpDgXnMPTtbWTHr-4V8hzKu2c2_1H0w6e2JihUSF1zv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing place with a caring, detailed, and kind staff who offer great food at a great price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbiQCJQxxJhedVqw17_1Iua7pZex3XQwDUCbTe&fid=0x0:0x9787847656e434c0"],"When":"2024-8-16"}]

title: Red Swan Pizza - WalnutGrove

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"BARINDER SINGH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnHJmw8mSAwFFSN_I1ydxaWlAD_YOMye1qL1TYo1TC5S8lXao=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We always order delivery. But i was in the plaza doing shopping so i decided to pick up my food. As soon as I walked in I was greeted. The place was very busy, but clean, and smelled great.
All the pizza was cooked perfectly and had a generous amount of toppings. This location has earned a spot among my top pizza experiences!
The pizza dough is fluffy in the right places and has a perfectly done, crunchy crust that isn't overly thick♥️ Don’t forget to add garlic to any pizza to take the flavour to another level! Thanks guys!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqVk67wdI2BsVTXGtwIl-ZLpi6VXml0NiVq1r6&fid=0x0:0x5c9e508c9d7b7a34"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Manjinder Moore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQUYaK42k5D2gkCECi8xEsdcUhTNUW1AVtXCPRJUuMcfkl2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered All Dressed and Veggie Fans pizza; cooked just right including crust, lots of toppings which I like, sauce was good amount and spread out and tasteful. They are known for sesame seed crust which is really good; you can also request no sesame seed crust and just as good. Inside is very clean and orderly, well lit menu signs and lots of parking spots around. Pizza is right priced to it's quality and competition. Highly recommend this place. I wish I had taken photos but ate it all too fast; but I see others have posted.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ishaan Bhargava","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJeiWM1lqZb3DXk38kZcFsDbOvWYtz8le9dej96i2imapp36g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ohh my goshh!! Must try pizza place, eating pizza in Fraser valley last 12 years. But this place man hands down. Really good and soft dough with Sesame seed. Feel the freshness of dough, toppings are unbelievable. Fully loaded. Every bite we can feel the satisfaction. Price are very reasonable with this inflation. Tons of deals. I believe will not get pizza with this price in north America. Store was neat and clean. Great customer service. Overall they deserve 💯 % for their hard work.
Will definitely come back to try more. Or hope they will deliver to surrey.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkQ0QHhW4ymA7zWX7FliR_f0FFD71-W0B2hGCA&fid=0x0:0x5c9e508c9d7b7a34"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"M Prins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYWCMj9HZ6_2jMol4qrWBbE6l7uCmTatsMh6ch4jbiMYWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent price for value, exceptional service, pizzas were good—evenly spread toppings, well layered, and I like the signature sesame seeds on the crust (tho, not everyone’s favourite). Their name led to a robust conversation around what is a “red swan” anyway? Eitherway, I’d totally order from them again, better price and food than most of the other pizza chains","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTUnwfPyUAdmPvTliWlcauTnHf9ewpbOHwdqQ&fid=0x0:0x5c9e508c9d7b7a34"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Deep Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLG0E_LuJH5JoQwHTbknmxPI1KWwMVXocDBrWKRnGWvZGaOCg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Order XL chicken Supreme with chili pepper 🌶.
Delivery was super fast. In 30 minutes we have received our pizza. Flavor was perfect, nice combination of toppings. Sauce was tasty and dough was perfect proof. No so thick or thin. Surprise with amount of toppings we got. Definitely spread the good words around the community.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"mr David","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1mR-iWGyYWaIoi88--8oia3Zeaq8olTYlC72g5Pcb1-P7hpE8cQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious and yummy pizza. My family enjoying them a lot. Very testy and professional prepared. Staffs are very humble and welcoming.
You want some yummy and very delicious pizza? Order or go here in person.
Enjoy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN46Djx1wEMOtA4z1livki8f3ZmDgZTZ1osjegu&fid=0x0:0x5c9e508c9d7b7a34"],"When":"2024-1-7"},{"Name":"Lucas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTd1Rqs7VgPhdrfxxG4D9LIBsTUDrAsKvUnxDxUDS6a4O3GLQ_HQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent pizza that came out hot, fresh, and not at all greasy. I really enjoyed the sesame seed crust as well. Two toppings, $10.95 for a medium pizza. Good deal as far as this guy can tell. Give them a try, you won't be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORTIw8N1HXWD2PVeh1YavSmn-RFfryGWqb2nA1&fid=0x0:0x5c9e508c9d7b7a34"],"When":"2023-5-22"},{"Name":"Umang Yagnik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsvNGWq1_VlqxVaqJoAM3ejmgUT-SZy1H8xfohJpGTKVkKRGIj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Out of the two locations in Langley, the Red Swan Pizza in Walnut Grove offers top quality pizza and amazing service. Overall the location with the small dine-in area is kept very clean. The person taking the order will offer recommendations and suggest how you can combine different sizes of pizza for the best deal! Keep it up…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMF6yFD1p4cPknZnZRC3lIC-n-PJI1vbnt6kR_T&fid=0x0:0x5c9e508c9d7b7a34"],"When":"2024-3-30"}]

title: Fatburger Walnut Grove
descriptions: Long-running LA-based chain serving burgers in several sizes, plus other classic fast-food options.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Manmeet Sohal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAFj9DrnYycDPwPe308BqNgQ5LPf_kkdLO8iQvK63Eh4cUkg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Being a vegetarian, it's sometimes difficult finding vegetarian friendly options that actually taste good, but wow there Impossible burger tasted amazing! I have never had such a flavorful and juicy impossible burger that actually tasted like beef/meat! There are other vegetarian options as well, but I chose the impossible burger and it was crafted really nicely. The burger was a bit pricey being that it was $11.99, but I'd say it's an experince because it was very big and tasty. I enjoyed the service as well, everyone was very friendly and greeted every customer that came in, and came around to provide me anything I needed. The atmosphere is pretty cool too, it gives a bit of a "Red-Robins" feel/vibe. It was fun, casual and bit quirky.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwpDXZPcWA5npQ00mAV6SuhQzGTkSgS8LwWpi4&fid=0x0:0x8a2756cf4e607e23"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Isabel Lummis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVW18Deq5WPH5BYFaP_ZHGXyGZuP-h5tLaSgm_DfQmAXl9LtY1p=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a breath of fresh air! The staff said welcome when we entered. The burgers were delicious! Service was excellent! The restaurant is very clean. The staff checked in with us to see if we were enjoying our meal! We will definitely eat there again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carson Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAqvoKhDH5nBZYgZ9k2zpBQTdZeJzu-c7PSBxsLF9m20cNOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in for lunch, food was quick and fresh. That was an amazing burger.

Staff and team culture was super, you can really feel their energy and buy-in","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOM4F7g8AI1CDsueGUnPx9LZMVZMpH2LSj3cpZ0&fid=0x0:0x8a2756cf4e607e23"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Teresa Lyons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfAh0Mbds7LE0tV_4Z8YdjbNYckxhrlFaHZrH2Jk96WBa82UoM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The burgers and wings were great but the best part of the whole thing was the service.  We’ve never been to a friendlier, more welcoming restaurant!   They greeted each person as they arrived and a friendly goodbye and merry Christmas. We would come back just for the service!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cody Ouellette","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQcxiUJ7VJ7NuMtjJAlGi_olOfuXhnI6XRedOwesivtd7PuNCo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow. The service was really good here. All the staff said hello as we entered, all interactions with staff were with a smile, and there were three separate staff members that stopped by the table to ask how everything was. Very impressed. This really doesn't sound like a big deal but it feels like nobody has good service anymore.

Props to these guys. The food was tasty and quick as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jesse Nuytten","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlLM7epvShgtHGsO0IfiONmpD6DdQALwIBY_CnjRA2hTDNK6zk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The warm welcome and smiles from all staff was appreciated. My fried chicken sandwich combo (was actually a burger bun) with fries and pop was hot, fresh and extremely affordable. They gave me the option to upsize the drink and fries which was well worth it. The only snag is I was expecting a booth to sit at as in other locations, but there was only one. All in all a great experience. Thank you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6W_KVZMnJr8nhuW5Ki94OLGZR9uX5A-Rci16u5fRqeAWjTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was fresh and hot.  The customer service was the best I've ever experienced at a burger place.  They were happy, attentive, and really cared about our experience.   They also got our order right! I would recommend this fat burger any day of the week!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1OFjTkVbUhvRP2CvHWlQz8bO3z3lVyBNztTD3&fid=0x0:0x8a2756cf4e607e23"],"When":"2023-5-22"},{"Name":"Mark McDonald","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo1botryxWQbdHIlVYReI6WOQPsffteIyCDKTnCGErPr735l0c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our go to Fatburger spot. Really great food, cooked fresh. Reasonable prices when compared to other options out there. Only $4 to add good amount of fries and a drink is great value. Staff are super friendly. You can tell they have a good team culture and it shows in their service.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Catherine Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvZUA-DrXnbDWR7wBL1JcTwQ16BBt7mGlMvihH64lvGm9OhA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a wonderful brunch here with my daughter and we instantly fell in love with the charming decor. We were especially delighted by the beautiful latte art on my little one’s hot chocolate. The food was not only beautifully presented but tasted just as good as it looked. I highly recommend this place for others to try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJqLds0SBVEV8AgJ5jPNZv3ABlI_nd36YVl6hi&fid=0x0:0x225e5e98753096ee"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Viona Halim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5PMLEtvgkAwv2IjmL8XXm0-Ly_XpBo5Kd0Hv2pxoQ26_Hfy4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was honestly surprised at the vibe and cozy ambiance this place had when we first walked in. Not to mention the mouth-drooling display case of their pastries right by the entrance door.!

We came for brunch and absolutely love the menu options. We both got the egg bennies on a bagel and they were so good! The eggs were cooked perfectly and the bagels were not too chewy as we were slightly worried. They serve as the perfect bed for the eggs with just the right amount of bite.

If you ever come to visit, you MUST get their cream croissants. OMG, they're the best and I still dream about them. We'll definitely be back to try other things.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOy4DVUPwxHeIn_A0VeZSyCarh3qINncqDQPtjd&fid=0x0:0x225e5e98753096ee"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Victoria Sinclair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvX6ljBDQ1a55cjAyGZUeeaCRzNItWEJMB98yXmD5iJcLImw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredible brunch! We've had the pleasure of ordering to go and eating in and O Treat never disappoints! They have the best pastries, amazing pasta and the fried chicken benny is to die for. Honestly you can't go wrong with this place, everything we ordered ended up being above our expectations! Highly reccomend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7ECWP3RCACbzxUIgazkPmD6jgzO9Un-PIRGKu&fid=0x0:0x225e5e98753096ee"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"YOUNG TAE CHOI","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOyrN2dsxgMNqTQWYXlAYe3iEOBhHKrOYhnoJPgapKFebRoitd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an unforgettable dinner! This was one of the best Thanksgiving meals I’ve ever had in Canada. You could truly feel the care and effort put into each dish. The sad thing is that this family style dinner is available on Thanksgiving Day only for now. Don't miss it out! Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNB9ow9iyaNSAVWRdifAm9gbR9lV9fC9uxYIjMk&fid=0x0:0x225e5e98753096ee"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Jessameen Dela Peña","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9mRpmL8-ZJUG7UPFcnsjzRdxjABif-MswbO1rxgJyyWfns8Jd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here for Sunday brunch, and while there was a bit of a wait to get seated, it was absolutely worth it! The food was incredible—so fresh and delicious. The ambiance is beautiful, clean, and elegant. The salmon bennies are my go-to, and they were perfect. Highly recommend this spot for brunch!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOj0pRadgchiAyeo9acB-36M3kjX3h22g5vzeW&fid=0x0:0x225e5e98753096ee"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Ginn J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFOOQZPhZylsgMOLmtSB5bJOkt-NwtAZ31Ulkb5_TUEpijBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is worth the visit.  We went for brunch and both loved the food.  We each had a pastry to take home and OMG, definitely do that!!  They are filled with the tastiest cream!  Wonderfully decadent treat that was shockingly light.

The place was packed by the time we left and the noise was a lot.  We sat outside for the last of our time together and that was super pleasant too.

Great service,  tasty food most of which they make daily and excellent desserts.   I highly recommended it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvM4jDHaowINl5MjVkRiDuzTEwHG5tfT2EE-gk&fid=0x0:0x225e5e98753096ee"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Amber MacDonald","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiIAAasuYSgIJ9wKSgvwaES2RmP7Jx14d1tylay6x4VPknGboF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for brunch and was very impressed with the selection of menu items. We opted for breakfast and I had an oat Chai latte- probably one of the best I've ever had! My breakfast was also very delicious and it was a very large portion! The pastries in the front display case also looked amazing but unfortunately, I cannot eat wheat so I wasn't able to try any. Definitely interested in coming back and trying their lunch items!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTn18HekA5M3JVTL--_Xsl0JCSI1y-pX6ibvLZ&fid=0x0:0x225e5e98753096ee"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Sha Ocampo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdm5IgIMU7SvsHCilkf1in2MS6Ihpq3-BCS6qypG5kW460CBo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friends from Ontario and Williams Lake ate here few weeks ago and we all had amazing food. We went there without a reservation and had to wait for 30-40 minutes which we didn't mind since we weren't that hungry. I suggest make a reservation ahead of time if possible.

The food were really great. The croissants were yummy & creamy (if you are into that)

Overall lovely place, nice and welcoming staff, and great ambiance!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPycs5O_58vQ9zmFFt1ITtm_KuHytznsAH16F8F&fid=0x0:0x225e5e98753096ee"],"When":"2024-10-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lorie R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrjQmMekEW7VIAhb5e0Y9mzrzcbkDFf4gZ5vwPrwyLSi4ANcg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent service, delicious appies, dinner, & dessert. It’s so refreshing to go somewhere, especially for a birthday, and it turns out perfect. Our server was very attentive and provided top notch friendly service. If I could give 10 stars I would. Will definitely be back — I’m already craving the baked garlic shrimp!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfKpP2ORTpo9CBxwaCWWl-oYojZOFbeOBg1P8x&fid=0x0:0xf4dd29cf2d46a2d5"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Jilla Taheri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLt4msPQ-ZtWKxHrbgA-jPbAFgGk28DTO3iW4ZviMYijJh39A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came I n for my 65th Birthday . Ordered 8 Oz steak which was cooked to perfection and delicious with sautéed mushrooms on the side. Had Mocha ice cream cake ( to die for).
Thank you Jesse for your great service .❤️🙏🏻👍.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQ0WmCEOvt9B248I9JxLw1awhy4Dk0Gxwec9Yk&fid=0x0:0xf4dd29cf2d46a2d5"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"V Rod","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTrzw13i53c8jaZAQC-VybAVyFuKfYJ-hgTzXZbk5cO2LMW5zu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite chain in Canada. Matt was an excellent bartender and server. Prime Rib sandwich was delicious! French Onion soup never disappoints. Finished with Billy Miner dessert.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIZH_exRNtxbOnrNtyVxjhJzZui6NGJpM6K8XB&fid=0x0:0xf4dd29cf2d46a2d5"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Agata Klein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-YULIycbfinB9D1WRgBT2Rg-LTwqfjwr1V9CxEB_PH_6Vxoucmg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Quite consistently this location of the Keg delivers and fixes any issues that may arise. We last dined this week for our anniversary and had a few mishaps (wax on forks, mashed potatoes sloppy and without flavour, dull steak knife) however our server Holden was very good at rectifying all issues quickly. My mashed potatoes got subbed for a twice baked which was great and the cutlery got fixed. On a previous visit, when we booked a reservation with OpenTable, no one read my notes for the reservation which was disappointing, I had to bring it up with our server. When we reserve we ask for a quiter spot as this Keg can get loud in some areas. Washrooms are very clean and serviced. Pretty happy overall with this location of the Keg and looking forward to coming back again soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJD4hUxwpcRlpTHBNogkOo2TMbarkPtys7TMB2&fid=0x0:0xf4dd29cf2d46a2d5"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Troy Gaglardi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDtpd9uvxivFoJXG3wnvbutjdiA1u5279JuW08j7ITz7Spog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Classy

Cleanliness
Fastidiously clean

Service
Solid service

Food
Very disappointed this time.  My blackened chicken was excellent,
But the Calamari and Mac and Cheese were not good.  No flavour (completely bland, like flour taste bland), they could improve

Drinks
Good

Cost
High to mid high

Overall
Normally Recommended, but this time mixed feelings","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDP87otRE1PtfxxnFLKZb6TMMhiTbxrQ5KkKI&fid=0x0:0xf4dd29cf2d46a2d5"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"whatthefuk4","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6LEi31F-If0ZN1nUlwh1yJvDZQpCsFPxdXQdaeAHMr0ETGp4j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is top notch but only topped by the great service. I have always thought the keg is a little dark but is very comfortable. The bred and butter, the garlic baked shrimp the prime rib oh my haha.  It's one of our go to spots always.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrCbPnGGWTvCsVue7Y3eEyqdGGvXCZF6F-RMoy&fid=0x0:0xf4dd29cf2d46a2d5"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Dev Deteriorate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW174d3q1C68k3CIpTb3Y2mjhbzxdBX3351-dOCoOvMShWcsYWq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The fall off of The Keg needs to be studied. We came in on a Thursday night, nowhere near being packed. The service was great, our waiter was incredibly accommodating and there were plenty of drink options to appease everyone, however the food and wait was terrible. The bread wasn’t baked through, yeasty tasting. The Escargot was the highlight as an appetizer but it went all downhill from there. Waited over 40 minutes for entrees and they were tasteless. The veggies weren’t seasoned, carrots were hard as diamonds, garlic mash had no garlic and had a glue like consistency to it, definitely not how they used to do it. I know some places have a hard time with rare steak but it was cold to the touch and was mostly fat. The lobster was rubbery and overcooked, and the other was undercooked and almost slimey. The real kicker is that sometimes you can live with having an underwhelming experience or an off-night at a place you’ve trusted in the past, however at this price point it isn’t acceptable. Get it together.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6BHsOx1fvTPDz78zUPx2zyKhUsgFUizL10OFl&fid=0x0:0xf4dd29cf2d46a2d5"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"jen h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhCIsdNpI0zn0ln1R2W8y6FEnO7Rpwo3p2N6L3S94WtNoyzHf7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Our server was enthusiastic and upbeat but some of the check ins seemed more transactional and quick than hearing us ask what we needed. Nevertheless - he still got my birthday billy miner special and made the effort to make that special for me. This is a busy location so I recommend making reservations. The tile can be slippery so ladies be careful with your heels! We got seated on a particular kid/family oriented side and it was a bit loud for my liking but we didn’t have a reservation so we were fine with what we were given. Good good as usual just a bit more hectic of a visit but that was partly on the crowd we were sitting near. Nice welcoming staff which always helps too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMst2neGJGvcJlNRmFJ4qp48BFdHhP5ZefOdglc&fid=0x0:0xf4dd29cf2d46a2d5"],"When":"2023-11-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Justin Mcgrath","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_XTTxBP-sgyuskqkWRXleAFWJrdFtO5XGZfoEqFrfLhKutg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just had my first visit to this A&W at night , and it was awesome! The guy at the drive-thru was super friendly and cool. The food was tasty too! I left feeling happy and satisfied. Can’t wait to go back again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"London games","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0tPiQQrPtNdN8DhezIaHkkohgKenviETpSdjWECpblRTdHCfFzg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best customer service and friendly staff. A quick, worthwhile stop in Langley. This place should be anyone's preferred choice for fast food around here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Abhiram Veeravalli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQ3ZoYZD_9kVW0CQoSnbDifqq5r3CnvvZELFhQF0i4AQCEFeUG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
My family and I came from Saskatchewan to Vancouver for a vacation, and during our trip, we stopped by the A&W located at 8790 204 St, Langley TWP. We were so lucky to be served by "WENDY", who was incredibly kind and welcoming. We ordered two drinks, but the sweet shake machine stopped working. Instead of letting that be a problem, Wendy handled the situation with such grace and made us feel right at home.

I wanted to buy a small chai latte, and to my surprise, Wendy gave it to me for free because of the delay. While doing that, she also quickly fixed the broken machine and got us the drinks we originally ordered, all with a smile on her face. The way she handled everything was so polite, efficient, and professional—it truly made our day.

If you're ever in Langley City, I highly recommend stopping by this A&W. Wendy’s service is top-notch, and her warmth and friendliness will make your experience exceptional!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ricardo Amanda Paliotti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1-tWR3oImGXb1bh0eJaBkqqB4lKa--eRLaWv99DtP2gOoadI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Teen burger no sauce is the best fresh hot fries","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxLwg5KwEJSYJjfKeD0lh5szjWOwyG3QJUwJWI&fid=0x0:0x28375350d502dcc1"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Anureet Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocID-XBVCTomsm-dUJ-py2m-aLNzcEJsPyh_-3R_2hHfET1RRw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing service. Had  a great experience with great food and background music. Staff was very friendly as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christopher Robins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUf4b5i3de9znbAyQOtva5svf9Qk8KIU6nMLGJBdRjQWPqQT-vE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Having grown up with establishment and returning after a hiatus I doubt I shall be returning.

The higher quality meat and fries are an added benefit but the price comparison to other like chains makes this fast food option less desirable (when I could spend the same money at a more established diner for example)

We were dissatisfied most, however, with the root beer float which was all root beer and no float. Adding insult to injuring the drink was not even filled to the top.

Seeing the chain unable to deliver on their signature item in addition to substandard offerings (a few that don't need detail) makes it hard to suggest stopping here, when the value menu across the street is just as likely to get the job done (literally across the street in this case)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8iVe738f-2MIqPc7BFhgeU_JrlLBhWSPmI1H0&fid=0x0:0x28375350d502dcc1"],"When":"2018-6-9"},{"Name":"Younghan Oh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5qco4Z3G6kvdOO6zOWrVG-RNt_JornL3ZeqyCiEY4ZVbl13I8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wendy. The manager is so kind and friendly. I always have breakfast on every Saturday.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Johnny Cashmachine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJUIkAQBWJ4kIrckGfOQdUbbQEJX0iOgd5tgfwtnGX6l8WrWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place gets an extra star for the beyond meat burger.  Delicious for carnivores and herbivores alike!   After that, try the great onion rings.   This A&W has 4 or 5 tables outside, which is perfect to enjoy -on a hot day- some cold pop in the chilled mugs.  They have breakfast items for sale all day, which makes my son happy (but takes a few extra minutes).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyUSgJyLZxtRcAfP363GIVEEIO4Ha9e2uyJIxL&fid=0x0:0x28375350d502dcc1"],"When":"2019-6-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lori N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmtMtkjNfkcOZjUstSIaPewdazX3LaSbWZ-fPdp_MqWNPH1dsX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing!!! They turn into a nightclub on weekends. I went on a Friday night for the After Dark Halloween Party, and I had an absolute blast. The servers were great, and the DJ was playing epic tunes! I danced the night away. I'm so excited to have my birthday party here!!! I also love all the artwork on the walls/ceiling, AND they have a little arcade section, too, which is awesome!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR_Pyn5ODCCtASD8dquMis_9WSiv4XGEJ_UUkW&fid=0x0:0x41b740371a8a4d7a"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Philippe Filiatreault","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbgxGZPQVrP7MObEa8aq5atLxMSBir25PUjBU7NB6nZvGuww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Understaffed at 1pm on a Friday. Took about 10 minutes to place an order. Got our food at 1:40 with ten minutes to eat before leaving to go back to work. Buttermilk chicken sandwich was overcooked, coleslaw tasted 5+ days old from the fridge, not enough, sauce was virtually non existent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwXxp0NQndJpTt47_HdInvQJe3-EyGwU7Pc6nP&fid=0x0:0x41b740371a8a4d7a"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"2nd time coming here and both times were good vibes! Quick and easy to get, good drinks, food was okay, I like the interior layout and music was great both times!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQDjusceuW1IPO_2IhDykKMxK_g5Zu3OqR125m&fid=0x0:0x41b740371a8a4d7a"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Came once for a fundraiser, once because we wanted late night wings (and it happened to be in nightclub mode), and once for lunch. On all three occasions the food was decent and the service was very attentive and friendly. Prices are fair.

I feel like the fried foods (wings, fries, fish tacos) retain too much oil (a sign of the oil not being hot enough) but the overall flavours are good.

Food is served until late on weekends and there aren’t too many options nearby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO948Ubg3hVLgjD9uhaYnZufJotVlxiEIskOK1K&fid=0x0:0x41b740371a8a4d7a"],"When":"2024-2-27"},{"Name":"Ryan Muirhead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQ5WOAJn3zPlZppWxH-h-JB1ms6nzPNJSgz_5im5qta-IKd28L=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Thorne in my side maybe. Hard to rate the food when they never brought it. Staying at the Sandman and went for happy hour with a group. Half the things we ordered off the menu they didn’t have. Went for brunch the next day and waited over an hour for food and eventually left after getting tired of hearing it’s coming right away. The last time we asked he just said he didn’t know if it was coming. People who arrived later were being served food. No offer to comp drinks or anything. Just excuses. Poorly managed spot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vanessa Siemens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJKCfF96Py35XeRij3LfZ7iw1-PArlS476_Zv-0lpjLz3Xkx3yww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great food but the service for the second part of our visit was not so great.

The inside of this restaurant is very spacious with lots of great spots to sit. The decor is great and I especially loved the bookshelves and perusing the books that were there.

They have a good selection on their menu and some good options for happy hour. Had the corn dog happy hour and wished I had ordered the trio as it was very tasty. I enjoyed the perogies and my friend had the fish and chips- both were delicious. The French fries were especially delicious- nice and crisp and very flavourful... I would come back just for the fries.

Near the end it felt like our server had forgotten us. And when we were finally able to ask for our bill, it took about ten minutes before she reappeared. This was annoying, but overall I still think it's a great restaurant and I look forward to coming back, and hopefully the service will be better next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxaTZQayIMyZAMGy7t5jbSdwYZdMeA1RfGV7ip&fid=0x0:0x41b740371a8a4d7a"],"When":"2022-4-21"},{"Name":"Melissa Moretti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGNuTLSsgCXXcz9wovHeN_ZoLBKSItE-QDlbuPetn07Y71rQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Went to oak and Thorne last night as the prices were decent. We got there and had an amazing waitress. We got our pepperoni pizza within 15-20 min it was so oily and as I took my first bite I saw a mouse run across the floor near the entry way of the restaurant. Will not be going back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stacey Hood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVznOGUSzzv0qwt76iwof1jvM3q6fBJ0JYrW35B8xH8BPLqSGqyGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Some friends and I booked reservations here for the Tyson vs Paul fight and we had a really great time! The service was great, even with it being crazy busy and the food was delicious. We will definitely go back!","Images":null,"When":""}]

No gloves on, long unclean looking fingernails too, then came to the till to handle cash, right back to food without any glove or hand washing. No care in the world for food safety. Gross! Won’t be back here after see that.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephen Blakeborough","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVA9LpRSVyfHgEuYufzFtWJjmV76HAWp6jAN7Du7iTILD-caOe3Eg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered on skip the dishes for pickup.  The geriatric man behind the counter had no idea what he was doing and tried to tell me that there was no order for me he didn't know what I was talking about. Booths are gone thanks .DQ was one of my favorite places","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"sophie smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7gHOMjEzCSX2Xd4UG5VM4EmgCrdQGW-Fa-31naVrUbuMmAb66=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Came here waited 20 minutes in line to get to the window after ordering, the lady came to the window just to talk not even give the customer or make the customer infront their food, ice cream etc, not only that but after the 20 minutes when i had finally gotten to the window my two blizzards were melted, one was spilling over out of the cup. i asked for napkins the lady was rude didn’t say anything she handed me then while looking at me strange, when i pulled up to the window keep in mind my two blizzards are ordered were sitting to the side while the man before me his blizzards seem to have taken 20 minutes?? terrible service knowing i’m paying $22 dollars for blizzards that are melted and just pure plan ice cream at the bottom, not even the flavour we had asked for meaning they hadn’t blended it fully . terrible experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephanie Mehmood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImZxghNddXTd9Zl-YYFjCYNXUrsDXnR131iMyvgGZDEgWmqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food is good, but I miss the old seating setup. [{"Name":"Matt Giasson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqkM1O0yTI0pZn1tAyhaNsCIAuDnZt3sRjOpCsQiy6y4AGAA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst Quiznos experience ever. Rude workers who do bare minimum and speak terrible English couldn’t even order the right sub because they can’t understand. Pool quality and disgustingly dirty. Employees should be fired on spot for not washing hands before handling food after sweeping floor. GROSS!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipProb6n_QN-3VPv3fHpNPD6gnQVSiHBdhwlujfB&fid=0x0:0x1a24eae0231de2ac"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Alpha Dog","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsMqz1zvyLvvrOeQeEyDqaoE4F62THzzbdSpJQESAEIzP5MQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Been coming to Quiznos for over twenty years. The free honey mustard they used the give now costs $1 each and they won't even give you the container that fits the sandwich to dip in. They used to for years and years but refused to today. I drive from Maple ridge for this, will not ever return. I don't blame the staff, I blame the owner","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"nilesh jalgaonkar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjaDnwvwCifBZxaJHeoXIEosAH7c46zg_XDydMTdILtVmAGpqV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Disappointing Experience!

I visited the Quiznos location expecting it to open at 9:00 AM, as stated both on Google and on the sign at the store entrance. However, when I arrived, the staff refused to serve me, claiming that the store actually opens at 9:15 AM and that the information on Google and the entrance sign is incorrect.

This inconsistency is frustrating and misleading. If the opening hours have changed, they should be updated both online and at the store entrance to avoid inconveniencing customers. I hope this issue is resolved promptly to improve the customer experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christian K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUd-3B0Kje09RXrwTcpa-IQ64hnT6f6lAG8vCn6LIXqK-R_97CN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The people were trying to sell me extra things, and gave me a warm chocolate milk,  refused to give me a cold one, tried to push me into buying a combo...
Terrible service...But sandwich was good 👍

This particular place was terrible,  other Quiznos are better service..

The reply by owner is an absolute joke..
This place was terrible...
They sent me a link to fill out a long survey...This place has terrible service..
I have even reduced my stars for sandwiches","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"whatthefuk4","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6LEi31F-If0ZN1nUlwh1yJvDZQpCsFPxdXQdaeAHMr0ETGp4j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Meeehhh. They are good, but nothing like what Quiznos started off like. Big sandwiches big taste.  Nice break from Subway though.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pavan Rakhra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbol_x1jhS5G7pR11PFlyZvs_hJ_zzUO83ZCtxqXOUWx2aubSn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This Quiznos is the worst! Went there to grab food and when I got home the sub was lacking any toppings and it was like eating a piece of cardboard. When I called an explained I was unhappy with my order the employee started arguing with me. Asked for a refund as I was going to bring the entire order back and she told me she did not know how to give a refund. This place is terrible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPT0mKcsA0K6YiJbCYTvf98-Ze355fqmmUagKZf&fid=0x0:0x1a24eae0231de2ac"],"When":"2020-12-7"},{"Name":"robert cochran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsTtbRnOejYUyhhY_Lugt0aWGblU9lAlPQ7MZCIDymAx-C=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"There cleanliness is just horrible

Will never go back

Watched the workers drop mutiple things on the floor and lick them up to re sell them","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cheryl A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocId3JTMrjtqtdmj_0XOBMchbLGhcrTAO0uBPM1jzlHcNAjL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great staff - work well together to get the busy lunch customers through quickly","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhhr9spwHnvlGJ6CnE0vAEaP9jxAO643TtxRY&fid=0x0:0x1a24eae0231de2ac"],"When":"2022-11-17"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Megan Arnold","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVVQ6UdC6FQk2Op32CbJ5z8q5qgVso6G8RzVfy2VeuQ-Su0NC4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I've been to this location for many times through the past couple of years and this is the second time I've had a hair in my food. I do enjoy their food but I've noticed the consistency isn't quite there. A heads up when ordering breakfast sandwiches with egg - the egg usually is rubbery and overcooked.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYULvU7LOvAWxkbjqll51viq-QZaTzrU61wHFvmcmfYXjmYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"So, I got to this triple o’s quite a bit as I work in the area.  Overall they have been O.. K with the quality of food, some days are good and some are bad.  But I had to mention for last nights dinner, seems like my Cajun fries were only half filled.  And also take note of the cheese on burgers, half of mine was on the wrapper when opening up the package. Sorry don’t have a pic of that but I’m sure I can get one next time I order.  The burgers with are very hit n miss, some days it’s picture perfect while other days it looks like it’s been through the wash cycle.  I really wish this place was more consistent with the quality of food, as I, and most of my co-workers frequent this place quite a bit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOetv7ke0sJq3ijBWXJ5MfSE1-z0CaWg38JQNUs\u0026fid=0x0:0x60fffb091f74fa93"],"When":"2022-1-10"},{"Name":"Shinn Inagaki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIpF1gPQ6II9FjL7HoACMWpgmrVznxivHZdomkvTJ9wRIkWHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good people, clean store, good burger, everything is good except ice machine was not working on 30 degree hot summer day.\nIf the ice machine is working I would give 5 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuBwBMoL5YMNt3lIzCYwYc9ad1J2T0fO7MF1E\u0026fid=0x0:0x60fffb091f74fa93"],"When":"2023-7-15"},{"Name":"Joe Kan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXox-nJwRz67n_ueQPF6TsDkx0Jsn0F5J1MkGQUtysCC2ivrHqF_w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We got two french fries, beef and chicken burger which came with two drinks. The price, a whooping $31 and change!! My fault, didn't pay attention to the price as I thought it was relative to other fast food restaurants like McDonald's. Not worth it.\nAlso, the bench is very uncomfortable on your back. See the pic. It has a depression on your shoulder blades. Not sure how they designed it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdfEVuV35Q4Awa6VFbMpaSTfeEdWh2jJAWG0BK\u0026fid=0x0:0x60fffb091f74fa93"],"When":"2021-10-6"},{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is located inside the gas station.  Their triple O burgers are excellent especially on Tuesday deal.  Try their lettuce wrap style triple O burger.  Not only healthy but also tastes great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwaNOvUtpLLpr5hrlPBMbeiG24TsEqpGufatRo\u0026fid=0x0:0x60fffb091f74fa93"],"When":"2023-6-11"},{"Name":"Brandon Crowe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVM5gXzrJACVherpeLdszLTHbpopst08Vj34efOa6Q68sMWUmUD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Somehow, I've lived around Triple O's various locations for 20 years and I've never managed to try their Chipotle Burger.  This disappoints me greatly as it's one of the best (Top 3 or 4) burgers I've ever had, and that's a lot of different burgers.  I will definitely be returning as I feel you do not truly experience something until you've tried it twice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYifuW6voOQ2ddEBRodcd__inuKMsac-Rpa2gb\u0026fid=0x0:0x60fffb091f74fa93"],"When":"2021-8-10"},{"Name":"Jeff barrett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkLjRYdqaaOjCsvTr6DLppCkaBURj9oIoPewjo2yjNUQSRg7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Last time I was here burgers were dried out and overcooked, it’s on the way home so decided to try it again. Dirtiest I’ve ever seen it, straws all over the floor a dip cup on the floor that the guy working stepped on several times instead of picking up, been here 16 minutes now and still waiting for a double double…. Finally got my burger after 25 minutes, not worth the wait for a $20 fast food burger","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeremy Yorke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKsouBt6ykfOlAiy9vCyj8Cq1dDGp2jrc3_ux05BzFch18GC176Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stop in got the spicy habanero chicken burger 🍔. it's was the best chicken burger, the staff were really friendly, fast and helpful i highly recommend this location","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"x","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhmJKDr7DJ4CGvY4IhEGbbWGqO-ap4CiO1rDd-9zbUBZo3Dg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for the Halloween 50% off menu promo at 8:30pm! Best decision ever made! Durian pizza was 10/10! It was so good that we bought another to go! The salt and pepper wings was also well seasoned and cooked! Everything came out piping hot and delicious! There was only one guy working so he told us it’ll be 25 minutes wait or so. Well worth the wait! He was so nice and helpful! Our first time here and we’ll definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgfAtBmGKukgwtZD8c91i9EDApq0fjoaWPy9ti&fid=0x0:0x4fc739809f4ecdb5"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"GR Randhawa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOb6GroAxpH3t4jYqK0Ht-b2N0K9SdGLTdsF-eHhZqC2Jwmk11=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I loved the butter chicken and bbq pizza. The quality is consistent and the prices are reasonable. I also noted that the service is quick, even on busy nights.  The staff was very friendly and polite. Great customer service. This will definitely be my place to go for pizza. 😊❤️💯","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1j2dqnh40u2LAsEtWS4wWkm5NdOOP2hQCSSwX&fid=0x0:0x4fc739809f4ecdb5"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Ahmad Omair Azimi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5MQSaeVyRp0OY88pBCSSJcWGgiD36MWEgjgo4g5U2cdoC3u0D=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"So I just got this beefy crunch Pizza from here and while eating and enjoying my food I felt something in my mouth, when I got it out and saw it was a tiny plastic wire looking thing, I just ignored the first and second time unfortunately, but it just kept coming and I was no more interested in that pizza. I always loved their Pizza but I'm never buying another one from here unfortunately. Even our company buys pizza from this place sometimes for lunch, no more for me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOFV8LLU_KCqipWDS6OBgs5U6Rwuq-OdeM8te5&fid=0x0:0x4fc739809f4ecdb5"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Roddie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqBa_SudQrA8lQV5TwCxEko2bBTKmubomw6zfTLQWSvQb56HLkhg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This pizza is delicious and very good . All but one pizza had good amount of topping but this pizza was delicious so it's a personal preference. I would order here again very though the staff made mistake . I wanted buffalo breaded wings and boneless chicken honey garlic, they are switch up on me 😕 . The wings are delicious though I wish they were hot wings.
If you take away the human error. Great food that was delicious not greasy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgIeU8Z0TTGyZpftvrXcmIRl3GZdyHFEzMN9DK&fid=0x0:0x4fc739809f4ecdb5"],"When":"2023-12-14"},{"Name":"Roxan Tyke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDKleKrncVH5ePTmeLatxcu3RMITu4kEdmKdhZCQHRGI_WGA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the gluten free vegan special. Delicious. Vegan pepperoni too. Loved it. Crust was chewy and fluffy. My fave. Reminds me of the good old days with Jim's Pizza in Langley. Husband picked up and said they were really nice in there. Great job guys. We'll see you soon!  (PS Family all had meat pizzas and enjoyed theirs too.)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"T L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlZv7_BS76hKZVl0Wb4gyyjBqUyJq5wa407QgwWRTbVcuuHoaG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The employee working tonight was great, we had some issues using the online ordering and ended up, resorting to calling it in. She was very receptive to our order and immediately gave a total price.

Upon arrival, I did have to wait a little bit but I was okay with it since she was the only person working. After payment she even offered additional dipping sauces, which I appreciated.

As for the food: the regular cheese pizza was good, with a thin crust. The keto/gluten free one was okay, since the crust was quite soft. And I didn’t love my pasta because the sauce seemed to be their creamy garlic dip, which to me, doesn’t fit as an actual sauce. I would’ve much rather preferred a regular Alfredo. Finally, the s’mores dessert pizza. It was delicious, especially when warmed up. The chewy crust, gooey marshmallow and the Nutella make for a tasty bite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkyWGEfmCOAWG7EcS0eP-y-K_RHoQ3JVkK_2N6&fid=0x0:0x4fc739809f4ecdb5"],"When":"2023-8-4"},{"Name":"En Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3O7mgqp0mQv_E7V7OeVPGn5-qinKKzOSt-9OrKZxARZRTgg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Pizza here typically pretty good however tonight was an exception because of lukewarm pizza arriving from a new driver after an inept delivery driver pestered me with calls and texts after telling him where I lived even though my full address and unit number was submitted online. The owner then said he remade the pizza when it arrived successfully this time but it wasn’t hot at all so I’m lead to believe they re delivered the same pizza from the first failed delivery despite saying it was made fresh again. Disappointing as the price and quality is typically good","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVipHG8w6-kH6vMLEtUKBUYQybeYL_poDooYSzOIk-WtxlZqtu3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good service, hard-working staff member. Lots of free parking. Good pricing on 3 topping small and medium pizzas. Best for takeout but there are a couple of small tables that will seat three people each.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKftOej971xNoHSB7EloGUfqzHtUMUgOuRAxgs&fid=0x0:0x4fc739809f4ecdb5"],"When":"2023-11-12"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Briana Magnussen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK79Bp5HL-PDMAKJACuxSuAx-3cE5LlYYzZMw0vfDKGbvnY9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantasticly fresh food and attentive service with a beautiful free sample! I highly recommend this sushi restaurant!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgLRRbjEvpbRi_lH3HBd9_vqarZdE2gDwNQdRv\u0026fid=0x0:0xb5cc2138c5bca098"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"sudip kc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWip5kBLnBa9j89Q8HUrlVvg2gaknlSO0fISHNENuHBE0_QfXw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They serve a good sushi with a special sauce. I just love it. If you are nearby this location, try it on one time.....","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7UVGZ3kzPzG18yIUA14nzF40am8dEM-ZefL8W\u0026fid=0x0:0xb5cc2138c5bca098"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Lucas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTd1Rqs7VgPhdrfxxG4D9LIBsTUDrAsKvUnxDxUDS6a4O3GLQ_HQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This has become mine and my stepdaughters \"place\". We love it here. The atmosphere is mellow and low-key cozy with a pop of action figure/superhero vibe. Just so happens the food is awesome too. I got the Nabeyaki and she got the Crazyboy, a fried California Roll, with the Miso soup. It was all so delicious. But what we really love is that we have our table, we have our tea, we chat, we interact with our gracious hosts and enjoy some great food. It just feels like you're at home. I would highly recommend you check it out!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMup1w3hdUvVQDsLxlpeWG38NPQKSIMqOv7Db0\u0026fid=0x0:0xb5cc2138c5bca098"],"When":"2023-12-11"},{"Name":"Tehzeeb Buttar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXC5kf9rhePC74FuVD05SvGk_rsAEXw7q6MkCNFdPqTD7HdFqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For starters the place is small but very cozy. When we got there the place was fairly busy. The staff were very kind and sweet, and they gave us complimentary rolls to try! Oh my goodness the food! Delicious and amazing! Definitely recommend and definitely would come back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaspreet Malhi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFqeDmTA-0Pd5ehTORDCo4cdu-TaxlQ606aqWdxhEXvOfEIVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food and service 10/10! I ordered my food 10 mins in advance and said I’ll be there to eat for my lunch break, they had everything ready perfectly on time and fresh when I arrived! Thank you for the amazing experience and service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOes9P0cMcnsIEXeXpVLO1Qw7bBuuptxog1h-is\u0026fid=0x0:0xb5cc2138c5bca098"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Ray Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnHoKzUHN2laU2bSp7bGdZulx8wlTrl7fcyIV2n_GmA8fi001AHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has to be the best Sushi joint in Langley. Everything here is made fresh and even the Miso soup is very good much more better than other Sushi places I been though around the lower mainland. I will most definitely come back here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNapzuourHLoIBNCHEWoSKMwftWLxST3b6QV7GZ\u0026fid=0x0:0xb5cc2138c5bca098"],"When":"2023-3-18"},{"Name":"Laura Mills","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVthiElYPRWnZZeMADCe8CJBqvXAa4YsFBAgaFK5DScomR7__TR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cute and cozy little restaurant. Food was delicious and fresh tasting, they gave me a little deep friend piece of sushi “on the house”. Plus my server was super cute! Will definitely eat here again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kevin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsniG3zu4SwMphpH7SkESPPBxlDgD_IGwyVScP4N-Rh_5M1mDk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite sushi spots. Super lucky to have a spot of this quality out in Langley! I usually go for nigiri wherever I go. Akane also has really good miso soup.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfvHbbA055jjBi50q223GgFQD_CA73eeBe9wFV\u0026fid=0x0:0xb5cc2138c5bca098"],"When":"2024-4-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Pilo News","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFId9ZdkkvXmcYiLmTK0bEP9YVRba_LZHmLxWEpHSLdGMlepoT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"KFC consistently delivers delicious fried chicken that's crispy on the outside and juicy inside. The menu offers a great variety, including classic sides like mashed potatoes and coleslaw. The staff is generally friendly, and service is quick. Perfect for a satisfying meal on the go or a casual dining experience. Highly recommend for comfort food lovers!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael MacFarlane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkMYkB6AZeryGkteoA9PyiFBYw3XJ5uVnYu8tHK_UBUMCKhQRh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food was fine, washroom was disgusting, dried piss and pubic hairs on the toilet, can of.vodka on the sink, doesn't look like it's been cleaned in months... Oh and they were out of dipping sauce, how do you completely run out of dipping sauce?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRLFgMqnWblQ_VLS5pw9Fe5_rZJDdk_JBzEEYd&fid=0x0:0x297ef43bcba95206"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"Freda Piskorik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQPcsgbAYk01za34Ezm_h9HMS6D00O2lnz02l0dwe34VdQjtdI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The place smells bad. The chicken is the greasiest I have ever had. The service was beyond slow. I ordered for pickup and it still took 40 mins. I would give zero stars if I could. Do not come to this KFC. It is truly the worst I have every encountered","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKNsA5-Xf8J9j6w0PqEKTZYhKWHkbErzlaLq1o&fid=0x0:0x297ef43bcba95206"],"When":"2023-11-1"},{"Name":"James Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzCe3Rn76tL8TyMPQ2z3iLCbunNcC0_1JY4uhNmKdw4Ku1hH6h=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I don't normally leave reviews, but this place calls for it.

Ordered a two piece meal. The "leg" was not much bigger than a ketchup packet, and the breast was not much bigger than the leg. Also, the food was overcooked and dry; the flesh was as hard as bone. I know KFC isn't the best place for chicken, but this is a new low. Avoid this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-6D95rYrz3im6GGYPftHFMqVTOejeQsa0-FLY&fid=0x0:0x297ef43bcba95206"],"When":"2024-2-12"},{"Name":"Sarah Lorette-Francisco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAa36MfhXbKMTs8_aZ43JhK_289F1E74sMQdv6GavkR507Vy_U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Pretty upset when we came here and spent almost $80 on our kfc takeout and we asked for 4 pieces of the white meat chicken breasts and i cant believe they gave me literal BITE SIZED breasts... even the bigger pieces are sooooo small. And im usually full after 1 chicken and i think i can probably eat all 4 and ill still be hungry. Probably the smallest amount of food i have ever got for $80... i shouldve went to The Keg or Cactus Club for this price.. even the FULL SIZE poutine was probably the size of a small fries....

UPDATE:
I opened up the Bacon Cheese Chicken Chicken and they gave me the bits and pieces leftover bacon... not even 1 single strip of bacon is in this burger its all just tiny pieces... i dont think we will be coming back to kfc...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9-VTr9jC4XIILKxpei6ICpI4yyDjMK9OCvIt9&fid=0x0:0x297ef43bcba95206"],"When":"2023-7-31"},{"Name":"HARSH SHARMA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK82K-fBBBfU77I8KpFBd6Px1siB00MBwRNjLbNg7Dvg0TLEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This location needs good employees.All the people working here are non serious and are busy in themselves. They only talk to each other and customers keep on waiting. They do not have any coordination between each other. They need a good manager who can make these lazy people focus on work.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Richard Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNYIJbRkdm1FkZ9ErWHnKhelREeYKQDPCL3STxQ2uQ3wQ1Ug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I went in for take out and I forgot to add some dipping sauce and gravy to my order and I had already paid.. the staff threw together a little bit of gravy and sauce for my granddaughter chicken strips and said have a great day.. this was very special for me at that exact moment because I had just lost my mom to lung cancer like 14 hours ago and after I left it actually made me cry and I told mom in heaven that I knew she had a hand in it and thanked her.. so it wasn't too greasy and it was all hot.  I enjoyed it and my family was also pleased with our dinner.. so thanks kfc Langley","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"L E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW79xhOb3PNhkRJLL-Sc62jfFAuNlT3SiAm7wuz85V_msM54COvYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Terrible, terrible meal. Cold oversalted fries and colder tasteless gravy, several PC's of the chicken were torn apart, one drumstick was so bad we threw it away. It was dried out and mangled, and it had burnt grill marks on it. How does food that was never grilled get grill marks? Lousy service, place was not clean - an absolute disaster. I used to love KFC, my kids wondered why we have never bought it for them, now they know. Seriously, I should get a full refund and an  apology for Bering served this garbage","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPC-Fe3oXxpf2NqjCARdsOa9aJTtH4yuXrqlEpo&fid=0x0:0x297ef43bcba95206"],"When":"2023-11-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fionn Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6QM4xX4rnjDy7uQ9_UX1ud-FeXhAIPbUGuv1ks1vTREnqqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food tasted amazing! It came out fast and the staff were super nice as well. Definitely will come back again. It’s not an upscale restaurant but it’s affordable and tastes great. Definitely on the authentic side","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMN5PtM78hOk2AlWDnJd9KvbBvlQ85W3VWtexm&fid=0x0:0xdd0f62780c5a0753"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"MrEgrass","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAJkWyksLi8Em65E-PPcT-kNUmbyu6r4HHpABPX6DElNCP1f0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Pho in Vancouver as far as I'm concerned. Also, great deep-fried wontons. Priced well and food come out amazing and very fast. The atmosphere is basic, but that is part of its charm. If you have eaten abroad in places like this, it brings back fond memories. Don't miss out on trying this place!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQLdiC4v6bG8pAd16e6XRbmnfpbhZm1aCw_0uj&fid=0x0:0xdd0f62780c5a0753"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Snoopy Kitchen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3h-I-trbYva-Tzrs-UNhkQe4Nn1jgsblAcoQ0hPrnUWvugM3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Normal pho restaurant. Can’t get wrong.  Just a bit under renovated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZjEFmMAB2nfZSvF2a0L2kkBOTGcmrexYver3B&fid=0x0:0xdd0f62780c5a0753"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Darcy Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9CSSiU-uC79dWrDwPGpKpZTdHa7GEPqFul9fxTdBkOUM4-vA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered #9 pho tai with well done and tripe. Just what the doctor ordered for a cold wet rainy day. Servings were generous and delicious for a $15 bowl of soup. Definitely a solid place in Langley. Thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7MlcPuGYgq4AvIOpgzzPOikHxIE6jtZXK1e4a&fid=0x0:0xdd0f62780c5a0753"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Jack Pajak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7kRSq5QM1wGXm36_dbE9YR6CpcUs9VUAhu1SxvpJkrQ-nGO0N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little family owned Vietnamese restaurant. You can tell that the owners really care about quality. I had the beef ball and rare beef pho, it was great and really hit the spot for me. The broth in the Pho was amazingly flavorful, they had a good amount of add ins and a decent amout of meat. Everything was fresh, came out quickly and we loved it. My wife and son really enjoyed their meals too, my son had the wonton soup with bean sprouts and my wife has the beef ball pho. We shared a salad roll to start too, which was very good. I would definitely be back...it is a great location... we stopped on the way to watch the Giants game. I would definitely recommend Pho Triple 3.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPle4Tu2Byl6R684RYGUZONMgUHT3tR8wxfV6Ep&fid=0x0:0xdd0f62780c5a0753"],"When":"2024-3-23"},{"Name":"Bohee Warkentin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1Us2b77KmpIDoMYOWppMf6UBDNkYM3zVv2vFIrPPAaHYaGBBkoA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Update:
I've dined in several times this year and I'm disappointed in the decline in their food portion and flavour. They increased their prices, which is completely understandable due to the inflation. However, the portion of noodles and meat are substantially smaller, the broth tastes watered down, and bun bo hue lacks flavor. I thought it was just one day, but the last two visits left me feeling unsatisfied.

By far, my favourite Vietnamese restaurant in Langley. The bbq grilled pork and chicken are moist and tender. Pho and bun bo hue is great for the cold weather and full of flavors and generous portions of meat. Staff are friendly, and the service is prompt. It's not as nice looking as its competitor nearby, but the food and the service is top notch. And the ventilation is poor inside, be prepared to smell like grilled food for the rest of the day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJE3GSoDtGiB3v_tlmBhT12V3YqhtlnhH81l6t&fid=0x0:0xdd0f62780c5a0753"],"When":"2020-12-8"},{"Name":"Jaylene Law","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIav-9zoyY9lDIuknaSnD0Xt8SxqwCSeF8yyROKohYLFQTGZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love this place! I’ve been a loyal customer for years, and despite trying many other pho restaurants (mainly on Sundays when Triple 3 is closed), this one remains my number one. The food is consistently amazing, with rich, flavourful broth and fresh ingredients. The salad rolls are my favourite. The service is always friendly and attentive. If you’re looking for the best pho in town, this is the place to go. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sampson Low - eXp Realty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5-nAJ3Hfrda7C10R7DZFzGI9EIQe40LQVumTj4ikshD9ogtV4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the Lemon Chicken Com and Pho here!! The marination and grilling is to perfection.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-UVhtg6mQ0JGPffI7VCjaIlOeoOh0n88f4mF7&fid=0x0:0xdd0f62780c5a0753"],"When":"2024-6-7"}]

[{"Name":"Veerpal Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZN_4_o81fyaabNlwh0zET2gvJ-3wHyDOC6ugJi8SOVI1W-JM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had great experience with Subway in this location. Employees were so kind and polite. Soft bread and great taste as compared to other locations. Would like to visit again and again♥️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNH2e9nlBhd6XhSxFNPQXRyAmSCK74izpfcRME&fid=0x0:0x1dd0efdd5a428f65"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"KB Bastt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9QXKZ3W7g_FMzyc9zYXNfrTZmKuOqEE1kcG4eHzAJi7fElA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best SUBWAY I’ve had in my entire life. So much better than the subs in Manitoba. Bread was absolutely fresh and baked to perfection, toppings were all completely fresh and flavourful, veggies crisp and tasty... complete quality fresh flavour.

As well, the cookies were very fresh and baked just the right amount of time.

Restaurant was clean.

Service quick and pleasant.

Good location.

EASY 5/5!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8ARWx74nKUyB_HbjhT-g8yrzsmxoJADYn8ghc&fid=0x0:0x1dd0efdd5a428f65"],"When":"2023-8-17"},{"Name":"Vera W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlAT2yknx7ggSgfcB2g1vKn-L9e3cpFpBLkof3T9pTEyQaOt4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered 2 foot longs today and was absolutely flabbergasted by the food quality and portion. The bread was stale and the veggies tasted old. Now on to the food portion part. Both of my foot longs were not 12 inches long for sure, they looked shorter and thinner. And the amount of chicken they gave me was scarily small. They were so little that I barely tasted the flavor of the chicken. Need to improve a lot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bansi Khant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEknKHs5BCZh8ldDUUSHJm-RxN31Gd-WO6faHT71rcnHWdMjhM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had visited this subway so many times. Never had any complaints.
It is always neat and clean. The staffs are also friendly. Well skilled and fast workers even in queue.

Great work guys!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjtGrEqXwD_2bUhsFGqyeSYn-SRfZRJniXaSWr&fid=0x0:0x1dd0efdd5a428f65"],"When":"2024-2-13"},{"Name":"Raghavendra Sagisetty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1ekq5TBoevPmljeCfHDV4Ip69Vnmt55udegqkx1PW-clVXA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I bought a Shawarma rice bowl today in the morning. I can't believe it the chicken and rice getting smell. I called them and they saying it's fresh. Anyone who buy food here don't blindly trust them check or even taste your food before leave the store. I could't go back and return it. I don't prefer to go this place next time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Know The Truth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCuzVOAUpb5FkCW7_vVeE1ek3sxF2UJZZJxu_K-6sNn69WeO4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Do not go to this store. Very bad, dishonest on portions and do not give you what is advertised. I order a Signature Sweet Onion Teriyaki Checking Rice bowl and here is what I got. Compare these to what they advertise, no even close.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1nmeSIXvJB-9IzvXV792F2wpDYcd6gye1RkvK&fid=0x0:0x1dd0efdd5a428f65"],"When":"2022-12-18"},{"Name":"Carol Glover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyK23Wh-4AAlZff7xHCuJ-eR5OKVeLn9qLCK8bjSzi8tJbIk4Y9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Clean and organized. It's a smaller subway store but the staff were nice, the bathroom was clean amd the tables weren't kept as such so that's the only thing I have to write about here","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arashdeep Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaZKTuQE6UAvVi2mG5rqherZSKAQdbZndMIWe8r3ETQFuL6JY-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"So disappointed.. ordered through Uber Eats and this is what I got. Please do better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORs7gdUxduShwpnjwAwvCmbuM_wkKLrwiv74x7&fid=0x0:0x1dd0efdd5a428f65"],"When":"2023-3-18"}]
